Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃-á sõ̀ mɛ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ tɔ́wû tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, nósyɔ́ pɔ wil mɔ pé yõ. Sárká syínwìlkìpu yísyɔ́ ye sõ̀, ànɛ̂ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô syɩ́kɩ́pú yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, à tahlɩ Sadusɛ̃ névye yísyɔ́ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ kénɛ no fɔkɔ sõ̀ mɛ kah vyãh Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃nɛ, pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ nɛ, Yesu-á ku tɛ́ yilki mɔ, ànɛ̂ lékyɩ̂ tɔ-á kɩ pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi.
Képah sɔkɔ, pè pè tɛ̃. Tɛ́ lékã̂h-á sõ̀ mɛ mɔ n tɛ sɛ̃́, képah ye pè pè dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, pópó à pɔ syɩ dĩndal tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ nónó-á Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye kwɔ́nɔ́ noh, pé náhnáh Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nɔ nɛ́pĩ̂ kèyõ nínɔ́ kyɛgbãm (5 000) kénkɔ̃lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, ké dĩndallɛ, Nsyifunɔ yõ̀tãm, ànɛ̂ kwil yèwàhnɩ̀, ànɛ̂ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kwɔ́pú wɛ̃ tuke Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ.
Sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ An sõ̀ mɛ ànɛ̂ ǹ gbô tãn póllɛ. Pépi túkù ye sõ̀ pɩ Kayifilɛ, ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃nɛ, ànɛ̂ Alɛkisãdrelɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃ tɛ̃ pɔ pé nɩyṍ, à pɔ pè piki yah nɛ, tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ nɛ̂ gbõ̀ yõ se, képah náh pɩ, nɛ̂ yĩn yõ se pè pɩ dɛ́nmɔnɔ mɛ̀nɛ nɩ?
Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, Pyɛrɩ pè syah nɛ:
«Kwil yõ̀tãm ànɛ̂ yèwàhnɩ̀, áyáh pèpɔrɩ pɩ sèkùkù dĩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́, képah yõ sɔkɔ náh yé n piki n yah álɛ kwɛynɛ nɛ, sɔ̃́ se á pɩ, tɛ́ à dɛ mɔ di?

Yépi pól ànɛ̂ Yisrayel tãn pól yɩ̃nɛ yè kè pɩ̃ nɛ, Nasarɛtɩ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ-á dĩ́ mɛ̀nɛ yĩ́nntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé yah sɔkɔ lènɔlɛ yɔ̀. Yépi ye syɩ Yesulɛ dahnɩ yõ, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ ǹ lékó yilki mɔ.
Ǹmɔ Yesu tyɩ́ ye yónɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: ‹Wɔ̀kɔ̀ mɔ́pú-á yahle dáhkɩ̀ nɛ̂ mɔ́nkõ̀nɔ́lɛ, képah ye pɔ pɩ wɔ̀kɔ̀ dáhgbɩ́lɛ.›»
Képah náh, Pyɛrɩ tɔ̃ nɛ: «Yesu ó yĩn kɩ fɛ̃ névye pwah mɔ. Nɛ́ ǹmɔ ó yĩn náh, yĩn yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ kɔ̃ kèkõyṍ, nɛ̂-á kɩ fɛ̃ névye min pwah mɔ.»

Tukey tùkèpu sõ̀ pɩ̃ nɛ Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃ náh Nsyifunɔ kǎrn ǹgbɛ̃ pɩ, ànɛ̂ pè náh mɛ n mɔ n kõ nɛ́npɔ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Tɛ́ pǎh n wɛkɩ nɩ̀sãh ànɛ̂ lékã́mnɛ sɛ̃́, képah mɛ pé gbã̀n du. Ǹtɛ pè mó tɔ̃ sõ̀ pɩ̃ nɛ, pépi-á lésõ Yesu kɔ́mûnɛ.
Tɛ́ pé yĩ́-á mó tɔ̃ sõ̀ mɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀ yõ nɛ̂-á dɛ́nmɔnɔ wɛ, tyíyóné náh tɔ̃ wɛ pé tyɩ́.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè Pyɛrɩpi kɔ̃ pè wil tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì wrɔ́, tɛ́ pépi mɛ wɛ̃ wɛ pé yahlɛ
tɛ́ nɛ, sɔ̃́ se pé kɩ pɩ no nɔ́pilɛ nɩ? Ńkɛ̃́, kɔ̃lɩ kɔ̃lɩ tɛ̃̀ náh se mó tɔ̃ kélɛ tɛ́. Yerusalɛmɩ tãn pól-á pɩ̃ nɛ, Pyɛrɩpi-á pɩ gbǐl mɛ̀nɛ.
Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé ye kè yahle pé tyɩ́ dírí sɔkɔ nɛ, pè káh tɔ̃ Yesu yĩnnɛ n yo ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́. Képah-à pɩ, yĩ mɛ̀ náh n tɔ̃ n mɔ n yuku n pi yahlɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè tɔ̃ pè ye, tɛ́ kè yahle pé tyɩ́ gbógbó nɛ, pé káh tɔ̃ Yesu yĩn noh n yah pé vyɛ̃y yah, ànɛ̂ pè káh tɔ̃ kwɔ́nɔ́ pɩ ǹ yĩn yõ.
Ǹtɛ Pyɛrɩpi pè syah nɛ: «Yépi ńtɛ̃ kè sõ n yah kɛ̀: Kè se mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́, áyâh ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yɛ, tɛ́ yépi yóré fɛ̃ syi?
Ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, áyáh nɛ̂ wɛ, tɛ́ nɛ̂ noh, á náh fɛ̃ n yɛ n pi sé yã́hnɔ́lɛ.»

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tukey tùkèpu tɔ̃ dírí gbah wɔ pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ pè fĩn mɔ. Pè náh sõ̀ mɛ vì-ǹsah wɛ pé wɛ fõh fõh tɛ̃̀nɛ, no pól-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ Liyel yĩnnɛ n gbilki Pyɛrɩpi tyípɩ́kɩ̀ mɛ̀ yĩnnɛ.
Tɛ́ dĩ́ nɛ̂ dɛ́nmɔnɔ-á sõ̀ pɩ gbǐllɛ, à kah ye tikininínɛ.
Pǎh fyɔ̀ Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃ fĩn mɔ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm ànɛ̂ yèwàhnɩ̀-á nɛ̂ yo pé tyɩ́, pè kyɩ sè pól yãh pé kɔ́mû tyɩ́.
Pé wɛlɔ nóhntɛnɔ náh, pé pól pé sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ, à Liyellɛ n ni nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, áwɔ ye mɔ yĩ̂nyõlɛ, ànɛ̂ sétáhlɛ, ànɛ̂ pnɛ yɔlɛ, à tahlɩ sé sɔkɔ yíyìn pól tyɩ́.
Ápi náh nɛy Davidi nɛ̂-á á tõ̀npɩlɛ, áwɔ ye à kɔ̃ à kè yo á Mirki gbõ̀ yõ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Kwâh nɛ̂ yúkúnyahlenɔ mɛ kwlo kwlo tyɩ́?
Kwâh nɛ̂ tyíkwɛ̂ sõnɔ mɛ névye sɔkɔ!
Kèkõyṍ yõ̀tãm wɛ̃ tyɩ́ mɔ,
tɛ́ yah tãm tɔ tuke mɔ, à pɩ núkúlɛ,
pè Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyellɛ n fwo ànɛ̂ ǹ nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ.›

Gbɩ yõ, kwil mɛ̀ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Yerɔdɩ ànɛ̂ gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Põse Pilati ye wɛ̃ tyɩ́ mɔ, à tahlɩ Yisrayel tãn ànɛ̂ kwlo kwlo tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́, pè á tõ̀npɩ Yesulɛ n fwo, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ.
Yah, wáh lésõ á tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ sɔkɔ tyi nónó yah tɔkɔ sah á dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ, sépi ye pè pɩ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, yah pè ápilɛ n kyĩ n kɔ̃ kɛ̀! Nɩ̀sãh ǹgbɛ̃nɛ á kɔ̃, à á wɛynɛ n yah n yo, ápi nónó-á á tõ̀npɩbɩlɛ.
Tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ á kɔ̃, à yámpúlɛ n dɛ n mɔ, à mó gbǐl tyilɛ n pɩ, á tõ̀npɩ Yesu yĩn yõ.»
Tɛ́ fɩ̃́ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á sõ̀ pélɛ tùkènmɔnɔlɛ, nírí-á fyɔ̀ n tyɛ, nɛ́npɔ́ núkú yike. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel Mirki pé pól tɔkɔ, pè tyah Liyel wɛynɛ n yah n yo n kɔ̃ nɩ̀sãhlɛ.

Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól sõ̀ mɛ n sõ dùkù núkúlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé nɛ n pɩ dùkù núkúlɛ. Pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ n yo nɛ, pé gbã̀n yîlɛ, pé gblɔ̌y núkúní tyɩ́-á sélɛ. Tɛ́ pé wɛ̃ wrɔ́, pé pól gbã̀n yî sõ̀ pɩ tɔ́wû tyɩ́lɛ.
Tɛ́ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ ye sõ̀ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ yónwàhpu kègblɔlɛ, à ǹ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n kɔ̃ nɛ, wǎh ku tɛ́ yilki mɔ. Tɛ́ Liyel pèpɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ sõ̀ mɛ pé pól yõ.

Swɛ̃y, képah náh pɩ, gbên-à sõ̀ mɛ nónó tyɩ́, pě sélɛ n yãm, ǹ tɛ́ sé pɔ́lɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ n kɔ̃. Pépi n mó sélɛ n dibi, à yɩ̃nɛ pé nɛ́núkù núkú pól fyã̀hnɔ́nɔlɛ. Képah ye, yãm pɩ́-ò náh sõ̀ mɛ pé sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, Nsyosɛfu yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ, nɛ̂-á dubi Syipri gbɛ̃̀nyah. Levi yìkì nɛy ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ. Tɛ́ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye mɛ yĩn dyɩ à kɔ̃ Barnabasɩlɛ, nɛ̂ kɔ́r-á sṍré mɔ́-òlɛ.
Ǹmɔ mɛ ǹ swãh yãm, tɛ́ mɛ pɔ ké pɔ́lɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye gbõ̀ dahbɩ.
Ǹtɛ dĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ pè n ye Ananiyasilɛ. Ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ kyɩ Safira mɛ pé sétáh yɔ́ yãm, tɛ́ yo sah núkú yõ,
à ké pɔ́ túkù kãm sah. Képah náh, Ananiyasi mɛ kyɩ ké pɔ́ tɛ́ynɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye kɔ̃.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, Ananiyasi, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ se pɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ́ wɛ de yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ nɩ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ mɩ̀nɩ̀ yo Liyel Mirki tyɩ́, tɛ́ sétáh yã̀mnɔ́ pɔ́ túkù kãm sah nɩ?

Sétáh mɛ̀ yã̀m-ǹkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́nɛ, ǹ yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tyɩ́ kó sõ̀ kélɛ nɩ? Wǎh tɔ̃ pɔ kè yãm, ké pɔ́ kó pɩ ǹmɔ tyɩ́lɛ nɩ? Ǹtɛ yĩ mɛ̀ dùkù pɩ́nɔ́ sõnɔ se pɩ sɔ̃́, tɛ́ de ǹ nɩ sɔkɔ nɩ? Ńkɛ̃́, névye ó tyɩ́ náh à yo mɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ dɛ́, Liyel tɔ tyɩ́-á.
Ananiyasi-á fyɔ̀ kénɛ wɛlɔ noh, à núkú syɩkɩ ku. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, nónó pól-á yĩ mɛ̀ noh, tíkí pè kah tɛ̃.
Wǎh ku sɛ̃́, kètɛ̃̀npì mɛ pɔ ǹ lékó fɔkɔ, tɛ́ à tɔkɔ kyɩ yɩ̃.
Képah náh, lɛ́rɩ́nɔ́ tɔ̃́nɔ́ kénkɔ̃ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, ǹ kyɩ pɔ de nɛ́npɔ́, tɛ́ tir nɛ̂-á pɩ sɔkɔ, à náh sõ̀ mɛ kè pɩ̃.
Pyɛrɩ mɛ à syah nɛ, à yo pé syah, dan mɛ̀ se ńtyɩ̃́nɔ pè yãm pé sétáh mɛ̀nɛ nɩ? À mɛ nɛ, àwe, kénɛ dan-á.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, pè se pɩ sɔ̃́, tɛ́ yo sah núkú yõ ǹ pɛlɛ, à pɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Mirki vyãh sõ̀lɛ n noh nɩ? À yah, nónó-á kyɩ yɩ̃ ǹ pɛ lékólɛ, pǎh mɛ pɔ n de yɔ̀. Tɛ́ pǎh kɩ ǹ tɔ lékó tɔkɔ n sɔkɔ n pi.
Pyɛrɩ-á yo sɛ̃́, nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, pi núkú syɩkɩ ǹ yah tĩ̀nnɛ, à ku. Kètɛ̃̀npì-á de kyɩ, pè kyɩ à wɛ kúnɔ́lɛ. Pè mɛ à tɔkɔ kyɩ yɩ̃ ǹ pɛ tnɔ̂.
Képah sɔkɔ, tíkí Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pól kah tɛ̃, à tahlɩ tyi nɔ́pi nóhpú pól tyɩ́.

Liyel sõ̀ mɛ n syɔ̃ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tyɩ́, à gbǐl tyi náhnáhlɛ n pɩ névye nɩyṍ. Pè sõ̀ mɛ pé sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ́lɔ́ póllɛ, tɛ́ wɛ̃nɛ n tuke n mɔ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô párn yɔ́ sõ̀, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Salomo párnnɛ.
Ǹtɛ no tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ ǹ nɩlɛ n syãh n kwrɔ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ no pól mó tɔ̃ mɛ pélɛ n kah n sõ.
Képah sɔkɔ, díbí ànɛ̂ syɔ́ náhnáh sõ̀ mɛ n sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ, dòhnɩ̀nɔ́ kɔ̃ kè n pɩ n yuku ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú yõ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, névye tyah n wil pé yámpúlɛ, à pélɛ n sah n pɔ pàl yõ, képah náh pɩ, sɛ̃ sɛ̃ yî yõ wã̀l yey sɔkɔ, nɛ Pyɛrɩ-à pɔ n sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ǹ mírkí wɛ mɔ pé sɔkɔ nɛy nɛ̂ yõ, tɛ̃̀ wɛ dɛ.
Yerusalɛmɩ gbɔ̀plɔ kwlo névye náhnáh ńtɛ̃ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ pé yámpúlɛ n tɛ̃ n pɔ n pɔ, à tahlɩ névye tyɩ́, sétã̀n-á sõ̀ mɛ nónónɛ n kwlɔ. Tɛ́ pé pól sõ̀ mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ n wɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ànɛ̂ ǹ náh névye póllɛ nónó-á Sadusɛ̃ névyelɛ, pè tyah dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀lɛ n pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ,
tɛ́ pè tɛ̃ kyɩ dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ lékã̂h-á pɔ mɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ pɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè mɛ̀ yah yɩkɩ mɔ ànɛ̂ ké sɔkɔ táh vɩ̀ yeynɛ, à Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye wilki, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ:
«Yé kyɩ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ, yè kyɩ min sã́n tyi nɔ́pi pól yo névye tyɩ́.»
Wɛy mɛ̀-á yo pè noh sɛ̃́, séngbɔ̃́ púpúlɛ, pè mɛ yuku kyɩ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ, à kyɩ tyah kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ n pɩ.

Légbĩ́nɛ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ànɛ̂ ǹ náh névye mɛ kyɩ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì ye ànɛ̂ Yisrayel gbɛ̃̀nyah yèwàhnɩ̀ póllɛ. Tɛ́ mɛ sràsyíbí tõ nɛ, pè kyɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye wilki n pɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ pǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃, pè náh pè wɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ. Pè mɛ pé syɩ pɔ ké yah yo pé yõ̀tãm tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́,
páh kyɩ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè yah wɛ tɛ̃́nmɔnɔlɛ pallɛ ànɛ̂ ké sɔkɔ táh vɩ̀ yey tɔlɛ, sé syɩ́kɩ́púlɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pé tɛ̃̀-ǹtã̀n sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ páh se mó tɔ̃ sè yɩkɩ mɔ de, pé náh nɛy wɛ sé sɔkɔ.
Pǎh yo sɛ̃́, yĩ mɛ̀ nóhnɔ́ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô syɩ́kɩ́pú yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ ànɛ̂ sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm fɔkɔ fil. Pè mɛ wɛ̃nɛ n piki n yah Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tyɩ́-á pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ.
Pǎh mɛ képah sɔkɔ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ pɔ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, névye nónó-á pè dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, pǎh mɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel ní-ńsah gbô syɩ́kɩ́pú yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ ǹ no tɛ̃, à pé nyáh sõ. Pǎh kyɩ, tíkí pè tɛ̃ nɛ páh kɩ nɛ pé pè tɛ̃ gbùgbù, névye káh pɔ pé minki ko dyêhlɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè pè ye yárr, à sɔkɔ.
Pǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ pélɛ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ pè syah nɛ,
pé kó lésõ kè tũ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè káh tɔ̃ kwɔ́nɔ́ pɩ n yah dĩ́ mɛ̀ yĩn yõ nɩ? Tɛ́ pè yah, pǎh pé kwɔ́nɔ́ tɔ̃ mɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil pól sɔkɔ, tɛ́ tɔ̃ mɛ ǹ kũ plɔlɛ n twah pépi yõ kɛ̀!
Ǹtɛ Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tɛ́lɔ́ mɛ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Á kɩ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ yɛ sɔ̃́, tɛ́ kɩ névye tyɩ́lɛ n pɩ?
Yesu nɛ̂-á yé ko mɔ dahnɩ yõ, á náh tãn Liyel ye ǹ lékó yilki mɔ,
tɛ́ à yɔ̃ dɔkɔ sɔkɔ, à kyɩ à sah ǹ gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ. Tɛ́ à pɩ yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yisrayel tãn fɛ̃ pé nnɔ vi mɔ, pè mó pé tyípêl yɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ wɛ.
Kénɛ tyi nónó-á Liyel pɩ, ápi ànɛ̂ Liyel Mirki ye sé yónwàhpu kègblɔlɛ, wǎh képah nɛ̂nɛ névye kɔ̃, nónó-á sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.»
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì-á wɛlɔ nɔ́pi noh sɛ̃́, pé fɔkɔ kah vyãh, fɔ́ɔ́ pè sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ko mɔ.

Ǹtɛ Farisiyɛ̃ nɛy yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ pé sɔkɔ pè n ye Kamalyɛlɩlɛ. Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kwɔ́-ò yɔ́ ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ, nɛ̂-á névye pól mɛ yõ̀yénnɛ n sah ǹ yõ. Ǹmɔ mɛ yuku yĩn tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì nɩyṍ tɛ́ nɛ, pè Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye wilki mɔ kégbɔ́ kwéy átrɛ.
Pǎh wil, à ǹ syɩ yo pé no tyɩ́ nɛ: «Á no Yisrayel tãn, yé yé gblɔ̌y kyɔmɩ yĩ́ĩ́ yé tyípɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, à yuku díbí nɔ́pi tĩ̀nnɛ dɛ́!

Ké náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ pɩ di mónɔ́lɛ kah, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á Tedasɩ mɛ yuku ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ nɛ, nɛ́-ǹgbɛ̃-á péwɔlɛ, tɛ́ díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ kyɛyẽ́h (400) sõnɔ vi mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè ǹ sõ̀ tɛ̃. Ǹtɛ wǎh pɔ ko mɔ, ǹ sõ̀ tɛ̃́pú pól náh karkɩ di? Nɛy se tɔ̃ wũ?

Ǹmɔ tyɩ́ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, Kalile gbɛ̃̀nyah dĩ́ Nsyudasɩ mɛ tɔ̃ yuku kénɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah névye yãh gbĩ́nɛ, à pé náhnáh yõ yɩkɩ pè kɔ̃ pè ǹ sõ̀ tɛ̃. Ǹtɛ ǹ tɔ náh pɔ ko mɔ, tɛ́ ǹ sõ̀ tɛ̃́pú mɛ karkɩ di?

Képah ye núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ, mé kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, yé yé vyɛ̃y dɛ no nɔ́pi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yè mó pè fĩn mɔ pè nɛ n yuku. Pé tir yáhntɔkɔnɔ, képah náh pɩ, pé tyípɩ́nɩ́ mɛ̀-à kɩ mɛ wil névye tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, kè kɩ tyɛ ké gblɔ̌y.
Ǹtɛ kàh kɩ mɛ wil Liyel tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ tɔ́tɔ́, yépi náh fɛ̃ kè yɩkɩ n pi. Yé kyɔ̀mɩ̀nɔ́ pɩ, yè káh pɔ tyah Liyel wɔlɛ n fwo dɛ́!»
Kamalyɛlɩ-á yo sɛ̃́, pé no sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
Pè mɛ tɔ̃ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ye de, à pɔ pè ko yèfõhlɛ. Tɛ́ kè yahle pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè káh tɔ̃ Yesu tyɩ́lɛ n yãh, tɛ́ pè fĩn mɔ.
Ǹtɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye sõ̀ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ kègbɩlɛ, pǎh n yal tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì wrɔ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ kè kyɔmɩ wɛ nɛ, páh yɩ̃nɛ fṍhnɔ́lɛ Yesu yĩnnɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, sõmɛsṍ pè n nɛ n mɛ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô ànɛ̂ kétlo sɔkɔ, ǹ névyelɛ n kwɔ, ǹ tɛ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ yõ.

Légbĩ́nɛ, wãn sõ̀ mɛ n mɔ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú nɛ́dán yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, Krɛkɩ wɛy wɛ́kɩ́pú tyah n wɛkɩ nɛ, sõmɛsṍ pé no Yebre wɛy wɛ́kɩ́pú-á mɛ n syɩkɩ pépi pɛ́kúsyɔ yõ yõke dibi gbĩ́nɛ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye nɛ́pĩ̂ gbɔ̃nimí mɛ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú tɔ́wû pól ye tuke, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, kè náh yɩ̃nɛ pépi Liyel wɛy yónɔ́ yal n mɔ, pé mó de tɛ̃ yõke díbínɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Képah-á, pé yṹnpyé, pè díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ kwǎrnimi yah n wilki pé sɔkɔ, nónó yĩ́ngbɩ́-á mɛ n yo, tɛ́ Liyel Mirki mɛ pè tɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ lékã́m mɛ pé sɔkɔ. Páh kɩ tõ̀ mɛ̀ dahbɩ pépi gbõ̀.
Kàh kɩ pɩ sɛ̃́, pépi-á kɩ mó yɔ̃ sɔkɔ nírí pɩ́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel wɛy yónɔ́ tõ̀lɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, pǎh nɛ̂ yo, tɔ́wû pól kè fɛ̃ syi. Pè mɛ Yetyɛ̃nɩ yah wilki, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á sõ̀ mɛ gblò, tɛ́ Liyel Mirki mɛ à tɔkɔ. À tahlɩ Filipi tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ Prokɔrɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ Nikanɔrɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ Timolɛ, ànɛ̂ Parmenasɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ Antyɔsyɩ kwil Nikolasɩlɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á lésõ vi mɔ de Nsyifunɔ Liyel nínɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ mɛ pépilɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye wɛ̃kɩ. Pépi mɛ pé gbã̀n sah pé yõ nírí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, à sãm mɔ pé sɔkɔ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel wɛy sõ̀ mɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ n yuku, tɛ́ wãn mɛ n mɔ n yuku náhnáh Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú nɛ́dán yõ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil. Sárká syínwìlkìpu tɔ náhnáh sõ̀ mɛ fɛ̃ syi sɛ̃ Yesu yõ.
Yetyɛ̃nɩ sõ̀ Liyel pèpɔrɩ náhnáh wɛ ànɛ̂ ǹ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ. À sõ̀ mɛ à tɔkɔ à gbǐl tyilɛ n pɩ névye nɩyṍ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Nsyifunɔ tyah yékã̂blɛ n pɩ Yetyɛ̃nɩnɛ. Pé túkùlɛ, Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ nɛ̂-á pè n ye yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ wìlpu wɔ̀kɔ̀lɛ, képah névye ye. Pè n wil Sirɛnɩ kwil ànɛ̂ Alɛkisãdri kwil. Pé túkù mɛ n wil Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, Yetyɛ̃nɩ sõ̀ mɛ n wɛkɩ lékã́mnɛ. Képah ye, no nɔ́pi náh mɛ tɛ̃ wɛ ǹ wɛlɔlɛ n kɔ̃lɩ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè kyɩ nósyɔ́ tɔkɔ pɔ́lɛ nɛ pè pɔ yo nɛ, páh à wɛ à mɛ Moyisi ànɛ̂ Liyel tyɩ́lɛ n yo n yɩkɩ.
Pè képah pɩ, à tɔ́wû, ànɛ̂ yèwàhnɩ̀, ànɛ̂ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kwɔ́pú mɔ Yetyɛ̃nɩ yõ, pè kɔ̃ pè à fyãh tɛ̃ yuku ǹnɛ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ tɔ̃ tàrfyɔ̀ mɩ̀nyobe yísyɔ́ yah, à yuku pélɛ nɛ pè kyɩ yo nɛ, dĩ́ mɛ̀ náh mɛ n yal n mɔ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô ànɛ̂ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́ yónyɩkɩnɔlɛ.
Páh kè noh ǹ vyãh yah à mɛ n yo ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ, kénɛ Nasarɛtɩ Yesu mɛ̀-á kɩ pɔ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔ n pi, tɛ́ Moyisi-á pé kwɔ wã̀l nónónɛ, wǎh kɩ sé tɔ vi mɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì pól tyah Yetyɛ̃nɩnɛ n yah díkídíkí, tɛ́ ǹ yah wɛ kè mɛ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ Yetyɛ̃nɩ piki yah nɛ, no-á nɛ̂nɛ n yo ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, gbɩ se kélɛ nɩ?

Yetyɛ̃nɩ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ń súbí ànɛ̂ ń yṹnpyé, yé noh ń tyɩ́. Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á lésõ á náh nɛy Abrahmɩ náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ mɛ yal yuku Yarã kwil sɔkɔ, tɔ̃́rɩ́ nɛ́tɛ̃̂ Liyel ye lésõ wil ǹ yah Mesopotami gbɛ̃̀nyah,
tɛ́ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Yal á gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ á kéte tãn wrɔ́, ǹ yuku gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á mé kɩ ǹ wɛ̃kɩ n pi.›
Képah sɔkɔ, Abrahmɩ yal Kalde tãn gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, à kyɩ tɛ̃ Yarã kwil.

Tɛ́ Liyel náh sõ̀ sétáh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ à kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ ásõ̂. Gbáhsúkí kénkɔ̃ fyé tyahlɛ, à náh kélɛ à kɔ̃. Ǹtɛ à ǹ vyãhlɛ à kɔ̃ nɛ, páh kɩ pɔ gbɛ̃̀nyah mɛ̀ póllɛ à kɔ̃. Tɛ́ kǎh kɩ tɔ̃ pɩ ǹ pétóbé tɔ tyɩ́lɛ, ǹmɔ kɛ̃́ náh ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, pi ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ Abrahmɩ tyɩ́.
Liyel mɛ tɔ̃ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Á pétóbé kɩ pɔ wil kɩ kyɩ n tɛ̃ n pi gbɛ̃̀nyah káhkɩ́ sɔkɔ. Nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ pè kɩ n pɩ n pi yɔ̃bɩlɛ, tɛ́ kɩ fṍhnɔ́ wɛ, pópó ye kyɛyẽ́h (400).
Ǹtɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah káhkɩ́ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á pélɛ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ, ńmɔ Liyel tukey kɩ n syɩkɩ n pi kénɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah tãn yõ. Tɛ́ képah náh, pè kɩ wil yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ nɛ́npɔ́, kɩ pé syɩ pɔ ńmɔ yĩn gbilki ásõ̂.›

Képah yóntɛnɔ náh, Liyel mɛ yégbékè kwrɔ mɔ Abrahmɩnɛ, képah nɛ̂-á kɩ sõ̀ n wɛ̃kɩ n pi kõ̀kè kõ̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Képah ye, Abrahmɩ-á pɔ Yisakɩ dubi, à mɛ à kõ ǹ dúbínɔ́ sèpĩ̀n kwǎrtɔ̃-ò sõlɛ. Yisakɩ tɔ mɛ pɔ ǹ pídĩ́ Nsyakɔbɩ kõ. Nsyakɔbɩ tɔ mɛ pɔ ǹ dĩ́npì nɛ́pĩ̂ gbɔ̃nimí kõ, pépi nónó-á ápi yìkìnì gbɔ̃ninɔ́ náh tãnnɛ.
Képah náh, á náh tãn pɔ tyah pé gbɛ̃̀ndĩ́ Nsyosɛfu dyɔlɛ n yɔ. Tɛ́ à tɛ̃ yãm yɔ̃̀lɛ, pè kɔ̃ pè sɔkɔ ǹnɛ Yesyipti gbɛ̃̀nyah. Ǹtɛ Liyel sõ̀ mɛ Nsyosɛfulɛ.

À ǹ yõ wilki yènvyã̀hnpèl nɔ́pi sɔkɔ, tɛ́ lékã́mnɛ à kɔ̃ yĩ́ĩ́, tɛ́ Yesyipti yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Farawɔ̃ yĩ́ kɔ̃ kè yuku ǹnɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, à mɛ à pɩ ǹ gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ kéte pól yah tɛ̃́-òlɛ.

Tɛ́ kwɛ́npékè yɔ́ pɔ de Yesyipti gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Kanah gbɛ̃̀nyah pól sɔkɔ, à pɩ yèvyãhrɩ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ pé tyɩ́. Ké pékénkàhnmɔnɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, á náh tãn náh tɔ̃ sõ̀ mɛ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n wɛ n yõ.
Tɛ́ Nsyakɔbɩ-á pɔ kè wɛ noh nɛ, yõke-á mɛ Yesyipti sɔkɔ, ké gbennɛ, à á náh tãn tɛkɩ mɔ nɛ́npɔ́, pè kyɩ yõke yah pɔ, pépi nónó-á ǹ wɛ̃́npìlɛ.
Pǎh tɔ̃ pɔ pé syɩ yuku kɛ ní-òlɛ, Nsyosɛfu mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ yo wah ǹ nɛ́nkyɩ́bɩ́ tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Farawɔ̃ mɛ Nsyosɛfu duku wìl-ǹsah pɩ̃.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyosɛfu tɛ̃ntõ̀ mɔ nɛ, pè kyɩ pé sú Nsyakɔbɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ no pól tɛ̃ n pɔ. Pè sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́pĩ̂ tikitɔ̃nɩ́ pɔ́ gbãm pɔ́ kwlɔ́lɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ye Nsyakɔbɩ mɛ yuku pɔ tɛ̃ Yesyipti gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. À syi pɔ ku nɛ́npɔ́ ànɛ̂ á náh tãn tɔ póllɛ.
Pé lékyɩ̂ mɛ twah kyɩ yɩ̃ Sisyɛmɩ kwil diki yɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á lésõ Abrahmɩ dwe Yemɔrɩ wɛ̃́npì tyɩ́.
Liyel-á lésõ ǹ vyãhlɛ Abrahmɩ kɔ̃ nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ, ké pɩ gbĩ́-á pɔ n nɔ, ápi no kwel náhnáh Yesyipti sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ késã́n yɔ́-á pɔ dɔkɔ Yesyipti yõ, ǹmɔ náh sõ̀ Nsyosɛfulɛ n pnɛ.
À mɛ vi syɩkɩ á no yõ. Ǹ nɛ́pékè kàhnmɔnɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, à á náh tãn kyɩ̃ mɔ, pè kɔ̃ pè pé wɛ̃́npì yrɔ̃́ milki sah kégbɔ́ pé ku yĩnnɛ.
Légbĩ́ mɛ̀ ó sɔkɔ ye Moyisi dubi. À kah plɛ yĩ́ĩ́, ànɛ̂ ǹ tyɩ́ nɔ Liyel tyɩ́. Pè à pu ńwɔ̃́lɔ́ tɔ̃́nɔ́ ǹ sú gbô.
Képah náh, pè à tɔkɔ kyɩ milki.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, lékã́m tyi nónó pól-á sõ̀ mɛ Yesyipti sɔkɔ, Moyisi kwɔ́nɔ́ wɛ sé pól yõ. Képah ye, à pɩ wɛ̀ntǎhnɩ̀ wɛ́kɩ́-òlɛ ànɛ̂ tyítǎhnɩ̀ pɩ́-òlɛ.
Tɛ́ wǎh pɔ nɔ ye tikininínɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à kè sõ wɛ nɛ, páh kɩ kyɩ yah pé yṹnpyé Yisrayel tãn tyɩ́.
Wǎh kyɩ, à kyɩ yɩ̃nɛ ǹ tyɩ́ névi yɔ́lɛ, Yesyipti nɛy yɔ́ mɛ n fõh. Moyisi tyɩ́ névi fṍhnɔ́ yrɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, à ǹ vyãh syi, à Yesyipti nɛy mɛ̀ ko mɔ.
Moyisi sõ̀ mɛ n sõ nɛ, pé no Yisrayel tãn-á kɩ n pɩ̃ n pi nɛ, Liyel-á kɩ péwɔ tɔkɔ, kɩ pè wilki n pi pé yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ pè náh tɛ̃ wɛ kè pɩ̃ ǹ tyɩ́.
Ké dĩndallɛ, à tɔ̃ kyɩ Yisrayel tãn nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí yísyɔ́ wɛ, pè mɛ n fwo. À nɛ pé pè syi mɔ, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pé no, pépi ó-á pé yahlɛ. Tɛ́ kwâh nɛ̂ se pè wɛ̃nɛ n fõh nɩ?
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ n fõh ǹ ní-òlɛ, ǹmɔ Moyisi syah nɛ ńkɛ̃́, nɛ̂ se sah ǹnɛ pépi yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ ànɛ̂ pé tùkè-òlɛ nɩ?
Péwɔ kònmɔ-ńsah káh kɩ nɛ̂, á n yah n kɔ̃, wǎh ńnɩ́nɩ́nɛ Yesyipti nɛy mɛ̀ ko mɔ sɔ̃́ dɛ́?
Wǎh fyɔ̀ képah yo, Moyisi to, tɛ́ kyɩ tɛ̃ Madyã gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, à syi pɔ dĩ́npì nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí wɛ nɛ́npɔ́.

À tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, pópó à ye tikininí pɩ. Képah náh, sõ yɔ́lɛ, à sõ̀ mɛ gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ, Syinayi yɔ̃lɩ gbɔ̀pɔ, tɛ́ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ wil ǹ yah nyàh lépɔ̃́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ n kõ dukuni yɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yĩ mɛ̀ wɛ́nɔ́ pɩ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ Moyisi tyɩ́. Tɛ́ wǎh mɛ n nɔ n de nɛ, pé kè wɛ yah yĩ́ĩ́, à Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yónmɔnɔ noh nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Á náh tãn Liyel ye ńmɔlɛ, Abrahmɩ, ànɛ̂ Yisakɩ, ànɛ̂ Nsyakɔbɩpi Liyellɛ.› Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tíkí Moyisi tɛ̃, fɔ́ɔ́ ǹ wil n syah. À náh tɔ̃ ǹ nɩ syãh ǹ yah yɔ̃ yah.
Képah sɔkɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Tyah nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á álɛ yɔ̀, nɛ́npɔ́ mɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ yõ. Képah ye, á lékyêh dɛ.

Mé ń no kwlɔ dùkù wɛ yĩ́nɛ Yesyipti gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pé gbĩ̀nɔ́ yĩ́npɔ̃́ noh. Mé pɔ pé wìlkì-ǹsah pé yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Képah ye, sɔkɔ! Mé álɛ n tɛkɩ mɔ ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ núkúnúkú Yesyipti sɔkɔ.›

Tɛ́ kénɛ Moyisi nɛ̂-á lésõ Yisrayel tãn yahle, tɛ́ à syah nɛ ńkɛ̃́, nɛ̂ se sah ǹnɛ pépi yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ ànɛ̂ pépi tùkè-òlɛ nɩ? Ǹmɔ ó ye tɔ̃ Liyel tɛkɩ mɔ yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ ànɛ̂ pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ gbõ̀ yõ, nɛ̂-á lésõ wil ǹ yah dukuni sɔkɔ.
Moyisi ye wilki Yisrayel tãnnɛ Yesyipti gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pnɛ yɔ́nsyã̂h kah pélɛ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ pélɛ gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ pópó ye tikininí. Liyel gbõ̀ yõ ye à pɩ sépi póllɛ gbǐl sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ ǹmɔ ye tɔ̃ yo Yisrayel tãn tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Liyel kɩ yé sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ tɛkɩ n mɔ n pi. À kɩ pɔ pɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-òlɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.›

Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ Yisrayel tãn mɛ tùkènmɔnɔlɛ gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ ye tɔ̃ sõ̀ wɛ syi yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ Syinayi yɔ̃lɩ yõ, à pɔ yo á náh tãn tyɩ́. Sɛ̃́ ye à wɛ syi min wɛlɔlɛ Liyel tyɩ́, à yo á tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ á náh tãn náh fɛ̃ syi sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ. Pè à yahle, tɛ́ sõ̀ mɛ n sõ nɛ, pé pé syɩ yuku Yesyipti sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ mɛ yo Arõ
Kénɛ sèpĩ̀n sɔkɔ, pè mɛ tõ̀ yɔ́ mɔ náhpír kètɔ̀lɛ, tɛ́ sárká wilki ké yõ, à nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ syáh syah, à pé gbɛ̃̀npɩnɩ gbilki.
Képah tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, Liyel ǹ náh vi pè kɔ̃, tɛ́ pè fĩn mɔ sah ńwɔ̃́ kèpye gbílkínɔ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á Liyel ǹ tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu kɔ̃ pè kè wãrkɩ sah pé sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Yisrayel tãn, yáh yípɛ̂y nónó ko sárkálɛ
pópó ye tikininí gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ,
yé se mɛ n sõ nɛ, ńmɔ tyɩ́-á yé ko sélɛ?
Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Yé tõ̀ nɛ̂ yĩn-á Molɔkɩlɛ, képah yèpir ye yé twah,
à tahlɩ yé ńwɔ̃́ kèpil tõ̀ tyɩ́ tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á yé n ye Wrefannɛ.
Kénɛ tã̀n ye yé pɩ sah yé gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, tɛ́ sélɛ n gbilki.
Képah ye, mé kɩ yé tɛ̃ sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ Babilɔnɩ kwil náhlɛ.›»

Képah yóntɛnɔ náh, Yetyɛ̃nɩ tɔ̃ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Á náh tãn-á sõ̀ mɛ gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, yèpir yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ pé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, Liyel-á mɛ pélɛ. Liyel sõ̀ kè yah kɔ̃ Moyisi tyɩ́ nɛ, à yèpir mɛ̀ pɩ sɔ̃́-á pé à wɛ̃kɩ ké pɩ́nɔ́lɛ gbrámgbrám.

Képah náh, á náh tãn pɔ yèpir mɛ̀nɛ pé wɛ̃́npì kɔ̃. Nsyosye ye sõ̀ pɩ pé yah tɛ̃́-òlɛ, pè yuku kénɛ yèpirlɛ à kyɩ nɛ́káhbɩ́ gbɛ̃̀nyahnɔ́ syi, Liyel-á nónó yĩni yal. Képah sɔkɔ, yèpir mɛ̀ mɛ tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, pópó à pɔ syɩ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Davidi gbĩ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ Davidi tyɩ́ sõ̀ kah nɔ Liyel tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, ǹ tɔ mó Liyel ni nɛ, à yɛ pé wɔ̀kɔ̀ yɔ́ mɔ à kɔ̃, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Nsyakɔbɩ Liyellɛ.
Tɛ́ ǹ pídĩ́ Salomo ye pɔ pɩ kénɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀ mɔ́-òlɛ Liyel tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ Yõ̀tah Liyel náh mó tɔ̃ n tɛ̃ névi gbõ̀ wɔ̀kɔ̀nmɔnɩ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò yo kélɛ nɛ,
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́: ‹Yĩ̂nyõ ye pɩ ń tɔ̃́rɩ́ kǒlɛ,
sétáh mɛ pɩ kòpírlɛ, ń gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ.
Tɛ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀ nɛ̂ dùkù mɛ yé kɩ fɛ̃ mɔ ńmɔ kɔ̃ wɛ́?
Ńmɔ se kɩ fɛ̃ tɛ̃ yépi wɔ̀kɔ̀nmɔnɩ sɔkɔ?
Ńmɔ gbɛ̃̀npɩnɔ náh yíyìn póllɛ di?›»

Képah náh, Yetyɛ̃nɩ tɔ̃ yo tukey tùkèpu tyɩ́ nɛ: «Nikisekɔ́kɔ́ névye nɔ́pi, yé yé nnɔ ànɛ̂ yé ní tah tũ, à yahle Liyel wɛy nóhnɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ Liyel Mirki yahle pɔ kwɛy nɔ. Yé mɛ yé náh tãn tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.

Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ se mɛ, nɛ̂-á yé náh tãn náh à fõh yah? Nɛ́gbɩ́ nɛ̂-á Liyel tyɩ́, nónó-á ǹ pɔ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ yo sah kèkõyṍ, pè náh pépi tɔ ko mɔ di? Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, kénɛ nɛ́gbɩ́ náh yépi vi ǹ náh, tɛ́ à ko mɔ di?
Yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ ye Liyel tõ, pè pɔ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yo yé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ yé yahle kɔ́lɔ́lɛ sé wã̀l yõ.»
Yetyɛ̃nɩ-á wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yo sɛ̃́, kè tukey tùkèpu kah yɔ kah mɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ pè pé ynínɛ n tah yrɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki tɛ̃̀-á mɛ Yetyɛ̃nɩ tɔkɔ sɛ̃́, à tyah yĩ̂nyõlɛ n yah díkídíkí, tɛ́ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ wɛ ànɛ̂ Yesulɛ yúkúnyĩnntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ Liyel gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, à nɛ: «Yé yah, mé mɛ yĩ̂nyõlɛ n yah yɩ́kɩ́nmɔnɔlɛ, tɛ́ Névi Pídĩ́ mɛ yúkúnyĩnnɔlɛ Liyel gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ.»
Névye-á képah noh sɛ̃́, pè gbo mɔ wòhòh, tɛ́ pé ní sni tũ, tɛ́ to tuke pé póllɛ ǹ yõ.

Tɛ́ à yɔrɩ wil kwil náhlɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, nónó-á sõ̀ pè ye pɔ pɩ tàrfyɔ̀lɛ, pépi mɛ pé fwɔ̀mɔ̀-ǹgbnɔ dɛ sah kètɛ̃̀npìkì yɔ́ tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Solelɛ. Tɛ́ pè tyah Yetyɛ̃nɩnɛ n minki dyêhlɛ, ǹ ku ku tɛ̃̀ yõ.
Ǹtɛ pǎh mɛ Yetyɛ̃nɩ mínkínɔ́ sɔkɔ dyêhlɛ sɛ̃́, à sõ̀ mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu, ń min yohnɩ n syi.»
Tɛ́ mɛ ǹ gbètukunɔ di, à yo yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ nɛ: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, káh pé tyípékè mɛ̀ mɔ n kõ.» Képah yóntɛnɔ ǹsɔ̃̀, à ku.
Tɛ́ pǎh à ko mɔ sɛ̃́, képah nɔ Sole tyɩ́.

Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì kàhnfõhnɔ núkú tyah Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ lésõlɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à wil Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ́lɔ́ pól to karkɩ de kwlo sɔkɔ, nónó-á mɛ Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ névye nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, pé yísyɔ́ mɛ Yetyɛ̃nɩ lékó tɔkɔ yɩ̃, tɛ́ ǹ kũ pɔ̀ kah gbo.

Ǹtɛ Sole tɛ̃̀ wɔ sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì duku tó-ńsahlɛ pnɛ́pnɛ́. À sõ̀ mɛ n de n kɔ̃ gbên sɔkɔ, à Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú díbí ànɛ̂ syɔ́lɛ n tɛ̃ n yɔrɩ n wilki n dah n mɔ n pɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á sõ̀ karkɩ kɔ̃, pépi mó mɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n kɔ̃ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ pé sɔkɔ nɛy nɛ̂-á pè n ye Filipilɛ, ǹmɔ mɛ kyɩ kwil yɔ́, Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, à kyɩ tyah Krista tyɩ́lɛ n yo nɛ́npɔ́.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, sétã̀n kwĩnki nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ déntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ névye sɔkɔ mɛ pélɛ n kwlɔ, sè sõ̀ mɛ n kah n de n syi, tɛ́ n wil pé sɔkɔ, tɛ́ wil kúnɔ́ névye ànɛ̂ gbáhkɩ̀ núkú névye náhnáh tɔ sõ̀ mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ n wɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, tɔ́wû-á Filipi gbǐl pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ noh, tɛ́ kyɩ sè wɛ sɛ̃́, pé pól pé sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ, à ǹ wɛlɔlɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n nohnɩ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ kénɛ kwil.

Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, dĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ pè n ye Simolɛ. À sõ̀ mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ kénɛ kwil mɛ̀ ó sɔkɔ di mónɔ́lɛ. Ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ snɛ̀y tyilɛ n pɩ, nónó-á mɛ Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah tãn gbã̀n du kègbɩlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ nɛ́-ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
No pól sõ̀ mɛ mɔ ǹnɛ, à tɔkɔ wɛ̃́npì tyɩ́, à kyɩ sah yèwàhnɩ̀ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ mɛ yo tũ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Ǹgbɛ̃nɛ, képah-á dĩ́ mɛ̀nɛ.
Tɛ́ dĩ́ mɛ̀ sõ̀ mɛ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ ǹ snɛ̀y sɔkɔ di mónɔ́lɛ, képah ye pè kɔ̃ pè mɔ ǹnɛ.
Ǹtɛ Filipi-á pɔ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir ànɛ̂ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ yo pé tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, pè sɛ̃ ké yõ. Tɛ́ díbí ànɛ̂ syɔ́ mɛ à kɔ̃ à pè wel wilki ni sɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Simo ńtɛ̃ tɔ sɛ̃ Yesu yõ, tɛ́ Filipi kɔ̃ à à wel wilki ni sɔkɔ. À náh tɔ̃ sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé yal Filipi tnɔ̂. Tɛ́ gbǐl tyi ǹgbnɔ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ n pɩ à n yah, sè sõ̀ mɛ pɩ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ ǹ tyɩ́.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye-á tɛ̃ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, tɛ́ noh nɛ Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah tãn-á Liyel wɛy fɛ̃ syi sɛ̃́, pè Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃ tɛkɩ mɔ pè kɔ̃.

Pǎh kyɩ de Samari sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó wɛ nɛ́npɔ́, Liyel Mirki náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ sõ̀ mɛ tiki pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ. Pè sõ̀ mɛ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ ni sɔkɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɔ yĩn yõ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃ mɛ tyah nírílɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́, nɛ pè Liyel Mirki wɛ.
Pè sõ̀ mɛ pé gbã̀n sah no nɔ́pi yõ à nírílɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, pè mɛ Liyel Mirki wɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Simo-á kè wɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye pé gbã̀nnɛ n sah pé yõ, pè kɔ̃ pè Liyel Mirkilɛ n wɛ sɛ̃́, à pɔ pɔ́lɛ Pyɛrɩpi tyɩ́,
tɛ́ nɛ, pè péwɔ tɔ kɔ̃ kénɛ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, pâh fyɔ̀ pé gbã̀n sah nɛ̂ yõ, tɛ̃̀ Liyel Mirki wɛ.
Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, Pyɛrɩ mɛ à syah nɛ, ǹ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ n to ànɛ̂ ǹ pɔ́ tɔlɛ, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ n sõ nɛ, páh kɩ fɛ̃ Liyel yɩ̃́nkɔ̃nɔ kwâh dwe pɔ́lɛ.
Ǹ nɩ-á mɛ kétúkùyɔ̂ Liyel yah. Képah-á, wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀ náh mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yĩ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ. À náh yɩ̃nɛ kélɛ póllɛ.

Páh kè wɛ nɛ, dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀ képékè-á yuku sah ǹ nɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ wǎh mɛ tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Képah-á, à ǹ nɩ vi mɔ, à mó Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel ni à kɔ̃ à ǹ fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ pèkè mɛ̀ yɔ̃ mɔ à kɔ̃, kàh kɩ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi.
Képah sɔkɔ, Simo mɛ yo Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, pépi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel ni pé tyɩ́ pé gblɔ̌y. Kàh kɩ pɩ sɛ̃́, tyi nónó-á pè yo pé tyɩ́, sé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh pé nɔ n pi.

Képah náh, Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃-á tyi nónó pɩ̃ Yesu tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pǎh sè yãh tɛ névye tyɩ́, tɛ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛy yo tɛ pé tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, pè pé syɩ n yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, tɛ́ mɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n yuku kwílpî náhnáh sɔkɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yah, nónó-á mɛ Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah.

Sõ yɔ́lɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ pɔ yo Filipi tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, à ǹ gblɔ̌y vi, à mó ǹ yah mɔ gbĩ̀ngboke gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ, à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃, nɛ̂-á wil Yerusalɛmɩ, à n tiki n yuku Kasa kwil. Kénɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ mɛ̀ yõ kɔ́pú náh mɛ fwɔ́ɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Filipi núkú yuku kénɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃. Wǎh n yuku, dǒ, à Yetyopi gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛ́-ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ wɛ.
Tɛ́ wǎh ǹ syɩ n yuku ǹ tĩ̀nnɛ, à sõ̀ mɛ kɔ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ǹ wòtoro sɔkɔ, mɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò Yesayi sɛ́bɛ́ynɛ n kar.
Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel Mirki mɛ yo Filipi tyɩ́ nɛ, à kɔ n tel wòtoro mɛ̀ tyɩ́.

Filipi mɛ to tel ké tyɩ́, tɛ́ dĩ́ kàrnɔ́ noh. À sõ̀ mɛ fɩ̃́ yɔ́lɛ n kar Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò Yesayi sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ. Filipi mɛ à piki yah nɛ, fɩ̃́ nɛ̂-á à n kar yɔ̀, à se mɛ ké kɔ́rlɛ n pnɛ nɩ?
Dĩ́ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, sɔ̃́ se pé kɩ pɩ̃ ké kɔ́rlɛ, nɛ́ nɛy náh ké yah yo pé syah nɩ? Tɛ́ mɛ kè yah kɔ̃ Filipi tyɩ́ nɛ, à pɔ n dɔkɔ n kɔ̃ n tɛ̃ pé tnɔ̂ wòtoro sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ fɩ̃́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ dĩ́ mɛ n kar, kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«À sõ̀ pɩ képɔ́ sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á pè tɛ̃ n yuku kò-ǹsah;
képah náh pɩ, nɛ̂ yɛ̀-á pè n kõ,
tɛ́ à náh ǹ vyãh fyɔ.
Pè à yilɔ, tɛ́ lékàhlɛ à kɔ̃,
tɛ́ à ko mɔ, ǹ duku to kèkõyṍ.
Nɛ̂ kɩ tɔ̃ n yãh ǹ no tyɩ́lɛ?»
Dĩ́-á kar tɛ, à mɛ yo Filipi tyɩ́ nɛ, à kékwɛ, à yo pé syah, nɛ̂ tyɩ́ se Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò Yesayi n yo sɛ̃́ yɔ̀ nɩ? Ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ se à n yo, tĩ̂ ǹnɩ̂ tyɩ́ se à n yo?
Képah sɔkɔ, Filipi syɔ̃ kénɛ Liyel wɛy mɛ̀ tyɩ́, à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo à syah Yesu tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Pǎh mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, pè kyɩ syɩ yɔ yɔ́ tyɩ́. Dĩ́ mɛ yo Filipi tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, yɔ-á yɔ̀, tir yɔ́ tɛ̃̀-à kɩ mɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, páh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, à pé wel wilki ni sɔkɔ. [
À mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, wàh kɩ mɛ sɛ̃ Yesu yõ ǹ nɩ póllɛ, páh kɩ fɛ̃ à wel wilki ni sɔkɔ. Dĩ́ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, páh sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ, Liyel Pídĩ́-á Yesu Kristalɛ.]
Tɛ́ mɛ nɛ, pè wòtoro yĩn mɔ. Kǎh yĩn, à tiki ànɛ̂ Filipilɛ à kyɩ de yɔ, tɛ́ Filipi mɛ à wel wilki ni sɔkɔ.
Pǎh fyɔ̀ wil yɔ sɔkɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel Mirki núkú Filipi tɔkɔ sɔkɔ. Yetyopi gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛ́-ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ náh tɔ̃ à wɛ. Ǹtɛ à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ ǹ kɔ́lɔ́lɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ Filipi tɛ̃̀ wɔ mó kyɩ ǹ gblɔ̌y wɛ Asɔtɩ kwil. À mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ, à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n yuku kwlo kwlo pól sɔkɔ, wǎh n kah nónó sɔkɔ, pópó à kyɩ de Sesarɩ kwil.
Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, Sole mó sõ̀ mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ dírílɛ n pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpúlɛ, mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, à kyɩ wil sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́lɛ pé kɔ̃, pé kyɩ Damasɩ kwil Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ yõ̀tãm kɔ̃. Képah sɔkɔ, páh kɩ kyɩ díbí ànɛ̂ syɔ́ nónó wɛ nɛ́npɔ́, tɛ́ pè mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ, pé pè tɛ̃ n pukubi n pɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil.
Wǎh sè wɛ syi, à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃ n yuku Damasɩ kwil. Wǎh mɛ yúkɛy kélɛ, kyòo yɔ́ núkú wil yĩ̂nyõ à kwɛ ǹ yõ pěrr, à à mɔ gbɩ̃.
Képah sɔkɔ, à yɔ̃ syɩkɩ sétáh, tɛ́ yĩ́npɔ̃́ yɔ́ noh, nɛ̂-á mɛ n yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Sole, Sole, kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ á ńnɛ n fõh?»
Sole mɛ piki yah nɛ, nɛ̂ se ǹmɔlɛ nɩ, pé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃? Kénɛ yĩ́npɔ̃́ tɔ̃ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yesu ye ńmɔlɛ, nɛ̂-á á n fõh.
Ǹtɛ yuku n de kwil sɔkɔ, tɛ́ wáh yɩ̃nɛ ǹ nɛ̂ pɩ, pè kɩ kè yo ǹ syah.»
Tɛ́ Sole-á sõ̀ mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ ànɛ̂ nónónɛ, pé tɔ sõ̀ mɛ yĩ́npɔ̃́ mɛ̀nɛ n nohnɩ, tɛ́ pè náh mɛ nɛy wɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé gbã̀n du, pè yĩn tɛ̃ syɩ́syɩ́, pè náh mɛ fɛ̃ tirlɛ n yo.
Képah sɔkɔ, Sole-á yuku yĩn, à ǹ yɩ̃́ yɩkɩ mɔ, tɛ́ à náh tɔ̃ mɛ fɛ̃ n yah. Pè mɛ ǹ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ̃, à de ǹnɛ Damasɩ kwil.
À sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́nɩ̀ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́ yɩ̃́tũri sɔkɔ, yõke yṍ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ànɛ̂ ni wɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ.
Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, Yesu tõ̀ sã́h-ò yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́ pè n ye Ananiyasilɛ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wil ǹ yah, tɛ́ nɛ: «Ananiyasi!» Ananiyasi mɛ syi, tɛ́ nɛ páh yɔ̀, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃!

Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yuku ǹ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃, wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ nɛ̂-á pè n ye wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ Tómmnɛ. Wáh kɩ kyɩ Nsyudasɩ gbô sɔkɔ, ǹ dĩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́ piki n yah. Kénɛ dĩ́ n wil Tarsɩ kwil, pè ǹnɛ n ye Solelɛ. À mɛ Liyel nínɔ́ sɔkɔ núkúnúkú.
Tɛ́ ǹ nírí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, à dĩ́ yɔ́ wɛ pè n ye Ananiyasilɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Ananiyasi nɛ, ṹ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, névye náhnáh-á dĩ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ yãh pé noh, ànɛ̂ wǎh mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n fõh sɔ̃́ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, páh ké tɔ noh.
Tɛ́ wǎh tɔ̃ sɛ́bɛ́y wɛ syi sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm tyɩ́, à pɔ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ nɛ, pé pɔ ǹmɔ yéngbopu pól tɛ̃ pukubi n sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ tɔ̃ yo Ananiyasi tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ńmɔ ye yah tɔkɔ pɩ dĩ́ mɛ̀nɛ ń tõ̀npɩlɛ nɛ, à ń tyɩ́lɛ n yo n kɔ̃ névye tyɩ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, à tahlɩ pé yõ̀tãm tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ Yisrayel tãn tɔ tyɩ́. Képah ye, kyɩ ǹ tyɩ́!
Wǎh kɩ kwlɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ pɩ n pi ńmɔ yĩnnɛ, mé kɩ kélɛ à wɛ̃kɩ ń gblɔ̌y.»

Képah sɔkɔ, Ananiyasi yuku sɔkɔ. Wǎh kyɩ de Nsyudasɩ gbô sɔkɔ, à ǹ gbã̀n sah Sole yõ, tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pé yṹnpi Sole, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu nɛ̂-á wil ǹ yah wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ wǎh n pi gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ǹmɔ-á tõ pélɛ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, á fɛ̃ nɛ n yah ńtɔ̃, ànɛ̂ Liyel Mirki mó à tɔkɔ.
Nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, yî yísyɔ́ núkú wil Sole yɩ̃́ sɔkɔ à pɔ kwɛ yɛ̃́nkɔ̂ gbró sɔ̃́, tɛ́ ǹ yɩ̃́ mɛ yɩkɩ. À mɛ yuku, tɛ́ pè mɛ à wel wilki ni sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, à yõke yõ, tɛ́ ǹ syɩ tǎhkɩ̀ wɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Damasɩ kwil, Sole tɛ̃ à sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ pépilɛ.
Tɛ́ núkú tyah Yesu tyɩ́lɛ n yo n kɔ̃ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ sɔkɔ nɛ, Liyel Pídĩ́-á ǹnɛ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, nónó pól-á sõ̀ mɛ ǹ wɛlɔlɛ n nohnɩ, kè pé gbã̀n du. Pè tyah n yo nɛ, tɛ́ ǹmɔ kó lésõ n kah n fõh Yesu yĩn yéngbopulɛ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ nɩ? Tɛ́ pé tɛ̃́npukubinsɔkɔ-ńsah ńtɛ̃-á à pɔ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ, nɛ pé kyɩ pélɛ sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm tyɩ́ dɛ́!

Ǹtɛ wãn sõ̀ mɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ n yuku Sole tǎhkɩ̀ yõ. À sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yo n wah nɛ, Yesu-á Liyel yah tɔkɔ pɩ pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Damasɩ kwil Nsyifunɔ yáh-ńsah tyɛ, tyíyóné náh tɔ̃ wɛ pé tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, sèpĩ̀n náhnáh sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, Nsyifunɔ pɔ yo sah núkú yõ nɛ, páh kɩ Sole ko mɔ.
Tɛ́ Sole mɛ pɔ pé yĩ́nvǐ mɛ̀ wɛ noh. Pè sõ̀ mɛ kwil dé-ńtã̂nnɛ n syɩkɩ, ké lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀, nɛ pé à wɛ n ko n mɔ.
Ǹtɛ sõ yɔ́ lékã̂hnɛ, ǹ tõ̀ sã́hpú sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé à pwah mɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, pè à dah mɔ tɔ̀kɔ̀-ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ à tiki mɔ kɛ̃́nkahnɩnɛ, nɛ̂-á kwil kore vi.

Képah sɔkɔ, Sole sɔkɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil. Wǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, à sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé kwrɔ mɔ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ pépi náh sõ̀ mɛ fɛ̃ sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ, wǎh pɩ Yesu tõ̀ sã́h-òlɛ kègbɩsɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ; képah ye tíkí pè tɛ̃.

Ǹtɛ Barnabasɩ wɔ mɛ à tɛ̃ yuku Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tyɩ́. Tɛ́ Sole-á sõ̀ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ Damasɩ kwil wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yah, ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á yo mɔ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́, Barnabasɩ ké yah yo pé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ tɔ̃ kè yo pé tyɩ́, wǎh Yesu tyɩ́ yo nɩ̀sãhlɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ Damasɩ sɔkɔ.
À tɔkɔ légbĩ́ tyɩ́, Sole kwrɔ mɔ pé sɔkɔ, à Liyel wɛynɛ n yah n yo n kɔ̃ nɩ̀sãhlɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩn yõ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ.
À sõ̀ mɛ n yãh ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ tɔlɛ, nónó-á Krɛkɩ wɛynɛ n wɛkɩ, mɛ yékã̂blɛ n pɩ pélɛ. Ǹtɛ pépi wɔ sõ̀ mɛ ǹ kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú-á pɔ kè noh, pè à tɛ̃ sɔkɔ Sesarɩ kwil, à kyɩ à tɛkɩ mɔ Tarsɩ kwil.

Légbĩ́nɛ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì nónó-á sõ̀ Nsyude, ànɛ̂ Kalile, ànɛ̂ Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah pól sɔkɔ, pé pól sõ̀ mɛ yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ. Pè sõ̀ mɛ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ n wɛ, tɛ́ mɛ n kɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, wãn mɛ n mɔ n yuku pé nɛ́dán yõ.
Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, Pyɛrɩ sõ̀ mɛ tã̀ntã̀n póllɛ n kɔ n kɔ̃. Képah sɔkɔ, sõ yɔ́lɛ, à tiki yuku Lida kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɔ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ kyɩ dĩ́ yɔ́ wɛ nɛ́npɔ́ pè n ye Yenelɛ. Ńyân sõ̀ mɛ ǹ wil ko; képah ye à sõ̀ mɛ sɛ̃ tɛ̃ ǹ sɛ̃ sɛ̃ kwâh yõ pópó ye kwǎrtɔ̃nɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yene, Yesu Krista ye álɛ n dɛ n mɔ yɔ̀. Yuku, ǹ tɛ́ á sɛ̃ sɛ̃ kwâh yõ tɔ̃ n sah á gblɔ̌y.» Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, dĩ́ núkú yuku yĩn.
Képah sɔkɔ, Lida kwil ànɛ̂ Sarõ gbɛ̃̀nyah tãn-á képah wɛ sɛ̃́, pé pól vi mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tyɩ́ yõ.
Pi yɔ́ lésõ mɛ Nsyope kwil sɔkɔ Yesu tõ̀ sã́h-òlɛ. Ǹ yĩn ye sõ̀ Tabitalɛ, pè n ye Dɔrkasɩlɛ Krɛkɩ wɛy sɔkɔ. À sõ̀ pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, mɛ yãm tãnnɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ.
Tɛ́ kénɛ sèpĩ̀n sɔkɔ, yam pɔ à fɛ̃ mɔ, à ku. Pè mɛ ǹ lékó wel, tɛ́ à tɔkɔ kyɩ sah yĩ̂nyõ wɔ̀kɔ̀ yɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ kǎh pɩ Lida kwil ànɛ̂ Nsyope kwil sõ̀ mɛ yúkɛy wɛ̃nɛ sɛ̃́, Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Nsyope sɔkɔ, pè sõ̀ noh nɛ, Pyɛrɩ-á mɛ Lida kwil. Képah sɔkɔ, pè mɛ díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí tõ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, pè kyɩ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, à ǹ gblɔ̌y yɛ, à mó pɔ pépi tĩ̀nnɛ súú.

Pǎh kyɩ kè yo sɛ̃́, à núkú yuku pè sɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Wǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃, pè à tɛ̃ dɔkɔ yuku yĩ̂nyõ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pɛ́kúsyɔ pól sõ̀ mɛ nɔ de ǹ tnɔ̂ mɛ n gbo, tɛ́ mɛ fwɔ̀mɔ̀-ǹgbnɔ ànɛ̂ fwɔ̀mɔ̀npîlɛ ǹnɛ n wɛ̃kɩ, nónó-á Tabita tĩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ à mɛ vilɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ névye pól kɔ̃ pè wil kégbɔ́, tɛ́ ǹ gbètukunɔ di à Liyel ni. Tɛ́ mɛ ǹ yah vi pi lékó tĩ̀nnɛ tɛ́ nɛ: «Tabita, yuku.» Pi núkú ǹ yɩ̃́ yɩkɩ mɔ. Tɛ́ wǎh Pyɛrɩ wɛ, à yuku kɔ̃ tɛ̃.
Pyɛrɩ mɛ ǹ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ̃, à à yilki sah. Képah náh, à Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú ànɛ̂ pɛ́kúsyɔ ye pɔ ǹnɛ pè wɛ̃kɩ vilɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yĩ mɛ̀ tɔ̃ mɔ Nsyope kwil ywɔ̃ ywɔ̃ pól sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ pé náhnáh pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.
Képah náh, Pyɛrɩ tɛ̃ mo kwéy Nsyope sɔkɔ sénpɩ dĩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́, nɛ̂ yĩn-á Simolɛ.
Dĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ Sesarɩ kwil pè n ye Kɔrnɛylɛ. Sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ́ ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ, Wrome tãn sràsyíbí tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Yitalɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sràsyíbí tĩ̀nkìlɛ.
À sõ̀ mɛ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, mɛ ǹ yah tíkílɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ gbô tãn pól mɛ ǹnɛ n ni. À sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ yãm tãnnɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ náhnáh, tɛ́ mɛ Liyellɛ n ni gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, sõ yɔ́ gbèkãm gbĩ́ kénkɔ̃ sɔkɔ, à wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́ wɛ. À Liyel yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ wɛ pnɛ́yy à de pɔ ǹ tĩ̀nnɛ, à pɔ à ye ǹ yĩnnɛ nɛ: «Kɔrnɛy!»

Ǹtɛ Kɔrnɛy sõ̀ mɛ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩlɛ n yah díkídíkí tíkítìkì sɔkɔ, tɛ́ à piki yah nɛ, kwâh nɛ̂ se nɩ, pé yõ̀tɛ̃̀? Yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Wáh nírí nónónɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ wáh yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ nónónɛ n pɩ yãm tãn tyɩ́, Liyel yĩ́ mɛ sé yõ. Ǹ dyɔ mɛ n kwnɛ á tyɩ́lɛ.
Núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ, nósyɔ́ wilki n tɛkɩ n mɔ Nsyope kwil, pè kyɩ Simo yɔ́ tɛ̃ n pɔ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Pyɛrɩlɛ.
À mɛ twáhntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ sénpɩ dĩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́, nɛ̂ tɔ yĩn-á Simolɛ. Ǹ gbô mɛ pnɛ yɔ gbɔ̀pɔ.»

Képah sɔkɔ, yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ-á wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yo tɛ Kɔrnɛy tyɩ́, tɛ́ yal ǹ tnɔ̂, Kɔrnɛy núkú ǹ tõ̀npɩbɩ díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí ye ànɛ̂ sràsyí yɔ́lɛ, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ǹ tnɔ̂ di mónɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ.
Tɛ́ mɛ tyi nɔ́pi pól yãh pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ pè tɛkɩ mɔ Nsyope kwil.
Ké dĩndallɛ, pè sõ̀ mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ sɛ̃́, tɛ́ pǎh pópó n de Nsyope kwil sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, gbĩ sõ̀ mɛ yõ̀tah sírr kénkɔ̃ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Pyɛrɩ mɛ dɔkɔ gbɛ̃́ntĩ̂n yõ, mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ.
Képah sɔkɔ, kwɛkɩ pɔ à tɛ̃; à sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé yõke yõ. Tɛ́ pǎh mɛ yõkelɛ n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Liyel wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́lɛ à wɛ̃kɩ.
À yĩ̂nyõ wɛ yɩ́kɩ́nmɔnɔlɛ, tɛ́ kwâh yɔ́ mɛ wil ké sɔkɔ, fwɔ̀pĩ̀n-ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔ̃́, ké vyɛ̃ynɔ ńyã́hlɛ tɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ n tiki n pi sétáh.
Tɛ́ gbyẽ̂h ǹyẽ̂h yî duke pól sõ̀ mɛ ké sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ yî nónó-à n til, à tahlɩ kèpye duke pól tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ yĩ́npɔ̃́ yɔ́ noh kè mɛ n yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Pyɛrɩ, yuku n ko sé sɔkɔ ǹ kɔ.»

Ǹtɛ Pyɛrɩ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ syah nɛ, páh pɩ sɔ̃́ pilɛ, pé náh dêl kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ yah, képah náh pɩ, kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ, nɛ̂-á névilɛ n silki Liyel yah. Képah-á, pé náh kè pɩ n pi póllɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, yĩ́npɔ̃́ mɛ̀ tɔ̃ ké syɩ yo à noh kɛ ní-òlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Liyel-á kwâh nɛ̂ wɛ̃kɩ kwáhpépɛ̌ynɛ, áwɔ tyɩ́ náh ké wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ nɛ, kǎh mɛ névilɛ n silki Liyel yah.»
Képah tɛ̃̀ pɩ sɛ̃́ kɛ tɔ̃́nɔ́, tɛ́ Liyel núkú kénɛ kwâh yɔ̃ dɔkɔ sɔkɔ yĩ̂nyõ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Pyɛrɩ lékã́m sõ̀ mɛ fɛ̃kɩ, à mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n piki n yah wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á à wɛ, ké yõ-á kɩ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi tir nɛ̂nɛ. À mɛ képah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Kɔrnɛy tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye mó mɛ sénpɩ dĩ́ Simo gbô tyɩ́ piki yah kɔ̃ pɔ wɛ, mɛ yĩn tɛ̃ ké yah,
tɛ́ mɛ n piki n yah nɛ, Simo nɛ̂-á pè n ye Pyɛrɩlɛ, à se mɛ twáhntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ nɩ?
Ǹtɛ Pyɛrɩ-á sõ̀ mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ ǹ fɔkɔlɛ n sõ wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, Liyel Mirki mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à yah, díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ tɔ̃́mɩ́-á mɛ ǹnɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Péwɔ-á tɛkɩ mɔ pélɛ ǹ tyɩ́. Képah-á, à yuku n tiki n sɔkɔ pélɛ, à káh tɔ̀tɔ̀ pɩ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ tiki kyɩ no nɔ́pi tnɔ̂, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, nɛ̂-á pè n yah n kɔ̃, ǹmɔ-á péwɔlɛ. Ńkɛ̃́, pè kèyǎh kɔ̃.

Pè mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Kɔrnɛy-á tõ pélɛ ǹ tyɩ́. Nɛ́gbɩ́-á ǹnɛ, wǎh Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ pól-á ǹ yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo. Yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́-á kélɛ à wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, wǎh yɩ̃nɛ à pɔ ǹ tɛ̃ n kyɩ ǹ gbô sɔkɔ, tyi nónó-á mɛ á tyɩ́ yo yo tɛ̃̀nɛ, á sè yo à syah.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ mɛ pé kɔ̃ pè de gbô sɔkɔ, à twah ǹ tyɩ́ à lékã̂h pɩ.
Tɛ́ ké dĩndallɛ, à mɛ pé sõ̀ tɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yísyɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ sɔkɔ pélɛ, nónó-á n wil Nsyope kwil.
Pé sɔkɔ sõ dĩndallɛ, pè kyɩ de Sesarɩ kwil; tɛ́ kyɩ nɛ yah Kɔrnɛy mɛ ǹ gbô tãn ànɛ̂ ǹ kódíbí kègblɔ ye tuke, mɛ pɔ pè syɩkɩ tɛ̃.
Pyɛrɩ-á pɔ n de gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Kɔrnɛy kyɩ à yohnɩ, tɛ́ kɔ kwĩnki ǹ yah, à à gbilki.
Ǹtɛ Pyɛrɩ mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à yuku, tɛ́ à yilki sah, tɛ́ nɛ névi ó-á péwɔ tɔlɛ dò.
Pè mɛ képah yónɔ́ sɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ de yuku gbô à kyɩ no nɔ́pi wɛ tùkèntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pípí.

Pyɛrɩ mɛ pè syah nɛ, pǎh pɩ̃ nɛ, dêl-á kélɛ Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́, pè náh n pɩ n soh wɛ̃ tyɩ́ kwlókáhkɩ́ névyelɛ, ànɛ̂ pè náh n de pé gbên sɔkɔ kɛ̀. Ǹtɛ Liyel-á kélɛ péwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, pé náh yɩ̃nɛ pé ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n yah nɛ, wǎh mɛ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ Liyel yah, képah náh pɩ, nɛ à náh yɩ̃nɛ pɩ́nsòhnɔ́lɛ névye tyɩ́.
Képah-á, pé kɔ̃ pǎh pé ye pé pɔ yékã̂b pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ. Ńkɛ̃́, pè se kɩ fɛ̃ pé yénɔ́ yõ yo pé syah nɩ?

Képah sɔkɔ, Kɔrnɛy mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, ké sèpĩ̀n ǹyẽ̂h-á yɔ̀, gbèkãm gbĩ́ mɛ̀ ó kénkɔ̃ sɔkɔ, páh lésõ mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ pé wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ dǒ, pé núkú dĩ́ yɔ́ wɛ yĩ́nntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pé yah tĩ̀nnɛ, wil flɔlɛ pěrr ǹ tyɩ́,
tɛ́ mɛ pé ye pé yĩnnɛ nɛ, Kɔrnɛy, Liyel-á pé nírí tɛ̃; ǹ dyɔ-á mɛ n kwnɛ pé pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ.
Képah-á, pé névye wilki n tɛkɩ n mɔ Nsyope kwil, pè kyɩ Simo ye n pɔ ásõ̂, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Pyɛrɩlɛ. Wâh mɛ twáhntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ sénpɩ dĩ́ Simo gbô sɔkɔ, pnɛ yɔ gbɔ̀pɔ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé núkú névye tɛkɩ mɔ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, pè kyɩ à ye n pɔ. Ǹ tɔ mó tɔ̃ pɩ plɛ tɛ́ fɛ̃ syi pɔ. Núkúnúkú, pé pól-á ásõ̂ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, ǹ wɛlɔ noh yĩnnɛ, nónó pól-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ dahbɩ ǹ gbõ̀, nɛ à yo pé syah.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ mɛ wɛy tɔkɔ tɛ́ nɛ: «Núkúnúkú, mé pɩ̃ kègbɩ yõ nɛ, Liyel náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n wah.
Névi nɛ̂-à fyɔ̀ ǹ yah tíkílɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ mɛ n kɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tɛ̃̀-à sɔ̃́ mɛ yìkì nɛ̂ nɛynɛ, ǹ tyɩ́ n nɔ Liyel tyɩ́.
Ǹmɔ Liyel ye ǹ wɛy tɛkɩ mɔ Yisrayel tãn tyɩ́, à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, yèvɩnɩ-á n wɛ Liyel tyɩ́ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á no pól Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
Nsyɔ̃-á kwní kɔ̃ tɛ ni sɔkɔ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, képah náh, nɛ̂-á pɩ Kalile gbɛ̃̀nyah ǹgbò sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah pól sɔkɔ, yé se mó kè pɩ̃ tɛ́!

Tɛ́ Liyel sõ̀ mɛ Nasarɛtɩ kwil Yesulɛ. À ǹ Mirki ànɛ̂ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ à kɔ̃. Képah ye, à mɛ n kɔ n kɔ̃ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ, à pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ nónó pól-á sõ̀ mɛ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ, à sõ̀ mɛ pélɛ n wilki ké sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ wǎh tyi nónó pól pɩ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ kwlo tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, á pól ye sè wɛ yĩ́nɛ. Ǹtɛ pè mɛ à tɛ̃ syɩ dahnɩ yõ, à à ko mɔ.
Tɛ́ ké sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́-ò sõlɛ, Liyel mɛ ǹ lékó yilki mɔ, tɛ́ à kɔ̃ à ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ no wɛ̃kɩ,

ǹtɛ à náh ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ no pól wɛ̃kɩ. À ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ ápi ó wɛ̃kɩ, ápi nónó-á lésõ Liyel yah tɔkɔ pɩ Yesu lékó yílkínmɔnɔ wɛ́pú ànɛ̂ sé yã́hpúlɛ. Ápi lésõ yõke yõ, tɛ́ wɔ wɔ kwâh wɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, ǹ lékó yílkínmɔntɛnɔ náh.
Képah sɔkɔ, à mɛ á tõ nɛ: ‹Yé kyɩ Liyel wɛynɛ n yo n kɔ̃ no tyɩ́. Yé kélɛ pè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, ńmɔ-á Liyel sah vye ànɛ̂ lékyɩ̂ tùkè-òlɛ.›
Ǹmɔ Yesu tyɩ́ ye tɔ̃ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu pól yo nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ ǹmɔ yõ, tɛ̃̀ tyípêl-á kɩ yɔ̃ mɔ à kɔ̃ ǹmɔ yĩn yõ.»
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ sõ̀ mɛ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, tɛ́ Liyel Mirki tiki ǹ wɛy nòhnɩ̀pu pól yõ.

Liyel-á Mirki nɛ̂ kɔ̃, kǎh tɔ̃ mɔ névye yõ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pè kɔ̃ pè wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nónó-á pè náh sè sãh, tɛ́ Liyellɛ n gbilki sɛ̃́, képah pɩ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á sõ̀ pɔ ànɛ̂ Pyɛrɩlɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ nɛ: «Névye nónónɛ Liyel Mirki wɛ tɛ ápi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, á kɩ fɛ̃ yahle sɔ̃́ nɛ, pè káh n wel n wilki ni sɔkɔ?»
Tɛ́ mɛ pè kɔ̃ pè Kɔrnɛypi wel wilki ni sɔkɔ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, pépi mó Pyɛrɩ ni nɛ, à wũ sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ pélɛ.
Tɛ́ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ́lɔ́ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, pè kè noh nɛ, nósyɔ́ tɔ-á mɛ Liyel wɛy fɛ̃ syi, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pyɛrɩ-á pɔ ǹ syɩ kyɩ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú Nsyifunɔ kyɩ tyah lékàhlɛ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃,
tɛ́ nɛ, à se sɔ̃́npɩ́ kyɩ de, à yõke tɔlɛ n yõ névye tĩ̀nnɛ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ nɩ?
Képah sɔkɔ, tir mɛ̀-á pɩ sɔ̃́, Pyɛrɩ ké yah yo wah pɔ dal mɔ pé tyɩ́ wárwár nɛ,

páh sõ̀ mɛ Nsyope kwil mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ Liyel wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́lɛ pé wɛ̃kɩ. Páh kwâh yɔ́ wɛ kè mɛ wil yĩ̂nyõ fwɔ̀pĩ̀n-ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔ̃́, ké vyɛ̃ynɔ ńyã́hlɛ tɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ n tiki n pi à pɔ yĩni tɛ̃ pé tnɔ̂.
Páh mɛ ké yáhnɔ́ sɔkɔ díkídíkí, pé yípɛ̂y wɛ ké sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ gbɛ̃́nkyɔlɛ, ànɛ̂ yî nónó-á n til, à tahlɩ kèpye tyɩ́.
Képah tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, pé yĩ́npɔ̃́ yɔ́ noh kè mɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Pyɛrɩ, yuku n ko sé sɔkɔ ǹ kɔ.»

Ǹtɛ pé mɛ yo yĩ́npɔ̃́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ nɛ pé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, pé náh képah pɩ n pi, ńkɛ̃́ páh pɩ sɔ̃́ pilɛ, dêl kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh de yah pé vyãh ànɛ̂ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ, nɛ̂-á névilɛ n silki Liyel yah.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, yĩ́npɔ̃́ mɛ̀ tɔ̃ wil yĩ̂nyõ, mɛ n yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Liyel-á kwâh nɛ̂ wɛ̃kɩ kwáhpépɛ̌ynɛ, áwɔ tyɩ́ náh ké wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ nɛ, kǎh mɛ névilɛ n silki Liyel yah.»
Képah tɛ̃̀-á pɩ sɛ̃́ kɛ tɔ̃́nɔ́, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ tɔ̃ kénɛ kwâh tɔkɔ dɔkɔ yĩ̂nyõ.
Tɛ́ légbĩ́ mɛ̀ ó sɔkɔ, díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ tɔ̃́mɩ́ mó mɛ pɔ yĩn tɛ̃ péwɔ mɛ́-ńsah gbô yah sɔkɔ. Ǹnɩ̂-á tõ pélɛ Sesarɩ kwil, pè pɔ péwɔ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ Liyel Mirki mɛ yo péwɔ tyɩ́ nɛ, pé sɔkɔ pélɛ, pé káh tɔ̀tɔ̀ pɩ. Pé yṹnpyé nɛ́pĩ̂ kénúkò nónó-á yɔ̀, pépi mɛ pé sõ̀ tɛ̃ à yuku Sesarɩ kwil. Pé pól kyɩ de Kɔrnɛy gbô sɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Kɔrnɛy tɔ mó yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, páh sõ̀ mɛ pé gbô sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ wil mɔ pé yah, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pé nɛy tɛkɩ n mɔ Nsyope kwil. Tɛ̃̀ kyɩ Simo tɛ̃ n pɔ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Pyɛrɩlɛ.
Wǎh kɩ pɔ wɛlɔ yísyɔ́ yo pé tyɩ́, nónó-á kɩ pé pwah mɔ ànɛ̂ pé gbô tãn póllɛ.
Kɔrnɛy-á képah yo tɛ sɛ̃́ péwɔ Pyɛrɩ tyɩ́, tɛ́ pé fyɔ̀ tyah à tyilɛ n yo pé tyɩ́, Liyel Mirki tiki Kɔrnɛypi tɔ yõ, sɔ̃́-á lésõ kè tiki pépi yõ ké tyah gbĩ́nɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, péwɔ dyɔ to kõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛy mɛ̀ tyɩ́lɛ, wǎh nɛ̂ yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Nsyɔ̃ névye wel wilki ni sɔkɔ, ǹtɛ yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, Liyel kɩ yé tɔ̃ sah ǹ Mirkilɛ kɩ yé pɩ yályál.»
Ǹtɛ pépi-á sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ ǹ Mirki nɛ̂nɛ pépi kɔ̃, wǎh fyɔ̀ kélɛ no nɔ́pi tɔ kɔ̃ tɛ pépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, nɛ̂ se péwɔlɛ kɩ fɛ̃ Liyel tir yah kõ nɩ?

Képah sɔkɔ, névye-á wɛlɔ nɔ́pi noh sɛ̃́, pé pól vɩ, tɛ́ Liyel yĩnnɛ n gbilki mɛ n yo nɛ, Liyel-á ńtyɩ̃́nɔ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ névye tɔ kɔ̃ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pè kɩ fɛ̃ pé nnɔ vi mɔ, kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ dɛ́!

Yetyɛ̃nɩ ko mɔ gbĩ́nɛ, pè sõ̀ mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n fõh. Képah ye, pè to karkɩ. Pé túkù sɔkɔ Fenisi gbɛ̃̀nyah, túkù sɔkɔ Syipri gbɛ̃̀nyah, túkù mɛ sɔkɔ Antyɔsyɩ kwil. Tɛ́ pè náh sõ̀ mɛ Yesu tyɩ́lɛ n yo ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́, nɛ́ Nsyifunɔ ó tyɩ́ náh.
Ǹtɛ túkù sõ̀ mɛ pé sɔkɔ, nónó-á n wil Syipri gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Sirɛnɩ kwil. Pépi-á pɔ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ, pè sõ̀ mɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo no tɛ́lɔ́
Tɛ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sõ̀ mɛ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ pélɛ n kɔ̃. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, névye náhnáh vi mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, à pɩ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Yerusalɛmɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì-á képah noh sɛ̃́, pè Barnabasɩ tɛkɩ mɔ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ.

Barnabasɩlɛ, nɛ́pépɛ̌y ye lésõ ǹnɛ. Liyel Mirki sõ̀ mɛ à tɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ǹ sɔkɔ kègbɩlɛ. Képah ye, wǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃, tɛ́ Liyel pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ nɛ́npɔ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, ǹ nɩ vɩ. À mɛ sṍré mɔ pé pól sɔkɔ nɛ, pè gbah tɛ̃ pé wrɔ́ tel tɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ pé nnɔ póllɛ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɔ́wû ǹgbɛ̃ fɛ̃ syi sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ.
Képah náh, Barnabasɩ sɔkɔ Tarsɩ kwil, Sole yáhnkɔ̃-ńsah.

Wǎh kyɩ à wɛ, à à tɛ̃ pɔ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ. Pé nímí tɛ̃ à yi vi pól pɩ nɛ́npɔ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ, à névye náhnáh tɔ wɛ kwɔ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ. Nɛ́npɔ́ ǹgbò sɔkɔ ye pè Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú ye Kretyɛ̃bɩlɛ.
Tɛ́ kénɛ sèpĩ̀n sɔkɔ, Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu yísyɔ́ wil Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, à pɔ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ.

Pé sɔkɔ núkú yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ pè n ye Akabusilɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, ǹmɔ yuku kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, dǒ kwéy, kwɛ́npékè-á kɩ n de n pi kèkõyṍ pól sɔkɔ. Képah pɩ́nɔ́ pɔ Klode wɛ, Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú kè yah tɔkɔ, à yɩ̃nɛ pé nɛ́núkù núkú pól gbã̀n yî wɛ́nɔ́nɔlɛ nɛ, páh kɩ pé gbã̀n yî yísyɔ́ tuke mɔ, kɩ tɛkɩ mɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú kɔ̃ Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Pǎh kè yah tɔkɔ sɔ̃́, pè kè pɩ sɛ̃́, tɛ́ mɛ yî nɔ́pilɛ Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Sole gbõ̀ dahbɩ, pépi mɛ kyɩ sélɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm kɔ̃.
Ké légbĩ́ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Yerɔdɩ tyah Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì névye túkù fṍhnɔ́lɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil.
À Nsyɔ̃ nɛ́nkyɩ́ dĩ́ Nsyakɩ ko mɔ kèkírkìlɛ.
Tɛ́ wǎh kè wɛ yĩ mɛ̀ nɔ Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, à tɔ̃ Pyɛrɩ tɔ tɛ̃. Légbĩ́ pɔ yɩ̃nɛ Nsyifunɔ búrn sɛ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ syáh syáhnɔ́lɛ.

Wǎh Pyɛrɩ tɛ̃ sɛ̃́, à mɛ à dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sràsyíbí nɛ́pĩ̂ ǹyẽ̂h tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ ńyã́h névye kɔ̃ pè wɛ̃nɛ n sah, à ǹnɛ n syɩkɩ. À sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, búrn sɛ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ syáh-à kɩ sɔkɔ tɛ, pé à tuke no pól yĩ́ yah.
Pyɛrɩ yah sõ̀ mɛ víkénɔ́lɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, ǹtɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì mó mɛ Liyellɛ n gbah n ni ǹ tyɩ́.

Tɛ́ sõ nɛ̂ dĩndal-á Yerɔdɩ kɩ Pyɛrɩ tuke n pi, ké lékã̂hnɛ, Pyɛrɩ sõ̀ mɛ púkúbínsàhnɔ́lɛ kɛ̃́lɔ́ plɔ́ nínɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ n dɔ sràsyíbí nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí wrɔ́. Tɛ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè mɛ̀ syɩ́kɩ́pú sõ̀ mɛ ké yah, mɛ kélɛ n syɩkɩ.

Ǹtɛ nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ núkú wil mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, ké sɔkɔ pól piki pěrr. Yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ mɛ̀ mɛ Pyɛrɩ mɩ mɩ ǹ gbɔ̀pɔ tyɩ́ à à yilki mɔ, tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, à yuku súú. Képah sɔkɔ, kɛ̃́lɔ́ nɔ́pi núkú kɔ̃lɩ to Pyɛrɩ gbã̀n tyɩ́, à kwɛ sétáh.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ tɔ̃ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à ǹ kɔ̃ dyɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ lékyêhlɛ. À mɛ kè pɩ sɛ̃́. Yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ mɛ̀ tɔ̃ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à ǹ fwɔ̀mɔ̀-ǹgbɛ̃ mɔ, à mó pé sõ̀ tɛ̃.
Pyɛrɩ mɛ ǹ sõ̀ tɛ̃, à wil. Tɛ́ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ-á tyi nónónɛ n pɩ, Pyɛrɩ náh sõ̀ mɛ sɛ̃ sé yõ nɛ gblɔ-á sélɛ. À sõ̀ wɛ nɛ dɛ́kɩ́-á pé n dɔ.

Pè wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè syɩ́kɩ́-ńsah gben kal sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ké ní-ò tɔ kal sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kyɩ syɩ vyɔrɩ wùkah gbɩ̃́nɩ́ tyɩ́. Képah yah sõ̀ mɛ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ kwil nɩyṍ tĩ̀nnɛ. Ké tɔ núkú yɩkɩ mɔ ké gblɔ̌y. Pè mɛ wil à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃ n yuku. Dǒ, Pyɛrɩ núkú yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ mɛ̀ yah kwlɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ yah pyě pɩ kyòo yĩ mɛ̀nɛ. À mɛ nɛ núkúnúkú, páh pyě kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á tõ ǹ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩlɛ à pɔ pé pwah mɔ wilki Yerɔdɩ gbõ̀ ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ pèl nónónɛ n syɩkɩ nɛ, sè péwɔ nɔ.
Tɛ́ Nsyɔ̃ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Markɩlɛ, Pyɛrɩ-á ǹ fɔkɔ sõ yah, à sɔkɔ ǹmɔ yṹ Mari gbô. Nírí pɩ́pú náhnáh sõ̀ mɛ tuke mɔ tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, mɛ Liyellɛ n ni.
Tɛ́ Pyɛrɩ-á pɔ gbô yah mɩ, tõ̀npɩ pípír yɔ́ mɛ pè n ye Wrodelɛ, ǹmɔ mɛ nɔ de kélɛ, tɛ́ píkínyahnɔ pɩ nɛ, nɛ̂ se nɩ?
Képah sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ-á yo mɔ, à ǹ yĩ́ pɩ̃. Ké nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, à pyě gbô yah sah yɩ́kɩ́nmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ tɛ́ ǹ syɩ to kyɩ kè yo no tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Pyɛrɩ-á mɛ yĩ́nntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ gbô yah.
Ǹtɛ pè pyě nɛ, pípír yõ̀gbèkè-á yuku. Tɛ́ wǎh mɛ kélɛ n gbah n yo nɛ gbɩ-á pé n yo, pè tɔ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Pyɛrɩ mírkí-á kɩ nɛ̂ à wɛ.
Ǹtɛ Pyɛrɩ wɔ mó mɛ wùkahlɛ n tɔ̃ n mɩ sɛ̃́. Képah sɔkɔ, pǎh pópó pɔ wùkah yɩkɩ mɔ, pè kè wɛ kè pɩ ǹmɔlɛ ńtyɩ̃́nɔ. Kè pɩ pé tyɩ́ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ.

Pyɛrɩ mɛ ǹ gbõ̀ pɩ mɔ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé vyɛ̃y vike. Tɛ́ Liyel-á à yohnɩ mɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ à kɔ̃ à wil wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, à de ké sɔkɔ à kè yãh pé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pè kyɩ kè yãh Nsyakɩ ànɛ̂ pé yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́. Képah náh, à pyě wil sɔkɔ fɩ̃́ yɔ́.
Ǹtɛ tyah-á pɔ dal, sràsyíbí fɔkɔ fil Pyɛrɩ tyɩ́lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, pè wɛ̃nɛ n piki n yah nɛ, ǹ tyɩ́ se pɩ sɔ̃́ nɩ?

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Yerɔdɩ pè kɔ̃ pè mɩ de Pyɛrɩ sóhnkɔ̃nɔ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ pè náh à wɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à mɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè syɩ́kɩ́pú ye pɔ piki yah, tɛ́ nɛ, pè pè ko mɔ. Képah náh, Yerɔdɩ wil Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ à kyɩ sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ Sesarɩ kwil.

Tiri kwil ànɛ̂ Sidõ kwil tãn-á sõ̀ mɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, ké yõke lésõ mɛ n wil yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Yerɔdɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ yékã̂b-á pɔ wɛ pé wrɔ́ ànɛ̂ Yerɔdɩlɛ, Yerɔdɩ fɔkɔ kah vyãh pélɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pépi mɛ yo sah núkú yõ nɛ, páh kɩ kyɩ wil Yerɔdɩ tyɩ́. Képah yĩnnɛ, pè kyɩ pé sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ ànɛ̂ Yerɔdɩ sɛ̃́-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Blasɩtusilɛ, nɛ pé kyɩ yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ yah kɔ̃ Yerɔdɩ tyɩ́.
Pǎh gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì nɛ̂ yah tɔkɔ, ké lésõ-á nɔ, Yerɔdɩ ǹ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ flɔ mɔ pɔ kɔ̃ tɛ̃ ǹ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ kǒ yõ, à tyah wɛy yɔ́lɛ n yo tɔ́wû tyɩ́.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, névye tyah n gbo mɔ nɛ, névi tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh n wɛkɩ yɔ̀ dɛ́, Liyel-á!
Képah sɔkɔ, Yerɔdɩ-á sɔ̃́npɩ́ gbílkínɔ́ mɛ̀ fɛ̃ syi, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ sàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel yõ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ núkú à mɩ, kèfyɔ̃ mɛ gbɔ ǹ sɔkɔ, à à yõ ko.
Ǹtɛ Liyel wɛy sõ̀ mɛ n gbah n tɔ̃ mɔ n yuku ólɛ.
Tɛ́ Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Sole wɔ-á pé tõ̀ pɩ tɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil,

Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu ànɛ̂ névye kwɔ́pú sõ̀ mɛ Antyɔsyɩ kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ: Barnabasɩ sõ̀ mɛ, ànɛ̂ Solelɛ, ànɛ̂ Simeyõlɛ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Dĩ́syíkèynɛ, ànɛ̂ Sirɛnɩ kwil Lusiyusilɛ, à tahlɩ Manayɛ̃ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ kɔ̃rɩ pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Kalile gbɛ̃̀nyah yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Yerɔdɩlɛ.
Sõ yɔ́lɛ, pǎh mɛ níkì tɛ̃, tɛ́ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyellɛ n ni gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ǹ Mirki yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yé Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Sole wilki pé tyɩ́lɛ. Pè kɩ tõ̀ pɩ, nɛ̂ yĩn-á mé n ye pélɛ.»
Képah sɔkɔ, pè níkì tɛ̃,

Liyel Mirki-á Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Sole tɛkɩ mɔ tõ̀ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, pè mɛ tiki yuku à kyɩ de Selesi kwil. Tɛ́ de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ́npɔ́, nɛ páh n yuku gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Syiprilɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ.
Pǎh yĩni tɛ̃ ké kwil yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Salamininɛ, pè tyah Liyel wɛynɛ n yo Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ Nsyɔ̃-Markɩ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ pélɛ, pé yohnɩ n mɔ yĩnnɛ.

Pè mɛ Syipri mɛ̀ kan kɔ kah, à kyɩ de ké kwil yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Pafɔsɩlɛ. Pè kyɩ Nsyifunɔ sènpɩ dĩ́ yɔ́ yohnɩ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Bar-Yesulɛ. Ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-òlɛ.

Tɛ́ à sõ̀ mɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ Syipri yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Sɛrɩsyusi Polusilɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á lésõ lékã́m névilɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel wɛy noh dékè sõ̀ mɛ Sɛrɩsyusi Polusi tɛ̃. Képah ye, à pè kɔ̃ pè kyɩ Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Sole ye.

Ǹtɛ sènpɩ dĩ́ Bar-Yesulɛ, pè tɔ̃ sõ̀ ǹnɛ n ye Yelimasɩlɛ Krɛkɩ wɛy sɔkɔ. Ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Solelɛ n fwo. À sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Syipri yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ yĩ́nínmɔ-ńsahlɛ, nɛ à káh sɛ̃ Yesu yõ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Sole nɛ̂-á tɔ̃ pè n ye Polelɛ,
tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Áwɔ nɛ̂-á lékã́mkãm ànɛ̂ yĩ́nvǐ ó á tɔ̂ɔ́, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ névi mɛ̀; gblɔ wã̀l pól sépɛlɛ áwɔlɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wã̀l tómtóm fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́ yal mɔ dɛ́!

Núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel gbõ̀ kɩ sah á wil. Á kɩ pɩ yɩ̃́tũ̂nɛ wrɔ́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ, á náh tɔ̃ gbĩ kyòo wɛ n pi.» Képah yóntɛnɔ ǹsɔ̃̀, ǹ yɩ̃́ núkú wɔ, à ǹ gblɔ̌y wɛ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ tyah n kɔ n kore n vi n kɔ̃, à nɛynɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ̃ tɛ̃ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Syipri yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́-á Liyel tyí-ǹgbnɔ pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ, tɛ́ kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ noh, sè ǹ nɩ tɛ̃. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ.

Képah náh, Pole ànɛ̂ ǹ kɔ́mû de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, à yal Pafɔsɩ kwil, tɛ́ yuku Pɛrsyɩ kwil, Pãnfili gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Pǎh mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, Nsyɔ̃ ǹ gbɛ wil pé sɔkɔ, à ǹ syɩ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil.
Ǹtɛ Polepi tɛ̃̀ wɔ mó yal Pɛrsyɩ kwil, à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ pé kɔ́lɔ́lɛ, pópó à kyɩ de Antyɔsyɩ kwil, Pisidi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ mɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ tã̀ntã̀nnɔ́ yísyɔ́ kar. Wǎh kar tɛ, Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ yah tãm mɛ pè kɔ̃ pè yo Polepi tyɩ́ nɛ, pé no, wɛlɔ yísyɔ́-à kɩ mɛ pé tyɩ́ sṍré mɔ mɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ tɔ́wû sɔkɔ, ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀-á mɛ pé tyɩ́.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ yuku yĩn, tɛ́ ǹ gbõ̀ pɩ mɔ no tyɩ́ nɛ, pè noh pé tyɩ́ yɔ̀. Tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yisrayel tãn, à tahlɩ nónó-á Nsyifunɔ náh pélɛ, tɛ́ mɛ Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ, yé nóhnɔ́ pɩ ń tyɩ́.
Ápi Yisrayel tãn Liyellɛ, à ápi náh tãn yah wilki. À tɔ̃ Yisrayel tãn pɩ dò, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ pè mɛ Yesyipti gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ; tɛ́ tɔ̃ ǹ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ pè wilki ké sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ à pè pu
Képah náh, à yìkìnìnɔ́ kwǎrninɔ névye ko mɔ, à pé duku to Kanah gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pé sétáhlɛ Yisrayel tãn kɔ̃ gbɛ̃kɩlɛ.

Tyi nɔ́pi pól-á pópó n pɩ n tɛ, kè nɔ ye kyɛyẽ́h tikininí pɔ́ gbãm (450) kénkɔ̃lɛ. Képah náh, á náh tãn sɔkɔ ye Liyel n wilki á vyãh syípúlɛ, pópó à pɔ nɔ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò Samuyɛlɩ gbĩ tyɩ́.

Tɛ́ sõ yɔ́lɛ, pè mɛ kè yah kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ, páh mɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ́ tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel mɛ Kisi pídĩ́ Sawuli pɩ pé yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, pópó ye tikininí. Tɛ́ Sawulilɛ, Bɛ̃nsyamɛ yìkì nɛy ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ.

Ǹtɛ Liyel-á pɔ ǹmɔ milki gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à mɛ Davidi pɩ pé yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ. Davidi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ ye lésõ Liyel yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: ‹Mé wil mɔ ń dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛy yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Nsyese pídĩ́ Davidilɛ. À kɩ ń dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi pól pɩ dal mɔ pallɛ.›
Liyel ye lésõ ǹ vyãhlɛ Davidi kɔ̃ nɛ, Yisrayel pwáhnmɔ-ò-á kɩ dubi ǹmɔ pétóbé sɔkɔ. Kénɛ pwáhnmɔ-ò ye pɔ pɩ Yesulɛ.
Tɛ́ Yesu-á pópó n pi, wèlnwìlkì-ò Nsyɔ̃ ye yo Yisrayel tãn pól tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé nnɔ vi mɔ, pè mó wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ.

Ǹtɛ Nsyɔ̃ tõ̀-á pópó pɔ n tyɛ, à mɛ n yo névye tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: ‹Yépi tɛ̃̀ sõnɔ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ mɛ ńmɔlɛ? Yé káh wɛ nɛ, pwáhnmɔ-ò nɛ̂ pɔ́nɔ́-á yé syɩkɩ tɛ̃, ǹmɔ-á ńmɔlɛ dɛ́! Ǹtɛ yé yah, à mɛ n knɛ pɔ́-ńsah. Tɛ́ ńmɔ ńtɛ̃ fṍrɔɔ kah ǹ lékyêh fyé dɛ́nɔ́lɛ ǹ gbyẽ̂h sɔkɔ.›»
Képah náh, Pole tɔ̃ nɛ: «Á no, yépi nónó-á Abrahmɩ pétóbélɛ, à tahlɩ Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́pú pól tyɩ́, pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛy mɛ̀ ye tɛkɩ mɔ ápi pól yĩnnɛ.

Ǹtɛ Yerusalɛmɩ tãn ànɛ̂ pé yõ̀tãm náh lésõ pɩ̃ nɛ, Yesu-á pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu wɛlɔ nónó-á n kar pé tyɩ́ Nsyifunɔ mɩ mɩ yòh sõnɔ́ póllɛ, pè náh sé yõ pɩ̃. Kénɛ wɛlɔ tyi yónɔ́ ye lésõ pè pɩ dal mɔ, pǎh lékàhlɛ Yesu kɔ̃.
Pè náh Yesu tyípɩ́nɩ́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ, nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ kònmɔnɔlɛ. Ǹtɛ pè kè yah kɔ̃ Pilati tyɩ́ nɛ, à à ko mɔ.
Tɛ́ Liyel wɛy-á tyi nónó pól yo Yesu tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pǎh pɔ sè pɩ dal mɔ tɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, pè ǹ lékó tiki mɔ to dahnɩ yõ, tɛ́ kyɩ à yɩ̃ diki yɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel mɛ ǹ lékó yilki mɔ.

Képah náh, névye nónó-á lésõ ǹ sõ̀ tɛ̃ yal Kalile gbɛ̃̀nyah, à dɔkɔ yuku ǹnɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, à ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ pépi wɛ̃kɩ sèpĩ̀n náhnáh sɔkɔ. Kénɛ névye nɔ́pi ye mɛ ǹ tyi yónwàhpu kègblɔlɛ Yisrayel tãn yah núkúnúkú yɔ̀.
Ǹtɛ ápilɛ, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir ye ápi tɔ n yo yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ á náh tãn kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ yõ,
képah-á à pɩ dal mɔ ápi tyɩ́, ápi nónó-á pɩ pé wɛ̃́npìlɛ. Wǎh Yesulɛ á kɔ̃, à yɩ̃nɛ kǎh wãrkɩ sah sɔ̃́ Gbálnɔ́ sɛ́bɛ́y yɩ̀kɩ̀ ní-ò sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Ńmɔ Pídĩ́ ye álɛ;
à tɔkɔ kwɛy tyɩ́, ńmɔ ye á Súlɛ.›
Liyel ye lésõ kwãh tɛ̃ kè yo sah nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yesu-à pɔ ku, à náh n pyãh n pi. Páh kɩ ǹ lékó yilki mɔ. À tɔ̃ lésõ kè yo dal mɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Máh lésõ ń vyãhlɛ Davidi kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ,
mé kɩ kè pɩ yé tyɩ́, kɩ sãm mɔ yé sɔkɔ,
tir yɔ́ náh ké dùkù ku n pi.›
Képah ye Davidi yo fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Á náh n yɛ á tõ̀npɩ pèpɛy lékó kɔ̃
kè n pyãh n pi.›
Ǹtɛ Davidi tɛ̃̀ wɔ gbĩ sɔkɔ, à Liyel tõ̀ pɩ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ. Képah náh, à mɛ ku pè kɔ̃ pè yɩ̃ ǹ náh tãn lékyɩ̂ tnɔ̂, ǹ tɔ lékó mɛ pyãh.
Ǹtɛ Liyel ye Yesu lékó yilki mɔ. Ǹmɔ lékó tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh pyãh dɛ́!
Á no, yé pɩ̃ nɛ, ǹmɔ Yesu gbõ̀ yõ-á tyípêl yɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ tyɩ́ wɛ yo yé tyɩ́ dɛ́! Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh tɛ̃ wɛ yé yõ wilki tyípêl nónó sɔkɔ,
névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ Yesu yõ, tɛ̃̀ yõ kɩ wil sé pól sɔkɔ, à kɩ fɛ̃ nɔ de Liyellɛ.
Képah ye, yé kyɔ̀mɩ̀nɔ́ pɩ, yè káh pɔ Liyel wɛy mɛ̀ yahle. Képah-à pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu-á tir nɛ̂ yo sah, kè kɩ pɔ yé yĩni tɛ̃. Pè lésõ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Yé yah, wɛ̀nyɩ̀kɩ̀ wɛ́kɩ́pú nɔ́pi,
yé nɛ mɛ gbɛ̃̀ndùnì sɔkɔ, yè mó ku tɛ̃ yõ!
Máh kɩ pɔ nɛ̂ pɩ n pi yé sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kɩ yé sah min sɔkɔ;
névi-à sɔ̃́ sõ̀ pɔ kélɛ n yãh yé tyɩ́,
yé náh n sɛ̃ n pi ké yõ.›»
Sépi yóntɛnɔ náh, Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ-á n wil Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, no tyah pélɛ n ni nɛ, mɩ mɩ yòh kèyǎhlɛ, pè tɔ̃ pɔ pé syɩ pé wɛy mɛ̀ ó yõ.

Képah náh, tɔ́wû-á pɔ karkɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, névye náhnáh Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ sõ̀ tɛ̃. Nsyifunɔ ye sõ̀, à tahlɩ névye tyɩ́, nónó-á vi mɔ de Nsyifunɔ Liyel nínɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ sõ̀ mɛ n yãh pélɛ, à pé sõnɔlɛ n vi n mɔ nɛ, Liyel-á pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ pé tyɩ́, pè ké tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ mɩ mɩ yòh kèyǎh-á vi pɔ, kwil névye kan pɔ tuke mɔ Liyel wɛy noh yĩnnɛ.
Nsyifunɔ-á kénɛ tɔ́wû wɛ sɛ̃́, dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀ de pé sɔkɔ képékèyɔ̂. Pè tyah Pole wɛynɛ n kɔ̃lɩ, à ké tyɩ́lɛ n yo n yɩkɩ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ kè yo nɩ̀sãhlɛ pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yépi ǹgbò tyɩ́ ye Liyel wɛy sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ kè yo. Ǹtɛ yáh fyɔ̀ kè yahle, tɛ́ kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ yé náh yɩ̃nɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ́nɔ́lɛ, kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ápi kɩ á yah mɔ névye tĩ̀nnɛ núkúnúkú, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel-á nɛ̂ yo, képah ye á n pɩ dò. À kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Mé ye ǹ sah nɛ á pɩ kyòolɛ névye tyɩ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ,
á mó kyɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛy yo
kèkõyṍ pól sɔkɔ.›»

Képah sɔkɔ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pǎh wɛlɔ nɔ́pi noh sɛ̃́, pé nɩ vɩ, pè tyah Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel wɛynɛ n gbilki. Tɛ́ névye nónó pól-á sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ́nɔ́lɛ, pé pól sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ.
Liyel wɛy núkú tɔ̃ mɔ kénɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ syɔ́ nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ yísyɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ, nónó-á mɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Nsyifunɔ mɛ pépi ànɛ̂ kwil nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ yísyɔ́ kurki mɔ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ yõ. Pè mɛ tyah Polepilɛ n fõh, tɛ́ pè yĩni yal pé sétáh yõ.
Pǎh mó n wil kénɛ kwil, pè pé gbyẽ̂h nɛ̀ngbɔ̃ kwer kwɛ ké sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sɔkɔ Yikonyumi kwil.
Ǹtɛ Antyɔsyɩ kwil Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú tɛ̃̀ wɔ sõ̀ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Liyel Mirki mɛ pè tɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ-á yĩni tɛ̃ Yikonyumi kwil, pè tɔ̃ de yuku Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ tyah Liyel wɛynɛ n yo, fɔ́ɔ́ Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pé náhnáh vi mɔ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.
Ǹtɛ Nsyifunɔ sɔkɔ nónó-á sõ̀ yahle sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ Yesu wɛy yõ, pépi nɛ́káhbɩ́ kurki mɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yõ.

Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ tɔ̃ tɛ̃ à mo Yikonyumi sɔkɔ. Pé gbõ̀ sàhnyĩnɔ sõ̀ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ pè kɔ̃ pè n wɛkɩ nɩ̀sãhlɛ. Tɛ́ à sõ̀ mɛ pé yah tɛ̃ pè kɔ̃ pè gbǐl tyilɛ n pɩ, gbǐl nónó-á n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, pǎh wɛlɔ nónónɛ n yo Liyel pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, gblɔ-á sélɛ.
Ǹtɛ kwil névye gbɛkɩ. Pé túkù sõ̀ mɛ mɔ Nsyifunɔlɛ, túkù mó mɛ mɔ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, à tahlɩ pé yõ̀tãmnɔ́ tyɩ́, pè wɛ̃ tyɩ́ mɔ nɛ, pé Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ fõh, pé mó pè minki ko dyêhlɛ.
Ǹtɛ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ-á pɔ pɩ̃ ké sɔkɔ, pè to sɔkɔ Lisitir kwil, ànɛ̂ Dɛrɩbɩ kwil, ànɛ̂ sé gbɔ̀plɔ kwlo sɔkɔ, Likawoni gbɛ̃̀nyah.
Tɛ́ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ, à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n kɔ̃ nɛ́npɔ́.
Tɛ́ dĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ Lisitir kwil, gbyẽ̂hnɛ kúnɔ́lɛ. À sõ̀ dubi sèkùkùlɛ, à náh tɛ̃ wɛ kɔ yah.

Tɛ́ sõ yɔ́lɛ, Pole-á n wɛkɩ, kénɛ dĩ́ sõ̀ mɛ ǹ wɛynɛ n nohnɩ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pole tyah dĩ́nɛ n yah díkídíkí. Tɛ́ wǎh kè wɛ nɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ dɛ́nmɔnɔ wɛ Liyel tyɩ́,
à yo ǹ tyɩ́ yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ nɛ: «Yuku n yĩn tómm á gbyẽ̂h yõ!» Képah sɔkɔ, dĩ́ núkú yɔkɔ syɩkɩ ǹ gbyẽ̂h yõ, à tyah n kɔ.
Tɔ́wû-á képah tɛ̃̀ pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ sɛ̃́ Pole tyɩ́, pè tyah n yo wòhòh Likawoni tãn wɛy sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, tã̀n-á sé viri pɩ névyelɛ à tiki pɔ pé wrɔ́ dɛ́!
Képah sɔkɔ, pè tõ̀ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Nsewusilɛ, pè képah yĩn dyɩ Barnabasɩ kɔ̃. Tɛ́ wɛy-á sõ̀ mɛ Pole wɔ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, pè kèyǎh yĩn dyɩ ǹmɔ kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Yɛrɛmɛsɩlɛ.
Tɛ́ tõ̀ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Nsewusilɛ, ké wɔ̀kɔ̀ sõ̀ mɛ kwil dé-ńsah yah sɔkɔ. Ké lékwén nɛ́tɛ̃̂ dĩ́ mɛ nyéhpyɛ́nɩ̀ tɛ̃ pɔ kénɛ tõ̀ wɔ̀kɔ̀ yah ànɛ̂ yî fĩnɛ.
Ǹtɛ Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Pole-á képah tɛ̃̀ noh sɛ̃́, pépi nónó-á Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ, pè pé fwɔ̀mɔlɔ yɔrɩ tɔkɩ yèkwɔrɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, tɛ́ to de tɔ́wû nɩyṍ mɛ yo tũ yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ nɛ:

«Á no, sɔ̃́ mɛ tɛ́ yé képahlɛ n pɩ? Névye ye ápi tɔlɛ, yépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ dò! Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir ye á pɔ yó-ńsah yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé yõ kɛ̃́ fal fal tã̀n nɔ́pi milki, yé mó vi mɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á min nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ. Ǹmɔ ye mɔ yĩ̂nyõlɛ, ànɛ̂ sétáhlɛ, ànɛ̂ pnɛ yɔlɛ, à tahlɩ sé sɔkɔ yíyìn pól tyɩ́.
Ǹgbòlɛ, Liyel mɛ̀ ye sõ̀ yɛ kwlo kwlo névye pól kɔ̃ pè n kɔ pé dyɔ dyɔ wã̀l yõ.

Ǹtɛ à mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y dùkùlɛ n wɛ̃kɩ sɛ̃́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ ǹ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. À mɛ pũ̀nɛ n pɩ n mɔ yélɛ n kɔ̃ à n wil yĩ̂nyõ, tɛ́ yé sèmukɔ kɔ̃ sè n pɛkɩ, tɛ́ yõke náhnáhlɛ yélɛ n kɔ̃ ànɛ̂ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ.»
Ǹtɛ wɛlɔ nɔ́pi fyé yónɔ́ yõ, Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye yah vyãh tɔ́wû yĩ́nínmɔ-ńsah nɛ, pè káh gbètòh mɔ pé yõ.

Ké légbĩ́ sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ yísyɔ́ wil Antyɔsyɩ kwil, Pisidi gbɛ̃̀nyah, ànɛ̂ Yikonyumi kwil, à pɔ nɛ́npɔ́. Pépi pɔ tɔ́wû vi tɛ̃ mɔ Polepi yõ, pè kɔ̃ pè yuku Polelɛ n minki dyêhlɛ nɛ páh ǹnɛ n min n ko. Képah náh, pè à yɔrɩ wilki sah kwil náh tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ mɛ n sõ nɛ wǎh ku.
Ǹtɛ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú-á pɔ tuke mɔ ǹ tnɔ̂, à à mɔ gbɩ̃ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à mɛ yuku tɛ́ de kwil sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ ké dĩndallɛ, à sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩlɛ Dɛrɩbɩ kwil.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ Dɛrɩbɩ kwil, pè Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo nɛ́npɔ́ tãn tyɩ́. Pé náhnáh mɛ sɛ̃ Yesu yõ, à pɩ ǹ tõ̀ sã́hpúlɛ. Képah náh, Polepi pé syɩ syɔ̃ Lisitir kwillɛ, ànɛ̂ Yikonyumi kwillɛ, à kyɩ de Antyɔsyɩ kwil, Pisidi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ nɩ̀sãh ànɛ̂ sṍré ye sõ̀ pè n mɔ n kɔ̃ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú sɔkɔ nɛ, pè gbah n tɛ̃ pé sõnɔ sah yĩ́ĩ́ Yesu yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Pè sõ̀ mɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, yèvyãhrɩ náhnáh dénwìlnɔ́ sɔkɔ-á pé kɩ de Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ mɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ kwlo nɔ́pi pól sɔkɔ, Polepi sõ̀ yah tãm yísyɔ́ yah wilki sé sɔkɔ, à sah sé yõ. Tɛ́ níkì tɛ̃ à nírí pɩ pé tyɩ́, à pè dahbɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu gbõ̀, pǎh sɛ̃ ǹmɔ nɛ̂ yõ.
Képah náh, pè Pisidi gbɛ̃̀nyah kɔ kah, à kyɩ de Pãnfili gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ, pè Liyel wɛy yo Pɛrsyɩ kwil tãn tyɩ́, tɛ́ pyě yuku Atali kwil.
Pǎh n yal nɛ́npɔ́, pè de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, à yuku Antyɔsyɩ kwil, Siri gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Kénɛ kwil sɔkɔ ye sõ̀ pè pè dahbɩ Liyel gbõ̀ sɔkɔ, tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ yĩnnɛ, nɛ̂-á pè pɩ tɛ yɔ̀.

Pǎh yĩni tɛ̃ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ, pè Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì ye tuke. Tɛ́ Liyel-á pé yah tɛ̃, à ǹ tõ̀ pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, pè kè yãh pé tyɩ́; à tahlɩ wǎh ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ névye tɔ kɔ̃ sɔ̃́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Képah náh, Polepi tɛ̃ pélɛ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ, à mo.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, díbí yísyɔ́ wil Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah, à pɔ Antyɔsyɩ kwil sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ pɔ tyah Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n kwɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, nɛ́ pè náh kõ̀kè kõ sɔ̃́-á Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kè yo sah, pè náh fɛ̃ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ n pi.

Ǹtɛ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ náh fɛ̃ syi. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yékã̂b ǹgbɛ̃ de pépi ànɛ̂ díbí nɔ́pi wrɔ́. Képah sɔkɔ, kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ Pole, ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ, ànɛ̂ pépi túkù-á kɩ dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil. Pǎh kɩ kyɩ wil Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm tyɩ́, pè yĩ mɛ̀ yah wah.

Tɛ́ mɛ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ Polepi tyɩ́ kénɛ kɔ́lɔ́ mɛ̀ yĩnnɛ. Polepi-á n sɔkɔ, pè syɔ̃ sɔkɔ Fenisi gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Samari gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, mɛ névye tyɩ́lɛ n yãh pé tyɩ́, nónó-á vi mɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃, tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ náh pélɛ. Kè pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tyɩ́.

Pǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú, ànɛ̂ pé yah tãm, ànɛ̂ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye mɛ pè tɛ̃ pallɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel-á Polepi yah tɛ̃ pè ǹ tõ̀ pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, Polepi kè yãh pé tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ Farisiyɛ̃ névye nónó-á vi mɔ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, pépi túkù yuku tyah n yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, nónó-á sɛ̃ Yesu yõ, tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ náh pélɛ, pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè kõ̀kè kõ; ànɛ̂ pǎh yɩ̃nɛ kyɩ̃̀nmɔnɔlɛ pè Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ nɛ n pɩ.
Képah tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm wɛ̃ wɛ yĩ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, à kè yah wɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Kè sõ̀ pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ yékã̂b ǹgbɛ̃nɛ pé wrɔ́, fɔ́ɔ́ Pyɛrɩ pɔ yuku yĩn, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Ń yṹnpyé, yépi ńtɛ̃ se kè pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel-á ńmɔ yah wilki yé sɔkɔ di mónɔ́lɛ tɛ́! À nɛ mé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo névye tyɩ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pè kɔ̃ pè kè wɛ noh, pè mó sɛ̃ Yesu yõ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel nɛ̂-á névye fɔkɔ sõnɔlɛ n pnɛ, ǹmɔ ye ǹ Mirkilɛ pè kɔ̃, sɔ̃́-á lésõ à kélɛ ápi tɔ kɔ̃, à kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ páh pépi tɔ fɛ̃ syi.
À náh wǎhkɩ̀ pɩ ápi ànɛ̂ pépi wrɔ́. Pǎh sɛ̃ ǹ yõ, képah ye à pé nnɔ tɔ̃ sah.
Tɛ́ núkúnúkú, sɔ̃́ pɩ tɛ́ yé Liyel vyãh sõ̀lɛ n noh, à tɔ́kɔ́pêllɛ n sah Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yõ, nónó-á ápi náh tãn ànɛ̂ ápi ńtɛ̃ náh tɛ̃ wɛ sè twah yah?
Ǹtɛ ápi sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ áyáh pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ, no nɔ́pi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.»

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, no pól tɛ̃ syɩ́syɩ́, tɛ́ pé ní kwɔ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel-á syɔ̃ Polepi tyɩ́, à gbǐl tyi nónó pɩ névye tyɩ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, Polepi sè yãh pé tyɩ́.
Pǎh sè yãh tɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Nsyakɩ wɛy tɔkɔ, tɛ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Ń yṹnpyé Nsyifunɔ,
Á pól yĩ́ yah ye Simo-Pyɛrɩ kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, ǹgbò dùkù-á Liyel kè yah tɔkɔ, à nósyɔ́ yah wilki névye sɔkɔ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, à pɩ ǹ nolɛ.
Tɛ́ wɛy mɛ̀ mó tɔ̃ mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu wɛlɔlɛ. Yé yah, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ nɛ,
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Képah náh, mé kɩ ń syɩ pɔ Davidi kéte sɔ́nɔ́ tɔ̃ mɔ.
Mé kɩ ǹ kéntíkínì tɔ̃ mɔ kɩ kè yilki pallɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, kèkõyṍ névye tɛ́lɔ́ pól kɩ yuku ńnɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Gbɩ yõ, kwlo kwlo névye pól ye kɩ n yah n kɔ̃ n pi ńnɛ,
máh pépi nónó ye nɛ pè pɩ ń tyɩ́lɛ.›
Sɛ̃́ ye Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel yo, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tyi nɔ́pi wɛ̃kɩ
di mónɔ́lɛ.
Képah yĩnnɛ, ńmɔ Nsyakɩ tɛ̃̀ sõnɔ sɔkɔ, névye nónó-á vi mɔ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ náh pélɛ, á náh yɩ̃nɛ à tyilɛ n tɛ̃ n tah pé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ á ye sɛ́bɛ́y wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ sãh fálnɔ́ yîlɛ, ànɛ̂ fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ tṍ kwɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ kwáhkókè kɔ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ tṍnɛ, sè kɔ̃ sè káh pɔ pè silki.
Yé yah kɛ̀, à tɔkɔ ǹgbò dùkù tyɩ́, kénɛ tyi ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ, pě névyelɛ n kwɔ mɩ mɩ yòh sõnɔ́ póllɛ kwlo kwlo pól Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ sɔkɔ.»

Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye, ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm, ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pól yo sah núkú yõ nɛ, páh kɩ nósyɔ́ yah wilki pé wrɔ́, tɛ́ kɩ pépi tɛkɩ mɔ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩlɛ Antyɔsyɩ kwil. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Nsyudasɩ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Barsabasɩlɛ, pè mɛ ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ Silasɩ yah wilki. Pé nímí póllɛ, névye sõ̀ mɛ yõ̀yénnɛ n sah pé yõ.

Pè mɛ tɛ̃ntõ̀ sɛ́bɛ́y yɔ́ wãrkɩ à dahbɩ pé gbõ̀, nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Á yṹnpyé yépi nónó-á Nsyifunɔ náh yélɛ, tɛ́ mɛ Antyɔsyɩ, Siri gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, à tahlɩ Siri gbɛ̃̀nyah kwlo tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyahlɛ; ápi Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ yé yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm ye n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.
Á kè noh nɛ, nósyɔ́-á wil ápi sɔkɔ, à kyɩ pé wɛlɔlɛ yé lékã́m vye fɛ̃kɩ, à yé mɔ sah fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ ápi náh se mó tɔ̃ tõ pélɛ.
Képah ye, á kè yah tɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, áyáh kɩ névye wilki tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́. Pè kɩ n pɔ n pi wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ á nɩ̀gbɛ̀kɩ̀ névye Barnabasɩ ànɛ̂ Polelɛ,
pépi nónó-á pé min mɔ kũ kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tõ̀ yĩnnɛ.
Nsyudasɩ ànɛ̂ Silasɩ ye á n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́. Tyi nónó-á á wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́, pè kɩ pɔ sè tɔ̃ yo yé tyɩ́ vyãhlɛ.
Liyel Mirki ànɛ̂ ápi ye yah tɔkɔ kélɛ nɛ, á káh tɔ̃ tyi yísyɔ́ kõ sah yé kɔ̃, à wil tyi nɔ́pi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, sépi nónó-á yɩ̃nɛ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ káhkáh:

Yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ sãh fálnɔ́ kɔ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ tṍnɛ, ànɛ̂ tṍ kwɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ kwáhkókè kɔ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Yâh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ n yĩ́ĩ́ sépi pól pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, yé mɛ n pɩ plɛ. Yé tɛ̃̀nɔ!»
Képah náh, pè wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye kɔ̃ pè sɔkɔ à kyɩ de Antyɔsyɩ kwil. Pè kyɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɔ́wû tuke mɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ntõ̀ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ pè kɔ̃.
Pǎh kè kar, ké sɔkɔ tyíyónɔ́ sṍré mɔ pé sɔkɔ, kè pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ pé tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyudasɩ ànɛ̂ Silasɩpi tɔ-á sõ̀ pɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopulɛ sɛ̃́, pépi tyah nolɛ n vi n mɔ, mɛ tyi náhnáhlɛ n yo pé tyɩ́, à sṍrélɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ.
Pǎh sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́, képah náh, no pè fĩn mɔ, tɛ́ wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè de lènɔlɛ pé tṍpú tĩ̀nnɛ. [
Tɛ́ Silasɩ wɔ mɛ nɛ, péwɔ-á kɩ wũ nɛ́npɔ́.]
Ǹtɛ Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ sõ̀ mɛ tɛ̃ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ. Pépi ànɛ̂ névye náhnáh yísyɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ nolɛ n kwɔ, tɛ́ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo.

Sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́-á sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, Pole yo Barnabasɩ tyɩ́ nɛ, páh Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛy yo kɔ̃ kwlo nónó pól sɔkɔ, à yɛ pé pé syɩ kyɩ yah pé yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ kénɛ kwlo sɔkɔ, pé tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyɔ̃ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Markɩlɛ, Barnabasɩ sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé ǹ tɔ tɛ̃ pé sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Pole wɔ náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé sɔkɔ ǹnɛ; ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á lésõ ǹ gbɛ wil pé sɔkɔ Pãnfili gbɛ̃̀nyah dùkù sɔkɔ, tɛ́ à náh tɔ̃ sõ̀ mɛ n kyɩ n pɔ pélɛ pé tõ̀ sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yékã̂b ǹgbɛ̃ de Pole ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ wrɔ́, pè mɛ gbɛkɩ. Barnabasɩ mɛ Nsyɔ̃-Markɩ tɛ̃ tahlɩ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, pè de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ à sɔkɔ Syipri gbɛ̃̀nyah.
Ǹtɛ Pole wɔ mó Silasɩ yah wilki. Tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú-á nírí pɩ pé tyɩ́, à pè dahbɩ tɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, pè mɛ sɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Pè Siri gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah pól kɔ kɔ̃, à Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sṍrélɛ n mɔ n yuku Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Képah náh, Polepi-á wil Siri ànɛ̂ Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, pè yɔ̃ sɔkɔ Dɛrɩbɩ kwil. Pǎh wil nɛ́npɔ́, pè yuku Lisitir kwil. Pè kyɩ Yesu tõ̀ sã́h-ò yɔ́ wɛ nɛ́npɔ́ pè n ye Timotelɛ. Ǹ yṹnɛ, Nsyifu nɛy ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ, tɛ́ ǹ sú mɛ Krɛkɩ nɛynɛ.
Tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Lisitir sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Yikonyumi kwil, pè sõ̀ mɛ Timote yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé à tɛ̃ sɔkɔ pé kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ kénɛ kwlo sɔkɔ, pè sõ̀ pɩ̃ nɛ, Krɛkɩ nɛy-á Timote súlɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Polepi-à fyɔ̀ n sɔkɔ kwlo nónó sɔkɔ, Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm-á tyi nónó yah tɔkɔ, pě sélɛ n yãh kénɛ kwlo Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ nɛ, pè nɛ n kɔ sé wã̀l yõ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ n gbah n sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, tɛ́ wãn tɔ̃ mɛ n mɔ pé nɛ́dán tɔ yõ sõmɛsṍ.
Képah náh, Polepi sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé kyɩ Liyel wɛy yo Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki kè yahle pé tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè mɛ kah syɔ̃ Frisyi gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Kalasi gbɛ̃̀nyahlɛ.
Pǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ n tɛ Misi gbɛ̃̀nyahlɛ, pè tɔ̃ kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ, páh kɩ yuku Bitini gbɛ̃̀nyah. Ǹtɛ Yesu Mirki
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè Misi kɔ kah, à tiki yuku Turasɩ kwil.
Tɛ́ lékã̂hnɛ, Pole wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́ wɛ. Wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, à Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah dĩ́ yɔ́ wɛ yĩ́nntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ mɛ ǹnɛ n ni nɛ ńkɛ̃́, à pɔ Masedonɩ sɔkɔ, à pɔ pépi yohnɩ n mɔ.
Pole-á fyɔ̀ wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ wɛ sɛ̃́, á mɛ kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ, Liyel-á ye álɛ nɛ, á kyɩ pé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo Masedonɩ tãn tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á núkú á vi nɛ áyáh kɩ sɔkɔ nɛ́npɔ́.

Képah sɔkɔ, á de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ Turasɩ kwil, à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á mɛ pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ pè n ye Samotrasɩlɛ, á náh kwɔ dah fɩ̃́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ ké dĩndallɛ, á yuku Neyapolisi kwil.
Áyáh yal nɛ́npɔ́, á yuku kwíl-ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Filipilɛ, Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Kénɛ kwil yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ Wrome tãn gbõ̀. Á mɛ tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, à sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ.

Nsyifunɔ mɩ mɩ yòh sõ-á pɔ nɔ, á kè sõ nɛ, pé Liyel ní-ńsah-á kɩ wɛ yɔ́ngbalɩ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á wil kwil nɩyṍ, à nɛ́npɔ́ nyáh sõ. Á kyɩ syɔ́ yísyɔ́ wɛ tùkènmɔntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ nɛ́npɔ́. Á mɛ kɔ̃ tɛ̃ pé tnɔ̂, à yã́hkɩ̀ yãh pélɛ Liyel wɛy tyɩ́ yõ.

Tɛ́ pi yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ syɔ́ nɔ́pi sɔkɔ pè n ye Lidilɛ. Fwɔ̀sãhlɔ dɛ́nkɔ́kɔ́nɩ̀ gbɔ̀ yɩ̃́-ò ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ. À n wil Tyatiri kwil, tɛ́ à sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ. Tɛ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ wɛkɩ pi mɛ̀ nɩ sɔkɔ à kɔ̃ à ǹ níkí kwɔ, à Pole wɛlɔ noh pallɛ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ kéte tãn pól mɛ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ ni sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, pi mɛ kè yah kɔ̃ ápi tyɩ́ nɛ, áyâh kɩ mɛ sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ péwɔ-á pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ, á pɔ n kyɩ n twah pé tyɩ́ pé gbô. Tɛ́ á gbah tɛ̃ pópó, á pɔ sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.

Képah sɔkɔ, sõ yɔ́lɛ á mɛ n yuku nírí pɩ́-ńsah, tɛ́ tõ̀npɩ pípír yɔ́ pɔ á yohnɩ. Sétõ sõ̀ mɛ kénɛ pípír gbil à kɔ̃ à tyísnɔ́lɛ n wɛ n yo. À sõ̀ mɛ pɔ́ náhnáhlɛ n wɛ ǹ yõ̀tãmnɛ n kɔ̃ kénɛ tyísnɔ́ wɛ́nyonɔ sɔkɔ.
Kénɛ pípír mɛ yuku, à ápi ànɛ̂ Pole sõ̀ tɛ̃, tɛ́ mɛ yo tũ léyy no tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, díbí nɔ́pilɛ, yõ̀tah Liyel tõ̀npɩbɩ-á pélɛ. Pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́-á pè pɔ n yo pé tyɩ́.

À sõ̀ mɛ képah tɛ̃̀nɛ n pɩ sɛ̃́, sèpĩ̀n náhnáh sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɔ Pole gblɔ́lɛ n vyãh, à ǹ yah vi yo sétõ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yesu Krista yĩn yõ, à pípír mɛ̀ fĩn mɔ. Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ sétõ núkú pípír fĩn mɔ.
