Képah sɔkɔ, pípír yõ̀tãm-á kè wɛ nɛ, pé sõnɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ pɔ́ nɛ̂ wɛ́nɔ́ yõ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ kǎh kɩ yĩn mɔ, pè Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩ tɛ̃, tɛ́ yuku pélɛ yõ̀tãm tyɩ́, tɔ́wû tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, pè mɛ kyɩ pélɛ Wrome tãn yísyɔ́ tyɩ́ nónó-á pé yõ̀tãmnɛ, tɛ́ kyɩ tyah n yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, díbí nɔ́pi-á mɛ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ pépi kwil. Nsyifunɔ-á pélɛ,
tɛ́ pǎh mɛ pɔ wã̀l yísyɔ́lɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ nónó-á sé wã̀l náh mɛ pépi Wrome tãn ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ kɩ sè fɛ̃ syi, képah náh pɩ, kɩ sè pɩ n pi.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɔ́wû tɔ núkú yuku Polepi yõ. Yõ̀tãm nɔ́pi mɛ pè kɔ̃ pè Polepi flɔ dɛ, tɛ́ nɛ pè pè ko yèfõhlɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, pǎh yèfõh yɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ pè ko tɛ, pè pè dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yo ké syɩ́kɩ́-ò dĩ́ tyɩ́ nɛ, à pélɛ n kyɔmɩ pallɛ.
Dĩ́-á fyɔ̀ képah noh sɛ̃́, à mó pè tɛ̃ dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè nɩyṍ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sésár kârn mɔ pé gbyẽ̂h tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ lénɩ mɔ́nɔ́ wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩ sõ̀ mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ mɛ yɩ̀lɛ n gbɩ à Liyel yĩnnɛ n gbilki, tɛ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ névye tɛ́lɔ́ mó mɛ n nohnɩ pé tyɩ́.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, sétáh syahrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ núkú pɩ nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, à wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sètyah yike. Ké vɩ̀ yey pól núkú yɩkɩ mɔ, ké sɔkɔ névye pól gbyẽ̂h sɔkɔ kârnnɔ́ pól kɔ̃lɩ kwɛ.
Wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè syɩ́kɩ́-ò dĩ́-á pópó dɔ yuku, tɛ́ ké vɩ̀ yey wɛ yɩ́kɩ́nmɔnɔlɛ sɛ̃́, à wɛ nɛ ké sɔkɔ névye-á to wil. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, à núkú ǹ kèkírkì yɔrɩ dɛ nɛ, pé pé gblɔ̌y ko mɔ.
Ǹtɛ Pole mɛ yo mɔ ǹ tyɩ́ yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ nɛ, à káh dlo yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y nɔ, pé pól-á mɛ ásõ̂.
Képah sɔkɔ, wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè syɩ́kɩ́-ò dĩ́ pè kɔ̃ pè pɔ fɔ̀tnɔ̀lɛ à kɔ̃, à de yuku súú wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè nɩyṍ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ǹ gbètukunɔ di Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩ yah wílsyahrɩ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ mɛ pè tɛ̃ wil kégbɔ́, tɛ́ pè piki yah nɛ, pé nɛ́nkyɩ́bɩ́, sɔ̃́ se pé yɩ̃nɛ pé pɩ pé mó pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ nɩ?
Pè mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ, á kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, áwɔ ànɛ̂ á nolɛ.»
Képah sɔkɔ, Polepi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛy yo ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ gbô tãn pól tyɩ́.
Dĩ́ mɛ Polepi tɛ̃ légbĩ́ mɛ̀ ó sɔkɔ lékã̂hnɛ, à kyɩ pé nɩ́y wu; tɛ́ nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ gbô tãn pól mɛ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ ni sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, à Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩ tɛ̃ yuku ǹ gbô sɔkɔ, à kyɩ yõkelɛ pè kɔ̃ pè yõ. Tɛ́ ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ no pól nɩ sõ̀ mɛ vɩ yĩ́ĩ́ pé wɛ́nsɛ̃nɔ yĩnnɛ Liyel yõ sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, tyah-á pɔ dal, yõ̀tãm nɔ́pi tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tɛkɩ mɔ nɛ, pè kyɩ yo wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè syɩ́kɩ́-ò dĩ́ tyɩ́ nɛ, à díbí nɔ́pi fĩn mɔ.
Dĩ́ mɛ kyɩ kè yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, yõ̀tãm-á tɛ̃ntõ̀ mɔ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pé pè fĩn mɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, núkúnúkú pǎh kɩ fɛ̃ wil kɩ n yuku yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ Pole mɛ pè syah nɛ, pépi nónó-á gbõ̀ mɔ yõ Wrome tãn tyɩ́, pépi kó pè tɛ̃ ko tɔ́wû yĩ́ yah pé tùkè-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ; tɛ́ pé dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ nɩ? Tɛ́ núkúnúkú, pè tɔ̃ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé wìlkìnfĩnnmɔ-ńsahlɛ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ sɔkɔ nɩ? Képah náh fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi dɛ́! Ńkɛ̃́, fɔ́ɔ́ pé dáhnmɔpu-á kɩ pɔ pé fĩn mɔ pé gblɔ̌y.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye nɔ́pi mɛ pé syɩ kyɩ wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yo yõ̀tãm nɔ́pi tyɩ́. Pépi-á képah tɛ̃̀ noh sɛ̃́ nɛ, Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩlɛ, Wrome tãn gbõ̀nmɔ̀nyõbe-á pélɛ, tíkí pè tɛ̃.
Pè pɔ gblɔ̌y yɛ yah kɔ̃ Polepi tyɩ́, tɛ́ pè fĩn mɔ, tɛ́ mɛ pè ni nɛ pè wil kwil sɔkɔ.
Polepi-á wil wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, pè yuku Lidi tĩ̀nnɛ. Pǎh kyɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú wɛ, pè sṍré mɔ pé sɔkɔ tɛ́ sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, Polepi syɔ̃ Anfipolisi kwil ànɛ̂ Apɔlɔnɩ kwil, à kyɩ de Tesaloniki kwil sɔkɔ. Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole-á sõ̀ ńkɛ̃́nɛ kélɛ n pɩ sɔ̃́, à tɔ̃ kyɩ yã́hkɩ̀ yãh Nsyifunɔlɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ tyi yõ pé Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ. À képah tɛ̃̀ pɩ syɩ sɛ̃́ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ kɛ tɔ̃́nɔ́, pé mɩ mɩ yòh sõnɔ́lɛ.

À sõ̀ mɛ ké yahlɛ n yo pé tyɩ́, à pélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Pwáhnmɔ-ò sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ à pɔ yèvyãhrɩ pɩ ku sɛ̃́, Liyel mó à yilki mɔ. Yesu nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á mé n yo yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀, ǹmɔ ye kénɛ pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ.»

Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ túkù sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ Krɛkɩ névye nɛ́kwĩ́nkílɛ, nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ, à tahlɩ syɔ́ nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ náhnáh tyɩ́. Pé pól mɛ mɔ Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩlɛ.

Ǹtɛ Nsyifunɔ yísyɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ Polepi dyɔlɛ n yɔ, tɛ́ sɔkɔ à kyɩ nɛ́túkúnì ǹkɔ̌nkɔ̌nɩ̀ yísyɔ́ tɛ̃ wã̀l yey sɔkɔ, à pɔ tɔ́wûlɛ n kurki n mɔ, tɛ́ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ kwil sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, pè kyɩ kwɔ de Nsyasõ gbô, à Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩlɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ, pé pè tɛ̃ pɔ tɔ́wû tyɩ́.

Pǎh kyɩ pè yah kwlɔ sɛ̃́, pè Nsyasõ ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yísyɔ́ tɛ̃ à yuku pélɛ pé kwil yõ̀tãm tyɩ́. Tɛ́ kyɩ tyah n yo wòhòh nɛ, nónó-á fɛ̃kɩ kèkõyṍ póllɛ, pépi-á pɔ de ásõ̂ tɔ sɔkɔ yɔ̀.

Tɛ́ Nsyasõ mɛ fɛ̃ syi pè kɔ̃ pè twah ǹ tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar-á nɛ tyi nónó káh nɛ n pɩ, sépi-á no nɔ́pi pól mɛ n pɩ. Pǎh mɛ n yo ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́-á tɔ̃ mɛ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Yesulɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, wɛlɔ nɔ́pi nóhnɔ́ tɔ́wû ànɛ̂ kwil yõ̀tãm fɔkɔ fil.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kwil yõ̀tãm mɛ Nsyasõpi kɔ̃ pè pɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ kɔ̃, tɛ́ pyě pè fĩn mɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, lékã̂h-á fyɔ̀ mɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú mɛ Pole ànɛ̂ Silasɩ kɔ̃ pè sɔkɔ Bere kwil. Pǎh yĩni tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, pè kyɩ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ.

Nɛ́npɔ́ tãn sõ̀ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ kal Tesaloniki kwil tãnnɛ. Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂-á sõ̀ Pole n yo Yesu tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pè mɛ kè fɛ̃ syi pallɛ dékè sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ mɛ Liyel wɛynɛ n kar, à ké sɔkɔ tyilɛ n sohlɩ n yah sõmɛsṍ nɛ, pé pɩ̃ gblɔ-à kɩ nɛ̂ Polepi wɛlɔlɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Nsyifunɔ náhnáh, ànɛ̂ Krɛkɩ syɔ́ nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ yísyɔ́, ànɛ̂ díbí nɛ́kwĩ́nkí pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.
Ǹtɛ Tesaloniki kwil Nsyifunɔ-á fyɔ̀ noh nɛ, Pole-á mɛ Liyel wɛynɛ n yo Bere kwil tɔ sɔkɔ, pè tɔ̃ pɔ nɛ́npɔ́ tɔ sɔkɔ, à pɔ tɔ́wû kurki mɔ, pè kɔ̃ pè fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́ pɩ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú núkú Pole tɛkɩ mɔ pnɛ yɔ tĩ̀nnɛ. Tɛ́ Silasɩ ànɛ̂ Timote wɔ mɛ wũ nɛ́npɔ́.
Nónó-á kyɩ tɛkɩ mɔ Polelɛ, pè kyɩ de ǹnɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ Atɛnɩ kwil. Tɛ́ pǎh pé syɩ n pi, Pole mɛ pè tõ nɛ, pàh kɩ kyɩ, pè kyɩ yo Silasɩ ànɛ̂ Timote tyɩ́, pè pɔ péwɔ tnɔ̂ súú.
Tɛ́ Pole-á sõ̀ mɛ Silasɩ ànɛ̂ Timote syɩ́kɩ́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́ Atɛnɩ kwil, à fal fal tã̀n kyɔmɩ wɛ dò kénɛ kwil sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹ yah kah kwɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, à kyɩ yã́hkɩ̀ yãh Nsyifunɔlɛ, pé Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, à tahlɩ nónó tɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ. Tɛ́ sõmɛsṍ, wàh kyɩ tɔ́wû tùkè-ǹsah, tɛ́ névye nónó wɛ nɛ́npɔ́, ǎ yã́hkɩ̀ yãh pé tɔlɛ.

Tɛ́ lékã́m ǹgbnɔ névye yísyɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ. Pè túkù sõ̀ mɛ Yepikur wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kwɔ́púlɛ, tɛ́ túkù mó mɛ Setoyiki wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kwɔ́púlɛ. Pépi mɛ yékã̂b mɔ Polelɛ. Pé túkù sõ̀ mɛ yo tũ nɛ, wɛ̀nkwĩnki nɛy mɛ̀ tɔ se nɛ sɔ̃́-á nɩ? Túkù mó nɛ, kǎh pɩ tɛ̃ nɛ fal fal tã̀n káhkɩ́ yísyɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ à n yo, nónó-á pépi náh sélɛ n pnɛ. Tɛ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir ye sõ̀ Pole n yo pé tyɩ́ Yesu tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ lékyɩ̂ yílkínmɔnɔ tyɩ́lɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè à tɛ̃ sɔkɔ pé kwil fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Arewopasɩlɛ.
Ńkɛ̃́, gbɛ̃̀ndùnì tyi ó-á à n yo pé n nohnɩ yɔ̀. Képah-á, à sé yah yo n wah pé syah.
Ǹtɛ gbɩ yõ, Atɛnɩ kwil tãn pól ànɛ̂ nɛ́pân nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ twáhntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ké sɔkɔ, pé pól ńkɛ̃́nɛ pé wrɔ́ kan tɔkɔ n pɩ tyísnɔ́ yã́hnɔ́lɛ, képah náh pɩ, sé nóhnɔ́lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ yuku yĩn pé nɩyṍ, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Atɛnɩ tãn, mé pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Liyel yáhnkɔ̃pu yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀nɩ̀-á yélɛ.

Máh yé kwil kɔ kɔ̃, mé kè kyɔmɩ wɛ, líyelnɔ́ náhnáh mɛ ké sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ mé tyah yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nmɔnɔlɛ ké yõ nɛ: ‹Dùkù pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ líyel tyɩ́ ye.› Tɛ́ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yé n gbilki ǹ dùkù pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ǹmɔ tyɩ́ ye mé pɔ yónwàh-ǹsah yé tyɩ́.
Ǹmɔ Liyel ye mɔ kèkõyṍlɛ, ànɛ̂ ké sɔkɔ yíyìn póllɛ. Ǹmɔ ye tɔ̃ yĩ̂nyõ ànɛ̂ sétáh nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ. À náh n tɛ̃ névi gbõ̀ wɔ̀kɔ̀nmɔnɩ sɔkɔ.
Ǹmɔ ye mɔ minnɛ névi sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ mɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ à kɔ̃ à n mɩ, à tahlɩ yíyìn pól tyɩ́. Képah ye, à náh mɛ névi gbɛ̃̀npɩnɩ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n yah n kɔ̃, ǹ gblɔ̌y yohnɩ n mɔ yĩnnɛ.

Yah, nɛ́núkù ó sɔkɔ ye kèkõyṍ yìkìnì pól wil Liyel-á nónó mɔ, tɛ́ pè kɔ̃ pè tɛ̃ tɛ̃ kɔ̃ kèkõyṍ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ ki ànɛ̂ kɔ̀kɩ̀ gbĩ́nɛ pè kɔ̃, tɛ́ tɔ̃ gbàhnɩ̀ gboke pé tɛ̃̀-ǹtã̀n tyɩ́.
Liyel sépi pól pɩ nɛ, nɛ́núkù núkú pól fɛ̃ pé yah n kɔ̃. Gbɔ̀kénpɩ, pǎh kɩ wnɛ yah kɔ̃ pɔ pé wɛ. Ǹtɛ gbɩ yõ, à náh mó tɔ̃ mɛ fɩ́ɩ́ á sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ.
Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye ápilɛ min sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ n werke. Képah ye tɔ̃ yé yɩ̀ gbɩ́pú yísyɔ́ yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́,
Liyel wɛ̃́npì-á ápilɛ.

Ǹtɛ Liyel wɛ̃́npì-á ápilɛ sɛ̃́, á se tɔ̃ yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n sõ nɛ, Liyel-á mɛ á kɩ nɛ tã̀n nɔ́pi sɔ̃́; sépi nónó-á névye sè mɔ sã́nnɛ, képah náh pɩ wárn vyɔrɩlɛ, képah náh pɩ dyêhlɛ, à yɩ̃nɛ pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ lékã́mnɛ?

Tɛ́ yé yah, névye-á tyi nónó pɩ sɔkɔ ǹpɩ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ ǹgbòlɛ, Liyel náh tɔ̃ mɛ sépilɛ n mɔ n kõ. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, à mɛ kélɛ n yo no pól tyɩ́ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ nɛ, pè pé nnɔ vi mɔ.

Wáh wɛ à képahlɛ n yo, à mɛ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì yɔ́ yah wilki sah, sõ nɛ̂-á tukey kɩ n tuke n pi kèkõyṍ névye pól yõ, à yɩ̃nɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ. À mɛ dĩ́ yɔ́ yah wilki sah, nɛ̂-á kɩ pɔ tukey mɛ̀ tuke n pi, tɛ́ pǎh pɔ tɛ̃̀ ko mɔ, à ǹ lékó yilki mɔ, à kélɛ á wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, wǎh kɩ fɛ̃ tɛ̃.»
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pǎh fyɔ̀ lékó yílkínmɔnɔ tyɩ́ noh, pé túkù tyah kṍlɛ Polelɛ n ko. Túkù mó mɛ n yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sõ yɔ́lɛ, à tɔ̃ pɔ ǹ syɩ ǹ wɛy mɛ̀ yõ pé tyɩ́.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Pole mɛ yal pé tnɔ̂.

Ǹtɛ ǹ wɛy nóhpú túkù kyɩ kwrɔ mɔ ǹnɛ, à pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ nónó-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ wɛ̃nɛ n tuke n mɔ, ǹ tyi yahlɛ n wah, pépi nɛy yɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ pélɛ pè n ye Denisilɛ, ànɛ̂ sê yɔ́ tɔlɛ pè n ye Damarisilɛ, à tahlɩ nósyɔ́ tyɩ́.
Képah náh, Pole yal Atɛnɩ kwil, à yuku Korɛ̃nti kwil.

Légbĩ́ pɔ yɩ̃nɛ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Klode mɛ Nsyifunɔ pól yal Wrome kwil. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Nsyifu dĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́ pè n ye Akilasɩlɛ. À dubi Põte kwil. Ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ kyɩ Prisili mɛ yal Wrome kwil, Yitalɩ sétáh yõ, à sɔkɔ Korɛ̃nti kwil. Pole mɛ kyɩ yɩ̃nɛ pé pɔ́ntwahnɔ késã́nnɛ nɛ́npɔ́, tɛ́ kwrɔ mɔ pé sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ pé pól sõ̀ mɛ tõ̀ núkúlɛ n pɩ, nɛ̂-á pɩ yèpye flɔ kóhnɔ́lɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Pole mɛ tɛ̃ pé tyɩ́ pè tõ̀lɛ n pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ mɩ mɩ yòh sõnɔ́ póllɛ, Pole sõ̀ mɛ yã́hkɩ̀lɛ n yãh n pɔ Nsyifunɔlɛ pé Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ pé pépi ànɛ̂ Krɛkɩ névye sõnɔ vi mɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Silasɩ ànɛ̂ Timote wil Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah à pɔ. Pǎh fyɔ̀ pɔ de, Pole náh tɔ̃ mɛ tõ̀ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n pɩ nɛ́ Liyel wɛy yónkɔ̃nɔ ó náh. À sõ̀ mɛ ké yahlɛ n yo Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́ nɛ, Yesu-á Liyel yah tɔkɔ pɩ pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ.

Ǹtɛ Nsyifunɔ mɛ kè yahle ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ́ ǹnɛ n gbyɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à ǹ wil flɔ kwer, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pé mɔ́npunɔ kémû-á kɩ pɩ pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tyɩ́lɛ, péwɔ vyãh náh mɛ ké sɔkɔ. À tɔkɔ núkúnúkú tyɩ́, páh kɩ pé yah mɔ névye tĩ̀nnɛ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yal nɛ́npɔ́ à sɔkɔ dĩ́ yɔ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Tityusi-Nsyusitusilɛ. Nsyifunɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́-ò ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ. Ǹ gbô sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ gbɔ̀pɔ sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Krisipusi ànɛ̂ ǹ no pól sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ. Korɛ̃nti kwil tãn nónó tɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ Pole wɛynɛ n nohnɩ, pé náhnáh sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ, tɛ́ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ ni sɔkɔ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, sõ yɔ́ lékã̂hnɛ, Pole wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́ wɛ, nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Névye náhnáh kɩ n pɩ n pi ńmɔ tyɩ́lɛ kwil mɛ̀ sɔkɔ. Képah ye, káh á vyãh vike n sah, yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ nɛ n wɛkɩ, káh tíkí pɩ. Ńmɔ mɛ álɛ, nɛy náh fɛ̃ ǹ tɛ̃ n tir n pi póllɛ.»
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pole tɛ̃, à yi núkú ànɛ̂ ńwɔ̃́lɔ́ kénúkò pɩ Korɛ̃nti kwil, à nolɛ n kwɔ Liyel wɛynɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ pɔ yuku wɛ̃ tyɩ́ mɔ, à tyah Polelɛ n fwo. Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, Kalyõ ye lésõ Akayi gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-òlɛ. Pè mɛ Pole tɛ̃ kyɩ ǹ tyɩ́ tukey tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ nɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀-á mɛ névye yõlɛ n yɩkɩ, à pélɛ n mɔ Liyel nínɔ́ gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃̀náh yɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ náh mɛ núkúlɛ pépi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole-á mɛ nɛ pé wɛy tɔkɔ, Kalyõ mɛ yo Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́ nɛ, kàh sõ̀ mɛ pɩ tyíkɛ̃̌kɩ̀, képah náh pɩ, tyípékè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́lɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀ pɩ, páh náhkɩ tɛ̃ noh pé tyɩ́ pallɛ.
Ǹtɛ pǎh se mɛ yékã̂blɛ n pɩ wɛlɔ, ànɛ̂ yni, ànɛ̂ pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yõ tɛ́; képah-á mɛ pépilɛ n yah kɛ̀. Péwɔ náh fɛ̃ sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ tukey tuke n pi lɔ́!
Tɛ́ mɛ pè yal tukey tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Sositɛnɩ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ yah yètɛ̃̀nɛ, pé pól tuke ǹmɔ yõ, à ǹnɛ n ko tukey tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ Kalyõ náh dahbɩ wilki pé tyɩ́ ké sɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole tɔ̃ wũ à sèpĩ̀n náhnáh pɩ Korɛ̃nti kwil. Képah náh, à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ni Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ nɛ́npɔ́ nɛ, páh kɩ pé syɩ yuku Siri gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Prisili, ànɛ̂ Akilasɩlɛ. Tɛ́ à lésõ mɛ ǹ vyãh tɔkɔ Liyel tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, wǎh pópó n sɔkɔ, à kyɩ Sãnkrɩ kwil, à kyɩ ǹ yõ kye vyãh tɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ yĩnnɛ.

Képah náh, ǹmɔ, ànɛ̂ Prisili, ànɛ̂ Akilasɩ kyɩ de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ, à yal nɛ́npɔ́ à kyɩ de Yefɛsɩ kwil. Pole mɛ ǹ kɔ́mû sah nɛ́npɔ́, tɛ́ mɛ sɔkɔ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, à kyɩ yã́hkɩ̀ yãh pélɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, pè kè yah kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, à tɔ̃ sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ pépilɛ nɛ́npɔ́. Ǹtɛ Pole náh fɛ̃ syi.
Tɛ́ mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ni pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Liyel-à kɩ fɛ̃ syi, sõ yɔ́lɛ, páh kɩ tɔ̃ pé syɩ pɔ yah pé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ Yefɛsɩ kwil, à sɔkɔ.
Wǎh kyɩ tiki Sesarɩ kwil, à dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, à kyɩ wɛkɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́. Wǎh wil nɛ́npɔ́, à ǹ syɩ tiki yuku Antyɔsyɩ kwil,
à kyɩ tɛ̃ yah nɛ́npɔ́. Képah náh, à tɔ̃ yal à kyɩ Kalasi gbɛ̃̀nyah kwlo kɔ kɔ̃ ànɛ̂ Frisyi gbɛ̃̀nyah kwlolɛ, à nɩ̀sãh mɔ kɔ̃ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú sɔkɔ.
Légbĩ́nɛ, Nsyifu dĩ́ yɔ́ pɔ Yefɛsɩ kwil. Ǹ yĩn ye sõ̀ Apɔlɔsɩlɛ, à dubi Alɛkisãdri kwil. À sõ̀ wɛy tyɩ́ yah wɛ yĩ́ĩ́, tɛ́ à mó tɔ̃ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ tyi pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́.
À lésõ kwɔ́nɔ́ wɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ́ mɛ Yesu tyɩ́lɛ n yo, à kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ n pɩ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, dékè sɔkɔ ǹ nɩ póllɛ. Ǹtɛ Nsyɔ̃ ni sɔkɔ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ ó ye sõ̀ à n pnɛ.

Tɛ́ sõ yɔ́lɛ, wǎh tyah n wɛkɩ nɩ̀sãhlɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, Prisili ànɛ̂ Akilasɩ mɛ ǹ wɛy noh pɔ tyɛ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɛ́ à ye yah kyɩ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyi yo wah yĩ́ĩ́ à syah, wǎh sõ̀ mɛ nónó yɩ̃́tũri sɔkɔ.

Képah náh, Akayi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ sõnɔ de Apɔlɔsɩ sɔkɔ. Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, pépi mɛ ké sṍré gbah mɔ ǹ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sɛ́bɛ́y wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ Akayi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ nɛ, Apɔlɔsɩ-à kɩ yĩni tɛ̃ pé tyɩ́, pè à tɛ̃ plɛ. Wǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃, Liyel gbõ̀ yõ, ǹ kyɩ́nɔ́ sõ̀ pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ yõre ǹgbɛ̃nɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ Akayi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
À sõ̀ mɛ Liyel wɛynɛ n kar, à kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, Yesu-á Liyel yah tɔkɔ pɩ pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ. Tɔ́wû pól yĩ́ yah, ǹ wɛy sõ̀ mɛ gbɩlɛ kal Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́lɛ.
Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ Apɔlɔsɩ mɛ Korɛ̃nti kwil, Pole sõ̀ mɛ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah tlɛy tã̀ntã̀n kɔ kah, à kyɩ de Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ. À kyɩ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú yísyɔ́ wɛ nɛ́npɔ́,
tɛ́ pè piki yah nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pǎh sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, pè se Liyel Mirki wɛ nɩ? Pè mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, pé náh Liyel Mirki yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ noh yah póllɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ pè piki yah nɛ, ǹtɛ ni sɔkɔ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ dùkù nɛ̂ se pè wɛ nɩ? Pè mɛ à syah nɛ, Nsyɔ̃ tyɩ́-á.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole tɔ̃ ǹ syɩ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, névye nónó-á fɛ̃ syi pé nnɔ vi mɔ, pépi-á sõ̀ Nsyɔ̃ n wel n wilki ni sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ wǎh sõ̀ mɛ n yo névye tyɩ́ nɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ n pɔ n pi péwɔ náhlɛ, pè sɛ̃ ǹmɔ yõ; ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Yesulɛ.
No-á wɛlɔ nɔ́pi noh sɛ̃́, pè mɛ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ ni sɔkɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩn yõ.
Pole mɛ ǹ gbã̀n sah pé yõ tɛ́ nírí pɩ pé tyɩ́, Liyel Mirki mɛ tiki pé yõ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè tyah wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nónó-á pè náh sè sãh,
Pé pól sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́pĩ̂ gbɔ̃nimí kénkɔ̃lɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole sõ̀ mɛ n de n pɔ Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ. À sõ̀ mɛ n yãh n pɔ névyelɛ nɩ̀sãh sɔkɔ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ tyɩ́ yõ, pópó ńwɔ̃́lɔ́ tɔ̃́nɔ́. À sõ̀ mɛ ǹ tah sah nɛ, pé pé wɛy nóhpú sõnɔ vi mɔ.

Ǹtɛ túkù sõ̀ mɛ pɔ nikisekɔ́kɔ́lɛ n pɩ, à yahle sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ ké yõ, tɛ́ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n ko tɔ́wû yĩ́ yah. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Pole mɛ pè sah, tɛ́ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú tɛ̃ sɔkɔ pé yahlɛ, à kyɩ yã́hkɩ̀lɛ n yãh pélɛ sõmɛsṍ kǎrn pɩ́-ńsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á Tiranusi tyɩ́lɛ.
À képah tɛ̃̀ pɩ sɛ̃́ ye nínɔ́, fɔ́ɔ́ Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, pé pól Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛy wɛ noh.
Liyel sõ̀ mɛ Pole tɔkɔ à gbǐl tyísnɔ́lɛ n pɩ,
fɔ́ɔ́ névye pɔ tyah Pole flɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ myèhtùkènènɛ n tɔkɔ n tũ n pɔ pé yámpú tyɩ́, pè kɔ̃ pè n dɛ; ànɛ̂ sétã̀n-à mɛ nónó sɔkɔ, sè n wil pé sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ yísyɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ nónó tõ̀-á sõ̀ sétã̀n yĩ́nínwìlkìnkɔ̃nɔlɛ névye sɔkɔ. Pépi tɔ mɛ kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ, pé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩn tɔkɔ kélɛ n pɩ. Pè sõ̀ mɛ n yo sétã̀n tyɩ́ nɛ, Yesu nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á Pole n nɛ n yo, ǹmɔ yĩn yõ, ńkɛ̃́ sè wil.
Nsyifunɔ sɔkɔ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Sevalɛ, ǹmɔ dĩ́npì nɛ́pĩ̂ kwǎrnimi ye sõ̀ n pɩ képahlɛ.
Ǹtɛ pǎh képah yo sɛ̃́, sétõ pè syah nɛ, páh Yesulɛ n pnɛ, tɛ́ tɔ̃ pɩ̃ névi dùkù nɛ̂-á Polelɛ. Ǹtɛ pépi-á dò, nónó se pépilɛ nɩ?
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, sétõ-á sõ̀ dĩ́ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, à yuku mɩ pé sɔkɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ wɛ pé tyɩ́ képékèyɔ̂. À pè pɩ yɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ pè to wil wɔ̀kɔ̀ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ à sɔkɔ wil tìtílɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ nónó pól-á sõ̀ mɛ Yefɛsɩ kwil, à tahlɩ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pǎh yĩ mɛ̀ noh, kè pɩ tíkílɛ pé pól tyɩ́. Pè mɛ tyah Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩnnɛ n gbilki.
Tɛ́ nónó-á sõ̀ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, pé náhnáh pé tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́lɛ n yo n dal n mɔ n pɔ tɔ́wû yĩ́ yah.

Képah sɔkɔ, nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ snɛ̀ynɛ n pɩ, pé náhnáh mɛ pé snɛ̀y pɩ pɩ sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ tɔkɔ pɔ tuke mɔ, à sukɛ no pól yĩ́ yah. Pǎh sɛ́bɛ́y nɔ́pi drɔ kõ yah, sè pɩ pɔ́ plɔ́ kèyõ túkúrí pɔ́ kwlɔ́lɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ye sõ̀ Liyel wɛy mɛ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ n wɛ, à n tɔ̃ n mɔ n yuku yahlɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ gbõ̀ yõ.

Tyi nɔ́pi pɩ́nsɔkɔntɛnɔ náh, Pole kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ, páh kɩ kyɩ Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Akayi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kɩ pyě yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil. À sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yo tɔlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, páh kɩ yĩni tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, páh yɩ̃nɛ pé kyɩ Wrome kwil tɔ sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à mɛ Timote ànɛ̂ Yerasɩtɩ tɛkɩ mɔ Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, pépi nónó-á sõ̀ ǹ yòhnɩ̀nmɔpulɛ. Tɛ́ ǹmɔ wɔ wũ à sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Légbĩ́nɛ, fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ pɩ Yefɛsɩ kwil, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Sã́n ywɔ́-ò kètɔ̃ndĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ pè n ye Demetriyusilɛ. Kénɛ dĩ́ ńkɛ̃́nɛ tã̀n vɩ̀ yã́ryã́r yísyɔ́lɛ nɛ n ywɔ wárn vyɔrɩ pérpérlɛ. Yefɛsɩ tãn tõ̀ yũ̌kì nɛ̂-á pè n ye Artemisilɛ, képah wɔ̀kɔ̀ kètɔ̀nɔ́ ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ à n nɛ n ywɔ. Tɛ́ ǹ tõ̀npɩbɩ sõ̀ mɛ pɔ́lɛ n wɛ yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ tyɩ́, tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Sõ yɔ́lɛ, à ǹ tõ̀npɩbɩ pól ye tuke, à tahlɩ ǹ tõ̀ dùkù pɩ́pú pól tyɩ́. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pé kódíbí, pé pól-á kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ páh mɛ yõrelɛ n wɛ n yĩ́ĩ́ pé tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ dĩ́ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Polelɛ, wǎh mɛ pɔ tir nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ, pǎh se mɛ kélɛ n nohnɩ, tɛ́ mɛ kélɛ n yah tɛ́. Kénɛ Pole-á mɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, fal fal tã̀nnɛ, névye gbɛ̃̀npɩnɔ yî-á sélɛ, yõ náh mɛ sé tyɩ́. Kénɛ wɛy mɛ̀ ńtɛ̃-á mɛ névye náhnáh yõ yɩkɩ Yefɛsɩ kwil. Tɛ́ kè náh se tɔ̃ mɛ yĩn képah ó tyɩ́, ńkɛ̃́ kǎh mɛ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah kwlo kan pól névye yõlɛ n yɩkɩ.

Kàh yɔ̃ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, yĩ mɛ̀-á kɩ n syah pépi pɩ pɩ tõ̀lɛ n yɩkɩ dɛ́! Kè náh se tɔ̃ n yĩn n pi képah ó tyɩ́, pé fal fal tõ̀ yũ̌kì Artemisi wɔ̀kɔ̀ náh tɔ̃ n mɔ n kõ n pi póllɛ. Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ n sah tõ̀ mɛ̀ yõ, kǎh kɩ yĩn mɔ. Tɛ́ képah-á mó tɔ̃ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah névye pól ànɛ̂ kèkõyṍ névye pól mɛ n gbilki.
Demetriyusi-á fyɔ̀ kénɛ wɛlɔ yo névye noh sɛ̃́, pé fɔkɔ kah vyãh. Pè mɛ tyah yo tũ wòhòh nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pépi Yefɛsɩ tãn Artemisi tɛ̃̀ wɔ kénkɔ̃ náh mɛ.

Pɩ́ntũnɔ mɛ̀ yĩ́npɔ̃́ kwil pól tɔ̃. Tɛ́ Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah tãn nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí yísyɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ yuku Polelɛ ǹ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ Yefɛsɩ kwil. Pé sɔkɔ núkú yĩn ye Kayusilɛ, ní-ò yĩn mɛ Arisitarkɩlɛ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, no núkú wɛ̃ tyɩ́ mɔ, à to tuke nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí nɔ́pi yõ, à pè tɛ̃ yɔrɩ sɔkɔ pé tɔ́wû tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé kyɩ pé yõ wilki mɔ tɔ́wû tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú mɛ kè yahle ǹ tyɩ́.
Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ yísyɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ, nónó-á sõ̀ Pole kódíbílɛ. Pépi tɔ mɛ tɛ̃ntõ̀ mɔ ǹ tyɩ́, à à vi mɔ nɛ, à káh n kyɩ tɔ́wû tùkè-ǹsah mɛ̀ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, tɔ́wû mɛ̀ névye pól sõ̀ mɛ wɛkɩ fɛ̃kɩ tũ wòhòh, tɛ́ pé pól tyíyónɔ́nɔ mó tɔ̃ mɛ sé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kè pɩ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ. Névye kan ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ pé pɔ́nɔ́ yõ pɩ̃.

Nsyifu dĩ́ yɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ pè n ye Alɛkisãdrelɛ. Pé no Nsyifunɔ mɛ ǹmɔ kurki mɔ kyɩ sah tɔ́wû yah tĩ̀nnɛ nɛ, à yo ké sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, Alɛkisãdre mɛ ǹ gbõ̀ pɩ mɔ tɔ́wû tyɩ́. À sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé pé no Nsyifunɔ vyãh syi.

Ǹtɛ tɔ́wû-á fyɔ̀ pɔ n pɩ̃ ké sɔkɔ nɛ Nsyifu nɛy-á ǹnɛ, pé pól núkú tɔ̃ tyah yo mɔ tũ wɛ̃ yõ wòhòh nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pépi Yefɛsɩ tãn Artemisi tɛ̃̀ wɔ kénkɔ̃ náh mɛ! Pè képah tɛ̃̀ yo tũ sɛ̃́, pópó kè syi pɔ n nɔ lɛ́rɩ́nɔ́ nínɔ́ kénkɔ̃ tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ ké tyɛ́-ńsah, kwil sɛ́bɛ́y wã́rkɩ́-ò dĩ́
Ké kɔ̃̀lɩ̀-ò náh mɛ póllɛ. Képah-á, pè pé nnɔ vɩ. Pè káh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ sõ̀nyah-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ.
Díbí nónó-á pè tɛ̃ pɔ ásõ̂, pè náh tir yɔ́ pɩ de pépi tõ̀ wɔ̀kɔ̀ tyɩ́, pè náh se mó tɔ̃ yo de pé fal fal tõ̀ yũ̌kì mɛ̀ tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ kàh kɩ mɛ pɩ ǹnɩ̂ mɛ pɩ de Demetriyusi ànɛ̂ ǹ tõ̀ pɩ́mû tyɩ́, tukey tùkènɔ́ yòhnɩ̀-á mɛ, tukey tùkèpu mó tɔ̃ mɛ. Pè kyɩ n tɔkɔ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃ pépi tyɩ́ kɛ̀.
Tɛ́ tyi yísyɔ́ tɔ-à kɩ se tɔ̃ mɛ pé tyɩ́ wah wah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pǎh kɩ fɛ̃ pɔ sé yah yo kwil névye tuke mɔ sõlɛ.
Páh yékã̂b nɛ̂ sɔkɔ kwɛynɛ yɔ̀, tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ se mɛ pé tyɩ́, pé kɩ fɛ̃ wɛ yo yékã̂b mɛ̀ yõlɛ nɩ? Képah-á, páh kɩ n to n kɔ̃ yɔ̀, pǎh kɩ pɔ n syah n tɔkɔ pélɛ n kɔ̃ dɛ́!
Wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yóntɛnɔ náh, à névye kɔ̃ pè karkɩ.
Tɛ́ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́ mɛ̀-á pɔ yĩn mɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Pole mɛ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú ye tuke, à sṍré mɔ pé sɔkɔ, tɛ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ni pé tyɩ́, à sɔkɔ Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
À kénɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah pól kɔ kɔ̃, à sṍré yah mɔ kɔ̃ náhnáh Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú sɔkɔ. Wǎh yal nɛ́npɔ́, à sɔkɔ Krɛsɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah,

à kyɩ ńwɔ̃́lɔ́ tɔ̃́nɔ́ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́. Képah náh, wǎh pɔ ǹ vi nɛ, pé de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, pé yal n yuku Siri gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, à kè wɛ noh nɛ, Nsyifunɔ-á mɛ ǹnɛ n plɔ pèkè yɔ́lɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ páh kɩ pé syɩ syɔ̃ Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyahlɛ.

Tɛ́ nónó-á sõ̀ Pole wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́mûnɛ, pépi wɛ yɔ̀: Sopatɛrɩ nɛ̂-á n wil Bere kwil, tɛ́ ǹ sú yĩn mɛ Pirusilɛ, ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ, à tahlɩ Arisitarkɩ, ànɛ̂ Sekũdusi tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á n wil Tesaloniki kwil, ànɛ̂ Kayusilɛ, nɛ̂-á n wil Dɛrɩbɩ kwil, ànɛ̂ Tisyikilɛ, ànɛ̂ Torofiminɛ, pépi nónó-á n wil Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, à tahlɩ Timote tyɩ́.
Pépi mɛ sɔkɔ ápi yahlɛ, à kyɩ álɛ n syɩkɩ Turasɩ kwil.

Búrn sɛ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ syáh syáhnsɔkɔntɛnɔ náh, ápi wɔ mó kyɩ de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ Filipi kwil, à pé nyáh sõ. Á sèpĩ̀n kwâl pɩ tɛ́ pyě de á no tnɔ̂ Turasɩ kwil. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, á tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́ à sèpĩ̀n kwǎrninɔ pɩ.
Yòh wrɔ́ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì gben sõlɛ,
Tɛ́ á pól sõ̀ mɛ tùkènmɔnɔlɛ gbɛ̃́ntĩ̂n yõ wɔ̀kɔ̀ tɔ̃́-ò sɔkɔ, tɛ́ fɔ̀tnɔ̀nɔ́ mɛ tũ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ pípí ké sɔkɔ.

Kètɛ̃̀npìkì yɔ́ tɔ sõ̀ mɛ álɛ pè n ye Yetikilɛ. Ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ kɔ̃ tɛ̃ fnɛ̀tír vyãh yõ. Dǒ, dɔy pɔ mɩ ǹ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ Pole Liyel wɛy yõ-á sõ̀ mɛ ko sɛ̃́, à pɔ dɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ syi yĩ̂nyõ wɔ̀kɔ̀ tɔ̃́-ò sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ syɩkɩ sétáh. Pǎh pópó pɔ nɛ pé à yilki sah, pè à wɛ kúnɔ́lɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pole tɔ tiki pɔ, tɛ́ kɔ à yɔ̃ ǹ gbã̀n sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yé káh n yɛ yé yáh-ńsah tyɛ; à mɛ min sɔkɔ.»
Képah náh, à ǹ syɩ dɔkɔ yuku ńtɔ̃, pè kyɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõke yõ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ tɔ̃ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ Liyel wɛy yónɔ́lɛ, pópó à pɔ nɔ tyah dal gbĩ́ tyɩ́, tɛ́ à pyě sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, no mɛ Yetiki tɛ̃ sɔkɔ ǹ vilɛ krémkrém ǹ gbô. Yĩ mɛ̀ pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ nɩ dénɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ no pól tyɩ́.

Pole sõ̀ kè yah tɔkɔ, à sɔkɔ Asɔsɩ kwil sɔkɔ, gbáhkɩ̀ yõ. À sõ̀ nɛ ápi pé yah yohnɩ nɛ́npɔ́, á pé twah. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ápi mɛ de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, à mɔ ǹ yahlɛ à kyɩ ǹnɛ n syɩkɩ nɛ́npɔ́, ǹ twah yĩnnɛ.
Wǎh pɔ de, á pól de krótókè sɔkɔ, à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ à kyɩ yĩn Mitilɛnɩ kwil.

Képah náh, á tɔ̃ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ. Ké sèpĩ̀n ní-ò sõlɛ, á kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ yèsreynɛ pè n ye Kyolɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Ké sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́-ò sõlɛ, á kyɩ sɔkɔ gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ gbɔ̀pɔ pè n ye Samoselɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Ké sèpĩ̀n ńyã́h-ò sõlɛ, á pyě yĩni tɛ̃ Milɛti kwil.

Tɛ́ Pole sõ̀ mɛ sàlnɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ kàh kɩ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi, pé nɛ mɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil Pãntekɔtɩ syáh syah sõlɛ. Képah ye à kɔ̃ à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ, à náh syɔ̃ Yefɛsɩ kwillɛ. À sõ̀ pɩ̃ nɛ páh kɩ de nɛ́npɔ́, pé náh wɛ n wil n pi súú Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole tɛ̃ Milɛti kwil, tɛ́ tɛ̃ntõ̀ mɔ Yefɛsɩ kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm tyɩ́ nɛ pè pɔ.
Pǎh pɔ yĩni tɛ̃ ǹ tnɔ̂, à yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «À tɔkɔ ńmɔ pɔ sõ tyɩ́ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, máh mɛ n pɩ sɔ̃́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ yé wrɔ́, yé se kélɛ n pnɛ tɛ́.
Mé tõ̀ pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔ kègbɩ sɔkɔ, à yétĩ kwɛ. Tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ tɔ mɛ vi ń náh gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáh sɔkɔ, à yèvyãhrɩ náhnáhlɛ ń yĩni tɛ̃.

Ǹtɛ yé se pɩ̃ nɛ, mé náh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɔ̃bɩ yélɛ nɛ̂-á kɩ fɛ̃ yé tyɩ́ pɛkɩ n pi tɛ́. Mé sõ̀ mɛ sé póllɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ yélɛ n kwɔ tɔ́wû tùkè-ǹtã̀n sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ yé gbên tɔ sɔkɔ.
Mé kè yo kɔ̃ Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ Krɛkɩ névye tɔ tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé nnɔ vi mɔ, pè mó sɛ̃ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, Liyel Mirki wɛ ń kyɩ̃ mɔ mé n sɔkɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil yɔ̀. Mé náh pɩ̃ tir nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á kɩ kyɩ ń yĩni n tɛ̃ n pi nɛ́npɔ́.
Máh nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ n pnɛ, mâh de kwil nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, Liyel Mirki ńkɛ̃́nɛ kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ dénɔ́ ànɛ̂ yèvyãhrɩ-á mɛ ń syɩkɩ tɛ̃.

Ǹtɛ sépinɔ́ pól sɔkɔ, ń gblɔ̌y min tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ náh mɛ tah ń tyɩ́ póllɛ. Mé náh mɛ kélɛ n mɔ n kõ kwáhtǎhlɛ. Tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á mɛ tah ń tyɩ́, képah ye pɩ ń tõ̀ pɩ́ntɛnɔlɛ; tõ̀ nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ dahbɩ ń gbõ̀ sɔkɔ nɛ mé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n kɔ̃ Liyel pèpɔrɩ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, mé pɩ̃ nɛ máh syɔ̃ yépi nónó pól tyɩ́ à Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ tyɩ́ yo kɔ̃, yé náh tɔ̃ ń wɛ n yah n pi.

Ǹtɛ mé náh yé wɔ̃bɩ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ, mé ye sé pól yo sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́. Képah ye, mé kélɛ n yo n dal n mɔ yé tyɩ́ kwɛynɛ nɛ, yé sɔkɔ nɛy nɛ̂-à kɩ se tɔ̃ mɔ pu, ké kémû náh n pɩ n pi ńmɔ tyɩ́lɛ.
Yé yé gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, yè mó Liyel yípɛ̂y
Mé pɩ̃ nɛ, ńmɔ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, névye yísyɔ́-á kɩ pɔ de yé wrɔ́ gbɛ̃́nképèl tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, kɩ yényêh pɩ yípɛ̂y sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ yépi ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ, névye túkù kɩ pɔ yuku tyah mɩ̀nɩ̀ wɛlɔlɛ n yo, kɩ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú yõ yɩkɩ, pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ pé sõ̀ tɛ̃.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ, yè mó yé dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ nɛ, máh lésõ yé kwɔ ye tɔ̃́nɔ́, ké lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀, à vìnmɔnɔlɛ yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól kɔ̃. Tɛ́ kèyǎhlɛ ń yétĩ ńtɛ̃ n kwɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ núkúnúkú, mé yélɛ n dahbɩ Liyel ànɛ̂ ǹ pèpɔrɩ wɛy gbõ̀ sɔkɔ. Tǎhkɩ̀ mɛ ǹmɔ sɔkɔ kɩ fɛ̃ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ yuku yahlɛ ǹmɔ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ wǎh ǹ vyãhlɛ yé kɔ̃ ǹ pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yé kɩ kè wɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ nónó pól-á mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ.
Mé náh pɔ́, ànɛ̂ sã́n, ànɛ̂ flɔ yah kɔ̃ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yé pól pɩ̃ nɛ, máh tõ̀ pɩ ń gbã̀nnɛ à yĩn ń gblɔ̌y yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ ń kɔ́mû tɔ yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ kɛ̀.

Mé kélɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ tyi pól sɔkɔ nɛ, sɛ̃́-á névi yɩ̃nɛ à tõ̀lɛ n pɩ, à kwâhlɛ n wɛ à yãm tãnnɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ, à mó ǹ dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛy mɛ̀ tyɩ́lɛ wǎh nɛ̂ yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sãm-á mɛ kɔ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, à kal wɛ́nsyinɔlɛ.»
Pole-á wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yo pɔ tyɛ, à kuku yĩn pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, pé pól Liyel ni.

Tɛ́ Pole sõ̀ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè náh tɔ̃ pé yèpɔ wɛ n yah n pi póllɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, pé pól tyah ǹnɛ n pɔrɩ n tɛ̃ n pɔ à n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ́ n gbo yèkwɔrɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́. Képah náh, pè kyɩ à tɛkɩ mɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ krótókè tɔ́kɔ́-ńsah sɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, áyáh pɔ wɛ yal pé tyɩ́, á de krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ, à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Koselɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Á náh kwɔ dah fɩ̃́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Ké dĩndallɛ, á yɔ̃ sɔkɔ gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Wrodɛsɩlɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Áyáh wil nɛ́npɔ́, á yuku Patara kwil sɔkɔ.
Á kyɩ yɩ̃nɛ krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́lɛ, kè mɛ n yuku Fenisi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Á mɛ de ké sɔkɔ, à sɔkɔ.

Á kyɩ syɔ̃ yúkɛy gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́lɛ pè n ye Syiprilɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ, fɔ́ɔ́ á ké yõ ńtɛ̃nɛ n yah. Ǹtɛ á mɛ kè mɔ á gbɛ̃̀yɩ̃̀nɛ̀ sõ̀lɛ, tɛ́ á yah mɔ Siri gbɛ̃̀nyahlɛ, à kyɩ tiki ké kwil yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Tirilɛ. Krótókè mɛ̀ vyɔ́ kɩ sõ̀ n tiki n mɔ n pi nɛ́npɔ́.

Képah sɔkɔ, áyáh kyɩ Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú nónó wɛ nɛ́npɔ́, á tɛ̃ pélɛ à sèpĩ̀n kwǎrninɔ pɩ. Tɛ́ kénɛ sèpĩ̀n sɔkɔ, Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú kè yo Pole tyɩ́ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ nɛ, à káh dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil.

Ǹtɛ sèpĩ̀n kwǎrninɔ nɔ́pi-á fyɔ̀ sɔkɔ, á tɔ̃ kyɩ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ á kɔ́lɔ́lɛ. Áyáh n sɔkɔ, díbí, ànɛ̂ syɔ́, ànɛ̂ wɛ̃́npì pól kyɩ á gbáhkɩ̀ wilki mɔ kwil náh tĩ̀nnɛ, yɔ́ngbalɩ sɔkɔ. Á pól mɛ á gbètukunɔ di nɛ́npɔ́, à Liyel ni pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Képah náh, á wɛkɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ wɛ̃ fĩn mɔ. Á tɛ́kɩ́nmɔpu nɔ́pi mɛ pé syɩ sɔkɔ pé tĩ̀nnɛ. Ápi mɛ tɔ̃ de krótókè mɛ̀ sɔkɔ

à yal Tiri kwil sɔkɔ, pópó à kyɩ de kwil yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Pitolemayisilɛ. Nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ ye á krótókè sɔkɔ kɔ́lɔ́ yĩn mɔ. Á mɛ wil krótókè sɔkɔ, à kyɩ yah wɛkɩ kɔ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ kwil nɩyṍ, tɛ́ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì núkú pɩ pélɛ.
Ké dĩndallɛ, á pɔ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ á kɔ́lɔ́lɛ, à sɔkɔ Sesarɩ kwil. Áyáh yĩni tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́, á kyɩ twah Filipi tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yó-òlɛ. Nɛ́pĩ̂ kwǎrnimi
Tɛ́ syɔ́npì nɛ́pĩ̂ ǹyẽ̂h sõ̀ mɛ ǹ tyɩ́, pè náh díbí tyɩ́ pɩ̃. Kénɛ syɔ́npì sõ̀ Liyel tɛ̃ntõnènɛ n syi n yo.
Képah sɔkɔ, á mɛ sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́. Á mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, tɛ́ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò yɔ́ tɔ wil Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah, à pɔ á wɛ. Pè ǹnɛ n ye Akabusilɛ.

Wǎh pɔ á wɛ, à Pole kɔ̃ tɔkɔ, à ǹ gblɔ̌y gbyẽ̂h ànɛ̂ ǹ gbã̀n pukubi kélɛ, tɛ́ nɛ, Liyel Mirki-á yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sɔ̃́-á pé pukubi pé gblɔ̌ynɛ, sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀-á Nsyifunɔ kɩ n pukubi n pi kɔ̃ mɛ̀ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, tɛ́ kɩ ǹ gbàh dɛ mɔ névye kɔ̃, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, áyáh wɛlɔ nɔ́pi noh sɛ̃́, à tahlɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Sesarɩ kwil, ápi pól Polelɛ n ni nɛ, à káh dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ Pole mɛ yo á tyɩ́ nɛ, sɔ̃́ se pɩ, tɛ́ á n gbo, à n yah n kɔ̃ yèkwɔrɩ mɔ́-ńsahlɛ pé sɔkɔ nɩ? Ńkɛ̃́, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ yĩ́n-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ pé púkúbínɔ́ ó tyɩ́, tɛ́ pé ku ńtɛ̃nɛ Yesu yĩnnɛ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, páh kè fɛ̃ syi.
Tɛ́ áyáh ǹ sõnɔ vi mɔ kwlɔ sɛ̃́, á yal mɔ ǹ gbáhntɛ̃nɔlɛ, tɛ́ nɛ, Liyel dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀ ó pɩ!
Áyáh sèpĩ̀n nɔ́pi pɩ pɔ n dal mɔ, á á vi, tɛ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃, à dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ Sesarɩ kwil Yesu tõ̀ sã́hpú yísyɔ́ mɛ á sõ̀ tɛ̃. Pépi mɛ á tɛ̃ yuku dĩ́ yɔ́ tĩ̀nnɛ pè n ye Mnasõnɛ. À sõ̀ n wil gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Syiprilɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Á sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ à twah ǹmɔ tyɩ́. Kénɛ dĩ́nɛ, Yesu tõ̀ sã́h-ò ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ di mónɔ́lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, áyáh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú mɛ á tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Ké dĩndallɛ, Pole sɔkɔ álɛ Nsyakɩ tĩ̀nnɛ, ńyãh sɔkɔ-á sõ̀ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tãm tɔ mɛ tùkènmɔnɔlɛ pé tɔ̂ɔ́.
Wǎh kyɩ de, à wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ Liyel-á à tɔkɔ à tyi nónó pɩ névye wrɔ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, à mɛ sé pól yo wah pé tyɩ́ pnɛ́pnɛ́.

Pǎh képah noh sɛ̃́, pè Liyel gbilki, tɛ́ mɛ yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ, pé yṹnpi Pole, à kó mɛ n yah Nsyifunɔ nɛ́kwĩ́nkí sɛ̃ Yesu yõ nɩ? Ńkɛ̃́, pǎh mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ n yĩ́ĩ́ pé póllɛ dɛ́!

Ǹtɛ à yah, no-á mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n yo ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ; pǎh mɛ n yo nɛ, Nsyifunɔ nónó pól-á mɛ karkɩ tɛ̃ tɛ̃ kɔ̃ nɛ́káhbɩ́ wrɔ́, wǎh mɛ pélɛ n kwɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pè pé syɩ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh. Wǎh mɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè káh tɔ̃ pé wɛ̃́npìlɛ n kõ, ànɛ̂ pè káh tɔ̃ Nsyifunɔ wã̀llɛ n kɔ.
Tɛ́ pǎh kɩ se mó tɔ̃ ǹ pɔ́nɔ́ noh n pi. Núkúnúkú, sɔ̃́ se pé kɩ pɩ nɩ?
Ńkɛ̃́, páh kɩ nɛ̂ yo n pi ǹ tyɩ́, à képah pɩ. Díbí nɛ́pĩ̂ ǹyẽ̂h-á mɛ ásõ̂, nónó-á pé vyãhlɛ Liyel kɔ̃, tɛ́ kɩ ké tyi pɩ n pi.

Ńkɛ̃́, à pè tɛ̃ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ pépi kyɩ ké tyi pɩ pé gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ sah Liyel yah, ǹmɔ mó yĩn pé ywɔ̃ kyénɔ́ sárká gbõ̀nwìlkìlɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, no pól-á kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ, páh tyi nónónɛ n nohnɩ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, gblɔ náh sélɛ, ǹmɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔ-á mɛ n kɔ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.

Ǹtɛ nónó tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, tɛ́ vi mɔ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, páh nɛ̂ yah tɔkɔ, páh kè wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ tɛ pé tyɩ́ nɛ: Pè pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ sãh fálnɔ́ yîlɛ, ànɛ̂ fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ tṍ kwɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ kwáhkókè kɔ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ tṍnɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, dĩndallɛ Pole díbí nɔ́pi tɛ̃ pè sɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, à kyɩ pé gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ sah. Képah náh, à de Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ sõ nɛ̂-á pé gblɔ̌y tɔ̃́nsàhnɔ́ sèpĩ̀n kɩ tũ, tɛ́ pè kɩ sárká wilki n pi pé nɛ́núkù núkú pól yĩn yõ, à mɛ ké gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì yo nɛ́npɔ́.
Tɛ́ sèpĩ̀n kwǎrninɔ nɔ́pi tyɛ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ nónó-á n wil Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, pè Pole wɛ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ. Pè mɛ tɔ́wû pól kurki mɔ ǹ yõ, tɛ́ à tɛ̃.

Pè sõ̀ mɛ gbo mɔ tũ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yisrayel tãn, pè pé yohnɩ n mɔ oo! Pè yah dĩ́ mɛ̀nɛ, ǹmɔ-á n yo n yɩkɩ pépi Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́lɛ ywɔ̃ ywɔ̃ pól sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô tyɩ́lɛ. À wil képah sɔkɔ, névye nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, wǎh pè tɛ̃ de Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ. Liyel tyah mɛ̀ ńtɛ̃ dêl kó à pɩ yɔ̀ nɩ?
Tɛ́ Torofimi nɛ̂-á n wil Yefɛsɩ kwil, ǹmɔ ye lésõ pè wɛ ànɛ̂ Polelɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ kwil nɩyṍ sɔkɔ. Képah ye, pè núkú wɛ nɛ, Pole-á à tɛ̃ de Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kwil fɛ̃kɩ. Névye mɛ to wil ywɔ̃ ywɔ̃ póllɛ, à pɔ. Pè mɛ Pole tɛ̃ yɔrɩ wil Liyel ní-ńsah gbô náhlɛ, tɛ́ núkú ké yey vike.
Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ pè mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Pole kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ, Wrome tãn sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kè wɛ noh nɛ, Yerusalɛmɩ kwil pól-á mɛ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ.

Nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, à núkú sràsyíbí ye tuke ànɛ̂ sràsyíbí yõ̀tãmnɛ, tɛ́ to sɔkɔ pélɛ tɔ́wû mɛ̀ mɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ tɔ́wû mɛ̀-á fyɔ̀ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ wɛ à n pi ànɛ̂ sràsyíbílɛ, pè núkú yal mɔ Pole kònɔ́lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ nɔ de Polelɛ, à à tɛ̃, tɛ́ nɛ, pè à pukubi kɛ̃́lɔ́ plɔ́ nínɔ́lɛ. Tɛ́ piki yah nɛ, nɛ́dúkú nɛ̂ se ǹnɛ, ànɛ̂ tir nɛ̂ se à pɩ nɩ?

Ǹtɛ tɔ́wû mɛ̀ névye pól yuku yo mɔ tũ wɛ̃ yõ pé tyíyónɔ́nɔlɛ sé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ náh fɛ̃ tɛ̃ ké yõ pɩ̃. Képah sɔkɔ, à nɛ sràsyíbí Pole tɛ̃ kyɩ dah mɔ pé wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ.

Pǎh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ yah, tɛ́ Pole tyah n dɔkɔ ké súndɔkɔ-ńtã̂n yõ, no pól ǹ sõ tɛ̃ mɛ gbo mɔ tũ nɛ, pè à ko mɔ oo, pè à ko mɔ! No-á Polelɛ n kah n yɩ̃kɩ n kɔ̃ sɛ̃́, sràsyíbí kwlɔ pè à yɔ̃ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á pè n tyah dénɔ́lɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ syah nɛ, pé se kɩ fɛ̃ tir yɔ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɩ? Yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ nɛ, è, tɛ́ wǎh Krɛkɩ wɛynɛ n nohnɩ kɛ̀!
Ńkɛ̃́, Yesyipti kwil dĩ́ nɛ̂-á fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́ pɩ sɛ̃́ yɔ̀ sɛ̃́ yɔ̀, à tyínyêh pɩ́pú nɛ́pĩ̂ kèyõ nínɔ́ (4 000) tɛ̃ sɔkɔ gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ náh ǹmɔlɛ kɛ̀.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole à syah nɛ, Nsyifu nɛy-á péwɔlɛ, pé dúbí-ńsah tɔ́tɔ́-á Tarsɩ kwillɛ, Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Pé dúbí-ńsah kwil mɛ̀ yĩn-á mɛ wìlnɔ́lɛ. Ńkɛ̃́, à ǹ gblɔ̌y yɛ, à mó yɛ pé kɔ̃ pé yo mɔ no tyɩ́.
Sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ à kɔ̃. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pole yuku yĩn súndɔkɔ-ńtã̂n yõ, tɛ́ ǹ gbõ̀ pɩ mɔ no tyɩ́, pè mɛ yĩn sṹmm. À mɛ tyah n wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́ Yebre wɛy
«Ń súbí ànɛ̂ ń yṹnpyé, yé yé gblɔ̌y yɛ, yè mó noh ń tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á mé kɩ yo kɩ ń vyãh kɔ̃lɩ n pi yé tyɩ́.»
Képah sɔkɔ, pǎh Pole wɛ à n wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́ Yebre wɛy sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, tyah tɔ̃ gbah pɩ sṹmm.

À mɛ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Nsyifu nɛy ye ńmɔlɛ. Mé dubi Tarsɩ kwil, Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil mɛ̀ sɔkɔ ye mé kyãh yɔ̀. Tɛ́ Kamalyɛlɩ ye sõ̀ kwɔ ńnɛ. À ń kwɔ yĩ́ĩ́ á náh tãn tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ. Mé sõ̀ mɛ gbah tɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á yélɛ ké sɔkɔ kwɛynɛ yɔ̀.
Mé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú fõh, fɔ́ɔ́ à pé túkù ko mɔ. Mé pé díbí ànɛ̂ pé syɔ́ túkùlɛ n tɛ̃ n pukubi n dah n mɔ n pɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.

Sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ yèwàhnɩ̀ pól kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ ń tàrfyɔ̀lɛ ké sɔkɔ. Pépi ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ ye lésõ mé wɛ syi sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́lɛ nɛ mé kyɩ á no Nsyifunɔ kɔ̃ Damasɩ kwil, mé mó Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú wɛ n tɛ̃ n pukubi nónó-á mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, mé pɔ pélɛ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, mé pɔ pè fõh.
Képah sɔkɔ, máh mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tɛ́ mɛ de n tɛ Damasɩ kwillɛ, kyòo yɔ́ núkú wil yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀lɛ, à pɔ kwɛ ń yõ pěrr à ń mɔ gbɩ̃.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, mé yɔ̃ syɩkɩ sétáh, tɛ́ yĩ́npɔ̃́ yɔ́ noh nɛ̂-á mɛ n yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Sole, Sole, kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ á ńnɛ n fõh sɛ̃́?›
Mé mɛ piki yah nɛ, nɛ̂ se ǹmɔlɛ nɩ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃? Kénɛ yĩ́npɔ̃́ tɔ̃ ké syɩ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Nasarɛtɩ kwil Yesu ye ńmɔlɛ, nɛ̂-á á n fõh.›
Képah sɔkɔ, máh sõ̀ mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ ànɛ̂ nónónɛ, pépi tɔ sõ̀ kyòo mɛ̀ wɛ; tɛ́ nɛ̂-á n yo n mɔ ń tyɩ́, pè náh tɛ̃̀ wɔ wɛy noh.
Mé mɛ piki yah nɛ, tir nɛ̂ se mé yɩ̃nɛ mé pɩ nɩ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃? À mɛ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Yuku n de Damasɩ kwil. Tɛ́ wáh yɩ̃nɛ ǹ tyi nónó pól pɩ, pè kɩ sè yo ǹ syah.›
Ǹtɛ kyòo mɛ̀ píkínɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ ń yɩ̃́ wɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, áyáh mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ ànɛ̂ nónónɛ, pépi mɛ ń gbõ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ̃, à de Damasɩ kwil.

Tɛ́ dĩ́ yɔ́ lésõ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́ pè n ye Ananiyasilɛ. Kénɛ dĩ́ sõ̀ mɛ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, mɛ ǹ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pɩ sé wã̀l yõ. Nsyifunɔ nónó pól-á sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, pé pól sõ̀ mɛ ǹ yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo.
Ǹmɔ mɛ pɔ ńmɔ tnɔ̂, tɛ́ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Ń yṹnpi Sole, fɛ̃ nɛ n yah ńtɔ̃.› Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ ń yɩ̃́ yɩkɩ, mé mɛ à wɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, à mɛ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Liyel nɛ̂-á á náh tãn n gbilki, ǹmɔ ye ǹ yah tɔkɔ nɛ á pé dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́nɛ n pnɛ, ànɛ̂ á pé tõ̀npɩ nɛ́gbɩ́
Képah ye, wáh tyi nónó wɛ, tɛ́ tyi nónó noh Liyel tõ̀npɩ nɛ́gbɩ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, á kɩ n pɩ n pi sé yónwàh-òlɛ no pól yĩ́ yah.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, núkúnúkú káh n tɔ̃ n tɛ̃ n mo. Yuku, á yɩ̃nɛ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́lɛ ni sɔkɔ, á tyípêl mó yɔ̃ mɔ ǹ kɔ̃, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩn yéngbonɔ sɔkɔ.›
Képah náh, mé ń syɩ sɔkɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil. Tɛ́ sõ yɔ́lɛ, máh mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ, Liyel wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́lɛ ń wɛ̃kɩ.
Mé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ à mɛ n yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yerusalɛmɩ kwil tãn náh ń tyíyónɔ́ fɛ̃ n syi n pi péwɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Képah-á, mé sal n wil súú Yerusalɛmɩ kwil sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ mé mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, á no Nsyifunɔ-á kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ, máh lésõ mɛ n kyɩ n pɔ á Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ sɔkɔ, à ǹmɔ yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n tɛ̃ n dah n mɔ n pɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pélɛ n ko yèfõhlɛ;
à tahlɩ pǎh ǹ tyɩ́ yónwàh-ò Yetyɛ̃nɩ ko mɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ńmɔ tɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ dò. Máh sõ̀ mɛ mɔ ǹ kònmɔpulɛ, tɛ́ pɩ pé fwɔ̀mɔ̀-ǹgbnɔ syɩ́kɩ́-òlɛ dò.
Képah sɔkɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: ‹Fɩ́ɩ́ sɔkɔ ye mé n tɛkɩ n mɔ álɛ kwlókáhkɩ́ névye tyɩ́. Nɛ n yuku!›»

Tɔ́wû sõ̀ mɛ Pole wɛlɔlɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n nohnɩ, ǹtɛ wǎh fyɔ̀ pɔ wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yo nɛ, kwlókáhkɩ́ névye tyɩ́-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ n tɛkɩ n mɔ pélɛ, pè núkú gbo mɔ wòhòh nɛ, ǹsɔ̃̀ntɛ̃̂ névi-á yɩ̃nɛ kònmɔntonɔlɛ sétáh yõ. À náh yɩ̃nɛ à tɛ̃ min sɔkɔ.
Pè sõ̀ mɛ kah gbo mɔ tũ, mɛ pé flɔlɛ n dɛ n milki, tɛ́ mɛ nɛ̀ngbɔ̃nɛ n yilki n mɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ, sràsyíbí Pole tɛ̃ de pé wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, pè mó à ko yèfõhlɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, tir nɛ̂ yĩn-á tɔ́wû n gbo n mɔ ǹ yõ sɔkɔ, páh kɩ ké yõ pɩ̃.

Ǹtɛ pǎh Pole pukubi mnɔlɛ nɛ páh ǹnɛ n ko gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, à yo ǹmɔ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ se mɛ yépi tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ Wrome tãn gbõ̀ mɔ yõ ko ǹ tùkè-ǹkɛ̃̂ ńtɛ̃nɛ?»
Dĩ́-á képah noh sɛ̃́, à kyɩ kè yo sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, tyítúkù nɛ̂ se à n tyah pɩ́nɔ́lɛ sɛ̃́ nɩ? Ǹgbǒ Wrome tãn gbõ̀ mɔ yõ-á dĩ́ mɛ̀nɛ dɛ́!
Képah sɔkɔ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ pɔ Pole piki yah nɛ, à yo pé syah, Wrome tãn gbõ̀ mɔ yõ se ńtyɩ̃́nɔ ǹnɛ nɩ? Pole mɛ nɛ àwe-á.
Pole-á yo sɛ̃́, dĩ́ à syah nɛ, tɛ́ pɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃-á péwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ wilki, tɛ́ pɩ Wrome tãn gbõ̀ mɔ yõlɛ dɛ́! Pole mɛ nɛ, ǹtɛ péwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á dubi kélɛ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, nónó-á kɩ sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ pè Pole ko n pi nɛ à wɛkɩ, pè gbɛ mɔ ǹnɛ. Tɛ́ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á kè wɛ pɩ̃ nɛ, Wrome tãn gbõ̀ mɔ yõ-á Polelɛ, tɛ́ pé mɛ pè kɔ̃ pè à pukubi, ké tíkí de ǹ sɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, ké dĩndallɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pɩ̃ tɔ́tɔ́, tir nɛ̂ yõ-á Nsyifunɔ tɔkɔ Pole kɔ̃. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, à pè kɔ̃ pè kyɩ Pole wah mɔ, tɛ́ mɛ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì névye pól ye tuke, pépi nónó sɔkɔ-á sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãmnɛ, tɛ́ pè kɔ̃ pè Pole tɛ̃ pɔ pé nɩyṍ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole tyah tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkìlɛ n yah díkídíkí, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ń yṹnpyé, mé mɛ ń fɔkɔ dal mɔ n kɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, pópó à pɔ nɔ kwɛy tyɩ́.»
Pole-á yo sɛ̃́, nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ ǹ tnɔ̂, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Ananiyasi yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè ǹ vyãh mɩ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, sékṹ sõ̀ wahy nɛ̂-á ǹnɛ, Liyel-á kɩ mɩ ǹmɔlɛ. Wǎh mɛ kɔ̃ tɛ̃ ásõ̂, à péwɔlɛ n tuke à yɩ̃nɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ à yo, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ sé dêllɛ n pɩ nɛ pè pé mɩ kɛ̀.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, pè à syah nɛ, Liyel sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ à n gbyɔ lɛ́?
À mɛ pè syah nɛ, pé náh sõ̀ mɛ pɩ̃ nɛ sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á ǹnɛ lɔ́, pé yṹnpyé. Ńkɛ̃́, kǎh mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ nɛ: «Káh á kwil névye yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ n gbyɔ.»

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole-á sõ̀ mɛ kè pɩ̃ sah nɛ, tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì tɔ́nɩ́ núkúlɛ Sadusɛ̃ névye-á, tɛ́ pé tɔ́nɩ́ mɛ̀ mɛ Farisiyɛ̃ névyelɛ sɛ̃́, à tyah n kah n wɛkɩ pé nɩyṍ nɛ: «Ń yṹnpyé, Farisiyɛ̃ névye ye ń dúbípúlɛ, ńmɔ tɔ mɛ Farisiyɛ̃ nɛynɛ. Tɛ́ ńmɔ sõnɔ-á mɛ ké yõ nɛ, lékyɩ̂-á kɩ n yilki n mɔ n pi, képah yĩn ye ńnɛ tukey sɔkɔ ásõ̂ yɔ̀.»
Pole-á fyɔ̀ képah yo n tɛ ǹsɔ̃̀, yékã̂b ǹgbɛ̃ núkú de Farisiyɛ̃ névye ànɛ̂ Sadusɛ̃ névye wrɔ́, à pé tɔ́wû gbɛkɩ.
Sadusɛ̃ névye wɔ sõ̀ mɛ nɛ, lékó yílkínmɔnɔ náh mɛ, yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ, mírkí yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ. Ǹtɛ Farisiyɛ̃ névye wɔ mó nɛ, sé pól-á mɛ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, wãn tɔ̃ mɔ névye gbónmɔnɔ yõ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kwɔ́pú nónó-á sõ̀ n wil Farisiyɛ̃ névye tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ, pépi yísyɔ́ yuku yahle képékèyɔ̂ nɛ, pépi náh mɛ tyítúkù yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ póllɛ. Tɛ́nkàh mírkí yɔ́, képah náh pɩ, Liyel yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́-á kɩ nɛ̂ yo mɔ ǹ tyɩ́ tɛ́?

Tɛ́ yékã̂b-á pɔ kah pɩ sǒhsǒh sɛ̃́, tíkí mɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tɛ̃ nɛ, pǎh kɩ pɔ Pole yɔrɩ n kɔ̃lɩ n pi. Képah sɔkɔ, à mɛ yo sràsyíbí tyɩ́ nɛ, pè tiki kyɩ Pole tɛ̃ n yal pé wrɔ́, pè yuku ǹnɛ pé wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ.
Ké lékã̂h-á pɔ mɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wil Pole yah, tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Sṍré mɔ á gblɔ̌y sɔkɔ. Ǹgbǒ, wáh ń tyɩ́ yo sɔ̃́ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ tɔ̃ ń tyɩ́ yo sɛ̃́ Wrome kwil tɔ sɔkɔ dɛ́!»

Képah sɔkɔ, tyah-á pɔ dal Nsyifunɔ yísyɔ́ yuku Pole tyɩ́ yo syɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ pé wo Liyellɛ nɛ, pé náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ yõ yõ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ n pi, ànɛ̂ pé náh wɔ wɔ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɔ n pi, Pole kònmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ nónó-á sõ̀ pɩ yĩ́nvǐ mɛ̀nɛ, pè kah nɛ́pĩ̂ tikininínɛ.

Képah tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, pè kyɩ wil sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm ànɛ̂ yèwàhnɩ̀ tyɩ́, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pépi-á pé wo Liyellɛ képékèyɔ̂ nɛ, pé náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ dah n mɔ n pi pé vyɛ̃y sɔkɔ, Pole kònmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ.

Képah-á, ńkɛ̃́ pépi tɔ pé vyɛ̃y pɩ núkúlɛ ànɛ̂ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkìlɛ, pè mó kyɩ kè yah kɔ̃ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, à Pole tɛkɩ mɔ pé kɔ̃. Ńkɛ̃́, pè kè pɩ á kɩ nɛ, pè sɔ̃́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé ǹ tyi sohlɩ n yah pallɛ. Ǹtɛ pépi tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á kɩ pé vi, kɩ kyɩ à syɩkɩ tɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yah sɔkɔ, kɩ à wɛ ko mɔ, ǹ yĩ́níntɛ̃-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Pole lèpi mɛ yĩ́nvǐ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ wɛ noh, tɛ́ Pole nyáh sõ sràsyíbí wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, à kyɩ kè yo à syah.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ́ ye, tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, tir yɔ́-á mɛ dípír mɛ̀ tyɩ́ yo yo tɛ̃̀nɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́. Ńkɛ̃́, à kyɩ ǹnɛ ǹ tyɩ́.

Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, dĩ́ mɛ kyɩ dípírlɛ, tɛ́ yo pé yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ nɛ, Pole nɛ̂ yah-á víkénɔ́lɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ-á ye yah pélɛ, tɛ́ kè yah kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pé pɔ dípír mɛ̀nɛ ǹ tyɩ́. Wǎh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé tir yɔ́ yo à syah.
Képah sɔkɔ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ dípír gbõ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ̃ pè kɛ̃kɩ gbɔ̀pɔlɛ, tɛ́ à piki yah nɛ, tir nɛ̂ se ǹ tyɩ́ yo yo tɛ̃̀nɛ nɩ?

À mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, Nsyifunɔ yísyɔ́-á mɛ yo sah núkú yõ nɛ, páh kɩ pɔ à ni, à Pole tɛkɩ mɔ pé kɔ̃ ńsõ̂nɛ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, á kɩ nɛ pè sɔ̃́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé ǹ tyi sohlɩ n yah pallɛ.

Tɛ́ à yah, nɛ́pĩ̂ tikininí dòhnɔ̀-á mɛ pé vi sah, mɛ Polelɛ n plɔ pèkè yɔ́lɛ. Pǎh kè yah tɔkɔ, à pé wo nɛ, pé náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ yõ yõ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ n pi, ànɛ̂ pé náh wɔ wɔ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɔ n pi, ǹ kònmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ. Pǎh kè sah tɛ gbáhkɩ̀ núkú yõ, tɛ́ mɛ ǹmɔ ó fɛ̃̀nsyinɔ syɩkɩ tɛ̃. Ǹtɛ à káh n yɛ pè à pilki.
Képah sɔkɔ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ dípír fĩn mɔ, tɛ́ kè gbah yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à káh kè yãh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, páh tyi nɔ́pi gbél kye péwɔ tyɩ́ dɛ́!

Képah sɔkɔ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tãm nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí ye pɔ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè sràsyíbí nɛ́pĩ̂ lègbãm (200) wilki n sah, ànɛ̂ sèsèn nátãm nɛ́pĩ̂ tikitɔ̃nɩ́ pɔ́ gbãmnɛ, ànɛ̂ màmàl nátãm nɛ́pĩ̂ lègbãmnɛ (200). Pè mó pé vi sah Sesarɩ kwil sɔkɔ sɔkɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ yɛ̃́pní sõ̀.
Pè mó tɔ̃ sèsèn yísyɔ́ wilki n sah, sépi pɔ Pole twah yuku gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Felikisi tĩ̀nnɛ, dlo yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh à wɛ nɔ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɛ́ sɛ́bɛ́y wãrkɩ pè kɔ̃ nɛ, pè kyɩ Felikisi kɔ̃, nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á à yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Ńmɔ Klode Lisyasɩ ye n tõ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ á tyɩ́, gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ pèpɛy Felikisi. Ń wɛy mɛ á tyɩ́.

Dĩ́ nɛ̂-á mé n tɛkɩ mɔ á tyɩ́ yɔ̀, Nsyifunɔ sõ̀ mɛ à tɛ̃, mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ. Ǹtɛ máh noh nɛ Wrome tãn gbõ̀ mɔ yõ-á ǹnɛ, ńmɔ ànɛ̂ ń sràsyíbí mɛ kyɩ à tɛ̃ syi pé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ mé sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, mé pɩ̃ tir nɛ̂ yĩn-á pè tɔkɔ à kɔ̃. Képah ye, mé à tɛ̃ kyɩ pé tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́.

Képah sɔkɔ ye mé pɩ̃ nɛ, pǎh mɛ yékã̂blɛ n pɩ Polelɛ pé tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ́ képah tyɩ́ yõ-á pè tɔkɔ à kɔ̃. Tɛ́ sépi pól sɔkɔ, à náh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ kònmɔnɔlɛ, képah náh pɩ, ǹ dáhnmɔnɔlɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.

Képah náh, mé pɔ noh nɛ, pǎh mɛ yĩ́nvǐ yɔ́lɛ n dahbɩ ǹ gbáhkɩ̀ sõ̀. Képah ye, mé núkú ǹnɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ á tyɩ́ yɔ̀. Tɛ́ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ tɔkɔ à kɔ̃, mé mɛ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè kyɩ ké yah yo áwɔ tyɩ́.»
Képah sɔkɔ, kǎh yo sɔ̃́ sràsyíbí tyɩ́, pè mɛ kè pɩ sɛ̃́. Pè kyɩ Pole tɛ̃ à sɔkɔ ǹnɛ lékã̂hnɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ à kyɩ de Antipatrisi kwil.
Dĩndallɛ, pè sèsèn nátãm kɔ̃ pè yɔ̃ sɔkɔ ǹnɛ, tɛ́ pé tɛ́lɔ́ mɛ pé syɩ sɔkɔ pé sràsyíbí wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ.
Sèsèn nátãm nɔ́pi-á fyɔ̀ kyɩ de Polelɛ Sesarɩ kwil, pè sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ kɔ̃, tɛ́ Polelɛ ǹ gbõ̀ dahbɩ.
Gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ mɛ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ kar, tɛ́ Pole piki yah nɛ, gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛ̂ nɛy se ǹnɛ nɩ? Wǎh noh nɛ Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛy-á ǹnɛ,
à yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, nónó-á tɔkɔ à kɔ̃, pàh kɩ pɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, páh kɩ pyě nóhnɔ́ pɩ ǹ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ mɛ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè à tɛ̃ ǹ yah vike n sah Yerɔdɩ tɔ̃́rɩ́ kéte sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ sèpĩ̀n kwâl sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Ananiyasi tiki pɔ Sesarɩ kwil, ànɛ̂ yèwàhnɩ̀ yísyɔ́lɛ, à tahlɩ wɛy pɩ̃́-ò ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Tɛrtulusilɛ. Pè sõ̀ mɛ pɔ Pole ye, gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Felikisi tyɩ́.

Képah sɔkɔ, pè mɛ Pole ye yah, tɛ́ Tɛrtulusi mɛ de wɛy sɔkɔ, à n tɔkɔ Polelɛ n kɔ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò pèpɛy, yèvɩnɩ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á pélɛ kwɛynɛ yɔ̀, ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ-á kè wɛ. Wǎh ǹ gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃ pallɛ sɔ̃́, képah-á vìnmɔnɔ náhnáh dahbɩ ké sɔkɔ.
Wǎh n tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ pépi tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ, páh n gbah n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ képah yĩnnɛ.
Tɛ́ à ǹ kékwɛ, à mó ǹ níkí kwɔ noh pé tyɩ́ kwéy. Pé náh pé wɛy yõ ko n pi, kè kɔ̃ kè n pɩ n pi ǹ tyɩ́ gblɔ́vyã́hrɩ́lɛ.

Ńkɛ̃́, dĩ́ nɛ̂-á yɔ̀, páh kè kyɔmɩ wɛ nɛ, wǎh mɛ pɩ tɛ̃̀ soh soh ńyân tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Wǎh mɛ Nsyifunɔ yõlɛ n yɩkɩ kèkõyṍ pól sɔkɔ. Ǹmɔ-á n tɛ̃ névye yahlɛ, nónó-á n kɔ Nasarɛtɩ kwil Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, nɛ̂-á gbɩ náh kélɛ.
Wǎh sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô dêl ńtɛ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ, képah-á pé kɔ̃ pé à tɛ̃. [Páh sõ̀ nɛ pé à tuke à yɩ̃nɛ pépi Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyi yónɔ́lɛ.
Ǹtɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Lisyasɩ-á pɔ à tɛ̃ syi pé tyɩ́ gbùgbù,

tɛ́ nɛ: «Nónó-á nɛ Pole tyípɩ́nɔ́ náh mɛ plɛ, pè kyɩ tɔkɔ à kɔ̃ Felikisi tyɩ́.»] Képah náh, Tɛrtulusi tɔ̃ nɛ, núkúnúkú ǹmɔ ńtɛ̃ Pole piki yah ǹ gblɔ̌y, képah sɔkɔ, wǎh kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ, tyi nónó yĩn-á pépi pɔ tɔkɔ à kɔ̃, gblɔ-á sélɛ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Nsyifunɔ mɛ dĩ́ wɛy sõ̀ so mɔ nɛ, sɛ̃́-á kè wɛ.

Képah náh, gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ mɛ ǹ gbõ̀ pɩ mɔ Pole tyɩ́, à wɛynɛ à kɔ̃. Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ nɛ: «Mé pɩ̃ nɛ áwɔ-á ápi no tukey tùkè-òlɛ ké ye náhnáh-á yɔ̀. Képah ye, ń nɩ mɛ yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ kɩ ń vyãh kɔ̃lɩ á yah sɔkɔ.
Ńmɔ dɔ́kɔ́npɔnɔlɛ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, nɛ mé pɔ Liyel gbilki, kè náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ kah sèpĩ̀n gbɔ̃ninɔ́lɛ. Áwɔ ńtɛ̃ kɩ fɛ̃ ké nɩ́y tɛ̃, kɩ ké gbɩ pɩ̃.

Pè náh ń wɛ mé mɛ yékã̂blɛ n pɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ kwil fɩ̃́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Mé náh se mó tɔ̃ tɔ́wû kurki mɔ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ pǎh pɔ tɔkɔ ńnɛ n kɔ̃ yɔ̀, tir nɛ̂ mɛ pè kɩ fɛ̃ yo nɛ̂-á n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ gblɔ-á pé tyíyónɔ́ nɔ́pilɛ?

Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-á mé kɩ n yo n pi, képah ye yɔ̀, mé mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ń náh tãn Liyel tyɩ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ mɛ̀ yõ, wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ nɛ̂-á pépi nɛ gbɩ náh kélɛ. Ǹtɛ tyi nónó pól-á wãrkɩ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ sɔkɔ, ńmɔ sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ sé pól yõ.
Ńmɔ sõnɔ-á mɛ Liyel yõ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pépi tɔ sõnɔ mɛ képah ó yõ nɛ, nɛ́péplɔ ànɛ̂ nɛ́túkúnì pól lékyɩ̂-á kɩ yilki mɔ.
Képah ye, mé mɛ gbah tɛ̃ ń fɔkɔ dal mɔ n kɔ Liyel yah ànɛ̂ névye yah sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ.
Ń pɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á mé yo yɔ̀, ye náhnáh sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh ye mé pɔ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, à pɔ ń kwil névye yohnɩ mɔ pɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ sárkánɔ́ wilki Liyel tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ ye sõ̀ pè pɔ wɛ ńnɛ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ, máh ń gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ sah gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ. Tɔ́wû náh sõ̀ mɛ ńnɛ, ànɛ̂ gbrǒgbrǒ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ n pɩ.
Tɛ́ Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah Nsyifunɔ yísyɔ́ wɔ sõ̀ mɛ. Mâh sõ̀ mɛ tir yɔ́ pu pɩ pè wɛ, pépi ye náhkɩ pɔ ásõ̂, à pɔ tɔkɔ ń kɔ̃ áwɔ tyɩ́ dò.
Képah náh pɩ, Nsyifunɔ nónó-á ásõ̂ yɔ̀, pǎh lésõ ń tɛ̃ kyɩ pé tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, lékàh-à kɩ mɛ wɛ ń tyɩ́, pè kè yo kɛ̀!
Tyínúkú yɔ́ ó ye lésõ mé yo gbǎp pé tyɩ́ tukey tùkèpu yah sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, máh sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ lékyɩ̂-á kɩ n yilki n mɔ n pi, képah yĩn-á ńnɛ tukey sɔkɔ kwɛynɛ yɔ̀ dɛ́!»

Tɛ́ kwil yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Felikisi sõ̀ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ dùkù pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à tukey mɛ̀ kur mɔ sah náh tĩ̀n yõ, tɛ́ nɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Lisyasɩ-à kɩ pɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, páh kɩ pé tir mɛ̀ yah wah.
Tɛ́ mɛ nɛ, sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ ǹ syɩ n kyɩ Pole dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ. À mó yɛ à kɔ̃ à nɛ n mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ kwéy. À káh ǹ tyɩ́ névye yĩni mɔ ǹ pɔ́nyòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔlɛ.

Sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, Felikisi pɔ de ànɛ̂ ǹ kyɩ Drusililɛ. Tɛ́ Drusililɛ, Nsyifu nɛy ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, Felikisi pè kɔ̃ pè Pole ye yah, à pɔ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃ dùkù tyɩ́lɛ n yãh ǹ tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ Pole-á pɔ tyah n yãh gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ dùkù pèpɛy tyɩ́ yõ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ Liyel névye pɔ n tuke dùkù tyɩ́ yõ, képah sɔkɔ, tíkí Felikisi tɛ̃, à mɛ yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ, núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ, wǎh kɩ fɛ̃ n yuku, tɛ́ pâh pɔ wrɔ́ wɛ, páh kɩ tɔ̃ yo mɔ ǹ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ ǹ sõnɔ sõ̀ mɛ ké yõ tɔlɛ nɛ, Pole-á kɩ pé kɔ̃ n pi pɔ́lɛ; képah ye, à sõ̀ mɛ ǹnɛ n tɔ̃ n ye fárfár pè yã́hkɩ̀lɛ n yãh n pɔ ǹnɛ.

Pè ye nínɔ́ pɩ képah tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́. Képah náh, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ késã́n yɔ́ pɔ Felikisi swɔ tɔkɔ pè n ye Porsiyusi Fɛsitusilɛ. Tɛ́ Felikisi-á sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé Nsyifunɔ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ pɩ sɛ̃́, képah ye à Pole sah wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò Fɛsitusi
Képah sɔkɔ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ kyɩ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Pole-á tyítúkúnì pɩ.

Tɛ́ tyah ǹnɛ n gbah n ni nɛ, à ǹ gblɔ̌y yɛ pé tyɩ́, à mó Pole kɔ̃ à pɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, pé ǹ tyi sohlɩ n yah pallɛ. Ǹtɛ kègbɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ, yĩ́nvǐ ye sõ̀ pè n pɩ nɛ, pé à wɛ ko mɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yah.
Ǹtɛ Fɛsitusi mɛ pè syah nɛ, Pole-á mɛ dáhnmɔnɔlɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ Sesarɩ kwil. Tɛ́ péwɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔ náh tɔ̃ n mo n pi pé syɩ́nsɔkɔ-ńsah nɛ́npɔ́.
Ńkɛ̃́, pé yah tãm nónó-à kɩ fɛ̃ n tɛ̃ n pi, pè péwɔ sõ̀ tɛ̃ pé tiki yuku Sesarɩ kwil. Pole-à kɩ se mɛ tyítúkù yɔ́ pɩ pè wɛ, páh kɩ kyɩ nɛ́npɔ́, pè kɩ n tɔkɔ à kɔ̃.

Képah sɔkɔ, Fɛsitusi náh tɔ̃ tɛ̃ mo nɛ́npɔ́ à kah sèpĩ̀n kwǎrtɔ̃nɔ, képah náh pɩ, gbãm yõ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ǹ syɩ sɔkɔ Sesarɩ kwil. Ké dĩndallɛ, à mɛ kɔ̃ tɛ̃ tukey tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ntõ̀ mɔ nɛ pè pɔ Polelɛ.

Pole-á pɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Nsyifunɔ nónó-á sõ̀ wil Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, pè pɔ à mɔ gbɩ̃, tɛ́ tyah lékàhlɛ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃ képékèyɔ̂ tyi náhnáh sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ pé tyíyónɔ́ nɔ́pi sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á wɛ̃kɩ nɛ gblɔ-á sélɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ tyah ǹ gblɔ̌y vyãhlɛ n kɔ̃lɩ nɛ, pé náh tyítúkù yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ à de Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ Fɛsitusi wɔ sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, Nsyifunɔ pé yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à Pole syah nɛ, à se kɩ fɛ̃ syi kyɩ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, ǹ tukey kyɩ n tuke péwɔ yĩ́ yah nɩ?

Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, Pole mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, Sesar tukey tùkè-ǹsah yɔ́ sɔkɔ-á pélɛ yɔ̀, ǹmɔ tyɩ́-á pé tukey yɩ̃nɛ kè tuke. Nsyifunɔ-á yɔ̀, pé náh tyítúkù yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ pé tyɩ́. Yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́, ǹmɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔ pɩ̃́nyĩnɔ-á mɛ ké sɔkɔ ó.

Ńkɛ̃́, pé tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ kah, ànɛ̂ pé mɛ tir yɔ́ pɩ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ kũnɛ, pé náh mɛ yahle pé kúnɔ́ yõ dò. Ǹtɛ pǎh tɔkɔ péwɔlɛ n kɔ̃ tyi nónó sɔkɔ, gblɔ-à ńkɛ̃̂nɛ sélɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ pé gbàh dɛ mɔ pè kɔ̃ n pi. Páh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé tyɩ́ tukey kyɩ n tuke Sesar tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, Fɛsitusi ànɛ̂ ǹ tukey tùkèpu tĩ̀nkì mɛ wɛ̃ wɛ. Pǎh tyɛ, à mɛ yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ, wǎh fyɔ̀ Sesar yĩn yo tɛ, wǎh kɩ kyɩ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ Wrome kwil sɔkɔ.
Sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa ànɛ̂ ǹ dósê Berenisi pɔ yah gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Fɛsitusi tyɩ́, Sesarɩ kwil.
Pè kɩ sõ̀ sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ n pi nɛ́npɔ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Fɛsitusi mó núkú Pole tyɩ́ wɛ kõ mɔ yãh Akripa tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Felikisi-á dĩ́ yɔ́ dah mɔ sah wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ ásõ̂.
Tɛ́ páh pɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ yèwàhnɩ̀-á mɛ pɔ n tɔkɔ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pé à mɔ kũ kɔ̃.

Ǹtɛ páh kè yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, kè náh n pɩ sɛ̃́ pépi Wrome tãn wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Pé náh wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ nɛynɛ n mɔ kũnɛ n kɔ̃, nɛ́ pé náh wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ à kɔ̃, à ǹ yo yo tɛ̃̀ yo névye yĩ́ĩ́ yah, nónó-á tɔkɔ à kɔ̃.

Képah sɔkɔ, kénɛ no mɛ pɔ ànɛ̂ péwɔlɛ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ. Péwɔ náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé tir mɛ̀ sah mo. Képah-á, ké dĩndal ńtɛ̃nɛ pé núkú yuku tukey tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ nɛ pè pɔ kénɛ dĩ́nɛ.
Péwɔ tɛ̃̀-á sõ̀ mɛ n sõ nɛ, névye nónó-á tɔkɔ à kɔ̃, pǎh kɩ pɔ tyítúkúnì ǹgbnɔ duke duke kwãh n pi nɛ, sépi-á à pɩ. Ǹtɛ pǎh pɔ, kè náh pɩ sɛ̃́.
Pǎh mɛ pɔ yékã̂b yísyɔ́ ólɛ n pɩ ǹnɛ pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Yesu yɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á lésõ ku, tɛ́ Pole tɔ̃ mɛ n yo nɛ, wǎh mɛ min sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, péwɔ náh sõ̀ pɩ̃, páh nɛ yĩ mɛ̀ dùkù wah n pi sɔ̃́. Képah sɔkɔ, pé mɛ Pole piki yah nɛ, à se kɩ kyɩ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil, ǹ tukey kyɩ tuke nɛ́npɔ́ nɩ?

Ǹtɛ Pole mɛ nɛ, páh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé tɛ̃ ásõ̂, pé tyi yah mó pɔ kyɩ wah Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé mɛ nɛ pè à dah mɔ sah wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ kè pɔ nɔ ǹ tɛ́kɩ́nmɔnɔ tyɩ́ Sesar tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, Akripa mɛ yo Fɛsitusi tyɩ́ nɛ, péwɔ tɔ-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀ pɔ ǹ tyi yãh pé noh. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Fɛsitusi mɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, ńsõ̂ ńtɛ̃ ó sɔkɔ, wǎh kɩ pɔ ǹ tyi yãh à kɩ noh.

Dĩndallɛ, Akripa ànɛ̂ Berenisi pé mɔ wil yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ flɔ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sràsyíbí yõ̀tãm ǹgbnɔ ànɛ̂ kwil nɛ́-ǹgbnɔ mɛ pé sõ̀ tɛ̃, pè yuku tukey tùkè-ǹsah wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, Fɛsitusi pè kɔ̃ pè pɔ Polelɛ.

Wǎh pɔ, Fɛsitusi mɛ de wɛy sɔkɔ tɛ́ nɛ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa, ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ nónó pól-á mɛ pélɛ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, pé pól-á mɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀nɛ n yah kɛ̀. Nsyifunɔ tɔ́wû pól-á pɔ wil pé tyɩ́ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ Yerusalɛmɩ, ànɛ̂ fɔ́ɔ́ ásõ̂ tɔ sɔkɔ. Pǎh mɛ gbo mɔ tũ nɛ, à náh yɩ̃nɛ sàhnɔ́lɛ min sɔkɔ póllɛ.

Ǹtɛ péwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh tir yɔ́ wɛ ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ kònmɔnɔlɛ. Tɛ́ wǎh fyɔ̀ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ dahbɩ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar gbõ̀, képah-á pé nɛ, páh kɩ à tɛkɩ mɔ à kɔ̃.

Tɛ́ tir nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ tɔ́tɔ́-á pé kɩ wãrkɩ, kɩ à tɛkɩ mɔ n pi Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar tyɩ́, pé náh mɛ képah pɩ̃. Képah-á pé pɔ ǹnɛ pé tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ ǹmɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔ tyɩ́ ǹ wahlɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa. Páh nɛ, pàh kɩ à piki yah tɛ, pé tɛ̃ wɛ tir yɔ́ wɛ n wãrkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pé à tɛkɩ n mɔ Sesar tyɩ́.
Péwɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ ké yah náh, à wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ nɛy tɛkɩ mɔ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, tɛ́ à náh mó tɔ̃ tɛ̃̀ tyi yah wɛ yo tɛkɩ mɔ ǹ tyɩ́, nónó yĩn-á pè tɔkɔ à kɔ̃.
Képah sɔkɔ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ, wɛy-á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́, wǎh kɩ fɛ̃ ǹ vyãh kɔ̃lɩ. Wǎh yo sɛ̃́, Pole mɛ ǹ gbõ̀ yɔ̃, tɛ́ tyah ǹ vyãh kɔ̃̀lɩ̀nɔ́lɛ pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́,

yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa, ǹmɔ-á pépi Nsyifunɔ tyídî póllɛ n pnɛ ànɛ̂ tyi nónó yõ-á pě yékã̂blɛ n pɩ. Képah-á, nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á kélɛ péwɔ tyɩ́ kwɛynɛ, kɩ pé vyãh kɔ̃lɩ tyi nɔ́pi pól sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ-á n tɔkɔ pélɛ n kɔ̃ tyi nónó sɔkɔ. Páh ǹnɛ n ni, à ǹ gblɔ̌y yɛ, à mó noh pé tyɩ́.
À tɔkɔ pé kètɛ̃̀npìkì gbĩ́ dùkù tyɩ́, páh sõ̀ mɛ pé minnɛ n pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ pé kwil tãn wrɔ́ ànɛ̂ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, Nsyifunɔ pól-á képahlɛ n pnɛ.
Pǎh pélɛ n pnɛ di mónɔ́lɛ. Pàh kɩ mɛ ké tyɩ́, pǎh kɩ fɛ̃ pé kèdùkù yo ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ, Farisiyɛ̃ névye tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ nɛy-á pélɛ, tĩ̀nkì nɛ̂ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́-á kah tah.
Ǹtɛ Liyel-á ǹ vyãh tɔkɔ pé náh tãn tyɩ́ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, péwɔ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ ké yõ, képah yĩn-á pélɛ tukey sɔkɔ núkúnúkú yɔ̀.

Tɛ́ pépi yìkìnì gbɔ̃ninɔ́ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ ké yõ nɛ, kǎh kɩ n pɩ n dal n mɔ n pi, tɛ́ mɛ gbah tɛ̃ à Liyellɛ n gbilki ké lékã̂h, ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀. Képah yõ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ yĩn-á Nsyifunɔ tɔkɔ péwɔ kɔ̃ yɔ̀, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa.
Ǹtɛ kwâh nɛ̂ se pɩ, tɛ́ ké fɛ̃̀nsyinɔ tɔ̃ kah tah pé no Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́ nɛ, Liyel-á lékyɩ̂lɛ n yilki n mɔ nɩ?
Péwɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ n sõ nɛ, páh yɩ̃nɛ pé tyi pól pɩ, pé Nasarɛtɩ kwil Yesu yĩn yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yah kõ.

Sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm-á ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ pé kɔ̃ tɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, páh Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú náhnáh tɛ̃ dah mɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ pàh sɔ̃́ sõ̀ pélɛ n ko n mɔ fyélɛ, péwɔ kè fɛ̃ n syi. Képah-á pé pɩ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil.

Páh sõ̀ mɛ n de n kɔ̃ pépi Nsyifunɔ Liyel ní-ńtã̂n vɩ̀ sɔkɔ, à Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n tɛ̃ n fõh, tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pè kyɩ̃ mɔ, pè Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yal mɔ. Tɛ́ pé fɔkɔ vyã́hnkàhnmɔnɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ pélɛ, páh ńkɛ̃́nɛ pé nyáh sõ ǹ kyɩ pélɛ n fõh kwlókáhkɩ́nɔ tɔ sɔkɔ.
Sɛ̃́-á sõ yɔ́lɛ, sárká syínwìlkìpu yõ̀tãm mɛ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ ànɛ̂ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ pé kɔ̃, pé yuku à n yuku Damasɩ kwil.

Ńkɛ̃́, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa, páh sõ̀ mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀ pɔ̃́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ kyòo yɔ́ wɛ kè wil yĩ̂nyõ, nɛ̂-á piki kal gbĩnɛ, à pɔ kwɛ péwɔ ànɛ̂ pé wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́mû yõ pěrr, à pé mɔ gbɩ̃.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pé pól syɩkɩlɩ sétáh tɛ́ péwɔ mɛ yĩ́npɔ̃́ yɔ́ noh kè mɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ Yebre wɛy sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Sole, Sole, kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ á ńnɛ n fõh sɛ̃́? Ǹgbǒ gbõ̀ nɛ̂-à yahle náh vìnɔ́lɛ, képah ye n kwɔ dɛ́!»
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé mɛ piki yah nɛ, nɛ̂ se ǹmɔlɛ nɩ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃? À mɛ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yesu ye ńmɔlɛ, nɛ̂-á á n fõh.

Ǹtɛ yuku n yĩn á gbyẽ̂h yõ. Máh ń gblɔ̌ynɛ ǹ wɛ̃kɩ tir nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ, képah wɛ yɔ̀: Mé nɛ á pɩ ń tõ̀npɩlɛ. Sɔ̃́-á á wɛ ńnɛ yɔ̀, á kɩ kélɛ n yah n yo n kɔ̃, à tahlɩ tyi nónó tɔ-á mé kɩ pɔ ǹ wɛ̃kɩ n pi náhlɛ.
Mé kɩ ǹ pwah mɔ wilki Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ kwlókáhkɩ́nɔ névye gbõ̀, pépi nónó tyɩ́-á mé n tɛkɩ n mɔ álɛ.

Mé álɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, á kyɩ pé yɩ̃́ yɩkɩ, pè kɔ̃ pè wil fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ pè pɔ kyòo yah. Pè mó wil sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ pè pɔ Liyel tyɩ́, pé tyípêl kɔ̃ sè yɔ̃ mɔ pè kɔ̃, pè mó kyɩ tɛ̃̀-ǹsah wɛ Liyel wɛ̃́npì wrɔ́, nónó-á mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ ńmɔ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ.»

Pole-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu wɛlɔ nɔ́pi yo tɛ, à ǹ syɩ yo Akripa tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́, páh tyi nónó noh, tɛ́ tyi nónó wɛ wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á n wil Liyel tyɩ́, pé náh yahle sé pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.

Tɛ́ Damasɩ tãn ǹgbò tyɩ́-á pé yo sélɛ. Képah náh, pé mɛ sè yo Yerusalɛmɩ tãn tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah tãn póllɛ, à tahlɩ kwlo kwlo tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́. Páh kè yo pé pól tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé nnɔ vi mɔ, pè mó Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃. Ńkɛ̃́, pè tyípéplɔlɛ n pɩ, nónó-á n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ gbɩ yõ, pé nnɔ-á vi mɔ.
Tɛ́ képah yõ sɔkɔ-á Nsyifunɔ tɛ̃ pélɛ, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ pé mɛ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ. Pǎh sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ.

Ǹtɛ Liyel yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ, páh mɛ min sɔkɔ à pɔ syɩ kwɛy tyɩ́. Tɛ́ páh tɔ̃ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, gblɔ yo yĩnnɛ tahbɩ ànɛ̂ yãm tãn tyɩ́. Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu ànɛ̂ Moyisi-á tyi nónó tyɩ́ yo nɛ, sǎh kɩ pɔ n pɩ n pi, pé náh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yo kah mɔ sépi yõ, sépi nónó-á yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
Liyel nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔ-á kɩ yèvyãhrɩ pɩ kɩ ku. Tɛ́ ǹmɔ-á kɩ n pɩ n pi nɛ́gbennɛ, kɩ yilki mɔ lékyɩ̂ sɔkɔ. Wǎh kɩ pɔ pwáhnmɔnɔ tyɩ́ yo wah kyòo pépi Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ névye tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ Pole-á mɛ ǹ tyi yah yónɔ́ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́ mɛ ǹ vyãhlɛ n kɔ̃lɩ, Fɛsitusi wɛkɩ páhpáh ǹ yõ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, ǹ yõ̀gbèkè náh mɛ, ǹ kǎrn pɩ́nɔ́ képékè-á ǹ yõ̀gbèkè yuku.
Ǹtɛ Pole mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ pèpɛy, pé yõ̀gbèkè náh yuku dɛ́! Gblɔ ànɛ̂ yèsrey wɛlɔ ó kɔ́kɔ́-á pé n wɛkɩ.

Ńkɛ̃́, tyi nɔ́pi sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh pɩ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ sɔkɔ, pé sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ ké yõ nɛ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ sé sɔkɔ dò. Képah-á, pé kɔ̃ pé kélɛ n yo n dal n mɔ ǹ yah sɔkɔ nɩ̀sãhlɛ.
Ǹtɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa, à kó sɛ̃ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu wɛlɔ yõ nɩ? Péwɔ tɛ̃̀-á pɩ̃ nɛ wǎh sɛ̃ sé yõ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Akripa mɛ yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ, kàh náh kɩ nɛ pé mo kwéy, wǎh náhkɩ núkú péwɔ vi mɔ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ.

Pole mɛ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, kàh kɩ se pɩ núkúnúkú ò, kàh kɩ se mo ò, péwɔ tɛ̃̀-á mɛ Liyellɛ n ni nɛ, kè káh yĩn ǹmɔ ńtɛ̃ ó tyɩ́, ńkɛ̃́ nónó pól tɔ-á mɛ pé wɛlɔlɛ n nohnɩ kwɛynɛ yɔ̀, pé pól pɩ péwɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, tɛ́ kârn wɔ káh mɔ pépi tyɩ́.
Képah náh, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Akripa yuku, ànɛ̂ gbɛ̃̀nyah yah tɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ Fɛsitusilɛ, ànɛ̂ Berenisilɛ, à tahlɩ nónó pól-á sõ̀ mɛ kɔ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pélɛ.
Ǹtɛ pǎh wil, pè tyah n yo wɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, dĩ́ mɛ̀ náh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ, nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ kònmɔnɔlɛ, képah náh pɩ, ǹ dáhnmɔnɔlɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Akripa mɛ yo Fɛsitusi tyɩ́ nɛ, dĩ́ mɛ̀ à sõ̀ mɛ ǹ tukey tyɩ́ dáhbɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar gbõ̀ sɔkɔ, wǎh yɩ̃nɛ fĩ́nmɔnɔlɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, kǎh pɔ sah núkú yõ nɛ, áyáh kɩ yuku n pi Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Sesar tyɩ́ Yitalɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ, pè mɛ Pole ànɛ̂ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ névye yísyɔ́ dahbɩ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ́ gbõ̀, nɛ à sɔkɔ álɛ. Dĩ́ mɛ̀ yĩn ye sõ̀ Nsyulyusilɛ. Ǹmɔ ye sõ̀ Wrome tãn sràsyíbí tĩ̀nkì yɔ́ yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ nɛ̂-á pè n ye Wokustilɛ.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, á de Adramiti kwil krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ, à sɔkɔ. Krótókè mɛ̀ kɩ sõ̀ n syɔ̃ n pi Asi gbɛ̃̀nyah krótónè yĩ́n-ńtã̂n sɔkɔ. Arisitarkɩ sõ̀ mɛ álɛ, nɛ̂-á n wil Masedonɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah kwil yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Tesalonikilɛ.
Ké dĩndallɛ, á kyɩ de Sidõ kwil. Ǹtɛ Nsyulyusi sõ̀ mɛ Pole tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ Pole kɔ̃ nɛ, à kyɩ yah ǹ kódíbí tyɩ́, pè kɔ̃ pè à wɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ.
Képah náh, áyáh yal nɛ́npɔ́, yã́hkɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ álɛ n fwo. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á syɔ̃ gbɛ̃̀nyah yɔ́ gbɔ̀pɔ pè n ye Syiprilɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Képah sõ̀ mɛ yã́hkɩ́ yah kõ sah á tyɩ́ kwéy.
Tɛ́ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ pnɛ yɔ sɔkɔ, à syɔ̃ Silisi gbɛ̃̀nyah ànɛ̂ Pãnfili gbɛ̃̀nyah gbɔ̀pɔ, à kyɩ tiki Mira kwil, Lisi gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Áyáh mɛ nɛ́npɔ́, Wrome tãn sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ mɛ Alɛkisãdri kwil krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ wɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ sõ̀ n yuku n pi Yitalɩ

Á sèpĩ̀n náhnáh pɩ, tɛ́ á náh sõ̀ mɛ fɛ̃ n to súú. Á yèvyãhrɩ kah pɩ, tɛ́ pyě yĩni tɛ̃ Knidi kwil dé-ńsahlɛ yúkɛy. Ǹtɛ yã́hkɩ́-á sõ̀ mɛ álɛ n fwo nɛ́npɔ́ tĩ̀n yúkúnɔ́lɛ sɛ̃́, gbɛ̃̀nyah nɛ̂-á pè n ye Krɛtɩlɛ pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ, á syɔ̃ képah dónmɔ-ńsah yɔ́ gbɔ̀pɔ pè n ye Salmonenɛ. Nɛ́npɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ yã́hkɩ́ yah kõ sah á tyɩ́ kwéy.
Á yèvyãhrɩ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́ sɔ́kɔ́-ńsah sɔkɔ, à kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ Krɛtɩ fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Krótónè yĩ́n-ńsah pèpɛynɛ. Lasɩ kwil mɛ nɛ́npɔ́ tnɔ̂.

Légbĩ́nɛ, wrɔ́ náhnáh sõ̀ mɛ sɔkɔ tɛ. Tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ fílsã̀hkɩ̀ sõ̀ níkì tɛ̃ gbĩ́-á sõ̀ mɛ sɔkɔ tɛ sɛ̃́, yã́hkɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ kõ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, krótókè tónɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ pɩ dlolɛ. Képah ye, Pole mɛ ké gbáhdyâh di pé tyɩ́ nɛ,

pé kódíbí, péwɔ-á kè wɛ tɛ nɛ, krótókè tónɔ́ náh tɔ̃ fɛ̃ n yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ n pi, nɛ́ dlo náh wɛ ké sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ kè náh n yĩn n pi krótókè ànɛ̂ ké sɔkɔ vyɔ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ képékè ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, pépi tɔ min-á kɩ n syah n wũ ké sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ sõ̀ mɛ sɛ̃ krótókè tó-ò dĩ́ ànɛ̂ ké yõ̀tɛ̃̀ wɛy yõ sɔkɔ, à kal Pole tyɩ́lɛ.

Tɛ́ Krɛtɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah krótónè yĩ́n-ńsah mɛ̀ náh sõ̀ mɛ plɛ kwɔ̀vɩrɩ gbĩ́nɛ. Képah ye, névye kan sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, kàh kɩ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi, pé yĩni tɛ̃ ké krótónè yĩ́n-ńsah yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Fenikisilɛ, pé kyɩ kwɔ̀vɩrɩ gbĩ́ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́. Nɛ́npɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ Krɛtɩ gbĩ̀yiki tĩ̀nnɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, yã́hkɩ́ yɔ́ tyah n kõ n wil fálfál yɔ nɩyṍ tĩ̀nnɛ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè sõ̀ mɛ n sõ nɛ páh nɛ̂ yah tɔkɔ, kǎh kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ, tɛ́ mɛ krótókè yĩn mɔ mɔ vyɔ́ngbílkì dɔkɔ mɔ, krótókè kɔ̃ kè tyah n sɔkɔ, à kyɩ tɔrɩ sɔkɔ Krɛtɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah gbɔ̀pɔlɛ.
Dǒ kwéy, yã́hpékè yɔ́ kõ wil ymɔ yõ à tiki pɔ mɩ á sɔkɔ. Yã́hkɩ́ mɛ̀ yĩn ye sõ̀ Yerakilõnɛ.
Kè pɔ á krótókè tɔkɔ n yuku gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃̀náhlɛ, á náh tɛ̃ wɛ ké yah kõ. Á mɛ á gblɔ̌y fĩn mɔ kè kɔ̃.

Kè kyɩ sɔkɔ álɛ gbɛ̃̀nyahpír yɔ́ tnɔ̂ pè n ye Kodalɛ, pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ. Kénɛ gbɛ̃̀nyah sõ̀ mɛ yã́hkɩ́ yah kõ sah á tyɩ́ kwéy. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, krótópír nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ tóhnmɔnsàhnɔ́lɛ krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, á gbah tɛ̃, à képah wɛ yɔrɩ dah mɔ ké sɔkɔ yèvyãhrɩlɛ.

Ké dáhnmɔntɛnɔ náh, á mnɔlɛ krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ pukubi kore vi nɛ kè káh kwɔkɩ. Tɛ́ tíkí-á sõ̀ mɛ á tɛ̃ nɛ á káh kyɩ n nir Libi gbɛ̃̀nyah sèmìyã́hrɩ́ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, képah ye á krótókè yõ̀tah flɔ kũ, sépi nónó gbõ̀ yõ-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ yã́hkɩ́ kélɛ n tu n mɔ súú, tɛ́ mɛ á gblɔ̌y fĩn mɔ yã́hkɩ́ kɔ̃ kè n yuku álɛ.
Dĩndallɛ, yã́hkɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ álɛ n kah fwo sɛ̃́, kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè krótókè tɔ́kɔ́bɩ́ wilki min dah mɔ pnɛ yɔ sɔkɔ.
Sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́-ò sõlɛ, krótókè tópú tɔ mɛ ké tõ̀npɩ̀vyɔ́ túkù wilki ké sɔkɔ, à min dah mɔ pnɛ yɔ sɔkɔ pé gblɔ̌y.
Kè sõ̀ mɛ pɩ sèpĩ̀n náhnáhlɛ, tɛ́ á náh gbĩ wɛ yah yĩ́nɛ, képah náh pɩ, ńwɔ̃́ kèpyelɛ. Yã́hkɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ peke tɛ̃ sɛ̃́, fɔ́ɔ́ á náh tɔ̃ mɛ pɔ n sõ nɛ, áyáh kɩ pwah.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á sõ̀ mɛ sèpĩ̀n náhnáh pɩ yõke yṍ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ yuku yĩn no pól nɩyṍ, tɛ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pé kódíbí, pǎh sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ pè sah péwɔ yóré yõ, pé mó wũ Krɛtɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah. Képah-à sõ̀ mɛ pɩ, páh dlo nónó gbal, ànɛ̂ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ nónó-á pɩ pé tyɩ́ yɔ̀, sè náh náhkɩ pé yĩni n tɛ̃ n pi dò!
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, páh kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé nɩ syãh, ńkɛ̃́ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ náh yɩ̃ n pi à wil krótókè tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ńkɛ̃́, Liyel nɛ̂ tyɩ́ yõ-á péwɔlɛ pé tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́-á wil pé yah lékã̂h mɛ̀ sɔkɔ,

tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Káh tíkí pɩ, Pole! Á kɩ n yĩn n pi Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar yah sɔkɔ, kɩ á yṍtyí yo ǹ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ névye nónó pól-á mɛ n yuku álɛ krótókè sɔkɔ, áwɔ gbõ̀ yõ, pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ náh n yɩ̃ n pi.»
Képah-á, péwɔ Pole sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ Liyel yõ nɛ, kǎh kɩ n pɩ n pi sɔ̃́-á ǹ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yo kélɛ pé tyɩ́. Képah-á, pè pé nɩ syãh pé kódíbí.
Ǹtɛ krótókè tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á kɩ kyɩ n yɩkɩ n pi pé tyɩ́ yɔ nɩyṍ kwil yɔ́ sɔkɔ dɛ́!

Légbĩ́nɛ, yã́hkɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ álɛ n fwo n yuku sɛ̃́ pnɛ yɔ yõ, nɛ̂-á pè n ye Mediteranɩnɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ syɩ ké sèpĩ̀n gbɔ̃nyã́h-ò sõ lékã̂h tyɩ́. Tɛ́ lénɩ mɔ́nɔ́ wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, krótókè tópú sõ̀ kè sõ nɛ, áyáh mɛ de n tɛ kènkwã̀h yõlɛ,

tɛ́ yɔ́ntî sãh sãh kwâh min dah mɔ yɔ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kè wɛ ké súkúlínɔ́ mɛ mɛ́tɛ́rnɔ́ yõgbãm pɔ́ kwǎrninɔlɛ. Áyáh yuku yahlɛ kwéy, pè tɔ̃ kè min dah mɔ, tɛ́ kè wɛ ké súkúlínɔ́ mɛ mɛ́tɛ́rnɔ́ túkúrí pɔ́ kwǎrtɔ̃nɔlɛ.

Pè sõ̀ mɛ tíkílɛ n pɩ nɛ, krótókè káh pɔ kyɩ syɩ dyêh yísyɔ́ tyɩ́, kè yɩkɩ. Képah ye, pè krótókè yĩn mɔ mɔ vyɔ́ngbîl ǹyẽ̂h dah mɔ krótókè náh tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ mɛ tyah dálnɔ́ ólɛ n dɛkɩ.
Ǹtɛ krótókè tópú sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ tó-ńsahlɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè krótópír tiki mɔ yɔ yõ, tɛ́ nɛ páh nɛ pé krótókè yĩn mɔ mɔ vyɔ́ngbîl dah mɔ krótókè yah tĩ̀nnɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole mɛ yo sràsyíbí ànɛ̂ pé yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, díbí nɔ́pi-à kɩ wṹ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ krótókè sɔkɔ, pépi náh tɛ̃ wɛ n pwah n pi dɛ́!
Képah sɔkɔ, mnɔ nónó-á sõ̀ tɛ̃ sah krótópírlɛ, sràsyíbí núkú sépi kɔ̃lɩ mɔ kè kɔ̃ kè sɔkɔ.

Képah náh, tyah-á pópó n dal, Pole kè yah kɔ̃ no pól tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pè yõke yõ. À nɛ ńkɛ̃́, ké sèpĩ̀n gbɔ̃nyã́h-ò-á kwɛynɛ yɔ̀, pé yáh-ńsah mɛ tyɛ tɛ̃ pópó, pè náh mɛ fɛ̃ yõkelɛ n yõ.
Ǹtɛ yõke vyãh-á mó tɔ̃ mɛ pé min pwáhnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Képah-á, páh kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõke yõ. Ńkɛ̃́, pé sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ̀yén pɔ́ núkú fyé náh n mɔ n pu n pi.
Képah yóntɛnɔ náh, Pole búrn tɔkɔ, tɛ́ wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ no pól yĩ́ yah, tɛ́ kè kwɔ à tyah n tah.
Képah sɔkɔ, no pól nɩ sũ, pé tɔ mɛ yõke yõ.
Névye nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ krótókè mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, á pól sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́pĩ̂ lègbãm tikitɔ̃nɩ́ pɔ́ gbãm pɔ́ kénúkòlɛ (276).
Á pól-á yõ tɔ̃ tɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, á sèmukɔ wilki min dah mɔ yɔ sɔkɔ krótókè kɔ̃ kè pɩ fáhfáh.

Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, tyah-á pɔ dal krótókè tópú náh sõ̀ mɛ kènkwã̀h yõ yah pɩ̃. Pǎh pɔ yɔ kéngbárkɩ̀ yɔ́ kyɔmɩ wɛ, nɛ́npɔ́ mɛ wɛ́nyĩ́n-ńsahlɛ, pè nɛ páh kɩ yuku yah nɛ́npɔ́ krótókèlɛ, kàh kɩ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi.

Képah sɔkɔ, pè krótókè yĩn mɔ mɔ vyɔ́ngbîl dɛ mɔ sè kɔ̃ sè wũ pnɛ yɔ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ núkú yɔ̃ sɔkɔ krótókè yah tɛ̃ tɛ̃ yî tɔ wah mɔ, ké yah tɛ̃ yĩnnɛ. Tɛ́ mɛ fwɔ toh yĩ̂nyõ, krótókè yah tĩ̀nnɛ, yã́hkɩ́ kɔ̃ kè kélɛ n tu n mɔ, tɛ́ pé yah mɔ à yɔ kéngbárkɩ̀ mɛ̀nɛ n yɩ̃kɩ.

Ǹtɛ pè kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ yɔ́ntáh sèmìyã́hrɩ́ fìì yɔ́ tyɩ́, à nir ké sɔkɔ. Krótókè yah tĩ̀n sõ̀ mɛ kyɩ di sèmìyã́hrɩ́ sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ kè náh mɛ fɛ̃ n yike, tɛ́ níkwîl mɛ ké náh tĩ̀nnɛ n mɩ n kwɔkɩ n pɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, sràsyíbí sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ névye kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ. Tíkí sõ̀ mɛ pè tɛ̃ nɛ, pè káh pɔ n yɔ̃ n wil n to n pwah.
Ǹtɛ sràsyíbí yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́-á sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé Pole pwah mɔ sɛ̃́, à pè yĩni mɔ képah pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Tɛ́ nɛ, yɔ yɔ̃́npnɛ̀pu ǹgbò yɔkɔ de yɔ sɔkɔ, pè kènkwã̀h yõlɛ n yɩ̃kɩ.
Tɛ́ mɛ nɛ, no tɛ́lɔ́ sésárnɔ tɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ, krótókè kwɔ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ, pè dɔkɔ sépi yõ, pè nɛ n yɔ̃ n yuku. Sɛ̃́ ye kè pɩ, tɛ́ no pól yĩni tɛ̃ kènkwã̀h yõ sɔkɔ krómkróm pé vyelɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, áyáh pwah sɛ̃́, á kè noh nɛ pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ gbɛ̃̀nyah mɛ̀ yĩn-á Maltɩlɛ.
Kénɛ kwil tãn mɛ á tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ pallɛ. Tɛ́ pũ̀-á sõ̀ mɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ vɩrɩ mɛ n pɩ sɛ̃́, pè mɛ nyàh mɔ tìí á pól kɔ̃ á mɛ tuke mɔ tɛ̃ n wnɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole-á kyɩ lésɔ́pî kwel nɛ pé pɔ mɔ nyàh sɔkɔ, nyàh swɔ̀ɔ̀-á kyɩ sé tyɩ́, wáhnpo yɔ́ wil sé sɔkɔ à Pole kõ, fɔ́ɔ́ à toh mɔ ǹ gbõ̀ tyɩ́.

Kwil mɛ̀ tãn-á wahy wɛ tóhnmɔnɔlɛ ǹ gbõ̀ tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, pè tyah n yo wɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, tɔ̀tɔ̀ náh mɛ ké sɔkɔ póllɛ, dĩ́ mɛ̀-á nɛ́kókè mɔ yah. Wǎh sénsɔ̃ pwah pnɛ yɔ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ ó, ǹtɛ pépi sétõ nɛ̂-á gbɩlɛ n wah, képah tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh à sah n pi min sɔkɔ dɛ́!
Képah sɔkɔ, Pole wahy mɛ̀ mir dah mɔ nyàh sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ syẽ́hẽ́h kwéy ńtɛ̃ náh kyɩ Pole wil tyɩ́.

Tɛ́ kwil tãn sõ̀ mɛ syɩ́kɩ́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ nɛ, dǒ páh kɩ à wɛ à kɩ mɛ tyah n sɛ̃, képah náh pɩ, kɩ syɩkɩ n ku n pi nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ. Ǹtɛ pǎh képah syɩkɩ tɛ̃ wrɛ́tɛ́tɛ́, pè pɔ pɩ̃ nɛ, pèkè yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh à nɔ n pi. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè pé vyɛ̃y vi à tyah n yo nɛ, tõ̀ yɔ́-á ǹnɛ.

Tɛ́ ńyãh sɔkɔ-á sõ̀ álɛ, fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ nɛ́npɔ́ tnɔ̂, nɛ̂-á pnɛ yɔ nɩyṍ gbɛ̃̀nyah mɛ̀ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ tyɩ́lɛ. Kénɛ dĩ́ yĩn ye sõ̀ Publiyusilɛ. Ǹmɔ mɛ á tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ pallɛ ǹ kódíbí sɔ̃́, tɛ́ á kɔ̃ á twah ǹ tyɩ́ à sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́nɩ̀ pɩ.
Tɛ́ kénɛ dĩ́ sú sõ̀ mɛ yam pɛ̀kɩ̀ yõ. Ǹ wil sõ̀ mɛ vyãh, tɛ́ ǹ fɔkɔ tɔ mɛ kye. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Pole mɛ kyɩ yah ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ́ ǹ gbã̀n sah ǹ yõ à Liyel ni ǹ tyɩ́, à à dɛ mɔ.
Képah náh, kénɛ kwil yámpú tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ mɛ pɔ Pole tyɩ́, tɛ́ pɔ dɛ́nmɔnɔ wɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á yõ yɔ̃ nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ kègbɩlɛ. Tɛ́ áyáh pɔ n tyah sɔ́kɔ́nɔ́lɛ, yî nónó yétõ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ á tɛ̃, pè sé póllɛ á kɔ̃.

Képah náh, ńwɔ̃́lɔ́ tɔ̃́nɔ́ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ sɔkɔ, á mɛ de sɔkɔ Alɛkisãdri kwil krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ yĩn-á kènìnìnɛ. Képah sõ̀ mɛ kwɔ̀vɩrɩ gbĩ́ tyɛ́nɔ́ syɩkɩ tɛ̃ Maltɩ gbɛ̃̀nyah sɔkɔ.
Áyáh kyɩ yĩni tɛ̃ Sirakusi kwil, á tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́ à sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́nɩ̀ pɩ.

Áyáh yal nɛ́npɔ́, à tyah n tɔrɩ n yuku krótókèlɛ yɔ vyãh tyɩ́, pópó à kyɩ de Wregbyo kwil. Ké dĩndallɛ, yã́hkɩ́ kõ wil á náh tĩ̀nnɛ à pɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, sèpĩ̀n nínì wrɔ́, á yĩni tɛ̃ Pusɔlɩ kwil, tɛ́ wil krótókè sɔkɔ.
Áyáh kyɩ nɛ́npɔ́, á kyɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yísyɔ́ wɛ. Pépi mɛ á ni, á kɔ̃ á wũ à sèpĩ̀n kwǎrninɔ pɩ pé tyɩ́. Képah náh, á sɔkɔ Wrome kwil.

Tɛ́ Wrome kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú-á fyɔ̀ á pìnɔ́ noh, pé túkù pɔ á yohnɩ, fɔ́ɔ́ Apyusi yòhntàhkɩ̀ sɔkɔ; pé túkù mó pɔ á yohnɩ fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ pè n ye Nɛ́pân twáh-ńtã̂n tɔ̃́nɩ̀nɛ. Pole-á fyɔ̀ pè wɛ sɛ̃́, à wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ ǹ nɩ sũ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, áyáh yĩni tɛ̃ Wrome kwil, pè ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ Pole kɔ̃ à kyɩ tɛ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sràsyí yɔ́ kɔ̃ à ǹnɛ n kyɔmɩ.

Képah sɔkɔ, sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́nɩ̀-á sɔkɔ, Pole Nsyifunɔ yah tãm ye ǹ tĩ̀nnɛ. Pǎh pɔ tuke mɔ, à yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pé no, pé náh sénsɔ̃ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ de pé no Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́, pé náh pé náh tãn wã̀l dêl pɩ, ǹtɛ pè pé tɛ̃ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pé dahbɩ Wrome tãn gbõ̀ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Wrome tãn-á pé piki yah tɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, pè náh pé tyípɩ́nɩ́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ, nɛ̂ yĩn-á pé yɩ̃nɛ pé ko mɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè mɛ nɛ páh pélɛ n fĩn n mɔ.

Tɛ́ Nsyifunɔ mɛ képah yahle. Képah-á, pé gbõ̀ yĩ́ĩ́ náh, pé mɛ pé gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ dahbɩ Wrome kwíltãm yõ̀tɛ̃̀ Sesar gbõ̀. Ńkɛ̃́, tɔ́kɔ́nkɔ̃nɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh pé nɛ pé tɔkɔ pé no Nsyifunɔ kɔ̃ dɛ́!
Képah yĩn-á pé kɔ̃ pé kè yah kɔ̃ nɛ, pé pè wɛ, pé mó yã́hkɩ̀ yãh pélɛ. Yisrayel tãn gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ pwáhnmɔ-ò nɛ̂ yõ, ǹmɔ yĩn-á kârn nɔ́pilɛ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ péwɔ gbã̀n sɔkɔ yɔ̀.

Képah sɔkɔ, pè mɛ yo Pole tyɩ́ nɛ, sɛ́bɛ́y yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh wil Nsyude gbɛ̃̀nyah, à pɔ pépi tyɩ́ ǹmɔ Pole tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Pé no Nsyifunɔ sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mó tɔ̃ wil nɛ́npɔ́, à pɔ tir yɔ́ yo pé tyɩ́ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ, à ǹ yĩ́po yo pépi tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ pépi-á pɩ̃ nɛ, wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á ǹnɛ, pǎh mɛ kélɛ n fwo ywɔ̃ ywɔ̃ pól sɔkɔ. Képah-á, ǹmɔ sõnɔ-á nɛ̂nɛ, páh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé kè noh ǹ vyãh sɔkɔ.
Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè mɛ wɛ̃ wɛ́nɔ́ yòh mɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Polelɛ.

Lésõ-á pɔ nɔ, wãn tɔ̃ mɔ pé wìlnɔ́ yõ, à pɔ Pole tyɩ́ ǹ twáhntɛ̃̀-ǹsah sɔkɔ. À mɛ tyah à Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n wah pé tyɩ́, à tɔkɔ séngbɔ̃́ tyɩ́, pópó à pɔ nɔ ńvɩ̃́ tyɩ́. À sõ̀ mɛ de Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu wɛlɔ sɔkɔ, à Yesu tyɩ́lɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè kè fɛ̃ syi.
Képah sɔkɔ, túkù ǹ tyi yónɔ́ fɛ̃ syi, ǹtɛ túkù mó sè yahle.

Ǹtɛ pǎh tɛ̃ wɛkɩ sah kwlɔ núkú yõ, tɛ́ n karkɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Pole tɔ̃ tyínúkú yɔ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, gbɩ-á Liyel Mirki wɛy mɛ̀nɛ, nɛ̂-á lésõ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò Yesayi yo pé náh tãn tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Kùkùtǎhkɩ̀ mɛ de no nɔ́pi nnɔ sɔkɔ.
Pè mɛ pé níkílɔ́ tah tũ,
tɛ́ pé yɩ̃́ vike sah;
nɛ ńkɛ̃́ pé yɩ̃́ káh kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ,
pé níkílɔ́ káh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ noh,
pé nnɔ kɔ̃ sè pɔ n yɛ kùkùtǎhkɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ,
pé mó vi mɔ ńmɔ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃,
ń kɔ̃ mé pè wɛ pwah mɔ.
Képah ye, kyɩ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ,
pǎh kɩ n nohnɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, tɛ́ pè náh ké tyɩ́ yah wɛ n pi.
Pǎh kɩ n yah dyěh sɛ̃́ yɔ̀, tɛ́ pè náh kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ n pi.»
Képah yóntɛnɔ náh, Pole tɔ̃ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Yé pɩ̃ nɛ, Liyel-á pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛy tɛkɩ mɔ névye tɔ tyɩ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Pépi tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ kè noh n pi.» [
Wǎh képah yo sɛ̃́, Nsyifunɔ yuku sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ yékã̂blɛ n pɩ n yuku képékèyɔ̂ pé wɛ̃ wrɔ́.]
Képah náh, Pole ye nínɔ́ tũ ǹ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ, wǎh sõ̀ nɛ̂ tɔkɔ de tɛ̃. Nónó pól-á sõ̀ n wil n pɔ ǹ tyɩ́, à sõ̀ mɛ pé póllɛ n tɛ̃ pallɛ.
À sõ̀ mɛ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo névye tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyilɛ nolɛ n kwɔ nɩ̀sãh sɔkɔ. Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ ǹ yahlɛ n kõ ké pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.
Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á Yesu Krista tõ̀npɩlɛ, ńmɔ ye n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ yé tyɩ́. Liyel ye ńmɔ ye pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ. À ń wilki sah nɛ mé pé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo.
Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ sah kénɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, à lésõ syɔ̃ ǹ tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu tyɩ́ à ké tyɩ́ yo sah ǹ wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ ǹgbò dùkùlɛ.
Ǹ Pídĩ́ tyɩ́ ye kè n yo, nɛ̂-á ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Kristalɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á pɩ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Davidi pétó náhkɩ̀lɛ ǹ pɔ́ndubinɔ sɔkɔ névilɛ.
Tɛ́ wǎh pɔ ku, tɛ́ ǹ lékó-á yilki mɔ, képah sɔkɔ Liyel Mirki mɛ kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Liyel Pídĩ́-á ǹnɛ, tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ-á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́.
