Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye ńmɔ yõ̀bènɔrɩ wɛ à pɩ ǹ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ, kɩ yìkìnì pól yohnɩ mɔ pè kɩ pɩ ǹmɔ yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ kɩ n sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, ǹ yĩn kɔ̃ kè kɩ n gbilki.
Kénɛ yìkìnì sɔkɔ névye ye yépi tɔlɛ, Yesu Krista-á yépi nónó ye pɩ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ.

Yépi nónó pól tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel tyɩ́ Wrome kwil sɔkɔ, tɛ́ à mɛ yé ye nɛ yé yé minnɛ n pɩ péwɔ tyɩ́ yõ, yépi tyɩ́ ye mé n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ápi Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, mé n wɛkɩ ń Sú Liyel ǹgbò tyɩ́ yépi pól tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ n yo kèkõyṍ pól sɔkɔ.
Mé mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́ ń nɩ póllɛ ǹ Pídĩ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹmɔ ńtɛ̃ ye ń tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, mâh nírílɛ n pɩ, máh ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ n mɛ yé tyɩ́lɛ n yo pé tyɩ́.
Máh ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ nɛ, péwɔ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀-à kɩ nɛ̂, pé wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ ń kɔ̃ sɛ̃́ mé n kyɩ n yah yé tyɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, pɔ n yah dékè mɛ ń kah tɛ̃ yé tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel Mirki-á nɛ̂nɛ ń kɔ̃, mé kɩ pɔ kélɛ yé kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á kɩ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃.
Képah ye kɩ á kɔ̃ á kɩ sṍré wɛ mɔ wɛ̃ sɔkɔ à yuku ápi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ.

Ń yṹnpyé, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé kè pɩ̃ nɛ máh kè yah kɔ̃ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ nɛ mé pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, mé pɔ tõ̀ wɛ n pɩ yõre-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á mé pɩ kélɛ yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Ǹtɛ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ náh mɛ tɛ̃ wɛ wɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ syɩ núkúnúkú tyɩ́ yɔ̀.
Mé yɩ̃nɛ mè Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú ànɛ̂ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ kǎrn pɩ́pú ànɛ̂ kǎrn pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂pú tyɩ́.
Képah ye, ké dékè mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ ń sɔkɔ nɛ mé pɔ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yépi tɔ tyɩ́, yépi nónó-á mɛ Wrome kwil sɔkɔ.

Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sen náh mɛ ńmɔ tɛ̃. Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ ye kélɛ nɛ̂-á névye póllɛ n pwah n mɔ nónó-à sɛ̃ ké yõ. Kè tyah Nsyifunɔ ǹgbò tyɩ́, tɛ́ pyě yĩni tɛ̃ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, képah ye n wɛ̃kɩ kélɛ nɛ Liyel-á mɛ névyelɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ó gbõ̀ yõ ye kè n pɩ, sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Névi nɛ̂-à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ min yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ wɛ képah gbõ̀ yõ.»
Yé yah, névye Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ ànɛ̂ pé tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ pól yĩnnɛ, Liyel tɛ̃ yĩ̂nyõ tɛ́ ǹ fɔ́kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ pè wɛ̃kɩ, pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pé tyítúkúnì tɔkɔ à gbɩ yah vike.
Yé náh wɛ di, névi-á fɛ̃ nɛ̂ pɩ̃ n pi Liyel tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ké sèndì náh pépilɛ dò. Liyel ye kélɛ pè wɛ̃kɩ.

Liyel tyi nónó-á sè náh n wɛ yĩ́nɛ, sépi nónó-á pɩ ǹ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́lɛ nɛ̂-á mɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ànɛ̂ wǎh mɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ tɔ́tɔ́; sépi mɛ fɛ̃ n pnɛ ǹ tyípɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ à tɔkɔ kèkõyṍ mɔ gbĩ́ dùkù tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, lénɔ̀ náh fɛ̃ n wɛ n pi névye tyɩ́ póllɛ.

Pè ye Liyel pɩ̃, tɛ́ pè náh fɛ̃ syi gbílkínɔ́ sah ǹ yõ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹnɛ. Pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛy nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ, pè náh kélɛ à kɔ̃. Ǹtɛ pè pyě sõnɔ wã̂nnɛ pé gblɔ̌y pilki, à pɩ lékã́m kɛ̃́ névyelɛ à de fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ.
Pé gblɔ̌y tɛ̃̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ lékã́m névyelɛ, pè pyě pɩ nɛ́wã̂nnɛ yɔ̀ sɔ̃́.

Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ sàhnɔ́lɛ kú-ńkɛ̃̂ Liyel yõ, pè képah vi mɔ n sah névye, ànɛ̂ kèpye, ànɛ̂ gbyẽ̂hnyẽ̂h yî, ànɛ̂ til til yî kètɔ̀ pɩ́nsàhnɔ́nɔ yõ. Tɛ́ névye ànɛ̂ kénɛ gbɛ̃́nkyɔ nɔ́pi pól kɩ mó tɔ̃ pɔ n ku n pi.
Képah ye Liyel yɛ pè kɔ̃ pè pé põ̌põ̌lɛ n pɩ, képah nɛ̂ dékè-á mɛ pé sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ sennɛ n pɩ pé gblɔ̌y tyɩ́.

Gbɩ nɛ̂-á yo Liyel tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pè képah vi mɔ pɩ mɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ. Pè mɔ mɔ Liyel sah tɛ́ ǹ yî mɔ́nɔ́ wɔlɛ n gbilki, tɛ́ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ sépi tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ ǹmɔ ye mó tɔ̃ yɩ̃nɛ gbílkínɔ́lɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ. Amiina!
Képah ye, Liyel mɛ yɛ pè kɔ̃ pè sen tyi ólɛ n pɩ nónó dékè-á mɛ pé sɔkɔ. Pé syɔ́ mɛ pɛ̀kɩ̀ yah tyi vi mɔ ké gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃̀náh yõ, mɛ n sɛ̃ wɛ̃nɛ.

Sɛ̃́ ó ye, díbí tɔ mɛ pɛ̀kɩ̀ yah tyi vi mɔ ké gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃̀náh yõ. Pè náh tɔ̃ mɛ n sɛ̃ syɔ́lɛ. Sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ wɛ̃nɛ, képah lédɔ́rɩ́ ó ye mɛ n ko pélɛ. Sen pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ tir ye pè mɛ n pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ mó pé mɔ́npunɔ lédyáhnɩ́ wɛ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ pélɛ.
Pǎh yahle Liyel pɩ̃́nɔ́lɛ sɛ̃́, à mɛ yɛ pè kɔ̃ pè pé sõnɔ túkúnì sõ̀ tɛ̃ à pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ tyilɛ n pɩ.

Tyíknɛ̌nɩ̀ duke pól ye pè mɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ tyítúkúnìnɛ, ànɛ̂ yĩ́sesúkúlɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́pékèlɛ. Dyɔ́yɔ́kè ó ye pé tõ̀lɛ, à tahlɩ nɛ́kókè mɔ́nɔ́ tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ mɛ́wɛ́ynɛ, ànɛ̂ yĩ́nvǐ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́túkùnì tyi pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ mɩ̀nɩ̀ sàhnɔ́lɛ névye yõ,

ànɛ̂ névye tyɩ́ yónkònɔ́lɛ. Pè pɩ Liyel sépɛ́bɩ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ vyã́hsenóhkɩ̀púlɛ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y gbílkípúlɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ̀ngbìl wɛ́kɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ pèkè yah wɛ́npɩpulɛ, ànɛ̂ dúbípú tyɩ́ yáhlepulɛ.
Pè pɩ lékã́m kɛ̃́ névyelɛ. Pàh nɛ̂ yo, pè náh kélɛ n pɩ. Kùkùtǎhkɩ̀ névye ànɛ̂ nɛ́pĩ́kɔbɩ ye pélɛ.

Tɛ́ pè mó tɔ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel-á mɛ kè yo sah nɛ, sɛ̃́nknɔ tyi pɩ́pú-á yɩ̃nɛ kònmɔnɔlɛ. Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, pè mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ tyi nɔ́pi póllɛ n pɩ. Tɛ́ pè náh mɛ yĩn sépi ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, pè mɛ mɔ sɛ̃́nknɔ tyi pɩ́pú tɔlɛ.

Áwɔ nɛ̂-á lékàhlɛ no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ n kɔ̃, wáh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ nɛ́dúkú nɛ̂nɛ, lénɔ̀ wɛ́-ńsah náh mɛ á tyɩ́. Á náh wɛ di, wáh lékàhlɛ no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ n kɔ̃, lékàh ye á á gblɔ̌ynɛ n kɔ̃, áwɔ tɔ-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, áwɔ nɛ̂-á lékàhlɛ pélɛ n kɔ̃.
Ápi pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ nónó-á kénɛ tyi dùkùlɛ n pɩ, Liyel-á kɩ pè tuke n pi à yɩ̃nɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ.
Áwɔ nɛ̂-á lékàhlɛ kénɛ tyi pɩ́púlɛ n kɔ̃, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ sɛ̃́nknɔlɛ n pɩ, á se mɛ n sõ nɛ wáh kɩ n pwah n pi Liyel tukey sɔkɔ?

Képah náh pɩ, Liyel pèpɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃, ànɛ̂ ǹ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩ, ànɛ̂ ǹ sṍmnɔ́ se á yahle mɔ́nkõ̀nɔ́lɛ? Á náh pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel pèpɔrɩ mɛ̀-á kɩ ǹ kɔ̃ á kɩ á nɩ vi mɔ kɩ tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ yal mɔ di?

Ǹtɛ á níkísekɔ́kɔ́ ànɛ̂ á nɩ táhntũnɔ yĩnnɛ, á mɛ Liyel plɔlɛ n gbah n yɔrɩ n mɔ á gblɔ̌y yõ, nɛ̂-á kɩ n pɔ n pi ǹ fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ sõlɛ, sõ nɛ̂-á à kɩ névye tuke n pi à yɩ̃nɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ.
À kɩ nɛ́núkù núkú pól dyah à yɩ̃nɛ pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀nɛ.
Nónó-á mɛ gbah tɛ̃ tyípéplɔlɛ n pɩ, nɛ pé kyɩ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ wɛ, gbílkínɔ́ mó nɛ n sah pé yõ, ànɛ̂ pé mó tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ, à kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ pépi kɔ̃.
Tɛ́ névye nónó-á yahle sàhnɔ́lɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ́ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ yahle tɛ́ pèkè pɩ́nɔ́ sõ̀ tɛ̃, à kɩ ǹ fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ pépi wɛ̃kɩ, tɛ́ kɩ fṍhnɔ́ sah pé yõ.
Yèvyãhrɩ ànɛ̂ tíkí képékè kɩ pɩ tyítúkúnì pɩ́pú pól tyɩ́lɛ. Kè kɩ tyah Nsyifunɔ ǹgbò tyɩ́, tɛ́ kɩ pɔ yĩni tɛ̃ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Ǹtɛ gbílkínɔ́, ànɛ̂ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́, ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩ kɩ pɩ tyípéplɔ pɩ́pú nɛ́núkù núkú pól tyɩ́lɛ. Kè kɩ tyah Nsyifunɔ ǹgbò tyɩ́, tɛ́ kɩ pɔ yĩni tɛ̃ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel náh névyelɛ n wah.

Névye nónó pól-á pè náh Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pnɛ tɛ́ tyípêl pɩ, kénɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ vyãh náh n wɛ n pi pépi tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ nónó pól-á tyípêl pɩ tɛ́ mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pnɛ, pépi kɩ n tuke n pi à yɩ̃nɛ képahlɛ.
Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyíyónɔ́ nóhpú náh Liyel n yah nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ dɛ́. Ké tyíyónɔ́ pɩ́pú ye.

Névye nónó-á pè náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pépi náh Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pnɛ, tɛ́ pé kɔ dùkù mó tɔ̃ pɔ yɩ̃nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yórélɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ pǎh pèpɛynɛ n pnɛ pé gblɔ̌y, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kɛ̃́nɛ pé tyɩ́.

Pè mɛ kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ képah sɔkɔ nɛ, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á nɛ̂ yo nɛ kè nɛ n pɩ, kǎh mɛ pé nnɔ sɔkɔ. Pé sõnɔ sɔkɔ, kèyǎhlɛ pè n nɛ n mɛ lékàhlɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kɔ̃, kèyǎhlɛ ǹ tɛ n nɛ n mɛ gbɩlɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kɔ̃.
Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂-á ńmɔ n yo, à yɩ̃nɛ képahlɛ, Liyel kɩ syɔ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ kɩ névye tuke n pi pé sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tyi pól tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Lésõlɛ, tyi nɔ́pi kɩ wilki mɔ kwèy.
Yépi nónó-á nɛ Nsyifunɔ-á yélɛ, yé mɛ yé gbõ̀ sah Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yõ, tɛ́ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah nɛ Liyel-á mɛ yépilɛ.
Tɛ́ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́-á nɛ̂nɛ, yé kélɛ n pnɛ kyɔ́! Yáh kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ wɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ, képah gbõ̀ yõ, yé pèpɛynɛ n pnɛ dò.

Kénɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, yé nɛ yé pnɛ̀nɔ́-á syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ yáh gbɩ pɩ̃ dal mɔ, tɛ́ núkú yuku yɩ̃́tũbi yahlɛ n tɛ̃, tɛ́ mɛ kyòolɛ n mɔ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ névye tyɩ́ yé yo kɛ̀? Yé mɛ vìnmɔnɔlɛ lékã́m kɛ̃́ névyelɛ n kɔ̃, tɛ́ mɛ wɛ̃́npì yrɔ̃́lɛ n kwɔ yé yo kɛ̀?
Yé mɛ no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ n kwɔ, tɛ́ yé náh yé gblɔ̌y wɔlɛ n kwɔ kɛ̀? Yé mɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ nɛ pè káh yɩ̃belɛ n yɩ̃, tɛ́ yépi wɔ n yɩ̃ kɛ̀?
Yé nɛ fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ káh nɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ yépi wɔ kélɛ n pɩ kɛ̀? Yé nɛ fal fal tã̀n tyɩ́ náh nɔ yé tyɩ́ póllɛ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ tã̀n vɩ̀ yîlɛ n yɩ̃ n tɔkɔlɩ kɛ̀?
Yé mɛ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah nɛ yáh Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pnɛ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ sé dêllɛ n pɩ. Liyel náh yé n yilɔ yɔ̀ di?
Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Yépi Nsyifunɔ ye yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ kɔ̃ pè Liyel yĩnnɛ n yɩkɩ.»
Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye, yõre mɛ kõ̀kè tyɩ́ yâh mɛ fɛ̃ n kɔ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l yõ. Ǹtɛ yâh mɛ sé dêllɛ n pɩ, yé kõ̀nɔ́ pɩ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ.
Kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ n kɔ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l yõ, Liyel kɩ tɛ̃̀ mɔ kõ kènkõbe sɔkɔ.

Yépi Nsyifunɔlɛ, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́ mɛ yé tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ yé se mó tɔ̃ kõ̀kè tɔ kõ. Tɛ́ képah fyé yõ, yé mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ dêllɛ n pɩ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névye nónó-á mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ, pépi ye kɩ pɔ lékàhlɛ yé kɔ̃ n pi.
Yé náh wɛ di, névi kõ̀nɔ́ náh n pɩ tɛ̃̀nɛ Nsyifulɛ. Kõ̀kè kõ̀nɔ́ nótɔ́lɩ́ tɔ náh n pɩ névilɛ Nsyifulɛ.

Liyel-à névi nɛ̂ nɩ vi mɔ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye n pɩ Nsyifu yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀lɛ. Kõ̀kè yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ tɔlɛ, Liyel Mirki ye n pɩ kélɛ nɩ sɔkɔ, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh. Nsyifu yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀lɛ, Liyel ye n sõ ǹnɛ, névi náh.
Wâh pɩ Nsyifulɛ tɛ́ kõ̀kè kõ, yõre se mɛ ké tyɩ́?
Ké yõre mɛ gblò yey yey póllɛ. Pépi ǹgbò gbõ̀ sɔkɔ ye Liyel dahbɩ ǹ wɛynɛ.
Ǹtɛ à, pépi sɔkɔ túkù-á yahle kɔ́lɔ́lɛ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, képah se kɩ pɔ Liyel tɔ kɔ à kɩ yahle kɔ́lɔ́lɛ ǹ tyi yónɔ́ sõ̀?
Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Névye pól sénsɔ̃ mɛ mɩ̀nyobelɛ, ǹtɛ kè yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ mɛ píkínɔ́lɛ nɛ Liyel wɔ-á n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀, sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ ǹ wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ:
«Á tyíyónɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ gbɩ yó-ò-á álɛ.
Pàh álɛ n tuke, gbɩ yɩ̃nɛ kè wɛ á tyɩ́.»

Ǹtɛ ápi kɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́-à kɩ pɔ kè kɔ̃ kè wɛ pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel-á mɛ tómm à, á kɩ tɔ̃ yo sɔ̃́ wɛ́? Képah se n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Liyel náh mɛ n kɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, wǎh ǹ fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ sɔkɔ fṍhnɔ́lɛ n sah á yõ? — Névi yõ̀tàhsyi sõ dùkù ye mé yah tɛ́ kélɛ n yo. —
Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Kàh mɛ sɛ̃́, tɛ́ Liyel kɩ tuke sɔ̃́ kèkõyṍ névyelɛ wɛ́?
Ǹtɛ ńmɔ mɩ̀nɩ̀ yónɔ́-à kɩ mɛ kè wilki mɔ nɛ Liyellɛ, gbɩ Liyel-á ǹnɛ ǹ yĩn kɔ̃ kè kɩ n gbilki à, sɔ̃́ pɩ tɛ́ lékàh kɩ tɔ̃ ńmɔlɛ n kɔ̃ á kɩ nɛ tyípékè pɩ́-ò sɔ̃́ ńnɛ?
Tɛ́ névye yĩn yɩ́kɩ́pú yísyɔ́ nɛ, ápi-á mɛ n yo nɛ pèkè-á yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n pɩ, nɛ̂-á kɩ n pɔ n pi pèpɔrɩlɛ. Lékàh ye yɩ̃nɛ kénɛ névye dùkù kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ.

Á yɩ̃nɛ à yo sɔ̃́ yɔ̀ wɛ́? Ápi Nsyifunɔ se fṍnfṍ névye tɛ́lɔ́ yõ? Póllɛ! Yé náh wɛ di, mé ye kè yo wah tɛ nɛ Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pé pól-á mɛ tyípékè mnɔ sɔkɔ,
sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ:
«Nɛ́gbɩ́ náh mɛ póllɛ.
Nɛ́núkù ńtɛ̃ fyé náh mɛ.
Lékã́m névi náh mɛ póllɛ.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ Liyellɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Pé pól ye wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ pèpɛy fĩn mɔ, tɛ́ mɛ mɔ pu wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Nɛy náh mɛ nɛ̂-á mɛ tyípépɛ̌ynɛ n pɩ.
Nɛ́núkù ńtɛ̃ fyé náh mɛ.
Pé yɩ̃̀ngbãhlɔ mɛ léyã̂l yey yɩ́kɩ́nmɔnsàhnɔ́ sɔ̃́.
Pě névyelɛ n vi n tɛ̃ pé nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́lɛ.
Pé vyɛ̃y wɛlɔ mɛ wahy sohrɩ sɔ̃́.
Plɔ yénmɔnɔ wɛlɔ ànɛ̂ wɛ̀npèl ó n nɛ n wil pé vyɛ̃y sɔkɔ.
Kàh pɩ nɛ́kókè mɔ́-ńsah yúkúnɔ́ wɔlɛ, pé gbáhkɩ̀ n nɛ n sal képah sõ̀.
Pépi syɔ̃̀-ǹtã̀n pól sɔkɔ, pě yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ pèkè ó kɔ́kɔ́lɛ n pɩ.
Yèvɩnɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃̀nɛ, pè náh képahlɛ n pnɛ.
Pè náh Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ póllɛ.»

Ǹtɛ á mó tɔ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á tyi nónó póllɛ n yo, sǎh mɛ sé yey mɔ sé wã̀l kɔ́pú tĩ̀nnɛ pé vyɛ̃y tũ yĩnnɛ, ànɛ̂ lékàh wɛ yĩnnɛ kèkõyṍ névye pól tyɩ́ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n pɩ n pi nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, Liyel ye kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ páh mɛ névyelɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ pé yah sɔkɔ. Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ vyãh náh mɛ ké sɔkɔ. Kénɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ ńtɛ̃ kè yo ó.

Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye Liyel névyelɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ. Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ sɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ, Liyel tɛ̃̀ pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, wǎhkɩ̀ náh mɛ ké sɔkɔ dò.
No pól ye tyípêl pɩ, pè kɔ̃ pè tɛkɩ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ pé tyɩ́, à pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á pwah mɔ pélɛ tyípékè sɔkɔ.

Yesu Krista ye Liyel tɔkɔ kɔ̃ sárkálɛ, nɛ ǹ tṍ kwɛ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, nónó-á sɛ̃ ǹ yõ, pé tyípêl yɔ̃ n mɔ pè kɔ̃. Képah álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Liyel-á mɛ tómm. Ǹgbòlɛ, à náh lésõ mɛ névye tyípêllɛ n mɔ n kõ,

à lésõ mɛ sṍmnɔ́lɛ n pɩ. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, à mɛ sélɛ n mɔ n kõ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ névyelɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ, nónó-á sɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ. Képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ wǎh mɛ tómm tɛ́ mɛ névyelɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ.
Gblɔ̌y gbílkí-ńsah se tɔ̃ mɛ névi tyɩ́? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ wɛ́? Kè náh tɔ̃ mɛ á kɩ nɛ pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sɔ̃́ mɛ n mɔ n kõ, Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ye mɛ n mɔ n kõ képah ye.
Yé náh wɛ di, ápi kɩ fɛ̃ kè yo nɛ névi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ó gbõ̀ yõ-á tɛ̃̀ n pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah. Kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔ̃́.
Tɔ̀dì Liyellɛ, Nsyifunɔ ó Liyel se ǹnɛ? No tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ Liyel náh ǹnɛ di? Àwe, no tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ Liyel ye ǹnɛ,
ǹmɔ ó-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ Liyellɛ. Ǹmɔ ye kɩ Nsyifunɔ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ kɩ tɔ̃ no tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Ǹtɛ kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ se mɛ pɔ á kɔ̃ á mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pɩ yõre kɛ̃́ kwâhlɛ? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́, yõre ye pyě á kélɛ n kɔ̃ yɔ̀ ńkɛ̃́.
Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo Abrahmɩ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á náh nɛynɛ? Kwâh nɛ̂ mɛ à fɛ̃ wɛ ǹ yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ?
Abrahmɩ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ yĩn-à sõ̀ nɛ Liyel à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ, à náhkɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah kɛ̀. Ǹtɛ à náh fɛ̃ képah pɩ Liyel yah sɔkɔ dɛ́.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Abrahmɩ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, Liyel mó à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ.»
Ǹtɛ kàh mɛ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tõ̀npɩ ye n wɛ ǹ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ lédyáhnɩ́nɛ. Nɔ̀nɔ́ náh à wɛ kélɛ dɛ́. À yɩ̃nɛ ké wɛ́nɔ́lɛ.
Ǹtɛ sɛ̃́ náh kélɛ Liyel tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ dɛ́. Névi nɛ̂-à sɔ̃́ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ tɛ́ fyɔ̀ mɛ sɛ̃ ǹ yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tyípêl pɩ́púlɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ, képah gbõ̀ yõ ǎ tɛ̃̀ pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ.
Liyel-á névye nónónɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀ mɔ́nkõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Davidi pé nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ wɛ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Névye nónó pílkí-ńtã̂n-á yɔ̃ mɔ pè kɔ̃, tɛ́ pé tyípêl mɛ niri pé tyɩ́,
pépi tyɩ́ nɔ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-à névye nónó tyípêl mɔ́nkõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ,
pépi tyɩ́ nɔ.»
Kénɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ mɛ̀nɛ, Nsyifunɔ ó tyɩ́ náh kélɛ dɛ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ pépi tɔ tyɩ́ ye. Á kè yo sɛ̃́ yɔ̀ nɛ, Abrahmɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah.
Ǹtɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂ mɛ Liyel pɩ ǹnɛ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ? Ǹ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ se, tĩ̂ ǹ kõ̀ntɛnɔ náh sɔkɔ se? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃, ǹ kõ̀ntɛnɔ náh sɔkɔ náh dɛ́, ǹ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ ye.

Képah náh sɔkɔ ye Liyel à kɔ̃ à kõ̀kè kõ. Kénɛ kõ̀kè kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ wǎh à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ǹ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névye nónó-á sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, tɛ́ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah, Abrahmɩ pɩ pépi súlɛ Liyel yah.
Tɛ́ pɩ kènkõbe tɔ súlɛ, nónó-á pè náh mɛ n yah pé kõ̀nɔ́ ó tyɩ́, pè mɛ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ Abrahmɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á à náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ sõ̀ mɛ kõ.

Yé yah, Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ Abrahmɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ náh tãn kɔ̃ nɛ páh kɩ kèkõyṍlɛ pè kɔ̃, kè náh pɩ á kɩ nɛ Abrahmɩ-á n kɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l yõ képah yĩn sɔ̃́ dɛ́, ǹ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩn ye nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, kàh sõ̀ mɛ pɩ nɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔ̃́ képah n wɛ, yõ se náhkɩ tɔ̃ mɛ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ ǹ vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́?
Yé náh wɛ di, tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ye n yilki n mɔ Liyel fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀nɛ. Tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-à n knɛ ńyãh sɔkɔ, ké dêl náh fɛ̃ n pɩ nɛ́npɔ́.

Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye képah n wɛ. Képah kɩ pɩ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ Abrahmɩ náh tãn pól tyɩ́. Tɛ́ kè náh pɩ nɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́pú ó tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ à pɩ kélɛ dɛ́. Nónó pól tɔ-á sɛ̃ ǹ yõ Abrahmɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, pépi pól tyɩ́ ye à pɩ kélɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, Abrahmɩ ye á pól súlɛ,
sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Áwɔ ye mé pɩ kwlo kwlo náhnáh.»

Tir nɛ̂-á kè náh sõ̀ mɛ gbõ̀ sah sah tɛ̃̀nɛ ké yõ, Abrahmɩ ǹ gbõ̀ sah képah yõ. À sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, képah yĩnnɛ Liyel mɛ à pɩ kwlo kwlo náhnáh névye súlɛ, sɔ̃́-á lésõ à yo kélɛ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, ǹ náh tãn-á kɩ pɩ dò.

Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, Abrahmɩ sõ̀ kè wɛ nɛ páh wah mɔ náhnáh. À sõ̀ mɛ ye lèkwɛ̌ vyãh yah sɔkɔ. Ǹ kyɩ Sara tɔ pɩ̀kɩ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ. Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, wìlkìnɔ́ náh pɩ ǹ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
À náh tɔ̀tɔ̀ pɩ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ mɛ̀ yõ. Ǹtɛ à tǎhkɩ̀ wɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, à Liyellɛ n gbilki.
Ǹ sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ sõ̀ mɛ ké yõ nɛ, Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ-á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ kè pɩ.
Képah ye, Liyel mɛ à mɔ kõ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ kǎh wãrkɩ sah Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Liyel à mɔ kõ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ.» Kè náh pɩ nɛ Abrahmɩ ó yĩn sɔ̃́ dɛ́;
ápi tɔ yĩn ye, ápi nónó Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á kɩ n mɔ n kõ n pi, áyáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu lékó yilki mɔ.
À lésõ ko mɔ ápi tyípêl yĩnnɛ, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ ǹ lékó yilki mɔ ápi pɩ yĩnnɛ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Ápi-á pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, yèvɩnɩ wɛ á wrɔ́ ǹnɛ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ.

Yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀-á yɩkɩ mɔ á tyɩ́ tɛ́ álɛ ké sɔkɔ yɔ̀, ǹmɔ ye dah mɔ álɛ ké sɔkɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Tɛ́ á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ ké yõ nɛ áyáh kɩ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ wɛ n pi, kè mɛ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ á tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ à wil képah sɔkɔ, yèvyãhrɩ ńtɛ̃ tɔ pɩ́nɔ́ mɛ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ápi tyɩ́. Yé náh wɛ di, á pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ yèvyãhrɩ pɩ́nɔ́-á névilɛ n pɩ gbáhntɛ̃-òlɛ,
gbáhntɛ̃nɔ mó névilɛ n pɩ tɛ̃́nwɛ-òlɛ mɔ́nyahnɔ gbĩ́nɛ. Névi-à pɩ tɛ̃́nwɛ-òlɛ mɔ́nyahnɔ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ n nɛ n mɛ Liyel yõ.
Ǹtɛ ápi nɩ̀gbɛ̀kɩ̀-á mɛ Liyel sɔkɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, à kélɛ á wɛ̃kɩ ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ wǎh képah nɛ̂nɛ á kɔ̃. Képah ye névi nɛ̂-à ǹ gbõ̀ sah ǹ yõ, sen náh tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ n pi.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel-á gbĩ́ nɛ̂ yah tɔkɔ sah, kǎh pɔ nɔ, Krista ku tyípêl pɩ́pú pwah n mɔ yĩnnɛ. Tɛ́ légbĩ́nɛ, ápi lésõ mɛ tǎhkɩ̀ kɛ̃́nɛ á sɔkɔ.
Névi nɛ̂-á kɩ fɛ̃ syi n ku n pi nɛ́gbɩ́ yĩnnɛ, tɛ̃̀ wɛ́nɔ́ kɩ tah. Gbɔ̀kénpɩ ǹnɩ̂ kɩ fɛ̃ fɛ̃ syi ku pèpɔrɩ pɩ́-ò wɔ yĩnnɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel-á kélɛ á wɛ̃kɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ nɛ á tyɩ́-á nɔ pé tyɩ́, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Ápi lésõ mɛ á tyípêl sɔkɔ sɛ̃́ tɛ́ Krista ku á pwah n mɔ yĩnnɛ.
Tɛ́ núkúnúkú, áyáh fyɔ̀ pɩ tɛ́ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ Krista kúnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, Liyel fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ wɔ yah se pyě à kɩ n yɛ n pi kõ̀nɔ́lɛ á tyɩ́?
Áyáh lésõ mɛ Liyel sépɛ́bɩ́lɛ, à á wrɔ́ tɔ̃ sah ǹnɛ ǹ Pídĩ́ kúnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Tɛ́ ǹ Pídĩ́ tɛ̃̀-á fyɔ̀ mɛ min sɔkɔ, à se kɩ pyě n yɛ n pi á pwáhnmɔnɔlɛ?
Tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, kè tɔ̃ mɛ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ á tyɩ́ Liyel yah sɔkɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩnnɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á wrɔ́ tɔ̃ sah Liyellɛ.
Yé yah, nɛ́núkù yɔ́ yĩn ye tyípékè de kèkõyṍ. Kénɛ tyípékè ye yɔrɩ mɔ kũnɛ. Tɛ́ névye pól mɛ kũ mnɔ sɔkɔ, pé pól-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ tyípékè pɩ...
Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ pɔ tyípékè wɛ kèkõyṍ. Ké pɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́nɛ, tyípékè mɛ̀ náh sõ̀ mɛ n mɔ n kõ.

Tɛ́ sépinɔ́ pól sɔkɔ, à tɔkɔ Adama gbĩ tyɩ́, pópó à pɔ nɔ Moyisi gbĩ tyɩ́, névye pól sõ̀ mɛ kũ mnɔ sɔkɔ. Pè náh sénsɔ̃ tyípékè pɩ Adama tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel dêl pɩ, ǹtɛ kũ sõ̀ mɛ pélɛ n tɛ̃. Névi nɛ̂-á sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ à pɔ, Adama pɩ ǹmɔ kètɔ̀lɛ.

Ǹtɛ tyípékè nɛ̂-á pɩ, kè náh mɛ sãh yah yah tɛ̃̀nɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ Liyel-á nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ. Gbɩ ye, nɛ́núkù tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyípékè yĩn ye névye náhnáh ku ó; ǹtɛ Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ á tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ wǎh syɔ̃ Yesu Krista tɔ gblɔ̌y núkúní tyɩ́ à pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ nɛ́kwĩ́nkí tyɩ́, sépi ye kal.

Liyel-á pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ, ké swɔ náh mɛ núkúlɛ nɛ́núkù tyípékè mɛ̀ tyɩ́lɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, nɛ́núkù tyípékè yĩn ye lékàh wɛ. Ǹtɛ névye tyípêl náhnáh pɩ́ntɛnɔ náh ye Liyel yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ pé tyɩ́ à pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ.

Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye nɛ́núkù tyípékè ye mɔ névyelɛ kũ mnɔ sɔkɔ ó, ǹtɛ Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ pɩ nónó tyɩ́ à pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ, pépi kɩ mɛ min sɔkɔ Yesu Krista gblɔ̌y núkúní gbõ̀ yõ, kɩ tɔ̃́rɩ́lɛ n pɩ.
Sɔ̃́-á nɛ́núkù tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ lékàhlɛ no pól yĩni tɛ̃, sɛ̃́ ó ye, nɛ́núkù tyípépɛ̌y pɩ́nɔ́ yĩn ye no pól kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Sɔ̃́-á nɛ́núkù Liyel yóré yáhlenɔ pɔ kénɛ névye náhnáh kɔ̃ pè pɩ tyípêl pɩ́púlɛ, sɛ̃́ ó ye, nɛ́núkù Liyel yóré fɛ̃̀nsyinɔ yĩn ye névye náhnáh kɩ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, képah ye pɔ tyípêl kɔ̃ sè kwel. Tɛ́ tyípêl-à kwel ńyãh sɔkɔ, Liyel n mó yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á kal sépilɛ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, sɔ̃́-á tyípékè névye pól dahbɩ kũ mnɔ sɔkɔ, sɛ̃́ ó ye, yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂-á Liyel n pɩ névye tyɩ́ à pélɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ, képah tɔ kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ pé pól kɔ̃ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ.
Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo yɔ̀ wɛ́? Á se yɩ̃nɛ à yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, Liyel kɔ̃ à yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ n gbah n pɩ á tyɩ́?
Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Ápi á náh vi tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ kɔ̃ á kɩ nɛ á sɔ̃́ ku. Tɛ́ á kɩ pɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ́ kɩ tɔ̃ pɔ á minnɛ n pɩ tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ?
Yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ, ápi nónó pól-á wel wilki ni sɔkɔ à kwrɔ mɔ Yesu Kristalɛ, á wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ mɛ̀-á mɛ á kɩ nɛ kúnɔ́ sɔ̃́ ápi tɔ ku ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ di?
Wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, ápi tɔ ye ku ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ yɩ̃ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ ǹ lékó-á yilki mɔ Sú Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ ǹgbɛ̃ gbõ̀ yõ sɔ̃́, sɛ̃́ ye ápi tɔ min pɩ dùkù vi mɔ pɩ sã́nnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, áyáh fyɔ̀ kwrɔ mɔ ǹnɛ à kũ dùkù núkú ku, ápi tɔ lékyɩ̂ kɩ pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Á yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh sõ̀ mɛ n pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ ǹgbòlɛ, áyáh képah kwrɔ mɔ syɩ Kristalɛ dahnɩ yõ à ké tyɩ́ yɩkɩ, tɛ́ wɛ wil tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, névi nɛ̂-à ku, tɛ̃̀ vyãh n dɛ tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ áyâh fyɔ̀ ku ànɛ̂ Kristalɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, á sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ nɛ áyáh kɩ á min pɩ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Ápi pɩ̃ nɛ Krista lékó-á yilki mɔ, à náh tɔ̃ n ku n yah n pi, kũ náh tɔ̃ tɛ̃ wɛ n pi ǹ tyɩ́.
Wǎh kũ nɛ̂ ku yɔ̀, tyípêl tyɩ́ yɩkɩ yĩn ye kṹmm à ku. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú wǎh mɛ min sɔkɔ, à mɛ ǹ minnɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, yépi tɔ yɩ̃nɛ yè pɩ̃ nɛ yáh yé náh vi tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ kɔ̃ á kɩ nɛ yé sɔ̃́ ku, tɛ́ mɛ min sɔkɔ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ.
Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á ye mɛ min sɔkɔ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, yé káh tɔ̃ yɛ tyípékè pɔ fyãh yé yõ, kè pɔ yélɛ n mɔ yé dyɔ dyɔ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ dɛ́.

Yé káh tɔ̃ yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀nnɛ tyípêllɛ n pɩ á kɩ nɛ tyípékè sɔ̃́ n tɛ̃ yé yahlɛ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ Liyel kɔ̃. Yé mɛ á kɩ nɛ yé sɔ̃́ ku tɛ́ yé lékyɩ̂ mɛ yilki mɔ. Yé yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n pól fĩn mɔ Liyel kɔ̃ sè pɩ tyígblɔ́ pɩ pɩ tõ̀npɩ̀yîlɛ.
Tyípékè náh tɔ̃ n dɔkɔ n tɛ̃ n pi yé yõ póllɛ. Yé náh tɔ̃ mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ dò. Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ yé tyɩ́, képah gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ ye yélɛ.

Á yɩ̃nɛ à yo sɔ̃́ yɔ̀ wɛ́? Áyáh fyɔ̀ mɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ á náh tɔ̃ mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ, képah se yɔ́ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀-á yɩkɩ mɔ á tyɩ́? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́!

Yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ yâh tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tyɩ́ yɔ̃bɩ sɔ̃́ yélɛ, tɛ́ n sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, yè n pɩ tɛ̃̀ yɔ̃̀lɛ kègbɩ yõ di? Sɛ̃́ ó ye, yâh n sah tyípékè tyɩ́ yõ, yè n pɩ ké yɔ̃bɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ kè n pɔ kũnɛ. Tɛ́ yâh n sah Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, yè n pɩ ǹ yɔ̃bɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ kè n pɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́lɛ.
Yé lésõ mɛ tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ yáh kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ wɛ, képah gbõ̀ yõ, núkúnúkú yé mɛ n sah Liyel yóré yõ yé nnɔ póllɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á ye wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́.
Yé wil tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ de gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Yépi tyi yah yáhnkwlɔnɔ ye ń kɔ̃ mé tyi nɔ́pilɛ n yo à yɩ̃nɛ névye pɩ dùkùlɛ yɔ̀. Ǹgbòlɛ lésõ, yáh yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n póllɛ põ̌põ̌ ànɛ̂ tyítúkúnìnɛ n pɩ, à Liyel dêllɛ n pɩ sɔ̃́; núkúnúkú, yé sélɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ, yè n nɛ n mɛ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ.
Yáh lésõ mɛ tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, nɛy náh mɛ yélɛ n kyɩ̃ n mɔ nɛ yé gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ.
Kénɛ tyi nónó-á lésõ yé n pɩ, kwâh nɛ̂ mɛ yé wɛ sɔkɔ sé sɔkɔ, à wil sen tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á mɛ yé yõ kwɛy mɛ̀ sɔkɔ? Sépi tyɛ́-ńsahlɛ kũ ye dò.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, Liyel-á yé wilki tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ, yé mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ǹmɔ tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ mɛ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́lɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ́ kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ n pi ké tyɛ́-ńsah.

Yé náh wɛ di, tyípékè lédyáhnɩ́nɛ, kũ ye. Ǹtɛ Liyel-á kwâh nɛ̂nɛ n yɩ̃ névyelɛ n kɔ̃, tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min ye. À képahlɛ névyelɛ n kɔ̃ pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
Ń yṹnpyé, yé tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye, máh kɩ nɛ̂ yo n pi yé tyɩ́, ké sèndì náh yélɛ. Névi tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ min sɔkɔ, à mɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, sê nɛ̂-à de pɛ tyɩ́, ǹ pɛ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ min sɔkɔ, à mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ fúr wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ tɛ̃̀ pɛ-à fyɔ̀ pɔ yah kwlɔ, à kɩ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ fúr wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ wàh de dĩ́ káhkɩ́ tyɩ́ tɛ́ ǹ pɛ sah min sɔkɔ, à kɩ n ye fɔ̀fɩ́npɩlɛ. Tɛ́ ǹ pɛ-à fyɔ̀ pɔ yah kwlɔ, à kɩ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ fúr wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Wàh de dĩ́ káhkɩ́ tyɩ́, fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ náh képahlɛ.

Képah núkú ó ye ń yṹnpyé, yépi wrɔ́-á kwrɔ mɔ Kristalɛ, kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ yé tɔ sɔ̃́ ku ǹnɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé náh tɔ̃ mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ ǹ lékó-á yilki mɔ, yé mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ núkúnúkú, nɛ̂-á kɩ á kɔ̃ á kɩ Liyel dyɔ dyɔ tyilɛ n pɩ.
Yé náh wɛ di, áyáh lésõ mɛ á dyɔ dyɔ tyilɛ n pɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ lésõ mɛ tyípékè dékè kɔ̃ kè á tɛ̃, á kɔ̃ á mɛ tyilɛ n pɩ nónó-á kɩ kũnɛ á yĩni n tɛ̃ n pi.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú kwâh nɛ̂ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ-á lésõ álɛ, áyáh á náh vi kè kɔ̃ á kɩ nɛ á sɔ̃́ ku, á ye wil Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀. Tɛ́ núkúnúkú á kɩ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́ pɩ dùkù késã́nnɛ ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ. Kè náh tɔ̃ n pɩ n pi ǹgbò tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ á mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ.

Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo yɔ̀ wɛ́? Tyípékè se Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Sépi gbõ̀ yõ ye ńmɔ pɩ̃ tyípékèlɛ. Sépi-à sõ̀ mɛ yó-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Káh yĩ́wílkìlɛ n pɩ!» Mé se náhkɩ pɩ̃ nɛ tyípékè-á yĩ́wílkì pɩ́nɔ́lɛ?

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ mɛ̀ ye wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ tyípékè kɔ̃ kè wɛ syɔ̃ à ńmɔ mɔ yĩ́wílkì duke pól pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-à sõ̀ mɛ n knɛ, tǎhkɩ̀ náh n wɛ n pi tyípékè sɔkɔ.
Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ pɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́nɛ, ńmɔ sõ̀ mɛ min sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á fyɔ̀ pɔ, tyípékè tǎhkɩ̀ wɛ
à pɔ ńmɔ min syi. Kénɛ tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ kè pɔ ńmɔ kɔ̃ mè min wɛ, képah ye pyě pɔ kũnɛ ńmɔ yĩni tɛ̃ yɔ̀ sɔ̃́.
Tyípékè ye syɔ̃ tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́ à ńmɔ pilki, tɛ́ kũnɛ ń yĩni tɛ̃.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ pól mɛ yályál. Sè mɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ plɛ.

Sépi nónó-á mɛ plɛ, sépi se n mɔ ńmɔlɛ kũ sɔkɔ? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Tyípékè ye. Sɛ̃́ ye kè wɛ̃kɩ dal mɔ ké gblɔ̌y dùkùlɛ kwèy. Kè pil pèpɛy náh, tɛ́ ń fike ko. Sɛ̃́ ye tyípékè pil pèpɛy náh tɛ́ gbah peke tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Á pól pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á wil Liyel tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ ńmɔ gblɔ̌y dyɔ dyɔ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé mɛ yɔ̃̀ sɔ̃́ ńnɛ pè tɛ̃ yãm tyípékè tyɩ́.
Kègbɩ yõ, máh nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ, mé náh ké dùkùlɛ n pnɛ. Mâh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé pèpɛy nɛ̂ pɩ, mé náh képahlɛ n pɩ. Tɛ́ ń dêl-á nɛ̂ wɔlɛ, mè n pyě képahlɛ n pɩ.
Ǹtɛ mâh ń dêl tirlɛ n pɩ, mé sah ké yõ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á mɛ plɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ńmɔ náh n pɩ kélɛ yɔ̀ dɛ́, tyípékè nɛ̂-á ń sɔkɔ, képah ye n pɩ kélɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, tyípépɛ̌y yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ ń gblɔ̌y dyɔ dyɔ tyi sɔkɔ. Tyípépɛ̌y pɩ́nɔ́ sõnɔ mɛ ń sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ké fɛ̃̀npɩnɔ tǎhkɩ̀ náh n wɛ ń sɔkɔ.
Mâh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé tyípépɛ̌y nɛ̂ pɩ, mé náh kélɛ n pɩ. Ǹ tɛ́ n pyě pèkè wɔlɛ n pɩ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ náh nɔ ń tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ mâh ń dêl tirlɛ n pɩ, ńmɔ náh n pɩ kélɛ yɔ̀ dɛ́, tyípékè nɛ̂-á ń sɔkɔ, képah ye n pɩ kélɛ.
Máh nɛ̂ kyɔmɩ wɛ ń gblɔ̌y sɔkɔ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Mâh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé tyípépɛ̌y pɩ, pèkè ó n nɛ n yĩn ń yah.
Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́ ń nɩ póllɛ.
Ǹtɛ mé kè kyɔmɩ wɛ nɛ, sépi nónó tyɩ́-á nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́, mâh nɛ mé sé wã̀llɛ n kɔ, kwâh yɔ́ n wɛ ń sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ sélɛ n fwo. Kénɛ kwâh ye mɔ sah ńnɛ tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ.
Ń yãm pɩ́nɔ́ dùkù tɛ̃̀nɛ n yah yɔ̀ lɛ́! Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ ó kɩ pɔ wɛ syi fĩn mɔ ńnɛ kénɛ kwâh tyɩ́, képah nɛ̂-á n mɔ ń yõ kũnɛ?
Liyel ye, ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ. Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ǹ yõ képah yĩnnɛ.
Mâh nɛ mé kè yo yõ̀tukulɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ mɛ ń tyɩ́ ń nɩ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ ń gblɔ̌y dyɔ dyɔ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé mɛ tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ.
Núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ, nónó wrɔ́-á mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Yesu Kristalɛ, Liyel tukey náh tɔ̃ n syɩkɩ n pi pé yõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel Mirki nɛ̂-á minnɛ névilɛ n kɔ̃ tɛ̃̀ wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ, képah ye wɛ wilki ńmɔlɛ tyípékè ànɛ̂ kũ mnɔ sɔkɔ.

Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh sõ̀ fɛ̃ képah pɩ n pi dò. Névye gblɔ̌y dyɔ dyɔ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ kǎn pɩ kélɛ képah ye. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Liyel mɛ ǹ Pídĩ́ tɛkɩ mɔ à pɔ dubi névi wil dùkùlɛ ǹ tyɩ́ ápi tyípêl pɩ́pú tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɔ, tɛ́ ku ápi tyípêl yĩnnɛ, sé tyɩ́ wɛ n yɩkɩ yĩnnnɛ névye sɔkɔ.
Ápi nónó-á á dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi wɛ yɛ, tɛ́ Liyel Mirki sõ̀ tɛ̃. Liyel kè pɩ nɛ á fɛ̃ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyíyónɔ́lɛ n pɩ. Képah ye à kɔ̃ à képah pɩ.

Yé náh wɛ di, névi nɛ̂-à yɛ ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi yah syi ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ sõnɔ n nɛ n mɛ ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi ó yõ. Nɛ̂-à mó yɛ Liyel Mirki yah syi ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ sõnɔ n nɛ n mɛ Liyel Mirki dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi ó yõ.
Wâh á dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi sõ̀ tɛ̃, ké syì-ǹsah n pɩ kũnɛ. Tɛ́ wâh Liyel Mirki dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ sõ̀ tɛ̃, ké syì-ǹsah n pɩ yèvɩnɩ ànɛ̂ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ́nɔ́lɛ.
Kègbɩ yõ, névye nónó dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi-á yah syi pé tyɩ́, Liyel sépɛ́bɩ́ ye pélɛ pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ yahle sàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yóré yõ. Pè náh fɛ̃ sé wã̀l kɔ ńtɛ̃nɛ dò.
Tɛ́ névye-à pé gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, Liyel yĩ́ náh n yuku pélɛ.
Yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, yé náh mɛ yé gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ. Liyel Mirki dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi ye yé mɛ n pɩ, képah nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ. Krista Mirki-à n knɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ náh mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
Krista-à mɛ yé yahlɛ n tɛ̃, yé kɩ sénsɔ̃ pɔ kũ n pi ó, ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, yé pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ à tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Liyel nɛ̂-á yilki mɔ Yesu lékólɛ, ǹ Mirki-à kɩ mɛ yépi tɔ sɔkɔ, yáh sɔ̃́ pɔ ku, yé lékyɩ̂ kɩ yilki mɔ kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Képah ye ń yṹnpyé, á yɩ̃nɛ à Liyel Mirki dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, á náh tɔ̃ yɩ̃nɛ à á gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyílɛ n pɩ.
Yâh yé dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, yé kɩ ku. Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ yâh yé dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi wɛ yɛ, yé kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel Mirki-à nónó yahlɛ n tɛ̃, Liyel wɛ̃́npì ye pélɛ.
Liyel-á ǹ Mirki nɛ̂nɛ yé kɔ̃, kè náh yélɛ n mɔ yɔ̃rɩ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ dɛ́. Képah ye pɩ yélɛ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ, tɛ́ yé fɛ̃ n yo yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ nɛ: «Bɔ̌, ápi Sú!»
Liyel Mirki mɛ̀ ńtɛ̃ ye á kɔ̃ á sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ ké yõ nɛ Liyel wɛ̃́npì-á álɛ.

Tɛ́ áyáh fyɔ̀ pɩ ǹ wɛ̃́npìlɛ, á vyãh kɩ wɛ pèpɔrɩ sɔkɔ, wǎh ǹ vyãhlɛ ǹ wɛ̃́npì kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Liyel-á pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ Krista tyɩ́, ápi tɔ vyãh kɩ wɛ ké sɔkɔ. Áyáh fyɔ̀ mɛ yèvyãhrɩlɛ n pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Kristalɛ, gbílkínɔ́ kɩ n sah n pi á yõ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Mé pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh mɛ yèvyãhrɩ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ kwɛy mɛ̀nɛ, képah náh mɛ sãh n yah yah tɛ̃̀nɛ gbílkínɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂-á kɩ pɔ n sah n pi á yõ ńsõ̂nɛ.
Liyel wɛ̃́npì-á kɩ gbílkínɔ́ wɛ n pi sɔ̃́, képah ye ǹ yî mɔ́nɔ́nɔ pól mɛ n dɛkɩ.

Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel yî mɔ́nɔ́nɔ pól mɛ yõre kɛ̃́ tǎhkɩ̀ yɔ́ gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ. Pépi dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀ náh nɛ kè pɩ sɛ̃́ dɛ́. Nɛ̂-á sah pélɛ ké gbõ̀ sõ̀, ǹmɔ ye pɩ kélɛ. Ǹtɛ gbõ̀ sàh-ǹsah tɔ̃ mɛ pé tyɩ́.
Sõ yɔ́ mɛ n pi, Liyel yî mɔ́nɔ́nɔ pól kɩ pɔ n wilki n pi yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ pɩ́-ò gbõ̀. Tɛ́ kɩ gbílkínɔ́ wɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ.
Ǹtɛ à pɔ syɩ kwɛy mɛ̀ tyɩ́, á pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel yî mɔ́nɔ́nɔ pól-á mɛ n gbĩ kúrntɛ̃́sè tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ yèvyãhrɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.

Tɛ́ kè náh yĩn pépi ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, Liyel-á ǹ Mirkilɛ ǹgbòlɛ ápi nónó kɔ̃, ápi tɔ mɛ n gbĩ á fɔkɔ táhlɔ́ sɔkɔ, mɛ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kìlɛ n syɩkɩ sõ nɛ̂-á Liyel kɩ kè wɛ̃kɩ n pi nɛ áyáh pɩ pé wɛ̃́npìlɛ, tɛ́ kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ dal mɔ.

Yé náh wɛ di, á ye pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ. Tɛ́ kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ sɔ̃́-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ névi ǹ gbõ̀ sah kwâh yɔ́ pɔ́nwɛnɔ yõ. Ǹtɛ wàh kè wɛ syi tɛ, à náh tɔ̃ ǹ gbõ̀ sah n pi ké pɔ́nwɛnɔ yõ dò. Wàh kè wɛ syi tɛ, à kɩ tɔ̃ ǹ gbõ̀ sah sɔ̃́ ké pɔ́nwɛnɔ yõ?
Ǹtɛ áyâh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ mɛ kwâh nɛ̂ wɛ́nsyi-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ǎ sṍmnɔ́ pɩ ǹ tɛ́ á gbõ̀ sah ké pɔ́nwɛnɔ yõ.

Sɛ̃́ ó ye, Liyel Mirki tɔ mɛ ápilɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ á tɛ̃́nkwlɔ́nɔ yĩnnɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, ápi náh pɩ̃ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ nínɔ́lɛ. Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ ápi tyɩ́ nɛ̂-á ápi náh fɛ̃ ké dùkù yah yo.
Tɛ́ Liyel nɛ̂-á névye fɔkɔ táhlɔ́lɛ n pnɛ, ǹ Mirki-á mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n yah n kɔ̃, ǹmɔ kélɛ n pnɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, ǹ Mirki nírílɛ n pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ à yɩ̃nɛ ǹmɔ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Á mó tɔ̃ pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ Liyel tyɩ́-á nɔ nónó tyɩ́, ǎ tyi póllɛ n pɩ pépi tyɩ́ pɛkɩ yĩnnɛ, pépi nónó-á à ye à yɩ̃nɛ wǎh kè yah tɔkɔ sah sɔ̃́.
Liyel-á nónó yah wilki ǹgbò dùkùlɛ, à ye kwãh tɛ̃ kè yah tɔkɔ tɔlɛ nɛ pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ pé Pídĩ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, ǹmɔ kɔ̃ à pɩ pé pól nɛ́nkyɩ́lɛ.
Wǎh kwãh tɛ̃ nónó yah tɔkɔ, à ye pè ye tɔlɛ. Wǎh nónó ye, à ye pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́ tɔlɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ. Wǎh nónó pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ, à ye yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pè kɔ̃.
Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo yɔ̀ wɛ́? Liyel-à mɛ ápilɛ, nɛ̂ kɩ fɛ̃ á fwo?
Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á à náh yɛ ǹ yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ Pídĩ́ kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ, à à mɔ kũ kɔ̃ ápi pól yĩnnɛ. À kɩ pɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ́ à náh yî tɛ́lɔ́ póllɛ á kɔ̃ à n tahlɩ n pi ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Liyel-á névye nónó yah wilki, nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ kɩ pɔ n tɔkɔ pélɛ n kɔ̃? Liyel ye pɩ névyelɛ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ.

Nɛ̂ kɩ tɔ̃ fɛ̃ Liyel tukey kɔ̃ kè kɩ syɩkɩ pé yõ? Yesu Krista ye ku, tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, ǹ lékó yilki mɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, à mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ Liyel gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ ápi tyɩ́.

Ápi tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ Krista sɔkɔ, kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ ké yah kõ n pi. Yèvyãhrɩ ò, tíkí képékè ò, fṍhnɔ́ ò, kwɛkɩ ò, kwâh kɛ̃́ ò, dlo ò, kũ ò, sé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ ké yah kõ n pi.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Áwɔ yĩnnɛ, ápi mɛ kũ dlo sɔkɔ sõmɛsṍ. Pè mɛ álɛ n pɩ á kɩ nɛ yípɛ̂y sɔ̃́ pè tɛ̃ n yuku kò-ǹsah sɔkɔ.»
Ǹtɛ sépi pól sɔkɔ, á tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel nɛ̂ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ á pɩ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀pu ǹgbnɔlɛ.

Gbɩ yõ, ápi tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ Liyel sɔkɔ, tɛ́ à syɔ̃ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ à kélɛ á wɛ̃kɩ, ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ nɛ, kwáhmɔ́nɩ́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ ké yah kõ n pi. Kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ kũnɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ minnɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩlɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́nɔlɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ kwɛy gbĩ tyilɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ ńsõ̂ tyilɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́nɔlɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ yĩ̂nyõ tǎhkɩ̀nɔ́lɛ ò, kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ sétáh sõwãh tǎhkɩ̀nɔ́lɛ ò, sé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ ápi tyɩ́nɔnɔ yah kõ n pi ǹ tyɩ́.
Krista tyɩ́ yõ ye ńnɛ. Képah ye, máh kɩ nɛ̂ yo n pi, gbɩ ye kélɛ, mɩ̀nɩ̀ náh mɛ ké sɔkɔ. Liyel Mirki ye ké sõnɔ dahbɩ tɛ ń sɔkɔ nɛ nɛ̂-á mé kɩ n yo n pi, gbɩ-á kélɛ.
Yèkwɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ ń sɔkɔ. Ń nɩ mɛ n sukɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, máh mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, ńmɔ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ náhkɩ yɩkɩ ànɛ̂ ń wrɔ́ mó gbɛ Kristalɛ ń yṹnpyé swɔ sɔkɔ, pé pwah n mɔ yĩnnɛ, pépi nónó-á ń yìkì névyelɛ.

Pépi ye Yisrayel nolɛ, Liyel-á nónó pɩ ǹ wɛ̃́npìlɛ. À yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pè kɔ̃, tɛ́ yégbékè kwrɔ mɔ pélɛ gbáyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ, tɛ́ tyi kõ sah pè kɔ̃, tɛ́ ǹ ni dùkùlɛ pè wɛ̃kɩ, tɛ́ ǹ vyãhlɛ pè kɔ̃.
Abrahmɩ, ànɛ̂ Yisakɩ, ànɛ̂ Nsyakɔbɩpi ye pé náh tãnnɛ. Yìkì núkú ye pélɛ Yesulɛ wǎh pɔ sétáh yõ. Ǹmɔ ye Liyellɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ yíyìn pól yõ. Ǹ yĩn nɛ n gbilki gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina!
Máh nɛ̂ yo sɔkɔ yõ̀tah, képah náh n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Liyel náh n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀. Ǹtɛ Yisrayel no pól náh pɩ Yisrayel no yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, Abrahmɩ wɛ̃́npì pól tɔ náh pɩ ǹ wɛ̃́npì yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ. Ǹ pídĩ́ Yisakɩ wɔ wɛ̃́npì ye kɩ n mɔ n kõ ǹ pétóbélɛ sɔ̃́-á Liyel yo kélɛ ǹ tyɩ́.
Mâh nɛ mé kè yo pallɛ, wɛ̃́npì nónó-á dubi gbɔynɛ, pépi náh Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ. Nónó-á dubi à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ, pépi ye ǹ wɛ̃́npìlɛ.
Yé yah, Liyel lésõ ǹ vyãhlɛ Abrahmɩ kɔ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Gbĩ́ yɔ́ yɩ̃̌nkɔ̃ gbĩ́nɛ, mé kɩ ń syɩ pɔ á tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ Sara kɩ mɛ dĩ́npir wɛ dubi.
Tɔ̂ɔ náh dɛ́, yé yah Wrebeka tɔ tyɩ́lɛ kɛ̀: Ápi sútó Yisakɩ mɛ̀ ye dubi à kɔ̃ dĩ́npì nɛ́pĩ̂ nímínɛ nónó-á kènìnìnɛ.
Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á wɛ̃́npì nɔ́pi náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ dubi, pè náh tyítúkúnì pɩ, pè náh tyípéplɔ tɔ pɩ. Ǹtɛ Liyel mɛ yo Wrebeka tyɩ́ nɛ: «Wɛ̃́npì nɔ́pi sɔkɔ, nɛ́nkyɩ́ tɛ̃̀ kɩ pɔ pɩ gbɛ̃̀ tɛ̃̀ yɔ̃̀lɛ.»
Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo yɔ̀ wɛ́? Liyel náh mɛ n kɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ di? À mɛ n kɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ kɛ̀.
Yé náh wɛ di, à yo Moyisi tyɩ́ nɛ: «Mâh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé pèpɔrɩ pɩ névi nɛ̂ tyɩ́, mě kè pɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ mâh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé névi nɛ̂ yãm yah, mě tɛ̃̀ yãm yah.»
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, képah náh n wil névi dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ ǹ gbáhntɛ̃nɔ sɔkɔ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ kè n wil Liyel ó tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á névi yãmnɛ n yah.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, Liyel-á yo Yesyipti yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ń tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ wɛ̃kɩ yĩn ànɛ̂ ń yĩn wil yĩn ye kèkõyṍ pól sɔkɔ, ń kɔ̃ mé ǹ pɩ yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ.»
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kàh Liyel dyɔ, ǎ ǹnɩ̂ yãm yah, tɛ́ kàh ǹ dyɔ ǎ ǹnɩ̂ pɩ kùkùtǎhkɩ̀ névilɛ.
Gbɔ̀kénpɩ túkù kɩ fɛ̃ nɛ, kwâh nɛ̂ se pɩ tɛ́ Liyel kɩ tɔ̃ n tɔkɔ névyelɛ n kɔ̃ nɩ? Nɛ̂ se kɩ fɛ̃ ǹ dyɔ dyɔ tyi yah kõ nɩ?
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ ó mɛ áwɔlɛ, tɛ́ á kɩ pɔ Liyellɛ n kɔ̃lɩ? Pĩ́n se kɩ fɛ̃ ké mɔ́-ò piki yah nɛ, kwâh nɛ̂ se pɩ tɛ́ à pé mɔ sɛ̃́ nɩ?
Pní mɔ́-ò tyɩ́ náh ǹ fãhrɩlɛ di? À kɩ fɛ̃ tyígbɩ́ pɩ pɩ pĩ́n mɔ kélɛ, tɛ́ kɩ tɔ̃ fɛ̃ ńyã̌n tyi pɩ pɩ pĩ́n mɔ kénɛ fãhrɩ ólɛ.
Liyel mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ wilki mɔ, pé mó pé tǎhkɩ̀ wɛ̃kɩ. Tɛ́ wǎh mó tɔ̃ sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ à ǹ fɔkɔ vyãh névye nónónɛ, à sṍmnɔ́ pɩ tɛ́ ǹ gblɔ̌y yɛ náhnáh pé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́-á mɛ gblò dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, à sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé kélɛ no tɛ́lɔ́ wɛ̃kɩ, wǎh pépi nónó yãm yah tɛ́ pè yah wilki sah ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ de yĩnnɛ.
Tɛ́ kénɛ névyelɛ, ápi ye. À náh á yah wilki Nsyifunɔ ó sɔkɔ dɛ́, ǹtɛ à túkù yah wilki yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ,
sɔ̃́-á Liyel kè yo sah Wose sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Névye nónó náh sõ̀ mɛ ńmɔ nolɛ, mé kɩ pélɛ n ye ń nolɛ. Yìkì nɛ tyɩ́ náh sõ̀ nɔ ń tyɩ́, mé kɩ kélɛ n ye ń dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ yìkìlɛ.
Tɛ́ ńyãh sɔkɔ-á lésõ kè yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńmɔ no náh pélɛ, nɛ́npɔ́ mɛ̀ ó sɔkɔ ye tɔ̃ pè kɩ ye pélɛ Min nɛ́tɛ̃̂ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ.»
Yesayi tɔ mó yo Yisrayel no tyɩ́ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yisrayel névye-à sɔ̃́ mɛ dò pnɛ yɔ gbɔ̀pɔ sèmìyã́hrɩ́ sɔ̃́, kwéy ó ye kɩ n pwah n pi pé sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃ Liyel-á tyi nónó yo, à kɩ sè pɩ dal mɔ súú sétáh yõ.»
Tɛ́ Yesayi tɔ̃ lésõ kè yo sah nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tyi pól tyɩ́ tɛ̃́nwɛ-ò TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃ Liyel-à sõ̀ mɛ á túkù sàh-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ min sɔkɔ, á duku náhkɩ to Sodɔmɩ ànɛ̂ Gbomɔrɩ névye tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.»
Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo yɔ̀ wɛ́? Névye nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, pépi nónó-á pè náh sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Tɛ́ Yisrayel no nónó wɔ-á pyě sõ̀ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ pé pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, pè náh wɛ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ képah gbõ̀ yõ.

Sɔ̃́ pɩ tɛ́ pé náh wɛ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ wɛ́? Pè náh sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, pè sõ̀ wɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀-á kɩ fɛ̃ pé pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah képah ye. Pé gbáhkɩ̀ ye pyě pè mɩ pé wilki n mɔ mɔ dáhkɩ̀ tyɩ́ yɔ̀ sɔ̃́.

Kénɛ dáhkɩ̀lɛ, Yesu Krista ye. Képah tyɩ́ ye wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yé yah, mé kɩ gbáhkɩ̀ mɩ mɩ dáhkɩ̀ yɔ́ sah Siyõ kwil sɔkɔ. Névye wilki n mɔ mɔ tɛ́dáhkɩ̀ yɔ́ ye kélɛ. Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à ǹ gbõ̀ sah ké yõ, sen náh tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ n pi.»
Ń yṹnpyé, máh mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ ń nɩ póllɛ, képah ye nɛ Nsyifunɔ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ. Mé mɛ Liyellɛ n ni pé tyɩ́ képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, mé kɩ fɛ̃ kè yo nɛ pǎh mɛ gbah tɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, ǹtɛ pǎh mɛ kélɛ n pɩ yɩ̃́tũri sɔkɔ.
Liyel-á névilɛ n pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ ǹ yah sɔkɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, pè náh kè pɩ̃. Tɛ́ pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tyɩ́lɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ Liyel tyɩ́ wɔ yahle.
Krista ye pɔ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyi pɩ syɩ sé yĩn tyɩ́. Névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ Krista yõ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.

Névi-á fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, Moyisi-á nɛ̂ wãrkɩ ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ kè wɛ yɔ̀: «Névi nɛ̂-à tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ tyíyónɔ́lɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ ǹ minnɛ n pɩ sépi gbõ̀ yõ.»

Ǹtɛ névi-á n pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ nɛ: «Káh nɛ n sõ á fɔkɔ sɔkɔ nɛ: ‹Nɛ̂ kɩ dɔkɔ kyɩ yĩ̂nyõ?›» Nɛ̂ kɔ́r-á, kɩ kyɩ Krista kɔ̃ à kɩ tiki pɔ.
Képah náh pɩ: «Nɛ̂ kɩ tiki yuku sétáh sõwãh?» Nɛ̂ kɔ́r-á, kɩ kyɩ Krista kɔ̃ à kɩ wil lékókwíl kɩ dɔkɔ pɔ.
Ǹtɛ tir nɛ̂ mɛ tɔ̃ yónɔ́lɛ wɛ́? Kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ: «Liyel wɛy mɛ á tnɔ̂. Kè mɛ á vyãh sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ á nɩ sɔkɔ.» Kénɛ wɛynɛ, Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛy ye kélɛ, áyáh mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n yo n kɔ̃.
Wâh kè yo á vyãhlɛ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ-á Yesu Kristalɛ, tɛ́ sɛ̃ ké yõ á nɩ sɔkɔ nɛ Liyel-á ǹ lékó yilki mɔ, á kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ.
Wâh sɛ̃ Liyel yõ á nɩ sɔkɔ, képah álɛ n pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ; ànɛ̂ wâh kè yo á vyãhlɛ, képah álɛ n pwah n mɔ.
Á náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ Krista yõ, sen náh tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ n pi.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, wǎhkɩ̀ náh mɛ Nsyifunɔ wrɔ́ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ núkú ó ye mɛ pé pól tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ no pól tyɩ́ nónó-á ǹnɛ n ye n gbo.
Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Névi nɛ̂-à Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ye gbo, tɛ̃̀ kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ.»
Ǹtɛ sɔ̃́ mɛ pè kɩ ye gbo ǹnɛ, nɛ́ pè náh sɛ̃ ǹ yõ? Ǹ tyɩ́ wɛ́nnoh-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, pè kɩ sɛ̃ sɔ̃́ ǹ yõ? Pè kɩ wɛ noh sɔ̃́ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ nɛ́ nɛy náh ǹ tyɩ́ wɛ yo pé tyɩ́?

Tɛ́ sɔ̃́ mɛ Liyel wɛy kɩ yo, nɛ́ névi náh tɛkɩ mɔ ké yo yĩnnɛ? Képah ye kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Kè mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ wâh Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yópú wɛ pè pé gbáhkɩ̀ tɔkɔ n pi.»
Ǹtɛ no pól se yɔ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir fɛ̃ syi? Yé yah, Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò Yesayi lésõ mɛ píkínyahnɔlɛ n pɩ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, ápi-á tir nɛ̂nɛ n yo, nɛ̂ sɛ̃ ké yõ?»
Sɛ̃́ ye Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ n wɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nóhnɔ́ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir mɛ̀nɛ mó, Yesu Krista tyɩ́ yónɔ́ ye.

Ǹtɛ à; pè náh ǹ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ noh yah di? Pè kè noh kyɔ́! Kè mɛ yónɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Pé yĩ́npɔ̃́ mɛ n dɔkɔ sétáh yõ pól sɔkɔ, pé wɛy mɛ n yĩni n tɛ̃ kèkõyṍ tã̀ntã̀n pól tyɩ́.»

Ǹtɛ à; Yisrayel no náh lésõ Liyel wɛy mɛ̀ syɩ́kɩ́-ńsah pɩ̃ di? Moyisi mó tɔ̃ kwãh tɛ̃ kè yo nɛ Liyel-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Mé kɩ kè pɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ yìkì fṍrɔɔ yɔ́ yèwannɛ n yah. Yìkì nɛ̂ névye-á lékã́m kɛ̃́ névyelɛ, mé kɩ kè pɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ pé dyɔlɛ n yɔ.»

Yesayi ǹ nɩ syãh kè yo ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ Liyel-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Névye nónó náh sõ̀ mɛ ńmɔlɛ n yah n kɔ̃, pépi ye wɛ ńnɛ. Névye nónó náh sõ̀ mɛ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ń tyɩ́, mé ń gblɔ̌ynɛ pépi wɛ̃kɩ.»
Ǹtɛ Yisrayel no tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, Yesayi nɛ Liyel-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ mè n nɛ n mɛ ń gbã̀n yɩkɩ mɔ pè syɩkɩ n tɛ̃, pépi nónó-á nòhnɩ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ ànɛ̂ kèlékɛ̃ névyelɛ.»
Ǹtɛ-à, Liyel se ǹ náh vi ǹ no Yisrayel tãn kɔ̃? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́! Yé náh wɛ di, ńmɔ tɔlɛ Yisrayel nɛy ye dò. Abrahmɩ náh nɛy yɔ́ ye ńnɛ, nɛ̂-á wil Bɛ̃nsyamɛ yìkì sɔkɔ.

Liyel náh ǹ náh vi ǹ no kɔ̃ wǎh kwãh tɛ̃ nónó yah wilki sah dɛ́. Yé se kɩ nɛ yé pɩ̃́nɔ́ náh mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ, kǎh mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ Yeli-á sõ̀ mɛ n tɔkɔ Yisrayel nolɛ n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́
nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, pè ye á tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu ko mɔ, tɛ́ sárká súkɛ́nkɔ̃-ńtã̂n yɩkɩ nónó-á mɛ áwɔ tyɩ́ yõ. Ńmɔ ó wũ ń gblɔ̌y, tɛ́ pè tɔ̃ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ń kònmɔ-ńsahlɛ.»
Ǹtɛ sɔ̃́ mɛ Liyel yo ǹ tyɩ́? À nɛ: «Mé ye díbí nɛ̂pĩ̂ kèyõ tɔ̃́nɔ́ kyɛgbãm (7 000) wilki sah ń gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, nónó-á pè náh gbètukunɔ di fal fal tõ̀ Baal yah sɔkɔ à kè gbilki.»
Képah núkú ó ye kwɛy mɛ̀ tɔ sɔkɔ, névye kwéy yísyɔ́ mɛ wũ tɛ̃ Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ nónó tyɩ́ à pè yah wilki.
Ǹtɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩ-à kɩ nɛ̂ Liyel pɩ pé tyɩ́ à pè yah wilki, pé tyɩ́pɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ náh mó tɔ̃ kɛ̀. Kàh mɛ sépi gbõ̀ yõlɛ, yõ̀bènɔrɩ náh mó tɔ̃ dò.
Sɔ̃́ mɛ ápi kɩ yo yɔ̀ wɛ́? Yisrayel no-á nɛ̂nɛ n yah n kɔ̃, pé pól náh kè wɛ. Ǹtɛ Liyel-á nónó yah wilki pé sɔkɔ, pépi ó wɛ kélɛ tɛ́ tɛ́lɔ́ wɔ ní mɛ tah tũ
sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Liyel ye pè pɩ tõ̌rɔ̀ɔ̀. À pé yɩ̃́ pɩ sè náh mɛ n yah, tɛ́ pé ní pɩ sè náh mɛ n nohnɩ, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ syɩ kwɛy mɛ̀ tyɩ́.»
Yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Davidi tɔ tɔ̃ kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Pé yõke yɩ̃nɛ kè pɩ pé tyɩ́ pé tɛ̃ tɛ̃ vyɔ́nɛ, ànɛ̂ pé tɛ̃ tɛ̃ kɛ̃́ynɛ, ànɛ̂ pé wilki n mɔ mɔ kwâhlɛ, kɩ pé tyítúkúnìnɛ pè dyah.
Pé yɩ̃́ mó nɛ mɛ syìì, pè káh fɛ̃ nɛ n yah, pè mó nɛ mɛ kwlɔ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ tɔ́kɔ́bɩ́ sɔ̃́ mɛ pé yõ.

Ǹtɛ-à, Yisrayel no-á pé gbáhkɩ̀ mɩ syɩkɩ sɛ̃́-à, pè se kɩ wũ tɛ̃ sɛ̃́ kṹmm? Sɛ̃́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh dɛ́. Ǹtɛ pépi-á pilki, yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ mó pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, pépi Nsyifunɔ kɔ̃ pè pé yèwannɛ n yah.

Ǹtɛ pépi-à pílkínɔ́-à kɩ mɛ pɩ pèpɔrɩ wɛ́nɔ́lɛ kèkõyṍ névye tyɩ́, tɛ́ pé tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ mɛ pɩ pèpɔrɩ wɛ́nɔ́lɛ yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ à, pépi-à pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ tɛ, képah náh n pɩ n pi pèpɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ kal di?
Yépi nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, yépi tyɩ́ ye mé n yo wɛy mɛ̀nɛ núkúnúkú. Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi ye ńmɔlɛ nɛ̂-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yépi yĩnnɛ. Tõ̀ mɛ̀ mɛ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́,
nɛ̂-á kɩ á no Nsyifunɔ kɔ̃ kè kɩ yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ yèwannɛ n yah, ń kɔ̃ mé kɩ pé túkù wɛ pwah mɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel-á pè gbɛ milki képah-à mɛ kèkõyṍ névye wrɔ́ tɔ̃ sah Liyellɛ à, wàh tɔ̃ pɔ pé ye kwrɔ́ ǹnɛ, kè kɩ pɩ sɔ̃́ wɛ́? Kè náh n pɩ n pi á kɩ nɛ lékyɩ̂ sɔ̃́ yilki mɔ di?
Sèmukɔ pye nónó-á ko gbrolɛ, sépi-à kɩ mɛ wilki sah Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, sé tɛ́lɔ́ pól tɔ mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ. Séswɔ̂ sémîn-à mɛ sàhnɔ́lɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ, ké yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n tɔ kɩ mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.

Nsyifunɔ mɛ wólívî séswɔ̂ sṍnɔ́ sɔ̃́, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ ké yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n kɔ̃lɩ. Tɛ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pépi mó mɛ á kɩ nɛ kyẽh sɔkɔ wólívî séswɔ̂ sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á Liyel ké yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n kɔ̃lɩ kyɩ pukubi wólívî yòhkɩ̀ sṍnɔ́ tyɩ́. Yáh Liyel yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ wɛ, képah n wil Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́-á wólívî séswɔ̂ sṍnɔ́ nìkì n yohnɩ n mɔ yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n púkúbínɔ́lɛ.
Képah ye, yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n nónó-á Liyel kɔ̃lɩ kwɛ, yé káh sélɛ n yilɔ. Yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah, yépi tyɩ́ náh sémînnɛ, pépi tyɩ́ ye sélɛ.
Yé kɩ fɛ̃ ń syah nɛ, Liyel-á yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n nɔ́pi kɔ̃lɩ to tɛ́ yépi wɛ pukubi.

Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye, pépi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ ye Liyel kɔ̃ à pè kɔ̃lɩ to tɛ́ yépi wɛ pukubi pé swɔ sɔkɔ yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Yé náh yɩ̃nɛ yè yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki. Kè pyě yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n mɛ tíkílɛ yé tyɩ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ ńkɛ̃́.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel-à mɛ yɛ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ séswɔ̂ sṍnɔ́ yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n kɔ̃̀lɩ̀nɔ́lɛ, yépi wɔ se pyě à kɩ wɛ yɛ yâh sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ yõ?
Yé yah, Liyel plɛ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ peke. À peke pílkípú yõ, tɛ́ n pɩ plɛ yépi tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ yé yɩ̃nɛ yè nɛ n mɛ ǹ pèpɔrɩ mɛ̀nɛ n pnɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Képah-à pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, yé tɔ kɩ kɔ̃lɩ milki.
Ǹtɛ Nsyifunɔ tɔ-à kɩ pé kèlékɛ̃ pɩ́nɔ́ yal mɔ tɛ́ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, Liyel kɩ pè tɔ̃ pukubi séswɔ̂ sṍnɔ́ tyɩ́. Tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɩ ǹ syɩ pè tɔ̃ pukubi.

Yé náh wɛ di, yépi nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, yé mɛ á kɩ nɛ kyẽh sɔkɔ wólívî séswɔ̂ sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á Liyel ké yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n kɔ̃lɩ kyɩ pukubi wólívî yòhkɩ̀ sṍnɔ́ tyɩ́. Nsyifunɔ mó mɛ wólívî séswɔ̂ sṍnɔ́ yɩ̃̀ngbã̀n tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ nónó-á Liyel kɩ pè tɔkɔ pukubi sé séswɔ̂ tyɩ́.

Ń yṹnpyé, mé kɩ Liyel tir wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́ yah yo wah yé syah, sɔ̃̀nko yè káh n pɔ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɔkɔ n pɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́púlɛ. Yé yah, Yisrayel no túkù kɩ wũ tɛ̃ níkísekɔ́kɔ́ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, pópó kɩ pɔ nɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pè kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, tɛ́ kɩ de Liyel no sɔkɔ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Yisrayel no pól kɩ pyě pwah sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Pwáhnmɔ-ò kɩ wil Siyõ kwil sɔkɔ. À kɩ pɔ Nsyakɔbɩ no tyípêl tɔ́kɔ́bɩ́ tɛ̃ yõ pé yõ.
Ńmɔ Liyel-á kɩ pɔ pé tyípêl yɔ̃ mɔ pè kɔ̃, tɛ́ kɩ yégbékè nɛ̂ kwrɔ n mɔ n pi pélɛ, képah ye yɔ̀.»

Yah yɔ́lɛ, Liyel sépɛbɩ́ ye Yisrayel nolɛ pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yahle, tɛ́ képah wɔ mó nɛkɩ yépilɛ. Ǹtɛ yah yɔ́lɛ, pépi ye sõ̀ à yah tɔkɔ pɩ ǹ nolɛ. Pé tyɩ́ nɔ ǹ tyɩ́ pé náh tãn yĩnnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel-à kwâhlɛ névi kɔ̃, à náh ǹ yahlɛ n vi kélɛ n syi póllɛ. Wàh névi nɛ̂ ye, à náh ǹ nahlɛ n vi tɛ̃̀nɛ n kɔ̃ póllɛ.
Ǹgbòlɛ, yé lésõ mɛ Liyel yóré yahle. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, Nsyifunɔ tɔ-á ǹ yóré yahle, à mɛ yépi yãm yah.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, Liyel yóré nɛ̂-á pè yahle núkúnúkú yɔ̀, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ yépi yãm yah, pépi tɔ yãm yah yĩn ye à pɩ képahlɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel yɛ no pól kɔ̃ pè ǹ yóré yahle pé pól yãm wɛ n yah yĩnnɛ.
Liyel pèpɔrɩ mɛ gblò dɛ́! Lékã́m mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ sɔkɔ, ǹ fɔkɔ se mó tɔ̃ mɛ dényĩnɔlɛ. Ǹ tyi tɛ̃ dùkù náh fɛ̃ n pɩ̃, ǹ syɔ̃̀-ǹtã̀n tɔ náh fɛ̃ n pɩ̃ lɔ́.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sõnɔlɛ n pnɛ wɛ́?
Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ fɛ̃ vìnmɔnɔlɛ à kɔ̃?
Nɛ̂ kwâh yɔ́lɛ à kɔ̃,
tɛ́ à pɔ ké lédyáhnɩ́nɛ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃ náhlɛ?»
Yé náh wɛ di, yíyìn pól wil ǹmɔ tyɩ́. Ǹmɔ mɔ́nɔ́ ye sé póllɛ. Sé pól mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ. Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ǹ yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina!

Ń yṹnpyé, Liyel pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ ápi tyɩ́, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ Liyel kɔ̃ yé sɔ̃́ pɩ sárkálɛ ǹ tyɩ́. Yè mó yé minnɛ n pɩ yályál ǹ yah sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á kɩ ǹ yĩ́ yuku. Képah ye Liyel gbilki dùkù pèpɛynɛ, yáh yɩ̃nɛ yè nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ.

Yé káh kèkõyṍ névyelɛ n yah n pɩ. Ǹtɛ yé yɛ Liyel kɔ̃ à lékã́m késã́nnɛ yé kɔ̃ sɔ̃̀nko yé vi mɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, tyi nónó tyɩ́-á mɛ Liyel tyɩ́, yé kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ sélɛ n wah n pnɛ. Sépi ye pɩ tyi tyípéplɔlɛ, ànɛ̂ nónó tyɩ́-á nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ nónó-á sǒhkɩ̀ kɛ̃́nɛ.

Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́, képah yĩnnɛ mé kélɛ n yo yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól tyɩ́ nɛ, yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki n kah n mɔ. Yé yɛ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔ sõnɔ nɛ n mɛ yé sɔkɔ, à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól kɔ̃ sɔ̃́.
Yé náh wɛ di, wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkú núkú ye á pól tyɩ́, tɛ́ tã̀ntã̀nnɛ sé tyɩ́ dò, nónó-á sé pól pɩ pɩ tyi mɛ sé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ.

Sɛ̃́ ó ye, ápi tɔ mɛ dò, ǹtɛ á pól pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ. Á pól kwrɔ mɔ pɩ núkúlɛ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ nónó yétõ̂-á mɛ wɛ̃nɛ n tɛ̃.
Liyel-á pèpɔrɩ pɩ á tyɩ́ à nónónɛ á kɔ̃, sè mɛ sé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ. Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè syínyonɔlɛ, tɛ̃̀ kélɛ nɛ n pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ.
Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ sónmɔnɔlɛ névye tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ nɛ n so n mɔ pé tyɩ́. Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ névye kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ̃̀ névyelɛ n kwɔ.

Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ névye vìnmɔnɔlɛ, tɛ̃̀ névyelɛ n vi n mɔ. Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ névye tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ kélɛ nɛ n pɩ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩ sɔkɔ. Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ névye yah tɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ̃̀ gbah tɛ̃ ké sɔkɔ. Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à kɩ mɛ névye yãm yáhnɔ́lɛ, tɛ̃̀ kélɛ n pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Yé yɩ̃nɛ yé tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ fɔ̀kɔ̀kwĩ̌nkì kɛ̃́nɛ ké sɔkɔ. Yé pèkè pɩ́nɔ́ yal n mɔ pnɛ́pnɛ́, yè mó pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ.
Yé yɛ yé tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yṹnpíkì núkú tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Yé gbah tɛ̃ yè yõ̀yénnɛ n sah wɛ̃ yõ.
Yé klɛ́yklɛ́ynɛ n pɩ, yé káh pɩ gbãndal névyelɛ. Yé tõ̀lɛ n pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yé nnɔ póllɛ.
Yé gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ nɛ̂ yõ, yé nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ képah yĩnnɛ. Yé sṍmnɔ́lɛ n pɩ yèkwɔrɩ gbĩ́nɛ. Yé gbah n tɛ̃ nírí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé yé yṹnpyélɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ pé fyã̀h-ǹtã̀n sɔkɔ, yé mó nɛ́pânnɛ n tɛ̃ plɛ.
Nónó-á yélɛ n fõh, yé sãmnɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ. Yé sãmmnɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ, yé káh léplɔlɛ n ye n mɔ pé yõ.
Nónó-à mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, yé nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Nónó-à mó mɛ gbní sɔkɔ, yé nɛ n mɛ gbní sɔkɔ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yé yé fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ. Yé káh pɩ gblɔ̌y gbílkípúlɛ, yé yɛ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔ tyɩ́ nɔ yé tyɩ́. Yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́púlɛ.
Yé káh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ̀ ńtɛ̃ pèkè pɩ́nɔ́ wɔ́ dɛ ǹ sɔkɔ. Yé pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ no pól tyɩ́.
Kàh kɩ mɛ yépi tɛ̃̀ ó sɔ̃́, yé gbah n tɛ̃ yé minnɛ n pɩ yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ no póllɛ kàh kɩ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi.

Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, yé káh nɛ yáh yé gblɔ̌y vyãhlɛ n syi, yé kè toh Liyel syɩ̃. Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Ńmɔ tyɩ́ ye vyãh syínɔ́lɛ, ńmɔ ye n dɛ wɔ́lɛ.»
Tɛ́ tɔ̃ yo ké fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ: «Á sépɛ-à mɛ kwɛkɩ sɔkɔ, yɩ̃ à kɔ̃ à yõ; wàh mɛ níkì sɔkɔ, yɩ̃ à kɔ̃ à wɔ. Wâh képah pɩ, kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ nɩ̀ségbnɔ sɔ̃́ á kwɛ mɔ ǹ yõ̀nɩ yõ.»
Káh n yɛ pèkè kɔ̃ kè fyãh á yõ sɔkɔ, ǹtɛ áwɔ fyãh ké yõ sɔkɔ á pèpɛy pɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ yɔ́ se mɛ nɛ́ kè náh wil Liyel tyɩ́? Névye nónó-á mɛ tɔ̃́rɩ́ yõ, Liyel sahkɩ sɔkɔ ye pélɛ dò. Képah ye, no pól yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ n sah kwil yõ̀tãm yóré yõ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, névi nɛ̂-à yõ̀tãmnɛ n fwo, Liyel yóré ye tɛ̃̀ n yahle. Tɛ́ nɛ̂-à se mó tɔ̃ Liyel yórélɛ n yahle, pèkè ye tɛ̃̀ n yɔrɩ n mɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ.

Tyípéplɔ pɩ́-ò náh yɩ̃nɛ tukey tùkèpu yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Tyítúkúnì pɩ́-ò wɔ ye yɩ̃nɛ pé yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Wáh kɩ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á káh yõ̀tãm tíkílɛ n pɩ, tyípéplɔlɛ nɛ n pɩ, képah sɔkɔ pè kɩ álɛ n sõ.

Á náh wɛ di, Liyel tõ̀ sɔkɔ ye yõ̀tãmnɛ á tyɩ́ pɩkɩ yĩnnɛ. Ǹtɛ wâh tyítúkúnìnɛ n pɩ, pé tíkí yɩ̃nɛ kè ǹ tɛ̃. Dípɩ́yî náh pè kɔ̃ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ dɛ́, tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ mɛ pé tyɩ́ Liyel tõ̀ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ kɩ fɛ̃ fṍhnɔ́ sah pèkè pɩ́-ò yõ, kɩ Liyel yrɔ wilki tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ.
Képah ye á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ nɛ n sah pé tyɩ́ yõ. Liyel fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ yah tì to yĩn ó náh dɛ́, á nɩ tɔ mɛ kélɛ álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ képah-á plɛ.
Képah tɔ yĩn ye yě mɔ́rɩ́lɛ n mɔ. Tɛ́ nónó-á mó n syi sélɛ, Liyel tõ̀ sɔkɔ ye pélɛ ké tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ yĩnnɛ.

Kwâh nɛ̂-à yɩ̃nɛ névi nɛ̂ kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ, kélɛ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃. Mɔ́rɩ́lɛ mɔ́rɩ́ syí-òlɛ n kɔ̃, ǹ tɛ́ lã̀polɛ lã̀po syí-òlɛ n kɔ̃. Wâh yɩ̃nɛ ǹ névi nɛ̂ yah tíkí pɩ, tɛ̃̀ yah tíkí pɩ. Wâh yɩ̃nɛ ǹ yõ̀yén sah névi nɛ̂ yõ, kè sah tɛ̃̀ yõ.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ kɔ̃lɩ káh wɛ yé yõ sɔkɔ. Yé yɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́nɔnɔ ó kɔ̃lɩ nɛ n mɛ yé yõ. Á ní-ò tyɩ́-à mɛ nɔ á tyɩ́, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l pól ye á kɔ dal mɔ.

Kǎh yo Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ, nɛy káh fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ pɩ, nɛy káh nɛ́kókè mɔ, nɛy káh yɩ̃be yɩ̃, nɛy káh ǹ yĩ́ wil ǹ ní-ò kwâh tyɩ́, à tahlɩ tyi nónó tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ tyɩ́-á yónɔ́lɛ ké sɔkɔ, sépi pól ye tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ núkú mɛ̀ tuke mɔ yo kɛ núkúlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Á ní-ò tyɩ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè nɔ á tyɩ́ á gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.»
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ névi náh n pɩ n dah n mɔ névi tyɩ́. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l póllɛ n kɔ n dal n mɔ.
Gbĩ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á álɛ, yé kè pɩ̃ ó. Pwáhnmɔnɔ mɛ yúkɛy álɛ núkúnúkú à kal gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á lésõ á sɛ̃ Krista yõ. Képah ye, dɔ n yuku gbĩ́ nɔ.
Tyah kah tɛ, tyah dal gbĩ́ mɛ yúkɛy. Á ye fɛ̃́ntũ̂ tyi wɛ n yɛ. Liyel-á nɛ̂nɛ á kɔ̃ kyòo yah tõ̀ pɩ yĩnnɛ,

à mó képahlɛ kyòo yah tyípɩ́nɔ́ ólɛ n pɩ. Á ye káh n pɩ yèwònpɩbɩlɛ, á ye káh mó tɔ̃ sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ. Á ye káh n pɩ fɔ̀fɩ́npɩbɩlɛ, á ye káh n pɩ prɔ̀npɩbɩlɛ. Á ye káh mâllɛ n kɔ̃lɩ, á ye káh yĩ́wílkìlɛ n pɩ.
Yé yɛ yé tyípɩ́nɔ́ pól nɛ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Yé káh n yɛ yé dyɔ dyɔ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ fyãh yé yõ, kè pɔ yé mɔ tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Névi nɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-à mɛ yúkú-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ yahlɛ, yé tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ. Yé káh tɛ̃̀ sõnɔlɛ n kɔ̃lɩ.
Sɔ̃́ kénkɔ̃-á ǹnɩ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-à yuku yahlɛ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃ à mɛ fɛ̃ yíyìn póllɛ n yõ, tɛ́ nɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ náh mó yuku yahlɛ, kè mɛ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃ à mɛ kɔ̀ yahle;
yíyìn pól yṍ-ò káh kɔ̀ kɔ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névilɛ n yilɔ, kɔ̀ kɔ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névi tɔ káh mó yíyìn pól yṍ-òlɛ n tuke. Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel mɛ tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ plɛ dò.

Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ mɛ áwɔlɛ, tɛ́ á kɩ pɔ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tõ̀npɩlɛ n tuke? Wàh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ n pɩ plɛ ò, à náh mɛ n pɩ plɛ ò, képah mɛ ǹ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́nɛ n yah kɛ̀. Ǹtɛ à kɩ pɩ plɛ n pi. Yé náh wɛ di, tǎhkɩ̀ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ à kɔ̃ à kɩ n pɩ plɛ.
Túkù tyɩ́ sèpĩ̀n mɛ sé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ, túkù tyɩ́ sè mɛ núkúlɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à sɔ̃́ mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n sõ, tɛ̃̀ sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ nɛ n mɛ ké yõ.

Névi nɛ̂-á mɛ sèpĩ̀nnɛ n mɔ n kõ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ ye tɛ̃̀ n pɩ kélɛ. Nɛ̂-à mɛ yíyìn póllɛ n yõ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ ye tɛ̃̀ n pɩ kélɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel yĩn ye tɛ̃̀ n gbilki. Nɛ̂-à se yíyìn póllɛ n yṍ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ ye tɛ̃̀ n pɩ kélɛ. Liyel yĩn ye tɛ̃̀ tɔ n gbilki.
Yé náh wɛ di, ápi sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ min sɔkɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y yĩnnɛ, ànɛ̂ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n ku n pi ǹ gblɔ̌y yĩnnɛ.
Áyâh mɛ min sɔkɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ ye álɛ min sɔkɔ. Áyâh se ku, ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ ye á ku. Képah ye, á mɛ min sɔkɔ ò, á ku ò, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ ye álɛ.
Krista ye ku tɛ́ ǹ lékó mɛ yilki mɔ, nɛ̂-á à kɔ̃ à pɩ lékyɩ̂ ànɛ̂ vye Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
Ǹtɛ áwɔ-á dò, kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ á á yṹnpilɛ n tuke? Tɛ́ áwɔ tɔ-á dò, kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ á á yṹnpilɛ n yilɔ? Liyel kɩ pɔ á pól tuke n pi dò.
Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Ńmɔ nɛ̂-á TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃NƐ mé mɛ min sɔkɔ. No pól kɩ gbètukunɔ di ńmɔ yah sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ no pól kɩ ńmɔlɛ n gbilki.»
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á nɛ́núkù núkú pól kɩ á tyípɩ́nɔ́ yah yo n pi Liyel tyɩ́ á gblɔ̌y.
Képah ye, á ye yal mɔ wɛ̃ tùkènɔ́lɛ, yè mó kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh tir yɔ́ pɩ nɛ̂-á kɩ yé yṹnpi yɔ́ yõ yɩkɩ, képah náh pɩ tɛ̃̀ syɩkɩ mɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesulɛ, ńmɔ kè pɩ̃, ànɛ̂ ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ ké gblɔ̌y sɛ̃́. Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à n sõ nɛ kwâh nɛ̂-á mɛ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ, kè n pɩ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Káh n pɔ á yõke yĩnnɛ á yṹnpi mɔ yèkwɔrɩ sɔkɔ, á náh tɔ̃ mɛ n kɔ tyɩ́nɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ dò. Káh n pɔ á yõke yĩnnɛ névi min kɔ̃ kè mɔ pu, Krista-á ku ǹmɔ nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ.
Kwâh nɛ̂-á kwâh pèpɛynɛ áwɔ tyɩ́, képah káh pɔ pɩ yĩ́nyɩ́kɩ̀lɛ dɛ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́lɛ, yõke ànɛ̂ wɔ wɔ yî náh. Gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀, ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩ, ànɛ̂ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ye kélɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ.
Névi nɛ̂-à tõ̀lɛ n pɩ Krista tyɩ́ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel yĩ́ n yuku tɛ̃̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ névye ǹ yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo.
Képah ye, áyáh nɛ yèvɩnɩ ànɛ̂ wɛ̃ yah yúkúnɔ́ wɛ n pi sɔ̃́, á ye képahlɛ n yɩ̃kɩ.

Á náh yɩ̃nɛ ǹ pɔ Liyel tõ̀lɛ nɛ n yɩkɩ yõke yĩnnɛ. Gbɩ ye, yíyìn pól tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ yályál Liyel yah ó; ǹtɛ wâh kwâh yɔ́lɛ n yõ nɛ̂ yṍnɔ́-á kɩ fɛ̃ pɔ á yṹnpi yɔ́ syɩkɩ mɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, képah náh plɛ.
Nɛ̂-á ké pèpɛynɛ, tir nɛ̂-á kɩ fɛ̃ á yṹnpi syɩkɩ mɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, kè se kɔ̀ kɔ̀nɔ́lɛ ò, kè se tɔ̃ wɔ́nɔ́lɛ ò, kè se tyi dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, káh kélɛ n pɩ.

Áwɔ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ nɛ̂ yõ à yuku nɛ́npɔ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, yɛ képah tɛ̃ áwɔ ànɛ̂ Liyel wrɔ́. Nɛ̂-à tyilɛ n pɩ wǎh mɛ nónónɛ n yah nɛ sǎh mɛ plɛ, tɛ́ à náh mɛ lékàhlɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n kɔ̃, tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ nɔ.

Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à kwâh yɔ́lɛ n yõ tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ n sõ tɔ̀tɔ̀, lékàh mɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ kélɛ n pɩ tɛ́ kè náh mɛ pɔ yɩ̃nɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ. Tyi nónó pól-á n pɩ nónó náh mɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tyípêl ye sélɛ.
Ápi nónó Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á yuku yahlɛ, á ye á no tɛ́lɔ́ yṍtyílɛ n twah pé tyɩ́. Á ye káh á dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi ó yah wũ.
Nɛ̂ mɛ̀ nɛ̂ mɛ̀, à ǹ ní-ò tyɩ́ pɛkɩ pɛkɩ tyilɛ nɛ n pɩ à kɔ̃ à nɛ n yuku yahlɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Krista ńtɛ̃ fyé náh ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi pɩ́-ńsah yah kɔ̃. Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Liyel, á gbyɔ̀pu-á ǹ gbyɔ gbyɔ nónónɛ, sè vi kwĩnki ńmɔ yõ.»

Tyi nónó pól-á wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ ǹgbò dùkùlɛ, sè wãrkɩ nɛ sè pɩ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ ápi tyɩ́. Sépi gbõ̀ yõ, á kɩ gbah tɛ̃ ànɛ̂ sṍré kɩ wɛ á sɔkɔ, á yáh-ńsah kɔ̃ kè náh n tyɛ n pi.
Liyel nɛ̂-á névilɛ n pɩ gbáhntɛ̃-òlɛ ànɛ̂ sṍré névilɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à yé sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ, yé mó Krista pɩ dùkùlɛ n yah n pɩ.
Képah sɔkɔ, yé pól kɩ yé vyãh pɩ núkúlɛ kɩ Liyellɛ n gbilki, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista Súlɛ.
Képah ye, yé wɛ̃ tɛ̃ plɛ sɔ̃́-á Krista yé tɛ̃ plɛ à gbílkínɔ́lɛ n sah Liyel yõ.
Máh nɛ̂nɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Liyel n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀. Wǎh ǹ vyãhlɛ Nsyifunɔ náh tãn kɔ̃ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, Krista pɔ pɩ pé tõ̀npɩlɛ à képah pɩ pé tyɩ́.

À wil képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ yĩn ye à pɔ, pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ Liyellɛ n gbilki ǹ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔ̀rɩ yĩnnɛ, sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Képah ye mé kɩ álɛ n gbilki yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ névye nɩyṍ, tɛ́ kɩ álɛ n gbɩ.»
Kè tɔ̃ mɛ yónɔ́lɛ ké fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ névye, yé nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Liyel nolɛ.»
Tɛ́ tɔ̃ mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ névye, yé pól Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n gbilki. No pól mó ǹ gbilki gbilki yɩ̀lɛ n gbɩ.»
Yesayi tɔ kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Nsyese pétó náhkɩ̀ kɩ pɔ yuku kɩ yìkìnì pól névye yah tɛ̃, tɛ́ pè kɩ pé gbõ̀ sah ǹ yõ.»

Liyel nɛ̂-á névi gbõ̀ sàh-ǹsahlɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɔ yé sɔkɔ, à mó yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃ yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ sɛ̃ ǹ yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ yé gbõ̀ sah yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ yõ ǹ Mirki tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ.
Ń yṹnpyé, ńmɔ sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ ké yõ nɛ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́pú-á yélɛ, yáh tyi póllɛ n pnɛ, ànɛ̂ yáh kɩ fɛ̃ vìnmɔnɔlɛ wɛ̃nɛ n kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ yé dyɔ to n kõ yĩn ye ń kɔ̃ mé tyi túkù wãrkɩ nɩ̀sãhlɛ tã̀ntã̀n yísyɔ́ sɔkɔ. Liyel gbõ̀ yõ ye mé pɩ képahlɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á pèpɔrɩ pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́,

à ń pɩ Yesu Krista tõ̀npɩlɛ névye wrɔ́, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Liyel tõ̀ kètǎr ye mé n pɩ ǹ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pè kɩ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ Liyel kɔ̃ kɩ pɩ yályál ǹ yah ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ pɩ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́nɛ.
Ń wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ, máh tõ̀ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́, kè mɛ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ń tyɩ́.

Kénɛ tõ̀ ye Krista ńmɔ tɔkɔ à pɩ névye wrɔ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Mé se kɩ tɔ̃ kèyǎh yo kah mɔ képah yõ? Ǹmɔ ye pè kɔ̃ pè n sah Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, ńmɔ vyãh wɛy ànɛ̂ ń tyípɩ́nɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ,

ànɛ̂ gbǐl tyi ǹgbnɔ náhnáh sɔkɔ Liyel Mirki tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ. À tɔkɔ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ ké gbɔ̀plɔ kwlolɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ à kyɩ sɔkɔ Yiliri mara pól sɔkɔ, mé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yĩ́ĩ́ Krista tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ mé kè yah tɔkɔ à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo tã̀ntã̀n nónó sɔkɔ-á Krista yĩn náh yo yah. Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir-á yo sɔkɔ tɛ tã̀ntã̀n nónó sɔkɔ, mé náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé kè yo nɛ́npɔ́ ńtɔ̃, á kɩ nɛ ǹnɩ̂ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sètyah yõ sɔ̃́ mé n mɔ n dohnɩ.

Tɛ́ máh tõ̀ nɛ̂ pɩ yɔ̀, kè mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛynɛ nɛ̂-á wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Ǹ tyɩ́ náh yo sah nónó tyɩ́, pépi ye kɩ wɛ ǹnɛ. Nónó-á pè náh ǹ tyɩ́ noh yah, pépi ye kɩ ké dùkù pɩ̃.»
Kénɛ tõ̀ ye kõ ń yahlɛ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ ń kɔ̃ mé náh mɛ tɛ̃ wɛ kyɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, ń tõ̀ ye tyɛ mara mɛ̀ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ ké ye náhnáh ye yɔ̀, yé tĩ̀n kyɩ dékè mɛ ń kah tɛ̃.
Máh kɩ pɔ n yuku Yɛsɩpayĩ yamana sɔkɔ, mé kɩ yĩn yah yé tyɩ́ kɩ yé dékè ku yah kwéy, yè mó yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ ń tyɩ́ ń kɔ̃ mè fɛ̃ n yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ ń kɔ́lɔ́lɛ kénɛ yamana sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, sɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ ye ńnɛ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil sɔkɔ kɩ kyɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yohnɩ mɔ nɛ́npɔ́.
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á mɛ Masedoni ànɛ̂ Akayi sɔkɔ, pépi ye kè yah tɔkɔ à pé gbã̀n yî yísyɔ́ tuke mɔ wɛ̃ yõ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yãm tãn yohnɩ n mɔ yĩnnɛ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ.

Pè kè yah tɔkɔ pé gblɔ̌y. Ǹtɛ gbɩ yõ, ké kɔ̃lɩ ńtɛ̃ sõ̀ mɛ pé yõ. Yah kɛ̀; Nsyifunɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye névye nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ pé tɔ vyãh wɛ Liyel tyi sɔkɔ. Pépi tɔ mó yɩ̃nɛ pè Nsyifunɔlɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ pé gbã̀n yîlɛ kɛ̀.
Mâh pɔ kénɛ tyi nɔ́pi yah wah tɛ à gbã̀n yî tùkènmɔnɔ nɔ́pilɛ pè kɔ̃ tɛ, tɛ́ n sɔkɔ Yɛsɩpayĩ yamana sɔkɔ, mé kɩ syɔ̃ yé tyɩ́.
Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ nɛ mâh pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, Krista-á kɩ sãm mɔ yĩ́ĩ́ á sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé, ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ, ànɛ̂ Liyel Mirki-á tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂ dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ, sépi yĩnnɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé so mɔ ń tyɩ́ náhnáh Liyel nínɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Yé Liyellɛ n ni ńmɔ tyɩ́ ń kɔ̃ mè wɛ n pwah Nsyude mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mé syi n yuku kɔ̃́-ńsah Yerusalɩmɩ kwil sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú kè fɛ̃ n syi nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, Liyel-à kɩ fɛ̃ syi, mé kɩ yĩni tɛ̃ yé tĩ̀nnɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ kɩ pɔ mɩ yah kwéy.
Liyel nɛ̂-á yèvɩnɩ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à nɛ n mɛ yé póllɛ. Amiina.
Mé á dósê Febelɛ n dahbɩ yé gbõ̀, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yòhnɩ̀nmɔ-òlɛ Sãnkrɩ kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ.

Yé ǹ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩn yõ, ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú-á wɛ̃nɛ n tɛ̃ sɔ̃́. Yè mó ǹnɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ yé yétõ̂-à syɩ ǹ tyɩ́. Yé náh wɛ di, à ye névye náhnáh yohnɩ mɔ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ńmɔ tɔ yohnɩ mɔ.
Yé wɛkɩ Prisili ànɛ̂ Akilasɩ tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á ńmɔ tõ̀ pɩ mûnɛ Yesu Krista tyɩ́.
Pè ye ku farkɩ ńmɔ min pwáhnmɔ-ńsah. Ńmɔ ó náh n kɔ̃ pélɛ pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛynɛ dɛ́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ pól nónó-á pè náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pépi tɔ mɛ pé pèpɔrɩlɛ n pnɛ.
Yé wɛkɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tɔ tyɩ́, nónó-á wɛ̃nɛ n tuke n mɔ pé gbô sɔkɔ. Yé wɛkɩ ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́ Yepayinɛtɩ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á pɩ nɛ́gbennɛ à sɛ̃ Krista yõ Asi mara sɔkɔ.
Yé wɛkɩ Mari tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tõ̀ kah pɩ yé tyɩ́.

Yé wɛkɩ Andronikusi ànɛ̂ Nsyunyasɩ tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á ńmɔ tyɩ́ névyelɛ tɛ́ á wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ pélɛ. Yõ̀yén mɛ n sah n yĩ́ĩ́ pé yõ pé no Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye sɔkɔ. Pépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ ńmɔ yah sɔkɔ.
Yé wɛkɩ Anpiliyatusi tyɩ́ ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á tah yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé wɛkɩ Yuribɛ̃ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á tõ̀ pɩ mûnɛ Krista tyɩ́. Yè mó wɛkɩ ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́ Syitakisi tɔ tyɩ́.
Yé wɛkɩ Apɛlɛsɩ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ǹ yĩ́n-ńsah fílkì viki Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yé wɛkɩ Arisitobuli gbô tãn tyɩ́.
Yé wɛkɩ Yorodyõ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ń tyɩ́ névilɛ. Yé wɛkɩ Narsisi gbô tãn tyɩ́, nónó-á sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ.
Yé wɛkɩ Tirifɛnɩ ànɛ̂ Tirifɔsɩ tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á tõ̀ pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́. Yè mó wɛkɩ ń kósê Pɛrsidi tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ yi-á tõ̀ kah pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yé wɛkɩ Wrufusi tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ yĩn-á mɛ wìlnɔ́lɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yè mó wɛkɩ ǹ yṹ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tɔ-á pɩ ńmɔ yṹnɛ.
Yé wɛkɩ Asɛ̃kriti tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ Flekõlɛ, ànɛ̂ Yɛrɛmɛsɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ Patrobaselɛ, ànɛ̂ Yɛrɛmasɩlɛ, à tahlɩ á yṹnpyé nónó-á mɛ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yé wɛkɩ Filolɔkɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyuli tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ Nere, ànɛ̂ ǹ dósêlɛ, à tahlɩ Wolɛ̃pasɩ ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tyɩ́, nónó-á mɛ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yé wɛkɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ. Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ pól n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.

Ń yṹnpyé, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ nónó-á yé wɛ sɔkɔ, névye nónó-á mɛ yuku sépilɛ n fwo, tɛ́ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ n dah n mɔ yé wrɔ́, yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ pélɛ. Yé káh pélɛ n tĩnki.

Kénɛ névye nɔ́pi dùkùlɛ kɛ̀; yé káh wɛ nɛ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Krista tyɩ́-á pè n pɩ tõ̀lɛ dɛ́, pé kèkùrn ye pè n yɩ̃kɩ. Vyã́hsesyɩ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ, pě ǹpɩ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névye yõ yɩkɩ pé yĩ́nvǐ wɛlɔlɛ.

Yáh mɛ n sah Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, no pól mɛ kélɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye ń nɩ mɛ vɩ́nɔ́lɛ yélɛ náhnáh. Ǹtɛ mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé lékã́m wɛ yé tyípéplɔlɛ n pɩ. Yé nɛ n mɛ yályál, yé káh tyítúkúnìnɛ n pɩ.
Liyel nɛ̂-á yèvɩnɩ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, dǒ kwéy, à kɩ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ pɩ yé gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́.
Timote nɛ̂-á ń tõ̀ pɩ mûnɛ, à n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́, à tahlɩ Lusiyusi, ànɛ̂ Nsyasõ, ànɛ̂ Sosipatɛrɩ tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á ń tyɩ́ névyelɛ.
Ńmɔ Tɛrityusi nɛ̂-á pè ń kɔ̃ mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ wãrkɩ, ń tɔ n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩn yõ.

Kayusi nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á ńmɔlɛ twáhntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì wɛ̃nɛ n tuke n mɔ n pɔ ǹ tĩ̀nnɛ, à n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́. Kwil pɔ́ màr-ò dĩ́ Yerasɩtɩ ànɛ̂ á yṹnpi Kwaritusi n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.
[Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé pól tyɩ́. Amiina!]
Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah Liyel yõ. Tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃ à yɩ̃nɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂nɛ mé n yo yé tyɩ́ Krista tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir ye lésõ kélɛ ǹgbò dùkùlɛ,

tɛ́ pɔ wilki mɔ núkúnúkú kwèyy kyòo yah, Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu tyi wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ Liyel ye lésõ pè kɔ̃ pè kè wãrkɩ sah sɔ̃̀nko yìkìnì pól névye kè wɛ n pɩ̃. Képah sɔkɔ, pè kɩ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ tɛ́ kɩ n sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
Liyel núkúní nɛ̂-á lékã́m ó ǹ tɔ̂ɔ́, gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ǹmɔ yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ. Amiina!
Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á Liyel ye pɩ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ, ńmɔ ànɛ̂ á yṹnpi Sositɛnɩ ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ

yépi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, yépi nónó-á mɛ Korɛ̃nti kwil. Yépi nónó-á mɛ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ tɛ́ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Yesu Kristalɛ, yépi ye Liyel ye à tahlɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tyɩ́ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ. Yépi pól mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩnnɛ n ye n gbo. Ǹmɔ ye yépi TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃NƐ ànɛ̂ ápi tɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Liyel ye yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́, yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Yesu Kristalɛ. Képah ye, mé n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ yépi yĩnnɛ.

Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ̂-á yo wah yé tyɩ́, kè ye tɛ̃̀-ǹsah wɛ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ. Képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye yé wɛ kwrɔ mɔ Kristalɛ, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ pèpɔrɩ dukenɔ pól pɩ yé tyɩ́, yé kɔ̃ yé wɛy dùkù póllɛ n pnɛ, ànɛ̂ pnɛ̀nɔ́ duke póllɛ yé tyɩ́.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Liyel pèpɔrɩ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh yah kwlɔ yé tyɩ́, yépi nónó-á mɛ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista syɩ́npɔnɔ syɩkɩ tɛ̃.
Liyel ye kɩ tɔ̃ yé pɩ gbáhntɛ̃pulɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ kɩ pɔ syɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista syɩ n pɔ sõ tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ pɩ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ yé tyɩ́ lésõlɛ.
Liyel n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yé ye pɔ kwrɔ mɔ ǹ Pídĩ́ Yesu Kristalɛ, nɛ̂-á á pól Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.

Ń yṹnpyé, mé noh Klowe no yísyɔ́ tyɩ́ nɛ yékã̂b-á mɛ de yé wrɔ́. Képah ye, ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé yé vyãh pɩ núkúlɛ. Yé káh n yɛ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ nɛ mɛ yé wrɔ́. Yé yé sõnɔ ànɛ̂ yé tyi yáhntɔkɔnɔnɔ pól pɩ núkúlɛ.

Nɛ̂-á mé n yo yé tyɩ́ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: - Túkù nɛ ńkɛ̃́, ńmɔ Pole náh névye-á pépilɛ. - Túkù mɛ nɛ Apɔlɔsɩ náh névye-á pépilɛ. - Túkù mó nɛ Pyɛrɩ náh névye-á pépilɛ. - Túkù wɔ mó nɛ Krista náh névye-á pépilɛ.
Yépi tɛ̃̀ se mɛ n sõ nɛ Krista-á mɛ tɔ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ? Pole se pè syɩ dahnɩ yõ yé yĩnnɛ? Pole yĩn yõ se pè wel wilki yélɛ ni sɔkɔ?
Mé n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́, máh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mé náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wel wilki ni sɔkɔ yépi sɔkɔ, à wil Krisipusi ànɛ̂ Kayusi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ n yo n pi nɛ, ńmɔ yĩn yõ-á pè pé wel wilki ni sɔkɔ.
Ɔ̃̀ɔ̃́ɔ̃̀, ń dyɔ to kõ nɛ máh Sitefanasɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ no tɔ wel wilki ni sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ à wil pépi tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ń dyɔ náh tɔ̃ mɛ n kwnɛ nɛ máh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ wel wilki ni sɔkɔ.

Krista náh ńmɔ tɛkɩ mɔ nɛ mé wèlnwìlkìnɔ́lɛ n pɩ ni sɔkɔ dò, à ń tɛkɩ mɔ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yĩnnɛ, nɛ̂-á kè náh yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n yo à yɩ̃nɛ névi yõ̀tàhsyi yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ dùkùlɛ, Krista syɩ́nɔ́ kɔ̃ kè pɔ pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ dahnɩ yõ.

Yah, wâh nɛ Krista-á ku dahnɩ yõ, kè n pɩ n tɛ̃ nɛ́wõré wɛlɔlɛ névye yah, nónó-á mɛ mɔ́npunɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ Liyel tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Ǹtɛ ápi nónó-á mɛ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́, Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ ye kèlɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Mé kɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ yɩkɩ,
tɛ́ kɩ lékã́m névye lékã́m niri.»

Ǹtɛ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú tɔ̃ ńyãh, ànɛ̂ kǎrn ǹgbnɔ pɩ́púlɛ, à tahlɩ kwɛy gbĩ vyã́hsensyɩ̃́rɩ́pu tyɩ́ wɛ́? Liyel kè wɛ̃kɩ pnɛ́yy nɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ nɛ̂-á mɛ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ névye sɔkɔ, nɛ́wõré-á kélɛ dò.

Kèkõyṍ névye ànɛ̂ pé yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ fyé yõ, pè náh tɛ̃ wɛ Liyel dùkù pɩ̃ ǹ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹ wɛy nɛ̂-á n yo tɛ́ kélɛ nɛ́wã̂n wɛynɛ pé yah, nónó-á sɛ̃ ké yõ, Liyel kè yah tɔkɔ à pépi pwah mɔ képah gbõ̀ yõ.
Nsyifunɔ tɛ̃̀ n nɛ n mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ gbǐl tyi pɩ pé wɛ, tɛ́ Krɛkɩ névye wɔ n mó n nɛ n mɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂lɛ n yah n kɔ̃.

Ǹtɛ ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ Krista tyɩ́lɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ, nɛ̂-á Liyel nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ pè syɩ dahnɩ yõ. Kè mɛ yõ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ wɛynɛ Nsyifunɔ tɛ̃̀ sõnɔ sɔkɔ. Nɛ́wõré wɛlɔ mó kélɛ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel-á nónó ye pwah mɔ Nsyifunɔ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ no tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, pépi tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́, Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ ye Kristalɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel tyípɩ́nɩ̀ nónó-á nɛ́wõré tyilɛ névye sõnɔ sɔkɔ, sè yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ tyilɛ kal névi yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂lɛ, tɛ́ ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ nónó-á ǹ tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔlɛ n wɛ̃kɩ névye sõnɔ sɔkɔ, sé tɔ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ kal névi tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ.

Ń yṹnpyé, Liyel-á yépi nónó ye, yé yé gblɔ̌y kèdùkù yah kɛ̀. Kèkõyṍ névye-á nónónɛ n yah yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ névyelɛ, ànɛ̂ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀pulɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́-ǹgbnɔlɛ, sɛ̃́nknɔ névye náh mɛ fwɔ́ɔ yé sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ tyi nónó-á kèkõyṍ névye mɛ n yah nɛ́wã̂n tyilɛ, sépi ye pyě Liyel yah tɔkɔ à sennɛ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú tɛ̃. Tɛ́ tyi nónó-á pè mɛ n yah tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ tyilɛ, sépi ye à yah tɔkɔ à sennɛ tɛ̃́nwɛpu tɛ̃.
Tyi nónó-á kèkõyṍ névye mɛ n yilɔ, sè náh mɛ kwâh yɔ́lɛ pé yah, pè náh mɛ sélɛ n mɔ n kõ, sépi ye Liyel yah tɔkɔ à sé tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ, pǎh mɛ nónónɛ n mɔ n kõ.
Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel nɛ́mɔ́nɩ́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh tɛ̃ wɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y yɔ̃ n sah n pi Liyel yah sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ Liyel gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye yélɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Yesu Kristalɛ. Tɛ́ Yesu Krista wɔ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye ápi mɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ mɛ̀ wɛ, nɛ̂-á wil Liyel tyɩ́. Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye tɔ̃ á pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́lɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ. Tɛ́ à mɛ á pwah mɔ á tyípêl sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, «Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé gblɔ̌y gbilki, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á tyi nónó pɩ ápi tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ ǹ gblɔ̌y gbilki sépi yĩnnɛ.»

Ń yṹnpyé, Liyel tir nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ, máh kyɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ à kyɩ ké tyɩ́ yo wilki mɔ yé tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, mé náh sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́ wɛ̀ngbìl sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ névi yõ̀tàhsyi yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ sɔkɔ.
Mé náh sõ̀ mɛ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ yo yo tɛ̃̀nɛ yé tyɩ́ yõ-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, à wil Liyel nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔ Yesu tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ ǹ syɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ dahnɩ yõ sɔkɔ.
Ńmɔ sõ̀ mɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ tǎhkɩ̀ kɛ̃́nɛ ń sɔkɔ, tɛ́ tíkí mɛ ń tɛ̃, ànɛ̂ ń wil mɛ n syah.
Máh sõ̀ mɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ Liyel wɛy nɛ̂nɛ n yo, névi yõ̀tàhsyi yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ náh sõ̀ mé n pɩ sélɛ à yé sõnɔlɛ n vi n mɔ. Liyel Mirki ye sõ̀ n wɛ̃kɩ ǹ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kè náh pɩ nɛ névye yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ gbõ̀ yõ sɔ̃́ yé sɛ̃ Yesu yõ dɛ́, Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye.
Nónó Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á de yĩn, á mɛ pépilɛ n kwɔ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂lɛ nɛ̂-á ké gblɔ̌y kèkõyṍ névye ànɛ̂ pé yõ̀tãm tyɩ́lɛ, pépi nónó min-á kɩ n tyɛ n pi.
Ápi mɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂lɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ nɛ̂-á wil Liyel tyɩ́, képah nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ. Kèkõyṍ mɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ dùkù sɔkɔ ye lésõ Liyel yah tɔkɔ sah kélɛ, ápi yõ yɔ̃ yĩnnɛ.
Kèkõyṍ yõ̀tãm sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh kè pɩ̃. Pàh sõ̀ mɛ kè pɩ̃, pè náh náhkɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ syɩ n pi dahnɩ yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tɔ̃́rɩ́ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ.
Tyi nɔ́pi pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́-á lésõ kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Névi yĩ́ náh tɛ̃ yah nɛ̂ yõ,
ǹ níkí náh nɛ̂ noh yah,
nɛ̂ sõnɔ náh de yah ǹ sɔkɔ,
sépi ye Liyel yah sah névye kɔ̃, ǹ tyɩ́-á nɔ nónó tyɩ́.»
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel tyi nɔ́pilɛ á wɛ̃kɩ ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ. Liyel Mirki kɩ fɛ̃ tyi pól sohlɩ, kàh sɔ̃́ Liyel fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔlɛ.
Nɛ́ áwɔ ó náh, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ á sõnɔ pɩ̃ n pi. Nɛ́ Liyel Mirki tɔ ó náh, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ Liyel sõnɔ pɩ̃ n pi.
Ǹtɛ Mirki nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á ápi sɔkɔ, Liyel Mirki ye; kèkõyṍ tyɩ́ náh. Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ ápi tyɩ́ à yî nónónɛ á kɔ̃, ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye á fɛ̃ pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ sélɛ.

Tɛ́ á náh mɛ sé tyɩ́lɛ n yo à yɩ̃nɛ névi yõ̀tàhsyi yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ kwɔ dùkùlɛ dɛ́, Liyel wɛy ye ápi n yo à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel Mirki-á kélɛ á wɛ̃kɩ sɔ̃́. Tɛ́ Liyel Mirki-á mɛ nónó sɔkɔ, pépi tyɩ́ ye à n nɛ n yo n wah Liyel Mirki tyilɛ.

Névi yõ̀tàhsyi sõnɔ dùkù kɔ́kɔ́ tɛ̃̀ ó-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ náh Liyel Mirki tyilɛ n fɛ̃ n syi. Tɛ̃̀ n tɛ̃ sé dùkù pɩ̃ n kwlɔ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, sè n nɛ n mɛ nɛ́wõré tyilɛ tɛ̃̀ yah. Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ ó ye, névi sé dùkùlɛ n pnɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye kɩ fɛ̃ tyi pól dùkù kyɔmɩ pɩ̃, tɛ́ nɛy náh fɛ̃ tɛ̃̀ wɔ dùkù kyɔmɩ n pɩ̃ n pi.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sõnɔlɛ n pnɛ wɛ́?
Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ fɛ̃ vìnmɔnɔlɛ à kɔ̃?»

Ń yṹnpyé, mé náh lésõ tɛ̃ wɛ Liyel wɛy yo yé tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á mě kélɛ n yo névye tyɩ́, nónó-á Liyel Mirki mɛ pé yahlɛ n tɛ̃.
