Ǹtɛ mé kè yo yé tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á mě kélɛ n yo névye tyɩ́ nónó-á nɛ̂ ó-à tɛ̃̀ dyɔ à n pɩ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé lésõ mɛ píyĩ́rínɔlɛ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Yáh lésõ mɛ píyĩ́rínɔlɛ sɛ̃́, yõke tĩ́ntĩ́ kɩ lésõ kǎn pɩ yélɛ, képah ye mé lésõ yɛ̃́níkìlɛ yé kɔ̃. Ǹtɛ à pɔ syɩ kwɛy mɛ̀ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́, nɛ̂ ó-à yé dyɔ yè n pɩ. Képah ye, kè kɩ tɔ̃ kǎn pɩ yélɛ. Yé yah kɛ̀, sɔ̃́-á yṹnwɔ̃rɩ́ ànɛ̂ mâl tɛ̃̀nɛ fyɔ̀ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, nɛ̂ ó-á yé dyɔ képah ye yé mɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ névi yõ̀tàhsyi pɩ dùkù ye yé sɔkɔ.
Sɔ̃́-á yé túkù tyah n yo nɛ, Pole náh névye-á pépilɛ, túkù mɛ nɛ, Apɔlɔsɩ náh névye-á pépilɛ, névi yõ̀tàhsyi pɩ dùkù ye yé n pɩ.
Nɛ̂ mɛ Apɔlɔsɩlɛ? Ànɛ̂ nɛ̂ mɛ ńmɔ Polelɛ? Tõ̀npɩbɩ ye ápilɛ, nónó gbõ̀ yõ-á yé sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ. Á nɛ́núkù núkú pól tã̀n ye á n pɩ, à yɩ̃nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á nónó sah á kɔ̃.
Ńmɔ ye sõ mɔ, Apɔlɔsɩ mɛ kè pu. Ǹtɛ Liyel ye pɩ kélɛ kè kyãh.
Ǹmɔ nɛ̂ wɔ-á pɩ kélɛ kè kyãh, ǹmɔ ó kɩ n mɔ n kõ. Névi nɛ̂-á sõ kélɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ̂-á pu kélɛ, pépi náh n mɔ n kõ n pi.

Ápi pól pɩ tõ̀ pɩ́púlɛ Liyel tyɩ́. Képah ye névi nɛ̂-á sõ mɔ, ànɛ̂ nɛ̂-á pu kélɛ, pépi pól mɛ núkúlɛ. Tɛ́ pé nɛ́núkù núkú pól kɩ pɔ pé tã̀n pɩ́nɔ́ lédyáhnɩ́ wɛ n pi à yɩ̃nɛ pé tã̀n pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Yépi ye pɩ Liyel swãhlɛ.
Yépi ye tɔ̃ pɩ ǹ wɔ̀kɔ̀lɛ nɛ̂-á à mɛ n mɔ.

Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ ń tyɩ́, képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, mé tɛ̃ wɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sètyah wilki wɔ̀kɔ̀ mɔ́npnɛ̀-ò pèpɛy tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Tɛ́ képah yõ sɔkɔ ye ǹnɩ̂ mɛ n mɔ n dohnɩ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à n mɔ n dohnɩ ké yõ, tɛ̃̀ kyɔ̀mɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ ǹ mɔ dùkù sɔkɔ.
Sètyah nɛ̂-á wilki tɛ yɔ̀, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ náh tɔ̃ fɛ̃ kèyǎh wilki n pi à wil képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, képah nɛ̂-á Yesu Kristalɛ.

Wɔ̀kɔ̀ sètyah nɛ̂-á wìlkìntɛnɔlɛ yɔ̀, sɔ̃́-á túkù-à mɛ kélɛ n mɔ n dɔkɔ mo mo yîlɛ sɔ̃́-á sã́nnɛ, ànɛ̂ wárnnɛ, ànɛ̂ dyêh pèplɔlɛ, tɛ́ túkù mɛ kélɛ n mɔ n dɔkɔ mó-ńkɛ̃̂ yîlɛ sɔ̃́-á léslɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ ǹdrɔlɛ, képah náh pɩ fílkɔ́kɔ́rɩ́lɛ,
kèkõyṍ tukey tuke sõ ye, nɛ́núkù núkú pól-á tã̀n nónó pɩ sɔkɔ, sàh kɩ mɛ plɛ, sé gbɩ kɩ pɩ̃. Lésõ kɩ mɛ nyàh sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á kɩ no pól tã̀n gbɩ yah, kɩ sé dùkù wɛ̃kɩ.
Nɛ̂ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́-à súkɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ ké lédyáhnɩ́ wɛ.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-à sukɛ, tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ pwah ó, tɛ́ à náh ké lédyáhnɩ́ wɛ n pi. À kɩ núkú mɛ á kɩ nɛ nyàh sɔkɔ sɔ̃́ à yɩ̃kɩ to wil ǹ gbõ̀ kɔ́kɔ́lɛ.
Yé se yɔ́ pɩ̃ nɛ yépi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì-á Liyel ní-ńsah gbôlɛ, ànɛ̂ ǹ Mirki-á mɛ déntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé sɔkɔ tɛ́.
Liyel ní-ńsah gbô mɛ sàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, képah nɛ̂-á yépilɛ. Képah ye, névi nɛ̂-à Liyel ní-ńsah gbô yɩkɩ, Liyel kɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ.

Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh ǹ gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ mɔ. Yé sɔkɔ nɛ̂-à mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ névilɛ à yɩ̃nɛ kèkõyṍ névye yɩ̃́yáhnɔ́lɛ, tɛ̃̀ ǹ gblɔ̌y vi n mɔ n pɩ nɛ́wõ̂lɛ à yɩ̃nɛ névye yɩ̃́yáhnɔ́lɛ, à mó Liyel yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ wɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, kèkõyṍ névye yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂lɛ, nɛ́wõré ye kélɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ dò. Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «À yɩ̃ pɩ̃́púlɛ n mɔ n tɛ̃ pé lékã́mkãm sɔkɔ.»
Tɛ́ tɔ̃ mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ ké fɩ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú sõnɔlɛ n pnɛ. À pɩ̃ nɛ sè náh fɛ̃ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɛkɩ n pi.»

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah nɛ páh mɛ yã̀hnkõ náh, képah náh pɩ yã̀hnkõ wɔ náh. Ńmɔ Pole ò, Apɔlɔsɩ ò, Pyɛrɩ ò, kèkõyṍ ò, min képah náh pɩ kũ ò, kwɛy gbĩ tyi ò, ńsõ̂ tyi ò, sépi ànɛ̂ ápi póllɛ, yépi tyɩ́ ye.
Ǹtɛ yépi mɛ Krista tyɩ́ yõ, Krista wɔ mó mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ.
Yé yɩ̃nɛ yè pɩ̃ nɛ Krista tõ̀npɩbɩ-á ápilɛ, ànɛ̂ tyi nónó-á lésõ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ, Liyel-á sélɛ ápi gbõ̀ dahbɩ, á kɔ̃ á syi n yo.
Ǹtɛ tyi-à dahbɩ nɛ̂ gbõ̀, kè n nɛ n mɛ yáhnkɔ̃nɔlɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ nɛ à nɛ n mɛ tómm sé pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́, yépi képah náh pɩ tukey tùkèpu-à kɩ sɔ̃́ lékàh, képah náh pɩ lénɔ̀lɛ ńnɛ n kɔ̃ sɔ̃́, képah náh mɛ tir yɔ́lɛ ńmɔ yah. Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh mɛ lékàh, képah náh pɩ lénɔ̀lɛ ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n kɔ̃.
Tɔ̀tɔ̀ náh mɛ ńmɔ nɩ sɔkɔ póllɛ nɛ máh tyípékè pɩ. Ǹtɛ képah náh n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ lékàh kɛ̃́ névi-á ńnɛ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ó ye kɩ fɛ̃ lékàh, képah náh pɩ lénɔ̀lɛ ńmɔ kɔ̃.

Képah ye, yé káh ǹmɔ dyàh tɛ̃ lékàhlɛ névyelɛ n kɔ̃ ké gbĩ́ nɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ. Yé ǹ pɔ́nɔ́ syɩkɩ. Ǹmɔ kɩ pɔ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tyi wilki mɔ kwèyy, tɛ́ kɩ névye fɔkɔ sõnɔ wilki mɔ kégbɔ́. Képah sɔkɔ, yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ nɛ̂-à yɩ̃nɛ nɛ̂nɛ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ kè wɛ Liyel tyɩ́.

Ń yṹnpyé, yépi yĩn ye mé Apɔlɔsɩ ànɛ̂ ń gblɔ̌y pɩ dùkù tɔkɔ à yé wɛ̃kɩ, nɛ̂-á kɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ tyi nónó-á wãrkɩ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n pɩ n kah n mɔ sépi yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh ǹ gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́ sɔkɔ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tɔkɔ fṍnfṍ pɩ n kal n pi ǹ ní-òlɛ.
Kwâh nɛ̂ kɩ ǹ kɔ̃ á kɩ kal no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ? Kwâh nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ mɛ á tyɩ́, nɛ́ Liyel náh ǹ kɔ̃ kélɛ? Ǹtɛ kɔ̃́nɔ́ à kélɛ à, sɔ̃́ pɩ tɛ́ á á gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki á kɩ nɛ Liyel kósyì ǹ kɔ̃ kélɛ?

Yî nónó pól-á yé n yah n kɔ̃, yé ye núkú sè wɛ tɛ yé yo kɛ̀? Yé pɩ tɛ tahbɩlɛ yé yo kɛ̀? Yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ ye núkú yé mɛ n pɩ ápi kɛ̃́nɛ yé yo kɛ̀? Yáh náhkɩ sõ̀ mɛ wɛ pɩ yõ̀tãmnɛ ápi tɔ náh kɩ mɛ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ sɔkɔ yélɛ.

Ńkɛ̃́ kè mɛ ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, á kɩ nɛ Liyel sɔ̃́ ápi Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye pɩ no pól náh névyelɛ. Á pɩ névye sɔ̃́ nónó-á kɩ pɔ n ko n mɔ n pi. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á pɩ syáh syah yîlɛ kèkõyṍ pól tyɩ́, yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ tɔkɔ dohnɩ névye yõ.

Ápi pɩ nɛ́wã̂nnɛ Krista yĩnnɛ, tɛ́ yépi mɛ pɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́púlɛ Krista sɔkɔ yé yo kɛ̀? Ápi pɩ tɛ̃́nkwlɔpulɛ, tɛ́ yépi mɛ pɩ tɛ̃́nwɛpulɛ yé yo kɛ̀? Ápi mɛ yílɔ́nɔ́lɛ n wɛ, tɛ́ yõ̀yén mɛ n sah yépi yõ yé yo kɛ̀?
Yé náh wɛ di, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ syɩ núkúnúkú mɛ̀ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́, kwɛkɩ ànɛ̂ níkì mɛ álɛ n kwlɔ. Mɔ mɔ flɔ náh mɛ á tyɩ́. Á mɛ kolɛ n syi, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀-ǹsah náh mɛ á tyɩ́.
Á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ kétǎhkɩ̀yɔ̂ á gbã̀nnɛ, à á yõ yõ tɛ̃̀nɛ n wɛ. Pàh álɛ n gbyɔ, ǎ sãmnɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ. Pàh álɛ n fõh, ǎ kè fɛ̃ n syi.
Pàh á tyɩ́lɛ n yo n ko, ǎ wɛ̀npèplɔlɛ n wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́. Á mɛ pɩ tɛ̃ kèkõyṍ yésyɩ̂ ànɛ̂ ké yítúkúnìnɛ névye tyɩ́, pópó à pɔ syɩ núkúnúkú mɛ̀ tyɩ́ yɔ̀.
Ǹtɛ mé náh mɛ tyi nɔ́pilɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ nɛ mé sennɛ yé tɛ̃ dɛ́, gbáhdyâh ye mé n di n sah kélɛ yé tyɩ́, yépi nónó tyɩ́-á nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́ á kɩ nɛ ń wɛ̃́npì sɔ̃́.

Yé yah, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye yé pɩ ńmɔ wɛ̃́npìlɛ à sɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ. Képah ye, ńmɔ mɛ n mɔ kõ á kɩ nɛ yé sú sɔ̃́. Nónó-á mɛ yélɛ n kwɔ Yesu Krista tyilɛ, pàh sɔ̃́ mɛ nɔ nɛ́pĩ̂ kèyõ kwlɔ́lɛ ò (10 000), yé pɩ̃ nɛ sú núkú tɛ̃̀ ó-á yé tyɩ́.
Képah ye, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé ńmɔ pɩ dùkùlɛ n yah n pɩ.

Képah yĩn ye tɔ̃ mé Timotelɛ n tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á mɛ ń pídĩ́ sɔ̃́. Ǹ tyɩ́ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́-ò pèpɛy ye ǹnɛ. Ǹmɔ ye kɩ pɔ yé dyɔlɛ n to n kõ máh mɛ Krista wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, sɔ̃́-á mé kélɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ póllɛ n yah n kwɔ n kɔ̃ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ yé túkù mɛ n sõ nɛ mé náh ń syɩ n pɔ n pi yé tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ mɛ yuku pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah.

Ǹtɛ kàh kɩ nɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, mé kɩ n syɩ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ núkúnúkú. Wɛ̀ngbìl wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ náh n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ névi-á álɛ, Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ̂-á á sɔkɔ, képah ye n wɛ̃kɩ kélɛ. Képah ye, mâh pɔ pɔ, kè náh n yĩn n pi gblɔ̌y gbílkípú wɛ̀ngbìl nóhnɔ́-ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ-à kɩ mɛ pé tyɩ́, mé kɩ kè pɩ̃.
Máh kɩ kènpyãhnɩ́ tɔkɔ pɔ yé tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ máh kɩ pɔ yárr yé tyɩ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ mɛ yé n yah n kɔ̃?

Kè mɛ n nohnɩ ywɔ̃ ywɔ̃ pól sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́-á mɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ. Prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃-á mɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ syi sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ pɩ n pi. Pè nɛ yé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃-á mɛ ǹ sú kyɩ tɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ sépinɔ́ pól sɔkɔ, yé tɔ̃ mɛ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɔ̃ n sah n kɔ̃ kɛ̀? Kè pyě sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ kè pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ yèkwɔrɩlɛ yé tyɩ́, yé kɔ̃ yè kénɛ tɛ̃̀ yĩni n wilki yé wrɔ́.
Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh mɛ yélɛ fɩ̃́ núkú sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ mé mɛ yélɛ sõnɔ sɔkɔ. Képah ye, ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ lékàhlɛ yĩ mɛ̀ pɩ́-ò kɔ̃ tɛ, á kɩ nɛ mé sɔ̃́ mɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Yâh pɔ wɛ̃ tuke mɔ, ńmɔ tɔ kɩ mɛ yélɛ sõnɔ sɔkɔ. Sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ névi tɛ̃̀nɛ, yé Yesu Krista yĩn ànɛ̂ ǹ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ à wilki yé wrɔ́, yè ǹ gbàh dɛ n mɔ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃. Kàh tɛ̃̀nɛ n kwlɔ, à kɩ pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ yal mɔ ǹ min kɔ̃ kè kɩ wɛ pwah, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ.
Yé gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́ mɛ̀ yah náh. Yé se yɔ́ pɩ̃ nɛ, kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ kwéy ó-á n dɔkɔ mífã́hkɩ̀ póllɛ tɛ́.

Yé kénɛ tyípékè wilki n to yé wrɔ́, képah nɛ̂-á mɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ mɛ wásáá kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ kã̂n búrn tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Krista lésõ fɛ̃ syi pè kɔ̃ pè à ko mɔ Nsyifunɔ yɔ̃rɩ tyɛ́nɔ́ syáh képɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ ápi tyípêl wu n to yĩnnɛ á tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé mɛ wásáá kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ kã̂n búrn tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Yé yɛ à tyípêl duke pól wilki n to á min sɔkɔ, à mó nɛ n mɛ yályál nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ kã̂n búrn tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, nɛ̂-á pè n nɛ n tah Nsyifunɔ yɔ̃rɩ tyɛ́nɔ́ syáh sɔkɔ.
Máh lésõ sɛ́bɛ́y nɛ̂ wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́, mé lésõ yo ké sɔkɔ nɛ yé káh nɛ n pɩ n soh prɔ̀npɩbɩlɛ.

Ǹtɛ kèkõyṍ névye tyɩ́ sɔkɔ náh lésõ ńnɛ dɛ́. Kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ prɔ̀npɩbɩ, képah náh pɩ ké yĩ́sesúkú névye, ànɛ̂ ké yɩ̃́pú, képah náh pɩ, ké sãh fálpú tyɩ́ sɔkɔ-à sõ̀ ńnɛ, yé náh náhkɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ n wũ n pi kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ dò.

Ǹtɛ sɛ̃́ náh dɛ́. Mé nɛ névi nɛ̂-à ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n ye Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ prɔ̀prɔ̀lɛ n pɩ, képah náh pɩ, yĩ́sesúkúlɛ n pɩ, képah náh pɩ, sãhlɛ n fal, képah náh pɩ, névye tyɩ́lɛ n yo n ko, képah náh pɩ, sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ, képah náh pɩ, mɛ yɩ̃belɛ n yɩ̃, yé káh nɛ n pɩ n soh sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ nɛynɛ póllɛ. Yé káh yõke ńtɛ̃nɛ n yõ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ.

Tɛ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú tùkènɔ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, ńmɔ tõ̀ náh képahlɛ. Liyel ye kɩ tuke pélɛ. Ǹtɛ kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yé nɛ́pékè yĩni n wilki yé wrɔ́.»
Kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ tir-à de yépi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú sɔkɔ yɔ́ ànɛ̂ ǹ ní-ò wrɔ́, yě yé tĩ̀nkì névye sah, ǹ tɛ́ kè tɔkɔ n kyɩ nɛ n tuke Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú tyɩ́?
Yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú-á kɩ pɔ kèkõyṍ névye tuke n pi di? Ǹtɛ yépi-à mɛ pɔ n tuke n pi kèkõyṍ névyelɛ, tyípî wɔ se yé kɩ tɛ̃ tuke kwlɔ?
Yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, áyáh kɩ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ ńtɛ̃ tuke n pi di? Tɛ́ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tyi wɔlɛ pyě á kɩ pɔ tuke kwlɔ nɩ?
Ǹtɛ sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ tir-à wɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, névi nɛ̂-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú náh mɛ ǹnɛ n mɔ n kõ, yè n pyě n kyɩ ǹmɔ tɔkɔ n pɔ nɛ, à pɔ kè tuke nɩ?
Sen ye kélɛ yé tyɩ́ dɛ́. Yépi tɛ̃̀ wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, lékã́m névi yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh núkú mɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ fɛ̃ yé wrɔ́ tyi yah wah lɛ́?
Tir se yɩ̃nɛ kè wɛ yé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ànɛ̂ ǹ ní-ò wrɔ́, kè syi n pɔ n yĩni n tɛ̃ tukey tùkè-ǹsah sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú ńtɛ̃ tɔ pɔ pɩ ké tùkèpulɛ?
Ǹtɛ yáh fyɔ̀ mɛ wɛ̃ tɛ̃̀nɛ n ye n tuke n pɔ, képah yé tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ wɛ̃kɩ tɛ dò. Kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ pàh tyíkɛ̃̌kɩ̀ pɩ yé tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ pàh yé gbã̀n yî yɩ̃ tɔkɔ, yè n tɛ̃ yé nnɔ tɛ̃ n kwlɔ?
Tɛ́ yépi ye mó tɔ̃ n pɩ kénɛ tyíknɛ̌nɩ̀ ànɛ̂ yɩ̃be tyilɛ yé yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́.
Yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ tyíknɛ̃̌nɩ̀ pɩ́pú náh n de n pi Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ di? Yé káh yé gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ mɔ lɔ́. Prɔ̀npɩbɩ, ànɛ̂ sãh fálpú, ànɛ̂ fɔ̀fɩ́npɩbɩ, ànɛ̂ díbí wɛ̃ tɔ́kɔ́pú,
ànɛ̂ yɛ̃́nwóbé, ànɛ̂ yĩ́sesúkú névye, ànɛ̂ sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀ pɩ́pú, ànɛ̂ névye tyɩ́ yónkòpu, ànɛ̂ névye yõ syɩ́kɩ́púlɛ, pépi sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n de n pi Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ yé yah, sɛ̃́nknɔ névye ye sõ̀ yé túkùlɛ ǹgbòlɛ. Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista ànɛ̂ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, yé pɩ yályál. Yé mɛ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ. Yé pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.

Kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tyi pól pɩ́nɔ́ gbàh mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.» Ǹtɛ yõre náh n wɛ sé túkù sɔkɔ. «Tyi pól pɩ́nɔ́ gbàh mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.» Ǹtɛ ńmɔ náh n pɩ n pi sé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yɔ̃̀lɛ lɔ́.

Kè tɔ̃ mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yõke mɛ kèkùrkì yĩnnɛ, kèkùrkì tɔ mó mɛ yõke yĩnnɛ.» Ǹtɛ Liyel kɩ pɔ sé nínɔ́ pól tyɩ́ yɩkɩ n pi. Ǹtɛ névi wil gbɛ̃́nsê tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh mɔ prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ yĩnnɛ dɛ́, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ ye kè mɔ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tɔ ye mó n yah ké yõ.
Liyel ye yilki mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu lékólɛ. À kɩ ápi tɔ lékyɩ̂ yilki n mɔ n pi ǹ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Yé se yɔ́ pɩ̃ nɛ, yé wil gbɛ̃́nsênɔ́lɛ, Krista wil tã̀ntã̀nnɔ́-á tɛ́. Mé pɩ sɔ̃́ mè n pɔ Krista wil fɩ̃́ yɔ́ tɔkɔ n pɔ n kwrɔ n mɔ prɔ̀npɩ willɛ? Póllɛ, mé náh képah pɩ n yah n pi.

Yé se yɔ́ pɩ̃ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ prɔ̀npɩlɛ, pé nímí-á kwrɔ mɔ pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ tɛ́. Kè mɛ yónɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, pé nímí-á kwrɔ mɔ pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ.
Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-à ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu kɔ̃, tɛ̃̀ sõnɔ vi n mɔ n pɩ núkúlɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tyɩ́lɛ.

Yé yé náh vi prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ kɔ̃. Tyípêl tɛ́lɔ́ nónó-á névi n nɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ wil gbɛ̃́nsê vyãh náh n wɛ sé sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, ǹ tɛ̃̀ mɛ n pɩ n de ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyɩ́.

Yé se yɔ́ pɩ̃ nɛ, yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê-á Liyel Mirki mɛ́-ńsahlɛ tɛ́. Liyel ye yé kɔ̃ ǹ Mirkilɛ, nɛ̂-á déntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé sɔkɔ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ye yé dwe dántǎhlɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé tyɩ́ náh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ dò. Képah ye, yé yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê pɩ ǹ gbilki gbilki kwâhlɛ.
Yáh tyi nónó piki yah ń tyɩ́ yé sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ, sépi yah ye mé kɩ yo yé syah núkúnúkú yɔ̀. Yé nɛ ńkɛ̃́
Ǹtɛ prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ yah kõ yĩnnɛ, kè ye fṍnfṍ dĩ́ mɛ̀ dĩ́ mɛ̀, à sê tɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ sê mɛ̀ sê mɛ̀, ǹ tɔ mó de pɛ tyɩ́.
Dĩ́-á yɩ̃nɛ nɛ̂ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ ǹ kyɩ tyɩ́ tnɔ sɔkɔ, à kélɛ n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́. Sê tɔ-á yɩ̃nɛ nɛ̂ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ ǹ pɛ tyɩ́ tnɔ sɔkɔ, ǹ tɔ kélɛ n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́.
Sê tyɩ́ yõ náh ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ dɛ́. Ǹ pɛ tyɩ́ yõ ye kélɛ. Dĩ́ tɔ tyɩ́ yõ náh ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ dɛ́. Ǹ kyɩ tyɩ́ yõ ye kélɛ.

Yé káh pɛ̀kɩ̀ kãm wɛ̃nɛ, nɛ́ kè náh pɩ yé nímí yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ nírí yɔ́ wɛ n pɩ yĩnnɛ wrɔ́ kwéy yɔ́ ó sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ képah-à sɔkɔ tɛ, yé yé syɩ pɛ̀kɩ̀ kwrɔ mɔ. Képah-à pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, yé kɩ pɔ n syah n tɛ̃ n kwlɔ, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃ à kɩ syɔ̃̀-ǹsah wɛ kɩ yé wilki mɔ.
Ǹtɛ ńmɔ-á nɛ̂ yo yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀, kyɩ̃̀nmɔnɔ náh dɛ́, syɔ̃̀-ǹsah yɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ye mé yé kɔ̃.

Kàh ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ ó sɔ̃́, mé sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ no pól nɛ mɛ lédyɔ́nɩ̀nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Ǹtɛ Liyel ye no pól mɔ ànɛ̂ pé tɛ̃́nwɛ-ńtã̂nnɛ. Ǎ tir yɔ́ pɩ́nɔ́ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǹtɛ kèyǎh pɩ́nɔ́ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ ǹ ní-ò kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-á mé kɩ yo lédyɔ́nɩ̀ ànɛ̂ pɛ́kúsyɔ tyɩ́, képah ye yɔ̀. Pàh tɛ̃ lédyɔ́nɩ̀nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, képah kɩ plɛ.
Ǹtɛ pàh kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ pé náh fɛ̃ pé gblɔ̌y tɛ̃ n pi, pè fúr pɩ. Fúr pɩ́nɔ́ ye fṍnfṍ kal, ǹ tɛ̃ lédɔ́rɩ́ kɔ̃ kè nɛ n ko.
Tɛ́ nónó-á fúr pɩ tɛ, máh kɩ nɛ̂ kõ n sah pè kɔ̃ n pi, ńmɔ náh n kõ n sah kélɛ pé tyɩ́ dɛ́. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ye n kõ n sah kélɛ pé tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sê náh yɩ̃nɛ à yal ǹ pɛ tyɩ́.
Wàh se mó yal ǹ pɛ tyɩ́, à náh tɔ̃ yɩ̃nɛ à de pɛ káhkɩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́, à yɩ̃nɛ à ǹ syɩ yuku ǹ pɛ tyɩ́, pè kyɩ pé wrɔ́ tɔ̃ n sah. Ǹtɛ dĩ́ tɔ káh mó ǹ kyɩ wilki.

Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-á mé n yo no tɛ́lɔ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ yɔ̀, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ náh n yo képahlɛ dɛ́. Ńmɔ ye n yo kélɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́ sê-à mɛ nɛ̂ náh pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ, tɛ́ kénɛ pi mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé tɛ̃ ǹ tyɩ́, à káh à wilki.
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò sê yɔ́ tɔ tyɩ́ pɛ-à mɛ nɛ̂ náh pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ, tɛ́ kénɛ dĩ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé tɛ̃ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, à káh yal ǹ tyɩ́.

Yé náh wɛ di, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò pi mɛ̀ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye ǹ pɛ kɩ mɛ yúkɛy Liyellɛ, ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò dĩ́ mɛ̀ tɔ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye ǹ kyɩ kɩ mɛ yúkɛy Liyellɛ. Ńkɛ̃́ kàh pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ sɛ̃́, pé wɛ̃́npì kɩ mɛ á kɩ nɛ pé wrɔ́ sɔ̃́ dɔ Liyellɛ. Ǹtɛ kègbɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ sɔkɔ, pè ye mɛ yúkɛy Liyellɛ.

Ǹtɛ kàh mɛ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ nɛy tɛ̃̀ wɔ nɛ páh pé ní-ò Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ n yahle, yé yɛ à kɔ̃ à kè pɩ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹ ní-ò Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò nɛ̂-á pɛ képah náh pɩ kyɩlɛ, ǹmɔ kɩ wɛ wũ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ sɔkɔ. Yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ tɛ̃ yĩn ye Liyel ye álɛ dò.
Ńkɛ̃́ à, áwɔ nɛ̂-á kyɩlɛ, á se sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ wáh kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ á pɛ min pwah mɔ? Tĩ̂, áwɔ nɛ̂-á pɛlɛ, á se sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ, wáh kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ á kyɩ min pwah mɔ?

Ǹtɛ sépi pól sɔkɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel-à nɛ̂ sah swɔ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, kè yɩ̃nɛ kè yɩ̃nɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́. Nɛ̂-à sõ̀ mɛ swɔ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ tɛ́ Liyel à ye pɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, à yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ képahlɛ. Kénɛ pɩ dùkù ye mé mɛ n yo Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ pól tyɩ́.
Névi nɛ̂-à sõ̀ mɛ kõ̀nɔ́lɛ tɛ́ Liyel à ye, tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ kõ̀nɔ́lɛ. Nɛ̂ tɔ-à sõ̀ mɛ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ tɛ́ Liyel à ye, tɛ̃̀ tɔ káh nɛ páh kõ̀kèlɛ n kõ.
Á kõ ò, á náh kõ ò, yõ náh mɛ képah tyɩ́. Yõ-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, képah ye Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́lɛ.
Nɛ̂-à sõ̀ mɛ swɔ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ tɛ́ Liyel à ye pɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à tɛ̃ képah sɔkɔ.
Wâh sõ̀ mɛ yɔ̃̀lɛ tɛ́ à ǹ ye, káh n yɛ kè álɛ n yɔ. Ǹtɛ gblɔ̌y yõ wɛ́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩ-à mó wil mɔ á yõ, káh n yɛ kè n kal.
Yé náh wɛ di, névi nɛ̂-à sõ̀ mɛ yɔ̃̀lɛ tɛ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ à ye, ǹ tyípêl yɔ̃rɩ n tyɛ. Yé náh wɛ tɔlɛ à, névi nɛ̂-à sõ̀ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ tɛ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ à ye, à n pɩ Krista yɔ̃̀lɛ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yé dwe wilki yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ dántǎhlɛ. Képah ye, yé káh ńtɔ̃ n pɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yɔ̃̀lɛ gbógbó.
Ǹtɛ ń yṹnpyé, yáh lésõ mɛ swɔ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ tɛ́ Liyel yé ye pɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, yé yɩ̃nɛ yè tɛ̃ képah ó sɔkɔ.

Névye nónó-á pè náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ fúr pɩ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ náh tir yɔ́ yo ń tyɩ́ pé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ, mé pɩ névi yɔ́lɛ nɛ̂-á yé kɩ fɛ̃ sɛ̃ ń yõ. Képah ye, mé kɩ ń yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ sõnɔ yo yé tyɩ́ fúr tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Tyi-á mɛ tɛ̃ tah sɔ̃́ kwɛy gbĩ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, ńmɔ sõnɔ sɔkɔ, yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól-à tɛ̃ sɔ̃́-á yélɛ, képah kɩ nɛkɩ kal yélɛ.
Wáh kɩ mɛ sê tɔkɔ tɛ, káh à fĩn n mɔ. Wáh kɩ se mó tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ mɛ sê tɔ́kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, sê tɔ́kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ fṍnfṍ.

Dĩ́-à sê tɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ sênpir-à de pɛ tyɩ́, tyípékè tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh pè pɩ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á mɛ ké sɔkɔ, ké pɩ́pú kɩ kwlɔ́nɔ́lɛ n wɛ. Képah yah ye mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé n kõ yé tyɩ́.
Ń yṹnpyé, mé kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, tyah mɛ n tyah sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔlɛ. Képah ye, à tɔkɔ núkúnúkú tyɩ́, sê-à mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ nɛ n mɛ á kɩ nɛ, sê kósyì mɛ ǹ tyɩ́.

Nɛ̂-à mɛ gbní sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ nɛ n mɛ á kɩ nɛ à kósyì mɛ gbní sɔkɔ. Nɛ̂-à mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ nɛ n mɛ á kɩ nɛ à kósyì mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Nɛ̂-à mɛ yídwénènɛ n dwe, tɛ̃̀ nɛ n mɛ á kɩ nɛ ǹ tyɩ́ kósyì yídwénè nɔ́pilɛ.
Nɛ̂-à mɛ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ nɔlɩlɛ n yõ, tɛ̃̀ nɛ n mɛ á kɩ nɛ à kósyì mɛ ké nɔlɩlɛ n yõ. Wáh n yah yɔ̀, kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ náh tɔ̃ n mo n pi lɔ́.
Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ káh kwel. Névi nɛ̂-à sê tɔ́kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, tɛ̃̌ ǹ fɔkɔlɛ n sõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tã̀n tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Ǎ n nɛ n mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ sê-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̌ ǹ fɔkɔlɛ n sõ kèkõyṍ tyi yõ. Ǎ n nɛ n mɛ ǹ kyɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃.

Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹ nɩ n nɛ n mɛ n yil n kɔ̃ yey nínínɛ. Tɛ́ sênpir, képah náh pɩ sê nɛ̂-à dé-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ pɛ tyɩ́, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tã̀n yah syi tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́. Tɛ̃̌ ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ n dal n mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tã̀n pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ sê pɛ̀tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, kèkõyṍ tyi yah syi ǹmɔ tyɩ́. Ǎ n nɛ n mɛ ǹ pɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃.

Mé náh tyi nɔ́pi yo yé tyɩ́ yé fíkéntɛ̃nɔ yĩnnɛ dɛ́, yé yohnɩ n mɔ yĩn ye mé n yo sélɛ yé tyɩ́. Képah ye, nɛ̂-á pèpɛynɛ, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé képahlɛ n pɩ, képah nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ó tã̀n yah wṹnɔ́lɛ.
Kètɛ̃̀npìkì nɛ̂-à pɩ̃ nɛ pé ségbɩ̃́nɩ́ dékè-á mɛ pélɛ n ko,

Ǹtɛ kètɛ̃̀npìkì nɛ̂-à kè yah tɔkɔ ǹ nɩ sɔkɔ nɛy fyã̀h-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ yõ, tɛ́ nɛ páh kɩ fɛ̃ tɛ̃ pé gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ lédɔ́rɩ́ náh fɛ̃ pé fwo pɛ̀kɩ̀ kɔ̃ kè n wɛ n pi pé wrɔ́ pé ségbɩ̃́nɩ́nɛ, tɛ̃̀ pɩ plɛ.
Képah ye, nɛ̂-à ǹ ségbɩ̃́nɩ́ fur, tɛ̃̀ pɩ plɛ. Tɛ́ nɛ̂-à ǹ ségbɩ̃́nɩ́ fúr-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ pɩ plɛ kal.
Sê pɛ-à fyɔ̀ mɛ min sɔkɔ, à yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ ǹmɔ ó tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ ǹ pɛ-à pɔ yah kwlɔ, à kɩ fɛ̃ de pɛ yɔ́ tyɩ́ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ.
Ǹtɛ ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ ó sõnɔ sɔkɔ, wàh wũ dé-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ pɛ tyɩ́, képah nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ kɩ kal ǹ tyɩ́. Ńmɔ fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ ye mé yo yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀. Ǹtɛ ńmɔ sõnɔ sɔkɔ, Liyel Mirki mɛ ń sɔkɔ.

Á ye á fɔkɔ mɔ n yah núkúnúkú à yuku sãh fálnɔ́ kyɔ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye yé yo nɛ á pól-á mɛ tyilɛ n pnɛ ó. Tɛ́ kénɛ tyi pnɛ̀nɔ́ wɔ ye mó tɔ̃ n mɔ névilɛ gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ wɔ yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ névilɛ n kɔ̃.
Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ n sõ nɛ páh tyilɛ n pnɛ, tɛ̃̀ náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ mɛ kwâh yɔ́lɛ n pnɛ wǎh sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ à sè pɩ̃ sɔ̃́.
Ǹtɛ Liyel tyɩ́-à nɔ névi nɛ̂ tyɩ́, Liyel tɛ̃̀nɛ n pnɛ.
Ǹtɛ à yuku sãh fálnɔ́ kɔ̀ kɔ̀nɔ́ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, á se yɩ̃nɛ à sélɛ n kɔ? Á pɩ̃ nɛ fal fal tõ̀lɛ, kwâh yɔ́ náh kélɛ kèkõyṍ sɔkɔ, Liyel núkú ó-á mɛ.
Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye, yíyìn náhnáh mɛ yĩ̂nyõ ànɛ̂ sétáh yõ, nónó-á túkù mɛ sélɛ n tɔkɔ n pɩ pé líyelnɔ́lɛ. Ǹtɛ líyelnɔ́ ànɛ̂ tãm náhnáh-à sɔ̃́ mɛ pé tyɩ́,

ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́, Liyel núkú ó ye mɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á Súlɛ. Ǹmɔ ye mɔ yíyìn póllɛ, ápi mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ. Sɛ̃́ ó ye, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ núkú ó tɔ ye mɛ, nɛ̂-á Yesu Kristalɛ. Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye yíyìn pól mɛ, ànɛ̂ ápi tɔlɛ min sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ fal fal tã̀nnɛ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú túkù náh pɩ̃ nɛ kwâh yɔ́ náh sélɛ. Pé túkù lésõ dar kah mɔ sãh fálnɔ́ tyilɛ. Tɛ́ pépi sɔkɔ nónó tɛ̃̀ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-à fyɔ̀ yúkú-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ yahlɛ, pàh sãh fálnɔ́ kɔ̀lɛ n kɔ, pè n nɛ n sõ n kyɩ n pɔ sãh fálnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè n nɛ n sõ nɛ tyípékè-á pé n pɩ kɔ̀ mɛ̀ kɔ̀nɔ́lɛ.
Yõke náh ápi nɔ n de n pi Liyellɛ dò. Ké yṍ-ńkɛ̃̂ náh kwâh yɔ́ wilki n pi á sɔkɔ, ké yṍnɔ́ tɔ náh se mó tɔ̃ kwâh yɔ́ dohnɩ n pi á yõ.
Sé kɔ̀nɔ́ gbàh sénsɔ̃ mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ yé tyɩ́ ó, ǹtɛ yé kyɔ̀mɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ, képah káh pɔ túkùlɛ n syɩkɩ n mɔ, nónó Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ náh mɛ yuku yahlɛ.

Sɔ̃́-á áwɔ nɛ̂-á tyilɛ n pnɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à ńtyɩ̃́nɔ kyɩ ǹ wɛ tõ̀ wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ á mɛ yõkelɛ n yõ, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ náh mɛ yuku yahlɛ, sɔ̃́ mɛ kè kɩ pɩ? Kè náh sṍré mɔ n pi tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, à kɔ̃ à sãh fálnɔ́ kɔ̀lɛ n kɔ n pi di?
Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́ à, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ǹ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ náh mɛ yuku yahlɛ, ǹ min náh n mɔ n pu n pi áwɔ tyi pnɛ̀nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ di? Tɛ́ á yṹnpi ye mó tɔ̃ ǹnɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tɔ yĩn-á Yesu Krista ku.
Yâh n pɩ n de yé yṹnpyé tyɩ́ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ à pé sõnɔlɛ n yɩkɩ pé tyi yah wɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ yĩnnɛ, Yesu Krista tyɩ́ ye yé n pɩ n de dɛ́.
Mâh nɛ yõke yɔ́ yõ, tɛ́ képah ń yṹnpi yɔ́ yõ yɩkɩ n mɔ n pi tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé kɩ kè wɛ yɛ gbógbó. Képah sɔkɔ, mé náh tɛ̃̀ yõ yɩkɩ n mɔ n pi tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Ń yṹnpyé, gblɔ̌y yõ névi náh ńnɛ di? Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi náh ńnɛ di? Mé náh Yesu wɛ yĩ́nɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ di? Ńmɔ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ náh yé wɛ sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ di?

Yáh fyɔ̀ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, képah kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ ǹ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi-á ńnɛ. Képah ye, túkù-à sɔ̃́ ké pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ń tyɩ́ nɛ ǹmɔ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi-á ńnɛ, yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔ yɩ̃nɛ yè kè pɩ̃.
Nónó-á mɛ n tɔkɔ ńmɔlɛ n kɔ̃, máh nɛ nɛ̂ yo n pi pé tyɩ́, kè wɛ yɔ̀:
Ápi náh yɩ̃nɛ à á tã̀n pɩ́nɔ́ yõke yõ à mó ké ni wɔ di?

Ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ náh mɛ ápi tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ syɔ́ tɔkɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú sɔkɔ, tɛ́ áyâh n sɔkɔ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, á fɛ̃ n sɔkɔ n pi pélɛ, sɔ̃́-á Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tɛ́lɔ́ kélɛ n pɩ, pépi nónó sɔkɔ yɔ́-á Pyɛrɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ sɔ̃́-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yṹnpyé kélɛ n pɩ di?
Tĩ̂, ńmɔ ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ ó kɔ́kɔ́ se yɩ̃nɛ à tã̀n káhkɩ́nɔlɛ n pɩ ńtɔ̃ à á gblɔ̌y vyãhlɛ n yah?

Yé se kè wɛ noh yah nɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-á mɛ sràsyìyálɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ mɛ yĩn ǹ gblɔ̌y yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ? Tĩ̂, séswɔ̂ sṍ-ò náh yɩ̃nɛ ké pye yṍnɔ́lɛ di? Tĩ̂, nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ yípɛ̂ynɛ n fɛ̃, tɛ́ à náh sé yɛ̃́níkì wɔ n pi?
Yé káh n wɛ nɛ kégbɔ́ mɛ̀ tyi pɩ dùkù ó-á mé yah tɛ́ sélɛ n yo dɛ́. Kè tɔ̃ mɛ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ ńtɛ̃nɛ tɔ́tɔ́ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Kénɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ nɛ̂-á Liyel Moyisi kɔ̃, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, nyeh-à mɛ swãh tṍnɔ́ sɔkɔ á tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, á káh sé vyɛ̃y pukubi á sèmukɔ yṍnɔ́lɛ.

Ápi yĩn náh à yo kélɛ di? Àwe, ápi yĩn ye à yo kélɛ. Yé náh wɛ à, ápi yĩn ye tyi nɔ́pilɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ ńtɔ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sètõ-à swãhlɛ n wɔ, ǹ sõnɔ n nɛ n mɛ ǹ wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀ yõ. Táh mɩ́-ò tɔ-à mó táhlɛ n mɩ, ǹ sõnɔ n nɛ mɛ ǹ wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀ yõ.
Ápi-á pɔ Liyel wɛy yo yé tyɩ́, ǹ tyɩ́ kɔ̃ kè wɛ de yé nnɔ sɔkɔ à; áyâh sõ̀ mɛ yé gbã̀n yîlɛ á gblɔ̌ynɛ n pu, kè se yɩ̃nɛ kè yé gbã̀n du?

Ké yah-à kɩ nɛ̂ fyɔ̀ névye túkù mɛ sɛ̃́nknɔlɛ n pɩ yé tyɩ́ à, ápi wɔ se pyě? Tɛ́ képah fyé yõ, ápi náh kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ syi yé tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ ápi náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ kè fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́ dahbɩ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sɔkɔ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ yõ. Képah ye, á mɛ tyi pól sro.
Tɛ́ yé pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Liyel ní-ńsah gbô tõ̀ pɩ́púlɛ, Liyel ní-ńsah gbô-á n yah pé vyãhlɛ. Sárká syínwìlkìpu tɔ-á pé wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ n wɛ sárká yî sɔkɔ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sɔkɔ-á Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yópú kɩ n yõ.

Ǹtɛ ńmɔ yõke yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh wil képah sɔkɔ. Mé náh mó tɔ̃ mɛ tyi nɔ́pilɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ nɛ mé yé kõ sélɛ dɛ́. Máh kélɛ n pɩ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ nɛ̂nɛ n wɛ ké sɔkɔ, kàh nɛ̂ n tɛ̃ n syi n pi ń tyɩ́, mè n ku ńtɛ̃nɛ.
Kè nɔ ń tyɩ́ ò, kè náh nɔ ń tyɩ́ ò, mé yɩ̃nɛ mè yo ólɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo. Képah ye, ké yónɔ́ náh mɛ yĩ́nyáhkɩ̀ tirlɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ pèkè mɛ ń yõ, mâh yahle ké yónɔ́lɛ.
Ńmɔ-à sõ̀ mɛ yah tɔkɔ tõ̀ mɛ̀nɛ, à ń gblɔ̌y mɔ ké pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé náhkɩ ké yõre wɛ. Ǹtɛ kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ye Liyel kõ sah ń kɔ̃ kélɛ mé n pɩ. Képah ye, ń pɩ pɩ tõ̀ ó ye mé n pɩ.
Ǹtɛ ńmɔ wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀ wɔ nɛ̂nɛ wɛ́? Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ nɛ̂-á mɛ ń sɔkɔ ń kɔ̃ mé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo névye tyɩ́ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ kwâh yɔ́ yáhnkɔ̃-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ké sɔkɔ, képah ye ń wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yɔ̃̀ náh ńnɛ dɛ́, mé mɛ ń gblɔ̌y yõ. Ǹtɛ mé ń gblɔ̌y pɩ no pól yɔ̃̀lɛ nɛ mé pé yõ vi n mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.

Mâh mɛ Nsyifunɔ sɔkɔ, mě ń minnɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ nɛ mé pé yõ vi n mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Pépi nónó-á Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́púlɛ, mě ń minnɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ ǹ pé yõ wɛ n vi n mɔ, tɛ́ sé wã̀l kɔ́-ò náh mó tɔ̃ ńnɛ dɛ́.

Mâh sɔ̃́ mɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂pú sɔkɔ ò, mè n nɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, ǹ pé náhnáh yõ wɛ n vi n mɔ. Tɛ́ képah náh n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ névi-á ńnɛ dɛ́. Máh fyɔ̀ mɛ Krista tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l tɛ̃̀nɛ n kɔ, képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l-á mé n kɔ.

Névye nónó Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ náh yuku yahlɛ, mâh mɛ pé sɔkɔ, mě ń minnɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ nɛ mé pé yõ vi n mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Mâh sɔ̃́ mɛ nɛ́dúké nónó sɔkɔ ò, mě ń gblɔ̌y pɩ pɩ dùkùnɔ́ póllɛ pé yĩnnɛ, nɛ mé pé túkù yõ wɛ n vi n mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.
Mé mɛ tyi nɔ́pi póllɛ n pɩ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ yah yuku yĩnnɛ, nɛ pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ ké sɔkɔ, ń vyãh wɛ ké sɔkɔ.
Yé se pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ wɛ̃ kàlnɔ́ tólɔ́ tópú pól-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ n mɛ n to kéntáhkɩ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pé nɛ́núkù ó-á n wɛ ké yõrelɛ tɛ́? Yépi tɔ nɛ n to tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ ké yõre wɛ yĩnnɛ.
Wɛ̃ kàlnɔ́ tólɔ́ tópú kwlɔ́nɔ́nɔ pól fɛ̃ n syi yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ pɔ n wɛ yĩnnɛ, nɛ̂-á kè náh n mo n pi. Ǹtɛ ápi kélɛ n pɩ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ pɔ n wɛ yĩnnɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ mɛ kṹmm.
Képah ye ńmɔ tɔ mɛ n to, tɛ́ mé náh mɛ n to n dah n mɔ dɛ́. Mé mɛ gbõ̀nkukuri syɩ́-ò yɔ́ sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á à náh n syɩ n dah n mɔ.
Ńmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel wɛynɛ n yo no tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́, mé mɛ ń wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ n fõh ń gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ mé káh n pɔ n tɛkɩ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé, nɛ̂-á á sútóbé yĩni tɛ̃ Moyisi gbĩ sɔkɔ, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé yé dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ kélɛ. Pé pól sõ̀ mɛ n kɔ ńyĩ́rkì fob sõ̀, tɛ́ de kah pnɛ yɔ́nsyã̂h sɔkɔ pé tɔ̂ɔ́.
Pé pól de sɔkɔ ńyĩ́rkì fob sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ pnɛ yɔ́nsyã̂h sɔkɔ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, à pɩ Moyisi sõ̀ tɛ̃́púlɛ.
Pé pól yõke núkú yõ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á wil Liyel tyɩ́,
tɛ́ mɛ wɔ wɔ ni núkú wɛ wɔ, nɛ̂-á wil Liyel tyɩ́. Tɛ́dáhkɩ̀ yɔ́ sɔkɔ ni ye sõ̀ kélɛ. Kénɛ tɛ́dáhkɩ̀lɛ sõ̀, Krista ye nɛ̂-á mɛ n yuku pélɛ.
Ǹtɛ pé kan náh sõ̀ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah.
Kénɛ tyi ye pɩ, à ápi yɩ̃́ yɩkɩ, nɛ̂-á kɩ á kɔ̃ á yĩ́ náh tɔ̃ n wil n pi tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ pépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Yé káh pɩ sãh fálpúlɛ pépi túkù tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, pépi nónó tyɩ́-á yónɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɔ́wû ye kɔ̃ tɛ̃ à n yõ, tɛ́ n wɔ, képah náh tɛ́ yuku à syáhlɛ n syah.»
Á ye káh á gblɔ̌y pɩ prɔ̀npɩbɩlɛ, sɔ̃́-á lésõ pé túkù kélɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ nɛ́pĩ̂ kèyõ gbɔ̃núkú kyɛgbãm (23 000) mɛ ku pé sɔkɔ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì núkúlɛ.
Á ye káh Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n mɔ n yah, sɔ̃́-á lésõ pé túkù pɩ kélɛ, tɛ́ vyeh mɛ pè kwãkɩ ko.
Yé káh Liyel sèyòkèlɛ n yo sɔ̃́-á lésõ pé túkù kélɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ nɛ̂-á nɛ́kókèlɛ n mɔ, ǹmɔ mɛ pɔ pé duku to.
Tyi nɔ́pi ye pè yĩni tɛ̃, à névye yĩ́ yɩkɩ. Ápi nónó-á mɛ kèkõyṍ tyɛ́ntɛnɔ gbĩ́ mɛ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, ápi yĩn ye pè tyi nɔ́pi wãrkɩ, à gbáhdyâh di sah á tyɩ́.
Képah ye, nɛ̂-à mɛ n sõ nɛ páh mɛ wɛ su yĩn pallɛ, tɛ̃̀ kyɔ̀mɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ, à káh pɔ yɔ̃ syɩkɩ.

Tɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ nónó-á yé yĩni tɛ̃ yah, sɛ̃́nknɔ ye n nɔ névi yõ̀tàhsyilɛ. Ǹtɛ Liyel n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀. À náh n yɛ tɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ kɔ̃ kè kǎn pɩ n pi yélɛ. Tɛ́ tɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ-à yé wɛ, à kɩ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ kè fwo, tɛ́ kɩ yé wɛ̃kɩ syɔ̃̀-ǹsahlɛ, yáh nɛ wɛ n wil n pi ké sɔkɔ sɔ̃́.
Ń yṹnpyé pèplɔ, yé yé náh vi tã̀n tyi kɔ̃ pnɛ́pnɛ́.
Ńmɔ mɛ yélɛ n mɔ n kõ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú sɔkɔ. Képah ye, tyi nónó-á mé n yo yé tyɩ́, yé sõ n yah sé tyɩ́ yõ yé gblɔ̌y.

Liyel yõke yõ gbĩ́nɛ, áyáh ńkɛ̃́nɛ wɔ wɔ kwâh nɛ̂ wɔ á wɛ́kɩ́ntɛnɔ náh Liyel tyɩ́, képah kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ áyáh pɩ núkúlɛ Yesu Kristalɛ ǹ tṍ kwɛ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Búrn nɛ̂ tɔ-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ à n kwɔkɩ n dibi n tah wɛ̃ tyɩ́, ké tɔ álɛ n pɩ núkúlɛ Yesu Krista wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ.
Búrn núkú ó ye mɛ. Tɛ́ ápi pípí nɔ́pi pól mɛ kénɛ búrn núkú mɛ̀ ólɛ n tah. Képah ye, kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ á pól sɔ̃́ pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ.

Tir nɛ̂-á mɛ n pɩ Yisrayel no nɩyṍ, yé yé fɔkɔ mɔ n yah képah tyɩ́ yõ kɛ̀. Pé sárká súkɛ́nkɔ̃-ńsah mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ. Képah ye, yípɛ̂y nónó-á pè n ko ké yõ sɔkɔ, pé nónó-á sé kyɔlɛ n kɔ, pè mɛ núkúlɛ Liyellɛ.
Képah se n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ máh nɛ yõre-á mɛ tã̀n ànɛ̂ sãh fálnɔ́ kyɔ tyɩ́?
Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́, mé nɛ sãh fálpú-á sãhlɔ nónónɛ n fal, sétã̀n tyɩ́-á pè n fal sélɛ, Liyel tyɩ́ náh. Mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé pɩ núkúlɛ sétã̀nnɛ gbógbó.
Yé náh fɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wóh sɔkɔ wɔ wɔ kwâh wɔ n pi, tɛ́ tɔ̃ yé yah vi n wɔ n pi sétã̀n tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Yé náh fɛ̃ nɛ n yõ n pi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ tɔ̃ yé yah vi kyɩ n yõ n pi sétã̀n tyɩ́.
Tĩ̂, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂-á nɛ á nɛ n mɛ péwɔ ó tyɩ́ yõ, ǹmɔ vyãh sõ̀ se á n yah n kɔ̃ nóh-ńsahlɛ? Ápi tǎhkɩ̀ se kal ǹ tyɩ́lɛ?

Kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tyi pól pɩ́nɔ́ gbàh mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ.» Ǹtɛ yõre náh n wɛ sé túkù sɔkɔ. «Tyi pól pɩ́nɔ́ gbàh mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔlɛ.» Ǹtɛ sé túkù pɩ́nɔ́ náh yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ névilɛ n kɔ̃.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh ǹ gblɔ̌y pɛ́kɩ́-ńsah ólɛ n yah n kɔ̃ dɛ́, yé no tɛ́lɔ́ pɛ́kɩ́-ńtã̂nnɛ n yah n kɔ̃ n kal.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ ye sétáh ànɛ̂ ké sɔkɔ yíyìn póllɛ.»

Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névi yɔ́-à ǹ ye yõke yṍnɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ á fɛ̃ syi kyɩ, wàh yé nónó tɔkɔ pɔ, sélɛ n yõ fwòó. Kè náh yɩ̃nɛ kè pɩ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ á tyɩ́ ǹ kɔ̃ ǹ pɔ píkínyahnɔ yɔ́lɛ n pɩ sé wìl-ǹtã̀n tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à yo á tyɩ́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, kɔ̀ mɛ̀nɛ, sãh fálnɔ́ kɔ̀-á kélɛ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ yĩnnɛ ànɛ̂ ké tyɩ́ sõnɔ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́ yĩnnɛ, káh kè kɔ.

Sõnɔ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á mé yo ásõ̂ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, áwɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ náh ńnɛ dɛ́, nɛ̂-á yo ǹ syah kélɛ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ ye ńnɛ. Ǹtɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɩ fɛ̃ nɛ kwâh nɛ̂ se pɩ tɛ́ ǹnɩ̂ fɔkɔ sõnɔ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́ yĩnnɛ, péwɔ náh fɛ̃ pé dyɔ dyɔ tyi pɩ n pi nɩ?
Pâh wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ yõke nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ, tɛ́ fyɔ̀ kélɛ n yõ, nɛy se yɩ̃nɛ à pé tyɩ́lɛ n yo kénɛ yõke yṍnɔ́ yĩnnɛ, képah nɛ̂ yĩn-á pé wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ nɩ?
Ǹtɛ sɛ̃́ náh dɛ́, wâh kwâh nɛ̂nɛ n yõ ò, wâh kwâh nɛ̂nɛ n wɔ ò, wâh se tir dùkù nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ ò, yɛ Liyel yĩn nɛ n gbilki ké sɔkɔ.
Kè se Nsyifunɔ́ ò, kè se nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ ò, kè se Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ ò, yépi tyípɩ́nɔ́ káh pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ yɩkɩ n mɔ tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Yé ńmɔlɛ n yah n pɩ. Ńmɔ ńkɛ̃́nɛ n gbah n tɛ̃ ǹ no pól nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ tyi pól sɔkɔ. Ńmɔ náh mɛ ń gblɔ̌y pɛ́kɩ́-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃ dɛ́, ǹtɛ mé mɛ nɛ́kwĩ́nkílɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ pé wɛ n pwah n mɔ yĩnnɛ.
Yé ńmɔ pɩ dùkùlɛ n yah n pɩ, sɔ̃́-á mé Krista pɩ dùkùlɛ n yah n pɩ.
Mé yélɛ n sõ náhnáh, yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ yé dyɔ sah n kwnɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́lɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, tɛ́ se tɔ̃ mɛ n kɔ tyi yónɔ́ wã̀l yõ, máh kwɔ́nɔ́ wɛ sépi nónó yõ à pɔ yé kwɔ.
Ǹtɛ mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé kè pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sê yõ̀tɛ̃̀-á dĩ́nɛ, díbí pól yõ̀tɛ̃̀ mó Yesu Kristalɛ, Yesu Krista wɔ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ mó Liyellɛ.
Képah ye, dĩ́ nɛ̂-à yṍkúrí kwĩnki sah tɛ́ nírílɛ n pɩ, képah náh pɩ tɛ́ mɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ n syi n yo, ǹ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ye à n yilɔ.
Ǹtɛ sê nɛ̂-à ǹ yõ dɛ mɔ sah tɛ́ nírílɛ n pɩ, képah náh pɩ à Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ n syi n yo, ǹ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ye à n yilɔ. Kè núkú mɛ á kɩ nɛ ǹ yõ sɔ̃́ à kye mɔ.
Sê nɛ̂-à nɛ mɔ̀nsɔr tɛ̃ n pi ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, à ǹ yõ kye. Ǹtɛ sen-à nɛ sê tyɩ́ ǹ yõ kyénɔ́lɛ, képah náh pɩ ké kṍnɔ́lɛ, à káh kè dɛ n mɔ n sah kɛ̀.
Dĩ́nɛ, Liyel kètɔ̀ ye ǹnɛ, ànɛ̂ à Liyel yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Képah ye, à náh yɩ̃nɛ yṍkúrí kwĩ́nkínsàhnɔ́lɛ. Ǹtɛ sê wɔ dĩ́ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ n wɛ̃kɩ.
Kèkõyṍ mɔ gbĩ́nɛ, dĩ́ náh wil sê sɔkɔ, sê wɔ ye wil dĩ́ sɔkɔ.
Dĩ́ náh mɔ sê yĩnnɛ dɛ́, ǹtɛ sê mɔ dĩ́ yĩnnɛ.
Képah ye, yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ yĩnnɛ, kwâh yɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n mɛ sê yõ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á kɩ ǹ yĩ́n-ńsahlɛ n wɛ̃kɩ.
Ǹtɛ sépinɔ pól sɔkɔ, ápi nónó tɛ̃̀-á mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ, á ye pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, dĩ́ yétõ̂-á mɛ sê tyɩ́, sê tɔ yétõ̂ mó mɛ dĩ́ tyɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, sê wil dĩ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ sê ye mó n dubi dĩ́nɛ. Ǹtɛ Liyel ye pɩ sépi póllɛ sɛ̃́.
Yépi ńtɛ̃ kè sõ n yah kɛ̀; ké yah se sê Liyellɛ nɛ n ni ǹ yõlɛ dɛ́nmɔnsàhnɔ́lɛ?
À yɩ̃nɛ kégbɔ́ dùkùlɛ, yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ dĩ́-à yõ̀yùkù mɔ, sen-á kélɛ ǹ tyɩ́ di?
Ǹtɛ yõ̀yùkù mɔ́nɔ́lɛ, yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ ye kélɛ sê tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́. Liyel kélɛ à kɔ̃, ǹ yõ yah vike yĩnnɛ.
Névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-à kɩ tɔ̃ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yékã̂b pɩ́-ńsahlɛ yĩ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ̃̀ pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, sɛ̃́-á ápi n pɩ kélɛ à tahlɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ pól tɔ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ yah, máh tyi nónó tɔ yo n pi yé tyɩ́ núkúnúkú, sè wɛ yɔ̀: Yé wɛ̃ tùkènmɔnɔnɔ mɛ yényêhlɛ n pɩ n kal yé tyɩ́ pèpɛynɛ. Képah ye, mé náh fɛ̃ yé sõ n pi képah sɔkɔ lɔ́.
Ké gbennɛ, pè nɛ yâh wɛ̃ tuke mɔ, gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ n nɛ n mɛ yé wrɔ́. Tɛ́ ńmɔ sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ nɛ gbɩ-á mɛ pé wɛy sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ dùkù yɔ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ yɩ̃nɛ kè wɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, á kɔ̃ à Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú kègblɔ pɩ̃ n wah yé sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á mé n yo yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, yâh wɛ̃ tuke mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõke yõ gbĩ́nɛ, yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól n núkú n yɩ̃kɩ n kyɩ yé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ yõkenɔ tɔkɔ n yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, túkù n wũ kwɛkɩlɛ, tɛ́ túkù n nɛ n mɛ sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõke tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh tɔ̃ kélɛ yé n yõ légbĩ́nɛ dɛ́.

Gbên náh mɛ yé tyɩ́ nónó sɔkɔ-á yé kɩ fɛ̃ yõkelɛ n yõ, tɛ́ kɩ n wɔ di? Tĩ̂, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì se yé n yilɔ, tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé sennɛ kwâh kɛ̃́pú tɛ̃? Sɔ̃́ mɛ mé kɩ yo yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀ wɛ́? Mé se yɩ̃nɛ mè yé sõ? Póllɛ, mé náh yé sõ n pi képah sɔkɔ lɔ́.
Yé yah, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á nɛ̂nɛ ńmɔ kwɔ tɛ́ mé mɛ kélɛ yé kwɔ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu-á kɩ sõ̀ n dahbɩ n pi gbõ̀ sɔkɔ sõ nɛ̂ lékã̂hnɛ, lésõlɛ à búrn tɔkɔ,
tɛ́ wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ kè kwɔkɩ dibi pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ńyɔlɛ, ńmɔ wil ye, nɛ̂-á kɩ kɔ̃ yépi yĩnnɛ. Yé kélɛ n pɩ, yè yé lékã́m sah ńmɔ tyɩ́lɛ.»

Yõke yṍntɛnɔ náh, à tɔ̃ wóh tɔkɔ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ ólɛ dìvɛ̃nɛ ké sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ńyɔlɛ, ńmɔ tṍ ye, nɛ̂-á kɩ kwɛ yépi yĩnnɛ, kɩ pɩ yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ késã́nnɛ Liyel ànɛ̂ névye wrɔ́. Yé kélɛ n pɩ, yè yé lékã́m sah ńmɔ tyɩ́lɛ, gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ yâh kélɛ n wɔ.»
Yé yah, gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ yâh búrn mɛ̀nɛ n tah tɛ́ dìvɛ̃ mɛ̀nɛ n wɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kúnɔ́ tyɩ́ ye yé mɛ n yo, fɔ́ɔ́ kɩ pɔ syɩ ǹ syɩ́npɔnɔ tyɩ́.
Képah ye, névi nɛ̂-à búrn mɛ̀nɛ n tah tɛ́ dìvɛ̃ mɛ̀nɛ n wɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ pɩ dùkù náh mɛ plɛ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ pèkèlɛ n pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wil ànɛ̂ ǹ tṍ tyɩ́ pɩ́ndenɔ sɔkɔ.
Nɛ́núkù núkú pól yɩ̃nɛ pé pé gblɔ̌y dùkù kyɔmɩ yah pallɛ, pè mó pyě búrn mɛ̀ tah, pè mó dìvɛ̃ mɛ̀ wɔ.
Yé náh wɛ à, névi nɛ̂-à búrn mɛ̀ tah tɛ́ dìvɛ̃ mɛ̀ wɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ náh sè mɔ kõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ willɛ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ pèkèlɛ n yɔrɩ n mɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ.
Képah yĩn ye yámpú ànɛ̂ nɛ́fukulɔ́lɛ pípí yé wrɔ́, tɛ́ yé náhnáh ńtɛ̃ mɛ ku.
Áyâh mɛ n sõ n yah pallɛ á gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, Liyel tukey náh n syɩkɩ n pi á yõ.
Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ ápi tɔ tyɩ́ kyɩ yɩkɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ kèkõyṍ névyelɛ, képah ye à kɔ̃ à ápilɛ n fõh á kwɔ yĩnnɛ.
Képah ye ń yṹnpyé, yâh tuke mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõke yõ yĩnnɛ, yé pól wɛ̃ syɩkɩ.

Kwɛkɩ-à mɛ nɛ̂ tɛ̃, tɛ̃̀ yõ ǹ tĩ̀nnɛ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé náh Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ pèkè yɔrɩ n mɔ n pi yé gblɔ̌y yõ yé wɛ̃ tùkènmɔnɔnɔ sɔkɔ. Tyi tɛ́lɔ́ nónó-á wũ, mâh pɔ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, mé kɩ sépi tyɩ́ yah wah.
Ń yṹnpyé, Liyel Mirki-á tyi nónó pɩ́nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ névilɛ n kɔ̃, mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé nɛ n mɛ sé yɩ̃́tũri sɔkɔ.
Yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á lésõ yé náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ Liyel pɩ̃, vì-ǹsah yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ yé tyɩ́ nɛ́ tã̀n yah ó tónkɔ̃nɔ náh tɔ̌ɔ̀, sépi nónó-á sè náh fɛ̃ n wɛkɩ.

Képah ye, mé kélɛ n yo n yĩ́ĩ́ yé tyɩ́ nɛ Liyel Mirki-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ yahlɛ n tɛ̃, tɛ̃̀ náh fɛ̃ n yo n pi nɛ ńkɛ̃́ Yesu tyɩ́ yɩkɩ; ànɛ̂ nɛy tɔ náh fɛ̃ n yo n pi nɛ ńkɛ̃́ Yesu-á TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃NƐ nɛ́ Liyel Mirki náh tɛ̃ tɛ̃̀ yahlɛ.
Tyi duke náhnáh pɩ́nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩ kɩ fɛ̃ wɛ, ǹtɛ kénɛ Liyel Mirki núkúní ó ye sélɛ névyelɛ n kɔ̃.
Liyel tã̀n duke mɛ dò, ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ núkúní tyɩ́ ye sé póllɛ á n pɩ.
Tã̀n pɩ dùkùnɔ́ mɛ dò, ǹtɛ Liyel núkúní ó ye sé pól pɩ́nɔ́ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ n kɔ̃.
Liyel Mirki ye tir fɛ̃̀npɩnɔ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ n kɔ̃, no pól tyɩ́ pɛkɩ yĩnnɛ.
Liyel Mirki ńkɛ̃́nɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, à n nɛ n wɛkɩ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kénɛ Mirki ó ńtɔ̃ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǎ tyilɛ n pnɛ n yo.
Kénɛ Liyel Mirki ó ye tɔ̃ ńkɛ̃́nɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, à n sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ, kénɛ Liyel Mirki núkúní n tɔ̃ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǎ yámpúlɛ n dɛ n mɔ.

Kě yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǎ gbǐl tyilɛ n pɩ, ǹ tɛ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǎ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ n syi n yo. Kě yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǎ Liyel Mirki tyípɩ́nɩ̀nɛ n wah n pnɛ sétã̀n tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Kě yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, ǎ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nɛ̂-á à náh kè sãh, ǹ tɛ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, à n fɛ̃ sé yahlɛ n yo.
Kénɛ Liyel Mirki núkúní ó tõ̀ vyãh ye sépi póllɛ. Kě tyi fɛ̃̀npɩnɔ yõ̀bènɔrɩ dibi nɛ́núkù núkù pól kɔ̃, à yɩ̃nɛ nɛ̂-á ké dyɔ.

Névi wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ, núkú ye kélɛ. Ǹtɛ tã̀ntã̀n mɛ dò ké tyɩ́. Ké tã̀ntã̀n dò fyé yõ, wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkú ye kélɛ. Névye nónó tɔ-á mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Yesu Krista sɔkɔ, sɛ̃́ ó ye pépi tɔlɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, kè se Nsyifunɔ ò, kè se nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ ò, kè se yɔ̃bɩ ò, kè se gblɔ̌y yõ névye ò, Liyel Mirki núkú mɛ̀ ó gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye á pól wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ, à pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ. Kènɛ Liyel Mirki mɛ̀ ye mɛ á pól sɔkɔ.
Wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ, tã̀ntã̀n mɛ dò ké tyɩ́, fɩ̃́ núkú ó náh ké tyɩ́.
Gbáhkɩ̀-à sõ̀ mɛ nɛ péwɔ náh fyɔ̀ pɩ gbõ̀lɛ, wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyah yɔ́ náh mó pélɛ, képah se náhkɩ kè kɔ̃ kè náhkɩ gbɛ wilki wil gbɛ̃́nsê sɔkɔ?
Níkí-à sõ̀ mɛ nɛ péwɔ náh fyɔ̀ pɩ yĩ́nɛ, wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyah yɔ́ náh mó pélɛ, képah se náhkɩ kè kɔ̃ kè náhkɩ gbɛ wilki wil gbɛ̃́nsê sɔkɔ?
Wil gbɛ̃́nsê pól-à sõ̀ mɛ yĩ́nɛ, kè náhkɩ n nohnɩ sɔ̃́? Ké pól-à sõ̀ mɛ níkílɛ, kè náhkɩ pãnnɛ n tɔkɔ sɔ̃́?
Ǹtɛ Liyel ye wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n pól mɔ ké sɔkɔ, à yɩ̃nɛ ǹ dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Wil gbɛ̃́nsê pól-à sõ̀ mɛ fɩ̃́ núkú ólɛ, wil gbɛ̃́nsê náh náhkɩ n mɛ n pi.
Ǹtɛ sɛ̃́ náh dɛ́, wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ, núkú ye kélɛ, tɛ́ tã̀ntã̀nnɛ dò ké tyɩ́.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yĩ́ náh fɛ̃ n yo n pi gbõ̀ tyɩ́ nɛ, ké yétõ̂ náh mɛ pé tyɩ́. Yõ tɔ náh fɛ̃ n yo n pi gbyẽ̂h tyɩ́ nɛ, sé yétõ̂ náh mɛ pé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n nónó ńtɛ̃ wɔ-á pyě á kɩ nɛ sohkɩ kósyì mɛ sé sɔkɔ, yétõ̂ mɛ sé tyɩ́.
Wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n nónó-á sè náh mɛ n mɔ n kõ n yĩ́ĩ́, sépi ye pyě à n nɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n tɛ̃. Sé nónó-á sé tyɩ́ yónɔ́ mɛ sennɛ, à n nɛ n yah n dah n mɔ yĩ́ĩ́ sépi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ nónó wɔ-á mɛ pallɛ, à n pyě sépi sah. Wil tã̀ntã̀n nónó-á á náh mɛ sélɛ n mɔ n kõ kwâh yɔ́lɛ, Liyel-á wil gbɛ̃́nsê mɔ, à gbílkínɔ́ sah kal sépi yõ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n náh wɛ̃nɛ n wɛ n mɔ. Sé pól mɛ wɛ̃ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ dùkù núkúlɛ.
Ké tyah yɔ́-à mɛ kwlɔ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, sé tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ n nɛ n mɛ n kwlɔ kélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ gbílkínɔ́-à mó n sah ké tyah yɔ́ yõ, sé tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ n mó ké nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ pɩ kélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ yé yah kɛ̀, yépi ye Krista wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ dò. Yé nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ, Krista wil gbɛ̃́nsê fɩ̃́ yɔ́ ye yélɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel mɛ nósyɔ́ wilki sah Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ pé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ: Gbennɛ, à Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye yah wilki. Ní-òlɛ, à Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu yah wilki. Tɔ̃́-òlɛ, tɛ́ kwɔ́pú yah wilki. Képah náh, gbǐlnpɩbɩ mɛ syɩ. Tɛ́ mɛ yámpú fɛ̃̀ndɛnmɔnɔ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ túkù kɔ̃, tɛ́ névye yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ túkù kɔ̃, tɛ́ névye yah tɛ̃́nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ túkù kɔ̃, tɛ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ túkù kɔ̃ pè fɛ̃ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔlɛ n wɛkɩ nónó-á pè náh sè sãh.
No pól se yɔ́ pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ, képah náh pɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopulɛ, képah náh pɩ kwɔ́púlɛ, képah náh pɩ gbǐlnpɩbɩlɛ?
Tĩ̂, no pól se yɔ́ pɩ yámpú dɛ́nmɔpulɛ, képah náh pɩ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔ wɛ́kɩ́púlɛ nónó-á pè náh sè sãh, képah náh pɩ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ nɔ́pi yah yópúlɛ?
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, tir nɛ̂ fɛ̃̀npɩnɔ-á kɩ névi yohnɩ mɔ kal, yé képah yõ̀bènɔrɩ yah n kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ mé kɩ tɔ̃ yé wɛ̃kɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɔ́lɛ nɛ̂-á plɛ kal sé tɛ́lɔ́lɛ.
Ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ névye wɛlɔlɛ n wɛkɩ, à tahlɩ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ wɛlɔ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ náh mɛ ń sɔkɔ, mé mɛ á kɩ nɛ ǹtey yɔ́ sɔ̃́ mɔ tũ, képah náh pɩ kɛ̃nkɛ̃kɩ̀ yɔ́lɛ.

Ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ wɛlɔlɛ n syi n yo, Liyel-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ tyi póllɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ tyi póllɛ n pnɛ, Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ ń sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á ymɔlɛ n tɔkɔ n yal sé mɛ́-ńtã̂n sɔkɔ tɛ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ náh mɛ ń sɔkɔ, kwâh yɔ́ náh ńnɛ.
Ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ ń gbã̀n yî pól dibi kwɛ́ndébé kɔ̃ ò, ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ ń wil gbɛ̃́nsê ńtɛ̃ kɔ̃ pè sukɛ nyàh sɔkɔ ò, tɛ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ náh mɛ ń sɔkɔ, kè náh tir yɔ́ pɛkɩ n pi ń tyɩ́.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̌ tyilɛ n sro, ǎ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔlɛ n pɩ, à náh yĩ́wílkìlɛ n pɩ, à náh ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n wɛ̃kɩ, à náh ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ náh sen tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n pɩ, à náh ǹ wìl-ǹsah ólɛ n yah n kɔ̃, à náh ǹ fɔkɔlɛ n vyãh, ànɛ̂ à náh nɛy tyɩ́lɛ n tɛ̃ n sah ǹ fɔkɔ.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tyíkɛ̃̌kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ náh n pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ ǹ tyɩ́, gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̌ tyi póllɛ n yɔ̃ n mɔ. Tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, à n nɛ n mɛ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ Liyel yõ, ǹ yáh-ńsah náh n tyɛ, ànɛ̂ à n nɛ n mɛ gbah n tɛ̃.
Yĩ̀n náh mɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ tyɩ́. Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè syínyonɔ kɩ pɔ tyɛ, wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ kɩ pɔ yal mɔ, pnɛ̀nɔ́ tɔ kɩ pɔ tyɛ.
Ápi pnɛ̀nɔ́ náh dal mɔ, ànɛ̂ á Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè syínyonɔ tɔ náh dal mɔ.
Ǹtɛ sé pɩ́ndalnmɔnɔ gbĩ-à kɩ sɛ Liyel tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, légbĩ́nɛ sépi nónó-á sè náh dal mɔ, sè kɩ tyɛ.
Máh lésõ mɛ wɛ̃́npirlɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ń wɛkɩ dùkù, ànɛ̂ ń sõnɔ dùkù, ànɛ̂ ń tyi yah dùkù pól sõ̀ mɛ wɛ̃́npir tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Ǹtɛ máh pɔ wah mɔ, mé wɛ̃́npì tyi yal mɔ.

Núkúnúkú, ápi mɛ tyilɛ n yah yìrkɔ̀ɔ̀, á kɩ nɛ dwɔ̌ldyâh dǐrɔ̀ɔ̀ yɔ́ sɔkɔ sɔ̃́ á n yah sélɛ. Ǹtɛ á kɩ pɔ sè wɛ n pi kyòo. Núkúnúkú, ńmɔ pnɛ̀nɔ́ náh dal mɔ. Ǹtɛ mé kɩ pɔ sè pɩ̃ sɔ̃́-á Liyel ńnɛ n pnɛ.
Núkúnúkú, tyinɔ tɔ̃́nɔ́ nɔ́pi wɔ ye sépi náh n tyɛ n pi: Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ, yáh-ńsah tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-á kal sé póllɛ, képah ye tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ.
Yé gbah n tɛ̃, yé tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Liyel Mirki-á tyi nónó pɩ́nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ n kɔ̃, yé sé tɔ yah n kɔ̃, tɛ́ ké nɛ̂ wɔ-á Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyonɔlɛ, yé képah wɔ gbah n yah n kɔ̃ n kal.

Yé náh wɛ à, névi nɛ̂-à wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nɛ̂-á à náh kè sãh, Liyel tyi wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́ ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ à n nɛ n yo Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, nónó-á névye náh sélɛ n nohnɩ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, névye tyɩ́ náh tɛ̃̀ n nɛ n yãh dɛ́, Liyel tyɩ́ ye.
Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂ wɔ-à Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ n syi n yo, névye tyɩ́ ye tɛ̃̀ n nɛ n yo n mɔ, ǹ yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ pélɛ n kɔ̃, ǹ tɛ́ sṍrélɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ, ǹ tɛ́ pé nnɔlɛ n sũ.

Tɛ́ nɛ̂-à wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nɛ̂-á à náh kè sãh, tɛ̃̀ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y ó yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ n yah n kɔ̃. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ n syi n yo, tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pól yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ n yah n kɔ̃.

Yé pól-à sõ̀ mɛ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔlɛ n wɛkɩ nónó-á yé náh sè sãh, kè náhkɩ plɛ ó; ǹtɛ yáh kɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ n syi n yo, képah kɩ nɔ kal ń tyɩ́. Névi nɛ̂-à wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nɛ̂-á à náh kè sãh, tɛ́ ké yah náh tɛ̃ wɛ yo Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì wɛ̃kɩ kè kɔ̃ kè yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ pè kɔ̃, yõre náh mɛ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ à nɔ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyó-òlɛ.

Ń yṹnpyé, sɔ̃́-á mâh ńtyɩ̃́nɔ pɔ yah yé tyɩ́, tɛ́ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́, tir nɛ̂ mɛ kè kɩ pɛkɩ yé tyɩ́, nɛ́ kè náh pɩ tir yɔ́lɛ Liyel ń wɛ̃kɩ mé yo yé syah, képah náh pɩ pnɛ̀nɔ́ yɔ́lɛ, képah náh pɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀lɛ mé syi yo yé tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ kwɔ́nɔ́ yɔ́lɛ mé yé kɔ̃.
Yé yah yímɔ́nɩ̀nɛ kɛ̀, sɔ̃́-á yɩkɩlɛ, képah náh pɩ gbrèynɛ; sàh n mɔ́nwàhnmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, nɛy se kɩ fɛ̃ sé yɩ̀ dùkù pɩ̃?
Tɛ́ kèpɔ̃ nɛ̂-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ pè n fɩ̃bɩ ǹ yo névye tyɩ́ nɛ pè yuku n sɔkɔ mɛ́kɩ̀ fwó-ńsah, képah-à ńtyɩ̃́nɔ fɩ̃́bɩ́nwàhnmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ ǹ vi mɛ́kɩ̀ fwo yĩnnɛ?

Sɛ̃́ ó ye, yé nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́-à wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔ yísyɔ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nónó-á névye náh mɛ sélɛ n nohnɩ, tyi nónó-á yé n yo, pè kɩ pɩ̃ sɔ̃́ sélɛ? Wɛ́kɩ́nmíndahnmɔnɔ ye yé kɩ n wɛkɩ n min n dah n mɔ ni sɔkɔ.
Wɛlɔ duke mɛ dò kèkõyṍ, mé náh sé dan ńtɛ̃nɛ n pnɛ. Ǹtɛ kɔ́r mɛ sé núkú núkú pól tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ mâh wɛy nɛ̂nɛ n nòhnɩ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ, ké wɛ́kɩ́-ò n pɩ nɛ́kã̂hnɛ ń tyɩ́, ńmɔ tɔ n mó n pɩ nɛ́kã̂hnɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Képah ye, Liyel Mirki-á tyi nónó pɩ́nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ n kɔ̃, yáh mɛ sépi yáhnkɔ̃nɔ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, sé nónó-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ n yuku yahlɛ, yé sépi náhnáh yah n kɔ̃.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, nɛ̂-à wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nɛ̂-á à náh kè sãh, tɛ̃̀ kè yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ à ké yah yónɔ́lɛ à wɛ̃kɩ.
Yé náh wɛ di, nírí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ wâh wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ nɛ̂-á á náh kè sãh, ǹ n pɩ̃ á nɩ sɔkɔ nɛ wáh mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ, ǹtɛ wɛy nɛ̂-á á n wɛkɩ, áwɔ ńtɛ̃ náh kélɛ n nohnɩ.

Ǹtɛ sɔ̃́ mɛ mé yɩ̃nɛ mè n pɩ wɛ́? Mé kɩ nírílɛ n pɩ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ sɔkɔ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ kɩ kélɛ n pɩ ń noh noh wɛy tɔ sɔkɔ. Mé kɩ yɩ̀lɛ n gbɩ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ sɔkɔ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ kɩ n gbɩ ń noh noh wɛy tɔ sɔkɔ.

Kàh pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ sɛ̃́, tɛ́ á wɛynɛ Liyellɛ n kɔ̃ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ ó sɔkɔ, nónó-á mɛ ké sèndìlɛ, pépi kɩ pɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ́ kɩ yohnɩ syi yo nɛ Liyel á wɛy mɛ̀ tɛ̃, wáh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ ǹ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ?
Á Liyel tyɩ́ tɔ̃́nsàhnwɛkɩnɔ mɛ̀-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ plɛ sɔ̃́, kè náh yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ tɛ́lɔ́ kɔ̃ n pi.
Ńmɔ n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́, máh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ sɔkɔ à kal yépi póllɛ.
Ǹtɛ mâh mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì wrɔ́, mâh wɛlɔ kwlɔ́ wɛkɩ nónó-á névyelɛ n kwɔ, képah tyɩ́ nɔ ń tyɩ́ kal wɛlɔ kèyõ kwlɔ́ (10 000) wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ yõ wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Ń yṹnpyé, yé káh yɛ yé tyi yah dùkù nɛ mɛ wɛ̃́npì tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Kàh mɛ pèkè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, yé nɛ mɛ wɛ̃́npì yrɔ̃́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Ǹtɛ tyi yah dùkù tɛ̃̀ wɔ sɔkɔ, yé nɛ mɛ yèwàhnɩ̀ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.

Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel-á nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yìkì yɔ́ névye ye mé kɩ kɔ̃ pè kɩ yo mɔ no nɔ́pi tyɩ́ wɛy yɔ́ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á pè náh kélɛ n nohnɩ. Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, pè náh fɛ̃ syi n noh n pi ń tyɩ́.»

Képah ye, wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ nɛ̂-á á náh kè sãh, kè Liyel tǎhkɩ̀lɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂púlɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Ǹtɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yohnɩ n mɔ yĩn náh kélɛ. Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè wɛlɔ syínyonɔ wɔlɛ, képah Liyel tǎhkɩ̀lɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Ǹtɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú yohnɩ n mɔ yĩn náh kélɛ.

Sɔ̃́-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pól-à ńtyɩ̃́nɔ mɛ tuke mɔ, tɛ́ yé pól núkú tyah wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔlɛ n wɛkɩ à, nónó-á mɛ ké sèndìlɛ, képah náh pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú yísyɔ́-à pɔ de nɛ́npɔ́, pè náh yé pɩ n pi vínpɩbɩlɛ di?

Ǹtɛ kàh mɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè wɛlɔlɛ yé pól n syi n yo, névi nɛ̂-á mɛ ké sèndyàhlɛ, képah náh pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névi nɛ̂-à de pɔ nɛ́npɔ́, yé wɛlɔ nɔ́pi pól nóhnɔ́ kɩ à kɔ̃ à kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ páh pèkè pɩ, pé tyɩ́-á kah.
Ǹ fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀ntɛ̃̀nɔ́ pól kɩ wilki mɔ kènkwã̀h yõ kwèyy. Képah sɔkɔ, à kɩ kɔ kwĩnki ǹ yah di sétáh kɩ Liyel gbilki, tɛ́ kɩ n yo nɛ, kègbɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ Liyel-á mɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Sɔ̃́ mɛ á yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n pɩ wɛ́, ń yṹnpyé? Yâh tuke mɔ nɛ yé Liyel ni gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ǹnɩ̂ kɩ fɛ̃ yɩ̀kɩ̀ gbɩ, ǹnɩ̂ mó kwɔ́nɔ́ kɔ̃, ǹnɩ̂ mó Liyel tyi wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ n wɛ n yo, ǹnɩ̂ mó wɛ́nkáhkɩ́lɛ n wɛkɩ, ǹnɩ̂ mó wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ mɛ̀ yahlɛ n yo. Sépi pól yɩ̃nɛ sè yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ n kɔ̃.
Nósyɔ́-à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé wɛ́nkáhkɩ́nɔlɛ n wɛkɩ, kè káh kah nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí, képah náh pɩ tɔ̃́mɩ́ yõ. Pè mó wɛ̃nɛ n syɩkɩ n wɛkɩ. Tɛ́ ǹnɩ̂ mó nɛ mɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ fɛ̃ sé yahlɛ n yo.
Ǹtɛ sé yah yó-ò-à mɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ wɛ́kɩ́-ò mɛ̀ yɩ̃nɛ à ǹ vyãh vike Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì wrɔ́. Tɛ̃̀ Liyellɛ n ni ǹ fɔkɔ táh, ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́.
Nónó-á Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopulɛ, pépi nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí, képah náh pɩ tɔ̃́mɩ́ wɔ yɩ̃nɛ pè wɛkɩ, tɛ́lɔ́ mó nɛ n mɛ pé wɛlɔlɛ n sohlɩ n yah.
Ǹtɛ Liyel-à tir yɔ́lɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ wɛ̃kɩ, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ n wɛkɩ, ǹmɔ yɩ̃nɛ à ǹ vyãh vike, tɛ̃̀ mó ǹ tyɩ́ yo.
Yé pól kɩ fɛ̃ Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè wɛlɔlɛ n syi n yo nɛ́núkù núkúlɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ no pól kɔ̃ pè kɩ kwɔ́nɔ́ wɛ, ànɛ̂ sṍré kɩ de pé sɔkɔ.
Liyellɛ, tyífɛ̃̌ tyɩ́ náh nɔ ǹ tyɩ́. Tir tɔ̃́nsàhnpɩnɔ tyɩ́ nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, yèvɩnɩ Liyel ye ǹnɛ. Képah ye Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè syínyopu yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ mɛ n fyãh n pnɛ pé gblɔ̌y yõ.
Sɔ̃́-á kélɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ pól sɔkɔ,
wɛ̃ tùkènmɔnɔnɔ pól sɔkɔ, syɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ pè tɛ̃ syɩ́syɩ́. Pè náh yɩ̃nɛ yóndahnmɔnɔlɛ wɛy sɔkɔ. Pè yɩ̃nɛ pè tɛ̃ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yo kélɛ.
Pàh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé tir yɔ́ dùkù pɩ̃, pè pé pɛbɩ piki yah gbên sɔkɔ. Ké yah náh sê nɛ n yo n dah n mɔ wɛy sɔkɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ.
Liyel wɛy sõ se tyah yépi tyɩ́? Yépi ó se noh kélɛ?

Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ n sõ nɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-ò-á pélɛ, képah náh pɩ, Liyel Mirki-á mɛ pé yahlɛ n tɛ̃, wɛy nɛ̂-á mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀, tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à kè fɛ̃ syi nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á kélɛ.
Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à képah mɔ́nkõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ, Liyel náh mó mɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ n mɔ n kõ lɔ́.
Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́ ń yṹnpyé, yé Liyel tɛ̃ntõnè wɛlɔ syínyonɔlɛ n yah n kɔ̃, tɛ́ yé káh wɛ́nkáhkɩ́ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ tɔ yah kõ.
Ǹtɛ tyi pól yɩ̃nɛ sè nɛ n pɩ sé yah yõ, ànɛ̂ sè mó nɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ.
Ń yṹnpyé, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé yé dyɔ to kõ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir mɛ̀ tyɩ́lɛ, nɛ̂-á mé yo sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́, képah nɛ̂-á yé kè fɛ̃ syi tɛ́ mɛ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ n yĩ́ĩ́.
Képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, yé kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, yáh kɩ n kɔ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ máh kè yo sɔ̃́ yé tyɩ́. Kàh kɩ pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ sɛ̃́, ké yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ kɩ pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ yé tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ-á kwɔ́nɔ́ wɛ nɛ̂ yõ, képah ǹgbò ye mé yé kwɔ nɛ Liyel nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔ-á ku ápi tyípêl yĩnnɛ. Sɛ̃́ ye kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ.
Mé tɔ̃ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ yé kɔ̃ nɛ wǎh yɩ̃, tɛ́ ké sèpĩ̀n tɔ̃́-ò sõlɛ ǹ lékó mɛ yilki mɔ. Sɛ̃́ ye kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ.
À ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ Pyɛrɩ wɛ̃kɩ, képah náh tɛ́ gblɔ̌ynɛ pé nɛ́pĩ̂ gbɔ̃nimí
Képah náh, à pɔ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ ǹ tõ̀ sã́hpú nɛ́pĩ̂ kyɛkwɛ́ (500) kahnɩ wɛ̃kɩ fɩ̃́ núkú sɔkɔ. Pépi kan mɛ min sɔkɔ kwɛy nɔ yɔ̀, tɛ́ pé túkù wɔ ku.
Képah náh, tɛ́ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ Nsyakɩ wɛ̃kɩ, tɛ́ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ ǹ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye pól wɛ̃kɩ.
Pépi pól tyɩ́ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, à mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ ńmɔ tɔ wɛ̃kɩ, ńmɔ nɛ̂-á piri kòndal-ńkɛ̃̂ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Ńmɔ ye Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye sɔkɔ tyɩ̃́ɩ̃ tɛ̃̀nɛ. Mé náh yɩ̃nɛ yénɔ́lɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ, máh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ fṍhnɔ́ sah ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yõ.

Ǹtɛ máh swɔ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ kwɛynɛ yɔ̀, Liyel pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye ńnɛ ké sɔkɔ. Pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂-á à pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́, kè náh sɔkɔ de ni sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, ńmɔ ye tõ̀ pɩ kal á no tɛ́lɔ́ póllɛ. Ǹtɛ ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ tǎhkɩ̀ náh n pɩ kélɛ dɛ́, Liyel-á pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ ń tyɩ́, képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye mé n pɩ kélɛ.
Képah ye, kè sɔ̃́ ńmɔ ò, kè sɔ̃́ pépi ò, kénɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir mɛ̀ ó ye á pól mɛ n yo. Képah yõ ye mó tɔ̃ yépi tɔ mɛ sɛ̃.
Ápi-á kélɛ n yo n wah nɛ ńkɛ̃́ Krista lékó-á yilki mɔ, sɔ̃́ mɛ tɛ́ yé túkù nɛ lékyɩ̂ náh n yilki n mɔ n pi?
Lékyɩ̂-à kɩ mɛ pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, Krista lékó tɔ náh mó yilki mɔ dò.
Tɛ́ wàh mɛ yílkínmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ápi Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́lɛ, nɔ̀nɔ́ ye kélɛ, yépi tɔ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ mó, nɔ̀nɔ́ ye ké tɔlɛ.

À wil képah sɔkɔ, kàh sõ̀ mɛ gbɩlɛ nɛ lékyɩ̂ náh n yilki n mɔ n pi, mɩ̀nɩ̀ yónsàhpu ye ápi ńtɛ̃nɛ Liyel yõ sɔkɔ, áyáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ nɛ wǎh Krista lékó yilki mɔ, tɛ́ à náh se mó tɔ̃ kè pɩ.
Lékyɩ̂-à kɩ mɛ n yilki n mɔ n pi ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, Krista lékó tɔ náh mó yilki mɔ dò.
Tɛ́ Krista lékó-à kɩ mɛ yílkínmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, yé sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ ǹ yõ, nɔ̀nɔ́ ye kélɛ. Yé mɛ sɛ̃́ yé tyípêl sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ névye nónó-á sɛ̃ Krista yõ tɛ́ ku, pépi tɔ tyɩ́ ye mó yɩkɩ.
Kàh kɩ mɛ ápi á gbõ̀ sah Krista yõ, á min pɩ yĩnnɛ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tɛ̃̀ ó sɔkɔ, yãm pɩ́pú ye álɛ à kal no póllɛ.
Ǹtɛ gbɩ yõ sɔkɔ, Krista lékó ye yilki mɔ gbennɛ lékyɩ̂ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á kélɛ álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ n dal n mɔ nɛ névye nónó tɔ́-á ku sɔkɔ, pé tɔ lékyɩ̂-á kɩ pɔ yilki mɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, nɛ́núkù yɔ́ yĩn ye névye póllɛ kũ mnɔ sɔkɔ yɔ̀. Tɛ́ nɛ́núkù yɔ́ tɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye névye pól lékyɩ̂ kɩ pɔ yilki mɔ.
Sɔ̃́-á Adama náh tãn pól n ku, sɛ̃́ ó ye Krista yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tɔ kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Ǹtɛ no pól lékyɩ̂ kɩ yilki mɔ syɩ yuku wɛ̃ náh, kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́. Krista ǹgbò lékó ye yilki mɔ. Képah náh, ǹ syɩ n pɔ gbĩ́nɛ, nónó-á mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ, pépi tɔ lékyɩ̂ kɩ yilki mɔ.
Képah náh, tyi tyi pól tyɛ gbĩ́ kɩ nɔ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, Krista kɩ mɛ névye fnɛ̀pu ànɛ̂ tɔ̃́rɩ́nɔ, ànɛ̂ tǎhkɩ̀nɔ́ duke duke pól tyɩ́ yɩkɩ, tɛ́ kɩ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ dahbɩ Sú Liyel gbõ̀.
Yé náh wɛ di, Krista yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ tɔ̃́rɩ́ yõ, fɔ́ɔ́ kè pɔ n nɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á Liyel kɩ sépɛ́bɩ́ pól pɩ Krista gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ.
Kũ ye kɩ pɩ sépɛ tɛ́ynɛ, nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á kɩ yɩkɩ.
Liyel yíyìn pól pɩ Krista gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ.
Ǹtɛ kǎh yo sɛ̃́, pè náh nɛ Liyel tɔ-á dɛ́, ǹmɔ Liyel nɛ̂-á yíyìn pól pɩ Krista gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ.

Yíyìn pól-à kɩ pɩ Krista gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ǹmɔ Krista nɛ̂-á Pídĩ́nɛ, à kɩ ǹ gblɔ̌y tiki mɔ Liyel yah, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yíyìn pól pɩ Krista gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel kɩ tɔ̃́rɩ́ tɔkɔ dal mɔ yíyìn pól yõ.

Ǹtɛ à, lékyɩ̂-à pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, névye nónó-á pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n wel n wilki ni sɔkɔ lékyɩ̂ yĩnnɛ, pè se náhkɩ kélɛ n pɩ? Lékyɩ̂ tɛ̃̀-à mɛ pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, sɔ̃́ pɩ tɛ́ pè pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n wel n wilki ni sɔkɔ pépi yĩnnɛ wɛ́?
Tɛ́ lékyɩ̂-à kɩ mɛ n yilki n mɔ n pi ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, sɔ̃́ pɩ tɛ́ ápilɛ dlo sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ wɛ́?
Ń yṹnpyé, sɔ̃́-á kélɛ gbɩlɛ nɛ ń nɩ-á mɛ vɩ́nɔ́lɛ yélɛ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ, sɛ̃́ tɔ ye kélɛ gbɩlɛ nɛ swɔ̃swɔ̃ póllɛ máh mɛ kũnɛ n dɔ n yah.

Gbɛ̃́nképèl nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ, máh mɛ́kɩ̀ fwo sélɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ nɛ́npɔ́, kàh sõ̀ mɛ nɛ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ min pɩ yĩn tɛ̃̀ ó sɔ̃́, yõre nɛ̂ mɛ mé náhkɩ wɛ ké sɔkɔ? Ǹtɛ kàh mɛ pɩ nɛ lékyɩ̂ tɛ̃̀ náh pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi, á ye nɛ n yõ à mó nɛ n wɔ kɛ̀, ńsõ̂nɛ á kɩ se pɔ n ku n pi tɛ́.
Yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ dɛ́, ǹgbǒ wâh nɛ́túkù pɩ á kɔ́-òlɛ, ǎ á yõ yɩkɩ dɛ́!
Mé kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, túkù mɛ yé sɔkɔ, pè náh Liyellɛ n pnɛ. Ǹtɛ yé pól sen ye kélɛ dò. Yé tɔ̃ n tɛ̃ kègbɩ yõ, yè yèsrey tyilɛ n pɩ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́, yè mó pèl pɩ́nɔ́ yal n mɔ.
Ǹnɩ̂ kɩ fɛ̃ n piki n yah nɛ, lékyɩ̂ se kɩ yilki mɔ sɔ̃́ nɩ? Wil gbɛ̃́nsê dùkù nɛ̂ se kɩ mɛ pé tyɩ́ nɩ?
Lékã́m kɛ̃́ névi! Wâh sèmukɔ pi duku mɔ, kàh fi, dúkúnmɔnɔ mɛ̀ ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ n ku dò.
Wáh ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ̂ duku n mɔ, sèmukɔ pi yɔ́ ó ye. Kè kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ kwlɔlɛ, képah náh pɩ sèmukɔ káhkɩ́lɛ, ńkɛ̃́ yòhkɩ̀ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh ǹ n duku mɔ kè n fi dɛ́.
Képah náh, Liyel kè kɔ̃ kè n fi n wil yòhkɩ̀lɛ à yɩ̃nɛ ǹ dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ. Sèmukɔ pye duke pól yèh mɛ sé tyɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ.
Wil gbɛ̃́nsê dùkù núkú náh min sɔkɔ yî pól tyɩ́. Névye wil gbɛ̃́nsê mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ, gbɛ̃́nkyɔ tyɩ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ, kèpye tyɩ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ, yɛ̃́nkyɔ tyɩ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ.
Yĩ̂nyõ yî tɔ mɛ, sétáh yõ yî mɛ. Ǹtɛ yĩ̂nyõ yî plɛ́nɔ́ mɛ sé tyɩ́lɛ ànɛ̂ sétáh yõ yî tyɩ́lɛ.
Gbĩ plɛ́nɔ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ, ńwɔ̃́ plɛ́nɔ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ, ńwɔ̃́ kèpye plɛ́nɔ́ mɛ sé tyɩ́lɛ. Tɛ́ ńwɔ̃́ kèpye túkù ńtɛ̃ plɛ́nɔ́ tɔ̃ sé gblɔ̌y sé túkù tyɩ́lɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ye lékyɩ̂ yílkínmɔnɔ tɔ kɩ pɔ n pɩ n pi. Wil gbɛ̃́nsê nɛ̂-á kɩ n pyãh n pi, képah kɩ yɩ̃, tɛ́ kɩ pɔ yilki mɔ pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ nɛ̂ náh tɔ̃ n pyãh n yah n pi.
Kàh n yɩ̃ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, kè n nɛ n mɛ kétúkùyɔ̂ sohkɩ kɛ̃́nɛ. Ǹtɛ kàh pɔ yilki mɔ, kè n nɛ n mɛ kètǎr ó, tǎhkɩ̀lɛ ké sɔkɔ.
Kè n yɩ̃ wil gbɛ̃́nsê gbɔynɛ, ǹtɛ n pɔ n yilki n mɔ wil gbɛ̃́nsê késã́nnɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ. Wil gbɛ̃́nsê gbɔy mɛ, wil gbɛ̃́nsê késã́n tɔ mɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Nɛ́gben nɛ̂-á Adamalɛ, nɛ́gbɔy ye ǹmɔlɛ, nɛ̂-á min dah mɔ ǹ sɔkɔ.»
Wil gbɛ̃́nsê késã́n nɛ̂-á wɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, képah náh pɔ gbennɛ dɛ́, wil gbɛ̃́nsê gbɔy ye pɔ gbennɛ. Képah náh, nɛ̂-á wɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, képah pyě pɔ.
Puri ye mɔ Adama gbennɛ, sétáh névi ye ǹmɔlɛ. Adama ní-ò wɔlɛ, ǹmɔ wil yĩ̂nyõ.
Nɛ̂-á wil sétáh sɔkɔ, sétáh yõ névye mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Nɛ̂-á wil yĩ̂nyõ, yĩ̂nyõ tyɩ́nɔ mó mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Áyáh pɩ sétáh yõ névi mɛ̀ kètɔ̀lɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, sɛ̃́ ó ye á kɩ tɔ̃ pɔ n pɩ n pi yĩ̂nyõ névi mɛ̀ tɔ kètɔ̀lɛ.
Yé yah, nɛ̂-á mé n yo yé tyɩ́ ń yṹnpyé, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Wil gbɛ̃́nsê gbɔy náh fɛ̃ n de n pi Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ. Pyãh pyãh kwâh tɔ náh fɛ̃ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.

Yé yah, mé kɩ tir wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́ yɔ́ yo yé syah: Á pól tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh n ku n pi dɛ́. Ǹtɛ kèpɔ̃ tɛ́y-à pɔ fɩ̃bɩ, á pól kɩ viri nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, yɩ̃́ víkényɩkɩnmɔnɔ wrɔ́. Kàh fɩ̃bɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, lékyɩ̂ kɩ yilki mɔ, tɛ́ pè náh tɔ̃ n ku n yah n pi. Ǹtɛ ápi nónó-à mɛ min sɔkɔ, ápi kɩ viri.
Pyãh pyãh kwâh yɩ̃nɛ kè vi mɔ pɩ pyã́h-ńkɛ̃̂ kwâhlɛ. Tɛ́ ku ku kwâh mó vi mɔ pɩ kú-ńkɛ̃̂ kwâhlɛ.

Ǹtɛ pyãh pyãh kwâh mɛ̀-à pɔ vi mɔ pɩ pyã́h-ńkɛ̃̂ kwâhlɛ, tɛ́ ku ku kwâh mɛ̀ mɛ vi mɔ pɩ kú-ńkɛ̃̂ kwâhlɛ, légbĩ́nɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ tir wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́ mɛ̀ kɩ wil, nɛ̂-á yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Kũ tyɩ́ ye yɩkɩ. Gbõ̀ ye syi ké tyɩ́ pnɛ́pnɛ́.»
«Kũ, ńyãh mɛ á tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ? Kũ, á kókè mɔ mɔ sõhkɩ ńyãh?»
Névye tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ ye kũ sõhkɩlɛ, tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ mó tǎhkɩ̀lɛ tyípékèlɛ n kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ á ye wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ á kɔ̃ tyi nɔ́pi yõ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ.

Képah ye ń yṹnpyé pèplɔ, yé yé tah n sah yé nɛ mɛ yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ gbáhkɩ̀ núkú yõ. Yé wãnnɛ n mɔ yé gbáhntɛ̃nɔ yõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yè mó pɩ̃ nɛ yáh kwlɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tõ̀ sɔkɔ, kè náh n pɩ n pi nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ.

À yuku pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ wɔ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ Yerusalɛmɩ kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yohnɩ n mɔ, máh vìnmɔnɔlɛ Kalasi mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ kɔ̃ nɛ pè kè pɩ sɔ̃́, yépi tɔ kè pɩ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ.
Dimansyi sõnɔ́ póllɛ, nɛ̂ gbõ̀-à nɔ nɛ̂nɛ, à kè wilki n kɛ̃kɩ n sah gbɔ̀pɔlɛ. Yé káh ńmɔ pɔ́nɔ́ ólɛ n syɩkɩ pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, mâh pɔ pɔ, mé kɩ sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ wãrkɩ tɛ́ kɩ sépi ànɛ̂ pɔ́ nɔ́pilɛ yé névye yáhnwìlkìnsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ dahbɩ, pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ kyɩ sè kɔ̃ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ.
Kàh kɩ se mɛ nɔ ńmɔ tɔ kyɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́, á kɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ pɩ núkúlɛ.
Mé kɩ n pɔ n pi yé tĩ̀nnɛ. Máh kɩ n pi, mé kɩ sɔkɔ Masedonɩ maralɛ. Képah ye mé kɩ kah tɛ́ kɩ de yé tĩ̀nnɛ.

Máh kɩ pɔ, kè kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ mé kɩ sèpĩ̀n yísyɔ́ pɩ yé tyɩ́. Gbɔ̀kénpɩ mé kɩ kwɔ̀vɩrɩ gbĩ́ pól ńtɛ̃ pɩ n pi yé tyɩ́. Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ fɛ̃ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ ń tyɩ́ ń kɔ̃ mé kɩ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ ń kɔ́lɔ́lɛ nɛ́npɔ́.
Kèpàhpɩ́kɩ̀ sɔkɔ, mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé n pɔ n yah n sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́ yĩ̂nyõ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-à kɩ fɛ̃ syi, mé kɩ wũ kɩ wɔ̂ yɔ́ pɩ yélɛ.
Ń fwópú sénsɔ̃ mɛ dò Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ ó, ǹtɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yɔ́ mɛ wɛ yɩkɩ mɔ ń tyɩ́ ń tõ̀ wɛ n pɩ yĩnnɛ nɛ́npɔ́. Képah ye, mé kɩ tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́ kɩ syi pɔ nɔ Pãntekɔtɩ syáh syah sõ tyɩ́.
Timotelɛ, Liyel tõ̀ ye à n pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Képah ye wàh kɩ pɔ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, yé ǹ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ tíkí kɔ̃ kè káh à tɛ̃ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh ǹnɛ n yilɔ dɛ́. Ńmɔ mɛ ǹnɛ n syɩkɩ ànɛ̂ ń yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Képah ye, wàh kɩ pɔ n yal yé tĩ̀nnɛ, yé yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ ǹ kɔ́lɔ́ yĩnnɛ à kɔ̃ à pɔ ń tnɔ̂ yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ á yṹnpi Apɔlɔsɩ wɔlɛ, mé sõ̀ kè yah kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ nɛ à kyɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ́lɔ́lɛ. Tɛ́ à náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ póllɛ nɛ pé kyɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ núkúnúkú. Ǹtɛ wrɔ́-à pɔ wɛ ǹ tyɩ́, à kɩ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ sõ yɔ́lɛ.
Yé káh yé dyɔ mɔ n fwɔ n tɛ̃. Yé su yĩn gbáhkɩ̀ núkú yõ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yé yé nɩ syãh, yè mó yé tah n sah.
Yé tyi póllɛ n pɩ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.

Ń yṹnpyé, Sitefanasɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ no ye pɩ nɛ́gbrolɛ à pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ Akayi mara sɔkɔ. Pè tɔ̃ mɛ pé gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ. Yé pɩ̃́nɔ́ se yɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ tɛ́. Képah ye, mé kɩ tɔ̃ kè yah kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ,
yé nɛ n sah sɛ̃́nknɔ névye tyɩ́ yõ, à tahlɩ nónó tɔ-á mɛ tã̀n nɔ́pilɛ n pɩ pélɛ mɛ n kwlɔ.
Sitefanasɩ ànɛ̂ Fɔrtunatusi, ànɛ̂ Asyayikusi mɛ́nɔ́lɛ ńnɛ ásõ̂, kè ń nɩ vɩ yĩ́ĩ́. Pè ye mɛ pɔ yé swɔ tɔkɔ.
Pè ńmɔ nɩ de à tahlɩ yépi tɔ tyɩ́ tyɩ́. Yé yɩ̃nɛ yè fɛ̃ sɛ̃́nknɔ névye yĩ́gbɩ́lɛ n yo.
Asi mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́. Akilasɩ ànɛ̂ Prisili à tahlɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á Liyellɛ n ni n pɔ Akilasɩpi gbô, pé pól n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩnnɛ.
Yé yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó pól-á mɛ ńnɛ ásõ̂, pé pól n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.
Yé pól wɛkɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ wɛy pèpɛynɛ.
Yé yah, nɛ̂-á mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ ń gbõ̀lɛ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Ńmɔ Pole n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tyɩ́-à nɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ névi nɛ̂ tyɩ́, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ.
Maranata. [Pàh nɛ Maranata-á, ké kɔ́r ye: Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, pɔ!]
Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́!
Yé pól tyɩ́ nɔ ń tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩnnɛ.

Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ, ńmɔ ànɛ̂ á yṹnpi Timote ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́ynɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́ Korɛ̃ntɩ kwil sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tyɩ́ nónó-á mɛ Akayi mara pól sɔkɔ.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Mé n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista Súlɛ. Ǹmɔ ye Súlɛ nɛ̂-á névye yãmnɛ n yah. Névye nnɔ dé-ò Liyel ye ǹnɛ.
Ǹmɔ ye ápi nnɔ dé-òlɛ á yèkwɔrɩ tyinɔ pól sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko nónó pól-á mɛ yèkwɔrɩ sɔkɔ, ápi tɔ fɛ̃ pé nnɔ de sɔ̃́-á à ápi nnɔ de.
Áyáh mɛ yèvyãhrɩlɛ n gbah n wɛ n yuku sɔ̃́ Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, sɛ̃́ ye Krista tɔ mó mɛ á nnɔlɛ n gbah n de n yuku sɛ̃́.
Áyâh yèvyãhrɩlɛ n pɩ, yépi nnɔ de yĩn ye ànɛ̂ yé pwáhnmɔnɔ yĩnnɛ. Á nnɔ-à de, sṍré mɔ yĩn ye yé sɔkɔ sɔ̃̀nko yépi tɔ fɛ̃ yèvyãhrɩlɛ n sro ápi-á nónó dùkù sro sɔkɔ.
Ápi yáh-ńsah náh mɛ tyɛ́nɔ́lɛ à yuku yépi tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Á pɩ̃ nɛ sɔ̃́-á yé yèvyãhrɩlɛ n pɩ álɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, sɛ̃́-á yé nnɔ tɔ kɩ n de n pi álɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Á yṹnpyé, áyáh yèvyãhrɩ nɛ̂ wɛ Asi mara sɔkɔ, á náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yépi tɛ̃ ké yɩ̃́tũri sɔkɔ. Kénɛ yèvyãhrɩ mɛ̀ kǎn pɩ ápilɛ à pɔ kah mɔ á yáh-ńsah kɔ̃ kè tyɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ á sõ̀ mɛ n sõ nɛ kǎh kɩ á yõ yɩ̃.
Á sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ sõ̀ mɛ ké yõ nɛ tir yɔ́ náh á kúnɔ́ dùkù ku n pi. Képah ye á mɛ á sõnɔ tɔkɔ to á gblɔ̌y yõ, tɛ́ kè sah Liyel yõ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á lékyɩ̂lɛ n yilki n mɔ.
Ǹmɔ ye ápi pwah mɔ kũ mɛ̀ dùkù gbõ̀. À kɩ tɔ̃ á pwah n mɔ n pi. Á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ mɛ ǹ yõ nɛ, wǎh kɩ á pwah n mɔ n pi ńtɔ̃.
Sónmɔnɔ ye yépi tɔ mɛ n so mɔ á tyɩ́ yáh nírílɛ n pɩ á tyɩ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, á kɩ pèpɔrɩ wɛ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ́kwĩ́nkí nírí pɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Tɛ́ névye náhnáh tɔ kɩ wɛ wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ ápi yĩnnɛ.

Ápi nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ yõ-á nɛ̂nɛ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Á kè pɩ̃ á sõnɔ sɔkɔ nɛ áyáh mɛ á fɔkɔ dal no póllɛ yã́ryã́r pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ǹtɛ áyáh mɛ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ n pɩ n kal yépi wɔ tyɩ́. Liyel yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye á kɔ̃ á tɛ̃ wɛ képah pɩ, névi lékã́m gbõ̀ yõ náh.
Ápi tɔ náh kwâh yɔ́ wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́ nɛ̂-á yé kar tɛ́ ké kɔ́r pɩ̃ kwlɔ. Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ nɛ, yáh kɩ fɛ̃ ǹyɔ̌ tɔ kar kɩ ké kɔ́r pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́.
Yé mɛ tyi nɔ́pi dùkùlɛ n pnɛ kwéy. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ, yé yõ kɩ yɔ̃ ápi yĩnnɛ, ápi tɔ yõ kɩ mó yɔ̃ yépi yĩnnɛ.
Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ sõ̀ mɛ képah yõ, képah ye mé nɛ mé pɔ yépi ǹgbò tĩ̀nnɛ kè kɔ̃ kè pɩ yõ̀bènɔrɩ kɛ ní-òlɛ yé tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ máh kɩ n sɔkɔ Masedonɩ mara sɔkɔ, mé n pɔ n wil n sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ máh kɩ ń syɩ, mé n pɔ n wil yé tyɩ́ ńtɔ̃ yé kɔ̃ yé ń yohnɩ n mɔ mé wɛ n yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ ń kɔ́lɔ́lɛ Nsyude mara sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ kǎh pɔ pɩ mé náh tɛ̃ wɛ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, képah se n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ máh mɛ tyilɛ n yah n tɔkɔ n dah n mɔ sɛ̃́? Képah náh pɩ, máh mɛ tyilɛ n yah n tɔkɔ ń yah yĩ́ĩ́nɛ; mâh nɛ àwe-á, dǒ mè n tɔ̃ nɛ ɔ̃́ɔ̃-á?
Liyel ye ń tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ áyáh wɛy nɛ̂ yo yé tyɩ́, kɔ̃́nvìnwɛkɩnɔ náh kélɛ.
Ńmɔ, ànɛ̂ Silasɩ, ànɛ̂ Timote-á Liyel Pídĩ́ Yesu Krista wɛy nɛ̂nɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, kɔ̃́nvìnwɛkɩnɔ wɛy náh kélɛ dɛ́, gbɩ kɔ́kɔ́ ye kélɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ tyi pól yĩnɛ n tɛ̃. Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye tɔ̃ ápi amiinalɛ n yo à gbílkínɔ́lɛ n sah Liyel yõ.
Liyel ye kɔ̃ ápi ànɛ̂ yépilɛ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ. Ǹmɔ ye wilki sah álɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
À á pɔkɔ mɔ à á pɩ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ. Tɛ́ ǹ Mirki dah mɔ á sɔkɔ nɛ̂ gbõ̀ yõ-á á pɩ̃ nɛ, wǎh ǹ vyãhlɛ á kɔ̃ yî nónó tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, áyáh kɩ sè wɛ n pi.
Liyel ye ń tàrfyɔ̀lɛ, máh kɩ mɛ mɩ̀nɩ̀ yo mè n ku. Yé yõ wilki yĩn ye tir sɔkɔ ń kɔ̃ mé náh ń syɩ pɔ Korɛ̃nti kwil sɔkɔ.

Á náh mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ á tir yɔ́ kãhlɩ n sah yé yõ à yuku yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ dɛ́. Yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ ye á n yohnɩ n mɔ yélɛ sɔ̃̀nko nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ wɛ yé sɔkɔ, yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ yé tah sah Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Ńmɔ kè yah ń gblɔ̌y nɛ yõ náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ mé n syɩ n pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ mé pɔ yèkwɔrɩ yɔrɩ mɔ yé yõ ńtɔ̃.
Ńmɔ-à kɩ yèkwɔrɩ mɔ yépi sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ kɩ pɩ ńmɔ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ yõlɛ, nɛ́ yépi náh máh yèkwɔrɩ mɔ yépi nónó sɔkɔ?

Mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko mé káh pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ yé túkù kɔ̃ pè yèkwɔrɩ mɔ ń sɔkɔ, pépi nónó-á sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ ń sɔkɔ. Mé kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ, mâh mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, kè n pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ yépi tɔ tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ-á sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ń nɩ sõ̀ mɛ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ń lékã́m sõ̀ mɛ vye fɛ̃kɩ tɛ́ yétĩ mɛ n kah n kwɛ. Yèkwɔrɩ náh sõ̀ mé n yah n kɔ̃ mɔ́-ńsahlɛ yé sɔkɔ dɛ́, mé sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé pɩ̃, yé tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ ń tyɩ́ à kyɩ syɩ ńyãh tyɩ́.
Yèkwɔrɩ-à wɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, ńmɔ tyɩ́ náh tɛ̃̀ pɩ dɛ́, yé pól yõ ye tɛ̃̀ yɔrɩ mɔ kélɛ. Ǹtɛ áyâh nɛ á káh kè yo n kah mɔ, á kɩ nɛ yé pól yõ-á tɛ̃̀ yɔrɩ mɔ kélɛ.
Kénɛ tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɔ́wû-á kɩ lékàh nɛ̂nɛ à kɔ̃, képah kɩ yɩ̃nɛ ǹnɛ.
Képah ye, yé yɩ̃nɛ yè yɔ̃ mɔ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃ yè mó ǹ nɩ de, sɔ̃̀nko yèkwɔrɩ káh pɔ ǹ yáh-ńsah tyɛ n kah mɔ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ tɔlɛ nɛ, yé kélɛ tɛ̃̀ wɛ̃kɩ nɛ ǹ tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ yé tyɩ́.
Máh sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ yõ nɛ̂ yõ tɔlɛ, mé sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé yé gbɩ yah, yáh kɩ mɛ n sah ń yóré yõ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ.
Yâh yɔ̃ mɔ névi nɛ̂ kɔ̃, ńmɔ tɔ kɩ yɔ̃ mɔ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃. Tɛ́ yâh wɛ mé yɔ̃ mɔ ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃, yépi yĩn ye mè n pɩ kélɛ Krista yah sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ náh syɔ̃̀-ǹsah wɛ à tɛ̃ wɛ n pi á tyɩ́. Á pól ǹ yah mɔ́-ńsahlɛ n pnɛ dò.
Máh yĩni tɛ̃ Turasɩ mara sɔkɔ Yesu Krista Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yó-ńsah, mé kè wɛ Liyel ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ ń kɔ̃ pallɛ.
Ǹtɛ mé náh ń yṹnpi Tite wɛ nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ń sõnɔ náh sõ̀ mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ fɩ̃́ núkú sɔkɔ. Képah ye, mé mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ni nɛ́npɔ́ tãn tyɩ́, tɛ́ sɔkɔ Masedonɩ mara sɔkɔ.

Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah Liyel yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á pɩ tɛ̃́nwɛpulɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ. À á kɔ̃ á Krista dùkùlɛ n yo n tɔ̃ n mɔ n kɔ̃ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á làsèkwěl pãn n tɔ̃ n mɔ tyah pól sɔkɔ.

Ápi pɩ làsèkwěl pãn pènɛ̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ Liyel tyɩ́, á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ Kristalɛ. Névye nónó-á pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ nónó-á mɛ tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, pãn mɛ̀ mɛ n yĩni n tɛ̃ pé pól tyɩ́.
Túkù tyɩ́, á mɛ n põ kétukùyɔ̂ nɛ̂-á n pɔ n pɔ kũnɛ. Túkù tyɩ́ mó, á mɛ n põ pallɛ nɛ̂-á n pɔ n pɔ minnɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ fɛ̃ képah pɩ wɛ́?
Névye náhnáh mɛ Liyel wɛy tɔkɔ gbɔ̀lɛ n yɩ̃. Ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh mɛ pépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Liyel ye tõ ápilɛ, képah ye á mɛ á fɔkɔ dal mɔ ǹ wɛynɛ n yo ǹ yah sɔkɔ, á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ.

Ápi se tɔ̃ yɩ̃nɛ á gblɔ̌y dùkù yónɔ́lɛ yé tyɩ́? Képah náh pɩ, á se yɩ̃nɛ à sɛ́bɛ́y yɔ́ wãrkɩ yé kɔ̃ à á gblɔ̌y dùkù yo yé syah, sɔ̃́-á túkù kélɛ n pɩ? Tĩ̂, yépi se kɩ wãrkɩ á kɔ̃ sɛ́bɛ́ynɛ, nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á yé kɩ mɛ ápi dùkù yo?
Yépi ye ápi sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ. Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nɔ́lɛ á nnɔ sɔkɔ. No pól kélɛ n pnɛ, tɛ́ kélɛ n kar n pnɛ.

Kè mɛ píkínɔ́lɛ nɛ yépi-á sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ, nɛ̂ sɔkɔ wɛlɔ-á Krista á kɔ̃ á wãrkɩ. Wã́rkɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀nɛ, min nɛ́tɛ̃̂ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ nɩ́y ye, wãrkɩ wãrkɩ kwâh nɩ́y náh. Dyêh fábkɔ́ fábkɔ́ yõ sɔkɔ náh kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nɔ́lɛ dɛ́, névye nnɔ sɔkɔ ye.
Krista gbõ̀ yõ ye á sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ kénɛ wɛlɔ yõ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Ápi-á tyi nónónɛ n pɩ yɔ̀, á yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ náh á fɛ̃ n pɩ sélɛ dɛ́, Liyel kɔ̃́nɔ́ ye.

Ǹmɔ ye á kɔ̃ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ á fɛ̃ yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ késã́n tyilɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ. Kénɛ yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ náh n wil tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ dɛ́, Liyel Mirki tõ̀ vyãh ye kélɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ nɛ̂-á wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ, képah n pɔ n pɔ tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki wɔ minnɛ n kɔ̃.

Tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wɔ nɛ̂-á n pɔ n pɔ tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ké wã́rkɩ́nmɔnɔ gbĩ́nɛ dyêh fábkɔ́ fábkɔ́nɔ́ yõ, Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ tiki pɔ Moyisi yèpɔ kɔ̃ kè n tɛ̃, fɔ́ɔ́ Yisrayel no náh sõ̀ mɛ fɛ̃ n yah n dah n mɔ ǹ yah sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ kénɛ tɔ̃́rɩ́ náh mo póllɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á tõ̀ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ, képah náh Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ wɛ̃kɩ n kal n pi di?
Tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á n pɔ n pɔ tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ, gbílkínɔ́-à wɛ képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́nɔ́ wɔ se pyě.
Á kɩ fɛ̃ yo ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ tɔ̃́rɩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ gben tɛ̃̀nɛ, núkúnúkú tyɩ́-á képah tɔkɔ yõ.
Gbílkínɔ́-à mɛ sah mó-ńkɛ̃̂ kwâh yõ, mo mo tyɩ́ wɔ se pyě.
Á gbõ̀ sàhnyĩnɔ mɛ képah yõ, képah ye á nɩ mɛ yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ.
Ápi náh mɛ pɩ Moyisi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ fwɔ vike tũ ǹ yah sɔkɔ sɔ̃̀nko Yisrayel no káh ǹ yèpɔ tɛ̃́nɔ́ yal n mɔ gbĩ́ pɩ̃, képah nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mo mo tyɩ́ náh kélɛ.

Ǹtɛ pè mɛ sɛ̃́ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ. À pɔ nɔ kwɛy tyɩ́, pàh tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kédyâhlɛ n kar, kénɛ fwɔ mɛ̀ n nɛ n mɛ fɔ́kɔ́ntũtɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pé yah sɔkɔ. Kè náh tɔkɔ to pé yah. Nɛ́ nɛ̂ náh ǹ wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ Kristalɛ, kè náh n tɔkɔ n to tɛ̃̀ yah.
Gbɩ yõ à pɔ syɩ kwɛy tyɩ́, pàh Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ n kar, fwɔ mɛ̀ n nɛ n mɛ pé lékã́m yah fɔkɔ n tũ n sah.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ wɔ-à sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ, fwɔ mɛ̀ n tɔkɔ n to tɛ̃̀ yah sɔkɔ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á n yo ásõ̂, Liyel Mirki ye. Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki-à mɛ ńyãh sɔkɔ, névye n nɛ mɛ pé gblɔ̌y yõ nɛ́npɔ́.

Fwɔ náh mɛ víkéntũnɔlɛ ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ yah. Á dùkù mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tɔ̃́rɩ́lɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Á vi mɔ pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Wãn mɛ n mɔ n yuku á tɔ̃́rɩ́ yõ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tõ̀ vyãh ye képahlɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Mirkilɛ.
Liyel ye ápi yãm yah tɛ́ tõ̀ mɛ̀ dahbɩ á gbõ̀, képah ye á kélɛ n pɩ wílkúnì kɛ̃́nɛ.

Sen tyi nónó-á névye n nɛ n wɔ̃bɩ n pɩ, ápi sépi wɛ yɛ. Á mɛ á tyilɛ n pɩ yĩ́nvǐ kɛ̃́nɛ, á náh mɛ Liyel wɛy kɔ́rlɛ n vi n mɔ póllɛ. Gbɩ ye ápi mɛ n yo tɔ́tɔ́, sɔ̃̀nko névye pól sɛ̃ á yõ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ ápi-á Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂nɛ n yo, képah-à kɩ tɔ̃ mɛ́-ńkɛ̃́nɛ kyòo, tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́pú tyɩ́ ye kè náh mɛ kyòo.

Sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ nɛ̂-á kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tõ̀lɛ, ǹmɔ ye fɛ̃́ntũ̂ mɔ pé yah. À kàh-ǹsah tũ pé tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir-á Krista tɔ̃́rɩ́ kyòo nɛ̂nɛ n wɛ̃kɩ, pè káh fɛ̃ képah wɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel kètɔ̀ ye mó tɔ̃ Kristalɛ.
Ápi gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ náh á n yo n kɔ̃ dɛ́, Yesu Krista tyɩ́ ye á n yo n kɔ̃ nɛ ǹmɔ-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ. Ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ pɩ tõ̀npɩbɩlɛ yé tyɩ́ Yesu Krista yĩnnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel nɛ̂-á yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́ kyòo mɔ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ ye kõ mɔ kyòolɛ ápi nnɔ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko névye ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ wɛ nɛ̂-á mɛ n tɛ̃ Krista yèpɔ sɔkɔ.
Kénɛ tahrɩ mɛ̀ ye ápi kɔ̃, ápi nónó-á sohkɩ kɛ̃́nɛ á sɔkɔ puri pĩ́n tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, sɔ̃̀nko névye pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ náh wil ápi tyɩ́, kǎh wil Liyel tyɩ́.
Fṍhnɔ́ mɛ n sah ápi yõ yey yey póllɛ, ǹtɛ á náh mɛ tɛ̃ kwlɔ. Á lékã́m mɛ vye fɛ̃kɩ, ǹtɛ á yáh-ńsah náh tyɛ.
Pè mɛ kõ á náh à álɛ n fõh, ǹtɛ Liyel náh ǹ náh vi á kɔ̃. Pè á mɩ min, ǹtɛ á náh ku.
Yesu-á fṍhnɔ́ wɛ à ku dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, képah ye mɛ ápilɛ n wɛ sõmɛsṍ. Képah ye kɩ névye kɔ̃ pè kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh mɛ á min sɔkɔ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Nɛ́ ápi náh ku, gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ á kɩ mɛ kũnɛ n dɔ n yah Yesu yĩnnɛ. Á wil gbɛ̃́nsê nɛ̂-á mó sohkɩ kɛ̃́nɛ, kè kɩ min wɛ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ápi mɛ wɛ̃ sɔkɔ kũnɛ, yépi mó mɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ n wɛ.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Mé sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, képah ye ń kɔ̃ mé ǹ wɛynɛ n yo.» Sɛ̃́ ye ápi tɔ sɛ̃ ǹ yõ, képah ye á kɔ̃ á ǹ wɛynɛ n yo.
Yé náh wɛ di, á pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel nɛ̂-á yilki mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu lékólɛ, wǎh kɩ ápi tɔ lékyɩ̂ yilki mɔ, tɛ́ kɩ kyɩ ápi ànɛ̂ yépi sah ǹ tnɔ̂.
Yépi yĩn ye tyi nɔ́pi pól ápilɛ n wɛ. Tɛ́ képah sɔkɔ ye mó Liyel kɩ yõ̀bènɔrɩ náhnáh pɩ névye tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko pè nɛ n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́, pè mó ǹnɛ n gbilki.
Képah ye kè náh mɛ wílkúnìnɛ ápi tyɩ́ póllɛ. Á wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyɩ́-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ n yɩkɩ n yuku, á min tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ n gbah n pɩ n yuku sã́nnɛ sõmɛsṍ.
Yé náh wɛ di, mó-ńkɛ̃̂ yèvyãhrɩ kwéy nɛ̂-á ápi yõ núkúnúkú yɔ̀, képah náh mɛ sãh yah yah tɛ̃̀nɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ nɛ̂-á á kɩ pɔ n wɛ n pi képah tyɩ́ sõwãh.

Yĩ́-á yî nónónɛ n wɛ n pnɛ, sépi náh ápi mɛ n yah n kɔ̃. Kè náh yî nónónɛ n wɛ n pnɛ, sépi ye á mɛ n yah n kɔ̃. Yĩ́-á n tɛ̃ n pnɛ yî nónó yõ, sépi náh n mo. Ǹtɛ kè náh n tɛ̃ n pnɛ nónó yõ, sépi n nɛ n mɛ tyɛ́tyɛ́nɩ́ kɛ̃́nɛ.

Wil gbɛ̃́nsê nɛ̂-á ápi min tɛ̃̀-ǹsahlɛ sétáh mɛ̀ yõ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, ké tyɩ́-à pɔ yɩkɩ, Liyel kɩ min tɛ̃̀-ǹsah yɔ́ yah á kɔ̃ yĩ̂nyõ, nɛ̂-á kɩ mɛ kṹmm yõ sɔkɔ. Kénɛ tɛ̃̀-ǹsah mɛ̀nɛ, névi gbɛ̃̀npɩnɩ náh kélɛ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, ké sɔkɔ de dékè mɛ á kah tɛ̃, képah ye á mɛ n gbĩ ké yĩnnɛ.
Áyáh kɩ wɛ de ké sɔkɔ, á wil tìtí náh tɔ̃ n wɛ n pi.

Wɔ̂ nɛ̂ pól-á á min kɩ n pɩ n pi sétáh mɛ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, á kɩ mɛ gbĩ̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ tɔ́kɔ́pékè sɔ̃́ á yõ. Min tɛ̃̀-ǹsah nɛ̂-á á tyɩ́ sétáh mɛ̀ yõ, kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ á sɔ̃́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃ dɛ́. Yɩ́kɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min tɛ̃̀-ǹsah nɛ̂-á Liyel kɩ á kɔ̃ n pi yĩ̂nyõ, á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ képah pɔ yɩkɩ yɩkɩ tyɩ́ mɛ̀ swɔ tɔkɔ.
Liyel ye sépi pól yah sah ápi yĩnnɛ. Pèpɔrɩ nónó-á à kɩ n pɩ n pi á tyɩ́, ǹ Mirki ǹgbò ye à tɛkɩ mɔ á kɔ̃ sé sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, á sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ nɛ á min tɛ̃̀-à kɩ fyɔ̀ tɛ̃̀ á wil gbɛ̃́nsê mɛ̀ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, á wrɔ́-á mɛ dɔ́nɔ́lɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
Ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye á mɛ n yuku yahlɛ, ǹ wɛ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ náh.
Á sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ, képah ye á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á min yal wil gbɛ̃́nsê mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, kè kyɩ n tɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tnɔ̂.
Ǹtɛ kàh kɩ se wɛ wil ò; kàh kɩ se wɛ wìl-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ ò; áyáh pɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ́ á tyɩ́ n nɔ n pi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, képah ye á mɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Yé náh wɛ di, á pól yɩ̃nɛ Krista á tuke. Képah sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-à kɩ mɛ pèpɛy pɩ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, à kɩ à dyah kélɛ. Nɛ̂-à kɩ mó mɛ pèkè pɩ, à kɩ à dyah kélɛ.

Kwâh nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ápi kélɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye, á mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ á névye sõnɔ vi mɔ pè ǹ yah tíkílɛ n pɩ. Ápi fɩ̃́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mɛ Liyel pu. Tɛ́ ńmɔ sõnɔ sɔkɔ, yépi tɔ api pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́.
Á gblɔ̌y dùkù náh tɔ̃ á n yo yélɛ n syah, ǹtɛ syɔ̃̀-ǹsah ye á yélɛ n kɔ̃ yè fɛ̃ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki ápi yĩnnɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɩ wɛ yé tyɩ́ yĩ́ yah pɩ́pú tyɩ́.
Ápi yõ̀gbèl-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ yuku, Liyel yĩn ye. Ǹtɛ á yah-à kɩ se mó mɛ gbrɛ́y, yépi yĩn ye.
Krista tyɩ́nɔnɔ ye yah syi ápi tyɩ́, ápi nónó-á pɩ̃ nɛ nɛ́núkú-á ku no pól swɔ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ no pól tɔ sɔ̃́ ku.
À ku no pól yĩnnɛ sɔ̃̀nko nónó-á mɛ min sɔkɔ, pè káh pé minnɛ n pɩ pé gblɔ̌y yĩnnɛ, nɛ̂-á ku tɛ́ ǹ lékó yilki mɔ, pè kélɛ n pɩ ǹmɔ yĩnnɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ á náh tɔ̃ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yah n pi à yɩ̃nɛ névi yõ̀tàhsyi yáhnɔ́lɛ. Áyâh sɔ̃́ sõ̀ mɛ Kristalɛ n yah sɛ̃́, núkúnúkú á náh tɔ̃ mɛ ǹnɛ n yah sɛ̃́.
Névi nɛ̂ wrɔ́-à mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Kristalɛ, tɛ̃̀ nɩ n vi n mɔ. Ǎ ǹ pɩ dùkù kédyâh fĩn n mɔ, ǹ tɛ́ pɩ dùkù késã́n tɔkɔ.
Liyel tõ̀ vyãh ye sépi póllɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ápi wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ ǹnɛ Krista gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ mɛ wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ tõ̀ dahbɩ ápi gbõ̀.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel náh kèkõyṍ névye tyípêl mɔ kõ, à syɔ̃ Krista tyɩ́ à pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ ǹnɛ, tɛ́ mɛ wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ dahbɩ ápi gbõ̀ nɛ, á névye wrɔ́lɛ n kwrɔ n mɔ péwɔlɛ.
Krista yĩn yõ ye ápi mɛ n wɛkɩ. Kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ Liyel sɔ̃́ n yo n mɔ névye tyɩ́ ápi gbõ̀ yõ. Képah ye á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ Krista yĩn yõ nɛ, yé yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ n mɔ Liyellɛ.
Krista nɛ̂-á à náh tyípékè pɩ yah, Liyel ǹmɔ twah mɔ ápi tyípêllɛ, sɔ̃̀nko ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ, ápi tɔ pɩ yályál Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Ápi-á pɩ Liyel tõ̀ pɩ mùnɛ sɛ̃́, képah ye á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ wǎh yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ yé tyɩ́, yé káh yɛ kè pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Tyah-á sõ̀ mɛ pallɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, mé á nírí tɛ̃.
Pwáhnmɔnɔ sõlɛ, mé ǹ yohnɩ mɔ.
Tyah pèpɛy gbĩ́ mɛ̀ ye núkúnúkú yɔ̀.
Yah, pwáhnmɔnɔ yòh ye kwɛynɛ.»
Á náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ yɩkɩ, ǹnɩ̂ kɔ̃ à pɔ wɛ́nyo-ńsah wɛ á tõ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, ápi mɛ á gblɔ̌ynɛ n wɛ̃kɩ Liyel tõ̀npɩbɩ kègblɔlɛ. Á mɛ gbah tɛ̃ yèvyãhrɩ, ànɛ̂ yèkwɔrɩ, ànɛ̂ tíkí képékèlɛ n sro náhnáh.
Á ko syi, tɛ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè pɩ. Pè névye mɔ á yõ, tɛ́ á mɔ tã̀n pèl pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Á náh mɛ n wɛ n dɔ, yõke tɔ náh mɛ n wɛ n yõ.
