Á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́ fɔkɔlɛ píkínɔ́lɛ ànɛ̂ á lékã́m póllɛ. Á mɛ tyilɛ n sro mɛ pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ mɛ á sɔkɔ,
ànɛ̂ gbɩ wɛlɔ ye á mɛ n yo Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ. Gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ ye ápi pɩ á mɛ́fwó yîlɛ à á sépɛ́bɩ́lɛ n fwo, tɛ́ á gblɔ̌y yõlɛ n syɩkɩ.
Névye á dɔkɔ n mɔ, képah náh pɩ pě á kõ fɛ̃. Pě á yĩ́gbɩ́lɛ n yo, képah náh pɩ pě á yĩ́pollɛ n yo. Pě álɛ n pɩ mɩ̀nyobelɛ, tɛ́ gblɔ yópú ye mó tɔ̃ álɛ.
Pě álɛ n pɩ pé kósyì á pɩ̃, tɛ́ pè mó tɔ̃ álɛ n pnɛ kyɔ́. Pě álɛ n pɩ lékyɩ̂ sɔ̃́ álɛ tɛ́ vye ye mó tɔ̃ álɛ. Pě fṍhnɔ́lɛ n sah á yõ, tɛ́ pè náh álɛ n ko n mɔ.

Pě yèkwɔrɩ tyilɛ n pɩ á tyɩ́, tɛ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ à n nɛ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Pě álɛ n tɔkɔ n pɩ yãm tãnnɛ, tɛ́ á mó tɔ̃ mɛ névye náhnáhlɛ n pɩ tahbɩlɛ. Pě álɛ n pɩ kwâh kɛ̃́púlɛ, tɛ́ yíyìn pól mó tɔ̃ mɛ á tyɩ́.
Korɛ̃ntɩ tãn, gbɩ ye ápi n yo yé tyɩ́. Á á fɔkɔ dal mɔ yélɛ.
Ápi náh á fɔkɔ kwĩnki yélɛ. Yépi ye yé fɔkɔ kwĩnki ápilɛ.
Sú-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ tyilɛ n yo ǹ wɛ̃́npì tyɩ́ sɔ̃́, sɛ̃́ ye mé mɛ n yo tyilɛ yé tyɩ́. Yé yɩ̃nɛ yè kè pɩ̃ á tyɩ́, yépi tɔ mó yé fɔkɔ dal n mɔ yĩ́ĩ́ álɛ.
Yé káh nɛ n pɩ n soh Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃́púlɛ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ ànɛ̂ tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ náh mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ núkú yõ. Kyòó ànɛ̂ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ náh fɛ̃ n kwrɔ n mɔ.
Krista ànɛ̂ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ wrɔ́ náh fɛ̃ n kwrɔ n mɔ. Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃́ névi wrɔ́ náh fɛ̃ n kwrɔ n mɔ.
Fal fal tã̀n náh fɛ̃ n kwrɔ n mɔ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, ápilɛ, Liyel ní-ńsah gbô ye álɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á kè yo sɔ̃́ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
«Mé kɩ tɛ̃ pélɛ tɛ́ kɩ mɛ pélɛ pé kɔ́-ńtã̂n sɔkɔ.
Mé kɩ pɩ pé Liyellɛ, tɛ́ pè kɩ mó pɩ ń nolɛ.»
Képah ye Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel nɛ: «Yé wil kénɛ névye wrɔ́, yè gbɛ n tɛ̃ yé tyɩ́lɛ.
Yé káh n tũ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ̂ náh mɛ yályál ńmɔ yah, képah sɔkɔ ńmɔ kɩ mó yé tɛ̃ plɛ.
Mé kɩ pɩ yé Súlɛ, tɛ́ yé kɩ mó pɩ ń dĩ́npì ànɛ̂ ń syɔ́npìlɛ.» Sɛ̃́ ye Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yo, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ.»

Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ nɔ́pilɛ, ápi tɔ vyãh mɛ sé sɔkɔ. Képah ye, tyi nónó pól-á silki sah á wil ànɛ̂ á minnɛ, á ye sè wu n to á gblɔ̌y sɔkɔ, à mó nɛ n mɛ yályál Liyel yah ǹ yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé yɛ á tyɩ́ nɔ yé tyɩ́. Ápi náh pɩ de ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́. Á náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ gbõ̀ tyɛ. Á náh syɩkɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yõ.
Yé káh wɛ nɛ máh mɛ sépilɛ n yo à lékàhlɛ yélɛ n kɔ̃ dɛ́. Mé kè yo sah tɛ yé tyɩ́ nɛ á min pól sɔkɔ, yé tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ́nɔ́lɛ á tyɩ́ kũ ńtɛ̃ fyé náh fɛ̃ á wrɔ́ yɩkɩ.
Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ yé yõ, ń nɩ mɛ vɩ́nɔ́lɛ yélɛ. Yé tyɩ́ pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ nɩ dénɔ́lɛ ń tyɩ́. Yèkwɔrɩ duke pól sénsɔ̃ mɛ álɛ n wɛ, ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ mɛ kah mɔ ń sɔkɔ.
Áyáh fyɔ̀ pɔ de Masedonɩ mara sɔkɔ, yèvyãhrɩ duke pól núkú syɩkɩ á yõ, á náh wɛ mɩ yah kwéy ńtɛ̃nɛ. Mâl ye yey yey póllɛ, tíkí wɛ á sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel nɛ̂-á tɛ̃́nkwlɔpu nɩ dé-òlɛ, à Tite tɛkɩ mɔ ápi kɔ̃ á nɩ kɔ̃ kè de.

Kè náh mɛ nɛ Tite pɔ́nɔ́ ó sɔ̃́ ápi nɩ kɔ̃ kè de, yáh sṍré nɛ̂ mɔ ǹ sɔkɔ képah tɔ ye. Tite pɔ yo á syah ń wɛ dékè-á mɛ yé kah tɛ̃ sɔ̃́, ànɛ̂ yèkwɔrɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ yáh mɛ yuku yĩn sɔ̃́ à ń vyãhlɛ n syi. Képah wãn gbah mɔ ń nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ yõ.

Máh sɛ́bɛ́y nɛ̂ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́, mé pɩ̃ nɛ kǎh yèkwɔrɩ mɔ yé sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ ké tɛ́kɩ́nmɔnɔ náh pɩ nàhnpɩ̃nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ máh pɔ kè kyɔmɩ wɛ nɛ kǎh yèkwɔrɩ mɔ yé sɔkɔ wrɔ́ kwéy ó sɔkɔ, kè pɩ nàhnpɩ̃nɛ ń tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, kè mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ ń tyɩ́. Kǎh yèkwɔrɩ mɔ yé sɔkɔ képah yĩn náh dɛ́, yèkwɔrɩ mɛ̀-á vìnmɔnɔ nɛ̂ dahbɩ yé pɩ dùkù sɔkɔ, képah yĩn ye. Yé yèkwɔrɩ mɛ̀ sõ̀ mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́. Kǎh mó pɩ sɛ̃́, á náh pèkè yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ yé tyɩ́.

Yé náh wɛ di, yèkwɔrɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́, képah névi pɩ dùkùlɛ n vi n mɔ à ǹnɛ n mɔ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, kè náh n pɩ nàhnpɩ̃nɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ kèkõyṍ tyi sõnɔ-á yèkwɔrɩ nɛ̂nɛ n mɔ névi sɔkɔ, képah ye n pɔ n pɔ kũnɛ.
Yèkwɔrɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tyɩ́, kǎh vìnmɔnɔ nɛ̂ dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ yé kè wɛ yɔ̀:
Yé mɛ yé gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ yĩ́ĩ́.
Yé mɛ gblɔ̌y yɛlɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Yé fɔkɔ mɛ vyãh yĩ́ĩ́ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ yĩ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ.
Tíkí mɛ yé tɛ̃ pèkè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.
Ń wɛ dékè mɛ yé tɛ̃.
Yé mɛ gbah tɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ fṍhnɔ́ sah lékàh névi yõ.
Yé kè wɛ̃kɩ dal mɔ nɛ yé vyãh náh mɛ yĩ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ póllɛ.
Ńmɔ náh sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ tyítúkù pɩ́-ò yĩnnɛ, képah náh pɩ tyítúkù-á pɩ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ yĩnnɛ dɛ́, mé kè tɛkɩ mɔ nɛ yé kè pɩ̃ Liyel yah sɔkɔ nɛ ápi tyɩ́-á mɛ tah yĩ́ĩ́ yé tyɩ́.
Yáh nɛ̂ pɩ, képah ápi nnɔ de kègbɩlɛ, tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, yáh Tite nɩ sũ ǹ nɩ kɔ̃ kè vɩ sɔ̃́, kè wãn mɔ ápi nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ yõ.
Mé lésõ ń gblɔ̌y yɔ̃ sah kwéy Tite tyɩ́ yé tyɩ́ sõwãh. Ǹtɛ yé náh mó sennɛ ń tɛ̃. Áyáh dar tɛ́ gbɩlɛ n yo sɔ̃́ yé tyɩ́, sɛ̃́ ye á yo yé yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ Tite tyɩ́, tɛ́ à mó ńtyɩ̃́nɔ kyɩ kè wɛ sɛ̃́.
Yáh à tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ tɛ́ yõ̀yen sah ǹ yõ sɔ̃́, ǹ dyɔ mɛ n kwnɛ kélɛ, képah ye yé tyɩ́ gbah nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ tyɩ́.
Kè mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ ń tyɩ́, à tɛ̃ wɛ ń gbõ̀ sah yé yõ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé, Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ Masedɔnɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ tyɩ́, á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á kè yo yé syah.
Yèkwɔrɩ duke náhnáh sõ̀ pè yĩni tɛ̃, ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sõ̀ mɛ kah mɔ pé sɔkɔ. Yãm sõ̀ mɛ kah peke pé yõ, ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, pè pɩ yɩ̃́nkɔ̃pu kègblɔlɛ.
Ńmɔ ye pé tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ pǎh kè pɩ à syɩ pé gbõ̀ yĩ̀n tyɩ́, fɔ́ɔ́ à kah mɔ pé gbõ̀ yĩ̀n ńtɛ̃ yõ à yɩ̃nɛ pé dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Tɛ́ mɛ kè gbah yah kɔ̃ ápi tyɩ́ nɛ á yɛ pé gbõ̀ dahbɩ á tyɩ́ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ mɛ̀ tɛ́kɩ́nmɔnɔ sɔkɔ Nsyude mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́.
Ápi-á sõ̀ mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n yah n kɔ̃, pè kè pɩ kah mɔ képah yõ ńtɛ̃nɛ. Pè pé gblɔ̌ynɛ Liyel ǹgbò kɔ̃, képah náh, tɛ́ pé gblɔ̌y dahbɩ ápi tɔ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ à yɩ̃nɛ Liye dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Képah ye, á mɛ Titi ni nɛ wǎh pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ syínɔ́ tõ̀ nɛ̂ tyah yé tĩ̀nnɛ, à kè pɩ n dal n mɔ.

Sɔ̃́-á yélɛ yahlɛ tyi pól sɔkɔ yɔ̀: Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ yé sɔkɔ, yé n wɛkɩ n pnɛ, yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂lɛ yé sɔkɔ, sṍrélɛ yé sɔkɔ yĩ̀n kɛ̃́nɛ, à tahlɩ névye tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á á dahmɔ yé sɔkɔ, képah yĩnnɛ á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé nɛ n mɛ yahlɛ pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ mɔ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ tɔ sɔkɔ.
Kyɩ̃́nmɔnɔ náh mé n kyɩ̃ n mɔ yélɛ máh képahlɛ n yo dɛ́. Ǹtɛ máh no tɛ́lɔ́ gbáhntɛ̃nɔ tyɩ́lɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yépi tɔ kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ kègbɩ-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista-á pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ, yé kélɛ n pnɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á kwâh nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, à fɛ̃ syi ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ yãm nɛynɛ sɔ̃̀nko yépi pɩ kwâh nátãmnɛ.

Ńmɔ sõnɔ-á nɛ̂nɛ, yĩ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, képah ye mé n yo yé tyɩ́. Képah mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ yépi tyɩ́ yépi nónó-á pɩ gbrolɛ yán dùkùlɛ à pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ mɛ̀ mɔ, tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, ké pɩ́nɔ́ yáhntɔkɔnɔ wil yépi tyɩ́.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, núkúnúkú yé tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ n dal n mɔ. Yáh kè yah tɔkɔ sõnɔ pèpɛynɛ sɔ̃́, yé kè pɩ n dal n mɔ sɛ̃́ à yɩ̃nɛ yé gbõ̀ yĩ̀nnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, wâh yɩ̃ kɔ̃ á gbõ̀ yĩ̀nnɛ à yɩ̃nɛ wáh kè yah tɔkɔ sɔ̃́, képah tyɩ́ nɔ Liyel tyɩ́. Kwâh nɛ̂ náh mɛ á tyɩ́, à náh képah nɩ́ynɛ n tɛ̃.
Mé náh yo nɛ yé yé gblɔ̌y mɔ yãm sɔkɔ no tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ pɛkɩ yĩnnɛ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé kè pɩ yé pól nɛ n mɛ núkúlɛ.

Kwɛy mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, kwâh mɛ yépi gbõ̀. Képah ye, kwâh náh mɛ nónó tyɩ́, yé pélɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ. Kwâh-à mó sõ nɛ̂nɛ mɛ pépi tyɩ́ tɛ́ kɩ n knɛ yépi tyɩ́, pè kɩ yé yohnɩ mɔ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé pól kɩ mɛ núkúlɛ,
sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Nɛ̂-á sõ̀ kwel dò, wãn náh wũ ǹ tyɩ́. Nɛ̂-á sõ̀ kwel kwéy, ǹ tyɩ́ náh tɛkɩ.»
Liyel yĩn nɛ n gbilki, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yé yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ dékè dahbɩ Titi nɩ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á sõ̀ à kè dahbɩ ápi nnɔ sɔkɔ.
Áyáh nɛ̂ yah kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́, à kè fɛ̃ syi. Tɛ́ yé yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ dékè-á sõ̀ mɛ ǹ nɩ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, à núkú kè yah tɔkɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ, páh kɩ yuku yé tĩ̀nnɛ.
Á mɛ á yṹnpi yɔ́ tɔlɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ pól mɛ ǹ yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ à wil képah sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ ye tɔ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ yah wilki nɛ à ápi tɛkɩ mɔ á kyɩ pèpɔrɩ tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩn gbilki yĩn ye ápi n pɩ tõ̀ mɛ̀nɛ à kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ tɔlɛ nɛ tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ á tyɩ́.
Á mɛ tyi póllɛ n pɩ tɔlɛ nɛ, pɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á dahbɩ á gbõ̀, á ké tyi tɔ̃ sah pɩ pɔ tyɛ á káh yĩ́nyɩ́kɩ̀ wɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á nɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á nɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ névye tɔ yah sɔkɔ.

Á ye á yṹnpi yɔ́ tɔlɛ n tɛkɩ mɔ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Á à wɛ mɔ yah gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ, tɛ́ sé pól sɔkɔ á kè wɛ nɛ gbáhntɛ̃-ò-á ǹnɛ. Ǹtɛ à tɔ̃ mɛ gbah tɛ̃ kal núkúnúkú, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ yépi yõ sɔkɔ.
Titi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, ńmɔ kɔ́-ò ye ǹnɛ, à mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ànɛ̂ ńmɔlɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yépi yĩnnɛ. Ǹtɛ á yṹnpyé tɛ́lɔ́ wɔlɛ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ ye tɛkɩ mɔ pélɛ, Krista yĩn gbilki yĩnnɛ.
Képah ye, yé kélɛ pè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ pé tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ yé tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ kè wɛ, pè mó pɩ̃ nɛ gbɩ-á mɛ á tyɩ́ á yélɛ n sõ.
Yòhnɩ̀mɔnɔ nɛ̂-á kɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ n pi Yude mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́, yõ náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ mè sɛ́bɛ́y tõ yé tyɩ́ képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Mé pɩ̃ nɛ yáh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé kè pɩ. Mé mɛ yélɛ n sõ ńtɛ̃nɛ Masedɔnɩ mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pṹ tyɩ́, mɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, Akayi mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú-á mɛ pé gblɔ̌y vi tɛ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ yĩnnɛ fɔ́ɔ́ yán dùkùlɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yépi nónó-á mɛ kénɛ mara sɔkɔ, yépi gbáhntɛ̃nɔ mɛ̀ sṍré mɔ névye kan sɔkɔ.
Mé á yṹnpyélɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko máh mɛ yélɛ n sõ sõ̀nɔ́ nɛ̂nɛ yĩ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, kè káh pɔ pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ. Ǹtɛ yè nɛ n mɛ yé gblɔ̌y vi sah kègbɩ yõ sɔ̃́-á mé yo kélɛ.

Kàh kɩ pɩ dùkù yɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ Masedɔnɩ mara tãn-à kɩ pɔ́nɔ́ yĩ́ ńmɔlɛ, tɛ́ pɔ nɛ yah yé náh mɛ yé gblɔ̌y vi sah, kè kɩ pɩ sen ǹgbɛ̃nɛ ápi tyɩ́ áyáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ kàh sɛ̃ yé yõ. Tɛ́ yépi ńtɛ̃ wɔ tyɩ́ ye kè kɩ pɩ sennɛ. Ǹtɛ mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé képah yo.

Képah ye, mé kè sõ nɛ máh yɩ̃nɛ mé á yṹnpyé nɔ́pi ni pè mɔ ńmɔ yahlɛ, pè pɔ pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ yahlɛ n wah yáh yé vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ; sɔ̃̀nko máh kɩ pópó n pi, ké tyɩ́ yah nɛ n mɛ wàhntɛnɔlɛ, nɛ̂-á kɩ kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ yáh kè pɩ yé dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ, kyɩ̃́nmɔnɔ náh pè kyɩ̃ mɔ yélɛ.
Yé se kè pɩ̃ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à duku mɔ kwéy, tɛ̃̀ n pɔ sèmukɔ kwéy tɔkɔ; tɛ́ nɛ̂-à duku mɔ dò, tɛ̃̀ n pɔ sèmukɔ dò tɔkɔ tɛ́.

Yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól yɩ̃nɛ yè kɔ̃ à yɩ̃nɛ yáh kè yah tɔkɔ sɔ̃́ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ. Nɛy káh kɔ̃ à mó tɔ̃ ké nàhnpɩ̃nɛ n gbo, képah náh pɩ, pè sɔ̃́ tɛ̃̀ kyɩ̃ mɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, nɛ̂-á n yɩ̃ n kɔ̃ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ tyɩ́ nɔ Liyel tyɩ́.

Tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ pèpɔrɩ duke pól pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ yé tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko yî nónó pól yétõ̂-á mɛ yé tyɩ́, sè nɛ n mɛ yé tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ ànɛ̂ dòhnɔ̀ tɔlɛ, yé kɔ̃ yè fɛ̃ pèpɔrɩ duke póllɛ n pɩ,
sɔ̃́-á kélɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ:
«À ǹ nɩlɛ n dal n mɔ n yɩ̃ n kɔ̃,
à n yɩ̃ yãm tãnnɛ n kɔ̃ n yĩ́ĩ́.
ǹ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩ tyɩ́ yĩ̀n náh mɛ.»
Liyel nɛ̂-á kwáhdúkúlɛ sètõlɛ n kɔ̃, tɛ́ ǹ yõ yõ yõkelɛ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃, ǹmɔ ye kɩ kwáhdúkúlɛ yépi kɔ̃ n pi, tɛ́ kɩ kè kɔ̃ kè kɩ kwel, kɩ wãn mɔ yé fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ yõ.

À kɩ yé pɩ kwâh nátãmnɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, sɔ̃̀nko yè fɛ̃ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩlɛ n pɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, yáh yî nónónɛ álɛ n kɔ̃ á névyelɛ n kɔ̃ n pɔ, pé náhnáh kɩ wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ sépi yĩnnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, yé pɔ́ mɔ́rɩ́ mɛ̀ kɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yohnɩ mɔ. Tɛ́ kè náh n yĩn n pi képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, kè kɩ névye náhnáh kɔ̃ pè kɩ pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛynɛ Liyellɛ n kɔ̃.

Yõre tõ̀ nɛ̂-á yé pɩ, pàh kɩ kè wɛ pè kɩ Liyel yĩn gbilki yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ à fɛ̃ syi tõ̀ pɩ Krista Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sɔkɔ. Pè kɩ tɔ̃ Liyel yĩn gbilki yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ yé gbã̀n yîlɛ pépi ànɛ̂ no tɛ́lɔ́ pól tɔ yohnɩ mɔ.
Pè kɩ nírí pɩ yé tyɩ́, kɩ pé tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ yõ̀bènɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ yĩnnɛ, Liyel-á nɛ̂ pɩ yé tyɩ́.
Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah Liyel yõ ǹ pèpɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ, nɛ̂-á ké kénkɔ̃ náh mɛ.
Ńmɔ Polelɛ, pè nɛ mâh mɛ yé tnɔ̂ mè n nɛ n wɛkɩ dáb dáb, tɛ́ mâh gbɛ mɔ yélɛ mè n nɛ n wɛkɩ fyɔ̌rɩ̀ fyɔ̌rɩ̀. Yesu Krista nɛ́pír pɩ́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ ǹ nɩ̀gbɛ̀kɩ̀ yĩn yõ,

ńmɔ Pole kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé yé gblɔ̌y yɛ, máh kɩ pɔ pɔ yé tnɔ̂, yé káh ń kɔ̃ mè pɔ nɛ n wɛkɩ fyɔ̌rɩ̀ fyɔ̌rɩ̀ yépi tɔ tyɩ́, sɔ̃́ mé mɛ kè sõ sah pɩ pɩ tɛ̃̀nɛ névye tyɩ́ nónó-á mɛ n sõ nɛ névi yõ̀tàhsyi pɩ dùkù-á ápi sɔkɔ.
Gbɩ ye névye tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye álɛ ó, ǹtɛ áyáh mɛ́kɩ̀ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, névi yõ̀tàhsyi tǎhkɩ̀ náh á n fwo kélɛ.
Ápi-á mɛ́kɩ̀lɛ n pɩ mɛ́fwóyî nónónɛ, névi gbɛ̃̀npɩnɔ náh sélɛ, sè n wil Liyel tyɩ́. Tǎhkɩ̀ mɛ sé sɔkɔ kɩ fɛ̃ Liyel sépɛ́bɩ́ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ ànɛ̂ sõnɔ túkúnìnɛ.

Kénɛ mɛ́fwóyî gbõ̀ yõ, ápi mɛ gblɔ̌y gbílkípú tǎhkɩ̀lɛ n yɩkɩ pépi nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ kàh-ǹsah tũ névye tyɩ́ nɛ pè káh Liyel pɩ̃. Á mɛ névye yõlɛ n vi n mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè n sah Krista tyɩ́ yõ.
Yáh kɩ pɔ n sah pallɛ Krista tyɩ́ yõ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, ápi náh tɔ̃ nòhnɩ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ tir sah kè n sɔkɔ n pi fṍhnɔ́ kɛ̃́nɛ ké tyɩ́ sṍwãh.

Yé yɩ̃́-á mɛ tyi nónó yõ, yě tyilɛ n yah n tɔkɔ à yɩ̃nɛ sépi ólɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à mɛ sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ páh mɛ Krista tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ tɔlɛ nɛ sɔ̃́-á pélɛ Krista tyɩ́ yõ, sɛ̃́ ó-á ápi tɔlɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.

Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ á kɔ̃ nɛ á yé yohnɩ mɔ yé yuku yahlɛ. À náh kélɛ á kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ yɩkɩ yĩnnɛ. Tɛ́ ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ ń gblɔ̌y yɔ̃ sah kah mɔ kwéy képah tyɩ́ sṍwãh, kè náh mɛ sennɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.
Kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ sɛ́bɛ́y nɔ́pi sɔ̃́ mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ à tíkílɛ n mɔ yé sɔkɔ dɛ́.

Yé náh wɛ di, túkù nɛ mâh mɛ fɩ́ɩ́ yélɛ tɛ́ sɛ́bɛ́ynɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ mè n nɛ n nɔ n wɛkɩ fyɔ̌rɩ̀ fyɔ̌rɩ̀ ké sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mâh pɔ yé tnɔ̂ mè n pɩ tɛ̃́nkwlɔ-òlɛ, wɛ̀nfɩ̀ ó-á mè n nɛ n wɛkɩ.
Névi nɛ̂-á n yo képahlɛ, tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à kè pɩ̃ nɛ sɔ̃́-á ápi wɛkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ á sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ sɔkɔ, áyâh pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ sɛ̃́-á á kɩ n wɛkɩ.

Névye nónó-á mɛ pé gblɔ̌y yĩ́gbɩ́lɛ n yo, ápi náh á nɩlɛ n syãh à á gblɔ̌ynɛ n sãh pépilɛ. Lékã́m kɛ̃́ névye ye pélɛ, nónó-á pé gblɔ̌y tɔkɔ pɩ sãh sãh dúlɛ à wɛ̃nɛ n sãh kélɛ.

Yĩ́n-ńsah nɛ̂-á mɛ ápi tyɩ́, ápi tɛ̃ wɔ náh á gblɔ̌y gbilki n kah n mɔ n pi képah yõ. Tõ̀ nɛ̂-á Liyel dahbɩ á gbõ̀, nɛ̂ gbõ̀ yõ-á á yĩni tɛ̃ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, ápi kɩ á gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki à yɩ̃nɛ képahlɛ.
Á náh n kah n mɔ n pi képah yõ, á kɩ nɛ á kósyì pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ. Ápi ǹgbò ye pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ à pɔ Yesu Krista Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yé tyɩ́.

Á náh n kah n mɔ n pi képah yõ, kɩ pɔ á gblɔ̌ynɛ gbilki no tɛ́lɔ́ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ. Ǹtɛ á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé yuku yahlɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko wãn mɔ á tõ̀ yõ yé tĩ̀nnɛ à yɩ̃nɛ yĩn-ńsáh nɛ̂-á á kɔ̃.
Képah náh, á kɩ fɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n kɔ̃ tã̀ntã̀n tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ nónó-á sé gblɔ̌y yépi tĩ̀nnɛ. Á náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ tɔkɔ á gblɔ̌y gbilki n pi.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ: «Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé gblɔ̌y gbilki, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á tyi nónó pɩ ápi tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ ǹ gblɔ̌y gbilki sépi yĩnnɛ.»
Névi nɛ̂-à ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n sõ, kè náh pɩ á kɩ nɛ ǹmɔ sɔ̃́ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ dɛ́, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-à névi nɛ̂nɛ n sõ, ǹmɔ ye nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé ń vî tyi sṍmnɔ́ pɩ yah sɛ̃́ kwéy. Ũ̀ṹ, yé ń sṍmnɔ́ pɩ.

Mé mɛ yé gbɩ̃ mɔ sah pɛ núkú ó tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á pɩ Kristalɛ, kɩ pɔ yélɛ à kɔ̃ n pi dĩ́ tyɩ́ pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ sénpir sɔ̃́ nɛ̂-á mɛ yályál Liyel yah. Képah ye, yé tyɩ́ mɛ ń nɩlɛ n yɔrɩ sɔ̃́-á kè Liyel nɩlɛ n yɔrɩ.
Ǹtɛ tíkí mɛ ń tɛ̃ nɛ yé sõnɔ káh pɔ vi mɔ, kè pɔ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ pèpɛy mɛ̀ gbɛkɩ ànɛ̂ Kristalɛ, sɔ̃́-á wahy Awa vi tɛ̃ lékã́mkãm sɔkɔ.

Yé náh wɛ di, névi yɔ́-à pɔ Yesu káhkɩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌y áyáh nɛ̂ tyɩ́ yo yé tyɩ́, yě kè fɛ̃ n syi. Névi yɔ́-à pɔ mírkí káhkɩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á ké gblɔ̌y Liyel Mirkilɛ yáh nɛ̂ tyɩ́ noh ápi tyɩ́, yě kè fɛ̃ n syi. Névi yɔ́-à pɔ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir káhkɩ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á ké gblɔ̌y Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ yáh nɛ̂ tyɩ́ noh ápi tyɩ́, yě kè fɛ̃ n syi.
Ǹtɛ nónó-á Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ǹgbnɔlɛ yé tyɩ́ yé yo, ńmɔ náh mó tɔ̃ mɛ fɩ̃́ yɔ́ wɛ, ńyãh-á pè fṍnfṍ ńmɔ yõ.
Máh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ wɛy yah wɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, pnɛ̀nɔ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ ń tyɩ́ à yuku Liyel tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Á ye képah dùkùlɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ dal mɔ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ.
Máh Liyel Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yé tyɩ́ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ ń gblɔ̌y tiki mɔ yé yõ yɔ̃ yĩnnɛ, tyípékè se pyě mé pɩ képahlɛ?
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ yísyɔ́ ye yĩn ńmɔ yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ ń kɔ̃ mé tɛ̃ wɛ pɔ tõ̀ pɩ yépi wrɔ́ à yé yohnɩ mɔ.

Máh lésõ mɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, yî túkù yétõ̂ lésõ mɛ ń tɛ̃, ǹtɛ mé náh sè syi ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́. Á yṹnpyé nónó-á wil Masedɔnɩ mara sɔkɔ, pépi sõ̀ mɛ ń yétõ̂ yî póllɛ ńnɛ n kɔ̃ képah ye. Tyi pól sɔkɔ, mé náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé pɩ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ mé kɩ tɔ̃ gbah n tɛ̃ n pi sɛ̃́.
Gbɩ yó-ò ye ńnɛ Krista gbõ̀ yõ: ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ mɛ̀ wɛ́nɔ́ yah kõ n pi ń tyɩ́ Akayi mara pól sɔkɔ.
Kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ mé képahlɛ n yo? Yé tyɩ́ náh mɛ nɔ ń tyɩ́ képah se? Liyel ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ yé tyɩ́-á nɔ ń tyɩ́ dò.
Máh mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ yɔ̀, mé kɩ yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ n pi ké pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, kɩ névye kùrn kah nónó-á mɛ syɔ̃̀-ǹsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃ kɩ pé gblɔ̌y gbilki, nɛ páh pɩ núkúlɛ ápilɛ.
Kénɛ névye nɔ́pilɛ, nósyɔ́ ye nónó-á mɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ. Pè n nɛ n vi n syɩkɩ névye yõ, ǹ tɛ́ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ.
Ǹtɛ képah náh mɛ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ dò. Yé náh wɛ di, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ńtɛ̃ tɔ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n viri n pɩ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩlɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ kyòo dò.
Képah ye ǹ tõ̀npɩbɩ tɔ-à pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ gbɩ Liyel tõ̀npɩbɩlɛ, kè náh mɛ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ. Pè kɩ pé tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ lédyáhnɩ́ wɛ n pi ké tyɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ à yɩ̃nɛ pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀nɛ.
Mé kɩ n syɩ kè tɔ̃ yo yé tyɩ́ nɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh ńmɔlɛ n yah vínpɩlɛ. Ǹtɛ yáh kɩ se mɛ n sõ sɛ̃́, yé ń tɛ̃ vínpɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, ń tɔ mó ń gblɔ̌y wɛ n gbilki kwéy kɛ̀.
Ǹtɛ máh kɩ nɛ̂ yo n pi, mé náh mɛ kélɛ n yo Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ dɛ́, mé mɛ kélɛ n yo vínpɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ sɔ̃̀nko mè ń gblɔ̌y wɛ n gbilki.
Névye náhnáh-á fyɔ̀ mɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki kèkõyṍ dékè tyi yĩnnɛ, ńmɔ tɔ kɩ ń gblɔ̌y gbilki.
Yépi nónó-á lékã́m névyelɛ, kè yé dyɔ yé fɛ̃ syi à vínpɩbɩ sṍmnɔ́lɛ n pɩ.
Yè n fɛ̃ n syi pè kɔ̃ pě yélɛ n pɩ yɔ̃bɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, ǹ tɛ́ nɛ n syɩkɩ yé yõ, ǹ tɛ́ yélɛ n yɩ̃, ǹ tɛ́ yélɛ n yilɔ, ǹ tɛ́ yé létáhlɔ́lɛ n kɔ̃lɩ.
Máh nɛ̂nɛ n yo yɔ̀, kè mɛ sennɛ yé tyɩ́. Kè ye á tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ wɛ̃kɩ.
Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, ǹnɩ̂-à kɩ fɛ̃ syi ǹ gblɔ̌y gbilki n pi tir yɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ńmɔ tɔ kɩ fɛ̃ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ pɩ, máh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ n wɛkɩ vínpɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Pépi-à kɩ se mɛ Yebreninɛ, Yebreke ye ńmɔ tɔlɛ. Pàh kɩ se mɛ Yisrayel nolɛ, Yisrayel nɛy ye ńmɔ tɔlɛ. Pàh kɩ se mɛ Abrahmɩ náh tãnnɛ, ǹ náh nɛy ye ńmɔ tɔlɛ.

Pàh kɩ se mɛ Krista tõ̀npɩbɩlɛ ò, mé kɩ tɔ̃ kè yo á kɩ nɛ vínpɩ sɔ̃́ ńnɛ. Ńmɔ tõ̀ pɩ kal pé póllɛ, tɛ́ yèvyãhrɩ pɩ kal pé póllɛ, tɛ́ de wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ à kal pé póllɛ, tɛ́ ko syi kal pé póllɛ, tɛ́ kũ dlo gbal gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ à kal pé póllɛ.
Nsyifunɔ ń ko yèfõh yɩ̃́ yõgbãm pɔ́ kwǎryãhlɛ, fɔ́ɔ́ gbáhyɩ̃́ kwlɔ.
Wrome tãn n ko yèfõhlɛ gbáhyɩ̃́ tɔ̃́nɔ́.
Névye ń minki dyêhlɛ kɛ núkúlɛ.
Krótókè tiki de yah ńnɛ yɔ sɔkɔ kɛ tɔ̃́nɔ́,
ànɛ̂ yɔ ń yõ farkɩ yah gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì núkú ànɛ̂ lékã̂h núkú wrɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Ń kɔ́lɔ́ náhnáh sɔkɔ,
mé dlo gbal yrɛy yúkúnɔ́ kàh-ǹtã̀n sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ de wil névye yõ vìnsyɩkɩpu dlonɔ sɔkɔ.
Mé sõ̀ mɛ dlo sɔkɔ ń yìkì névye Nsyifunɔ wrɔ́ sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ mɛ dlo sɔkɔ nɛ́káhbɩ́ wrɔ́.
Mé sõ̀ mɛ dlo sɔkɔ kwil nɩyṍ,
tɛ́ mɛ dlo sɔkɔ gbɛ̃́nnɩ sɔkɔ.
Mé sõ̀ mɛ dlo sɔkɔ pnɛ yɔ sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ mɛ dlo sɔkɔ ń yṹnpyé mɩ̀nyobe wrɔ́.

Mé tã̀nkyèh náhnáh pɩ à yèvyãhrɩ pɩ sɔkɔ. Mé yah sõ lékãhlɔ náhnáhlɛ, tɛ́ kwɛkɩ ànɛ̂ níkì sṍmnɔ́ pɩ. Yõke yah kwlɔ yah ń tyɩ́ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ, mé tɛ̃ kwɛkɩ sɔkɔ. Mé tɛ̃ yah vɩrɩ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ yah flɔ kɛ̃́nɛ ń tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́-á mɛ tah yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́, ń vyãh náh syɩ képah tyɩ́ dɛ́: Képah nɛ̂-á pɩ fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ ń sɔkɔ à yuku Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ.
Ǹnɩ̂-à mɛ tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ sɔkɔ, ńmɔ tɔ n pɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ tɛ̃́nkwlɔ-òlɛ. Ǹnɩ̂-à tyípékè pɩ, kě ńmɔlɛ n yɔ.
Máh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ yɩ̃nɛ mè ń gblɔ̌y gbilki, mé kɩ ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki ń tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Liyel nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Súlɛ, ǹmɔ pɩ̃ nɛ mɩ̀nɩ̀ náh mé n yo. Sãm nɛ mɛ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ ǹ sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́.
Máh sõ̀ mɛ Damasɩ kwil sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Aretasɩ-á kwíltɛ̃̂ nɛ̂ wilki sah nɛ́npɔ́, ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ pè kɔ̃ pè kwil dé-ńtã̂nnɛ n syɩkɩ ńmɔ tɛ̃ yĩnnɛ.
Ǹtɛ pè mɛ ń dah mɔ gbétɔ́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ à wilki mɔ sétír pwã̀hlɛ à tiki mɔ kwil kɛ̃́nkahnɩnɛ ń kɔ̃ mé wɛ pwah ǹ gbõ̀.
Ńmɔ se yɩ̃nɛ mè ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki? Yõ kɛ̃́ ye képahlɛ. Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, máh wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ wɛ, tɛ́ pnɛ̀nɔ́ nɛ̂ wɛ wil Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, mé kɩ sépi tyɩ́ yo.

Mé Krista yõ sɛ̃́-ò yɔ́lɛ n pnɛ, ké ye gbɔ̃nyã́h ye yɔ̀, — à yɔ̃ dɔkɔ sɔkɔ yĩ̂nyõ léyy tɛ̃̀-ǹsah sɔkɔ. Tɛ́nkàh à yɔ̃ dɔkɔ sɔkɔ ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tɔlɛ nɩ? Tɛ́nkàh wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ ye à wɛ nɩ? Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh pɩ̃. Liyel ó ye n pnɛ kélɛ. —

Gbɩ ye, mé pɩ̃ nɛ dĩ́ mɛ̀-á yɔ̃ dɔkɔ yuku fɔ́ɔ́ yĩ̂nyõ pal tɛ̃̀-ǹsah. Tɛ́nkàh à yɔ̃ dɔkɔ sɔkɔ ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tɔlɛ nɩ? Tɛ́nkàh wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ ye à wɛ nɩ? Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh pɩ̃. Liyel ó ye n pnɛ kélɛ. Tɛ́ à mɛ wɛlɔ yísyɔ́ noh nónó-á sè náh fɛ̃ n yo, ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ náh mɛ névi tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ ǹ syɩ sé yõ.
Ńmɔ kɩ fɛ̃ ń gblɔ̌y gbilki sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ névi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ mé náh ń gblɔ̌y gbilki n pi ń tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yĩnnɛ nɛ́ ń tɛ̃́nkwlɔ-ńtã̂n ó yĩn náh.

Mâh sɔ̃́ sõ̀ mɛ nɛ mé ń gblɔ̌y gbilki, mé náh n mɔ n kõ n pi vínpɩlɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, gbɩ ye mé náhkɩ n yo. Ǹtɛ mé mɛ ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ képah pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, sɔ̃̀nko yáh nɛ̂ wɛ tɛ́ nɛ̂ noh ń tyɩ́, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh pɔ ń sõ kah mɔ sépi yõ,

ànɛ̂ mé káh n pɔ ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ wɛ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ nɛ̂-á pɩ gbǐllɛ. Fṍhnɔ́ yɔ́ mɛ sah ńmɔ wil gbɛ̃́nsê yõ, á kɩ nɛ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ sɔ̃́ tɛkɩ mɔ ǹ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́lɛ nɛ à pɔ ń yah kõ mé káh n pɔ ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki.
Mé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ni kɛ tɔ̃́nɔ́ nɛ, à fṍhnɔ́ mɛ̀ wrɔ́ gbɛ mɔ ńnɛ.

Ǹtɛ à mɛ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ: «Ńmɔ-á pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ á tyɩ́, képah kɩ yɩ̃nɛ álɛ. Á tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ sɔkɔ ye ńmɔ n wɛ̃kɩ n yĩ́ĩ́ ń tǎhkɩ̀lɛ.» Képah ye, ńmɔ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé ń gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki ń tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ wɔ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko Krista tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ n mɛ ń sɔkɔ.

Képah ye, Krista yĩnnɛ mâh mɛ tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ pàh ńnɛ n gbyɔ, képah náh pɩ mâh mɛ kwlɔ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ pàh ńnɛ n fõh, képah náh pɩ tíkí képékè-à mɛ ń sɔkɔ, mè n nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Ń tɛ̃́nkwlɔnɔ gbĩ́ ye tǎhkɩ̀ n wɛ ń sɔkɔ.

Mé wɛ pɩ lékã́m kɛ̃́ névi sɔ̃́ ńnɛ. Tɛ́ képah wil yépi tyɩ́. Yépi ye sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ ńmɔ yĩ́ngbɩ́ yónɔ́lɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, máh kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ tir yɔ́lɛ n pɛ́kɩ́-ńkɛ̃́nɛ, nónó-á yé n ye Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ǹgbnɔlɛ, pè náh fṍnfṍ ńmɔ yõ.
Gbɩ yõ, mé sṍmnɔ́ pɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ à gbɛ̃̀ndùnì tyi pɩ, ànɛ̂ gbǐl tyi duke náhnáhlɛ, ànɛ̂ tyítǎhnɩ̀nɛ, nónó-á n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi-á ńnɛ.

Mé se Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ tɛ́lɔ́ tɔkɔ fṍnfṍ pɩ yélɛ tir yɔ́ sɔkɔ? Máh yahle nɛ yé káh yĩn ń yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ képah ó náh di? Yé képah yɔ̃ mɔ ń kɔ̃, mé náh pɩ plɛ yé tyɩ́. Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ tɛ́lɔ́ fṍnfṍ yé yõ tir nɛ̂ sɔkɔ?

Yé yah, ńmɔ mɛ ń gblɔ̌y vi tɛ gbáhyĩ́ tɔ̃́-ò pɔ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ yé náh n yĩn n pi ń yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, yépi ye mé n yah n kɔ̃, yé gbã̀n yî náh. Wɛ̃́npì náh yɩ̃nɛ pè gbã̀n yîlɛ n yah n sah pé dúbípu tyɩ́. Dúbípú ye yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ n yah n sah pé wɛ̃́npì tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ kɩ fɛ̃ syi kɩ ń gbã̀n yî ànɛ̂ ń min tɔ kɔ̃ yépi yĩnnɛ. Yé tyɩ́-á sɔ̃́npɩlɛ kah nɔ ń tyɩ́, képah se kɩ kwâh wilki ńmɔ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́?
Gbɩ ye ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh yĩn ń yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ. Ǹtɛ yé túkù mɛ n yo nɛ lékã́mkãm névi-á ńnɛ, máh yélɛ n yõ yĩ́nvî sɔkɔ.
Máh nónó tõ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́, mé se syɔ̃ pépi tyɩ́ à yé yõ?

Mé Tite gbah tɛ̃ nɛ à kyɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ. Mé á yṹnpi yɔ́ tɔ tɛkɩ mɔ ǹnɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á lésõ mé yo yé tyɩ́. Tite se mɛ pɔ yélɛ n yõ? Ǹmɔ sõnɔ ànɛ̂ ńmɔ tyɩ́ náh pɩ núkúlɛ di? Á kɔ dùkù tɔ náh pɩ núkúlɛ di?

Yé mɛ n sõ di mónɔ́lɛ nɛ ápi-á mɛ gbɩlɛ á gblɔ̌ynɛ n kɔ̃ yépi yah sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ sɛ̃́ náh dɛ́, tyi nónó-á á n yo, Liyel yah sɔkɔ ye á n yo sélɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ. Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, ápi mɛ sé póllɛ n yo yépi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yah yuku yĩnnɛ.

Tíkí mɛ ń tɛ̃ nɛ máh kɩ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ mé káh n pɔ yé wɛ máh mɛ n sõ̀ sɔ̃́, yépi tɔ káh ńmɔ wɛ yáh mɛ n sõ̀ sɔ̃́. Tíkí tɔ̃ mɛ ń tɛ̃ nɛ mé káh n pɔ mâl wɛ yé wrɔ́, ànɛ̂ yṹnwɔ̃rɩ́ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ fɔ̀kɔ̀nvyã̀hnɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ̃ fwónɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yónkònɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ yĩ́n yɩ̀kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́lɛ ànɛ̂ tyífɛ̃̌ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.

Tíkí tɔ̃ mɛ ń tɛ̃ nɛ máh kɩ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, ń Liyel káh n pɔ ń yilɔ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ mé káh n pɔ n gbo névye yĩnnɛ, nónó-á lésõ tyípékè pɩ ǹgbòlɛ, tɛ́ pè náh mɛ yal mɔ põ̌põ̌ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ sèn pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ tyi pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.
Ń gbáhyĩ́ tɔ̃́-ò ye n pi yé tĩ̀nnɛ. Tyi pól kɩ n wah à yɩ̃nɛ tàrfyɔ̀ nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí, képah náh pɩ tɔ̃́mɩ́ vyãh wɛynɛ.

Ń pɔ́nyahnɔ kɛ ní-ò sɔkɔ, mé lésõ gbáhdyâh di névye tyɩ́ nónó-á sõ̀ tyípêl pɩ sɔkɔ ǹgbòlɛ ànɛ̂ no tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ kwɛynɛ mé náh mɛ yé wrɔ́, ǹtɛ mé tɔ̃ ké gbáhdyâhlɛ n tɔ̃ n di yé tyɩ́ nɛ, mâh ń syɩ pɔ, mé náh tɔ̃ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yãm yah n pi.
Yé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé kè pɩ̃ Krista-à kɩ mɛ n syɔ̃ ńmɔ tyɩ́ à n yo n mɔ yé tyɩ́. Tɛ̃́nkwlɔ-ò náh ǹnɛ yé tyɩ́. À kɩ ǹ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ wɛ̃kɩ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Gbɩ tɛ̃ wɔ ye, ǹ tɛ̃́nklwɔnɔ sɔkɔ ye à syɩ dahnɩ yõ. Ǹtɛ à mɛ min sɔkɔ Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ gbõ̀ yõ. Ápi wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ ǹnɛ, á tɔ mɛ tɛ̃́nklwɔnɔ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ Liyel tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ gbõ̀ yõ, á mɛ min sɔkɔ ǹnɛ.

Yé yé gblɔ̌y sohlɩ n yah yè pɩ̃ yáh kɩ mɛ yé minnɛ n pɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yé kɩ kè wɛ pɩ̃ nɛ Krista-á mɛ yélɛ. Gbɩ náh di? Kàh mó pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ sɛ̃́, gblɔ̌y sóhlɩ́nyahnɔ mɛ̀ náh sɔkɔ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ yé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ ńmɔ sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ nɛ, yáh kɩ kè wɛ pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ á sɔkɔ.

Á mɛ Liyellɛ n ni yé tyɩ́ sɔ̃̀nko yè káh tyípékèlɛ n pɩ. Á náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ-á mɛ á tyɩ́, ǹtɛ á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé tyípéplɔ ólɛ n pɩ, ápi-á sɔ̃́ mɛ tɛ̃ klwɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, gbɩ fwo fwo tǎhkɩ̀ náh mɛ á sɔkɔ. Gbɩ tyɩ́ ye á mɛ n so n mɔ.
Ápi-à mɛ tɛ̃ kwlɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, tɛ́ yépi mɛ tɛ̃ wɛ, ké nɛ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ ápi tyɩ́. Áyáh mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n ni Liyel tyɩ́ képah ye nɛ, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ nɛ n yuku yahlɛ.

Képah ye n kɔ̃ mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ tɛ́ ń sah fɩ́ɩ́ yélɛ, sɔ̃̀nko máh kɩ pɔ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ nɛ̂nɛ ń kɔ̃, mé káh n pɔ képah tɔkɔ n peke yé yõ. Yé náh wɛ di, à kélɛ ń kɔ̃ nɛ mé yé yohnɩ mɔ yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ kɔ̃ kè nɛ n yuku yahlɛ. À náh kélɛ ń kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ yɩkɩ yĩnnɛ.

Ké tyɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ ń yṹnpyé, yé tɛ̃ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, yè mó gbah n tɛ̃ n pɩ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ ye tyɩ́. Yé sṍrélɛ n mɔ wɛ̃ sɔkɔ, yè mó nɛ n sah wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ. Yé yé minnɛ n pɩ yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ, képah sɔkɔ tyɩ́nɔnɔ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩ Liyel kɩ mɛ yélɛ.
Yé wɛkɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ wɛy pèpɛynɛ. Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́, Liyel mó tyɩ́nɔnɔ dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ, ǹ Mirki mó yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ n mɔ.

Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ, mé náh pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ névye gbõ̀ yõ, képah náh pɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ Yesu Krista ànɛ̂ Sú Liyel gbõ̀ yõ ye mé pɩ kélɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Yesu lékó yilki mɔ wilki lékyɩ̂ sɔkɔ.
Ńmɔ ànɛ̂ ń yṹnpyé nónó pól-á mɛ ásõ̂, ápi ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ Kalatɩ mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ tyɩ́.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́, pè mó yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Krista ye ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ pè à ko mɔ ápi tyípêl yĩnnɛ, nɛ pé á wilki kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ pèkè sɔkɔ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á Súlɛ.
Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ǹmɔ yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina!
Liyel nɛ̂-á ye yélɛ Yesu Krista pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ, yáh yé náh vi ǹmɔ kɔ̃ súú tɛ́ tir káhkɩ́ yɔ́ sõ̀ tɛ̃, nɛ̂-á mɩ̀nyobe nɛ képah-á Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ, képah pɩ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir káhkɩ́ yɔ́ sɔ̃́ mɛ dɛ́, ɔ̃́ɔ̃, ǹtɛ nósyɔ́ ó ye mɛ, nónó-á mɛ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n dahbɩ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ pé Krista Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir vi mɔ.

Ǹtɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́, képah náh pɩ ápi ńtɛ̃, képah náh pɩ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ fyé-à pɔ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir káhkɩ́ yɔ́ yo yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kè náh mɛ núkúlɛ ápi-á nɛ̂ yo yé tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ kɩ yɩkɩ.
Á kè yo sɔkɔ tɛ, tɛ́ mé kɩ tɔ̃ ń syɩ kè tɔ̃ yo núkúnúkú nɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir káhkɩ́ yɔ́ yo yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kè náh mɛ núkúlɛ yáh nɛ̂ fɛ̃ syi sɔkɔ tɛ, tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ kɩ yɩkɩ.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, ńmɔ náh mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ névye ńnɛ n sõ dɛ́, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ Liyel ńnɛ n sõ. Névye dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ náh ńmɔ n yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ. Képah-à nɛ̂ sõ̀ mé n yah n kɔ̃, mé náh náhkɩ n mɛ n pi Krista tõ̀npɩlɛ.
Ń yṹnpyé, mé kélɛ n yo n dal n mɔ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂-á mé yo yé tyɩ́, kè náh wil névye tyɩ́ dɛ́.
Névi náh yo ń syah kélɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh mó tɔ̃ kwɔ ńnɛ kélɛ. Ǹtɛ Yesu Krista ye ń wɛ̃kɩ kélɛ.

Ńmɔ-á sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ Liyel nínɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, máh sõ̀ mɛ n pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, yé ké tyɩ́ yónɔ́ noh. Mé sõ̀ mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ n kah n fõh, fɔ́ɔ́ mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé duku tó-ńsahlɛ.
Mé sõ̀ mɛ á kɔ̃ Nsyifunɔ náhnáh yah tĩ̀nnɛ ápi Nsyifunɔ Liyel nínɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ. Mé sõ̀ mɛ gbah tɛ̃ kal pélɛ kénɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, képah nɛ̂-á á súbí wɛ̃̀dyàhlɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel ye ńmɔ yah tɔkɔ ń dúbí-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, tɛ́ ń ye ǹ tõ̀ pɩ yĩnnɛ ǹ pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ.
Tɛ́ wǎh pɔ kè yah tɔkɔ à ǹ Pídĩ́nɛ ń wɛ̃kɩ, tɛ́ nɛ mé ǹ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n kɔ̃ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, mé náh kyɩ vìnmɔnɔ yah kɔ̃ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Mé náh mó tɔ̃ dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ à kyɩ wil Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye tyɩ́ nónó-á tõ̀ tyah ńmɔ yah dɛ́. Mé yɔ̃ sɔkɔ Arabi yamana ǹgbò sɔkɔ. Képah náh, mé ń syɩ pɔ Damasɩ kwil sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ ye tɔ̃́nɔ́ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, mé kyɩ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ, á kyɩ wɛ̃ wɛ pɩ̃ ànɛ̂ Pyɛrɩlɛ, tɛ́ tɛ̃ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ à sèpĩ̀n gbɔ̃nkwlɔ́ pɩ.
Ǹtɛ à wil ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ gbɛ̃̀ndĩ́ Nsyakɩ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, mé náh tɔ̃ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ.
Tyi nónó pól-á mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀, Liyel ye ńmɔ tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ mɩ̀nɩ̀ náh mé n yo.
Képah náh, mé mɛ sɔkɔ Siri yamana ànɛ̂ Silisi mara sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ Nsyude mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ náh sõ̀ mɛ ńnɛ n pnɛ yĩ́ yah.
Pè sõ̀ noh ólɛ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-á sõ̀ n fõh pélɛ ǹgbòlɛ, wǎh mɛ ǹ syɩ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo, képah nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á lésõ à n yah n kɔ̃ yɩ́kɩ́-ńsahlɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, pè sõ̀ mɛ Liyellɛ n gbilki ńmɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Képah náh, ye gbɔ̃nyã́h sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ sɔkɔ, mé tɔ̃ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ kwil sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩlɛ. Mé Tite tɔ tɛ̃ dohnɩ ń gblɔ̌y yõ à sɔkɔ.

Liyel ye wɛ̃kɩ ńnɛ tir yɔ́lɛ ń kɔ̃ mé dɔkɔ yuku Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ máh tõ̀ nɛ̂ pɩ sɔkɔ tɛ, ànɛ̂ máh mɛ nɛ̂ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé náh sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ sè pɩ yõ̀kã̀nnɛ. Képah yĩnnɛ, máh yĩni tɛ̃, mé kyɩ wil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tãm tyɩ́ pé yahlɛ, tɛ́ máh Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo dùkù nɛ̂nɛ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, mé ké yah yo pépi tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ ńmɔ kɔ́-ò Tite nɛ̂ ńtɛ̃-á Nsyifu náh ǹnɛ, pè náh à kyɩ̃ mɔ à kɔ̃ à kõ̀kè kõ.

Á yṹnpyé nɛ́túkúnì yísyɔ́ sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ Tite kõ̀kè kõ. Pépi ye sõ̀ pɔ de fɛ̃kɩ á wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, Yesu Krista-á pɔ á wɛ wilki tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yɔ̃rɩ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, képah ségblɔ́ ye pè pɔ yáh-ńsah tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé á tɔ̃ dahbɩ kénɛ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ ápi sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂-á gbɩlɛ, kè tɛ̃ ké dùkùlɛ yépi yĩnnɛ. Képah ye, á náh kè fɛ̃ syi pé tyɩ́. Á náh sah pé tyɩ́ yõ kwéy ńtɛ̃nɛ.

Ǹtɛ nónó-á no mɛ n yah yah tãmnɛ, yĩ́n-ńsah nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ pé tyɩ́, képah náh mɛ tir yɔ́lɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́. Liyel náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n tɔkɔ fṍnfṍnɛ n pɩ ǹ ní-òlɛ dò. Kénɛ névye nɔ́pi ńtɛ̃ tɔ náh mó tir yɔ́ wɛ yo dohnɩ ń Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ yõ.
Ǹtɛ pè pyě kè wɛ pɩ̃ ńtɛ̃nɛ nɛ, Liyel-á kè dahbɩ ńmɔ gbõ̀ nɛ mé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, sɔ̃́-á à kè dahbɩ Pyɛrɩ gbõ̀ nɛ à kélɛ n yo Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel nɛ̂-á pɩ Pyɛrɩlɛ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ Nsyifunɔ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ ó ye pɩ ńmɔ tɔlɛ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, Nsyakɩ ànɛ̂ Pyɛrɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyɔ̃pi nónó-á yah tãmnɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ, pépi mɛ kè pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel-á pɩ ń tyɩ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ à ń dah mɔ tõ̀ mɛ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pè mɛ yuku pɔ gbã̀n dahbɩ wɛkɩ ńmɔ ànɛ̂ Barnabasɩ tyɩ́, à kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ á pól-á pɩ tõ̀ núkú pɩ́púlɛ pélɛ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, á mɛ yo sah núkú yõ pélɛ nɛ, ápi-á kɩ á yah mɔ névye tĩ̀nnɛ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, tɛ́ pépi kɩ mó pé yah mɔ Nsyifunɔ tĩ̀nnɛ.
Tɛ́ pè kè yah kɔ̃ á tyɩ́ wɔlɛ nɛ, á á dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ pépi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yãm tãn tyɩ́lɛ Yerusalɛmɩ sɔkɔ. Pǎh kè yo sɔ̃́, képah ye mé mɛ n pɩ ń nɩ póllɛ.
Képah náh, Pyɛrɩ-á pɔ pɔ Antyɔsyɩ kwil sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ tyi pɩ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, mé lékàhlɛ à kɔ̃ no pól yĩ́ yah.

Yé náh wɛ di, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á lésõ Nsyakɩ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ mɛ pɔ Antyɔsyɩ sɔkɔ, Pyɛrɩ sõ̀ mɛ n yõ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ á yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Tɛ́ no nɔ́pi-á fyɔ̀ pɔ yĩni tɛ̃, à núkú ǹ gbɛ á yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nɔ́pilɛ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. À náh tɔ̃ mɛ n yõ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Nsyifunɔ yah tíkí tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Nsyifunɔ tɛ́lɔ́ tɔ mó kõ ǹ náh pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ tyi nɔ́pi pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ pè Barnabasɩ ńtɛ̃ tɔ yõ yɩkɩ mɔ ké sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂-á gbɩlɛ, máh fyɔ̀ pɔ kè wɛ nɛ pè náh mɛ n kɔ képah wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, mé núkú yo Pyɛrɩ tyɩ́ no pól yĩ́ yah sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Áwɔ nɛ̂-á Nsyifulɛ, wáh pɔ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ, á á náh vi Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ̃, tɛ́ n kɔ á yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Tɛ́ yõ nɛ̂ yõ mɛ, á kɩ pɔ pépi wɔlɛ n kyɩ̃ n mɔ n mɔ Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ núkúnúkú wɛ́?»
Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye Nsyifunɔ ye ápilɛ á wìl-ǹsah sɔkɔ, nɛ́káhbɩ́ náh álɛ pépi nónó-á pè n nɛ n ye Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ dêl pɩ́púlɛ.

Ǹtɛ á pól pɩ̃ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ náh fɛ̃ névi yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ névi nɛ̂ ó-à sɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ. Ápi tɔ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ kè káh pɩ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ pèpɛy gbõ̀ yõ sɔ̃́. Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh se fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, képah gbõ̀ yõ tɛ́. Ǹtɛ á pól pɩ̃ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ náh fɛ̃ névi yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ tómm Liyel yah sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ névi nɛ̂ ó-à sɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ. Ápi tɔ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á pɩ tómm Liyel yah sɔkɔ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ kè káh pɩ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ pèpɛy gbõ̀ yõ sɔ̃́. Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh se fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi tómm Liyel yah sɔkɔ, képah gbõ̀ yõ tɛ́.

Ǹtɛ áyáh n yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ tómm Liyel yah sɔkɔ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ, tɛ́ kè kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ dêl pɩ́pú-á ápi tɔlɛ, képah se yɔ́ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Krista-á á mɔ tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ? Póllɛ!
Ńmɔ-à ńtyɩ̃́nɔ ń náh vi Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ̃, tɛ́ tɔ̃ pɔ ń syɩ pɔ sélɛ n kɔ à, mé náh ń gblɔ̌y wɛ̃kɩ sé dêl pɩ́-òlɛ di?

Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, ńmɔ mɛ nɛ kókè sɔ̃́ ńnɛ. Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ńtɛ̃ ye pɩ képahlɛ ń kɔ̃ mé ń minnɛ n wɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ. Ńmɔ ànɛ̂ Kristalɛ, á tɔ̂ɔ́ ye syɩ dahnɩ yõ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Mé sénsɔ̃ mɛ min sɔkɔ ó, ǹtɛ ńmɔ náh n tɛ̃ ń gblɔ̌y yahlɛ dɛ́, Krista ye n tɛ̃ ń yahlɛ. Máh min sɔkɔ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ ń tyɩ́ núkúnúkú yɔ̀, mé mɛ ń min póllɛ n pɩ Liyel Pídĩ́ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, ń tyɩ́-á nɔ ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, fɔ́ɔ́ à fɛ̃ syi pè à ko mɔ ńmɔ yĩnnɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, kàh sõ̀ mɛ pɩ nɛ névi-á kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, yõ se náhkɩ sõ̀ mɛ Krista kúnɔ́ tyɩ́? Ńmɔ náh Liyel pèpɔrɩ yahle n pi dɛ́!
Kalatɩ mara tãn, yé lékã́m tɛkɩ kah mɔ; nɛ̂ yɩkɩ yé yõlɛ? Tɛ́ Yesu Krista dahnɩ yõ kúnɔ́ tyɩ́ mó tɔ̃ yo wah yé wɛ̃kɩ pallɛ.
Nɛ̂ ó-á mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé piki yah yé tyɩ́ képah ye yɔ̀. Tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ se yé wɛ Liyel Mirkilɛ? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye yé wɛ kélɛ.
Yé lékã́m tɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ se yĩni tɛ̃ nɛ́npɔ́ tyɩ́? Yáh nɛ̂ tyah Liyel Mirki tǎhkɩ̀lɛ, yé se mɛ n sõ nɛ yáh kɩ fɛ̃ kè syi yé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ?
Ǹtɛ à, tyi nónó pól sɔkɔ-á yé de wil sɔkɔ, sè se pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ? Sè náh fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi yõ kɛ̃́nɛ dɛ́.
Liyel nɛ̂-á yé kɔ̃ ǹ Mirkilɛ, tɛ́ mɛ gbǐl tyilɛ n pɩ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, yé tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ yĩn se à n pɩ kélɛ? Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yĩn ye.
Kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Abrahmɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, képah yĩnnɛ à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.»
Yé yɩ̃nɛ yè kè pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú-á Abrahmɩ náh tãnnɛ.
Liyel kè yo Abrahmɩ tyɩ́ nɛ: «Mé kɩ syɔ̃ áwɔ tyɩ́ kɩ sãm mɔ yìkìnì pól sɔkɔ.»
Sɔ̃́-á Abrahmɩ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ tɛ́ à mɛ sãm mɔ ǹ sɔkɔ, sɛ̃́ ye névi nɛ̂ tɔ-à sɛ̃ Yesu yõ, Liyel kɩ sãm mɔ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-á tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyíyónɔ́ pól wã̀llɛ n kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, pèkè-á mɛ tɛ̃̀ yõ.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye tómm kɩ min yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ wɛ.»

Ǹtɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ náh mɛ núkúlɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ dò. Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ, sépi gbõ̀ yõ-á tɛ̃̀ kɩ mɛ min sɔkɔ.

Krista ye ápi yõ dwe wilki tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ pèkè gbõ̀, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́ fɛ̃ syi pèkè twah ǹ yõ ápi yĩnnɛ. Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, pàh névi nɛ̂ gbel séswɔ tyɩ́, pèkè-á mɛ tɛ̃̀ yõ.

Sɛ̃́ ye kè pɩ tɛ́ sãm nɛ̂-á mɔ Abrahmɩ sɔkɔ, Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, kè yĩni tɛ̃ névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Tɛ́ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ ye ápi Liyel Mirki wɛ, Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Ń yṹnpyé, mé kɩ wɛy mɛ̀ yo kɩ yɩ̃nɛ névye pɩ dùkùlɛ. Sɔ̃́-á névi-à ǹ fɔkɔ wɛkɩ ǹ kú-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ, tyi nónó-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ tɛ̃̀ n yo, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sé dùkùlɛ n ko n pnɛ, képah náh pɩ kɩ fɛ̃ kwâh dohnɩ sé yõ.

Ɔ̃̀hɔ̃̂, sɛ̃́ ye Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ tɔlɛ Abrahmɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ náh nɛy tyɩ́. Kè náh yo nɛ Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ Abrahmɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ náh tãn kɔ̃, á kɩ nɛ ǹ náh tãn sɔ̃́ mɛ dò dɛ́. Kè yo nɛ, ǹ náh nɛy-á. Képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ nɛ́núkù tyɩ́-á n yo, nɛ̂-á pɩ Kristalɛ.

Yé yah, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé yo kè wɛ yɔ̀. Liyel-á sõ̀ ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ sah tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ye kyɛyẽ́h yõgbãm sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh fɛ̃ n pɔ képah ko kè kɔ̃ kè n pɩ n pi yõ kɛ̃́nɛ dò.

Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, képah-à mɛ n wɛ n pnɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ náh mó tɔ̃ kè n wɛ dò. Ǹtɛ Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye à pèpɔrɩ pɩ Abrahmɩ tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ tir nɛ̂ yĩn mɛ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ á kɔ̃? À sõ̀ képahlɛ á kɔ̃ dohnɩ, nɛ̂-á kɩ sõ̀ ǹ dêl tyilɛ álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ, pópó kɩ pɔ nɔ Abrahmɩ náh nɛy dúbínɔ́ tyɩ́, Liyel-á lésõ ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ ye sõ̀ syɔ̃ wɛy syínyo-ò
Tɛ́ kàh nɛ́núkù ólɛ, á se kɩ fɛ̃ nɛ nɛy pɔ de yo ǹ wrɔ́ sɔkɔ? Ǹtɛ Liyellɛ, núkú ó ye ǹnɛ dò.

Képah se n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á mɛ Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ n fwo? Póllɛ! Kàh sõ̀ mɛ pɩ nɛ tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ yɔ́ sɔ̃́ névye kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á kɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ pé min pwah mɔ, névye náhkɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ pɩ tómm Liyel yah sɔkɔ kénɛ tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ dò.

Ǹtɛ Liyel wɛy nɛ ńkɛ̃́, kèkõyṍ névye pól-á mɛ tyípékè mnɔ sɔkɔ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, à kɩ kélɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú kɔ̃ pé sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Krista yõ.
Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbĩ-á pópó n sɛ, á lésõ mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ǹgbò gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ à légbĩ́nɛ n syɩkɩ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ye lésõ n wɛ̃kɩ álɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ pèpɛynɛ, pópó à pɔ yĩni tɛ̃ Krista pɔ́nɔ́ tyɩ́, á kɔ̃ á wɛ pɩ tómm Liyel yah Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Ǹtɛ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbĩ-á fyɔ̀ sɛ tɛ, tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ vyãh dɛ á yah tɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Núkúnúkú, Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, yépi pól pɩ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ.
Yépi nónó pól-á wel wilki ni sɔkɔ, yé pɩ núkúlɛ Kristalɛ. Krista pɩ dùkù ye yé sɔkɔ tɔ́tɔ́.

Képah ye, kè se Nsyifu ò, kè se névi nɛ̂ náh pɩ Nsyifulɛ ò, kè se yɔ̃̀ ò, kè se névi nɛ̂ náh pɩ yɔ̃̀lɛ ò, kè se dĩ́ ò, kè se sê ò, núkú ye yé póllɛ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ.
Tɛ́ yáh fyɔ̀ pɩ Krista tyɩ́lɛ, Abrahmɩ náh tãn ye yélɛ nónó-á kɩ pèpɔrɩ wɛ n pi, à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ Abrahmɩ kɔ̃ sɔ̃́.
Máh mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n sõ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Gbɛ̃̀nyõ-à mɛ wɛ̃́npirlɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à n nɛ mɛ núkúlɛ yɔ̃̀lɛ ǹ tahrɩ nɛ́tɛ̃̂ fyé yah yõ.
Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹ tɛ̃́nsàhpu ànɛ̂ ǹ tyi yah wàhpu n nɛ n yah n dah n mɔ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, pópó ǹ pɔ n nɔ ǹ yah syɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ gbĩ́ tyɩ́, ǹ sú-á nɛ̂ yah tɔkɔ sah.
Sɛ̃́ ye, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á ápi tɔ lésõ mɛ wɛ̃́npì sɔ̃́, á lésõ mɛ kõ kèkõyṍ tyi náh, tɛ́ mɛ pɩ tɛ̃ yɔ̃bɩlɛ sé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ Liyel syɩkɩ tɛ̃, légbĩ́-á pɔ nɔ, à ǹ Pídĩ́ tɛkɩ mɔ kèkõyṍ. Pídĩ́ mɛ̀ pɔ dubi sê yɔ́ tyɩ́, tɛ́ sõ̀ mɛ Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ,
névye yõ wɛ n dwe n wilki yĩnnɛ Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ á pól wɛ n pɩ yĩnnɛ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ.
Ǹtɛ ǹ wɛ̃́npì ye ńtyɩ̃́nɔ yélɛ kɛ̀. Yé náh wɛ à ǹ Pídĩ́ Mirki dah mɔ á pól nnɔ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ á kɔ̃ à n nɛ n yo yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ nɛ: ‹Bɔ̌, ńmɔ Sú!›
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yɔ̃bɩ náh tɔ̃ álɛ; Liyel pye ye álɛ. Tɛ́ áyáh pɩ ǹ pyelɛ sɛ̃́, képah ye ápi tɔ kɩ pèpɔrɩ wɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́.
Ǹgbòlɛ, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á yé náh lésõ mɛ Liyellɛ n pnɛ, yé lésõ mɛ yɔ̃rɩlɛ n pɩ yî yísyɔ́ tyɩ́ sé gbílkínɔ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Liyel náh se mó tɔ̃ sélɛ sé wìl-ǹsah.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, yé Liyel pɩ̃. Tɛ́ mé kɩ tɔ̃ fɛ̃ yo nɛ Liyel-á n pnɛ yépilɛ ńkɛ̃́. Yé se tɔ̃ yɩ̃nɛ yè yé syɩ n tɔ̃ n de kénɛ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ, yè kénɛ yõ kɛ̃́ yîlɛ n gbilki sépi nónó-á sohkɩ kɛ̃́nɛ?
Yé mɛ sèpĩ̀n, ànɛ̂ ńwɔ̃́lɔ́, ànɛ̂ tyi túkù pɩ gbĩ́, ànɛ̂ ye wɔ túkùlɛ n mɔ n kõ.
É! Yé tyɩ́ mɛ ńmɔ yáh-ńsah tyɛ dɛ́. Máh yèvyãhrɩ tõ̀ nɛ̂ pɩ yépi yĩnnɛ, kè náh n pɩ n pi nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ lɛ́?
Ńmɔ ń gblɔ̌y pɩ yépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Képah ye ń yṹnpyé, mé yélɛ n ni nɛ, yépi tɔ yé gblɔ̌y pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Yé náh pɩ de yah ń tyɩ́ dò.
Yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ gbennɛ yé tyɩ́, yam gbõ̀ yõ-á mé wɛ yo kélɛ yé tyɩ́.

Tɛ́ ń wil gbɛ̃́nsê yam mɛ̀ yáhnɔ́ náh sõ̀ mɛ nɔ. Tɛ́ képah fyé yõ, yé náh fɛ̃ syi ń yilɔ, yé náh ń sohlɩ. Ǹtɛ yé pyě ń tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ Liyel yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩ yɔ́ sɔ̃́ ńnɛ; á kɩ nɛ Yesu Krista ńtɛ̃ sɔ̃́ ńnɛ.

Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ lésõ mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ yé sɔkɔ légbĩ́nɛ. Tɛ́ ńyãh mɛ yé mɔ kénɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ núkúnúkú wɛ́? Mé kélɛ n yo kègbɩ yõ nɛ, kàh sõ̀ mɛ fɛ̃ n pɩ n pi, yáh náhkɩ sõ̀ mɛ yé yɩ̃́ gbahlɩ wilki ń kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, ń gbɩ yónɔ́ yĩnnɛ yé tyɩ́, mé kɩ pɩ yé sépɛlɛ lɛ́?
Nósyɔ́ mɛ gbah tɛ̃ nɛ páh mɛ yé sõ̀ tɛ̃, ǹtɛ yé tyɩ́ sõnɔ pèplɔ náh mɛ pé sɔkɔ dɛ́. Pè mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé ńmɔ ànɛ̂ yépi wrɔ́ gbɛkɩ, yépi mó gbah tɛ̃ pépi sõ̀ tɛ̃.
Yâh gbah tɛ̃ tyípéplɔ sõ̀ tɛ̃ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, tyípépɛ̌y ye kélɛ. Tɛ́ kè náh yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n pɩ yâh ńmɔ wɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂ ólɛ dɛ́.
Ń wɛ̃́npì, mé tɔ̃ mɛ n kwlɔ yé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ kúrntɛ̃́sè sɔ̃́, pópó kɩ pɔ nɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á yé pɩ dùkù kɩ vi mɔ pɩ Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Ǹtɛ ń yáh-ńsah mɛ tyɛ yé tyɩ́lɛ. Képah ye, mé sɔ̃́ náhkɩ ǹ gblɔ̌y wɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ núkúnúkú ńtɛ̃nɛ, mè tyi nɔ́pi wɛ n yo yé tyɩ́ dùkù yɔ́lɛ.
Yépi nónó-á mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ tɔ̃́nkõ̀-ǹsahlɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh, yé se kɩ fɛ̃ yo ńmɔ tyɩ́ nɛ kǎh tyi nónó yo, yé náh sè wɛ noh?
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, wɛ̃́npì nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí-á lésõ mɛ Abrahmɩ tyɩ́. Núkúlɛ, yɔ̃̀ pi Akar pídĩ́-á, ní-ò mɛ Sara pídĩ́nɛ, nɛ̂-á yɔ̃̀ náh ǹnɛ.
Piri nɛ̂-á pɔ dubi yɔ̃̀ pi Akar tyɩ́, ǹmɔ dubi à yɩ̃nɛ névi yõ̀tàhsyi yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ. Ǹtɛ piri nɛ̂-á pɔ dubi Sara wɔ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ dubi à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á sõ̀ ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ sɔ̃́.

Tyi nɔ́pilɛ yɔ̀ kɛ̀; tir yɔ́ ye sè álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Syɔ́ nɔ́pi tyi mɛ yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ duke nínɔ́lɛ álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Akar ye yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbennɛ, nɛ̂-á wɛ Syinayi yɔ̃lɩ yõ. Yɔ̃bɩ ye ǹmɔ mɛ n dubi n mɔ.
Ǹmɔ ye Syinayi yɔ̃lɩlɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ Arabi yamana sɔkɔ. Á kɩ fɛ̃ à tɔkɔ sãh Yerusalɛmɩ kwillɛ kwɛy mɛ̀ sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, Yerusalɛmɩ kwil tɔ mɛ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ ké névyelɛ.
Ǹtɛ Yerusalɛmɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ yĩ̂nyõ, képah náh mɛ yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Képah ye ápi yṹnɛ.
Yé yah, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ ńkɛ̃́:
‹Nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ píkã́nsè, áwɔ nɛ̂-á á náh sõ̀ mɛ pilɛ n wɛ.
Nɛ n syɔ n wilki n mɔ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, áwɔ nɛ̂-á á náh pi dúbínɔ́ yɔ́nɔ́ pɩ̃.
Yé náh wɛ di, sê yáhlensàhnɔ́ pye kɩ dò kal
pɛ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́lɛ.›
Ǹtɛ yépi wɔlɛ, ń yṹnpyé, yé dubi à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ, sɔ̃́-á Yisakɩlɛ.
Piri nɛ̂-á lésõ dubi à yɩ̃nɛ névi yõ̀tàhsyi yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ, ǹmɔ lésõ mɛ ǹ ní-òlɛ n fõh, nɛ̂-á dubi Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ. Tɛ́ sɛ̃́ ó ye kélɛ kwɛy mɛ̀ tɔ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ sɔ̃́ mɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y yo wɛ́? Kè nɛ ńkɛ̃́: ‹Yɔ̃̀ pi pídĩ́ náh yɩ̃nɛ gbɛ̃kɩ yṍnɔ́lɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ pídĩ́ yɔ́lɛ, nɛ̂ yṹ náh mɛ yɔ̃̀lɛ. Képah ye, yɔ̃̀ pi yĩni ànɛ̂ ǹ pídĩ́ tɔlɛ.›
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ń yṹnpyé, yɔ̃̀ pi pye náh ápilɛ dɛ́. Sê nɛ̂ pye-á ápilɛ, yɔ̃̀ náh ǹnɛ.
Krista mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á nɛ n mɛ á gblɔ̌y yõ sɔkɔ, képah ye à kɔ̃ à á wilki yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ yé yé tah n sah, yé káh n tɔ̃ yé syɩ n de yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ.
Ńmɔ Polelɛ, yé noh ń tyɩ́ yɔ̀: Yáh kɩ kõ̀kè kõ, Krista náh tir yɔ́ pɛkɩ n pi yé tyɩ́.
Mé kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́ ńtɔ̃ nɛ, névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-à kɩ fyɔ̀ kõ̀kè kõ, wǎh kɩ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ pól wã̀llɛ n kɔ káhkáh.
Yépi nónó-á mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ yé pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, yé gblɔ̌y ye yé gbɛ Krista náh. Yé vyãh náh tɔ̃ mɛ Liyel pèpɔrɩ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ. Képah sõnɔ ye Liyel Mirki dahbɩ ápi sɔkɔ, tɛ́ á mɛ kélɛ n dɛkɩ náhnáh.

Yé náh wɛ di, névi nɛ̂ wrɔ́ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Kristalɛ, tɛ̃̀ kõ̀kè kõ ò, tɛ̃̀ náh kõ̀kè kõ ò, tir yɔ́ náh képahlɛ. Nɛ̂-á ké yõlɛ, Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n wɛ̃kɩ tyi pɩ dùkù sɔkɔ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.
Yé lésõ mɛ n yuku yahlɛ pallɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ ó pɔ kõ yé yahlɛ yé kɔ̃ yé gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ fĩn mɔ wɛ́?
Liyel nɛ̂-á yé ye pɩ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ, ǹmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh se yɩkɩ yé yõlɛ tɛ́.
Pè náh nɛ kɔ́kɔ́nɔ́ kwéy ó-á n dɔkɔ mífã́hkɩ̀ póllɛ di?

Tɛ́ sépinɔ pól sɔkɔ, ńmɔ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ mɛ yé yõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ gbõ̀ yõ nɛ, yé náh n fɛ̃ n syi káhkɩ́ vi n pi. Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-á n yɩkɩ yé yõlɛ, tɛ̃̀-à ké se mɛ nɛ́dúkú nɛ̂nɛ, fṍhnɔ́ kɩ n sah n pi tɛ̃̀ yõ.

Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ ń yṹnpyé, kàh sõ̀ mɛ pɩ nɛ kõ̀kè kõ̀nɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ tɔ̃ mé mɛ gbah tɛ̃ n yo nɛ kè nɛ n pɩ, yõ se náhkɩ mɛ ké tyɩ́ pè ńnɛ nɛ n fõh ńtɔ̃? Kègbɩ yõ, képah tyɩ́-à tɔ̃ sõ̀ nɛ mé mɛ gbah tɛ̃ sɛ̃́, Krista dahnɩ yõ syɩ́nɔ́ se náhkɩ mɛ yõ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ ńtɔ̃?
Nónó-á n dahbɩ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ yé wrɔ́, pè káh yĩn kõ̀kè kõ̀nɔ́ ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, pè pé tyɩ́nɔ́ kɔ̃lɩ n to pnɛ́pnɛ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ kɛ̀.
Ń yṹnpyé, gblɔ̌y yõ wɛ n tɛ̃ yĩn ye Liyel ye yélɛ. Ǹtɛ yé káh núkú sah képah yõ, yè mó yé dyɔ dyɔ tyilɛ n pɩ dɛ́. Yé wɛ̃nɛ nɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyi pól ye tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ núkú mɛ̀ tuke mɔ yo kɛ núkúlɛ nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Á ní-ò tyɩ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè nɔ á tyɩ́ á gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.»
Ǹtɛ yáh wɛ̃nɛ n nwãhkɩ, tɛ́ wɛ̃nɛ n kɔ sɛ̃́ à; yáh kɩ yé gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, yé kɩ pɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ.
Yé noh ń tyɩ́ yɔ̀: Yé yɛ Liyel Mirki yé yahlɛ n tɛ̃. Képah sɔkɔ, yé náh tɔ̃ yé gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi pɩ n pi.

Yé náh wɛ di, névi gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ, Liyel Mirki dêl tyi ye sépilɛ. Liyel Mirki tɔ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi-á mó tyi nónónɛ, névi dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi náh sépilɛ. Tɛ́ sépi tɛ̃̀-á pɩ wɛ̃ sépɛ́bɩ́lɛ sɛ̃́, képah ye yé kɔ̃ yé náh yé gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ n pnɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel Mirki-à kɩ fyɔ̀ yé yahlɛ n tɛ̃, tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ vyãh kɩ dɛ yé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ á gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi-á tyi nónónɛ, á pól sélɛ n pnɛ. Sè wɛ yɔ̀: fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, põ̌põ̌ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ,

ànɛ̂ sãh fálnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ klɔ́ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́pékè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ mɛ́kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ yṹnwɔ̃rɩ́ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ fɔkɔ vyã́hnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ̃ fwónɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ tĩ̀ntĩ̀nnɛ,

ànɛ̂ yĩ́wílkìlɛ, ànɛ̂ sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ yèwò pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ sé sɛ̃́nknɔ dukelɛ. Mé ké gbáhdyâhlɛ n di yé tyɩ́, máh sõ̀ kè di sah sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́ ǹgbò dùkùlɛ sɔ̃́ nɛ, névye nónó pól-á n pɩ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ, pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n de n pi Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ tyi nónó-á n pɩ Liyel Mirki yah tɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, sè wɛ yɔ̀: Tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ, ànɛ̂ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ, ànɛ̂ sṍmnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ yãm yáhnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́lɛ,
ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y yɛlɛ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ. Sépi póllɛ, tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh mɛ sélɛ n fwo.
Névye nónó-á mɛ Krista tyɩ́ yõ, pépi ye pé gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi, ànɛ̂ pé dékè tyi, ànɛ̂ pé yĩ́wílkì tyi pól syɩ dahnɩ yõ, à sè ko.
Liyel Mirki nɛ̂-á minnɛ á kɔ̃, á ye yɛ képah kɔ̃ kè á yahlɛ n tɛ̃ kɛ̀.
Á ye káh pɩ gblɔ̌y gbílkípúlɛ, à nɛ n pɩ n de wɛ̃ tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ, à wɛ̃ dyɔlɛ n yɔ.

Ń yṹnpyé, yâh sɔ̃́ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ wɛ tɛ̃ à mɛ tyítúkù yɔ́lɛ n pɩ, Liyel Mirki-á mɛ yépi nónó yahlɛ n tɛ̃, yépi tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ mámmám yè pɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ pèpɛy yõ. Yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól mó yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ, yé tɔ káh pɔ de tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé wɛ̃ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ n twah. Yâh képahlɛ n pɩ, yé mɛ Krista tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ.
Névi yɔ́-à ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n dɔkɔ n sah, tɛ́ kwâh yɔ́ náh mó tɔ̃ ǹnɛ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ.
Nɛ́núkù núkú pól yɩ̃nɛ pè pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀ kyɔmɩ n yah pallɛ. Nɛ̂ nɩ-à mɛ fɛ̃ n vɩ n pi ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ, ǹ nɩ vɩ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ, à káh ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɔkɔ n sãh ǹ ní-òlɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, nɛ́núkù núkú pól-á tyi nónó pɩ, pè kɩ yĩn sé yṍtyílɛ.
Névi nɛ̂-à álɛ n kwɔ Liyel wɛynɛ, á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ tɛ̃̀nɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ.
Yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ lɔ́, pè náh kṍlɛ Liyellɛ n ko. Névi-à sèmukɔ nɛ̂ duku mɔ, képah ye à kɩ tɔkɔ.

Névi nɛ̂-à ǹ gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi yõre ye tɛ̃̀ kɩ wɛ, képah nɛ̂-á tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à Liyel Mirki dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, Liyel Mirki dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi yõre ye tɛ̃̀ kɩ wɛ, képah nɛ̂-á tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ.
Á ye káh yal mɔ tyi pèplɔ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, áyâh tyi pèplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ yálnmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, á kɩ pɔ ké yõre wɛ ké gbĩ́ pèpɛy sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, áyâh tyípépɛ̌y pɩ́-ńsah wɛ, á ye kélɛ n pɩ no pól tyɩ́. Tɛ́ á ye kélɛ n pɩ n kal á yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú wɔ tyɩ́.
Yáh wã́rkɩ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ wɛ kélɛ yẽ̌hyẽ̌h yɔ̀, ńmɔ ye n wãrkɩ kélɛ ń gbõ̀lɛ.
Gblɔ̌y wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́-á nɔ nónó tyɩ́, pépi náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé fṍhnɔ́ wɛ Krista dahnɩ yõ kúnɔ́ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ yĩnnɛ. Képah ye pè yépilɛ n kyɩ̃ n mɔ n mɔ kõ̀kè kõ̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Kénɛ névye nónó ńtɛ̃-á mɛ kõ̀nɔ́lɛ, pè náh mɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ ò. Pè mɛ ké tyɩ́ ólɛ nɛ yé kõ̀kè kõ, pé kɔ̃ pé pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n wɛ n gbilki képah yĩnnɛ.

Ǹtɛ ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, mé náh ń gblɔ̌y gbilki n pi tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yĩnnɛ à wil Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista dahnɩ yõ kúnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹmɔ dahnɩ yõ kúnɔ́ yĩn ye ńmɔ kɔ̃ mé kèkõyṍ tyilɛ n yah yõ kɛ̃́ tyilɛ, tɛ́ kèkõyṍ névye tɔ mó mɛ ńmɔlɛ n yah sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ.
Névi kõ̀nɔ́ ànɛ̂ ǹ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ, yõ náh mɛ sépi tyɩ́. Yõ-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, képah ye pɩ vìnmɔnɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel dahbɩ tɛ̃̀ nɩ sɔkɔ.
Nónó pól-á mɛ n kɔ képah wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, pépi ànɛ̂ Liyel no póllɛ, pépi nónó-á Yisrayel nolɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à yèvɩnɩnɛ pè kɔ̃ à mó pé yãm yah.
À tɔkɔ núkúnúkú tyɩ́, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh tɔ̃ ńmɔlɛ n kwlɔ. Nɩ́tbɔ́ nónó-á ńmɔ wil sɔkɔ, sépi n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ máh pɩ Krista tyɩ́lɛ.
Ń yṹnpyé, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́. Amiina!

Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á pɩ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ, ńmɔ ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ névye tyɩ́ nónó-á pɩ Liyel nolɛ Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ n kɔ pallɛ pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́ pè mó yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah Liyel yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista Súlɛ. À ye sãm mɔ á sɔkɔ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, à pèpɔrɩ duke duke pól pɩ á tyɩ́ nónó-á wil yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ.
Kèkõyṍ mɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, Liyel sõ̀ ápi yah tɔkɔ pɩ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ Krista gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, nɛ á pɩ yályál wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ á tyɩ́ péwɔ yah sɔkɔ. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ,
Liyel sõ̀ kwãh tɛ̃ kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ páh kɩ ápi pɩ pé wɛ̃́npìlɛ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ. Yé náh wɛ di, képah ye sõ̀ à pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Á ye ǹnɛ n gbilki ǹ pèpɔrɩ yĩnnɛ, wǎh nɛ̂ pɩ á tyɩ́ ǹ nɩ̀dɛ̀ Pídĩ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Ǹmɔ tṍ kwɛ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye á wɛ wil pèkè sɔkɔ, tɛ́ á tyípêl mɛ yɔ̃ mɔ á tyɩ́. Sɛ̃́ ye Liyel pɩ yõ̀bènɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ á tyɩ́,
képah nɛ̂-á à pɩ á tyɩ́ náhnáh à yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ ànɛ̂ lékã́mnɛ á kɔ̃ yĩ́ĩ́.
Sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, à sõ̀ képah yah tɔkɔ sah ǹgbò dùkùlɛ. Núkúnúkú, à kélɛ á wɛ̃kɩ. Krista gbõ̀ yõ ye sõ̀ à yah tɔkɔ tyípépɛ̌y mɛ̀nɛ.
Ké pɩ gbĩ́-à pɔ nɔ, à kɩ yíyìn pól tuke mɔ nónó-á mɛ yĩ̂nyõ ànɛ̂ sétáh yõ, nɛ́núkù kɔ̃ à kɩ pɩ sé yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Kristalɛ.

Á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ á wɛ wɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ, Liyel ye kélɛ á kɔ̃. À sõ̀ kwãh tɛ̃ á yah tɔkɔ sah ǹ tyɩ́lɛ. Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyellɛ, ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tir ye à n nɛ n pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ wǎh kè yah tɔkɔ sɔ̃́.
Képah ye, ápi nónó ǹgbò-á á gbõ̀ sah Krista yõ, á ye gbílkínɔ́lɛ n sah Liyel yõ.

Yépi tɔlɛ, yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ, yé gbɩ wɛy wɛ noh, képah nɛ̂-á Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ, nɛ̂-á yélɛ n pwah n mɔ. Ǹmɔ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye tɔ̃, Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ yé kɔ̃ ǹ Mirki nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, à kélɛ yé kɔ̃ à yé pɔkɔ mɔ.

Liyel Mirki nɛ̂-á à á kɔ̃, képah álɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ wǎh ǹ vyãhlɛ ǹ no kɔ̃ yî nónó tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, áyáh kɩ sè wɛ n pi. Képah á nɩlɛ n sũ nɛ áyáh kɩ sè wɛ n pi, áyâh sõ nɛ̂nɛ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ pnɛ́pnɛ́. Képah sɔkɔ, gbílkínɔ́-á kɩ n sah Liyel yõ.
Képah ye, ńmɔ tɔ-á fyɔ̀ noh nɛ yáh mɛ sɛ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ, ànɛ̂ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ yé tyɩ́,
gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, mè n nɛ n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ yé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ǹ tɛ́ ǹnɛ n ye n gbo yé tyɩ́.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista Liyel tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tɔ̃́rɩ́ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, nɛ à lékã́m Mirkilɛ yé kɔ̃ nɛ̂-á kɩ Liyel dùkùlɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ tɛ́ kɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ à pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́.
À mó yé lékã́m yɩkɩ mɔ, sɔ̃̀nko wǎh yé ye nɛ yé yé gbõ̀ sah kwâh nɛ̂ yõ sɔkɔ yé fɛ̃ ké dùkù pɩ̃; ànɛ̂ wǎh mɛ yípéplɔ nónó yah sah ǹ no kɔ̃, yé sé tɔ pɩ̃.
Yè mó pɩ̃ gbǐl tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ nɛ̂-á à mɛ yah sah á kɔ̃ ápi nónó-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Kénɛ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ mɛ̀ ye Liyel tõ̀ pɩ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ,
wǎh Krista lékó yilki mɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ tɛ́ à kɔ̃ à kɔ̃ tɛ̃ ǹ gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ.
À mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ tɔ̃́rɩ́, ànɛ̂ tǎhkɩ̀, ànɛ̂ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ, ànɛ̂ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́nɔ pól yõ sɔkɔ. Nónó yni-á mɛ wil kwɛynɛ, ànɛ̂ nónó yni-á kɩ n wil n pi ńsõ̂nɛ, ǹmɔ mɛ pépi pól yah sɔkɔ.
Liyel yíyìn pól pɩ Krista gbáhkɩ̀ súnsàh-ǹsahlɛ, tɛ́ à pɩ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pól yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ,
pépi nónó-á ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ. Krista mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ pépi sɔkɔ ǹ tɔ̂ɔ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel tɔ mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ǹ sɔkɔ ǹ tɔ̂ɔ́.
Ǹgbòlɛ, yé lésõ mɛ lékyɩ̂ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ yé tyítúkúnì ànɛ̂ yé tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ.

Kénɛ tyípêl sɔkɔ ye sõ̀ yé mɛ n pɩ yé minnɛ ǹgbòlɛ, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á yé mɛ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tǎhkɩ̀ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ sõ̀ tɛ̃. Kénɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ tyah kènkãh sɔkɔ. Ǹmɔ ye mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yáhlepu yahlɛ n tɛ̃ kwɛy mɛ̀ sɔkɔ yɔ̀.

Ápi tɔ pól sõ̀ mɛ pépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, mɛ á dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi ólɛ n pɩ. Tir nɛ̂-à sõ̀ nɔ á wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ áyâh nɛ̂ sõ wɛ nɛ kǎh mɛ plɛ, képah ye à n nɛ n pɩ. Áyáh sõ̀ pɩ sɛ̃́, képah ye Liyel pèkè kɩ sõ̀ á nɔ n pi no tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Ǹtɛ Liyel nɩ̀gbɛ̀kɩ̀ tnɔ. Á tyɩ́ kah nɔ ǹ tyɩ́,
képah ye, áyáh lésõ mɛ lékyɩ̂ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ á tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à minnɛ á kɔ̃ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ Kristalɛ. — Yõ̀bènɔrɩ ye Liyel pɩ yé tyɩ́ à yé pwah mɔ. —
Á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ, Liyel ye á wilki kũ sɔkɔ ǹmɔlɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ á sah yĩ̂nyõ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Pèpɔrɩ nɛ̂-á Liyel pɩ ápi tyɩ́ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ, à kè pɩ ǹ yõ̀bènɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃kɩ yĩnnɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ no pól tyɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, yáh sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, à mɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́ à yé pwah mɔ. Pwáhnmɔnɔ mɛ̀ náh wil yépi tyɩ́ dɛ́, Liyel yɩ̃́nkɔ̃nɔ ye kélɛ
Yépi tǎhkɩ̀ pɩ́nwɛnɔ náh kélɛ dɛ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh fɛ̃ ǹ gblɔ̌y gbilki n pi.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel mɔ́nɔ́ ye álɛ. À ye á mɔ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ tyípéplɔ pɩ yĩnnɛ Liyel-á nónó yah sah ǹgbò dùkùlɛ nɛ á pɔ sélɛ n pɩ.

Yépi nónó-á lésõ Nsyifunɔ n ye kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ névyelɛ, tɛ́ mɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n ye kènkõbelɛ ké nɩ́tbɔ́ yĩnnɛ nónó-á mɛ pé wil sɔkɔ, yáh lésõ mɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ légbĩ́nɛ, yé yé dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ képahlɛ.

Légbĩ́nɛ yé lésõ mɛ fɩ́ɩ́ Kristalɛ. Yé lésõ mɛ nɛ́pânnɛ, yé náh mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Liyel no sɔkɔ. Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ n no kɔ̃ nɛ páh yî nónónɛ pè kɔ̃ pé Yégbékè kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ pélɛ, yé vyãh lésõ dɛ sé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Yé lésõ mɛ kèkõyṍ sɔkɔ gbõ̀ sàh-ǹsah kɛ̃́nɛ yé tyɩ́. Liyel náh lésõ mɛ yé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ, yépi nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ fɩ́ɩ́, yé nɔ de Liyellɛ Krista tṍ kwɛ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.

Ǹmɔ ye ápi yèvɩnɩnɛ. Ǹmɔ ye Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ pè kwrɔ mɔ pɩ yìkì núkú névyelɛ. Dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ kɛ̃kɩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, mɛ Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ pé wrɔ́ gbɛkɩ sah, à ye pɔ kénɛ kɛ̃kɩ sɔ to ǹ kúnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.

À ye Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ànɛ̂ sé wã̀l kɔ dúkùnɔ́ pól yĩn mɔ. Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ, à Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pé kwrɔ mɔ pɩ yìkì núkú névyelɛ, yèvɩnɩ kɔ̃ kè wɛ pé wrɔ́.

À Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ pé pól kwrɔ mɔ pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ ǹ kúnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ dahnɩ yõ, tɛ́ pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ pɩ núkúlɛ Liyellɛ. À dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀ tɔ tyɩ́ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ ǹ syɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ dahnɩ yõ.
À pɔ yèvɩnɩ wɛlɔ yo yé tyɩ́ yépi nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ fɩ́ɩ́, ànɛ̂ nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ yúkɛy.
Yé náh wɛ di, Krista gbõ̀ yõ ye Nsyifunɔ ànɛ̂ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, á pól kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ yĩni tɛ̃ Sú Liyel tnɔ̂ ǹ Mirki núkúní mɛ̀ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yépi nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, nɛ́pân náh tɔ̃ yélɛ, wɔ̂ yah tãn náh yélɛ. Yé pɩ kwil núkú tãnnɛ ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Tɛ́ pɩ Liyel nolɛ.
Yé mɛ á kɩ nɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀ yɔ́ sɔ̃́ pè mɔ nɛ̂ sètyah-á pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopulɛ, tɛ́ Yesu mɛ pɩ ké dáhgbɩ́lɛ ǹ wahlɛ.
Ǹmɔ Yesu gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye wɔ̀kɔ̀ kɩ yĩn gbã́hngbã́h, tɛ́ kɩ kyãh kɩ pɩ Liyel ní-ńsah gbôlɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ.
Yé wrɔ́-á kwrɔ mɔ ǹmɔlɛ, yépi tɔ ye pɩ gbô mɛ̀ fɩ̃́ yɔ́lɛ, kɩ wɛ kwrɔ mɔ no tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ kɩ pɩ tɛ̃̀-ǹsah yɔ́lɛ, ńyãh sɔkɔ-á Liyel kɩ mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ Mirki sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á mɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ Yesu Krista tõ̀ yĩnnɛ, ànɛ̂ yépi yĩnnɛ, yépi nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ...
Liyel-á ǹ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ tõ̀ nɛ̂ dahbɩ ń gbõ̀ yépi tyɩ́ pɛkɩ yĩnnɛ, mé sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ yáh képah tɛ̃̀ wɔ noh ó.
Liyel ye syɔ̃ wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́ yɔ́ tyɩ́ à ǹ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tirlɛ ń wɛ̃kɩ, sɔ̃́-á mé yo sɔkɔ kélɛ yé tyɩ́ kwéy sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ yõ̀tah sɔkɔ yɔ̀.
Yáh kɩ kélɛ n kar, yé kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir nɛ̂-á mɛ Krista tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ké sèndyàh náh ńnɛ.
Liyel náh sõ̀ kénɛ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tirlɛ ǹgbò tãn wɛ̃kɩ, sɔ̃́-á à kélɛ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu nɛ́gblɔ́ wɛ̃kɩ núkúnúkú ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ.

Sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir mɛ̀ wɛ yɔ̀, nɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir gbõ̀ yõ, nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pé pól-á kwrɔ mɔ Nsyifunɔ sɔkɔ kɩ gbɛ̃kɩ núkú yõ n pi pélɛ, tɛ́ kɩ n pɩ n pi gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ pélɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, pé tɔ vyãh-á kɩ n wɛ n pi ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Liyel-á ǹ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́, képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye ńnɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ tõ̀ sɔkɔ.
Ńmɔ nɛ̂-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól nɛ́tɛ́ynɛ, ńmɔ ye wɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩ mɛ̀nɛ kɩ Yesu pèpɔrɩ tyɩ́lɛ n yo névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ. Kénɛ pèpɔrɩ mɛ̀nɛ, yĩ̀n náh mɛ ké tyɩ́.
Liyel-á kɩ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir mɛ̀ pɩ n pi dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, mé yɩ̃nɛ mè kélɛ névye wɛ̃kɩ n yĩ́ĩ́ pallɛ. Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yíyìn pól mɔ́-òlɛ, à ye képah wɔ̃bɩ sah ǹgbò dùkùlɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ,

sɔ̃̀nko à tɔkɔ núkúnúkú tyɩ́, yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ nɛ̂-á n wil Liyel tyɩ́, yõ̀tãm pól ànɛ̂ kèkõyṍ tɔ̃́rɩ́ nónó-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ, pé pól tɛ̃ wɛ kè pɩ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ.
Sépi pól pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á sõ̀ nɛ̂ yah tɔkɔ sah tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂, tɛ́ pɔ kè pɩ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ.
Áyáh á wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ Kristalɛ tɛ́ sɛ̃ ǹ yõ, képah gbõ̀ yõ, wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ mɛ yɩ́kɩ́nmɔnɔlɛ á tyɩ́ kɩ fɛ̃ nɔ de Liyel tnɔ̂ nɩ̀sãh sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, ńmɔ-á mɛ yèvyãhrɩ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ yé yĩnnɛ, yé káh yɛ képah yé wil ku. Képah ye kɩ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé kɔ̃.
Képah ye, mé kɩ gbètukunɔ di Sú Liyel yah sɔkɔ,
ǹmɔ nɛ̂ gbõ̀ yõ-á kétlo pól mɛ sétáh yõ ànɛ̂ yĩ̂nyõ.
Ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ mɛ gblò. Képah ye, mé kélɛ n yah kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃ ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, sɔ̃̀nko tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ n mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ yé sɔkɔ.
Krista nɛ n mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ mó nɛ mɛ yã̀hnɩ̀ mɔ yĩ́ĩ́ yé sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ Krista sɔkɔ, yépi ànɛ̂ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ́lɔ́ pól kɩ ké yõ̀tukuri, ànɛ̂ ké yõ̀sɛ̃̀kɩ̀, ànɛ̂ ké kyãhlɔ, ànɛ̂ ké súkúlínɔ́ dùkù pɩ̃.
Yé kɩ tyɩ́nɔnɔ mɛ̀ dùkù pɩ̃, képah nɛ̂-á kal pnɛ̀nɔ́ duke póllɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel kɩ mɛ ǹ tɔ̂ɔ́ yé sɔkɔ.
Áyáh yî nónónɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ànɛ̂ áyáh mɛ nónó tyɩ́lɛ n sõ, Liyel ye kɩ fɛ̃ sélɛ álɛ n kɔ̃ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, fɔ́ɔ́ kɩ kah mɔ ńtɛ̃nɛ, ǹ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ nɛ̂-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ápi sɔkɔ.
Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah Liyel yõ à wil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, knɔ knɔ pól sɔkɔ tyɛ tyɛ́nɩ́ kɛ̃́nɛ. Amiina.
Ńmɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tõ̀ yĩnnɛ, mé yélɛ n ni yépi nónó-á Liyel ye, nɛ yé yé minnɛ n pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ ǹ yénɔ́ mɛ̀nɛ.
Yé pɩ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔpulɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́pír névyelɛ, ànɛ̂ sṍmnɔ́ pɩ́púlɛ. Yé wɛ̃nɛ n n tɛ̃ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.
Yáh mɛ yèvɩ̀nɩ̀ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, képah gbõ̀ yõ, yé gbah n tɛ̃ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ tɛ̃ n sah Liyel Mirki-á nɛ̂nɛ yé kɔ̃.
Yé pól pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkú Krista gbõ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ Liyel Mirki núkú ye mɛ. Liyel yé ye tɔlɛ kwâh núkú yĩnnɛ nɛ yé yé gbõ̀ sah ké yõ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ núkú ye mɛ, ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ núkúlɛ, ànɛ̂ ni sɔkɔ wèlnwìkìnɔ́ núkúlɛ.
Liyel núkú ye mɛ. No pól Sú ye ǹnɛ. Ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ mɛ no pól yõ. À mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ no pól sɔkɔ. À mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ no pól sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ á nɛ́núkù núkú pól ye Liyel yõ̀bènɔrɩ wɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Krista-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé kélɛ á kɔ̃ sɔ̃́.
Kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ:
«Wǎh dɔkɔ yuku yĩ̂nyõ sɛ̃́,
à sɔkɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ névyelɛ.
À tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ yɩ̃ névye kɔ̃.»
Ǹtɛ kwâh nɛ̂ mɛ pè n ye yĩ̂nyõ dɔ́kɔ́nyukunɔlɛ wɛ́? Képah ye n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ wǎh sõ̀ tiki yuku sétáh sõwãh tɔ sɔkɔ.
Nɛ̂-á tiki pɔ, ǹmɔ ó ye tɔ̃ dɔkɔ yuku yĩ̂nyõ léyy tɛ̃̀-ǹsah sɔkɔ, kɩ kèkõyṍ pól yuku.
Ǹmɔ Krista ye kɔ̃ névyelɛ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ duke dukelɛ. À túkù pɩ ǹ tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ, tɛ́ túkù pɩ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopulɛ, tɛ́ túkù pɩ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónkɔ̃pulɛ, tɛ́ túkù pɩ kwɔ́púlɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ye à vi mɔ Liyel nolɛ pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ ǹ tõ̀ pɩ dal mɔ, wãn kɔ̃ kè kɩ n mɔ Krista yõ sɛ̃́pú yõ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ kɩ á pól wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ pɩ núkúlɛ, tɛ́ á kɩ Liyel Pídĩ́ pɩ̃ tɛ́ kɩ yuku yahlɛ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ fɔ́ɔ́ kɩ pɔ pɩ Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, á náh tɔ̃ n pɩ n tɛ̃ n pi wɛ̃́npìlɛ nónó-á kwɔ́nɔ́ kétúkúnì pɩ́pú ànɛ̂ pé névye vìntɛ̃nɔ kɩ álɛ n tɔkɔ n fĩ n kɔ̃ yã́hkɩ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, kɩ á mɔ pílkínɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.
Ǹtɛ áyáh kɩ gbɩlɛ n yo tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ, á kɩ yah yúkúnɔ́ wɛ tyi pól sɔkɔ kɩ n nɔ n de Kristalɛ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yõlɛ.

Ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n póllɛ núkúlɛ. Gbèl tél-ńtã̂n gbõ̀ yõ ye wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n pól wɛ̃ tɛ̃ yĩn sah. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, wil tã̀ntã̀n pól-à tõ̀lɛ n pɩ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́, wãn kɩ n mɔ wil gbɛ̃́nsê yõ, kè kɩ n yuku yahlɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.

Nɛ̂-á mé n gbah n yo yé tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Yé káh tɔ̃ yé minnɛ n pɩ Liyel pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névye tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, pépi nónó-á pé lékã́m pé yahlɛ n tɛ̃ n mɔ yõre kɛ̃́ tyi sɔkɔ.
Pé lékã́m mɛ fɔ́kɔ́ntũnɔlɛ. Liyel-á min nɛ̂nɛ n kɔ̃, kè náh mɛ pé tyɩ́. Képah ye pè pɩ yah wɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂pú ànɛ̂ kùkùtǎhkɩ̀ névyelɛ.
Pè pɩ sen pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂púlɛ, pè náh n fyãh. Tɛ́ pè pɩ prɔ̀npɩbɩlɛ à tyítúkúnì duke póllɛ n pɩ yĩ̀n kɛ̃́nɛ.
Ǹtɛ yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ náh yé pɩ̃ Kristalɛ dɛ́.
Mé sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ ǹ tyɩ́ dùkù pól-á yo yé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ gbɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yé kwɔ́nɔ́ wɛ ké tɔ yõ.
Yáh sõ̀ mɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ ǹgbòlɛ, yé yɩ̃nɛ yè képah milki. Yé yé náh vi yé pɩ dùkù kédyâh kɔ̃, képah nɛ̂-á sõnɔ túkúnìnɛ n mɔ yé sɔkɔ, nónó-á yé tyɩ́lɛ n yɩkɩ.
Liyel Mirki-á lékã́m nɛ̂nɛ yé kɔ̃, yé yɛ kè yé vi mɔ.
Yé vi mɔ nɛ n pɩ pɩ dùkù késã́nnɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́, yè mó nɛ n mɛ tómm ànɛ̂ yályál liyel yah gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Képah yĩnnɛ, yé mɩ̀nɩ̀ yónɔ́ yal n mɔ, yè mó gbɩlɛ n yo wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Yé náh wɛ di, wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkú tã̀ntã̀n ye á póllɛ.
Yé fɔkɔ-à vyãh yé káh tyípékè pɩ. Gbĩ́yĩ́ náh yɩ̃nɛ kè pɔ de yè mó nɛ n mɛ fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́.
Yé káh yé mɔ n tɛ̃ tɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yɩkɩ mɔ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃.
Névi nɛ̂-à sõ̀ mɛ yɩ̃belɛ n yɩ̃, tɛ̃̀ kè yal mɔ, à mó ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ǹ gbã̀nnɛ yĩ́nvǐ kɛ̃́nɛ, à fɛ̃ kwâh wɛ à névi yɔ́ tɔ yohnɩ n mɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ yãm nɛynɛ.
Wɛ̀ntùkù yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n wil yé vyãh sɔkɔ. Yé wɛ̀npèplɔ ólɛ n wɛkɩ nónó-á kɩ fɛ̃ névye yohnɩ mɔ, ànɛ̂ nónó-á kɩ fɛ̃ pèpɔrɩ pɩ sé nóhpú tyɩ́.

Liyel Mirki mɛ yé sɔkɔ kètõ̀npɔ́kɔ́ sɔ̃́ yé wil tyɩ́, yé káh yèkwɔrɩlɛ n mɔ ké sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye yé sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ ké yõ nɛ sõ yɔ́-á mɛ n pi, Liyel-á kɩ yé pwah mɔ n pi pnɛ́pnɛ́.
Yé káh yrɔlɛ n tɛ̃ n sah yé fɔkɔnɩ sɔkɔ. Yé fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀, ànɛ̂ mâl, ànɛ̂ wɛy sǒhsǒh, ànɛ̂ gbyɔ yal n mɔ, à tahlɩ nɛ́pékè pɩ́nɔ́ duke pól tyɩ́.
Yé pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ, yé tyɩ́ mó nɛ n mɛ nɔ́nɔ́lɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Yé nɛ n yɔ̃ n mɔ wɛ̃nɛ n kɔ̃, sɔ̃́-á Liyel yɔ̃ mɔ yé kɔ̃ Krista gbõ̀ yõ.
Yáh pɩ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ nónó tyɩ́-á nɔ ǹ tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, képah ye yé ǹmɔlɛ n yah n pɩ.
Yé yɛ yé tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á á pól tyɩ́ nɔ Krista tyɩ́, tɛ́ à mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ Liyel kɔ̃ ápi yĩnnɛ à pɩ sárkálɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ n põ sírr tɛ́ ké tyɩ́ mɛ nɔ Liyel tyɩ́.
Yé pɩ Liyel nolɛ, képah ye fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀, ànɛ̂ prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ duke pól, à tahlɩ yĩ́sesúkú tyɩ́, sépi sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ náh yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n nohnɩ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Sen pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ wɛlɔ, ànɛ̂ wɛ̀ntùkùnì, ànɛ̂ nɛ́wã̂n wɛlɔ tɔ náh yɩ̃nɛ sè nɛ n wil yé vyɛ̃y sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛy ye yé yɩ̃nɛ yè Liyellɛ n kɔ̃.

Yé yɩ̃nɛ yè kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ prɔ̀npɩbɩ, ànɛ̂ nónó-á mɛ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ Liyel yah, ànɛ̂ yĩ́sesúkú névyelɛ, pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n de n pi Krista tɔ̃́rɩ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ. Yĩ́sesúkú pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, sãh fálnɔ́ dùkù yɔ́ ye kélɛ.
Yé káh yɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ kɔ̃ à pɔ yé pilki ǹ sõnɔ prɛ̌nɩ̀nɛ. Sépi dùkù pɩ́nɔ́ ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ n pɔ Liyel kɔ̃ ǎ fṍhnɔ́ sah ǹ tyɩ́ yáhlepu yõ.
Képah ye, yé káh nɛ pɩ n soh pélɛ póllɛ.
Yé lésõ mɛ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ ǹgbòlɛ. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú yé mɛ kyòo sɔkɔ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ. Kyòo sɔkɔ névye-á n pɩ sɔ̃́, yé tɔ nɛ n pɩ sɛ̃́.
Yé náh wɛ di, kyòo sɔkɔ kɔ́lɔ́ ye n pɔ n pɔ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ gbɩ yónɔ́lɛ.
Nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á nɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, yé gbah tɛ̃ kélɛ n pnɛ.
Yé káh fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ tyilɛ n pɩ. Yõre náh mɛ sé tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ yé sé gbɩ̃nɛ n wɔ.
Tyi nónó-á kénɛ névye mɛ n wɔ̃bɩ n pɩ, sé tyɩ́ yã́hnɔ́ ńtɛ̃ mɛ sennɛ.
Ǹtɛ tyi nónó gbɩ̃-à wɔ, sépi n nɛ n mɛ kyòo.
Yé náh wɛ di, tyi nónó gbɩ̃-à wɔ, sé dùkù n nɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye, kè mɛ yónɔ́lɛ nɛ:
«Áwɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ n dɔ, dɔ n yuku.
Yuku n wil lékyɩ̂ wrɔ́,
Krista kɩ kyòo mɔ á tyɩ́.»
Yé yé pɩ dùkùlɛ n kyɔmɩ pallɛ. Yé káh nɛ n pɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névye tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, yé nɛ n pɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́pú tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ,
nónó-á tir nɛ̂ pɩ́nɔ́ yõ̀bènɔrɩ-à fyɔ̀ wɛ pé tyɩ́, pě kè pɩ. Yé náh wɛ di, gbĩ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á álɛ, kè náh mɛ pallɛ.
Képah ye, yé káh pɩ lékã́m kɛ̃́ névyelɛ, ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀-á nɛ̂nɛ, yé gbah n tɛ̃ képahlɛ n pnɛ.
Yé káh tɔ̃ wɔ kè yé tɛ̃, képah névi tyɩ́lɛ n yɩkɩ. Yé yɛ Liyel Mirki yé tɔkɔ.
Yé sṍrélɛ n mɔ wɛ̃ sɔkɔ yɩ̀gbɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ yè Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ n gbilki, yè mó yɩ̀lɛ n gbɩ ǹ tyɩ́ ǹ Mirki-á nónó dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ. Yé yɩ̀lɛ n gbɩ yè Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n gbilki yé nnɔ póllɛ.
Gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ ànɛ̂ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, yé nɛ n wɛkɩ Sú Liyel tyɩ́ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ.
Yépi nónó-á pɩ Krista yah tíkí pɩ́púlɛ, yé nɛ n sah wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ sɔkɔ.
Syɔ́, yé nɛ n sah yé pɛbɩ tyɩ́ yõ, sɔ̃́-á yé n sah Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, dĩ́ ye sê yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ sɔ̃́-á Kristalɛ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, pépi nónó-á ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ tɛ́ à mɛ pɩ pé pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ.
Syɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ n sah pé pɛbɩ tyɩ́ yõ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á Krista yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì n sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
Pɛbɩ, yé yɛ yé syɔ́ tyɩ́ nɔ yé tyɩ́, Krista yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́-á nɔ sɔ̃́ ǹ tyɩ́, fɔ́ɔ́ à ǹ min kɔ̃ pé yĩnnɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ye sõ̀ à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pɩ yályál Liyel yah, ni sɔkɔ wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ Liyel wɛy gbõ̀ yõ.
À sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pè pɔ pé yah sɔkɔ yályál syíi kɛ̃́nɛ, ànɛ̂ tìkìlì-ǹsah kɛ̃́nɛ, ànɛ̂ yɩ́kɩ́-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ pé tyɩ́.
Sɛ̃́ ye pɛbɩ tɔ yɩ̃nɛ pé syɔ́ tyɩ́ nɔ pé tyɩ́ pé gblɔ̌y wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyɩ́-á nɔ sɔ̃́ pé tyɩ́. Névi nɛ̂ kyɩ tyɩ́-à nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ ye nɔ ǹ tyɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wil gbɛ̃́nsê kṍ náh ǹnɛ n tɛ̃ dò, tɛ̃̀ n pyě kélɛ n pu ńkɛ̃́; ǹ tɛ́ kè tɔ̃ n sah n tɛ̃ sɔ̃́-á Krista tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ,
képah nɛ̂-á ápilɛ.
Képah ye, dĩ́ kɩ yal ǹ sú ànɛ̂ ǹ yṹ tnɔ̂, tɛ́ kɩ kwrɔ mɔ ǹ kyɩlɛ, pé nímí kɩ pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ.
Sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir ǹgbɛ̃ ye kélɛ. Tɛ́ ńmɔ kélɛ n yo nɛ kǎh mɛ ké yah mɔ Krista ànɛ̂ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ kè mɛ ké yah mɔ yépi tɔ tyɩ́. Yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól syɔ́ tyɩ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè nɔ yé tyɩ́ yé gblɔ̌y sɔ̃́, syɔ́ nɛ́núkù núkú pól mó yõ̀yénnɛ n sah pé pɛbɩ yõ.
Wɛ̃́npì, yé nɛ n sah yé dúbípú tyɩ́ yõ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ. Képah ye plɛ.
Yõ̀yénnɛ n sah á sú ànɛ̂ á yṹ yõ. Képah ye tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ gbennɛ, vyãh kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ tàhlɩ̀nɔ́lɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ:
Wâh képah pɩ, wáh kɩ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ tɛ́ kɩ min sɛ̃́kɩ̀ wɛ sétáh yõ sɔkɔ.
Dúbípú, yépi tɔ káh yèkwɔrɩlɛ n mɔ yé wɛ̃́npì sɔkɔ. À yɩ̃nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ, yé pélɛ n pu, yè mó kwɔ́nɔ́ pèpɛynɛ pélɛ n kɔ̃, yè mó pélɛ n vi n mɔ pallɛ.
Yɔ̃bɩ, yé nátãm nónó-á sétáh mɛ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, yé nɛ n sah pé tyɩ́ yõ tíkí ànɛ̂ wílsyahrɩlɛ ké sɔkɔ. Yé kélɛ n pɩ yã́ryã́r dáhbɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ké sɔkɔ Krista tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ yé n pɩ kélɛ.

Kè káh pɩ á kɩ nɛ pǎh yélɛ n kyɔmɩ képah yĩn sɔ̃́ yé n pɩ kélɛ, á kɩ nɛ névi dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ sɔ̃́ yé n yah kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ dɛ́. Yé kélɛ n pɩ Krista yɔ̃bɩ sɔ̃́ yélɛ, yè Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ n pɩ yé nnɔ póllɛ.
Yé tõ̀lɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ yé nnɔ póllɛ, á kɩ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ yé n pɩ kélɛ, kè káh nɛ n mɛ névi tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ yé n pɩ kélɛ.
Yé yé dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ nɛ yé nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ, nɛ̂-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ yɔ̃̀lɛ ò, nɛ̂ náh mɛ yɔ̃̀lɛ ò, tɛ̃̀-á kɩ ǹ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ lédyáhnɩ́ wɛ n pi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Yépi nónó-á yɔ̃bɩ nátãmnɛ, yépi tɔ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́. Yé káh dírílɛ n kõ pé yõ sɔkɔ. Yé pɩ̃ nɛ yépi ò, pépi ò, yé pól tyɩ́ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ́-á mɛ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á à náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n tɔkɔ n pɩ fṍnfṍ ǹ ní-òlɛ.
Ké tyɛ́-ńsah, yé yɛ yé tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ n wil Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yé Liyel mɛ́fwó yî tɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko yè tɛ̃ wɛ sétõ yĩ́nvǐ tyi yah kõ.

Yé náh wɛ di, ápi mɛ́kɩ̀ náh mɛ ké yah mɔ névye tyɩ́ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ kǎh mɛ ké yah mɔ nónó tyɩ́ pépi ye pɩ, yõ̀tãmnɛ, ànɛ̂ tǎhkɩ̀nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ névye fnɛ̀pu nónó-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ kèkõyṍ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ pèkè pɩ pɩ mrɛ́y nónó-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yĩ̂nyõ.
Képah ye, yé Liyel mɛ́fwóyî tɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko yòhnpèkè sõ-à pɔ, yè tɛ̃ n wɛ sépɛ fwo. Képah-à pɩ yé kɩ yĩn gbáhkɩ̀ núkú yõ.
Yé nɛ n mɛ yé gblɔ̌y vi n sah. Yé yɛ gbɩ yónɔ́ pɩ syɩ̃ kɔ̃lɛ yé tyɩ́, gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ mó pɩ vyɔrɩ fwɔ̀mɔnɩnɛ yé tyɩ́.
Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂-á yèvɩnɩnɛ n kɔ̃, ké yónɔ́ dékè nɛ mɛ yé sɔkɔ yé gbyẽ̂h sɔkɔ lékyêh tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tɛ̃ n yĩn mɛ̀mɛ̀kɩ̀ swàhkɩ̀ sɔ̃́ yé gbã̀n sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, yè fɛ̃ pèkè pɩ́-ò pnɛ́pêl pól swah kélɛ.
Yé pwáhnmɔnɔ fɛ̃ n syi á kɩ nɛ vyɔrɩ gbétú sɔ̃́ yé kwĩnki, yè mó Liyel wɛy fɛ̃ n syi kèkírkì sɔ̃́ Liyel Mirki-á nɛ̂ kɔ̃.

Yé yɛ yé Liyel nínɔ́ ànɛ̂ yé Liyel fàlnɔ́ duke pól nɛ n pɩ Liyel Mirki yah tɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Yé gbah tɛ̃ nɛ n yuku yahlɛ képah sɔkɔ. Yé Liyellɛ n ni Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì pól tyɩ́.
Yé nírílɛ n pɩ ńmɔ tɔ tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko Liyel wɛlɔ pèplɔ dahbɩ ń vyãh sɔkɔ mâh n wɛkɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, mè n tɛ̃ n wɛ nɩ̀sãh wɛ mè tyípǐllɛ n yo n wah nónó-á mɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir sɔkɔ.
Kénɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yah yuku yĩn ye kârnnɛ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ ń gbã̀n tyɩ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ yɔ̀. Yé nírílɛ n pɩ ń tyɩ́ ń kɔ̃ mè tɛ̃ n wɛ kélɛ n yo nɩ̀sãhlɛ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́.

Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yépi tɔ pɩ̃ ń tyɩ́-á mɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, ànɛ̂ tir nɛ̂-á mé mɛ n pɩ. Á yṹnpi Tisyiki nɛ̂-á ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́nɛ, tɛ́ mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ pallɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ kɩ pɔ ń tyɩ́ kèdùkù pól yo yé tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ ye wɛ tɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ ǹnɛ yé tyɩ́ nɛ à kyɩ á tyɩ́ kèdùkù yo yé syah à mó yé nɩ sũ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ pè yèvɩnɩ, ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ, ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ á yṹnpyé pól kɔ̃.
Á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ́nɔ́lɛ nónó pól tyɩ́ tyɛ́tyɛ́nɩ́ kɛ̃́nɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ pé tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ Pole ànɛ̂ Timotelɛ, ápi nónó-á Yesu Krista tõ̀npɩbɩlɛ, ápi ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́ynɛ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tyɩ́ Filipi kwil sɔkɔ, pépi nónó sɔkɔ yísyɔ́-á yah tɛ̃́pú ànɛ̂ yòhnɩ̀nmɔpulɛ, nónó-á yáhntɔkɔnsàhnɔ́lɛ.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ mâh sõ yé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, mè n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́.
Gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ mě nírílɛ n pɩ yé pól tyɩ́ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ,
yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ ńmɔ yòhnɩ̀nmɔpulɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sɔkɔ, à tɔkɔ ké tyah sõ duku tyɩ́, pópó à pɔ syɩ núkúnúkú tyɩ́.
Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ sɔkɔ nɛ, Liyel nɛ̂-á tyah tõ̀ pèpɛy mɛ̀nɛ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ, wǎh kɩ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ kɩ kélɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ, pópó kɩ pɔ syɩ ké pɩ́ntɛnɔ tyɩ́ Yesu Krista syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ.

Yé tyɩ́ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́. Képah ye, ké yah ye yé pól tyɩ́ sõnɔlɛ ń sɔkɔ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ. Yépi tɔ vyãh mɛ yõ̀bènɔrɩ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, Liyel-á nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ ń tyɩ́ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ máh sõ̀ mɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n wah gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, à kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ gbɩ-á kélɛ.
Liyel ye ńmɔ tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ, Yesu Krista tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ ńmɔ sɔkɔ, képah-á ń nɩ kɔ̃ kè n yɔrɩ yé tyɩ́lɛ.
Máh mɛ Liyellɛ n ni yé tyɩ́ tir nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, képah ye yɔ̀ nɛ: Tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, kè nɛ n yuku yahlɛ, yé kɔ̃ yé pɩ lékã́m névyelɛ, ànɛ̂ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́púlɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, tyi nónó-á yɩ̃nɛ kal, yé kɩ sépilɛ n yah n tɔkɔ n pnɛ. Képah-à pɩ, yé kɩ mɛ yályál wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ yé tyɩ́ Krista syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ tyi póllɛ n pɩ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, Liyel yĩn kɔ̃ kè kɩ pɩ gblò, tɛ́ kɩ n gbilki.
Ń yṹnpyé, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé pɩ̃ nɛ, tir nɛ̂-á ńmɔ yĩni tɛ̃, kǎh yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ yah yúkúnɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ tɔ̃́rɩ́ kéte nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á ńnɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ, nɛ́npɔ́ tãn pól ànɛ̂ no tɛ́lɔ́ pól pɩ̃ nɛ, Krista tõ̀ yĩn-á ńnɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé-á ńmɔ wɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, wãn mɔ pé kan Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yõ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé nɩ tɔ̃ gbah syãh, pè Liyel wɛynɛ n yo tíkí kɛ̃́nɛ.
Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye, túkù mɛ ńmɔ dyɔ yɔ yĩnnɛ Krista tyɩ́lɛ n yo à pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɔkɔ n pɩ fṍnfṍ ńmɔlɛ. Ǹtɛ túkù tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ kélɛ n yo sõnɔ pèplɔlɛ pé sɔkɔ.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ ye pépi n pɩ képahlɛ. Pè pɩ̃ nɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir gbɩ yo n wah yĩn-á ńnɛ ásõ̂.
Ǹtɛ nónó tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á Krista tyɩ́lɛ n yo à ńmɔlɛ n fwo, pépi sõnɔ náh mɛ plɛ. Pè mɛ n sõ nɛ páh kɩ wãn mɔ n pi ńmɔ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ dénɔ́ yèvyãhrɩ yõ.
Ǹtɛ képah náh mɛ tir yɔ́lɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́. Kè sɔ̃́ pɩ sõnɔ túkù sɔkɔ ò, kè sɔ̃́ pɩ sõnɔ pèpɛy sɔkɔ ò, Krista tyɩ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ n yo. Képah ye, kè mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ ńmɔ pɩ̃ nɛ yépi nírí ànɛ̂ Yesu Krista Mirki yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ, yĩ mɛ̀-á mɛ n pi ńmɔ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ. Képah ye, ń nɩ kɩ tɔ̃ n vɩ n yuku n pi yahlɛ.

Máh mɛ nɛ̂ syɩkɩ tɛ̃ kègbɩlɛ, tɛ́ ń gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ mɛ ké yõ, képah ye nɛ, sen káh ń tɛ̃ ń tyípɩ́nɩ́ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ póllɛ. Ńmɔ sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ sɔkɔ núkúnúkú ànɛ̂ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ nɛ, mâh se wũ min sɔkɔ ò, mâh se ku ò, képah-á kɩ Kristalɛ n gbilki.
