Yé náh wɛ di, ńmɔ mɛ́nɔ́ yõlɛ min sɔkɔ, Krista gbilki yĩn ye. Tɛ́ kúnɔ́lɛ, yõre wɛ́nɔ́ ye kélɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ min sɔkɔ tɛ̃̀nɔ́-à kɩ ńmɔ kɔ̃ mé fɛ̃ tõ̀ wɛ n pɩ n pi yõre-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, mé yɩ̃nɛ mè nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ yah n tɔkɔ wɛ́?
Ńmɔ mɛ tɔ̀tɔ̀ sõnɔ sɔkɔ. Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé yal kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ mé n kyɩ n tɛ̃ Kristalɛ, képah tyɩ́ mɛ kal ń tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ ń tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ min sɔkɔ, yõ mɛ képah tyɩ́ kal yépi yĩnnɛ.
Ń sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ, ànɛ̂ mé pɩ̃ nɛ máh kɩ wũ, kɩ n tɛ̃ n pi yé póllɛ, yé yah yuku yĩn ànɛ̂ yé nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ wɛ yĩnnɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, ńmɔ syɩ́npɔnɔlɛ yé tnɔ̂, kè kɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ Yesu Kristalɛ n gbah n gbilki.

Nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-á tah kal, yé yé minnɛ n pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ Krista Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, máh kɩ sɔ̃́ pɔ wil yé tyɩ́ ò, máh kɩ sɔ̃́ pɔ n wìl-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ yé tyɩ́ ò, mé kɩ mɛ yé tyɩ́lɛ n nohnɩ nɛ yáh mɛ su yĩn gbáhkɩ̀ núkú yõ sõnɔ núkúlɛ yé sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ so wɛ̃ tyɩ́ à gbah tɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yah yúkúnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Yé káh yɛ yé sépɛ́bɩ́ kɔ̃ pè yé wore tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ ye pè kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ pé tyɩ́ yɩkɩ yɩkɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ-á pélɛ, tɛ́ yépi-á mɛ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ. Liyel ye n pɩ sépi póllɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel ye yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́ yé kɔ̃ yé pɩ Krista yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Tɛ́ kè náh yĩn ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, yé kɩ tɔ̃ yèvyãhrɩ tɔ wɛ n pɩ n pi ǹmɔ yĩnnɛ.

Yépi ye mɛ mɛ́kɩ̀lɛ n fwo Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yah yúkúnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, sɔ̃́-á lésõ yé ń wɛ mé mɛ ké mɛ́kɩ̀lɛ n fwo. Tɛ́ ńmɔ mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́ kélɛ. Yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ ó.

Yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Kristalɛ, kè mɛ sṍrélɛ n mɔ yé sɔkɔ. Ǹ tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á yé sɔkɔ, kè mɛ yé nnɔlɛ n sũ. Yé wrɔ́ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Liyel Mirkilɛ. Yé mɛ wɛ̃ yãmnɛ n yah, tɛ́ mɛ pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, núkúnúkú tɛ̃̀nɛ, yé nɛ n sah núkú yõ. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ dùkù núkú yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n mɛ yé sɔkɔ, yè mó yé fɔkɔ táh ànɛ̂ yé sõnɔ pɩ núkúlɛ. Yâh képah pɩ, nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ye yé kɩ mɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ńmɔ sɔkɔ.
Yé káh tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n pɩ wɛ̃ fwónɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tiki n mɔ, yè mó no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ n tɔkɔ n pɩ fṍnfṍ yé gblɔ̌ynɛ.
Yé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh nɛ n yah ǹ yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tyi ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, yé nɛ n sõ n kal no tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Sõnɔ nɛ̂ dùkù-á sõ̀ mɛ Yesu Krista sɔkɔ, yé yɛ kénɛ sõnɔ dùkù nɛ̂ mɛ yépi tɔ sɔkɔ.
Ǹmɔ mɛ núkúlɛ Liyellɛ,
tɛ́ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹnɛ, à náh sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ káhkáh.
Ǹtɛ à sépi pól wɛ yɛ
tɛ́ ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ yɔ̃̀lɛ,
à ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ névilɛ.
No pól sõ̀ ǹnɛ n pnɛ névilɛ.
À ǹ gblɔ̌y tiki mɔ
à n sah Liyel tyɩ́ yõ,
à syi pɔ dahnɩ yõ kũ ku.
Képah ye, Liyel mɛ ǹmɔ dɔkɔ sah kal no póllɛ,
tɛ́ yĩ́n-ńsah ǹgbɛ̃nɛ à kɔ̃ kal no tɛ́lɔ́ póllɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, yî nónó pól-á mɛ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ,
ànɛ̂ sétáh yõ, ànɛ̂ lékókwíl,
sé pól kɩ sé gbètukunɔ di Yesu yah sɔkɔ,
tɛ́ kɩ n yo nɛ Yesu Krista-á TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃NƐ,
Sú Liyel yĩn kɔ̃ kè kɩ n gbilki.

Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, máh sõ̀ mɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ tɛ́ yé mɛ n nohnɩ sɔ̃́ ń tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, núkúnúkú mé náh mɛ yé wrɔ́, ǹtɛ mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ yé wãn mɔ sɛ̃́ yé nòhnɩ̀nɔ́ yõ. Yáh fyɔ̀ pwah mɔ, yé tõ̀lɛ nɛ n pɩ tíkí ànɛ̂ wílsyahrɩ sɔkɔ képah yĩnnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel ye n dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ dékèlɛ à yɩ̃nɛ ǹmɔ-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́, ǹ tɛ́ ké pɩ́nɔ́ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ yé kɔ̃ yě kélɛ n pɩ à yɩ̃nɛ ǹmɔ-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́.
Yé tyi póllɛ nɛ n pɩ wɛ̀nkyɔ̃ wɛ́kɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ànɛ̂ yékã̂b kɛ̃́nɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ pɩ pèkè kɛ̃́ névyelɛ, pè náh wɛ́nyo-ńsah wɛ n pi yé tyɩ́. Yé kɩ pɩ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ, lékàh kɛ̃́ névyelɛ kèkõyṍ névye wrɔ́, pépi nónó-á yĩ́nvǐ ànɛ̂ nɛ́pêl ó pé tɔ̂ɔ́. Yépi yɩ̃nɛ yè pɩ kyòolɛ pé tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á ńwɔ̃́ kèpyelɛ kyòo yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ wɛy nɛ̂-á minnɛ névyelɛ n kɔ̃, yé képah yo pé tyɩ́. Képah-à pɩ, kè kɩ pɩ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ Krista syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ. Tɛ́ kè kɩ tɔ̃ kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ máh yèvyãhrɩ ànɛ̂ tã̀n nónó pɩ sɔkɔ, sè náh pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ.
Yépi-á yèvyãhrɩ nɛ̂ pɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ, ńmɔ-à kɩ sɔ̃́ mɛ yɩ̃nɛ mè n ko n pɩ sárkálɛ à tahlɩ képah tyɩ́ ò, nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ye kélɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ mé mɛ ké nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ yé tɔlɛ.
Yépi tɔlɛ, yé nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, yè ké nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ ńmɔlɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ nɛ máh kɩ Timote tõ yé tyɩ́ kè náh tɔ̃ n mo n pi. Képah sɔkɔ, wàh kɩ kyɩ yah yé tyɩ́ tɛ́ ǹ syɩ, à kɩ pɔ yé tyɩ́ kèdùkù wɛ yo ń syah ń nɩ kɔ̃ kè kɩ de.
Yé náh wɛ di, ǹmɔ ó mɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ nɛ̂ nɩ-á mɛ n yɔrɩ yé tyɩ́lɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
No tɛ́lɔ́ pól tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ n yah pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ tyi ó tyɩ́, pé dyɔ náh mɛ n kwnɛ Yesu Krista tõ̀ tyɩ́lɛ.

Ǹtɛ Timotelɛ, yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sɔkɔ-á à kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, tõ̀npɩ pèpɛy-á pélɛ. À ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ tõ̀ sɔkɔ ńmɔlɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á wɛ̃́npir tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ǹ sú tyɩ́.
Képah ye, ń tyɩ́-à kɩ fyɔ̀ pɔ sah gbáhkɩ̀ núkú yõ, ǹmɔ ye mé mɛ n yah nɛ máh kɩ núkú tõ yé tyɩ́.
Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ gbõ̀ yõ, ńmɔ ńtɛ̃ tɔ-á kɩ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ kè náh n mo n pi.

Ǹtɛ mé kè wɛ, mé yɩ̃nɛ mè ń yṹnpi Yepafroditi kɔ̃ à ǹ syɩ n yuku yé tĩ̀nnɛ. Ń kɔ́-ò ye ǹnɛ, tõ̀ núkú pɩ́pú ànɛ̂ mɛ́kɩ̀ núkú fwópú tɔ̃ álɛ. Yépi ye ń fyã̀hnɔ́ wɛ, tɛ́ à wilki tõ ń tyɩ́ à pɔ ń yohnɩ mɔ.
Yé pól wɛ dékè mɛ à tɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́, tɛ́ yáh noh ǹ yɔ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, kè mɛ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ ǹ tyɩ́.

Kègbɩ yõ, à sõ̀ mɛ n yɔ. Fárkɔ fárkɔ à náhkɩ ku. Ǹtɛ Liyel mɛ ǹ yãm yah. Tɛ́ kè náh pɩ nɛ ǹmɔ ó yãm sɔ̃́ à yah dɛ́, ńmɔ tɔ yãm ye à yah wãn kɔ̃ kè náh n mɔ n pi ń yèkwɔrɩ yõ.
Képah ye, mé kɩ à kɔ̃ à kɩ ǹ syɩ yuku súú yé tĩ̀nnɛ, yé kɔ̃ yáh kɩ à wɛ, kè pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ yé tyɩ́ ńtɔ̃, kwâh mó wilki ńmɔ tɔ yèkwɔrɩ sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, yé à tɛ̃ plɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩnnɛ, yè mó sɛ̃́nknɔ névyelɛ nɛ n sõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Krista tõ̀ yĩn ye à ku farkɩ. Yépi-á nɛ yé ńmɔ yohnɩ n mɔ yî nónónɛ, tɛ́ yé náh fɛ̃ n pɔ sélɛ ń kɔ̃ n pi yé gblɔ̌y, ǹmɔ fɛ̃ syi kũ dlo gbal à sè syi pɔ ń kɔ̃.

Ń yṹnpyé, yé nɛ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ yĩnnɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ. Máh tyi nónó yo sɔkɔ tɛ yé tyɩ́, kè náh mɛ kwlɔ́nɔ́lɛ ń tyɩ́ kɩ tɔ̃ ń syɩ sè wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ yé tyɩ́. Képah ńtɛ̃ ye kɩ yépi yohnɩ mɔ yékɩ tɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ pèpɛy yõ.
Yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ tõ̀ntùkù pɩ́púlɛ, kénɛ pãhlɔlɛ, pépi nónó kõ̀kè kõ̀nɔ́-á wil fɩ̃́ yɔ́ ó kã̀mnɔ́lɛ.

Ké gbɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ, ápi wɔ ye kõ kõ̀kè pèpɛynɛ, képah nɛ̂-á Liyel yĩn gbílkínɔ́lɛ ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ. Kè mɛ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́lɛ á tyɩ́ áyáh wɛ kwrɔ mɔ Yesu Kristalɛ tɛ́ á náh mɛ á gbõ̀ sah á gblɔ̌y yõ.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ fɛ̃ ǹ gbõ̀ sah n pi ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ, gbɩ kɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ wɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́ kal tɛ̃̀nɛ kɩ ń gbõ̀ sah ń gblɔ̌y yõ,

ńmɔ nɛ̂-á kõ ń dúbínɔ́ sèpĩ̀n kwǎrtɔ̃́-ò sõlɛ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ pɩ Yisrayel nɛynɛ à wil Bɛ̃nsyamɛ yìkì sɔkɔ. Yebreke ye ńnɛ, ń dúbípúlɛ Yebreni ye pélɛ. Nsyifunɔ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́pú nónó-á pè n ye Farisi wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́púlɛ, pépi sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ ye sõ̀ ńnɛ.
Tɛ́ à yuku gbáhntɛ̃nɔ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ kénɛ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé sõ̀ mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ n fõh. À tɔ̃ yuku kénɛ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, nɛy náh sõ̀ fɛ̃ lékàhlɛ n kɔ̃ n pi.
Ǹtɛ kénɛ tyi nónó-á sõ̀ mɛ yõre tyilɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́, núkúnúkú mé mɛ pɔ sè wɛ syɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ tyilɛ Krista yĩnnɛ.

Gbɩ yõ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista wɛ́npɩ̃nɔ-á pɩ pèpɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́, képah yĩnnɛ mé mɛ tyi nɔ́pi póllɛ n yah syɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ tyilɛ. Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé pɩ Krista tyɩ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ ń wrɔ́ mó kwrɔ mɔ ǹnɛ. Képah ye ń kɔ̃ mé fɛ̃ syi ń náh vi tyi pól kɔ̃, tɛ́ sé póllɛ n yah tũ̀ yõ yî tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Mé náh tɔ̃ mɛ n sõ nɛ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́-á pɩ ńnɛ tómm dɛ́. Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye mé pɩ tómm. Liyel ye n pɩ névilɛ tómm Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Ńmɔ-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ képah ye yɔ̀ nɛ, mé Krista pɩ̃ ànɛ̂ tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ̂-á yilki mɔ ǹ lékólɛ, ànɛ̂ ń vyãh mó wɛ ǹ yèvyãhrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé mó n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ ǹ ku dùkù sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, ń sõnɔ kɩ mɛ ké yõ nɛ ń tɔ lékó-á kɩ pɔ n yilki n mɔ n pi.

Kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ nɛ̂-á mé n yah n kɔ̃ mé sɔ̃́ kè wɛ tɛ, ànɛ̂ ń tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ pɛkɩ syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ mé mɛ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ ń tólɔ́lɛ nɛ mé gbah n tɛ̃ mé kè wɛ, képah nɛ̂ yĩn-á Krista ń ye pɩ ǹmɔ ó tyɩ́lɛ.
Ɔ̃́ɔ̃ dɛ́ ń yṹnpyé, kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ ńmɔ sɔ̃́ kè wɛ tɛ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-á mé mɛ n pɩ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Tyi nónó-á sɔkɔ tɛ, mě ń dyɔ mɔ n fwɔ sépi tyɩ́lɛ, ǹ tɛ́ yah tĩ̀n tyɩ́lɛ n yɩ̃kɩ.
Mé mɛ n to ké yĩ̀nnɛ n yɩ̃kɩ yõre wɛ yĩnnɛ Liyel-á álɛ n ye nɛ á pɔ nɛ̂ syi yĩ̂nyõ, Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ.
Ápi nónó pól Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á de yĩn, sɛ̃́ ye á yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n sõ. Ǹtɛ sõnɔ káhkɩ́-à kɩ se mɛ yé sɔkɔ tir yɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, Liyel kɩ tɔ̃ képah dùkùlɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ.
Kàh kɩ sɔ̃́ n pɩ sɔ̃́, áyáh mɛ n kɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ nɛ̂ yõ à pɔ syɩ núkúnúkú tyɩ́, á ye yɔ̃ sɔkɔ nɛ n yuku yahlɛ képah ó yõ.
Ń yṹnpyé, yé ńmɔlɛ n yah n pɩ. Áyáh pɩ dùkù nɛ̂ wɛ̃kɩ, nónó-á mɛ képah wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ, yé pépilɛ n yah n pɩ.

Mé ye kè yo sɔkɔ tɛ yé tyɩ́ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ, tɛ́ tɔ̃ mɛ ń syɩ kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́ gbní sɔkɔ núkúnúkú nɛ, Yesu Krista dahnɩ yõ kúnɔ́-á nɛ̂nɛ n pɛkɩ, névye náhnáh pɩ dùkù-á mɛ kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ pǎh mɛ kélɛ n fwo.

Pépi tyɩ́-á kɩ pɔ n yɩkɩ n pi ké tyɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ. Pé kèkùrn-á pɩ pé líyellɛ. Tir nɛ̂-á sennɛ pè tɛ̃ n pi, pè n nɛ mɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki képah sɔkɔ. Kèkõyṍ yî ó tyɩ́-á pépi n nɛ n sõ.
Ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ sú fṍ mɛ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ, ńyãh sɔkɔ-á á pwáhnmɔ-ò nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Kristalɛ, à kɩ n wil n pɔ n pi, áyáh mɛ ǹmɔ nɛ̂nɛ n dɛkɩ.

Ápi wil gbɛ̃́nsê nɛ̂-á sohkɩ kɛ̃́nɛ, à kɩ pɔ kè vi mɔ pɩ ǹmɔ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, nɛ̂-á gbílkínɔ́ mɛ n sah ké yõ. Ǹ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye à kɩ pɩ képahlɛ, nɛ̂-á yíyìn pól kɔ̃ sè n sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.

Képah ye ń yṹnpyé pèplɔ, yé gbah n tɛ̃ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ yè yé sõnɔ sah yĩ́ĩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ. Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, yé wɛ dékè mɛ ń kah tɛ̃. Yépi ye ńmɔ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ yõlɛ, ànɛ̂ yépi ye yɔ̃ ńmɔ yõlɛ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Yevodi ànɛ̂ Sɛ̃tisyi tyɩ́ nɛ, pè pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ n mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ áwɔ nɛ̂-á tõ̀ núkú pɩ́-ò pèpɛynɛ ńmɔlɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á tyɩ́ nɛ á Yevodi ànɛ̂ Sɛ̃tisyi yohnɩ n mɔ pé wrɔ́ kɔ̃ kè kwrɔ n mɔ. Yah, syɔ́ yísyɔ́ ye pélɛ, nónó-á so mɔ ńmɔ tyɩ́ á gbah tɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yah yúkúnɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Klema tɔ sõ̀ mɛ pélɛ, ànɛ̂ ń tõ̀ núkú pɩ́pú tɛ́lɔ́lɛ, pépi nónó yni-á mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min névye yni sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ.
Yé nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ yĩnnɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Mé kélɛ n tɔ̃ n yo yé tyɩ́, yé nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Yé yah, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ pɔ́nɔ́ mɛ yúkɛy. Yé yɛ no pól yélɛ n pnɛ nɛ́péplɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé káh n yɛ yé yáh-ńsah tyɛ tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ. Tɛ́ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, kwâh nɛ̂ yétõ̂-à yé tɛ̃, yé kè ni Liyel tyɩ́ nírí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, yè mó wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ ǹ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ, ǹ yèvɩnɩ nɛ̂-á kǎn pɩ névi sõnɔlɛ, képah kɩ yáh-ńsah tyɛ́nɔ́ yah kõ dénɔ́lɛ yé nnɔ ànɛ̂ yé sõnɔ sɔkɔ, yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ.

Nɛ̂-á mé kɩ yo yé tyɩ́ ké tyɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ ń yṹnpyé, tyi nónó-á mɛ gblɔlɛ, tɛ́ yɩ̃nɛ gbílkínɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ tyi nónó-á mɛ tómtóm tɛ́ mɛ yályál, ànɛ̂ tyi nónó tyɩ́-á kɩ fɛ̃ nɔ névi tyɩ́ tɛ́ à kɩ sè fɛ̃ syi, ànɛ̂ tyi nónó-á mɛ tyípénàllɛ tɛ́ mɛ n mɔ n kõ, yé yɛ sépi ó nɛ mɛ yé sõnɔ sɔkɔ.

Yáh tyi nónó sãh ńmɔ tyɩ́, tɛ́ nónó wɛ tɔkɔ ńmɔ tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ yáh tyi nónó noh ńmɔ tyɩ́, tɛ́ ń wɛ mé mɛ tyi nónónɛ n pɩ, yé nɛ n kɔ sépi wã̀l yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel kɩ mɛ yélɛ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yèvɩnɩnɛ n kɔ̃.

Mé nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ tɛ̃ wɛ kè wɛ wɛ̃kɩ ńtɔ̃ nɛ ń tyɩ́-á mɛ tah yé tyɩ́. Ń tyɩ́ sõ̀ mɛ tah yé tyɩ́, ǹtɛ yé náh sõ̀ mɛ syɔ̃̀-ǹsah wɛ à fɛ̃ kélɛ ń wɛ̃kɩ.
Kè náh pɩ nɛ ń fyã̀hnɔ́ sɔ̃́ ń kɔ̃ mé képahlɛ n yo dɛ́. Máh nɛ̂ sãh képah ye yɔ̀ nɛ, kè sɔ̃́ dùkù nɛ̂ ólɛ, kè n nɛ n mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́.

Mé ń minnɛ n pɩ n pnɛ yãm sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ kélɛ n pɩ n pnɛ tahrɩ sɔkɔ. Tyi pól sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ duke duke pól sɔkɔ, ńmɔ n fɛ̃ ń minnɛ nɛ n pɩ. Kàh se tɛ̃kɩ sɔkɔ ò, kàh se kwɛkɩ sɔkɔ ò, mé ń gblɔ̌y dar mɔ sépi póllɛ. Mé ń minnɛ n pɩ n pnɛ tahrɩ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ kélɛ n pɩ n pnɛ fyã̀hnɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Mé kɩ fɛ̃ tyi pól pɩ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tǎhkɩ̀lɛ ńnɛ n kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, yé pɩ plɛ gbõ̀ dáhbɩ́nɔ́lɛ ń tyɩ́ ń yèvyãhrɩ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ.

Filipi tãn, yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ, Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ tyah gbĩ́nɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mé yal Masedonɩ sɔkɔ, à wil yépi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ yépi nónó-á pɩ soh ńmɔlɛ à kwâhlɛ ń kɔ̃, tɛ́ kwâh wɛ syi ń tyɩ́, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh tɔ̃ kwâhlɛ ń kɔ̃.
Gbĩ́ nɛ̂ ńtɛ̃ fyé-á sõ̀ mé mɛ Tesaloniki kwil sɔkɔ, gbáhyĩ́ núkú ó náh yé tɛkɩ mɔ ń tyɩ́ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔlɛ.
Kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ mé sɔ̃́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, yé yîlɛ nɛ n yɩ̃ ńnɛ n kɔ̃ dɛ́, ǹtɛ mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ wãn mɔ yé pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ yõre wɛ́nɔ́ yõ.

Yáh yî nónó pól tɛkɩ mɔ ń tyɩ́, mé sè wɛ syi, kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh tɔ̃ mɛ ń tɛkɩ. Yepafroditi-á fyɔ̀ pɔ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔlɛ ń kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á yé à kɔ̃ nɛ à pɔ ń kɔ̃, mé núkú pɩ kwâh nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ. Kénɛ yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ mɛ̀nɛ, tyípépɛ̌y ye kélɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, wǎh nɛ̂ fɛ̃ syi, tɛ́ ké tyɩ́ nɔ ǹ tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ Liyel nɛ̂-á tahrɩlɛ ǹ tyɩ́ tyɛ́tyɛ́nɩ́ kɛ̃́, à kɩ syɔ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́, kɩ yé yétõ̂ yî póllɛ yé kɔ̃.
Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ápi Sú Liyel yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina!
Yesu Krista yĩn yõ, yé wɛynɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nɛ́núkù núkú pól kɔ̃ ń tyɩ́ . Ń yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á mɛ ńnɛ ásõ̂, pé tɔ n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́.
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́, ké dú dɔkɔ nónó-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ Sesar tyɩ́ ásõ̂ sɔkɔ.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ nɛ n pɩ yé pól tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á pɩ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ, ńmɔ ànɛ̂ á yṹnpi Timote ye

n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ yépi tyɩ́, yépi nónó-á pɩ Liyel nolɛ Kolɔsɩ kwil sɔkɔ, tɛ́ pɩ á yṹnpyé Krista yõ sɛ̃́pú kègblɔlɛ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ. Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Sú Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ, à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́ à mó yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Liyel nɛ̂-á á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista Súlɛ, gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ áyâh ǹnɛ n ni, à n nɛ n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ yé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, á sé tyɩ́ yónɔ́ noh.
Gbɩ wɛy nɛ̂-á Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ wɛynɛ, ké yĩ́níntɛ̃nɔ gbennɛ yé tyɩ́, képah sɔkɔ ye yé noh kélɛ nɛ gbõ̀ sàh-ǹsah yɔ́-á mɛ yé tyɩ́ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ yé gbõ̀ sah ké yõ.

Kénɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir mɛ̀-á yĩni tɛ̃ yépi tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, kǎh sõ̀ mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ n tɔ̃ mɔ kèkõyṍ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ sɔ̃́, sɛ̃́ kélɛ yépi tɔ tĩ̀nnɛ, à tɔkɔ sõ nɛ̂-á yé kè pɩ̃ kègbɩ yõ sɔkɔ nɛ Liyel-á yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́.
Ápi nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́ Yepafratɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ tõ̀ núkúlɛ n pɩ ápilɛ, ǹmɔ ye kɔ̃ yélɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ mɛ̀nɛ. Krista tõ̀npɩ nɛ́gbɩ́ ye ǹnɛ nɛ̂-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yépi tyɩ́.
Liyel Mirki-á tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂ dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ, à ké tyɩ́ yo á tyɩ́.

Képah ye, ápi tɔ-á yé tyɩ́ noh sõ nɛ̂nɛ, à tɔkɔ lésõ tyɩ́, á náh mɛ yal mɔ nírí pɩ́nɔ́lɛ yé tyɩ́. Á mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́nɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ pallɛ, yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ ànɛ̂ lékã́m gbõ̀ yõ nónó-á n wil ǹ Mirki tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ n kɔ à yɩ̃nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ, kɩ ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Yé kɩ tyípéplɔ duke póllɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ kɩ Liyellɛ n gbah n pɩ̃ n yuku yahlɛ.
Á mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ, sɔ̃̀nko yé fɛ̃ tyi póllɛ n sro.

Yé wɛkɩ Sú Liyel tyɩ́ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tɛ̃́nwɛnɔlɛ yé kɔ̃ yé vyãh kɔ̃ kè wɛ ǹ pèpɔrɩ wɛ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, wǎh képah nɛ̂ yah sah ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ kyòo sɔkɔ kɩ névye kɔ̃, nónó-á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
À ye á yɔrɩ tɛ̃ syi fɛ̃́ntũ̂ tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀, tɛ́ á dah mɔ ǹ nɩ̀dɛ̀ Pídĩ́ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Kénɛ Pídĩ́ gbõ̀ yõ ye á pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, tɛ́ á tyípêl mɛ yɔ̃ mɔ á tyɩ́.
Liyel nɛ̂-á à náh n wɛ yĩ́nɛ, Krista mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Ǹmɔ ye Liyel Pi gbennɛ. À mɛ Liyel gbɛ̃̀npɩnɔ pól yõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye yíyìn pól mɔ.
Kè se yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ ò, kè se sétáh yõ sɔkɔ ò,
kè se yî nónó-á n wɛ yĩ́nɛ ò, kè se nónó náh n wɛ yĩ́nɛ ò,
kè se mréy tǎhkɩ̀nɔ́lɛ ò, kè se névye fnɛ̀pulɛ ò, kè se yõ̀tãmnɔ́lɛ ò, kè se tɔ̃́rɩ́ yõ névyelɛ ò,
ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye pé pól mɔ, ànɛ̂ pé pól mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ.
Ǹmɔ yíyìn pól dyah tɛ̃,
yíyìn pól mɛ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ.
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yõ̀tɛ̃̀ ye ǹmɔlɛ, pépi nónó-á ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ.
Ǹmɔ ye tyàh-ǹsahlɛ,
ǹmɔ lékó ǹgbò ye yilki mɔ,
sɔ̃̀nko ǹmɔ pɩ gbennɛ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, kè ye nɔ Liyel tyɩ́ à tɛ̃ ǹmɔ sɔkɔ ǹ tɔ̂ɔ́.
Tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé névye ànɛ̂ yíyìn pól wrɔ́ tɔ̃ sah péwɔ Liyellɛ, Krista gbõ̀ yõ.
Liyel Pídĩ́ mɛ̀ kúnɔ́lɛ dahnɩ yõ, képah gbõ̀ yõ ye yèvɩnɩ wɛ Liyel ànɛ̂ no pól wrɔ́
sétáh yõ ànɛ̂ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ.
Ǹgbòlɛ, yépi tɔ wrɔ́ lésõ mɛ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ Liyellɛ. Sépɛ́rɩ́ lésõ mɛ yé wrɔ́ ǹnɛ yé sõnɔ túkúnì ànɛ̂ yé tyítúkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, ǹ Pídĩ́-á wil gbɛ̃́nsê sɔkɔ kũ nɛ̂ ku, képah gbõ̀ yõ ye Liyel yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ mɔ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ, nɛ yé pɔ yĩn péwɔ yah sɔkɔ yályál pèkè kɛ̃́nɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ yé tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ yé yɩ̃nɛ yè Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tɛ̃ yĩn gbã́hngbã́h, yé yĩn dùkù mó nɛ n mɛ pallɛ. Yé gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ nɛ̂ yõ à tɔkɔ yé Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir noh sõ dùkù tyɩ́, yè káh pɔ gbɛ mɔ kélɛ. Kénɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir ye yo kèkõyṍ névye pól tyɩ́, képah nɛ̂ tõ̀ sɔkɔ-á ńmɔ Pollɛ.

Máh mɛ yèvyãhrɩ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ yépi yĩnnɛ, núkúnúkú mé mɛ képah nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, ńmɔ mɛ ń gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ à Krista yèvyãhrɩ tɛ́y tɔkɔ n pɩ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yĩnnɛ, pépi nónó-á ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsêlɛ.
Ńmɔ pɩ tõ̀npɩlɛ yépi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á tõ̀ mɛ̀ dahbɩ sɔ̃́ ń gbõ̀ yé yĩnnɛ. À kè dahbɩ ń gbõ̀ nɛ mé pé wɛy pól yo,
képah nɛ̂-á pɩ Liyel sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tirlɛ, nɛ̂-á à mɛ no pól wɔ̃bɩ sah kélɛ ǹgbò dùkùlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ kélɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì wɔ wɛ̃kɩ núkúnúkú.

Yõre ǹgbɛ̃ ànɛ̂ tɔ̃́rɩ́ nɛ̂-á mɛ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, képah ye sõ̀ Liyel mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé wɛ̃kɩ. Sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir mɛ̀ wɛ yɔ̀: «Kristalɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, yé gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ kɩ mɛ Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ wɛ́nɔ́ yõ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.»

Ǹmɔ tyɩ́ ye á mɛ n yo no pól tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ ké gbáhdyâhlɛ n di n sah nɛ́núkù núkú pól tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ n kwɔ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ duke pól sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko no pól Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ de yĩn pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ.
Képah yĩn ye mé mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ, mɛ ń tah sah syikey sɔkɔ Krista tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ, nɛ̂-á mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ ńmɔ sɔkɔ.
Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé pɩ̃ nɛ máh mɛ mɛ́kɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n fwo yépi ànɛ̂ Lawodise tãn yĩnnɛ, à tahlɩ nónó ńtɛ̃ tɔ pól-á pè náh ń wɛ yah yĩ́nɛ.
Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ nɩ̀sãh wɛ pé sɔkɔ, pè mó pɩ núkúlɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ, lékã́m mó nɛ mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ pé sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, pè kɩ Liyel tir wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́ pɩ̃, nɛ̂-á pɩ Kristalɛ.
Yõre nɛ̂-á yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ ànɛ̂ pnɛ̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ, ké pól mɛ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nɔ́lɛ ǹmɔ sɔkɔ.
Mé tir mɛ̀nɛ n yo yé tyɩ́ sɔ̃̀nko ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh n pɔ yé pilki vyã́hsesyɩ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Gbɩ ye, ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh mɛ yélɛ fɩ̃́ núkú sɔkɔ ó, ǹtɛ mé mɛ yélɛ sõnɔ sɔkɔ. Ń nɩ mɛ vɩ́nɔ́lɛ yélɛ, máh kè wɛ yé mɛ yé tah sah tɛ́ mɛ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ koh tɛ̃ yĩn gbã́hngbã́h.
Yáh fyɔ̀ kè fɛ̃ syi nɛ yé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á Yesu Kristalɛ, yé yé minnɛ n pɩ yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ sɔkɔ ǹmɔlɛ.

Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, yé yɛ ké yã̀hnɩ̀ nɛ n mɛ dínyĩnɔlɛ ǹ sɔkɔ, yè mó yé min póllɛ n pɩ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ yõ. Yé nɛ mɛ sṹnyĩnɔlɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ sɔ̃́-á pè yé kwɔ kélɛ, yè mó pɩ Liyel pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́pú ǹgbnɔlɛ.
Yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ sɔ̃̀nko ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh n pɔ tyídî ànɛ̂ kèkõyṍ tyi tɔkɔ à yé pilki tɛ̃ mɩ̀nɩ̀ tyilɛ, ǹ névi yõ̀tàhsyi lékã́mnɛ. Sè náh mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ núkú yõ Krista tyilɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ Krista sɔkɔ ǹ tɔ̂ɔ́.
Yíyìn pól mɛ yépi tyɩ́ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ. Ǹmɔ ye yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ ànɛ̂ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔnɔ pól yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Yé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ ǹmɔlɛ, yé kõ̀kè kõ. Kénɛ kõ̀kèlɛ, névi gbõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ náh kélɛ, Krista pɩ́nɔ́ ye kélɛ sɔ̃̀nko kè á wilki á tyípékè sɔkɔ.

Yé náh wɛ di, yáh wèlnwìlkìnɔ́ wɛ ni sɔkɔ, kè mɛ á kɩ nɛ yé lékyɩ̂ sɔ̃́ yɩ̃ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ yilki mɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ sɛ̃ Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ yõ, nɛ̂-á yilki mɔ Krista lékólɛ.
Ǹgbòlɛ, yé lésõ mɛ lékyɩ̂ sɔ̃́ yé tyípêl ànɛ̂ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ yĩnnɛ. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, Liyel ye minnɛ yé kɔ̃ ànɛ̂ Kristalɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. À á tyípêl pól yɔ̃ mɔ á kɔ̃.
Áyáh Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ dêl pɩ tɛ́ lékàh nɛ̂ kɩ sõ̀ pɔ á kɔ̃ n pi, Liyel ye képah niri to á tyɩ́, tɛ́ ké tyɩ́ yɩkɩ Krista syɩ́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ dahnɩ yõ.

Yõ̀tãm ànɛ̂ tɛ̃́nwɛpu nónó-á mɛ yĩ̂nyõ, Liyel ye pé tǎhkɩ̀ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ kwèyy. À pè pɩ yɛ̀dìmɔ̀lɛ no pól tyɩ́ à n yɔrɩ n kɔ̃ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ névye tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ Krista kúnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ dahnɩ yõ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé káh n yɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yé tuke yõke képah náh pɩ wɔ wɔ kwâh yĩnnɛ. Yé káh n yɛ tɛ̃̀ yé tuke syáh yɔ́, képah náh pɩ ńwɔ̃́ sã́n yɔ́ wìlnɔ́, képah náh pɩ mɩ mɩ yòh tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Sépi póllɛ, yípéplɔ nónó-á mɛ n pi, sépi kètɔ̀ ye. Ǹtɛ ké kègbɩ tɛ̃̀nɛ, Krista ye.

Névye nónó-á n pɩ á kɩ nɛ pè sɔ̃́ mɛ pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tiki n mɔ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ yah, tɛ́ mɛ gbílkínɔ́lɛ n sah pé yõ, tɛ́ mɛ pé tah sah pé dlɛ́y tyilɛ n mɔ n kõ, yé káh yɛ pé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yé yah kõ yah yúkúnɔ́lɛ. Pé gblɔ̌y ye pè n gbilki pé fɔkɔ táh tyi sõnɔlɛ.

Krista nɛ̂-á yõlɛ, pè yahle ǹmɔ sõ̀ tɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ. Tɛ́ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye gbèl tél-ńtã̂n ànɛ̂ yãhlɔ wil gbɛ̃́nsê tã̀ntã̀n pól tel sah wɛ̃ tyɩ́, wil gbɛ̃́nsê kɔ̃ kè fɛ̃ n kyãh à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́.

Yé ku Kristalɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, tɛ́ pwah mɔ wilki kèkõyṍ sétã̀n tyi tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀. Ǹtɛ kwâh nɛ̂ pɩ tɛ́ yé tɔ̃ yé minnɛ n pɩ á kɩ nɛ yé sɔ̃́ mɛ kénɛ tyi gbõ̀ sõ̀ sɔkɔ, à fɛ̃ syi pè kɔ̃ pè yélɛ n kyɩ̃ n mɔ n mɔ sɛ̃́nknɔ tyi sɔkɔ ńtɔ̃ wɛ́? Pè n nɛ:
«Káh kwâh mɛ̀ tɔkɔ, káh kwâh mɛ̀ yõ, káh n tũ kwâh mɛ̀ tyɩ́.»
Kénɛ yî póllɛ, á kɩ fɛ̃ á gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ pɛkɩ sélɛ kɛ núkú ólɛ, tɛ́ sè kɩ pɩ yõ kɛ̃́ yîlɛ. Névye yah yĩ́ĩ́ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ye sélɛ à tahlɩ pǎh kwɔ́nɔ́ nónónɛ n kɔ̃.

Gbɩ ye gbílkínɔ́ sàhnɔ́lɛ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ yõ ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔlɛ sé yah sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ wil gbɛ̃́nsê fṍhnɔ́lɛ. Sè mɛ á kɩ nɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ tyi sɔ̃́ sélɛ. Ǹtɛ yõre náh mɛ sé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́. Névi dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi ó ye sélɛ.
Yépi tɔ lékyɩ̂-á fyɔ̀ yilki mɔ ànɛ̂ Kristalɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, yé Liyel fṍ yîlɛ n yah n kɔ̃, ńyãh sɔkɔ-á Kristalɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ Liyel gbõ̀yõ̀ sõ̀lɛ.
Yé nɛ n sõ Liyel fṍ yî tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yé káh nɛ n sõ sétáh yõ yî tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé náh wɛ di, yé ku tɛ́ yé min mɛ wɔ̃̀bɩ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ Krista sɔkɔ Liyel tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ Krista nɛ̂-á yépi minnɛ, ǹmɔ-à sõ nɛ̂nɛ wil mɔ, yépi tɔ kɩ wil mɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Tyi nónó-á pɩ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tyilɛ, yé sépi yal n mɔ, sépi nónó-á pɩ: Prɔ̀prɔ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, põ̌põ̌ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, dékè tyi pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, dékè túkúnìnɛ, à tahlɩ yĩ́sesúkú pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́, képah nɛ̂-á sãh fálnɔ́ dùkù yɔ́lɛ.
Kénɛ tyi dùkù ye n yɔrɩ n mɔ Liyel fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀nɛ ǹ yóré yáhnlepu yõ.
Ǹgbòlɛ sõ̀, yé min-á lésõ mɛ tyípékè yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ, sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ ye yé mɛ n pɩ.
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, tyi nónó-á yé yɩ̃nɛ yè milki, sè wɛ yɔ̀: Fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ mâl pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́pékè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Gbyɔ ànɛ̂ wɛ̀npèkè yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh nɛ n wil yé vyɛ̃y sɔkɔ.
Yé káh mɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ n yo wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Yé náh wɛ di, yé yé náh vi yé min pɩ dùkù kédyâh kɔ̃ tɛ, à ké tyípɩ́nɩ̀ pól milki,
tɛ́ mɛ pɩ dùkù késã́nnɛ n pɩ, képah nɛ̂-á Liyel mɛ n vi n mɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, sɔ̃̀nko yè pɩ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, yè mó ǹnɛ n pɩ̃ yuku yahlɛ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɔ yélɛ.

Képah sɔkɔ, wǎhkɩ̀ náh tɔ̃ n wɛ n pi yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ ànɛ̂ Nsyifunɔ wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, kènkõbe ànɛ̂ kõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂pú wrɔ́. Kè náh tɔ̃ mɛ á kɩ nɛ yã̀hnkõ wɔ-á yɩ̃ pɩ̃, tɛ́ ńyɔ mɛ náh yɩ̃ pɩ̃. Kè náh tɔ̃ mɛ á kɩ nɛ ńyɔlɛ yɔ̃̀-á tɛ́ ńyɔ mɛ gblɔ̌y yõ névilɛ. Nɛ̂-á mɛ n mɔ n kõ, Krista ye. Ǹmɔ ye yíyìnì póllɛ tɛ́ mɛ no pól min sɔkɔ.

Liyel-á fyɔ̀ yépi yah wilki pɩ ǹ nolɛ, à yé pɩ yályál ǹ yah sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yé tyɩ́ mɛ nɔ ǹ tyɩ́. Képah ye, yé pɩ névye yãm yáhpú, ànɛ̂ pèpɔrɩ pɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔpulɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́pír névyelɛ, ànɛ̂ nónó-á tyilɛ n sro.
Yé wɛ̃ sṍmnɔ́lɛ n pɩ. Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à sɔ̃́ pɩ de ǹ ní-ò tyɩ́, yé yɔ̃ mɔ wɛ̃ kɔ̃. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á yɔ̃ mɔ yé kɔ̃ sɔ̃́, yépi tɔ nɛ n yɔ̃ n mɔ wɛ̃nɛ n kɔ̃ sɛ̃́.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-á kal sépi póllɛ, yé tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye yé wrɔ́ kɩ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ pallɛ.
Krista yèvɩnɩ nɛ̂ mɛ yé sɔkɔ. Liyel ye yé ye kénɛ yèvɩnɩ wɛ yĩnnɛ, sɔ̃̀nko yè pɩ wil gbɛ̃́nsê núkúlɛ. Yé pɩ pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́púlɛ.

Yé yɛ Krista wɛy tõ̀ pɩ yĩ́ĩ́ yé sɔkɔ. Yé wɛ̃nɛ n kwɔ, yè mó wɛ̃nɛ n vi n mɔ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ sɔkɔ. Yé pɩ pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́púlɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yé nnɔ póllɛ, yè mó ǹnɛ n gbal, yè ǹ yĩn gbilki gbilki yɩ̀lɛ n gbɩ, à tahlɩ Liyel Mirki-á yɛ̀ nónó dahbɩ yé sɔkɔ.
Yâh tyi nónónɛ n yo tɛ́ tyi nónónɛ n pɩ, yé sélɛ n pɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩn yõ, yè wɛynɛ Sú Liyellɛ n kɔ̃ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Syɔ́, yé nɛ n sah yé pɛbɩ tyɩ́ yõ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Pɛbɩ, yé yɛ yé syɔ́ tyɩ́ nɔ yé tyɩ́, yé káh peke tɛ̃ pé yõ.
Wɛ̃́npì, yé nɛ n sah yé dúbípú tyɩ́ yõ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ. Képah ye Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́.
Dúbípú, yé káh fɔ̀kɔ̀nvyã̀hnɩ̀nɛ n mɔ yé wɛ̃́npì sɔkɔ kè kɔ̃ kè pɔ pɩ wílkúnìnɛ pé tyɩ́.

Yɔ̃bɩ, tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, yé nɛ n sah yé yõ̀tãm tyɩ́ yõ nónó-á mɛ sétáh mɛ̀ yõ. Yé káh tõ̀lɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́ pàh yélɛ n kyɔmɩ gbĩ́ nɛ̂ ólɛ, á kɩ nɛ névye dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ sɔ̃́ yé n yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ dɛ́. Ǹtɛ yé yé gblɔ̌y tiki mɔ kélɛ n pɩ fɔkɔ pérpérlɛ yáh sɔ̃́npɩlɛ mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yah tíkílɛ n pɩ.
Yâh sɔ̃́ tõ̀ nɛ̂ dùkùlɛ n pɩ, yé kélɛ n pɩ yé nnɔ póllɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ yé n pɩ kélɛ, kè káh nɛ n mɛ nɛ névi tyɩ́ sɔ̃́ yé n pɩ.
Yé pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á kɩ pɔ yépi tɔ dyah n pi yípéplɔlɛ, wǎh sépi nónó yah sah ǹ no yĩnnɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, ǹmɔ Krista ye yõ̀tɛ̃̀ kègbɩlɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á yé n pɩ tõ̀lɛ.
Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ nɛ́túkùlɛ, ǹ nɛ́túkúnì tyi lédyáhnɩ́ ye à kɩ wɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel náh wǎhkɩ̀lɛ n pɩ.
Yõ̀tãm, yé yé yɔ̃bɩlɛ n tɛ̃ n plɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ sɔkɔ, yé mó yé dyɔ sah nɛ n kwnɛ nɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ yɔ́-á mɛ yépi tɔ tyɩ́ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ.
Yé gbah n tɛ̃ nírí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Yé nírílɛ n pɩ yè pépɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛynɛ Liyellɛ n kɔ̃.

Yé Liyellɛ n ni ápi tɔ tyɩ́ sɔ̃̀nko à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ á kɔ̃ à fɛ̃ ǹ wɛynɛ n yo, ànɛ̂ mè fɛ̃ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir tyɩ́lɛ n yo nɛ̂-á Liyel wɔ̃bɩ sah Krista sɔkɔ. Képah nɛ̂ yĩn-á ńnɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Yé Liyellɛ n ni ń tyɩ́ sɔ̃̀nko à ń yah tɛ̃ ń kɔ̃ mè fɛ̃ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ tir mɛ̀nɛ n yo n wah, máh yɩ̃nɛ mè kè yo sɔ̃́.
Yé yé minnɛ n pɩ lékã́mnɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú wrɔ́. Syɔ̃̀-ǹsah-à fyɔ̀ wɛ yé tyɩ́ pèpɔrɩ pɩ pɩ tɛ̃̀nɛ pé tyɩ́, yé kè pɩ pé tyɩ́.
Yé yɛ yé wɛlɔ nóhnɔ́ nɔ névye tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ yõre mó nɛ n mɛ sé tyɩ́. Névi nɛ̂-á píkínyahnɔ pɩ, yé ké yah tɔ̃ n sah n yo tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Á yṹnpi Tisyiki nɛ̂-á ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́nɛ ànɛ̂ ń kɔ́-òlɛ tɛ́ mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ pallɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ kɩ pɔ ń tyɩ́ kèdùkù pól yo yé tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ ye wɛ tɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ ǹnɛ yé tyɩ́ nɛ à kyɩ á tyɩ́ kèdùkù yo yé syah à mó yé nɩ sũ.
Wonesimi tɔ mɛ ǹnɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á yṹnpilɛ nɛ̂-á mɛ tómm, tɛ́ pɩ á nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́nɛ. Yépi sɔkɔ yɔ́ ye ǹnɛ. Tyi nónó pól-á mɛ n pɩ ásõ̂, pè kɩ pɔ sè yãh yé syah.

Arisitarkɩ nɛ̂-á mɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ ńmɔlɛ, à n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́. Markɩ tɔ n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Barnabasɩ tyɩ́ névilɛ. Markɩ tyɩ́ kèdùkù yo sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́ nɛ wàh kɩ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, yé à tɛ̃ plɛ.
Yesu nɛ̂-á pè n ye Nsyusitusilɛ, à n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́ tɔlɛ. Nsyufunɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú sɔkɔ, pépi ó ye mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ànɛ̂ ńmɔlɛ à Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ tyɩ́lɛ n yo. Pè ń nɩ de yĩ́ĩ́ kègbɩlɛ.

Yepafrasɩ nɛ̂-á yépi sɔkɔ yɔ́lɛ, à n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́. Yesu tõ̀npɩ ye ǹnɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ yé tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ sɔ̃̀nko yè nɛ n mɛ sṹnyĩnɔlɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi pól pɩ pɩ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
À yèvyãhrɩ kah pɩ yépi ànɛ̂ Lawodise tãn, ànɛ̂ Yerapolisi tãn yĩnnɛ. Ńmɔ ńtɛ̃ kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ képah tàrfyɔ̀lɛ.
Dɔ̀ktɔ̂r dĩ́ Likyi nɛ̂-á ápi kódĩ́nɛ, à n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ Damasɩlɛ.
Á yṹnpyé nónó-á mɛ Lawodise, yé wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́ à tahlɩ Nɛfa tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì nɛ̂-á n tuke n mɔ n pɔ ǹ gbô.
Yáh kɩ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ wɛ kar, yé gbah n tɛ̃ Lawodise Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tɔ kɔ̃ pè kè wɛ n kar. Nɛ̂ tɔ-à kɩ se mó mɛ tɛkɩ mɔ pépi tyɩ́, pàh kɩ kélɛ yé kɔ̃, yé kè kar.
Yè mó n yo Arsyipi tyɩ́ nɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á tõ̀ nɛ̂ dahbɩ ǹ gbõ̀, à gbah n tɛ̃ kè pɩ pallɛ.
Ńmɔ Pole ye n wɛkɩ yé tyɩ́, tɛ́ kélɛ n wãrkɩ ń gbõ̀lɛ. Yé káh n yɛ yé dyɔ fwɔ nɛ máh mɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ, à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé pól tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ Pole, ànɛ̂ Silasɩ, ànɛ̂ Timote ye n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ yépi Tesaloniki kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, yépi nónó-á mɛ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ yõ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ Liyel yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́, à mó yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Á mɛ n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ yé pól tyɩ́ sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, tɛ́ mɛ ǹnɛ n ye n gbo yé tyɩ́.

Yáh mɛ gbah tɛ̃ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ, à yé gbõ̀ sah yĩ́ĩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ sɔ̃́, Sú Liyel ye ápi tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ, gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ á dyɔ-á mɛ n kwnɛ sélɛ.
Á yṹnpyé, yépi nónó tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel tyɩ́, á pɩ̃ nɛ wǎh yé yah wilki pɩ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, áyáh Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nɛ̂ yo yé tĩ̀nnɛ, kè náh sõ̀ pɩ vyãh wɛy gbɔy ólɛ dɛ́. Á sõ̀ mɛ kélɛ n yo tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ sɔkɔ Liyel Mirki tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ á sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ nɛ gbɩ-á kélɛ. Áyáh á gblɔ̌y tɛ̃ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́ pɛkɩ yĩnnɛ, ké sèndì náh yélɛ dò.
Ápi ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ pɩ dùkù ye yé mɛ n yah n pɩ. Yèvyãhrɩ náhnáh fyé sɔkɔ, yé Liyel wɛy fɛ̃ syi nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, ǹ Mirki-á nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ nɛ̂ mɔ yé sɔkɔ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yépi ye Masedonɩ mara ànɛ̂ Akayi mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól kɩ n yah n pɩ.

Yé náh wɛ di, à tɔkɔ yépi tĩ̀nnɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛy mɛ tɔ̃ mɔ Masedonɩ mara ànɛ̂ Akayi mara pól sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ tɔ mɛ n yãh ywɔ̃ ywɔ̃ pól sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ kè náh tɔ̃ mɛ ápi tɔ̃ képah tyɩ́lɛ n yo ńtɛ̃nɛ.

Áyáh kyɩ yé tĩ̀nnɛ tɛ́ yé á tɔ̃ sah tɛ̃ pallɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, névye pól mɛ képahlɛ n yãh; ànɛ̂ yáh yé náh vi fal fal tã̀n kɔ̃ tɛ́ yé yah mɔ Liyel tĩ̀nnɛ à tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á gbɩ Liyellɛ tɛ́ mɛ min sɔkɔ, névye pól mɛ képah tɔlɛ n yãh.
Yé mɛ ǹ Pídĩ́ Yesu syɩkɩ tɛ̃ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á kɩ wil yĩ̂nyõ kɩ n pɔ n pi. Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel ǹ lékó yilki mɔ, ǹmɔ ye kɩ ápi yõ wilki n pi Liyel tukey sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ n pi.
Á yṹnpyé, yépi ńtɛ̃ kè pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ á pɔ́nɔ́ náh pɩ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ.

Yé kè pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ áyáh yèvyãhrɩ wɛ sɔkɔ Filipi kwil sɔkɔ, ńyãh sɔkɔ-á pè fṍhnɔ́ sah á yõ tɛ́ Liyel mɛ nɩ̀sãh mɔ á sɔkɔ á kɔ̃ á mɛ fɛ̃ pɔ ǹ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo yépi tɔ tyɩ́, gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á névye sõ̀ mɛ álɛ n fwo.
Tyi nónó-á á n yo névye tyɩ́, á náh mɛ pílkínɔ́ sɔkɔ, yĩ́nvǐ wɛlɔ náh sélɛ, vìntɛ̃nɔ tɔ náh à n vi n tɛ̃ pélɛ.

Liyel ye kè wɛ nɛ ápi-á kɩ fɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo, tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ dahbɩ ápi gbõ̀ á kɔ̃ á kélɛ n yo ké yah yõ. Névye dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ náh ápi n yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ dɛ́, Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ ye ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ápi sõnɔlɛ n pnɛ.
Yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ wɛlɔ nónó-á á yo yé tyɩ́, yé vi n tɛ̃ tɛ̃ wɛlɔ náh sélɛ. Liyel ye á tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ á náh mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé yṍ-ńsahlɛ.
Ápi náh mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ álɛ n gbilki. Kàh sɔ̃́ yépilɛ ò, kàh sɔ̃́ no tɛ́lɔlɛ ò, á náh mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ álɛ n gbilki.
Tɛ́ ápi kɩ mó tɔ̃ sõ̀ fɛ̃ á tɔ̃́rɩ́ sah yé yõ áyáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névyelɛ. Ǹtɛ á yé tɛ̃ mármár pídúbísè-á ǹ pyelɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n tɛ̃ sɔ̃́.

Yé tyɩ́ sõ̀ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ápi tyɩ́, képah ye á mɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yé tyɩ́ nɛ̂-á n wil Liyel tyɩ́. Tɛ́ kè náh yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, á á min ńtɛ̃ mɔ kũ kɔ̃ yépi yĩnnɛ yé tyɩ́ táhnɔ́ tɛ̃̀ yĩnnɛ á tyɩ́.

Á yṹnpyé, áyáh yèvyãhrɩ ànɛ̂ kwlɔ́nɔ́ nónó pɩ, yé dyɔ mɛ n kwnɛ sélɛ kyɔ́. Áyáh lésõ mɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ à Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tirlɛ n yo n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́, á lésõ mɛ tõ̀ tɔlɛ n pɩ lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀ à yĩn á gblɔ̌y yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ, sɔ̃̀nko à káh n pɩ n tɛ̃ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ yé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Yépi ńtɛ̃ ye ápi tàrfyɔ̀lɛ nɛ, áyáh tyi nónó pól pɩ yépi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́, sé pól-á mɛ plɛ, tɛ́ mɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ; Liyel tɔ ye á tàrfyɔ̀lɛ.
Yé pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ áyáh yé tɛ̃ plɛ, sɔ̃́-á súbí pé wɛ̃́npìlɛ n tɛ̃ plɛ.
Á vìnmɔnɔlɛ yé kɔ̃, tɛ́ sṍré mɔ yé sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kè gbah yo yé tyɩ́ nɛ yé yɛ yé kɔ dùkù nɛ n mɛ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ye yélɛ ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ de yĩnnɛ kɩ ké nɔlɩ wɛ yõ.

Yáh Liyel wɛy nɛ̂ noh ápi tyɩ́, yé náh kè pɩ névi vyãh wɛynɛ. Yé kè pɩ Liyel wɛynɛ. Tɛ́ sɛ̃́ ńtɛ̃ ye kélɛ kyɔ́. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, kè mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yé sɔkɔ, yépi nónó-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ. Képah ye, á n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ ńtɔ̃.

Ń yṹnpyé, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ nónó-á mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ Nsyude mara sɔkɔ, tir nɛ̂-á nɔ pélɛ, sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ ye nɔ yépi tɔlɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, yé sú fṍ névye-á yé kwlɔ sɔ̃́, sɛ̃́ ye Nsyifunɔ kwlɔ pépi tɔlɛ.
Nsyifunɔ ye ko mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu ànɛ̂ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopulɛ

Pè mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé ápi yah kõ á káh Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo yìkìnì tɛ́lɔ́ névye tyɩ́ pé tɔ kɔ̃ pè wɛ n pwah. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, dòhnɩ̀nɔ́ ó ye pè mɛ n pɩ n yuku pé tyípêl yõ. Ǹtɛ ké syì-ǹsah, Liyel fṍhnɔ́ sah pé yõ.

Ń yṹnpyé, á yal yé tnɔ̂ wrɔ́ kwéy mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, á yĩ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé yõ ó, ǹtɛ á mɛ yé tyɩ́lɛ n sõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Yé wɛ dékè mɛ á kah tɛ̃, képah ye á mɛ gbah tɛ̃ nɛ á yé wɛ.
Á lésõ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á á syɩ n pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáh ńtɛ̃ ye ńmɔ Pole yah kɔ̃ kélɛ tɛ́ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ á yah kõ.
Ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ, nónó gbõ̀ yõ mɛ á yáh-ńsah náh n tyɛ n pi, ànɛ̂ á nɩ kɩ vɩ, ànɛ̂ á yõ kɩ yɔ̃? Yépi ye.
Kègbɩ yõ, yépi yĩn ye gbílkínɔ́ kɩ sah ápi yõ, tɛ́ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ kɩ mɛ á sɔkɔ.
Képah sɔkɔ, áyáh pópó pɔ tɛ̃ kwlɔ yé wɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, á kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ ápi-á kɩ wũ á gblɔ̌y Atɛnɩ kwil sɔkɔ,

tɛ́ mɛ á yṹnpi Timote tɛkɩ mɔ yé kɔ̃, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ Liyel tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ápilɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónkɔ̃nɔ sɔkɔ Krista tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Á nɛ à pɔ yé yohnɩ mɔ yé tǎhkɩ̀ wɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, à mó sṍré mɔ yé sɔkɔ,
sɔ̃̀nko kwɛy gbĩ yèvyãhrɩ káh pɔ yé kɔ̃ kwɔ. Yé pɩ̃́nɔ́ se mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ yèvyãhrɩ mɛ̀nɛ n sɔkɔ tɛ́ á sah n pi tɛ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, áyáh lésõ mɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, á lésõ kè yo sah yé tyɩ́ nɛ áyáh kɩ pɔ yèvyãhrɩ pɩ n pi. Képah ye pɩ yɔ̀, ké sèndì náh yélɛ dò.

Képah ye, máh pɔ tɛ̃ sṍmnɔ́ pɩ kwlɔ, mé Timote tɛkɩ mɔ nɛ à kyɩ yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ dùkù yah n pɔ n yo ń syah. Tíkí sõ̀ mɛ ń tɛ̃ nɛ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ káh nɛ mɛ tɛ̃ n wɛ yé tyɩ́, ápi kwlɔ́nɔ́ kɔ̃ kè pɩ yõ kɛ̃́nɛ.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, Timote ye wil yé tĩ̀nnɛ à pɔ. À mɛ pɔ yé yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo nɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ. Ńkɛ̃́ yáh mɛ n sõ ápi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Á wɛ dékè-á mɛ yé tɛ̃, sɔ̃́-á yépi tɔ wɛ dékè mɛ ápi tɛ̃.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́ á yṹnpyé, áyáh sõ̀ mɛ yèkwɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvyãhrɩ nónó pól sɔkɔ, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ nóhnɔ́ pɩ nɩ dénɔ́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ á tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ yáh fyɔ̀ mɛ sɛ̃́nyĩnɔlɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ, á mɩ̀nɩ̀ ye pyě tiki de á fɔkɔ sɔkɔ núkúnúkú yɔ̀.
Wɛy dùkù nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ mɛ ápi kɩ fɛ̃ Liyel kɔ̃ n pi yé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, wǎh nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂nɛ á kɔ̃ yépi yĩnnɛ?

Ké lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀, á mɛ kélɛ n gbah n ni Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ á kɔ̃ á fɛ̃ pɔ yah yé tyɩ́. Tɛ́ fɩ̃́ nɛ̂-à kɩ mɛ yé tɛkɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, á mó yé yohnɩ n mɔ ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Sú Liyel ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ ànɛ̂ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ á kɔ̃ á pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ.
Wɛ̃ tyɩ́nɔnɔ ànɛ̂ no pól tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, à wãnnɛ n mɔ ké yõ á kɩ nɛ yé tyɩ́-á nɔ sɔ̃́ ápi tyɩ́.

À mó nɩ̀sãhlɛ yé kɔ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, yé kɔ̃ yè pɩ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ yé tyɩ́. Yè mó nɛ n mɛ yályál á Sú Liyel yah sɔkɔ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista-à sõ nɛ̂nɛ ǹ syɩ pɔ ǹ yõ ǹ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ póllɛ.

Á yṹnpyé, yáh yɩ̃nɛ yè nɛ n kɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ kè mó nɔ Liyel tyɩ́, á kélɛ yé wɛ̃kɩ tɛ. Sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ ńtɛ̃ ye yé mɛ kɔ ó, ǹtɛ á tɔ̃ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩn yõ nɛ, yé gbah n tɛ̃ wãn mɔ ké yõ.
Áyáh vìnmɔnɔ nónónɛ yé kɔ̃ à wil Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu tyɩ́, yé sélɛ n pnɛ.
Liyel-á mɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, kè wɛ yɔ̀: À mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé nɛ n mɛ yályál péwɔ yah, yé káh prɔ̀prɔ̀lɛ n pɩ,
yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól mó yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.
Yé káh yɛ lédɔ́rɩ́ tɛ̃ n wɛ yé tyɩ́ sɔ̃́-á kè Liyel pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂púlɛ n fnɛ.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh n pɩ n de ǹ ní-ò tyɩ́ à yuku képah tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Liyel náh n yɛ képah tɛ̃̀ wɔ dɛ́nɔ́lɛ dɛ́. Á lésõ kè yo yé tyɩ́, tɛ́ ké gbáhdyâh tɔ di sah tɛ yé tyɩ́ dò.
Liyel náh á ye põ̌põ̌ pɩ yĩnnɛ dɛ́, à á ye nɛ á nɛ mɛ yályál péwɔ yah.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, névi nɛ̂-à vìnmɔnɔ nɔ́pi yahle, névi náh tɛ̃̀ yahle dɛ́, Liyel ye tɛ̃̀ yahle, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ǹ Mirki dah mɔ yé sɔkɔ.
Liyel tyɩ́ ye yé wɛ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ à yuku wɛ̃ tyɩ́nɔnɔ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Képah ye, yõ náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ mè n tɔ̃ tir yɔ́ wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ képah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Masedonɩ mara Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú pól tyɩ́ mɛ nɔ yé tyɩ́. Képah kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ yáh mɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ mɛ̀ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ. Ǹtɛ á yṹnpyé, á tɔ̃ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé tɔ̃ wãn mɔ ké yõ.
Yé yèvɩnɩ yáhnkɔ̃nɔ pɩ yé tõ̀lɛ. Yé káh yé pɩ pɩ tyi sah yè mó nɛ n yɔkɔ n de névye tyi sɔkɔ. Yé yé gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ tõ̀ sɔkɔ áyáh kè yo sah sɔ̃́ yé tyɩ́.
Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɔ dùkù kɩ kèkõyṍ névye kɔ̃ pè kɩ yõ̀yénnɛ n sah yé yõ, ànɛ̂ yé náh n pɩ n tɛ̃ n pi yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Á yṹnpyé, yé no nónó-á pè náh tɔ̃ mɛ min sɔkɔ, pé tyɩ́-á nɛ pɔ n pɩ n pi sɔ̃́, ápi náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yé tɛ̃ ké yɩ̃́tũri sɔkɔ kè pɔ n pɩ yèkwɔrɩlɛ yé tyɩ́ névye tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, nónó yáh-ńsah-á mɛ tyɛ́nɔ́lɛ.

Áyáh fyɔ̀ sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ Yesu-á ku tɛ́ ǹ lékó mɛ yilki mɔ, á sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ tɔlɛ nɛ nónó-á sɛ̃ ǹ yõ tɛ pɔ yah kwlɔ, Liyel-á kɩ pépi tɔ lékyɩ̂ yilki mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ mɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ Yesulɛ.
Á kɩ tir yɔ́ yo yé syah, à yɩ̃nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛy yɔ́lɛ. À nɛ ńkɛ̃́ pé syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ, ápi nónó-à kɩ mɛ min sɔkɔ, névye nónó lékyɩ̂-á yilki mɔ, á náh pépi dyàh tɛ̃ n pi.

Yé náh wɛ di, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-à kɩ fyɔ̀ pɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ̃, yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ kɩ gbo mɔ yĩ́npɔ̃́ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ, tɛ́ Liyel kèpɔ̃ kɩ fɩ̃bɩ. Képah sɔkɔ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kɩ wil yĩ̂nyõ kɩ tiki pɔ. Képah tɛ̃̀nɛ, nónó-á sõ̀ sɛ̃ Yesu yõ tɛ́ pɔ yah kwlɔ, pépi ǹgbò lékyɩ̂ kɩ yilki mɔ.
Képah náh, ápi nónó-à kɩ mɛ min sɔkɔ légbĩ́nɛ, á tɔ kɩ kwrɔ mɔ yɔ̃ dɔkɔ pélɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ńyĩ̂rn sɔkɔ kɩ kyɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yohnɩ yĩ̂nyõ, tɛ́ kɩ tɛ̃ ǹnɛ kṹmm yõ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé wɛ̃ nnɔlɛ n de wɛlɔ nɔ́pilɛ.
Á yṹnpyé, tyi nɔ́pi-á kɩ pɔ n pɩ n pi gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, yõ náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ mè n tɔ̃ tir yɔ́ wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ sépi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Yépi ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ syɩ n pɔ sõ-á kɩ névye kwɔkɩ n tɛ̃ n pi yɛ̃́nwó pɔ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ lékã̂hnɛ.
Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á névye kɩ mɛ n yo nɛ, yèvɩnɩ-á mɛ, dlo náh tɔ̃ mɛ, légbĩ́ ye tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ kɩ núkú pè kwɔkɩ tɛ̃ sê kúrkì tɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ, tɛ́ pè náh tɛ̃ wɛ n wil n pi ké sɔkɔ póllɛ.
Ǹtɛ yépi wɔlɛ á yṹnpyé, yépi tɔ se yɔ́ mɛ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ kénɛ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì kɔ̃ kè kɩ pɔ yé kwɔkɩ n tɛ̃ n pi yɛ̃́nwó tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ?
Yé náh wɛ di, yépi póllɛ, yé fɔkɔ mɛ dálnɔ́lɛ. Yé mɛ tyilɛ n pɩ kyòo sɔkɔ. Ápi tyípɩ́nɩ̀ náh mɛ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, á yé káh nɛ n dɔ no tɛ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Á ye nɛ mɛ n yah, à mó á gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, lékã̂h yé dɔy dɔ́pú n nɛ n dɔ, ànɛ̂ lékã̂h ye sèwɔbɩ tɔ sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ.

Ǹtɛ ápi nónó-á pɩ tyah kyòo sɔkɔ névyelɛ, á ye káh sètɛ̃̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ. Á ye yɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ n mɛ á sɔkɔ á kɩ nɛ vyɔrɩ fwɔ̀mɔnɩ sɔ̃́ á mɔ. Á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ mó nɛ mɛ pwáhnmɔnɔ yõ á kɩ nɛ vyɔrɩ gbétú sɔ̃́ á kwĩnki.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel náh ápi mɔ nɛ pé pɔ á fõh dɛ́. Ǹtɛ à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ.
Ǹmɔ ku ápi yĩnnɛ, sɔ̃̀nko áyâh sɔ̃́ mɛ min sɔkɔ ò, áyâh sɔ̃́ ku ò, à nɛ n mɛ ǹmɔlɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Képah ye, yé sṍrélɛ n mɔ wɛ̃ sɔkɔ, yè wãnnɛ n mɔ wɛ̃ tǎhkɩ̀ yõ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á yé mɛ kélɛ n pɩ yɔ̀.
Á yṹnpyé, á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ nónó-á mɛ gbah tɛ̃ yé yahlɛ n tɛ̃, tɛ́ mɛ yélɛ n vi mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, yé yõ̀yénnɛ n sah pé yõ.
Yé yõ̀yénnɛ n sah n yĩ́ĩ́ pé yõ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ pé tõ̀ yĩnnɛ. Yé nɛ n mɛ tnɔ sɔkɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ.
Á yṹnpyé, á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ, yé nɛ n wɛkɩ gbãndal pɩ́pú yõ, yé nɩ̀sãhlɛ n mɔ tíkí pɩ́pú sɔkɔ, yé mó tɛ̃́nkwlɔpulɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ. Yé no pól sṍmnɔ́lɛ n pɩ.
Yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh pèkè wɔ́lɛ n dɛ pèkèlɛ. Ǹtɛ yé pèpɛy ó pɩ́-ńsahlɛ n yah n kɔ̃ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ no pól tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́.
Yé nɛ n mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́.
Yé Liyellɛ n ni kṹmm.
Tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ yé nɛ n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́. Képah ye Liyel n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ yé nɛ n pɩ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Yé káh Liyel Mirki yah kõ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ,
yé káh Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu wɛlɔ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n ko.
Yé tyi póllɛ n sohlɩ n yah, tɛ́ nónó-à mɛ pallɛ, yè mó sépi fɛ̃ n syi.
Yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ tyípêl duke pól pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.

Liyel nɛ̂-á yèvɩnɩ nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ à sãm mɔ yé min pɩ dùkù pól sɔkɔ. À mó yé sõnɔ, ànɛ̂ yé min, ànɛ̂ yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê pɩ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ sé tyɩ́ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista syɩ n pɔ sõlɛ.
Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á n ye yélɛ, à n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀. Ǹmɔ ye kɩ pɩ sélɛ.
Á yṹnpyé, yé nírí tɔlɛ n pɩ ápi tyɩ́.
Yé wɛkɩ á yṹnpyé pól tyɩ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ wɛy pèpɛynɛ.
Mé yélɛ n gbah n ni Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩn yõ, nɛ yé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ kar á yṹnpyé pól noh.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ Pole, ànɛ̂ Silasɩ, ànɛ̂ Timote ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ yépi Tesaloniki kwil Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́, yépi nónó-á mɛ ápi Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ yõ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́, à mó yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Á yṹnpyé, ké yah ye á yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ yépi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ yé wɛ̃ tyɩ́nɔnɔ-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ n yuku yahlɛ.

Yé mɛ yèvyãhrɩ ànɛ̂ yèkwɔrɩ tɔlɛ n wɛ, ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, yé mɛ fɛ̃ yé tah sah. Képah ápi nɩ vɩ yĩ́ĩ́ á kɔ̃ á mɛ yé tyɩ́lɛ n yah n yãh n kɔ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ tyɩ́, nónó-á mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ.
Kénɛ yèvyãhrɩ nɔ́pi ye n wɛ̃kɩ kélɛ nɛ Liyel tukey-á mɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ nɔ̀nɔ́ náh yépi kɩ wɛ de Liyel tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ, yáh mɛ n kwlɔ képah nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ.
Liyel mɛ tómm. À kɩ yé fṍhpú wɔ́ dɛ pé sɔkɔ.
Yépi nónó-á mɛ fṍhnɔ́lɛ n wɛ, à kɩ yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃ n pi ànɛ̂ ápilɛ. Képah kɩ n pɩ n pi sõ nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu kɩ wil yĩ̂nyõ kɩ pɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀pulɛ
nyàh lépɔ̃́ yɔ́ sɔkɔ, kɩ pɔ fṍhnɔ́ sah Liyel pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂pú ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yáhlepu yõ.
Pé fṍhnɔ́ kɩ pɩ tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ kṹmmnɛ, tɛ́ pé wrɔ́ kɩ gbɛ mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ànɛ̂ ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́lɛ.

Lésõ nɛ̂-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kɩ n pɔ n pi yɔ̀, ǹ náh névye ànɛ̂ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú pól kɩ gbílkínɔ́ sah ǹ yõ lésõlɛ, tɛ́ kɩ ǹnɛ n yah dékè ó. Yépi tɔ kɩ mɛ kénɛ névye sɔkɔ, yáh fyɔ̀ sɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yõ ápi-á képah nɛ̂ yo yé tyɩ́.

Képah ye, á mɛ nírílɛ n pɩ yé tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Á mɛ kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ, wǎh yé ye tir nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ, à kè pɩ yé fɛ̃ kè pɛkɩ. Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃ yé fɛ̃ tyípéplɔ póllɛ n pɩ nónó dékè-á mɛ yé sɔkɔ, à mó yé yohnɩ n mɔ yé ǹ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyípɩ́nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ.
Képah sɔkɔ, yé kɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩnnɛ n gbilki, tɛ́ ǹ tɔ kɩ mó yé yõ yɔ̃. Pèpɔrɩ ye sélɛ ápi Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista kɩ pɩ.
Á yṹnpyé, à yuku ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista syɩ́npɔnɔ ànɛ̂ ápi tùkènmɔnɔ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ ǹ tnɔ̂, á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ,

yé káh yɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɔ yé sõnɔ vye fɛ̃kɩ, képah náh pɩ tíkí mɔ yé sɔkɔ sɛ́rɔsɛ́rɔ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ syɩ́npɔnɔ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì-á yĩni tɛ̃. Tɛ̃̀-à kɩ sɔ̃́ nɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀-à pé syi n yo, képah náh pɩ, tɛ̃̀ yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ wɛy-à kɩ sɔ̃́ nɛ̂ à pɔ n yo yé tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ, sɛ́bɛ́y yɔ́ fyé-à kɩ sɔ̃́ nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ pɔ, tɛ́ nɛ kǎh wil ápi tyɩ́, yé káh sɛ̃ tɛ̃̀ yõ.

Yé káh yɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ kɔ̃ à pɔ yé pilki dùkù yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, kénɛ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì-à pópó n pi, Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ ǹgbò ye pè kɩ pɔ tyah n fwo, tɛ́ Liyel fwó-ò kɩ ǹ yõ wilki mɔ. Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á n pilki névyelɛ, ǹ tyɩ́ kɩ pɔ n yɩkɩ n pi.
Ǹmɔ ye kɩ pɔ yuku Liyel ànɛ̂ gbilki gbilki yî póllɛ n fwo, tɛ́ kɩ kyɩ de kɔ̃ tɛ̃ ńtɛ̃nɛ Liyel ní-ńsah gbô sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kɩ nɛ Liyel-á péwɔlɛ.
Yé dyɔ se fwɔ nɛ máh lésõ kè yãh sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́ ń mɛ gbĩ́nɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ?
Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, kwâh nɛ̂-á kõ sah ǹ yahlɛ à kɔ̃ à náh fɛ̃ wil n mɔ n pi ké gbĩ́ nɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ, yé kélɛ n pnɛ dò.
À mɛ ǹ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ tõ̀ tyah tɛ́ sètĩ̀n sõ̀ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ ǹ tɛ̃́nsàh-ò-à sõ nɛ̂nɛ n knɛ,
légbĩ́nɛ à kɩ ǹ yõ wilki mɔ, tɛ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu kɩ ǹ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ ǹ vyãh yã́hfânnɛ, tɛ́ Yesu pìnɔ́ tǎhkɩ̀ kɩ à pyãhrɩ pnɛ́pnɛ́.
Nɛ́pékè mɛ̀ kɩ n pɔ n pi sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ ǹ sɔkɔ. À kɩ gbǐl ànɛ̂ gbɛ̃̀ndùnì tyi duke póllɛ n pɩ nónó-á névilɛ n pilki.

À kɩ tyíknɛ̌nɩ̀ duke póllɛ n pɩ névye wɛ n pilki yĩnnɛ nónó-á mɛ tyɩ́yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ. Pé tyɩ́ kɩ n yɩkɩ n pi pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ yahle, képah nɛ̂-á kɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ pè pwah n mɔ n pi.
Képah ye, Liyel yɛ sétõ tǎhkɩ̀ kɔ̃ kè pɔ pè mɔ pílkínɔ́ sɔkɔ, pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ n sɛ̃ mɩ̀nɩ̀ tyi yõ.
Képah sɔkɔ, nónó pól-á yahle sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ gbɩ yõ, tɛ́ tyíknɛ̌nɩ̀ tyɩ́ nɔ pé tyɩ́, fṍhnɔ́ kɩ sah pé yõ.

Á yṹnpyé, yépi nónó tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel tyɩ́, ké yah ye á yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ yépi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, ǹmɔ ye yah wilki yélɛ tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ nɛ pé yé pwah mɔ ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ, képah gbõ̀ yõ-á yé kɩ yé minnɛ n pɩ yályál Liyel yah, ànɛ̂ gbɩ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Képah yĩn ye à ye yélɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir nóhnɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ áyáh nɛ̂ yo yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kɩ yépi tɔ kɔ̃ yé kɩ wɛ de á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ.

Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́ á yṹnpyé, á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ yé sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yõ. Áyáh kwɔ́nɔ́ nónónɛ yé kɔ̃ vyãh wɛy sɔkɔ, képah náh pɩ sɛ́bɛ́y tṍntɛkɩnmɔnɔ sɔkɔ, yé sè koh n tɛ̃ n yĩn.
Ápi tyɩ́ nɔ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista ànɛ̂ á Sú Liyel tyɩ́. Pépi ye á nnɔlɛ n de tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ pé pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ á kɔ̃ á tɛ̃ wɛ á gbõ̀ sah yĩ́ĩ́ pé yõ.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ nɛ pè yé nnɔ de, pè mó tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃ yé fɛ̃ nɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n pɩ, tyípɩ́nɩ̀ ànɛ̂ vyãh wɛy sɔkɔ.
Á yṹnpyé, ké syì-ǹsah mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ nɛ yé nírílɛ n pɩ ápi tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɛy tɔ̃ mɔ súú, névye mó kélɛ n mɔ n kõ yépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Yé Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ni á tyɩ́ tɔlɛ à kɔ̃ à á pwah n mɔ nɛ́túkúnì ànɛ̂ nɛ́pêl gbõ̀. Yé náh wɛ di, no pól náh sɛ̃ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yõ.
Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ tómm. À kɩ tǎhkɩ̀lɛ yé kɔ̃, tɛ́ kɩ yé yõlɛ n syɩkɩ nɛ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ káh tɛ̃ wɛ yé tyɩ́.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ gbõ̀ yõ, ápi sɛ̃́nyĩ́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ nɛ áyáh nɛ̂ kõ sah yé kɔ̃, yáh mɛ kélɛ n pɩ, tɛ́ kɩ tɔ̃ n yɔ̃ n sɔkɔ n pi sɛ̃́.
Á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, à yé yohnɩ n mɔ yé fɛ̃ pɩ̃ yé tyɩ́-á nɔ sɔ̃́ Liyel tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ yé fɛ̃ sṍmnɔ́lɛ n pɩ ǹmɔ Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.

Ń yṹnpyé, ápi-á yé kwɔ tyi nónónɛ, yé yṹnpyé nónó-á sépi kɛ̃kɩ sah tɛ́ pé minnɛ n pɩ gbãndal pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yé tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ nɛ, yé káh pélɛ n tĩnki.
Yáh yɩ̃nɛ yè ápilɛ n yah n pɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, yé kélɛ n pnɛ kyɔ́. Ápi náh á min pɩ yé wrɔ́ gbãndal pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Áyáh lésõ mɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, á náh kè yah kɔ̃ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ à ápi vyãhlɛ n yah. Á tõ̀ pɩ, á yah vyãh, à kwlɔ lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀ à yĩn á gblɔ̌y yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ, sɔ̃̀nko à káh n pɩ n tɛ̃ yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ yé sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Ké yah ye lésõ yè á vyãhlɛ n yah. Ǹtɛ ápi képah pɩ nɛ kè pɩ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ yé tyɩ́, yé tɔ kɔ̃ yé sɛ̃́nkɔ̃lɛ n pɩ.
Áyáh lésõ mɛ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, á ké gbáhdyâh di sah yé tyɩ́ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à yahle tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ̃̀ náh yɩ̃nɛ yṍnɔ́ tɔlɛ.
Ǹtɛ á mɛ n nohnɩ nɛ, yé túkù-á mɛ gbandal ó yah wũ à yahle tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ mɛ n yɔkɔ n de névye tyi sɔkɔ.

Kénɛ névye nɔ́pi tɛ̃̀nɛ, á kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pé tyɩ́ tɛ́ sṍrélɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ nɛ, pè pé yah di tõ̀lɛ n pɩ, pè pé yõ yõ tɛ̃̀nɛ n wɛ pé yɛ̃́ngbɛ̃́ myèh nínkwɛnɔ sɔkɔ.
Yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ á yṹnpyé, yé káh n yal n mɔ tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.
Tyi nónó-á ápi yo sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀ sɔkɔ yɔ̀, névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-à kɩ fyɔ̀ yahle sàhnɔ́lɛ sé yõ, yé tɛ̃̀nɛ n kyɔmɩ, yé káh nɛ n pɩ n soh tɛ̃̀nɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, kè kɩ pɩ sennɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ yé káh tɛ̃̀ pɩ yé sépɛ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ dɛ́, yé vìnmɔnɔlɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ n kɔ̃ sɔ̃́-á yé kélɛ yé yṹnpyélɛ n kɔ̃.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ yèvɩnɩ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ, à yèvɩnɩnɛ yélɛ n kɔ̃ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ kàh sɔ̃́ kɔ̃ dùkù nɛ̂ ólɛ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à nɛ n mɛ yé póllɛ.
Wɛy nɛ̂-á mé yé kɔ̃ yɔ̀, ńmɔ Pole ye wãrkɩ kélɛ ń gbõ̀lɛ. Sɛ̃́ ye mè n nɛ n mɔ ń gbõ̀ nɩ́ynɛ ń sɛ́bɛ́y wã́rkɩ́ntɛkɩmɔnɔnɔ yõ. Ńmɔ wã́rkɩ́nɔ́ ye kélɛ tɔ́tɔ́.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, à yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ yé pól tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á pɩ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Sú Liyel-á kè yah tɔkɔ sɔ̃́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ, ànɛ̂ à yɩ̃nɛ Yesu Krista tɔ-á kè yah tɔkɔ sɔ̃́, á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ ǹmɔ nɛ̂ yõ sɔkɔ.

Timote, áwɔ tyɩ́ ye mé n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ, áwɔ nɛ̂-á ń pídĩ́ kègbɩlɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ á tyɩ́, pè á yãm yah pè mó yèvɩnɩnɛ ǹ kɔ̃.
Tɛ̃ Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ sɔ̃́-á sõ̀ mé yo kélɛ á tyɩ́ máh n sɔkɔ Masedonɩ mara sɔkɔ. Névye túkù mɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ kétúkúnìnɛ n pɩ nɛ́npɔ́, á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ pè yĩni n mɔ ké pɩ́nɔ́lɛ.

Yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ, pè káh tɛ̃ sèmìrn yã́hnɔ́ ànɛ̂ náh tãn yĩni tyɩ́ nɩ́y tɛ̃́nɔ́ ó sɔkɔ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ. Yékã̂b ó ye sépi n pɔ n pɔ. Sè náh névyelɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ sɔ̃́.
Gbáhdyâh dínsàhnɔ́ mɛ̀ yõ ye nɛ kè tyɩ́nɔnɔ dahbɩ pé sɔkɔ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á n wil nɩ pèpɛy sɔkɔ, sõnɔ pèpɛy sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ kègbɩ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ névye túkù ye képah yahle, tɛ́ mɔ pu à yékã̂b túkúnì pɩ́nɔ́ ó yah wũ.
Pě pé gblɔ̌y pɩ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kwɔ́púlɛ. Tɛ́ tyi nónó ńtɛ̃-á pè mɛ n yo, ànɛ̂ tyi nónó-á pè mɛ névyelɛ n gbah n kwɔ, pè náh mɛ sé dùkùlɛ n pnɛ.
Ápi pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́-á plɛ, wâh mɛ sé tyilɛ n pɩ sǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́.

Yé náh wɛ di, Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh sah nɛ́gblɔ́ yĩnnɛ dɛ́. Nónó yĩn-á sè sah, pépi ye pɩ tyítúkúnì pɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ kèlékɛ̃ pɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́pékè pɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ tyípêl pɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ Liyel mɔ́nkõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂púlɛ, ànɛ̂ Liyel tyi mɔ́nkõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂púlɛ, ànɛ̂ súbí kònmɔpulɛ, ànɛ̂ yṹbí kònmɔpulɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́kókè mɔ́púlɛ,

ànɛ̂ prɔ̀npɩbɩlɛ, ànɛ̂ díbí wɛ̃ tɔ́kɔ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ syɔ́ wɛ̃ tɔ́kɔ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ yɔ̃bɩ yã̀mpulɛ, ànɛ̂ mɩ̀nyobelɛ, ànɛ̂ nónó-á pélɛ n wo mɩ̀nɩ̀ tyi sɔkɔ, à tahlɩ nónó pól-á mɛ Liyel tyi kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ n fwo.
Kénɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ wil Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir sɔkɔ, tɔ̃́rɩ́ Liyel-á nɛ̂ dahbɩ ńmɔ gbõ̀, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á pèpɔrɩ Liyellɛ.
Ńmɔ n wɛkɩ á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tǎhkɩ̀lɛ ń kɔ̃. Mé n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ kè yah nɛ máh yɩ̃nɛ pé tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ ń tɔkɔ ǹ tõ̀ sɔkɔ.

Tɛ́ ńmɔ ye mó tɔ̃ lésõ n yo n ko ǹ tyɩ́lɛ, tɛ́ ǹnɛ n fõh, tɛ́ pɩ nɛ́pékèlɛ. Ǹtɛ mé lésõ mɛ sépi póllɛ n pɩ ǹpɩ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ, képah ye Liyel mɛ pɔ ń yãm yah.
Ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ye pèpɔrɩ pɩ ńmɔ tyɩ́ náhnáh, à Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ ń kɔ̃ nɛ̂-á n wɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ.
Gbɩ ye wɛy mɛ̀nɛ nɛ̂-á no pól yɩ̃nɛ pè kè fɛ̃ syi, képah nɛ̂-á yo nɛ Yesu Krista-á pɔ kèkõyṍ sɔkɔ tyípêl pɩ́pú pwah n mɔ yĩnnɛ. Pépi sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ ye ńmɔlɛ, tɛ́ ńmɔ tyɩ́ peke kal.

Ǹtɛ ńmɔ nɛ̂ tyípêl-á kal, Liyel ńmɔ yãm yah. À mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ Yesu Krista ǹ gblɔ̌y pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ̃kɩ, nɛ̂-á kɩ pɩ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ névye tyɩ́ nónó-á kɩ pɔ n sɛ̃ n pi ǹ yõ, kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ Yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ nɛ̂-á à náh n wɛ, à náh n ku, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel núkúnínɛ, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ yõ yɔ̃̀nɔ́ ànɛ̂ gbílkínɔ́ pɩ ǹmɔ tyɩ́lɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina.
Ńmɔ pídĩ́ Timote, Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ wɛlɔ nónó-á yo sah á tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ sépi ǹ yohnɩ n mɔ á gbah tɛ̃ tõ̀ pèpɛynɛ n pɩ.
Kélɛ n pɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ ànɛ̂ sõnɔ pèpɛynɛ. Túkù ye yahle sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, pé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tɛ̃ syi pé tyɩ́.
Pépi túkù ye Yimene ànɛ̂ Alɛkisãdrelɛ. Mé pépi gbah dɛ mɔ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á kɩ pɩ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ pé tyɩ́ pè kɔ̃ pè náh tɔ̃ n yo n de n pi Liyel tyɩ́.
Máh mɛ nɛ̂ ǹgbòlɛ n yah n kɔ̃, képah ye nɛ á yáhnkɔ̃nɔlɛ n pɩ Liyel tyɩ́, á ǹnɛ n ni, á ǹnɛ n fal, á mó wɛynɛ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃ no pól yĩnnɛ.

Á ye nírílɛ n pɩ yõ̀tãm tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ névye pól tyɩ́ tɔ̃́rɩ́-á mɛ nónó gbõ̀, sɔ̃̀nko à á minnɛ n wɛ n pɩ syɩ́syɩ́ yèvɩnɩ sɔkɔ, á kɔ dùkù mó nɛ n mɛ pallɛ, à mó Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ.
Képah ye plɛ, ànɛ̂ ké tyɩ́ nɔ á pwáhnmɔ-ò Liyel tyɩ́,
ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ no pól pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, pè mó tɛ̃ wɛ gbɩlɛ n pnɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel núkú ó ye mɛ. Liyel ànɛ̂ névye wrɔ́ tɔ̃́-ò núkú tɔ ó mɛ. Névi ye ǹnɛ. Ǹmɔ ye Yesu Kristalɛ,
ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ à névye pól yõ dwe. Gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ yáhntɔkɔnsàhnɔ́lɛ, kè pɩ képah sɔkɔ.

Yesu Krista gblɔ̌y kɔ̃́nɔ́ mɛ̀ yĩn ye Liyel ńmɔ yah tɔkɔ pɩ ǹ wɛy yó-òlɛ, ànɛ̂ Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ, nɛ névye nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ mé pélɛ n kwɔ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ. Gbɩ ye mé n yo, mɩ̀nyo náh ńnɛ.
Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ tã̀ntã̀n pól sɔkɔ, díbí pé gbã̀n yɔ̃ dɔkɔ yĩ̂nyõ pé Liyellɛ n ni nnɔlɛ yályál, fɔ̀kɔ̀vyã̀hnɩ̀ ànɛ̂ mɛ́kɩ̀ kɛ̃́nɛ pé wrɔ́.

Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ syɔ́ tɔ flɔlɛ n tɔ̃ n sah n mɔ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́. Pè flɔlɛ n mɔ nónó-á kɩ fɛ̃ pé sen yɩ̃ ólɛ yã́ryã́r dáhbɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ké sɔkɔ. Pè káh yõ kàhntɔ̃nsàhnɔ́ képékè, ànɛ̂ sã́n yɛ̀sõ̀ yî, ànɛ̂ yî kètǎrnɔ, ànɛ̂ fwɔ̀tǎhnɩ̀nɛ n yah n kɔ̃.
Ǹtɛ pé gblɔ̌y tɔ̃́nsàhnɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè pɩ tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, sɔ̃́-á syɔ́ kélɛ n pɩ nónó-á mɛ Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ.
Sê yɩ̃nɛ à ǹ gblɔ̌y tiki mɔ tɛ̃ syɩ́syɩ́ pàh ǹnɛ n kwɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì wrɔ́.
Mé náh ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ sê kɔ̃ nɛ à névyelɛ n kwɔ, képah náh pɩ à pɩ dĩ́ yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ. À yɩ̃nɛ à tɛ̃ syɩ́syɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, Adama ǹgbò ye Liyel mɔ, tɛ́ pyě Awɔ mɔ dò.
Adama náh sétõ pilki; Awɔ ye à pilki à kɔ̃ à Liyel yóré yahle.
Ǹtɛ képah fyé yõ sê kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ ǹ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩnnɛ yṹnɛ, wàh sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, tɛ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ mɛ ǹ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ n kɔ yályál Liyel yah yã́ryã́r dáhbɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ sépi pól sɔkɔ.
Yé yah, kègbɩ wɛy yɔ́ ye mé n tyah yónɔ́lɛ yé tyɩ́ yɔ̀. Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tɛ̃́-òlɛ, tõ̀ pèpɛy ye tɛ̃̀ n yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ.

Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tɛ̃́-ò yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ ǹ tyɩ́. À yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ sê núkú nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́npnɛ̀-òlɛ, nɛ̂-á mɛ ǹ tyilɛ n pɩ n yɩ̃nɛ pallɛ, mɛ nɛ́pânnɛ n tɛ̃ plɛ, tɛ́ kɩ fɛ̃ névye kwɔ n pi.
À náh yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ sèwɔlɛ, képah náh pɩ nɛ́pékèlɛ. Ǹtɛ à yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ névilɛ, nɛ̂-á ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n yɛ n pnɛ. À náh yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ mâl kɔ̃̀lɩ̀-òlɛ, képah náh pɩ pɔ́ náh púkúbínmɔ-òlɛ.
À yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ ǹ kéte yahlɛ n tɛ̃ n pnɛ pallɛ, à mó ǹ wɛ̃́npì kwɔ pè nɛ n sah ǹ tyɩ́ yõ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ sɔ̃́.
Yé náh wɛ di, névi-à tɛ̃ wɛ ǹ kéte yahlɛ n tɛ̃́npnɛ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂nɛ, à kɩ pɩ sɔ̃́ tɛ́ kɩ fɛ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, pépi nónó-á Liyel nolɛ?
Tɛ̃̀ náh yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ nɛ́sã́nnɛ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́ káh pɔ de tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ, ǹ tyɩ́ kɔ̃ kè pɔ n yɩkɩ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
À wil képah sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú tɔ yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ mɛ tɛ̃̀ yĩ́ngbɩ́lɛ n yo, sɔ̃̀nko yílɔ́nɔ́ káh pɔ à yĩni tɛ̃, à kɔ̃ à pɔ tɛ̃ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ vyɔ́y sɔkɔ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tɛ̃́pú yòhnɩ̀nmɔpu tɔ yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ànɛ̂ wɛ́kɩ́nyĩpulɛ. Pè náh yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ sèwɔbɩlɛ ànɛ̂ kwâh yáhnkɔ̃pulɛ yĩ́nvǐ sɔkɔ.
Gbɩ nɛ̂-á pè wɛ pɩ̃ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ, pè yɩ̃nɛ pè kè tɛ̃ n sah pé sõnɔ sɔkɔ pallɛ.
Ké gbennɛ, pè yɩ̃nɛ mɔ́nyahnɔlɛ. Pílkí-ńsah-à wɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ pé tyɩ́, pè kɩ pyě fɛ̃ wilki sah Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tɛ̃́pú yòhnɩ̀nmɔpulɛ.

Syɔ́ nónó tɔ-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tɛ̃́pú yòhnɩ̀nmɔpulɛ, pé yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ névyelɛ nónó-á yõ̀yén mɛ n sah pé yõ. Pè náh yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ névye tyɩ́ yónkòpulɛ. Pè yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́npnɛ̀pulɛ, pè mó nɛ n mɛ tómm tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ.
Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yah tɛ̃́pú yòhnɩ̀nmɔ-ò yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ sê núkú nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, à mó nɛ mɛ tɛ̃ wɛ ǹ wɛ̃́npì ànɛ̂ ǹ kéte yah tɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́.
Nónó-à pé tõ̀lɛ n pɩ pallɛ, pè kɩ yĩ́n-ńsah ǹgbɛ̃ wɛ ké sɔkɔ, tɛ́ gbõ̀ sàh-ǹsah tɔ kɩ wɛ pé tyɩ́ pé wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ.
Mé ye sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ á tyɩ́, ǹtɛ ń sõnɔ sɔkɔ mé kɩ pɔ n yah n pi á tyɩ́ dǒ kwéy.

Ǹtɛ máh kɩ se mo pɔ́nyah-ńsah á tyɩ́, tyi nónó-á mé wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ á tyɩ́, sépi kɩ ǹ yohnɩ n mɔ á kɩ á gblɔ̌y tɛ̃ dùkù pɩ̃ min nɛ́tɛ̃̂ Liyel no wrɔ́ sɔkɔ, pépi nónó-á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìlɛ, nónó-á gbɩ tɛ̃́nsàhpulɛ dàhpɛ sɔ̃́.
Liyel-á nɛ̂ yo á tyɩ́ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, tyi ǹgbɛ̃ ye kélɛ.
Liyel ǹ gblɔ̌y pɩ névilɛ à pɔ sétáh yõ, nɛ̂-á Kristalɛ.
Liyel Mirki kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ nɛ́gbɩ́-á ǹnɛ,
yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ à wɛ,
ǹ tyɩ́ yo névye tyɩ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ,
névye náhnáh sɛ̃ ǹ yõ kèkõyṍ,
tɛ́ yĩ̂nyõ sɔkɔ, Liyel mɛ gbílkínɔ́ sah ǹ yõ.
Liyel Mirki kè yo dal mɔ pnɛ́yy nɛ kèkõyṍ-à pópó n tyɛ, névye túkù-á kɩ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yahle, tɛ́ kɩ sɛ̃ mɩ̀nyobe wɛlɔ yõ, ànɛ̂ kwɔ́nɔ́ nónó-á n wil sétã̀n tyɩ́.
Névye nónó-á yĩ́nvǐnpɩbɩlɛ ànɛ̂ mɩ̀nyobelɛ, pépi nónó-á pè náh sennɛ n pnɛ póllɛ, pè kɩ pé gblɔ̌y sah pépi kɔ̃ pè kɩ vi tɛ̃.

Pépi ye n kwɔ névyelɛ nɛ pɛ dékè náh mɛ sê tɔ́kɩ̀ náh mɛ, ànɛ̂ yõ yõ yî yísyɔ́-á mɛ sè náh yɩ̃nɛ yṍnɔ́lɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel mó tɔ̃ kénɛ yõ yõ yî mɔ nɛ péwɔ yõ sɛ̃́pú nónó-á gbɩlɛ n pnɛ, pè sélɛ n yõ pè mó pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛynɛ pélɛ n kɔ̃.
Liyel-á yî nónó pól mɔ, sè plɛ. Milki milki kwâh náh mɛ sé sɔkɔ, áyâh mɛ sè fɛ̃ syi tɛ́ mɛ pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́nɔ́ wɛynɛ ǹnɛ n kɔ̃.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel wɛy ànɛ̂ nírí ye n pɩ yíyìnì póllɛ yályál Liyel yah sɔkɔ.

Wáh kɩ tyi nɔ́pilɛ á yṹnpyélɛ n kwɔ, á kɩ pɩ Yesu Krista tõ̀npɩ pèpɛynɛ. Á kɩ kè wɛ̃kɩ képah sɔkɔ nɛ pǎh Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛlɔ ànɛ̂ kwɔ́nɔ́ kègbɩ nɛ̂nɛ ǹ kwɔ sɔkɔ, sǎh de yĩ́ĩ́ á sɔkɔ.
Á náh vi sèmìrn wã̀n ànɛ̂ wɛ̀nwã̀n kɔ̃, sépi nónó náh tir yɔ́lɛ n pɛkɩ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Gbah n tɛ̃ ǹ nɛ n mɛ Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ.

Wil gbɛ̃́nsê dàrnmɔnɔlɛ tõ̀lɛ, yõre mɛ ké tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ yõre wɔ kal tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ. Yé náh wɛ di, képah gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye á kɩ min wɛ kwɛy gbĩ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ ńsõ̂ tɔlɛ.
Wɛy mɛ̀nɛ gbɩ wɛy ye kélɛ, nɛ̂-á no pól yɩ̃nɛ pè kè fɛ̃ n syi.

Yé náh wɛ di, ápi-à mɛ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yèvyãhrɩlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ gbah tɛ̃ sɛ̃́, képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ min nɛ́tɛ̃̂ Liyel yõ, nɛ̂-á no pól pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ. Tɛ́ wǎh kɩ nónó pwah n mɔ n pi kal, pépi yé pɩ Krista yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ.
Képah ye á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ gbah n yo névye tyɩ́ ǹtɛ pè kwɔ kélɛ.

Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh yɩ̃nɛ à álɛ n yilɔ wáh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ wɛ̃́npirlɛ. Yɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tɛ̃ wɛ álɛ n yah n pɩ á vyãh wɛy sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ á pɩ dùkù sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ á sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ á Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ á pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ yályál Liyel yah.
Máh kɩ pópó n pi, gbah n tɛ̃ Liyel wɛynɛ n kar tɔ́wû sɔkɔ, ǹ tɛ́ névyelɛ n vi mɔ, ǹ tɛ́ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ n pɩ.

Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ̂-á mɛ á tyɩ́, káh kè tɛ̃ gbõ̀nwɔ̀kɔ̀lɛ dɛ́; képah nɛ̂-á á wɛ Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu wɛlɔ gbõ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú yah tɛ̃́pú-á pé gbã̀n sah á yõ à nírí pɩ á tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ.
Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ mɛ̀ tɛ̃ gbɛ̃̀nínìnɛ, gbah n tɛ̃ ké sɔkɔ. Képah sɔkɔ, no pól kɩ kè wɛ nɛ wáh mɛ n yuku yahlɛ.

Á gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, wáh kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂nɛ n kɔ̃ ǹ tɛ́ ké tɔ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ. Gbah n tɛ̃ nɛ n yuku yahlɛ ké sɔkɔ. Wâh n pɩ sɛ̃́, képah sɔkɔ ye á kɩ á gblɔ̌y pwah mɔ, tɛ́ kɩ á wɛy nóhpú tɔ pwah mɔ.
Wâh yèwàhlɛ n vi mɔ, káh nɛ n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ dírí sɔkɔ, nɛ n wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ á sú sɔ̃́ ǹnɛ. Kètɛ̃̀npìlɛ n vi mɔ á yṹnpyé sɔ̃́ pélɛ.
Syɔ́dîlɛ n vi mɔ á yṹbí sɔ̃́ pélɛ, ǹ tɛ́ syɔ́npìlɛ n vi mɔ ké yah pèpɛy yõ á dósyɔ́ sɔ̃́ pélɛ.
Pɛ́kúsyɔ nónó-á yòhnɩ̀nmɔpu náh mɛ pé tyɩ́, pé tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ.

Ǹtɛ pɛ́kúsyɔ nónó tyɩ́ wɛ̃́npì-à mɛ, képah náh pɩ pétóbélɛ, kénɛ wɛ̃́npì ye yɩ̃nɛ pè pé Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ̃kɩ à yuku pé gbô tãn tĩ̀nnɛ. Pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ̂ pɩ pé dúbípú tyɩ́, pè képahlɛ n pɩ pé tyɩ́. Yé náh wɛ di, képah tyɩ́ ye nɔ Liyel tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ sê nɛ̂-à mɛ pɛ́kúsèlɛ kègbɩ yõ sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á névi náh mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ kɩ à yohnɩ mɔ, ǹmɔ ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ ǹ gbõ̀ sah n yĩ́ĩ́ Liyel yõ sɔkɔ. Ǎ Liyellɛ n ye n gbo nírí sɔkɔ lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀.
Ǹtɛ pɛ́kúsè nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-à mɛ wil gbɛ̃́nsê dékè tyi ólɛ n sõ, ǹmɔ mɛ kúnɔ́lɛ tɛ́ à sah vilɛ.
Wáh yɩ̃nɛ ǹ nɛ̂ tɔ yo pé tyɩ́ sɔ̃̀nko lékàh káh pɔ wɛ pé tyɩ́, kè wɛ yɔ̀.
Névi nɛ̂-à n yáhndahnmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ tyɩ́ névye tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ ǹ kéte névye tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ milki. Krista yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névi ńtɛ̃ fṍnfṍ ǹmɔ yõ.
Pɛ́kúsè nɛ̂ yĩn-à pópó n wãrkɩ, à ǹnɛ n mɔ n kõ pɛ́kúsyɔ wrɔ́ à yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ ye tikitɔ̃nɩ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔ wɛ, à mó nɛ mɛ de yah pɛ núkú ó tyɩ́.

Ǹ tyɩ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ mɛ pɩ̃́nɔ́lɛ ǹ tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. À nɛ n mɛ ǹ wɛ̃́npì tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, à nɛ n mɛ yɛ nɛ́pân nɛ n twah n tyɩ́, à nɛ n mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú gbyẽ̂hnɛ n wu, à nɛ n mɛ névye nnɔlɛ n de nónó-á mɛ yèkwɔrɩ sɔkɔ, à mó nɛ n mɛ tyípéplɔ duke póllɛ n pɩ.
Ǹtɛ syɔ́pâm nónó tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á pɛ́kúsyɔlɛ, káh pépi yni wãrkɩ pɛ́kúsyɔ sɔkɔ. Á náh wɛ di, lédɔ́rɩ́-à pɔ pé wrɔ́ gbɛ mɔ Kristalɛ, pè n nɛ n mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé syɩ de pɛbɩ tyɩ́.
Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, lékàh n wɛ pé tyɩ́, pǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pé vyãhlɛ Krista kɔ̃ tɛ́ pɔ pé syɩ ǹ náh.

Pǎh se tɔ̃ pɩ tõ̀ kɛ̃́ névyelɛ sɛ̃́, pè n wũ n tɛ̃ gbéngbèn kɔ̃́nkɔ̃nɔ ó sɔkɔ. Pépi ye tõ̀ náh mɛ pé tyɩ́ yɔ̀, tɛ́ pè n tɔ̃ n pɩ wɛ̀nkwĩnki wɛ́kɩ́púlɛ vyãhlɛ dálnɔ́lɛ, ǹ nɛ n wɛkɩ n min n dah n mɔ sɛ̃́.

Képah ye, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pɛ́kúsyɔ nónó-á mɛ syɔ́pâmnɛ, pè de pɛbɩ tyɩ́. Pè fɛ̃ wɛ̃́npì wɛ, pè mó nɛ n yah n dah mɔ pé gbên tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Sɔ̃̀nko pè káh pɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɩkɩ mɔ á sépɛ́bɩ́ kɔ̃ pè á yĩ́npolɛ n yo.
Yé náh wɛ di, pɛ́kúsyɔ túkù ye mɛ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ milki tɛ, tɛ́ mɛ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ sõ̀ tɛ̃.

Ǹtɛ pɛ́kúsyɔ-à mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ò sê nɛ̂ wɔ̀kɔ̀ tãn sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n yah n dah mɔ pé tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko képah káh pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yṍtɔ́kɔ́bɩ́lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tɔ kɩ mó n yah n dah mɔ pɛ́kúsyɔ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ nónó-á nɛ́kã́n tãnnɛ.

Yah tɛ̃́pú nónó-à mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yahlɛ n tɛ̃ pallɛ, yõ̀yén yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n sah n yĩ́ĩ́ pé yõ. Ké dú dɔkɔ pé nónó-á Liyel wɛy yónɔ́ ànɛ̂ névye kwɔ́nɔ́ tõ̀ mɛ dahbɩ pé gbõ̀.

Yé náh wɛ di, kè mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ Liyel wɛy sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ nɛ, nyeh-à mɛ swãh tṍnɔ́ sɔkɔ á tyɩ́ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, á káh sé vyɛ̃y pukubi nɛ sè káh á sèmukɔlɛ n yõ. Tɛ́ tɔ̃ mɛ wã́rkɩ́nɔ́lɛ nɛ, tõ̀npɩ-á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ sǎr wɛ́nɔ́lɛ.
Káh n fɛ̃ n syi lékàhlɛ n syi yah tɛ̃́-òlɛ n kɔ̃ nɛ kénɛ tir náh wil tàrfyɔ̀ nɛ́pĩ̂ nímí képah náh pɩ tɔ̃́mɩ́ vyɛ̃y sɔkɔ.
Névi nɛ̂-à tyítúkù pɩ, kè yo gbǎb tɔ́wû pól yĩ́ yah sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko kè tíkí mɔ tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Mé kélɛ n gbah n yo á tyɩ́ Liyel yah, ànɛ̂ Yesu Krista yah, ànɛ̂ yĩ̂nyõ tõ̀npɩbɩ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́ yah sɔkɔ nɛ, á tyi nɔ́pi póllɛ n pɩ tómm, á káh wǎhkɩ̀lɛ n pɩ.
Káh nɛ n sal á gbõ̀lɛ n sah névi yõ ǹ nírílɛ n pɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ káh á vyãhlɛ n dah n mɔ á ní-òlɛ ǹ tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Nɛ n mɛ yályál Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Wáh mɛ n yɔ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ sɛ̃́, káh ni ó kɔ́kɔ́lɛ n wɔ, dìvɛ̃ tɔlɛ n wɔ kwéykwey á fɔkɔ markɩ yĩnnɛ.
Névye túkù tyípêl mɛ sè n wilki n mɔ kwèyy pé tùkè-ǹkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ túkù tyɩ́ mɛ, náh ó sè n pɔ n pɩ̃.
Sɛ̃́ ye tyípéplɔ tɔlɛ, sépi tɔ n wɛ kwèyy yĩ́nɛ, ànɛ̂ nónó ńtɛ̃ fyé-á sè náh mɛ n yah, sè náh n wũ n pi wìlkìnmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ.

Nónó pól-á mɛ yɔ̃rɩlɛ n pɩ, pè yɩ̃nɛ pè pé yõ̀tãmnɛ n mɔ n kõ nɛ pǎh yɩ̃nɛ yõ̀yén sàhnɔ́lɛ pé yõ, sɔ̃̀nko áyáh kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂nɛ n kɔ̃, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh pɔ képah ànɛ̂ Liyel tyɩ́lɛ n yo n ko.

Nónó yõ̀tãm-à mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, pè náh yɩ̃nɛ pè yo nɛ pé yṹnpyé-á pélɛ, pè mó yahle yõ̀yén sàhnɔ́lɛ pé yõ sɔkɔ dɛ́. Pépi nónó-á pé yṹnpyé pèplɔlɛ, pépi-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ n wɛ pé tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́ yõrelɛ, pè ye pyě yɩ̃nɛ pè tõ̀lɛ n pɩ n yĩ́ĩ́ pépi tyɩ́ ńkɛ̃́.
Yah, kénɛ tyi ye á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ nolɛ n kwɔ, ǹ tɛ́ sè kõ n sah pè kɔ̃.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à pɔ nolɛ n kwɔ tyíkáhkɩ́lɛ, tɛ́ kè náh mɛ núkúlɛ gbɩ wɛynɛ nɛ̂-á wil ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á á wɛ Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ yõ,

képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́-á tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃́ wɔ. Ǹpɩ̃̀-ǹkɛ̃̂ nɛy ye tɛ̃̀nɛ, nɛ̂-á yékã̂b pɩ́nɔ́, ànɛ̂ wɛ̃̀nkyɔ̃ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ mɛ ǹ yõ̀gbèkè yɩkɩ sah, sépi nónó-á n pɔ n pɔ mɛ́kɩ̀lɛ. Sépi ye n pɔ n pɔ yṹnwɔ̃rɩ́, ànɛ̂ mɛ́wɛ́y, ànɛ̂ yrɔ́wã̂n yɔ́nɔ́, ànɛ̂ gbyɔlɛ.
Tɛ́ tɔ̃ n pɔ n pɔ yékã̂b kwĩnkilɛ lékã́m kɛ̃́ névye wrɔ́, nónó-á pè náh gbɩlɛ n pnɛ póllɛ. Pépi tãn n nɛ n sõ nɛ Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, kwâh wɛ́nɔ́-á mɛ ké sɔkɔ.
Gbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye, Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́lɛ tahrɩ ǹgbɛ̃ ye kélɛ névye tyɩ́, nónó-á pé wɛ́nɔ́ pé yĩ́nɛ n yuku.
Yé náh wɛ di, ápi náh pɔ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, á náh mó á syɩ n sɔkɔ n pi kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ.
Ǹtɛ yõke ànɛ̂ flɔ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ á tyɩ́, sè yɩ̃nɛ sè á yĩ́ yuku.

Ǹtɛ nónó-à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pɩ tahbɩlɛ, pépi ye n de mɔ́nyahnɔ sɔkɔ. Tyíwã̂n ànɛ̂ yõ kɛ̃́ tyi sõnɔ n pɔ pè mɔ n tɛ̃, sépi nónó-á névyelɛ n mɔ tyɩ́ yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ mɔ́npunɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, tyípêl duke pól tyàh-ǹsah n wil pɔ́ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ. Pɔ́ yáhnkɔ̃nɔ képékè tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, túkù Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yal mɔ, tɛ́ kwlɔ́nɔ́ náhnáh yɔrɩ mɔ pé gblɔ̌y yõ.

Ǹtɛ áwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á Liyel tyɩ́ névilɛ, nɛ n to kénɛ tyi yah sɔkɔ. Nɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ á pɩ nɛ́gbɩlɛ Liyel yah, á nɛ n mɛ Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ, á nɛ n mɛ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ Liyel yõ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ n mɛ á sɔkɔ, á nɛ n mɛ sṍnmɔ́lɛ n pɩ, á mó nɛ n mɛ á gblɔ̌ynɛ n tiki n mɔ.
Mɛ́kɩ̀ pèpɛy fwo à yuku Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Á pwáhnmɔnɔ tɛ̃ n yĩn pállɛ, képah nɛ̂ yĩn-á Liyel ye álɛ, tɛ́ á mɛ fɛ̃ syi névye náhnáh yĩ́ yah nɛ wáh pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ.
Liyel nɛ̂-á minnɛ yíyìn póllɛ n kɔ̃, ànɛ̂ Yesu Krista nɛ̂-á yĩn Põse Pilatɩ yah sɔkɔ à Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛlɔ tɔ̃ sah wɛkɩ, pépi yĩ́ yah sɔkɔ ye mé kélɛ n yo á tyɩ́ nɛ,
tyi nónó-á kõ sah ǹ kɔ̃, á sé wã̀llɛ n kɔ. Á nɛ n mɛ pílkí-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ ànɛ̂ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ á tyɩ́ fɔ́ɔ́ kɩ pɔ nɔ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista syɩ́npɔnɔ tyɩ́.

Liyel núkúní nɛ̂-á tyi pól tyɩ́ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀-òlɛ, pèpɔrɩ-á n wil ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yõ̀tãmnɔ́ Yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ tãmnɔ TƐ̃̀ ǸGBƐ̃NƐ ǹmɔ ye kɩ Krista kɔ̃ à kɩ ǹ syɩ pɔ à yɩ̃nɛ ké gbĩ́ yáhntɔkɔnsàhnɔ́lɛ.

Ǹmɔ ó ye à náh ku n yah n pi. À mɛ déntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ kyòo yɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ̂-á nɛy náh fɛ̃ n nɔ n de n pi kélɛ. Nɛy yĩ́ náh tɛ̃ yah ké yõ, ànɛ̂ nɛy yĩ́ náh n tɛ̃ n yah n pi ǹ yõ sɔkɔ. Gbílkínnɔ́ ànɛ̂ tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ n sah ǹ mɔ yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina!

Kè yo kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tahbɩ tyɩ́ nɛ pè káh pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki, pè káh pé gbõ̀ sah tahrɩ yõ nɛ̂-á kɩ n tyɛ n pi. Ǹtɛ pè pé gbõ̀ sah Liyel yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á yíyìnì póllɛ ápilɛ n kɔ̃ náhnáh nɛ̂-á kɩ á kɔ̃ á kɩ mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Yo pé tyɩ́ nɛ pè tyípéplɔlɛ n pɩ, pè yɛ pé tahrɩ pɩ tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ. Pè pɩ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩ névyelɛ nónó-á kɩ fɛ̃ syi n yɩ̃ n kɔ̃.
Képah sɔkɔ, pè kɩ tahrɩ pèpɛy yah sah pé gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ ńsõ̂ yĩnnɛ nɛ̂-á kè náh n yɩkɩ. Sɔ̃̀nko pè pɔ min kègbɩ wɛ.

Ń dĩ́ Timote, tyi nónó-á áwɔ gbõ̀ dahbɩ, sé tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ. Káh nɛ n de yékã̂b wã̀n pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ nónó náh mɛ n yuku Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ káh névye wɛlɔ nɩ́nɛ n tɛ̃ nónó-á pé gblɔ̌y pɩ tyi kàhnpnɛpulɛ.
Névye túkù ye pé gblɔ̌y pɩ kénɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ mɛ̀ dùkù névyelɛ, tɛ́ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ milki.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ, Liyel ǹ pèpɔrɩ pɩ yé tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ Polelɛ, Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névi ye ńnɛ à yɩ̃nɛ Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀nɛ. Liyel-á ǹ vyãhlɛ á kɔ̃ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kè n wɛ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, à ń tɛkɩ mɔ képah tyɩ́ yo yĩnnɛ névye tyɩ́.

Ń pídĩ́ Timote, áwɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ń tyɩ́, áwɔ tyɩ́ ye mé n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ á tyɩ́, pè mó á yãm yah, ànɛ̂ pè yèvɩnɩnɛ ǹ kɔ̃.
Gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ mâh n sõ á tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, mě wɛynɛ Liyellɛ n kɔ̃ náhnáh ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á mé mɛ ń fɔkɔ dal mɔ tõ̀lɛ n pɩ pallɛ ń sútóbé tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Lékã̂h ké gbĩ̀ntɔ̃̀, mâh nírílɛ n pɩ, mè n pɩ á tɔ tyɩ́.
Ń dyɔ-à to kõ á yétĩ kwɛ́nɔ́ tyɩ́lɛ, mè n nɛ n mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé ǹ wɛ ń nɩ kɔ̃ kè vɩ yĩ́ĩ́.
Ń dyɔ náh fwɔ á Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ kègbɩ tyɩ́lɛ. Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ kègbɩ nɛ̂-á lésõ mɛ á yṹntó Loyisi ànɛ̂ á yṹ Yenusi sɔkɔ, ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ nɛ, képah núkú-á mɛ á tɔ sɔkɔ.
Képah ye, mé á dyɔlɛ n to n kõ nɛ, máh ń gbã̀n sah á yõ á nírí pɩ á tyɩ́, tɛ́ Liyel mɛ ǹ Mirki tǎhkɩ̀ nɛ̂nɛ ǹ kɔ̃, á kè koh n tɛ̃ yĩn.
Ǹgbǒ Mirki nɛ̂-á Liyel á kɔ̃, tíkí Mirki náh kélɛ dɛ́; tǎhkɩ̀ ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́ Mirki ye.

Káh n yɛ ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ pɩ sennɛ á tyɩ́. Ńmɔ mɛ́nɔ́lɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ sõwãh, káh n yɛ kè nɛ mɛ sennɛ á tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ yèvyãhrɩ fɛ̃ n syi ńmɔlɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́ mó nɛ mɛ Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ yõ,

képah nɛ̂-á pwah mɔ ápilɛ, tɛ́ à mɛ á ye pɩ ǹ nolɛ. Á tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩn náh à képah pɩ á tyɩ́ dɛ́, kè ye ǹ dyɔ ànɛ̂ pèpɔrɩ ye à pɩ á tyɩ́ kélɛ. Yesu gbõ̀ yõ, à kénɛ pèpɔrɩ mɛ̀ pɩ sah ápi kɔ̃ kèkõyṍ mɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ.
Kénɛ kèpɔrɩ ye á wɛ núkúnúkú á pwáhnmɔ-ò Yesu Krista pɔ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹmɔ ye pɔ kũ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ tɛ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yo á tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á á mɔ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.
Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir mɛ̀ yĩn ye Liyel ńmɔ ye tõ, tɛ́ n pɩ Yesu tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyo-òlɛ, ànɛ̂ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kwɔ́-òlɛ.

Képah kwlɔ́nɔ́ ye ń yõ sɔkɔ, ǹtɛ kè náh mɛ sennɛ ń tyɩ́. Máh ń gbõ̀ sah névi nɛ̂ yõ, mé ǹnɛ n pnɛ dò. Ń sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ mɛ ké yõ tɔlɛ nɛ wǎh nɛ̂ dahbɩ ń gbõ̀, tǎhkɩ̀-á mɛ ǹ sɔkɔ kɩ fɛ̃ ké tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, pópó kɩ pɔ nɔ gbĩ̀nyĩ̀kì tɛ́y sõ tyɩ́.
Timote, máh wɛlɔ gblɔ nónó yo á tyɩ́, sè koh n tɛ̃ n yĩn Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ, sépi nónó-á á wɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ.
Liyel Mirki nɛ̂-á mɛ ápi sɔkɔ, képah gbõ̀ yõ wáh kwɔ́nɔ́ pèpɛy nɛ̂ wɛ, kè koh n tɛ̃ yĩn pallɛ.
Áwɔ ńtɛ̃ pɩ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ, Asi mara tãn pól-á pé náh vi ń kɔ̃, Fisyɛlɩ ànɛ̂ Yɛrɛmosyɛnɩ ńtɛ̃ tɔ pé náh vi ń kɔ̃.

Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ, à Nsyonesifɔrɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ no nɩlɛ n gbɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, máh wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ kǎrnnɛ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ ń tyɩ́, ké sen náh ǹmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ yah kõ ń nɩ dénpɔnɔlɛ gbáhyɩ̃́ náhnáhlɛ.
Ǹ yĩ́níntɛ̃nɔ ǹsɔ̃̀ Wrome kwil sɔkɔ, à ń gbah soh kɔ̃ súú à kyɩ wɛ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ à ǹ yãm yah tukey tuke sõlɛ. Wǎh yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ nónó pɩ ń tyɩ́ Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ, nɛy náh sè pɩ̃ nɔ áwɔ Timotelɛ.
Áwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ ń pídĩ́ Timote, yõ̀bènɔrɩ nɛ̂-á ápi wɛ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Yesu Kristalɛ, képah yĩnnɛ, á tah n sah yĩ́ĩ́.
Wáh ń kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ noh névye náhnáh yĩ́ yah, kyɩ nɛ́gblɔ́ kwɔ kélɛ, nónó tɔ-á kɩ tɔ̃ fɛ̃ túkù kwɔ kélɛ.
Kwlɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á yɩ̃nɛ álɛ, kè fɛ̃ n syi Yesu Krista sràsyi yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Névi-à fyɔ̀ de sràsyìyá sɔkɔ tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé yõ̀tɛ̃̀ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ n pɩ, ǎ ǹ vyãh dɛ kèkõyṍ tyi tɛ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Wɛ̃ kàlnɔ́ tólɔ́ tó-ò tɔ náh tɔ̃́rɩ́ yṍkúrílɛ n wɛ n pnɛ nɛ́ à náh to ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.
Sètõ nɛ̂-á tõ swãhlɛ à kwlɔ, ǹmɔ ǹgbò ye yɩ̃nɛ ké sèmukɔ wɛ́nɔ́lɛ
Sõ n yah ń wɛlɔ yõ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kɩ sé pól syɩ́kɩ́-ńsahlɛ ǹ wɛ̃kɩ.
Káh á dyɔ fwɔ Yesu Krista tyɩ́lɛ,
ǹmɔ nɛ̂ lékó-á yiki mɔ.
Davidi náh nɛy ye ǹnɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ye kélɛ yónɔ́lɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir sɔkɔ, képah nɛ̂-á mé mɛ n yo n kɔ̃.
Kénɛ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yĩn ye kwlɔ́nɔ́lɛ ń yõ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ kârnnɛ mɔ́nɔ́lɛ ń tyɩ́ á kɩ nɛ pèkè pɩ́-ò sɔ̃́ ńnɛ. Ǹtɛ kârn náh se yɔ́ mɛ mɔ Liyel wɛy tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ tɛ́.
Képah ye, mé mɛ tyi póllɛ n sro névye yĩnnɛ Liyel-á nónó yah tɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko pé tɔ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ, pé mó gbílkínɔ́ wɛ nɛ̂-á kè náh n tyɛ.
Gbɩ wɛy yɔ́ wɛ yɔ̀:
Áyáh kɩ mɛ ku Yesu Kristalɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, á kɩ mɛ min tɔ sɔkɔ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Áyáh kɩ á tah sah wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ǹnɛ,
á kɩ tɔ̃́rɩ́ pɩ ǹnɛ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Áyáh kɩ à yahle,
ǹ tɔ kɩ á yahle.
Áyáh kɩ sɔ̃́ pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ,
ǹmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ tɛ̃ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ,
à náh fɛ̃ ǹ syɩ n kur n pi.
Névye dyɔ to n kõ n mɔ kénɛ tyilɛ, ǹ tɛ́ ké gbáhdyâh di pé tyɩ́ Liyel yah sɔkɔ nɛ, pè káh yékã̂b wã̀nnɛ n pɩ. Sè náh tir yɔ́lɛ n pɛkɩ. Nónó-á mɛ sélɛ n nohnɩ, sè n pyě pépi mɔ n pu.
Á tah n sah Liyel yĩ́ kɔ̃ kè yuku álɛ. Pɩ tõ̀npɩlɛ, nɛ̂-á gbɩ wɛlɔlɛ n yo ké yah yõ, tɛ́ sen náh n pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ à yuku ǹ tõ̀ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ.
káh yã́hwã̂nnɛ n yãh nónó-á sè náh mɛ yuku Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Nónó-à kélɛ n pɩ, pé wrɔ́ n nɛ n gbah n gbɛ Liyellɛ.
Pé yã́hwã̂n yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ n pɩ á kɩ nɛ nówũ̂-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ willɛ n yõ sɔ̃́. Yimene ànɛ̂ Filɛtɩ tɔ mɛ kénɛ sɛ̃́nknɔ névye sɔkɔ.
Pépi gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ fĩn mɔ tɛ́ mɛ n yo n nɛ lékyɩ̂-á yilki mɔ sɔkɔ tɛ. Sɛ̃́ ye pè pɩ tɛ́ névye náhnáh Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yɩkɩ.
Ǹtɛ sépinɔ pól sɔkɔ, Liyel-á sètyah nɛ̂ wilki, képah tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ. Wɛlɔ nónó-á mɛ wã́rkɩ́nɔ́lɛ ké tyɩ́ yõ, sè wɛ yɔ̀:
«Nónó-á mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ yõ, à pélɛ n pnɛ.»
Ànɛ̂ tɔ̃: «Nónó pól-á Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n ye n gbo, pè yɩ̃nɛ pè tyítúkúnì wɛ n yɛ.»
Wɔ̀kɔ̀ ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, sã́n vyɔ́ ànɛ̂ wárn vyɔ́ ó kɔ́kɔ́ náh mɛ dɛ́; sésár tyɩ́nɔ mɛ, puri tyɩ́nɔ tɔ mɛ. Túkù mɛ yî tǎhnɩ̀ mɔ yĩnnɛ, túkù mó mɛ ńyã̌n yî mɔ yĩnnɛ.
Tyi nónó tyɩ́-á mé yo, Névi nɛ̂-à sè wɛ yɛ tɛ́ pɩ yályál Liyel yah, tɛ̃̀ kɩ mɛ wìlkìnsàhnɔ́lɛ tyítǎhnɩ̀ pɩ yĩnnɛ. Ǹ yétõ̂ kɩ mɛ yõ̀tɛ̃̀ dĩ́ tyɩ́ tyípéplɔ pɩ yĩnnɛ.

Kètɛ̃̀npìkìnì dékè tyi wɛ n yɛ. Tyi nónó-á á yɩ̃nɛ n yah n kɔ̃, sè wɛ yɔ̀: Gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́lɛ, Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́, tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ, ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ. Yé sépi póllɛ n pɩ ànɛ̂ névyelɛ nónó-á mɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n ye n gbo fɔkɔ pérpérlɛ.
Yékã̂b wã̀n pɩ́nɔ́ wɛ n yɛ. Á pɩ̃ nɛ sépi-á n pɔ n pɔ mâllɛ dò.
Ǹgbǒ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tõ̀npɩ náh yɩ̃nɛ mɛ́kɩ̀ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ dɛ́. À pyě yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n mɛ nɛ́pír névilɛ no pól tyɩ́, à mó nɛ n mɛ névye kwɔ́nɔ́ yah wɛ, tɛ́ pàh ǹ tyɩ́lɛ n yo, à tɛ̃ wɛ kè sṍmnɔ́.
À yɩ̃nɛ à ǹ wɛy kɔ̃̀lɩ̀pulɛ n tɛ̃ mármár à vìnmɔnɔlɛ pélɛ n kɔ̃. Nɛ̂ pɩ̃, tɛ́nkàh Liyel kɩ yɛ pè kɔ̃ pè kɩ pé sõnɔ wɛ vi mɔ kɩ gbɩ wɛ pɩ̃ tɛ́.
Képah-à pɩ, pé yah kɩ pɩ kyòo pè kɩ wɛ dɛ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ vyɔ́y sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á sõ̀ à pè mɔ tɛ̃ sah pè kɔ̃ pè ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́nɛ n pɩ.
Timote, á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ kè pɩ̃ nɛ kèkõyṍ tyɛ gbĩ́nɛ, tyah táhnɔ́nɔ-á kɩ n wɛ.

Névye kɩ pɩ gblɔ̌y yõ yɩ̃́kɩ́púlɛ, pɔ́ kódíbílɛ, wɛ̀ngbìl wɛ́kɩ́púlɛ, gblɔ̌y gbílkípúlɛ, Liyel tyɩ́ yóndepulɛ, dúbípú tyɩ́ yáhlepulɛ, pèpɔrɩ pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névyelɛ, Liyel tyi mɔ́nkõ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂púlɛ,
kùkùtǎhkɩ̀ névyelɛ, nɛ́pĩ́kɔbɩlɛ, névye yĩn yɩ́kɩ́púlɛ, gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂ névyelɛ, nɛ́kókè mɔ́púlɛ, pèpɛy fwópúlɛ,
wɛ̃ náh vìpulɛ, fɔ̀kɔ̀nvyã̀hnɩ̀ névyelɛ, gblɔ̌y yɔ̃̀nsàhpulɛ. Pé dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi tyɩ́ kɩ nɔ kal pé tyɩ́ Liyellɛ.
Pè kɩ pɩ yĩ́ yah Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́púlɛ, ǹtɛ kègbɩ yõ, pè náh Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ tǎhkɩ̀ fɛ̃ n syi n pi. Káh nɛ n pɩ n soh sɛ̃́nknɔ névyelɛ.
Pé túkù n nɛ n de n kɔ̃ gbên sɔkɔ ǹ syɔ́ túkùlɛ n vi n tɛ̃, nónó lékã́m-á tuke. Kénɛ syɔ́ mɛ tyípêl ó pé tɔ̂ɔ́. Tyi duke pól dékè n nɛ n mɛ pé sɔkɔ.
Pè mɛ sã́hnɔ́ sɔkɔ kṹmm, ǹtɛ pè náh mɛ fɛ̃ gbɩlɛ n pnɛ póllɛ.
Nsyãnɛsɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyãbrɛsɩ-á Moyisi kɔ̃lɩ sɔ̃́, sɛ̃́ ye pépi tɔ mɛ n kɔ̃lɩ gbɩlɛ. Pé sõnɔ náh mɛ pallɛ. Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ náh yuku yahlɛ.
Ǹtɛ pè náh n yuku n pi yahlɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, no pól kɩ pé nɛ́wṍré wɛ kwèyy sɔ̃́-á Nsyãnɛsɩ ànɛ̂ Nsyãbrɛsɩ tyɩ́ pɩ.

Ǹtɛ áwɔ Timote tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye ńmɔ sèfiki mɔ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ: Máh kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ pɩ á kè fɛ̃ syi, tɛ́ mɛ ń pɩ dùkùlɛ n yah n pɩ. Á ń sõnɔlɛ n pnɛ, ànɛ̂ ń Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ dùkùlɛ, ànɛ̂ ń tyi srónɔ́ dùkùlɛ, ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ ń sɔkɔ, à tahlɩ máh mɛ gbah tɛ̃ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ.

Pǎh ń fõh dùkù nɛ̂nɛ á kélɛ n pnɛ, à tahlɩ máh yèvyãhrɩ nónó pɩ Antyɔsyɩ, ànɛ̂ Yikonyumi, ànɛ̂ Lisitir sɔkɔ. Fṍhnɔ́ nɛ̂ dùkù tɛ̃̀ mɛ mé náh kè wɛ yah? Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ ń pwah mɔ sépi pól sɔkɔ.
Gbɩ yõ, nónó pól-á sɛ̃ Yesu yõ, tɛ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé pé minnɛ n pɩ Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, pé kɩ fṍhnɔ́ wɛ.
Ǹtɛ nɛ́pêl ànɛ̂ névye pílkípú tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ yɔ̃ sɔkɔ pèkè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ kɩ névye túkù pilki, tɛ́ kɩ pé gblɔ̌y ńtɛ̃ tɔ pilki.
Ǹtɛ áwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ-á kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ wɛ tɛ́ kè fɛ̃ syi nɛ gbɩ-á kélɛ, kè tɛ̃ yĩn pallɛ. Wáh kwɔ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ wɛ nɛ̂ tyɩ́, á ǹnɛ n pnɛ ó.
Á wɛ̃́npir gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ á Liyel wɛynɛ n pnɛ. Kè kɩ fɛ̃ á lékã́m yɩkɩ mɔ ǹ kɔ̃ á kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ Yesu Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ.
Liyel wɛy pól wãrkɩ Liyel tǎhkɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ. Kè wãrkɩ névye kwɔ yĩnnɛ, ànɛ̂ mɩ̀nɩ̀ gbel kye yĩnnɛ, ànɛ̂ pílkí-ńtã̂n tɔ̃ yĩnnɛ, ànɛ̂ névi mɔ yĩnnɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ sɔkɔ,
sɔ̃̀nko, Liyel tyɩ́ névi pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ tã̀n pèplɔ pól fɛ̃ n pɩ yĩnnɛ.
Yesu Krista nɛ̂-á kɩ pɔ vye ànɛ̂ kyɩ̂ tuke n pi, mé kélɛ n gbah n yah n kɔ̃ á tyɩ́ Liyel ànɛ̂ ǹmɔ yĩ́ yah, à tahlɩ ǹ syɩ́npɔnɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ yĩn yõ nɛ,
