á Liyel wɛynɛ nɛ n yo. Kàh sɔ̃́ yèvyãhrɩ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ ò; kàh sɔ̃́ yèvɩnɩ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ ò; kélɛ nɛ n gbah n yo. Névi nɛ̂-à pu pɩ, wɛkɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ, vìnmɔnɔlɛ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃, tɛ̃̀ tɔkɔ yárr ǹ kwɔ́nɔ́lɛ à kɔ̃.
Gbĩ yɔ́ mɛ n pi, túkù náh tɔ̃ kwɔ́nɔ́ yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ fɛ̃ n syi n pi. Tyi nónó dékè-á n ko pélɛ, pè kɩ kwɔ́pú kwĩnki yísyɔ́ yah nónó-á kɩ pɔ sépi tyɩ́lɛ n wɛ n yo pé tyɩ́ nónó nóhnɔ́-á mɛ nɔ.
Pè kɩ pé ní tah tũ yahle gbɩ nóhnɔ́lɛ, tɛ́ kɩ sèmìrn wɔlɛ n nohnɩ.
Ǹtɛ áwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ á gblɔ̌y tɛ̃ pallɛ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ. Kwlɔ́nɔ́ sro, ǹ tɛ́ á gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yónɔ́ sɔkɔ. Pɩ Liyel tõ̀npɩ pèpɛynɛ.
Ńmɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ pɩ gbĩ́ nɔ tɛ sárkálɛ. Kèkõyṍ fĩn mɔ gbĩ́ nɔ ń tyɩ́.
Mé mɛ́kɩ̀ pèpɛy fwo à yuku Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ. Tólɔ́ nɛ̂ sɔkɔ-á sõ̀ ńnɛ, kè tyɛ. Mé náh Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ yal mɔ.

Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ yõre wɛ́nɔ́ ye mé mɛ syɩkɩ tɛ̃, nɛ̂-á nɛ́gblɔ́ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ yṍkúrílɛ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂-á tukey tùkè-ò pèpɛynɛ, ǹmɔ ye kɩ ń kɔ̃ n pi kélɛ. Tɛ́ à náh n yĩn n pi ńmɔ ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, nónó tɔ-á mɛ ǹ pɔ́nɔ́ syɩkɩ tɛ̃ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, à kɩ pépi tɔ pól kɔ̃ kélɛ.
Gbah n tɛ̃ n pɔ ń tĩ̀nnɛ súú.
Yé náh wɛ di, kwɛy gbĩ tyi mɛ yah syi Demasɩ tyɩ́ à kɔ̃ à mɛ ǹ náh vi ń kɔ̃. À mɛ sɔkɔ Tesaloniki kwil sɔkɔ. Krɛsã mó sɔkɔ Kalasi mara sɔkɔ, tɛ́ Tite wɔ mɛ sɔkɔ Dalmati mara sɔkɔ.
Likyi ó ye mɛ ń tnɔ̂. Markɩ tɛ̃ yè pɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ ǹnɛ. Ǹ yétõ̂ mɛ gblò ń tyɩ́ tõ̀ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ.
Mé Tisyiki tɛkɩ mɔ Yefɛsɩ kwil sɔkɔ.
Wáh kɩ n pi, ń fwɔ̀mɔ̀-ǹgbɛ̃ tɔkɔ n pɔ ń kɔ̃ nɛ̂-á mé sah Karpusi tyɩ́ Turasɩ kwil sɔkɔ. Ń sɛ́bɛ́ynɔ́ tɔ tɔkɔ n pɔ n kɔ̃, ǹ tɛ́ n pɔ sé sêl tyɩ́nɔ tɔlɛ, sépi nónó tyɩ́-á tah kal ń tyɩ́.
Kètɔ̃ndĩ́ Alɛkisãdre nɛ́pékè kah pɩ ńnɛ. Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kɩ à dyah n pi ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀nɛ.
À ápi wɛlɔ kɔ̃lɩ kah mɔ. Képah ye, á tɔ á gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ ǹnɛ.
Pǎh ń tuke sõ nɛ̂nɛ gbennɛ, no pól pé náh vi ń kɔ̃. Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh yo tɛ̃ mɔ ǹnɛ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à káh kè pɩ tirlɛ pé tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ wɔ so mɔ ń tyɩ́. À tǎhkɩ̀lɛ n kɔ̃ mé fɛ̃ ǹ wɛy yo yĩ́ĩ́, tɛ́ nónó náh pɩ Nsyifunɔlɛ, pé pól kè wɛ noh. À ń pwah mɔ kyɛ̃̀kɩ́ngbɛ̃kɩ tyɩ́.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ kɩ tɔ̃ ń yõ wilki n pi pèl duke duke pól sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ kɩ ń pwah mɔ ń kɔ̃ mé kɩ wɛ de ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ. Gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ǹmɔ yõ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́. Amiina!
Wɛkɩ Prisili ànɛ̂ Akilasɩ tyɩ́ ń kɔ̃, ànɛ̂ Wonesifɔrɩ nolɛ.
Yerasɩtɩ wũ Korɛ̃nti kwil sɔkɔ. Mé Torofimi wɔ sah Milɛti kwil sɔkɔ. À sõ̀ mɛ n yɔ képah ye.
Gbah n tɛ̃ n pɔ kwɔ̀vɩrɩ gbĩ́ nɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ sɔkɔ. Yebulusi, ànɛ̂ Pudɛ̃sɩ, ànɛ̂ Linusi, ànɛ̂ Klodya, ànɛ̂ á yṹnpyé tɛ́lɔ́ pól n wɛkɩ á tyɩ́.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ tyɩ́ nɛ à nɛ n mɛ áwɔlɛ, à mó yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ nɛ n pɩ yé pól tyɩ́.

Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á Liyel tõ̀npɩ ànɛ̂ Yesu Krista tɛ̃ntõ̀ névilɛ, Liyel ń tõ nɛ mé péwɔ névye yáhntɔkɔnɔ yohnɩ mɔ pè kɔ̃ pè sɛ̃ Yesu yõ. À ń yah tɔkɔ nɛ mé gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ pè wɛ̃kɩ pè kɔ̃ pè pé minnɛ n pɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ,
pé gbõ̀ sàhnyĩnɔ mó nɛ mɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ yõ. Liyel nɛ̂-á à náh mɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ n yo, ǹmɔ ǹ vyãhlɛ pè kɔ̃ kénɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min tyɩ́ sɔkɔ kèkõyṍ mɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂ gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ.
Tɛ́ wǎh ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ké wɛ̃kɩ gbĩ́-á pɔ nɔ, à kè wɛ̃kɩ ǹ wɛy gbõ̀ yõ, tɛ́ ń kɔ̃ mé kélɛ n yo, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á pwáhnmɔ-òlɛ.

Titi, áwɔ nɛ̂-á ńmɔ pídĩ́ kègbɩlɛ ápi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, áwɔ tyɩ́ ye mé n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ápi Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ ápi pwáhnmɔ-ò Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ ǹ kɔ̃.

Mé ye ǹ sah Krɛtɩ mara sɔkɔ nɛ, tyi tɛ́lɔ́ nónó-á wũ á sè pɩ n dal n mɔ, á mó yah tɛ̃́pú yísyɔ́ yah n sah n sah n kɔ̃ kwlo kwlo pól Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkìnɔ́ yõ sɔkɔ à yɩ̃nɛ máh sõ̀ kè yo sɔ̃́ á tyɩ́.

Kénɛ yah tɛ̃́pú pól yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ n mɛ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ pé tyɩ́, ànɛ̂ pé nɛ n mɛ sê núkú núkú nátãmnɛ. Pé wɛ̃́npì mó nɛ n mɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ, pè káh pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ tyilɛ n pɩ, pè káh pɩ nòhnɩ̀-ǹkɛ̃̂púlɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì kyɔ̀mɩ̀-ò yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ mɛ wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ ǹ tyɩ́, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tahrɩ kyɔ̀mɩ̀-òlɛ. À náh yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ wɛ̀ngbìl wɛ́kɩ́-òlɛ, ànɛ̂ fɔ̀kɔ̀nvyã̀hnɩ̀ névilɛ, ànɛ̂ sèwɔlɛ, ànɛ̂ mâl kɔ̃̀lɩ̀-òlɛ. Tɛ̃̀ káh nɛ yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ kwâh nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ yĩ́nvǐ sɔkɔ.
À yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ́pânnɛ n tɛ̃ plɛ, pèpɛy pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́ mó nɔ ǹ tyɩ́. À yɩ̃nɛ à pɩ yɩ̃ pɩ̃́-òlɛ, ànɛ̂ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ, à mó nɛ mɛ yályál Liyel yah, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́npnɛ̀-òlɛ.

Wɛlɛ nónó-á yɩ̃nɛ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ sé yõ, à yɩ̃nɛ à sè koh n tɛ̃ n yĩn à yɩ̃nɛ kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á à wɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, à kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ Liyel wɛynɛ névyelɛ n vi n mɔ, tɛ́ kɩ wɛ́nyo-ńsah tyɛ ǹ kɔ̃̀lɩ̀pu tyɩ́.
Yé náh wɛ di, névye náhnáh mɛ pɩ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔ-ńkɛ̃̂púlɛ, ànɛ̂ wɛ̀nfɩ̀ wɛ́kɩ́púlɛ, ànɛ̂ névye pílkípúlɛ. Tɛ́ pé kan ńtɛ̃ n wɛ Nsyifunɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú sɔkɔ.
Pè mɛ fɛ̃̀kɩ̀nɔ́lɛ n dahbɩ kétlo náhnáh sɔkɔ pé kwɔ́nɔ́ túkúnìnɛ kwâh wɛ yĩnnɛ yĩ́nvǐ sɔkɔ. Képah ye, pé vyɛ̃y yɩ̃nɛ tṹnɔ́lɛ.
Pé lékã́m névi yɔ́ lésõ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, mɩ̀nyobe, ànɛ̂ gbɛ̃́nképèl, ànɛ̂ gbãndal névye, ànɛ̂ yèwònpɩbɩ-á Krɛtɩ tãnnɛ.
Gbɩ ye à yo. Képah ye, wɛkɩ n yĩ́ĩ́ pé yõ, pè kɔ̃ pè Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ pèpɛy wɛ.
Pè káh pukubi mɔ Nsyifunɔ sèmìrn ànɛ̂ névye tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh, nónó-á sè náh mɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.

Tyi pól mɛ yályál névye tyɩ́, nónó-á mɛ yályál Liyel yah. Ǹtɛ névye nónó-á mɛ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ Liyel yah, tɛ́ yahle sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ ǹ yõ, tyi pól mɛ sìlkìnɔ́lɛ pépi tyɩ́. Yé náh wɛ di, pé sõnɔ ànɛ̂ pé lékã́m náh mɛ pallɛ.
Pě pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n pɩ Liyel pɩ̃́púlɛ. Ǹtɛ pé tyípɩ́nɩ̀ kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ pè náh ǹnɛ pnɛ. Pè pɩ nɛ́túkúnì ànɛ̂ nikisekɔ́kɔ́ pɩ́púlɛ, pè náh tɔ̃ fɛ̃ tyípépɛ̌y pɩ.
Ǹtɛ áwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, ápi sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ nɛ̂ yõ, képahlɛ névyelɛ n kwɔ.

Yo yèwàhnɩ̀ tyɩ́ nɛ pè pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ n pnɛ, pè yɛ yõ̀yén nɛ n sah pé yõ, pè pɩ yèsrey névyelɛ, pè nɛ mɛ sũ yĩ́ĩ́ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ mó nɛ n mɛ pé sɔkɔ, pè mó nɛ mɛ sṍmnɔ́ névyelɛ.
Yo syɔ́dyî tɔ tyɩ́ nɛ pè yɛ pé kɔ dùkù nɛ mɛ pallɛ Liyel yah, pè káh névye yĩnnɛ n yɩkɩ, pè káh pɩ sèwɔbɩlɛ, pè névyelɛ n vi n mɔ pallɛ.
Syɔ́ nónó náh wah mɔ, pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè pépilɛ n yohnɩ n mɔ pé pɛbɩ ànɛ̂ pé wɛ̃́npì tyɩ́ kɔ̃ kè nɔ pé tyɩ́.

Pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè pɩ yèsrey névyelɛ nónó-á mɛ tómm, tɛ́ mɛ n yah n dah mɔ pé kétlo tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ n mɛ syɔ́gblɔ́lɛ nónó-á mɛ n sah pé pɛbɩ tyɩ́ yõ, sɔ̃̀nko Liyel wɛy tyɩ́ káh yo ko.
Sṍré mɔ kètɛ̃̀npì tɔ sɔkɔ pè pɩ yèsrey névyelɛ
tyi pól sɔkɔ. Áwɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ mó pɩ dùkù pèpɛynɛ pélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ á tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, ǹ tɛ́ á fɔkɔ dal mɔ pélɛ n kwɔ yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀lɛ.
Yɛ á wɛlɔ nɛ n mɛ gblɔ ó sé tɔ̂ɔ́, wɛ́nyo-ńsah kɛ̃́nɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, á sépɛ́bɩ́ náh wɛ́nyo-ńsah wɛ n pi ápi tyɩ́. Kè kɩ pɩ sennɛ pé pól tyɩ́.
Yo yɔ̃bɩ tyɩ́ nɛ pè nɛ n sah pé yõ̀tãm tyɩ́ yõ tyi tyi pól sɔkɔ, pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ pé tyɩ́, pè káh pé yõ̀tãmnɛ n kɔ̃lɩ,
pè káh kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yɩ̃ n tɔkɔ pé tyɩ́. Pè pé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ pèpɛynɛ n wɛ̃kɩ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́, sɔ̃̀nko á pwáhnmɔ-ò Liyel-á kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂nɛ n kɔ̃, gbílkínɔ́ nɛ n sah ké yõ.
Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel ye ǹ yõ̀bènɔrɩ wɛ̃kɩ képah nɛ̂ gbõ̀ yõ-á névye pól pwáhnmɔnɔlɛ n wɛ.

Kè álɛ n kwɔ nɛ á Liyel yah tíkílɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ á káh á yĩ́nɛ n wil kèkõyṍ yî tyɩ́. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, kwɛy gbĩ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ á kɩ tɛ̃ wɛ á minnɛ n pɩ gblɔ̌y tɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ Liyel yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Sɛ̃́ ye á yɩ̃nɛ à nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ wɛ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ syɩkɩ tɛ̃, á gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-á mɛ nɛ̂ yõ, à tahlɩ gbĩ̀yĩ̀kì tyɩ́, sõ ye ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel nɛ̂-á pwáhnmɔ-ò Yesu Kristalɛ, ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ kɩ n wilki n mɔ n pi.
À ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ ápi yĩnnɛ à á yõ wɛ dwe wilki tyípêl pól sɔkɔ. À mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ pé á pɩ yályál pé yah, á mó nɛ mɛ pé tyɩ́ yõ, á mó gbah tɛ̃ tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.
Sɛ̃́ ye á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ nɛ n wɛkɩ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ sɔkɔ, ǹ sṍrélɛ n mɔ pé sɔkɔ, ǹ tɛ́ nɛ n wɛkɩ pé yõ. Káh n yɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ álɛ n yilɔ.

Névye pól dyɔ to n kõ nɛ pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè pé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tiki n mɔ kwil yah tãm ànɛ̂ yõ̀tãm yah sɔkɔ. Pǎh yɩ̃nɛ pè nɛ n sah pé tyɩ́ yõ, pè mó pé gblɔ̌y vi sah tyípéplɔ duke pól pɩ pɩ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Pè káh wɛ̀ntùkùnìnɛ n wɛkɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́, pè káh mâllɛ n kɔ̃lɩ. Pè pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ, pè mó névye póllɛ nɛ n tɛ̃ mármár.

Yé náh wɛ di, ǹgbòlɛ, lékã́m kɛ̃́ ànɛ̂ kèlékɛ̃ névye ye lésõ ápi tɔlɛ. Á sõ̀ mɛ mɔ́npunɔlɛ, mɛ á dyɔ dyɔ tyi ànɛ̂ á nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tyi yɔ̃rɩ sɔkɔ. Á sõ̀ mɛ á minnɛ n pɩ pèkè pɩ́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ dékè tyi pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Á sõ̀ mɛ á dékè wilki névye sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mɛ wɛ̃ dyɔlɛ n yɔ.
Ǹtɛ gbĩ́ nɛ̂-á á pwáhnmɔ-ò Liyel ǹ pèpɔrɩ ànɛ̂ ǹ tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ névye wɛ̃kɩ,
à á pwah mɔ. Tɛ́ kè náh pɩ nɛ á tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ yĩn sɔ̃́ dɛ́, á yãm ye à yah. À ye á pwah mɔ, tɛ́ min sã́nnɛ á kɔ̃ à á nnɔ wu pɩ yályál Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ.
À syɔ̃ á pwáhnmɔ-ò Yesu Krista tyɩ́ à Mirki mɛ̀ tiki mɔ á yõ náhnáh,
sɔ̃̀nko á pɩ́ntɛnɔ náh nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ ǹ pèpɔrɩ gbõ̀ yõ, à tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ képah nɛ̂-á á mɛ n dɛkɩ.
Wɛy mɛ̀nɛ, gbɩ ye kélɛ. Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á kè gbah yo pé tyɩ́, sɔ̃̀nko nónó-á sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, pè gbah tɛ̃ tyípéplɔlɛ n pɩ. Sépi ye plɛ, tɛ́ sé yõre mó tɔ̃ mɛ no pól tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ káh yõ kɛ̃́ yékã̂blɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ káh yékã̂blɛ n pɩ névye duku wìl-ǹsah tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Káh mâllɛ n pɩ, ànɛ̂ káh yékã̂blɛ n pɩ névyelɛ Moyisi tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́ yõ. Yõre kɛ̃́ ànɛ̂ yékã̂bkwɛ̀ ye sélɛ.
Névi nɛ̂-à névyelɛ n gbɛkɩ, ké gbáhdyâh di tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ kè nɔ kɛ nínɔ́lɛ, wàh ké nóh-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, à gbɛ n milki.
Á pɩ̃ nɛ kénɛ névi dùkù-á wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ pèpɛy fĩn mɔ, wǎh mɛ tyípêllɛ n pɩ à pèkèlɛ n yɔrɩ n mɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y yõ.
Máh kɩ fyɔ̀ Artemasɩ, képah náh pɩ Tisyiki tɛkɩ mɔ á tyɩ́, gbah n tɛ̃ n pɔ n wil ń tyɩ́ Nikopolisi kwil sɔkɔ. Mé kè yah tɔkɔ nɛ máh kɩ kwɔ̀vɩrɩ gbĩ́ pɩ nɛ́npɔ́.
Nsyenasɩ nɛ̂-á Liyel ǹgbò wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kwɔ́-òlɛ, yah n dah n mɔ ǹmɔ ànɛ̂ Apɔlɔsɩ kɔ́lɔ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ. Káh n yɛ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pè tɛkɩ.
Ápi no tɔ yɩ̃nɛ pè pé gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ n yĩ́ĩ́ tyípéplɔ pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko tyi nónó tyɩ́-á mɛ tah, pè tɛ̃ n wɛ sépi yahlɛ n wah. Pè káh pɩ tɛ̃ yõre kɛ̃́ névyelɛ.
Névye nónó pól-á mɛ ànɛ̂ ńmɔlɛ, pè n wɛkɩ á tyɩ́. Nónó-á ápi kódíbílɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, wɛkɩ pé tyɩ́.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ n pɩ yé pól tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ Yesu Krista tõ̀ yĩnnɛ, ńmɔ ànɛ̂ á yṹnpi Timote ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ áwɔ Filemo tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á ápi nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́nɛ ànɛ̂ á tõ̀ pɩ mûnɛ.

Á kélɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ tɔlɛ ápi dósê Apiya tyɩ́, à tahlɩ Arsyipi tyɩ́ ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á á mɛ́kɩ̀ fwo mûnɛ, ànɛ̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́ pépi nónó-á wɛ̃nɛ n tuke n mɔ n pɔ áwɔ Filemo wɔ̀kɔ̀ sɔkɔ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ ápi Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, pè yõ̀bènɔrɩ ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩnɛ yé kɔ̃.
Gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́ mâh Liyellɛ n ni, mè n wɛkɩ Liyel tyɩ́ á tyɩ́ sɔkɔ,
máh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ mɛ n nohnɩ nɛ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ á sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ ǹ yõ sɛ̃́pú tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ́nɔ́lɛ á tyɩ́.
Mé kélɛ n ni Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ ǹmɔ yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ nɛ̂-á ápi kwrɔ mɔ pɩ núkúlɛ, kè nɛ n yuku yahlɛ. Tyípéplɔ pól nónó-á á kɩ fɛ̃ pɩ Krista yĩnnɛ, sélɛ névye wɛ̃kɩ.
Ń yṹnpi, tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ á sɔkɔ ǹ kɔ̃ á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú nnɔlɛ n de, kè mɛ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́, tɛ́ mɛ sṍrélɛ n mɔ ń sɔkɔ.
Gbɩ ye sénsɔ̃, Krista yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ mé kɩ sõ̀ fɛ̃ á pɩ pɩ tir kõ sah ǹ kɔ̃,
ǹtɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ yĩnnɛ mé álɛ n ni, ńmɔ Pole nɛ̂-á pɩ yèwàhlɛ, tɛ́ mɛ ńtɛ̃nɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ Yesu Krista tõ̀ yĩnnɛ.
Mé álɛ n ni Wonesimi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á pɩ ń pídĩ́nɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ gbõ̀ yõ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ.
Ǹgbòlɛ, à náh sõ̀ mɛ tirlɛ n pɛkɩ áwɔ tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ núkúnúkú, à mɛ tirlɛ n pɛkɩ áwɔ ànɛ̂ ńmɔ tyɩ́.
Mé kɩ ń syɩ à tɛkɩ mɔ ǹ kɔ̃, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á ńmɔ wil fɩ̃́ yɔ́lɛ.
Ńmɔ-á mɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ sɛ̃́ Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ tir yĩnnɛ, mé sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ à tɛ̃ ń tnɔ̂ à tõ̀lɛ n pɩ ń tyɩ́ áwɔ swɔ.
Ǹtɛ mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé tir yɔ́ pɩ nɛ́ á náh ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ̃. Mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé ǹ kyɩ̃ mɔ á tyípépɛ̌y pɩ. Mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ kè pɩ áwɔ dyɔ dyɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Gbɔ̀kénpɩ Wonesimi kɩ mɛ gbɛ mɔ álɛ wrɔ́ kwéy yɔ́ ó sɔkɔ, sɔ̃̀nko ǹ pɔ à wɛ kṹmm yõ sɔkɔ.

Yé náh wɛ di, yɔ̃̀ ó náh ǹnɛ núkúnúkú dɛ́, à fṍnfṍ yɔ̃̀ yõ. Á pól yṹnpi ye ǹnɛ, nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ á tyɩ́. Ǹ tyɩ́ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ńmɔ tyɩ́, ǹtɛ ǹ tyɩ́ ké nɔ kal áwɔ tyɩ́, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ áwɔ yɔ̃̀lɛ tɛ́ tɔ̃ pɩ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-òlɛ.
Képah ye, wáh kɩ mɛ pɩ̃ nɛ á yṹnpi-á ńnɛ, à tɛ̃ plɛ ńmɔ sɔ̃́ á tɛ̃.
Wàh kɩ mɛ tyítúkù yɔ́ pɩ, képah náh pɩ á kɔ̃lɩ-à kɩ mɛ ǹ yõ, mé kɩ yĩn sé yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ.
Ńmɔ Pole ye n wãrkɩ wɛlɔ nɔ́pilɛ ń gbõ̀lɛ nɛ máh kɩ kɔ̃lɩ mɛ̀ dyah. Tɛ́ á dyɔ náh mé n to n kõ nɛ wáh yɩ̃nɛ á á minnɛ ń dyah.
Képah ye ń yṹnpi, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á tyɩ́ nɛ á tir mɛ̀ pɩ ń tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yĩn yõ. Ń nɩ de á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ gbõ̀ yõ Kristalɛ.
Ń sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké yõ nɛ nɛ́gbɩ́-á álɛ. Képah ye, máh tyi nónónɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ á tyɩ́ yɔ̀, mé pɩ̃ nɛ wáh kɩ sè pɩ ń yóré yõ, kɩ kah mɔ ńtɛ̃nɛ.
Mé kè pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ yé nírí gbõ̀ yõ pǎh kɩ ńnɛ yé kɔ̃. Képah ye, mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á tyɩ́ nɛ á sɛ̃́-ńsah yah n sah n kɔ̃ ńtɛ̃nɛ.
Yepafrasɩ n wɛkɩ á tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ ńnɛ wɔ̀kɔ̀npèkè sɔkɔ Yesu Krista yĩnnɛ.
Markɩ ànɛ̂ Arisitarkɩ, ànɛ̂ Demasɩ, ànɛ̂ Likyi n wɛkɩ á tyɩ́, pépi nónó-á ńmɔ tõ̀ pɩ mûnɛ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ nɛ, à yõ̀bènɔrɩlɛ nɛ n pɩ yé tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ Nsyakɩ nɛ̂-á Liyel, ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista tõ̀npɩlɛ, mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ, à n wɛkɩ Liyel nípú pól tyɩ́, nónó-á mɛ kárkɩ́nkɔ̃nɔlɛ kèkõyṍ sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé, mɔ́nyahnɔ-à sɔ̃́ pɩ yèvyãhrɩ dùkù nɛ̂ dùkùlɛ yé tyɩ́, yé yɛ kè pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ yé tyɩ́.
Yé pɩ̃ nɛ, yé Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á tɛ̃ wɛ mɔ́nyahnɔ tyɩ́, képah sɔkɔ-á yé kɩ pɩ tɛ̃́npnɛ̀pulɛ.
Ǹtɛ, yé yɛ yé tɛ̃́npnɛ̀nɔ́ mɛ̀ ké tõ̀ pɩ kyɩ syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́, yé kɔ̃ yè gbèkè yɩ̃, pèkè káh tɔ̃ wɛ yé sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ káh yé tɛkɩ.
Ǹtɛ, yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂-à yé sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ tɛkɩ, tɛ̃̀ kè ni Liyel tyɩ́, à kɩ kè yɩ̃ tɛ̃̀ kɔ̃. Ǹmɔ ye n yɩ̃ no póllɛ n kɔ̃ fɔ̀kɔ̀pènɔrɩ sɔkɔ, pé yah yó-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ. Képah ye, tɛ̃̀ kè ni ǹmɔ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à kè ni Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ tɔ̀tɔ̀ kɛ̃́nɛ. Yah, névi nɛ̂-à tɔ̀tɔ̀lɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ á kɩ nɛ yɔ́nkwîl sɔ̃́, yã́hkɩ́ n tɔkɔ n mɔ n kɔ̃ yey yey póllɛ.
Sɛ̃́nkɔ̃ névi káh nɛ n sõ nɛ, páh kɩ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ wɛ n pi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel tyɩ́.
Névi dùkù yɔ́ ye tɛ̃̀nɛ, nɛ̂ lékã́m náh mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ fɩ̃́ núkú, ànɛ̂ à mɛ tɔ̀tɔ̀ sɔkɔ ǹ tyípɩ́nɔ́ pól sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé nónó-á mɛ yãm sɔkɔ, Liyel kɩ pɔ pè dɔkɔ n mɔ n pi: Képah ye, pè ké nɩ̀vɩ̀lɛ nɛ n pɩ.
Tɛ́ tahbɩ kɩ tyɛ n sɔkɔ n pi fílfĩ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Képah ye, pè tɔ pé tíkínmɔnɔ nɩ̀vɩ̀lɛ nɛ n pɩ.
Sɔ̃́-á gbĩ-à gbo, tɛ́ vyãh fílfĩ tɛ̃, sè n kɔkɔ, ǹ du ǹ kwɛ. Plɛ́-ńsah náh tɔ̃ n wɛ sé tyɩ́. Sɛ̃́ ó ye, tahbɩ tɔ kɩ yah n kwlɔ n pi pé tyípɩ́nɔ́ nɩyṍ.

Yèvɩnɩ mɛ névi tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á ǹnɛ n tah n sah mɔ́nyahnɔ sɔkɔ. Mɔ́nyahnɔ sɔ́kɔ́ntɛnɔ náh, tɛ̃̀ kɩ tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ tɔ̃́rɩ́ yṍkúrí wɛ, nɛ̂-á tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ. Kénɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min tyɩ́ ye Liyel ǹ vyãhlɛ névye kɔ̃ sah, ǹ tyɩ́-á nɔ nónó tyɩ́.

Yé pɩ̃, nɛy náh fɛ̃ Liyel tɔ̃ mɔ à tyípékè pɩ n pi, ànɛ̂ ǹmɔ tɔ náh mó tɔ̃ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ n tɔ̃ n mɔ n dah n mɔ tyípékè sɔkɔ. Képah ye, tɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ-à nɛ̂ yĩni tɛ̃, tɛ̃̀ káh nɛ, Liyel-á n tɔ̃ n mɔ pélɛ.
Ǹtɛ, nɛ̂-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ n yɔrɩ n dah n mɔ tyípékè sɔkɔ, pé sõnɔ túkúnì dékè tyi ye.
Wâh yɛ sõnɔ túkúnì nɔ́pi kɔ̃ sè tɛ̃ wɛ á tyɩ́, sè n pɔ tyípékèlɛ. Tyípékè-à mó gbèkè yɩ̃, kè n pɔ kũnɛ.
Ń yṹnpyé, yé tyɩ́ nɔ ń tyɩ́. Yé káh yé gblɔ̌y pilki dɛ́!
Ǹgbǒ, yɩ̃́nkɔ̃nɔ yî tǎhnɩ̀ pèplɔ pól n wil yĩ̂nyõ. Liyel ye n kɔ̃ álɛ sélɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɔ yĩ̂nyõ kyòolɛ. Ǹ dùkù náh n vi n mɔ, fɛ̃́ntũ̂ tyah náh mɛ ǹ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ, Liyel sõ̀ mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, pé á sah ǹ yî mɔ́nɔ́nɔ pól yah tĩ̀nnɛ. Képah ye, à min sã́nnɛ á kɔ̃ ǹ wɛy gbɩ gbõ̀ yõ.

Ń yṹnpyé, yé tyɩ́ nɔ ń tyɩ́. Yé pɩ̃ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, névi fɔkɔ-à vyãh, ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ náh Liyel nɩlɛ n vɩ. Képah ye, yé nɛ́núkù núkú pól yɩ̃nɛ yè yé nínɛ n kwɔ nohnɩ súú, tɛ́ yé káh nɛ n sal n wɛkɩ sṍnyah-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, ànɛ̂ yé fɔkɔ káh nɛ n kwãh n vyãh.

Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé tyítúkúnì ànɛ̂ nɛ́pékè pɩ́nɔ́ duke duke pól yal n mɔ pnɛ́pnɛ́. Yé mó Liyel wɛy fɛ̃ n syi gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔ sɔkɔ, wǎh nɛ̂ dah mɔ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ. Képah ye kɩ fɛ̃ yé pwah mɔ.
Yé káh yé gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ mɔ n pɩ Liyel wɛy nóhpú ólɛ, ǹtɛ, yé nɛ n kɔ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.
Yah, nɛ̂-à kélɛ n nohnɩ ólɛ, tɛ́ à náh mɛ n kɔ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ á kɩ nɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á mɛ ǹ yèpɔlɛ n yah dwɔ̀lɩ́ sɔkɔ sɔ̃́-á kélɛ.
Wàh fyɔ̀ ǹ gblɔ̌y yah tɛ, tɛ́ yal ké tnɔ̂, nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, ǹ dyɔ n fwɔ ǹ yèpɔ dùkùlɛ.

Ǹtɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ mɛ tṹnɔ́lɛ, sè kɩ fɛ̃ névye sah pé gblɔ̌y yõ. Névi nɛ̂-à sépi tɛ̃ pallɛ, sé sɔkɔ tyi nóhnmilki-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, tɛ́ ǹ tyilɛ n pɩ sǎh yo sɔ̃́, tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ yèvɩnɩ wɛ ǹ tyípɩ́nɔ́ pól sɔkɔ.
Ńkɛ̃́, nɛ̂-à mɛ n sõ nɛ, Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́-ò-á pélɛ, tɛ́ à náh mɛ n kyɔmɩ n wɛkɩ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ n pilki. Ǹ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ dùkù mɛ nɔ̀nɔ́lɛ.

Ǹtɛ, Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ kɔ́lɔ́ nɛ̂-á syíi ńtɛ̃ kɛ̃́nɛ ké sɔkɔ sú Liyel n mɔ n kõ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Á yɩ̃nɛ ǹ ńgbye ànɛ̂ pɛ́kúsyɔlɛ n tɛ̃ plɛ pé yèvyãhrɩ sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ káh n yɛ kèkõyṍ tyi pɔ ǹ silki Liyel yah.
Ń yṹnpyé, yáh sɛ̃ tɔ̃́rɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu Krista yõ, yé náh yɩ̃nɛ yè nɛynɛ n wah.
Sɔ̃́-á dĩ́ yɔ́ kɩ fɛ̃ pɔ de yé tɔ́wû nɩyṍ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kɩ mɛ sã́n kèngbɔ tã́hnɩ́ dyɩ, tɛ́ kɩ mɛ fwɔ̀tǎhnɩ̀ mɔ; tɛ́ yãm nɛy yɔ́ tɔ kɩ fɛ̃ pɔ de yé nɩyṍ fwɔ̀yàllɛ ǹ wil:

Yâh fwɔ̀pèplɔ mɔ́-ò dĩ́ wɔ tɛ̃́nɔ́ plɛ, tɛ́ yo ǹ tyɩ́ nɛ, à pɔ kɔ̃ tɛ̃ tɛ̃̀-ǹsah pèpɛy mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yo yãm nɛy mɛ̀ wɔ tyɩ́ nɛ, à yuku yĩn tɛ̃, képah náh pɩ, à kɔ̃ tɛ̃ ásõ̂ sétáh sɔkɔ;
yâh pɩ sɛ̃́, wǎhkɩ̀ náh yé n pɩ wɛ̃ wrɔ́ di? Yé náh ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tɔkɔ fṍnfṍ pɩ ǹ ní-òlɛ yé fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ túkúnì gbõ̀ yõ di?

Ń yṹnpyé, yé tyɩ́ nɔ ń tyɩ́. Yé yé níkí kwɔ noh. Névye nónó-á yãm tãnnɛ kèkõyṍ névye tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, pépi ye Liyel yah wilki, à pɩ tahbɩlɛ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ànɛ̂ pépi ye tɔ̃ à kɩ kɔ̃ pè kɩ n de n pi ǹ tɔ̃́rɩ́ sɔkɔ, képah nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á à ǹ vyãhlɛ névye kɔ̃, ǹ tyɩ́-á nɔ nónó tyɩ́.
Ǹtɛ, yépi-à yãm tãnnɛ n yilɔ, tɛ́ tahbɩ wɔlɛ n gbilki-à; kénɛ tahbɩ tɛ̃̀ wɔ náh n fõh yélɛ, tɛ́ yélɛ n tɛ̃ n tuke n pɔ tukey tùkè-ǹtã̀n sɔkɔ di?
Tɛ́ Krista yĩn pèpɛy-á yé yõ sɔkɔ, pépi ye tɔ̃ képah tyɩ́ yónkòpulɛ.
Ǹtɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ̀ yɔ́ mɛ wã́rkɩ́nsàhnɔ́lɛ nɛ̂-á gblò kal sé no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ. Képah n yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Yɛ á ní-ò tyɩ́ nɔ á tyɩ́ á gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ»
Ǹtɛ, wǎhkɩ̀ tɛ̃̀-à kɩ nɛ̂ yé n pɩ, tyípékè ye kélɛ. Yé mɛ pílkínɔ́lɛ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ sɔkɔ, yáh sɔ̃́npɩ́ yahle kɔ́lɔ́lɛ ké wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ.
Yah, Liyel nɛ̂-á yo nɛ: «Káh fɔ̀fɩ́kɩ̀ pɩ», ǹmɔ ó ye tɔ̃ yo nɛ: «Káh nɛ́kókè mɔ.»
Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ ye sah yélɛ yé gblɔ̌y yõ, tɛ́ Liyel kɩ yé tuke n yɩ̃nɛ n pi sépilɛ. Képah ye, yé yɛ yé wɛy, ànɛ̂ yé pɩ́dúkù nɛ mɛ yɩ̃́nɛ́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ nɔ́pilɛ.
Ńkɛ̃́, névi nɛ̂-à névye yãmnɛ n yáh-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, Liyel tɔ náh tɛ̃̀ yãm yah n pi tukey tuke sṍlɛ. Ǹtɛ, névi nɛ̂-à névye yãmnɛ n yah, tɛ̃̀ yõ kɩ yɔ̃ tukey tuke sṍlɛ.
Ń yṹnpyé, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à ńtyɩ̃́nɔ nɛ, páh sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, tɛ́ ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ náh mɛ kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ, yõ se kɩ wɛ ké tyɩ́? Kénɛ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ dùkù mɛ̀ se kɩ fɛ̃ à pwah mɔ?
Sɔ̃́-á, á yṹnpi yɔ́ tyɩ́ flɔ kɩ fɛ̃ n knɛ, ànɛ̂ à náh mɛ n wɛ n yõ swɔ̃swɔ̃ pól sɔkɔ:
Yõ se mɛ ké tyɩ́, wâh tɛ̃̀ syah nɛ, à de lènɔlɛ, à mó flɔlɛ n mɔ vɩrɩlɛ n tũ, ànɛ̂ à nɛ n yõ n tɔ̃; tɛ́ á náh se mó tɔ̃ à kɔ̃ ǹ yétõ̂ yî nɔ́pilɛ?
Sɛ̃́ ó ye, névi nɛ̂-à nɛ, páh sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ nɛ̂-á ǹ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ n wɛ̃kɩ, tɛ̃̀ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ mɛ kúntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ.

Gbɔ̀kénpɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ kɩ fɛ̃ nɛ, túkù-á mɛ sɛ̃ Liyel yõ, túkù mó mɛ tyípéplɔlɛ n pɩ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, tɛ̃̀ ń wɛ̃kɩ ǹ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ, tyípɩ́nɩ̀ kɛ̃́nɛ wɛ́. Ńmɔ wɔ kɩ à wɛ̃kɩ ń Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ ń tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Wâh mɛ sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ Liyellɛ, núkú-á ǹnɛ, kè plɛ. Tɛ́ pɩ̃ nɛ, sétã̀n tɔ sɛ̃́nɔ́-á mɛ képah tɛ̃̀ wɔ yõ dɛ́. Ànɛ̂, ǹ yah tíkí pɩ́nɔ́ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, sé wil n nɛ n syah.
Lékã́m se mɛ ǹ tɛkɩ? Wâh mɛ ké tyɩ́, mé kɩ fɛ̃ ǹ wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, tyípéplɔ pɩ́-ńkɛ̃̂ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ, yõ náh mɛ ké tyɩ́:
Ápi náh nɛy Abrahmɩ-á tyípɩ́kɩ̀ nɛ̂ pɩ, képah nɛ̂-á pɩ ǹ pídĩ́ Yisakɩ dɔ́kɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ sárká súkɛ́nkɔ̃-ńsah yõ, nɛ pé à ko Liyel kɔ̃, sɔ̃́-á Liyel yo kélɛ ǹ tyɩ́.
Á náh wɛ di, Abrahmɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sõ̀ mɛ n kɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Tɛ́, ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ gbõ̀ yõ, ǹ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ pɩ pallɛ.
Képah sɔkɔ ye Liyel wɛy mɛ̀ pɩ tũ nɛ̂-á yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Abrahmɩ sɛ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel yõ, Liyel mó à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ», tɛ́ ǹnɛ n ye ǹ kódĩ́nɛ.
Yé kè wɛ kɛ̀, névi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ó náh dɛ́! Ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ tɔ gbõ̀ yõ ye Liyel à pɩ nɛ́gbɩ́lɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye tɔ̃, fɔ̀fɩ́npɩ pi nɛ̂-á lésõ pè n ye Wrahbɩlɛ: À lésõ fɛ̃ syi Yisrayel tɛ̃ntõ̀ névye kɔ̃ pè wɔ̃bɩ ǹ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ pè yohnɩ mɔ, à pè mɔ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yɔ́ yõ, pè kɔ̃ pè to pwah.
Sɔ̃́-á névi min-à wil ǹ sɔkɔ, à n nɛ mɛ kúnɔ́lɛ, sɛ̃́ ó ye tyípɩ́nɩ̀ tɔ-à n knɛ, névi Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ n nɛ mɛ kúnɔ́lɛ.

Ń yṹnpyé, yé pɩ̃́nɔ́ mɛ ké sɔkɔ nɛ, ápi nónó-á pɩ névye kwɔ́púlɛ, áyáh kɩ n tuke n pi képékèyɔ̂, kɩ kal no tɛ́lɔ́lɛ kɛ̀. Képah ye, yé náhnáh káh nɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ, yé pɩ kwɔ́púlɛ.
Yé pɩ̃ nɛ, á nɛ́núkù núkú pól-á n pilki náhnáh. Ǹtɛ, névi nɛ̂-à n pílkí-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ vyãh wɛy sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ nɛ́pépɛ̌y syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́. À kɩ fɛ̃ tɛ̃ ǹ wil gbɛ̃́nsê pól tɔ tyɩ́.
Sɔ̃́-á áyâh kàrfyɛ̂ dyɩ sèsèn vyɛ̃y tyɩ́ nɛ, sè nɛ n nohnɩ á tyɩ́, sé wil pól tɔ yah ye ńkɛ̃́nɛ à n nɛ n tɛ̃ kélɛ.

Képah náh pɩ, yé krótókè ǹgbɛ̃ tɔlɛ n yah yɔ sɔkɔ kɛ̀: Kàh sɔ̃́ mɛ gblò sɔ̃́, tɛ́ yã́hkɩ́ sɔ̃́ mɛ kélɛ n tu n mɔ sɔ̃́, sésár pír yɔ́ ó ye ké tó-ò n nɛ n tɛ̃ ké yahlɛ. Wàh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ, kè syɔ̃ ńyãh sɔkɔ, kè n syɔ̃ nɛ́npɔ́lɛ.
Sɛ̃́ ó ye nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́ tɔlɛ, wil tyah yɔ́ ye tyɩ̃́ɩ̃ ǹsɔ̃̀, tɛ́ kè ké gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki n kah.
Yé náh nyàh tɔ wɛ di? Kàh sɔ̃́ mɛ tyɩ̃́ɩ̃ sɔ̃́, kàh soh dùkù ǹgbɛ̃ sɔkɔ, kè n fɛ̃ ké pól yõ.

Ǹtɛ, nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́ tɔ mɛ kénɛ nyàh tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Tyípêl náhnáh n wil képah sɔkɔ. Kè mɛ déntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ wil sɔkɔ, tɛ́ wil tɛ́y póllɛ n yõ. Tyípêl nónó-á n wil ké sɔkɔ, ní-ńkɛ̃̂ nyàhnpèkè sɔkɔ ye sè n wil. Képah ye, kě yɩ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ n pɩ á min pól sɔkɔ, fɔ́ɔ́ kè pɔ nɔ á kúnɔ́ tyɩ́.
Yah, gbɛ̃́nkyɔ duke duke pól n kwɔ n pnɛ. Kèpye, ànɛ̂ vyeh, à tahlɩ yɔ sɔkɔ yî tyɩ́, névi tɛ̃ wɛ sépi pól kwɔ.
Ǹtɛ, nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh tɛ̃ wɛ képah kwɔ n pi. Kwáhpékè nɛ̂-á kè náh n tɛ̃ syɩ́syɩ́, képah ye nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́lɛ. Kè mɛ névi ko ko sohrɩ ólɛ ké tɔ̂ɔ́.
Kénɛ nɛ́npɔ́rɩ́ núkú mɛ ye ápi Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃, á sú Liyellɛ n gbilki, ǹ tɛ́ n tɔ̃ képah ólɛ pèkèlɛ n ye n mɔ névye yõ, ǹtɛ Liyel ye mó tɔ̃ mɔ pélɛ ǹ kètɔ̀lɛ.
Gbílkínɔ́ wɛlɔ ànɛ̂ pèkè yénmɔnɔ wɛlɔ kɩ n wil vyãh núkú sɔkɔ nɩ? Ń yṹnpyé, yé káh nɛ n pɩ sɛ̃́.
Nípénɛ̀kɩ̀ ànɛ̂ ni páhpáh se kɩ fɛ̃ n wil kwlɛ̀y núkú sɔkɔ?

Ń yṹnpyé, dah se kɩ fɛ̃ wɛ gbɛ sènsóké séswɔ̂ sɔkɔ? Tĩ̂ sènsóké séswɔ̂ pye se kɩ fɛ̃ wɛ gbɛ kèpɔ̃npɔ̃ séswɔ̂ sɔkɔ? Sɛ̃́ ó ye pnɛ ni, ànɛ̂ nípénɛ̀kɩ̀ náh fɛ̃ n wil n pi kwlɛ̀y núkú sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ yépi sɔkɔ, nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ mɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ névilɛ tɛ́ lékã́m mɛ ǹ sɔkɔ? Tɛ̃̀ yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n kɔ pallɛ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔnɔlɛ ǹ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ sɔkɔ, képah nɛ̂-á n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ, wǎh yɩ̃ pɩ̃.
Ǹtɛ, dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀ képékè, ànɛ̂ wɛ̃ fwónɔ́ sõnɔ-à kénɛ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ, yé káh yé gblɔ̌ynɛ gbilki nɛ, yáh mɛ yɩ̃ pɩ̃. Yé káh gbɩlɛ n kɔ̃lɩ.
Kénɛ yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ mɛ̀ dùkù náh n wil Liyel tyɩ́ dɛ́! Kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ ye kélɛ. Névi yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ ye kélɛ, kè n wil sétõ tyɩ́.
Yah, dyɔ́yɔ́kɩ̀ ànɛ̂ wɛ̃ fwónɔ́ sõnɔ-à mɛ ńyãh sɔkɔ, tyífɛ̃̌ ànɛ̂ tyítúkúnì duke duke pól n nɛ n pɩ nɛ́npɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ, yɩ̃́pɩ̃̂ nɛ̂-á n wil Liyel tyɩ́, képah-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, ké gbennɛ, tɛ̃̀ nɩ n nɛ n mɛ yályál, ànɛ̂ yèvɩnɩ tyɩ́ n nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ́ à n pɩ nɛ́pépɛ̌ynɛ. Ǹ tõ̀ náh n tah, ànɛ̂ à névi yãmnɛ n yah, tɛ́ tyípéplɔ ó ye à n nɛ n pɩ. À náh yèwǎhkɩ̀ ànɛ̂ fɔ̀kɔ̀pǐllɛ n pɩ.
Yèvɩnɩ-á mɛ nónó tyɩ́, tɛ́ pè mɛ ké tõ̀lɛ n pɩ, pě ké yõre wɛ, nɛ̂-á pélɛ n pɩ nɛ́gblɔ́lɛ Liyel yah.
Kwâh nɛ̂ n pɔ n pɔ yékã̂b ànɛ̂ mâllɛ yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ? Fɔ́kɔ́sõnɔ túkúnì dékè tyi náh n fwo yélɛ di?

Yé yĩ́ mɛ n wil yî náhnáh tyɩ́, tɛ́ yé náh mɛ sélɛ n wɛ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, nɛ́kókè mɔ dékè yé tɛ̃. Yáh nɛ̂nɛ n yah n kɔ̃, yé náh kélɛ n wɛ. Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, yékã̂b ànɛ̂ mâl n pyě nɛ n de yé wrɔ́ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ, yé náh mɛ n ni Liyel tyɩ́, képah ye, yé náh mɛ kwâh yɔ́lɛ n wɛ.
Yâh se sɔ̃́ n ni Liyel tyɩ́, sõnɔ pèplɔ náh ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ mɛ yé sɔkɔ. Yě n nɛ n ni yé tyítúkúnì dékè tyi pɩ yĩn ólɛ. Képah ye, yé náh kwâhlɛ n wɛ.
Kwâh nɛ̂ fɔ̀fɩ́npɩbɩ pɩ dùkù mɛ yé n pɩ sɛ̃́? Yé náh pɩ̃ nɛ, wâh á yĩ wil kèkõyṍ tyi tyɩ́, Liyel sépɛ-á álɛ di? Nɛ̂-à kèkõyṍ tyi tɛ̃ kódĩ́nɛ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ pɩ Liyel sépɛlɛ.
Yé se wɛ nɛ, yõ kɛ̃́-á Liyel wɛy mɛ̀nɛ, nɛ̂-á yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Liyel-á min nɛ̂ mɔ ápi sɔkɔ, ké tyɩ́ nɔ yĩ́ĩ́ ǹ tyɩ́. Képah ye, à mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á nɛ n mɛ péwɔ ó tyɩ́ yõ.»
Ǹtɛ sépi pól sɔkɔ, à tɔ̃ pèpɔrɩ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ n pɩ ápi tyɩ́, sɔ̃́-á ǹ wɛy kè yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́: «Liyel peke gblɔ̌y gbílkípú yõ, tɛ́ pèpɔrɩlɛ n pɩ gblɔ̌y tíkínmɔpu tyɩ́.»
Képah ye, yé nɛ n sah Liyel yóré yõ, yè mó sétõ̀ tyɩ́ yahle, képah sɔkɔ, sétõ kɩ to gbɛ mɔ yélɛ.
Yé nɔ n de Liyellɛ, képah sɔkɔ, ǹ tɔ kɩ nɔ de yélɛ. Tyípêl pɩ́pú, yé yé gbã̀n wilki tyípêl pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ. Tɔ̀tɔ̀ névye, yé yé nnɔ tɔ̃ n sah.
Yé yɩ̃nɛ yè pɩ̃ nɛ, yáh mɛ pèkè sɔkɔ, yé ké nàhnpɩ̃ gbo. Yé yɛ yé yɩ̀syɔ̀nɩ̀ pɩ gbnílɛ, yé nɩ̀vɩ̀ mó pɩ yèkwɔrɩlɛ.
Yé yé gblɔ̌y tiki mɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ yah, à kɩ yé yõ yɔ̃.

Ń yṹnpyé, yé káh wɛ̃ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n yɩkɩ. Nɛ̂-à ǹ yṹnpi tyɩ́ yo yɩkɩ, képah náh pɩ, à lékàh syi à kɔ̃, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ tyɩ́ ye tɛ̃̀ yo yɩkɩ, tɛ́ lékàhlɛ kè kɔ̃. Wâh képah pɩ, á se mɛ n kɔ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ? Lékàh náh á kélɛ n kɔ̃ di?

Ǹtɛ, Liyel ó ye sah tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́lɛ, ànɛ̂ ǹmɔ ó ye kɩ fɛ̃ lékàhlɛ névi kɔ̃. Ǹmɔ ó ye kɩ tɔ̃ fɛ̃ névi pwah mɔ, képah náh pɩ, kɩ ǹ tyɩ́ yɩkɩ. Nɛ̂ mɛ áwɔ tɛ̃̀nɛ, tɛ́ á lékàhlɛ n syi á yṹnpilɛ n kɔ̃?
Núkúnúkú, yé noh ń tyɩ́ yɔ̀, yépi nónó-á mɛ n yo nɛ kwɛynɛ, képah náh pɩ, ńsõ̂nɛ yáh kɩ kyɩ kwíl-ǹgbɛ̃ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, kɩ kyɩ yi núkú pɩ gbɔ̀ yɩ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ nɛ́npɔ́ kɩ pɔ wɛ.
Ǹtɛ, yé se pɩ̃ yé min-á kɩ n mɛ n pi sɔ̃́ ńsõ̂nɛ? Yé mɛ á kɩ nɛ kénfã́hkɩ́ tɔ̃́ɔ̃tɔ̃́ɔ̃ yɔ́ sɔ̃́, nɛ̂-á ńkɛ̃́nɛ n mɔ nɛ́npɔ́ swɔ, ǹ tɛ́ n karkɩ.
Yé pyě tɔ̃ sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ yè yo nɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-à kɩ fɛ̃ syi, yáh kɩ tɛ̃ min sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kɩ tir mɛ̀ pɩ, képah náh pɩ tir mɛ̀ pɩ.
Ǹtɛ, yè n pyě yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n gbilki yé vyãh wɛy sɔkɔ. Kénɛ gblɔ̌y gbílkínɔ́ dùkù yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh plɛ.
Sépi pól sɔkɔ, névi nɛ̂-à pèpɔrɩ pɩ́nɔ́ yah wɛ, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ náh mɛ kélɛ n pɩ, tyípékè ye tɛ̃̀ n pɩ.
Núkúnúkú, yépi nónó-á mɛ tahbɩlɛ, yé noh ń tyɩ́ yɔ̀: Yèvyã̀hnpèl nónó-á kɩ pɔ yé yĩni n tɛ̃ n pi, yé nɛ n kah n gbo sépi yĩnnɛ.
Yé tahrɩ mɛ n pyãh, tɛ́ sóhrɩ́ mɛ yé flɔlɛ n yõ.

Yé sã́n ànɛ̂ yé pɔ́nɔ mɛ n pɩ syɩ̃́mɩ́nɛ. Kénɛ syɩ̃́mɩ́ ye kɩ pɔ wilki mɔ yé gbõ̀nkɔ̀kɔ̀lɛ, tɛ́ kɩ yé wil gbɛ̃́nsê yõ, nyàh tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Kèkõyṍ tyɛ gbĩ́ mɛ̀ fyé nɔ́ntɛnɔ sɔkɔ, yépi mɛ tahrɩlɛ n yah n tuke n mɔ n sah yé gblɔ̌y tyɩ́ kɛ̀!
Tɛ́, tõ̀npɩbɩ nónó ńtɛ̃-á tõ̀lɛ n pɩ yé swɛ̃y sɔkɔ, yè n yahle pé pɔ́lɛ pé kɔ̃́nɔ́lɛ. Pépi Liyel yéngbonɔ yĩ́npɔ̃́ ye n de Liyel níkí sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á kèkõyṍ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ.
Yépi mɛ yõ̀tɔ̃rɩ́ yélɛ n yõ kèkõyṍ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, à yé dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, mɛ gbilki tɛ̃, á kɩ nɛ ko ko nyeh sɔ̃́.
Yé lékàhlɛ névye kɔ̃, nónó-á pè náh tyítúkù pɩ. Pè mó pé gblɔ̌y fĩn mɔ yé kɔ̃, yé pè ko mɔ.

Ń yṹnpyé, yé syɩ́kɩ́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ n pɩ, fɔ́ɔ́ kè pɔ nɔ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ syɩ́npɔnɔ tyɩ́. Yé yah sètõlɛ kɛ̀, à ńkɛ̃́nɛ sèmukɔ pèpɛy wɛ́ntɔkɔnɔ syɩkɩ n tɛ̃, à tɔkɔ pṹgbro pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́, pópó ǹ pɔ n syɩ pṹtɛ́lɔ́ pɩ́nɔ́ tyɩ́.
Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ syɩ́npɔnɔ mɛ yúkɛy; képah ye, yépi tɔ sṍré mɔ yĩ́ĩ́ yé gblɔ̌y sɔkɔ, yè syɩ́kɩ́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́ pɩ.
Ń yṹnpyé, yé káh nɛ n tɔkɔ wɛ̃nɛ n kɔ̃; képah sɔkɔ, Liyel náh yé tuke n pi. Yé yah, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ nɛ̂-á kɩ pɔ á tuke n pi, à mɛ yúkɛy.
Ń yṹnpyé, Liyel tɛ̃ntõ̀ syínyopu-á lésõ ǹ wɛynɛ n yo n kɔ̃ yèvyãhrɩ ànɛ̂ syɩ́kɩ́ntɛ̃̀nɔ́ sɔkɔ sɔ̃́, yé yɩ̃nɛ yè nɛ n pɩ pépi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.

Yé yah, nónó-á gbah tɛ̃ à kyɩ syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́, ǎ pépilɛ n sõ. Yé Nsyɔbɩ gbáhntɛ̃nɔ tyɩ́ noh ǹ yèvyãhrɩ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ kɛ̀. Tɛ́ tɔ̃ kè wɛ, Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃-á tyí-ǹgbnɔ nónó pɩ ǹ tyɩ́ ké tyɛ́-ńsah sɔkɔ.

Ǹtɛ, ń yṹnpyé, sépi pól sɔkɔ, yé káh yélɛ n wo Liyellɛ, képah náh pɩ sétáhlɛ. Ànɛ̂ yé káh yélɛ n wo kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃nɛ. Yé yɛ yé àwe nɛ mɛ ké gbɩ yõ, yé ɔ̃́ɔ̃ mó nɛ mɛ ké gbɩ yõ. Képah sɔkɔ, Liyel náh lékàhlɛ yé kɔ̃ n pi.
Tɛ́ yèvyãhrɩ-à mɛ yépi sɔkɔ nɛy nɛ̂ yõ, tɛ̃̀ Liyel ni. Nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀-à se mó mɛ nɛ̂ yõ, tɛ̃̀ Liyel yĩn gbilki yɩ̀gbɩ̀nɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Yé sɔkɔ nɛy nɛ̂-à mɛ n yɔ, tɛ̃̀ Liyel nípú yah tɛ̃́pú ye, pépi kɩ pɔ nɩrɩ tuke ǹ tyɩ́ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Yesu yĩn yõ, tɛ́ kɩ Liyel ni ǹ tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ nírí mɛ̀-à pɩ Liyel yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, yɔ́nwó mɛ̀ kɩ pwáhnmɔnɔ wɛ, ànɛ̂ Tɛ̃̀ ǹgbɛ̃ Liyel kɩ à dɛ mɔ. Tɛ́ wàh se mɛ tyípêl pɩ, à kɩ sè yɔ̃ mɔ à kɔ̃.
Képah ye, yâh mɛ dɛ́nmɔnɔ tyɩ́, yé yé tyípêl wil n syi, yè mó Liyellɛ n ni wɛ̃nɛ n kɔ̃. Tǎhkɩ̀ mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ nɛ́gbɩ́ nírí sɔkɔ dɛ́.
Yé náh Yeli wɛ-à: Névi ye lésõ ǹnɛ ápi tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Ǹtɛ, à mɛ nírí gbah pɩ nɛ, pũ̀ káh tɔ̃ pɩ. Pũ̀ náh mó ńtyɩ̃́nɔ pɩ sétáh yõ, fɔ́ɔ́ à pɔ nɔ ye tɔ̃́nɔ́ ànɛ̂ tɔ́nɩ́ tyɩ́.
Képah náh, à tɔ̃ ǹ syɩ Liyel ni nɛ, pũ̀ pɩ. Pũ̀ mɛ pɩ, sèmukɔ pɛkɩ.
Ń yṹnpyé, yé sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́-à mɔ pu gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ, tɛ́ nɛ̂ mɛ à tɛ̃ pɔ ké yõ, tɛ̃̀ pɩ plɛ.
Yé pɩ̃ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à tyípêl pɩ́-ò vi mɔ pèpɛy pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ ǹ min pwah mɔ ǹ kúntɛnɔ náh yèvyãhrɩ yah. Ànɛ̂ ǹ tyípêl náhnáh nɔ́pi kɩ se tɔ̃ yɔ̃ mɔ à kɔ̃.
Min nɛ́tɛ̃̂ nɛ̂-á Wɛynɛ, ǹmɔ tyɩ́ ye á n yo yé tyɩ́. Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ tyi pól tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, ápi ǹ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ noh, tɛ́ à wɛ yĩ́nɛ, tɛ́ à yah díkídíkí, tɛ́ tũ ǹ tyɩ́.

Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á min nɛ́tɛ̃̂nɛ, à ye ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ á wɛ̃kɩ. Á à wɛ, tɛ́ mɛ ǹ tyɩ́lɛ n yo n wah. Ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ n kɔ̃, ǹmɔ tyɩ́ ye á n yo yé tyɩ́. Ǹmɔ sõ̀ mɛ Sú Liyel tnɔ̂, tɛ́ pɔ ǹ gblɔ̌ynɛ á wɛ̃kɩ.

Áyáh ǹmɔ nɛ̂ wɛ tɛ́ ǹ wɛ́kɩ́nɔ́ noh, ǹmɔ tyɩ́ ye á n yo yépi tɔ tyɩ́ á wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ yĩnnɛ yélɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, wrɔ́ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ ápi wrɔ́ ànɛ̂ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ ǹ Pídĩ́ Yesu Kristalɛ, yépi tɔ kɩ de ké sɔkɔ.
Á ye tyi nɔ́pilɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kɩ ápi ànɛ̂ yépi nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ kɔ̃ kè kɩ syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ yah, áyáh wɛy nɛ̂ noh Yesu Krista tyɩ́ tɛ́ kélɛ n yo yé tyɩ́, képah ye yɔ̀: Liyellɛ, kyòo ye ǹnɛ. Fɛ̃́ntũ̂ náh mɛ ǹ sɔkɔ póllɛ.
Áyâh n yo nɛ á wrɔ́-á mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Liyellɛ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ n kɔ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ, mɩ̀nyobe ye álɛ, á náh mɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ n kɔ.
Ǹtɛ áyáh kɩ n kɔ kyòo sɔkɔ sɔ̃́-á ǹmɔlɛ kyòo sɔkɔ, á nɛ́núkù núkú pól wrɔ́ kɩ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ wɛ̃nɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel Pídĩ́ Yesu Krista tṍ kɩ á tyípêl pól wu to á tyɩ́.
Áyâh nɛ tyípékè náh mɛ á sɔkɔ, á gblɔ̌y ye á n pilki, gbɩ náh mɛ á sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ áyâh á tyípêl wil syi, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á Liyel tómmnɛ tɛ́ n kɔ ǹ tyíyónɔ́ sõ̀, à kɩ á tyípêl yɔ̃ mɔ á kɔ̃, tɛ́ kɩ á wu wilki á tyíknɛ̌nɩ̀ pól sɔkɔ.
Áyâh nɛ á náh tyípékè pɩ, ǹmɔ ye á n pɩ mɩ̀nyolɛ, ǹ wɛy náh mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ á sɔkɔ.

Ń wɛ̃́npì, mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kɩ yé kɔ̃ yè káh tyípékèlɛ n pɩ. Ǹtɛ kàh se pɔ pɩ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tyípékè pɩ, wrɔ́ tɔ̃́-ò mɛ á tyɩ́ Sú Liyel yah sɔkɔ, nɛ̂-á Yesu Kristalɛ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ tómm.

Ǹmɔ ye ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ sárkálɛ nɛ̂-á kɩ Liyel kɔ̃ à kɩ ápi tyípêl yɔ̃ mɔ. Tɛ́ à náh ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃ ápi ó tyípêl yɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ yĩnnɛ dɛ́, kèkõyṍ névye pól tɔ tyípêl yɔ̃̀nmɔnɔ yĩn ye à ǹ gblɔ̌y kɔ̃.
Áyâh Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ, képah sɔkɔ ye á kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh ǹnɛ n pnɛ.
Névi nɛ̂-à nɛ páh ǹnɛ n pnɛ, tɛ́ tɛ̃̀ náh mɛ n kɔ ǹ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l yõ, mɩ̀nyo ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Gbɩ náh mɛ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ wɔ-à n kɔ ǹ yóré yõ, ǹ tyɩ́ mɛ nɔ tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́ kègbɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ. Képah sɔkɔ ye ǎ kélɛ n pnɛ nɛ áyáh mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ.
Névi nɛ̂-à nɛ páh mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, Yesu-á kɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, tɛ̃̀ tɔ yɩ̃nɛ à nɛ n kɔ sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀nɛ.

Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ késã́n náh kélɛ mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ dɛ́, tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kédyâh ye kélɛ, nɛ̂-á yo sɔkɔ yé tyɩ́ tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ. Yáh wɛy nɛ̂ noh sɔkɔ tɛ, képah ye tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ kédyâh mɛ̀nɛ.

Ǹtɛ fɩ̃́ yɔ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ késã́n ye mó tɔ̃ kélɛ mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́. Yesu ànɛ̂ yépi pɩ dùkù mɛ képah gbɩlɛ n wɛ̃kɩ. Yé náh wɛ di, fɛ̃́ntũ̂ mɛ n sɔkɔ, kyòo yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ mó mɛ pɔ tɛ.
Névi nɛ̂-à nɛ páh mɛ kyòo sɔkɔ, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ ǹ yṹnpi yɔ́ dyɔlɛ n yɔ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ sɛ̃́ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ.
Névi nɛ̂ yṹnpi tyɩ́-à nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ kyòo sɔkɔ. Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n de n pi tyípékè sɔkɔ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à ǹ yṹnpi dyɔlɛ n yɔ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ wǎh mɛ n kɔ fɛ̃́ntũ̂ sɔkɔ sɛ̃́, fɛ̃́ntũ̂ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, ǹ yɩ̃́ kɩ wɔ, à náh ǹ yúkú-ńsah pɩ̃ n pi.
Ń wɛ̃́npì, Yesu yĩn gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ ye yé tyípêl yɔ̃ mɔ yé kɔ̃. Képah ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́.

Súbí, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ tyi pól tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, yé ǹnɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́. Kètɛ̃̀npì, yé tɛ̃ wɛ pèkè pɩ́-ò tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ. Képah ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́.

Yépi nónó-á wɛ̃́npìlɛ, nɛ̂-á Sú Liyellɛ, yé ǹnɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́. Yépi nónó-á súbílɛ, nɛ̂-á sõ̀ mɛ tyi pól tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, yé ǹnɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́. Kètɛ̃̀npì, tǎhkɩ̀ mɛ yé sɔkɔ, ànɛ̂ Liyel wɛy mɛ n tɛ̃ yé nnɔ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ yé tɛ̃ wɛ pèkè pɩ́-ò tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ. Képah ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́.
Yé káh yé yĩ́ wil kèkõyṍ tyɩ́, képah náh pɩ ké sɔkɔ kwâh yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́. Névi nɛ̂-à ǹ yĩ́ wil kèkõyṍ tyɩ́, Sú Liyel tyɩ́ náh fɛ̃ n nɔ n pi tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.

Yé yah, tyi nónó-á mɛ kèkõyṍ sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á gblɔ̌y dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyi pɩ́nɔ́ dékèlɛ, ànɛ̂ yĩ́wílkìlɛ, ànɛ̂ gblɔ̌y wɛ̃́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ à yuku tahrɩ tyɩ́ tĩ̀nnɛ, sépi sɔkɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n wil Sú Liyel tyɩ́. Kèkõyṍ sɔkɔ ye sè n wil.
Tɛ́ kèkõyṍ ànɛ̂ ké yĩ́wílkì kɩ pɔ n tyɛ n pi. Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à Liyel dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ kɩ tɛ̃ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ.

Ń wɛ̃́npì, kèkõyṍ tyɛ gbĩ́ ye mɛ nɔ n tɛ. Yé kè noh sɔkɔ tɛ nɛ Krista sépɛ-á kɩ n pɔ n pi. Núkúnúkú, Krista sépɛ́bɩ́ yísyɔ́ mɛ wil mɔ pí. Képah n wɛ̃kɩ nɛ kèkõyṍ tyɛ gbĩ́ sɔkɔ-á álɛ.

Ápi tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ ye sépɛ́bɩ́ nɔ́pi wil. Ǹtɛ kègbɩ yõ, pè náh sõ̀ mɛ núkúlɛ ápilɛ. Pàh sõ̀ mɛ núkúlɛ álɛ, pè náh náhkɩ n gbɛ n wil n pi ápi sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ kè ye sõ̀ yɩ̃nɛ kè pɩ sɛ̃́, nɛ̂-á kɩ kè wɛ̃kɩ nɛ pé sɔkɔ nɛy yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh sõ̀ mɛ núkúlɛ ápilɛ kègbɩ yõ.
Ǹtɛ yépi wɔlɛ, Liyel Mirki mɛ yé sɔkɔ Krista-á nɛ̂nɛ yé kɔ̃. Képah ye yé pól kɔ̃ yé tyilɛ n pnɛ.

Kè náh mɛ á kɩ nɛ yé kósyì gbɩlɛ n pnɛ ń kɔ̃ mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ dɛ́, yáh kélɛ n pnɛ, tɛ́ pɩ̃ nɛ mɩ̀nɩ̀ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh n wil ké sɔkɔ, képah ye ń kɔ̃ mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́.
Névi nɛ̂-à nɛ Yesu náh Kristalɛ, nɛ̂-á Liyel nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ, mɩ̀nyo yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh kah mɔ tɛ̃̀ yõ. Krista sépɛ ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ ǹ Pídĩ́ Krista ye tɛ̃̀ yahle.
Yé yah, névi nɛ̂-à Liyel Pídĩ́ yahle, Sú Liyel náh mɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ. Tɛ́ nɛ̂-à Liyel Pídĩ́ fɛ̃ syi, Sú Liyel mɛ tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ.

Yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, yáh wɛy nɛ̂ noh tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, yé yɩ̃nɛ yè kè koh n sah yé nnɔ sɔkɔ. Yáh wɛy nɛ̂ noh tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ, yâh fɛ̃ kè koh sah yé nnɔ sɔkɔ, yépi tɔ wrɔ́ kɩ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Pídĩ́nɛ, ànɛ̂ Súlɛ.
Tɛ́ Pídĩ́-á ǹ vyãh kɔ̃ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min ye.
Nónó-á n yah n kɔ̃ yé yõ yɩ́kɩ́-ńsahlɛ, pépi tyɩ́ sɔkɔ ye mé sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́.

Yépi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, Yesu-á Liyel Mirki nɛ̂nɛ yé kɔ̃, kè mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ yé sɔkɔ. Képah ye, kwɔ́-ò yétõ̂ náh tɔ̃ mɛ yé tyɩ́. Liyel Mirki mɛ yélɛ n kwɔ tyi póllɛ. Tɛ́ ǹ kwɔ́nɔ́nɔ póllɛ mó tɔ̃, gblɔ ye sélɛ, mɩ̀nɩ̀ náh mɛ sé sɔkɔ. Képah ye, yé nɛ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ Kristalɛ, sɔ̃́-á Liyel Mirki yé kwɔ kélɛ.
Núkúnúkú ńtɛ̃nɛ ń wɛ̃́npì, yé yɛ yé wrɔ́ nɛ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔntɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ Kristalɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, wàh sõ nɛ̂nɛ pɔ tíkí náh á tɛ̃ n pi, ànɛ̂ sen náh á kɔkɔ n sah n pi ǹ yah sɔkɔ lésõlɛ.
Yé se pɩ̃ tɛ nɛ wǎh mɛ tómm tɛ́. Tɛ́ yé yɩ̃nɛ yè kè pɩ̃ tɔlɛ nɛ, névi nɛ̂-à n kɔ tómm, Liyel pi-á tɛ̃̀nɛ.

Yé náh wɛ à, á tyɩ́ kah nɔ Sú Liyel tyɩ́, fɔ́ɔ́ à álɛ n ye ǹ wɛ̃́npìlɛ. Tɛ́ Liyel wɛ̃́npì tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye ńtyɩ̃́nɔ álɛ ó. Tɛ́ kèkõyṍ névye-á pɩ Liyel pɩ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂púlɛ sɛ̃́, képah ye pè náh fɛ̃ ápi tɔ pɩ̃.

Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, Liyel wɛ̃́npì ye álɛ núkúnúkú, ǹtɛ áyáh kɩ pɔ n pɩ n pi kwâh nɛ̂nɛ ńsõ̂nɛ, képah náh tɔ̃̌nɩ̀ mɛ wilki mɔ tɛ. Ǹtɛ á pɩ̃ nɛ Krista-à pɔ wil mɔ gbĩ́ nɛ̂nɛ, áyáh kɩ à wɛ wǎh mɛ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ. Képah ye, á kɩ mɛ ǹmɔ tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.
Névi nɛ̂ gbõ̀ sàhnɔ́-à mɛ képah yõ sɔkɔ Krista tyɩ́, tɛ̃̌ ǹ gblɔ̌y tɔ̃ n sah yályál Liyel yah sɔkɔ, sɔ̃́-á Kristalɛ yályál.
Névi nɛ̂-à tyípékèlɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ dêllɛ n pɩ. Tyípékè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ dêl pɩ́nɔ́ ye kélɛ.
Ǹtɛ yé pɩ̃ nɛ Krista pɔ́nɔ́ yõ-á pɩ tyípêl tɛ̃́nyõ̀nɔ́lɛ névye yõ. Tyípékè náh mɛ ǹmɔ sɔkɔ póllɛ.
Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ Krista tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ̃̀ náh tyípékèlɛ n pɩ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à tyípékèlɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ náh à wɛ yah, à náh ǹnɛ n pnɛ.
Ń wɛ̃́npì, yé káh yɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yé pilki. Névi nɛ̂-à n kɔ tómm, nɛ́gbɩ́ ye tɛ̃̀nɛ Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ.

Tɛ́ névi nɛ̂-à tyípékèlɛ n pɩ, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ névi ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, tyípékè pɩ́-ò ye ǹnɛ tyi pól tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ. Liyel Pídĩ́-á pɔ tir nɛ̂ yĩnnɛ, sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyípɩ́nɩ̀ yɩkɩ yĩn ye.
Névi nɛ̂-à pɩ Liyel pilɛ, Liyel pɩ dùkù n nɛ n mɛ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ. Képah ye tɛ̃̀ náh tyípékèlɛ n pɩ. Wǎh pɩ Liyel pilɛ sɛ̃́, à náh fɛ̃ tyípékè pɩ n pi.

Liyel wɛ̃́npì ànɛ̂ sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́-á n wah n pnɛ wɛ̃ sɔkɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Névi nɛ̂-à n kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ tómm, Liyel tyɩ́ névi náh tɛ̃̀nɛ. Névi nɛ̂ tɔ yṹnpi tyɩ́-à nɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ tyɩ́, Liyel tyɩ́ névi náh tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Yé náh wɛ di, yáh nɛ̂ noh tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ képah ye yɔ̀ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, áyáh yɩ̃nɛ á yɛ á tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.

Á ye káh pɩ Kayin tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ névi ye sõ̀ ǹnɛ. À ǹ gbɛ̃̀ndĩ́ ko mɔ. Ǹtɛ tir nɛ̂ yĩn mɛ à ko mɔ ǹnɛ? Ǹmɔ tyípɩ́nɔ́-á sõ̀ mɛ kétúkùyɔ̂ Liyel yah sɔkɔ tɛ́ ǹ gbɛ̃̀ndĩ́ tyɩ́lɛ pallɛ, képah yõ ye.
Ń yṹnpyé, kèkõyṍ névye-à yé dyɔlɛ n yɔ, yé káh n yɛ kè pɩ gbɛ̃̀ndùnìnɛ yé tyɩ́.
Ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, á yṹnpyé tyɩ́-á nɔ á tyɩ́ sɛ̃́, á pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh tɛ̃ syi tɛ kũ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ, tɛ́ min wɛ. Ǹtɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à n knɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ mɛ kũ gbõ̀ sɔkɔ.
Névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ ǹ yṹnpi dyɔlɛ n yɔ, nɛ́kókè mɔ́-ò ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Tɛ́ yé se mó tɔ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min náh mɛ nɛ́kókè mɔ́-ò yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ tyɩ́ tɛ́.
Yé yah, Krista-á ǹ min kɔ̃ ápi yĩnnɛ, képah sɔkɔ ye ápi mɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ dùkù pɩ̃. Ápi tɔ yɩ̃nɛ à á min kɔ̃ á yṹnpyé yĩnnɛ.
Ǹtɛ kèkõyṍ tahrɩ-à mɛ ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ tyɩ́, tɛ́ à ǹ yṹnpi yɔ́ wɛ yãm sɔkɔ tɛ́ yahle ǹ yãm yáhnɔ́lɛ, Liyel tyɩ́nɔnɔ náh mɛ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ.
Ń wɛ̃́npì, ápi tyɩ́nɔnɔ káh n pɩ wɛy ànɛ̂ vyã́hsesyɩ̃́rɩ́ ó sɔkɔ dɛ́. Á tyípɩ́nɔ́ yɩ̃nɛ kè kélɛ n wɛ̃kɩ kègbɩ tɛ̃̀ yõ.
Képah sɔkɔ ye á kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh mɛ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, ànɛ̂ á nnɔ kɩ mɛ yĩ́nnɔ́lɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Ápi nnɔ-à sɔ̃́ mɛ lékàhlɛ álɛ n kɔ̃ sɔ̃́, Liyel nɛ̂-á gblò kal, ǹmɔ tyi póllɛ n pnɛ n kal ápi nnɔlɛ.
Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, á nnɔ-à kɩ lékàhlɛ álɛ n kɔ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ, tíkí náh á tɛ̃ n pi Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Tɛ́ áyáh mɛ ǹ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ, tɛ́ ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́ tyilɛ n pɩ, képah ye áyâh kwáhdúkú nɛ̂ yah kɔ̃ ǹ tyɩ́, à kɩ kélɛ á kɔ̃.
Wǎh nɛ̂ kõ sah á kɔ̃ képah ye yɔ̀ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, á sɛ̃ pé Pídĩ́ Yesu Krista yĩn yõ, á mó yɛ á tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ sɔ̃́-á à kõ sah kélɛ á kɔ̃.

Névi nɛ̂-à Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ, tɛ̃̀ kɩ mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ Liyel kɩ mɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ. Sɔ̃́-á á kɩ pɩ tɛ́ kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel-á mɛ álɛ, ǹ Mirki gbõ̀ yõ ye, wǎh képah nɛ̂nɛ á kɔ̃.

Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, névye nónó-á nɛ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ-á pé n yo tyilɛ, yé káh n sɛ̃ pé pól yõ dɛ́. Yé pè sohlɩ n yah, yè ké gbɩ pɩ̃ Liyel Mirki gbõ̀ yõ-à kɩ nɛ̂ ńtyɩ̃́nɔ pè n yo tyilɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel yĩn yõ mɩ̀nyobe mɛ tɔ̃ mɔ pí kèkõyṍ.
Liyel Mirki-á n tɛ̃ nónó yahlɛ, yáh nɛ pè pɩ̃ n pi dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Yâh névi nɛ̂ wɛ à mɛ n yo nɛ Yesu Krista-á pɩ névilɛ, Liyel Mirki ye n tɛ̃ tɛ̃̀ yahlɛ.

Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à nɛ sɛ̃́ náh, Liyel Mirki náh n tɛ̃ tɛ̃̀ wɔ yahlɛ. Krista sépɛ mírkí ye n tɛ̃ tɛ̃̀ yahlɛ. Yé kè noh sah tɛ nɛ, Krista sépɛ-á kɩ n pɔ n pi. Tɛ́ núkúnúkú, à mɛ tɛ kèkõyṍ ńtɛ̃nɛ.

Yépi wɔlɛ ń wɛ̃́npì, Liyel tyɩ́ névye ye yélɛ. Ǹ Mirki nɛ̂-á n tɛ̃ yé yahlɛ, képah tǎhkɩ̀ kal sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ mírkí tyɩ́lɛ, képah nɛ̂-á kèkõyṍ névye yahlɛ n tɛ̃. Képah ye, yé tɛ̃́nwɛnɔ wɛ Liyel yĩn yõ mɩ̀nyobe yõ.
Pépilɛ, kèkõyṍ tyɩ́ ye pélɛ. Képah ye, pě pé tyilɛ n yo à yɩ̃nɛ kèkõyṍ névye tyi yo dùkùlɛ, tɛ́ kèkõyṍ névye n mó pé nínɛ n kwɔ pé tyɩ́.

Ǹtɛ ápi mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ. Névi nɛ̂-à Liyellɛ n pnɛ, tɛ̃̌ ǹ níkílɛ n kwɔ ápi tyɩ́. Tɛ́ névi nɛ̂-à mɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ̃̀ náh ǹ níkílɛ n kwɔ ápi tyɩ́. Sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ ye Liyel Mirki nɛ̂-á névyelɛ n mɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, à n tɛ̃ n wɛ ǹnɛ n wah sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á névyelɛ n pilki.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ n wil Liyel tyɩ́. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, Liyel pi ye tɛ̃̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ Liyellɛ n pnɛ. Képah ye ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, á ye yɛ á tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́.
Liyellɛ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ Liyel ye ǹnɛ. Képah ye, á náh fɛ̃ n yo n pi nɛ wáh ǹnɛ n pnɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ kɛ̃́nɛ á sɔkɔ.
Yé yah, Liyel-á kè wɛ̃kɩ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ nɛ á tyɩ́-á nɔ pé tyɩ́, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Pi núkúní nɛ̂-á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́, à à tɛkɩ mɔ kèkõyṍ, ápi kɔ̃ á kɩ min wɛ ǹmɔ gbõ̀ yõ.

Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-á nɛ̂nɛ, kè wɛ yɔ̀: Liyel tyɩ́-á nɔ ápi tyɩ́ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, képah náh tyɩ́nɔnɔ kègbɩlɛ dɛ́. Ápi tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel tyɩ́ nɔ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, képah ye tyɩ́nɔnɔ kègbɩlɛ. Yé náh wɛ à ǹ Pídĩ́ tɛkɩ mɔ à pɔ pɩ sárkálɛ ápi tyípêl yɔ̃ n mɔ yĩnnɛ di?
Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɔ́, ápi tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel tyɩ́ sɛ̃́ à, ápi tɔ yɩ̃nɛ á tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́ mó kɛ̀.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ yĩ́ náh tɛ̃ yah Liyel yõ. Ǹtɛ ápi tyɩ́-à mɛ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́, á mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ ǹ tyɩ́nɔnɔ mɛ ápi sɔkɔ yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Liyel-á ǹ Mirkilɛ á kɔ̃, képah ye á kɔ̃ á pɩ̃ nɛ áyáh mɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ wǎh mɛ álɛ.
Sú Liyel ye ǹ Pídĩ́ tɛkɩ mɔ kèkõyṍ névye pwah n mɔ yĩnnɛ. Ápi yĩ́ ye kè wɛ, képah ye á kɔ̃ á kélɛ n yo n wah.
Névi nɛ̂ tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ yo nɛ ńkɛ̃́ Yesu-á Liyel Pídĩ́nɛ, Liyel mɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ, ànɛ̂ tɛ̃̀ mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ.

Ápi tyɩ́-á nɔ Liyel tyɩ́ dùkù nɛ̂nɛ, ápi tɛ̃̀ wɔ ye kélɛ n pnɛ, ànɛ̂ á sɛ̃ ké yõ. Liyellɛ, tyɩ́nɔnɔ Liyel ye ǹnɛ. Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ wɔ mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, ànɛ̂ Liyel mɛ tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ ápi sɔkɔ, á mɛ á minnɛ n pɩ kèkõyṍ Yesu Krista tyɩ́ kɔ̃lɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, tíkí náh á tɛ̃ n pi Liyel tukey tuke sõlɛ.

Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel tyɩ́nɔnɔ-à mɛ névi nɛ̂ sɔkɔ, tíkí náh tɛ̃̀nɛ n tɛ̃. Tɛ́ wâh mɛ n sõ nɛ á tyípêl wɔ-á kɩ pɔ n dɛ n pi á sɔkɔ, képah ye n pɔ n pɔ tíkílɛ. Ǹtɛ tyɩ́nɔnɔ kègbɩ wɔ tíkí yahlɛ n kõ. Tíkí tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ névi nɛ̂nɛ n tɛ̃, tyɩ́nɔnɔ náh mɛ yĩ́ĩ́ tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ.
Liyel ǹgbò ye ápi tyɩ́ nɔ ǹ gblɔ̌y tyɩ́, képah ye tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ ápi tɔ sɔkɔ.

Névi nɛ̂-à nɛ Liyel tyɩ́-á nɔ pé tyɩ́, tɛ́ mó tɔ̃ mɛ ǹ yṹnpi yɔ́ dyɔlɛ n yɔ, mɩ̀nyo ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Tɛ̃̀ yĩ́-á mɛ ǹ yṹnpi nɛ̂ yõ, ǹmɔ tyɩ́-à nɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ tyɩ́, sɔ̃́ mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ kɩ pɔ n nɔ ǹ tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á à náh à wɛ yah?
Tɛ́ Krista-á nɛ̂ kõ sah á kɔ̃, kè wɛ yɔ̀ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, Liyel tyɩ́-à mɛ nɔ névi nɛ̂ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ yṹnpi tɔ tyɩ́-á yɩ̃nɛ kè nɔ ǹ tyɩ́.
Névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ Yesu-á Kristalɛ, nɛ̂-á Liyel nɛy yáhntɔkɔnɔlɛ, Liyel pi ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Tɛ́ Sú Liyel tyɩ́-à nɔ névi nɛ̂ tyɩ́, Liyel wɛ̃́npì tɔ tyɩ́ n nɔ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Liyel tyɩ́-à nɔ ápi tyɩ́, tɛ́ á mɛ ǹ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀llɛ n kɔ, képah sɔkɔ ye á kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel wɛ̃́npì tɔ tyɩ́-á mɛ nɔ á tyɩ́.
Á náh wɛ di, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ ye n wɛ̃kɩ kélɛ nɛ ǹ tyɩ́-á nɔ á tyɩ́. Tɛ́ ǹ tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ náh mɛ táhnɔ́lɛ,
á pól-á sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ pɩ Liyel wɛ̃́npìlɛ tɛ́ n tɛ̃ n pnɛ kèkõyṍ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ tir nɛ̂-á á kɔ̃ á n tɛ̃ n pnɛ kèkõyṍ tyɩ́, á Yesu yõ sɛ̃́nɔ́ ye.
Ǹtɛ nɛ̂ n tɛ̃ n pnɛ kèkõyṍ tyɩ́ wɛ́? Névi nɛ̂-á sɛ̃ ké yõ nɛ Liyel Pídĩ́-á Yesulɛ, ǹmɔ ye.

Yesu Krista ye pɔ wel wilki ni sɔkɔ. Képah náh, à ko mɔ ǹ tṍ kwɛ. Tɛ́ à náh pɔ wel wilki ni ó sɔkɔ dɛ́, à ye pɔ wel wilki ni sɔkɔ, tɛ́ ko mɔ ǹ tṍ kwɛ. Kénɛ tyinɔ nínɔ́ ànɛ̂ Liyel Mirki ye n yo n wah kélɛ. Yé náh wɛ di, Liyel Mirki ye n wɛ̃kɩ gbɩlɛ gbĩ́mɛgbĩ́.
Liyel Mirki-á nɛ̂ yo, ànɛ̂ ni-á nɛ̂ wɛ̃kɩ, ànɛ̂ tṍ-á nɛ̂ wɛ̃kɩ, sépi tɔ̃́nɔ́ ye n yo n wah kélɛ. Tɛ́ sé tɔ̃́nɔ́ pól mɛ sah núkú ó yõ.
Névye-á tyi nónó wɛ tɛ́ sélɛ n yo n wah, áyâh mɛ sépilɛ n fɛ̃ n syi à, ǹtɛ Liyel tyi yónwàhnɔ́ náh fṍnfṍ névye tyɩ́ yõ di? Tɛ́ Liyel ye mó tɔ̃ yo wah ǹ Pídĩ́ tyɩ́lɛ.

Névi nɛ̂-à sɛ̃ Liyel Pídĩ́ yõ, ǹ tyɩ́ yónɔ́ mɛ̀ ye tɛ̃̀ tɛ̃ sah ǹ nɩ sɔkɔ. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ Liyel yõ, tɛ̃̀ mɛ Liyellɛ n pɩ mɩ̀nyolɛ, wǎh sɔ̃́npɩ́lɛ yahle sɛ̃́nɔ́lɛ Liyel tyíyóné mɛ̀ yõ, wǎh nɛ̂ yo ǹ Pídĩ́ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ.
Tyíyóné mɛ̀ wɛ yɔ̀ nɛ, Liyel-á tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ á kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á n wɛ ǹ Pídĩ́ gbõ̀ yõ sɔkɔ.
Névi nɛ̂-à mɛ Pídĩ́ tyɩ́ yõ, kénɛ min mɛ tɛ̃̀ wɔ tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ nɛ̂-à mɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ ǹ tyɩ́ yõ, min mɛ̀ náh mɛ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́.
Yépi nónó-á sɛ̃ Liyel Pídĩ́ yõ, mé ye tyi nɔ́pilɛ n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á kɩ yé kɔ̃ yé kɩ pɩ̃ nɛ yáh tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ min wɛ.
Ápi sɛ̃́nyĩnɔ-á mɛ Liyel yõ nɛ̂ tyɩ́ sɔkɔ képah ye yɔ̀ nɛ ńkɛ̃́, áyâh kwâh nɛ̂nɛ n ni ǹ tyɩ́ tɛ́ kè mɛ ǹ dyɔ yĩ́ĩ́nɛ, ǎ nóhnɔ́ pɩ á tyɩ́.
Tɛ́ áyáh fyɔ̀ kè pɩ̃ nɛ wǎh mɛ nóhnɔ́lɛ n pɩ á tyɩ́, á pɩ̃ yĩ́ĩ́ tɔlɛ nɛ, áyâh kwâh nɛ̂ ni ǹ tyɩ́, ǎ kè wɛ.

Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à ǹ yṹnpi yɔ́ wɛ à mɛ tyípékèlɛ n pɩ, nɛ̂-á kè náh névi min tyɩ́lɛ n yɩkɩ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, tɛ̃̀ nírí pɩ ǹ tyɩ́, Liyel kɩ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ tyípékè pɩ́-ò mɛ̀ kɔ̃, kàh mɛ nɛ tyípékè nɛ̂-á à pɩ, kè náh névi min tyɩ́lɛ n yɩkɩ Liyel yah sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ tyípékè yɔ́ mɛ nɛ̂-á névi min tyɩ́lɛ n yɩkɩ Liyel yah sɔkɔ, képah dùkù tyɩ́ náh mé n yo nɛ yé nírílɛ n pɩ ké tyɩ́ sɔkɔ dɛ́.
Tyi nónó pól tɛ̃̀-à fyɔ̀ mɛ tyíknɛ̌nɩ̀nɛ, tyípêl ye sélɛ. Ǹtɛ tyípêl pól náh névi min tyɩ́lɛ n yɩkɩ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.

Ápi pɩ̃ nɛ névi nɛ̂-à pɩ Liyel pilɛ, tɛ̃̀ náh tɔ̃ tyípékèlɛ n pɩ. Liyel Pídĩ́ ńkɛ̃́nɛ nɛ mɛ tɛ̃̀ yõlɛ n syɩkɩ, képah ye pèkè pɩ́-ò nɛ̂-á sétã̀n yõ̀tɛ̃̀nɛ, à náh fɛ̃ tir yɔ́ pɩ n pi tɛ̃̀ sɔkɔ.
Ápi pɩ̃ nɛ ápi-á mɛ Liyel tyɩ́ yõ, tɛ́ kèkõyṍ pól tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, pèkè pɩ́-ò mɛ̀ mɛ képahlɛ n fnɛ.

Ápi tɔ̃ pɩ̃ nɛ Liyel Pídĩ́-á pɔ, ànɛ̂ wǎh lékã́mnɛ á kɔ̃ á tɛ̃ wɛ Liyel yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀lɛ n pnɛ. Ǹmɔ Liyel nɛ̂-á yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀lɛ, ápi wrɔ́ mɛ kwrɔ́nmɔnɔlɛ ǹmɔlɛ ǹ Pídĩ́ Yesu Krista gbõ̀ yõ. Ǹmɔ ye Liyel yèsyɩ̀kɩ̀lɛ, ànɛ̂ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂ minnɛ.
Ń wɛ̃́npì, yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n tɛ̃ sãh fálnɔ́ tyilɛ.
Ńmɔ nɛ̂-á nɛ́dyâhlɛ, ńmɔ ye n tõ sɛ́bɛ́y mɛ̀nɛ pi tyɩ́, nɛ̂-á Liyel yah tɔkɔ ànɛ̂ ǹ wɛ̃́npìlɛ;
kénɛ gbɩ gbõ̀ yõ, képah nɛ̂-á mɛ tɛ̃̀nɔ́lɛ ápi sɔkɔ, tɛ́ kɩ n tɛ̃ n pi á sɔkɔ tyɛ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ.
Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ ǹ Pídĩ́ Yesu Krista kɩ yõ̀bènɔrɩ pɩ á tyɩ́, tɛ́ kɩ á yãm yah, tɛ́ kɩ yèvɩnɩnɛ á kɔ̃, nɛ̂-á kɩ á kɔ̃ á kɩ tɛ̃ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ ànɛ̂ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.
Kè pɩ nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ ǹgbɛ̃nɛ ńmɔ tyɩ́, máh kè kyɔmɩ wɛ nɛ áwɔ wɛ̃́npì túkù-á mɛ n kɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, à yɩ̃nɛ Sú Liyel-á kè kõ sah ápi tyɩ́ sɔ̃́.

Pi, máh mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n kõ n sah á tyɩ́ núkúnúkú, képah ye yɔ̀: Yé yɛ á tyɩ́ nɔ wɛ̃ tyɩ́. Tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ késã́n náh kélɛ mé n wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ á tyɩ́ dɛ́. Nɛ̂-á mɛ ápi tyɩ́ tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ képah ye.
Tyɩ́nɔnɔlɛ, Liyel tyi kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ wã̀l kɔ́lɔ́ ye kélɛ. Tir kõ̀nsàhnɔ́ mɛ̀ tyɩ́ ye yo yé tyɩ́ tyah gbĩ́ dùkùlɛ nɛ, yé yé minnɛ n pɩ tyɩ́nɔnɔ sɔkɔ.

Névye náhnáh mɛ wil kwɛ kèkõyṍ pól sɔkɔ, nónó-á mɛ névyelɛ n mɔ pílkínɔ́ wã̀l yõ sɔkɔ. Pépi náh mɛ kè fɛ̃ syi nɛ Yesu Krista-á pɩ névilɛ kègbɩ yõ sɔkɔ. Tɛ́ yah, sɛ̃́ntɛ̃̀ névilɛ, névye pílkí-ò ànɛ̂ Krista sépɛ ye tɛ̃̀nɛ.
Kǎh pɩ sɛ̃́, yé yé gblɔ̌ynɛ n kyɔmɩ, yè káh pɔ tɛkɩ yé tõ̀ pɩ́nɔ́

Krista-á kwɔ́nɔ́ nɛ̂ kɔ̃, névi nɛ̂-à n kɔ́-ńkɛ̃̂nɛ képah wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tɛ́ kè fĩn mɔ, tɛ̃̀ wrɔ́ mɛ gbɛ́kɩ́nɔ́lɛ Liyellɛ. Ǹtɛ névi nɛ̂-à n kɔ Krista kwɔ́nɔ́ mɛ̀ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tɛ̃̀ wrɔ́ mɛ télnɔ́lɛ Sú Liyel ànɛ̂ ǹ Pídĩ́nɛ.
Ǹnɩ̂ yɔ́-à pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, tɛ́ ǹ kwɔ́nɔ́ mɛ ké tyɩ́lɛ, yé káh fɛ̃ syi tɛ̃̀ twah yé tyɩ́. Yé káh wɛkɩ ǹ tyɩ́ póllɛ.
Névi nɛ̂-à wɛkɩ tɛ̃̀ tyɩ́, tɛ̃̀ tɔ vyãh mɛ ǹ tyítúkúnì nɔ́pi pɩ́nɔ́ sɔkɔ.

Tyi náhnáh mɛ ń tyɩ́ yo yo tɛ̃̀nɛ yé tyɩ́, ǹtɛ mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé sè wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ yé tyɩ́ sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ. Mé mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ mé pɔ n wil yé tyɩ́, mé mó sè yo yé tyɩ́ vyãhlɛ. Képah sɔkɔ, ápi nɩ̀vɩ̀nɩ̀ kɩ syɩ ké yĩ̀n tyɩ́.
Pi nɛ̂-á Liyel yah tɔkɔ ásõ̂, ǹ wɛ̃́npì n wɛkɩ á tyɩ́.
Ńmɔ nɛ̂-á nɛ́dyâhlɛ, ńmɔ ye n tɛkɩ n mɔ sɛ́bɛ́ynɛ ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́ Kayusi tyɩ́, ǹmɔ nɛ̂ tyɩ́-á nɔ ń tyɩ́ kègbɩ yõ.
Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́, mé mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ á tyi pól nɛ n pɛkɩ, á mó nɛ n mɛ lènɔ sɔkɔ pallɛ, sɔ̃́-á á min pɩ dùkùlɛ pallɛ Liyel yah sɔkɔ.
Ń yṹnpyé yísyɔ́ pɔ yo ń tyɩ́ nɛ, áwɔ-á mɛ gbɩ koh tɛ̃ yĩn, tɛ́ mɛ n kɔ képah wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ. Képah ń nɩ vɩ kègbɩlɛ.
Mâh n nohnɩ nɛ ń wɛ̃́npì-á mɛ n kɔ gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ yõ, tir yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ náh ń nɩlɛ n vɩ n nɔ képahlɛ.
Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́, á mɛ ápi yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́púlɛ n tɛ̃ plɛ, wáh nónónɛ n pnɛ ànɛ̂ á náh nónó ńtɛ̃nɛ n pnɛ. Á mɛ n pɩ plɛ.

Tyɩ́nɔnɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ á sɔkɔ, pè ye ké dùkù yo Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì yĩ́ yah. Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ á tyɩ́ nɛ, á yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ pɩ pé tyɩ́ pé kɔ́lɔ́ yĩnnɛ à yɩ̃nɛ kǎh yɩ̃nɛ kè nɛ n pɩ sɔ̃́ Liyel wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ sɔkɔ.
Á náh wɛ di, Yesu Krista yĩn ye pè n kɔ kɔ́lɔ́ mɛ̀nɛ, tɛ́ pè náh fɛ̃ syi Yesu yõ sɛ̃́-ńkɛ̃̂pú yòhnɩ̀nmɔnɔ yɔ́ ńtɛ̃ syi.
Kàh pɩ sɛ̃́, ápi ye yɩ̃nɛ à so mɔ sɛ̃́nknɔ névye tyɩ́ tõ̀ mɛ̀ sɔkɔ, á tɔ̂ɔ́ pɩ tõ̀ núkú pɩ́púlɛ pélɛ, à gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀lɛ névyelɛ n wɛ̃kɩ.
Mé vyãh wɛy kwéy yɔ́ tɔ wãrkɩ tɛkɩ mɔ Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì tyɩ́. Ǹtɛ Dyotrɛfɩ náh mɛ n sah ń tyɩ́ yõ, ǹmɔ nɛ̂-á mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ pɩ́-ńsahlɛ tyi yah tɛ̃́-òlɛ kìrkìr.

Képah ye, mâh pɔ pɔ yé tĩ̀nnɛ, wǎh mɛ nɛ̂nɛ n pɩ ápi tyɩ́ á tyɩ́ yónyɩkɩnɔ sɔkɔ, mé kɩ sé pól yo wah yé syah. Tɛ́ à náh mɛ yĩn képah ó tyɩ́ dɛ́, à náh mɛ n fɛ̃ n syi á yṹnpyé Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú wɛ̃̀kɔbɩ mɛ n twah ǹ tyɩ́. Tɛ́ nónó-à se tɔ̃ nɛ pé pélɛ n swah n syi, ǎ pé yah kõ ké pɩ́nɔ́lɛ, ǹ tɛ́ pè yĩni n wilki Yesu yõ sɛ̃́pú tĩ̀nkì sɔkɔ.
Ń nɛ́nɔ́nɩ́ Kayusi, káh pèkè pɩ́nɔ́lɛ n yah n pɩ, ǹtɛ pèpɛy wɔ pɩ́nɔ́lɛ n yah n pɩ. Nɛ̂-à pèpɛynɛ n pɩ, Liyel tyɩ́ névi ye tɛ̃̀nɛ. Tɛ́ nɛ̂-à pèkèlɛ n pɩ, tɛ̃̀ náh Liyellɛ n pnɛ.
Demetriyusi tɛ̃̀ wɔlɛ, no pól mɛ ǹmɔ yĩ́gbɩ́lɛ n yo. Gbɩ wɛ̃̀kɩ̀ nɛ̂ tɔ-á à n kɔ, yĩn pèpɛy ye ké tɔlɛ ǹ tyɩ́. Ápi tɔ mɛ ǹ yĩ́gbɩ́lɛ n yo, tɛ́ áwɔ pɩ̃ nɛ nɛ̂-á ápi n yo, gbɩ-á kélɛ.
Tyi náhnáh mɛ ń tyɩ́ yo yo tɛ̃̀nɛ á tyɩ́, tɛ́ mé náh mɛ ké tyɩ́ nɛ mé sè wãrkɩ n tɛkɩ n mɔ á tyɩ́ sɛ́bɛ́y sɔkɔ.
Mé mɛ n yah n kɔ̃ nɛ mé ǹ wɛ kè káh tɔ̃ n mo. Áyâh pɔ wɛ̃ wɛ, á kɩ yãh sé tyɩ́ yõ vyãhlɛ.
Mé kélɛ n yah n kɔ̃ Liyel tyɩ́ nɛ à yèvɩnɩnɛ ǹ kɔ̃.
Á kódíbí n wɛkɩ á tyɩ́. Wɛkɩ ápi tɔ kódíbí tyɩ́ á kɔ̃ pé nɛ́núkù núkú póllɛ.
